tubaki sadayosi tubaki sadayosi, nen gatu niti nen gatu niti ha, nippon no zyaanarisuto, terebi asahi torisimariyaku. henkouhoudou tosite sira reru tinzi ken wo hikioko sita.
zinbutu keireki
toukyougakugeidaigaku sotugyougo, nen nippon kyouiku terebi gen terebi asahi ni nyuusya. hobo ikkan site houdou hatake wo rekinin. houdou bu seizi tantou kisya, wasinton tokuhain, houdou bugai hou tantou desuku, pekin sikyoku nagamo tutome ru. mata nyuusuhu a inaru kyasutaa mo tutome ta.
houdoukyoku zityou wo hete nen ni houdoukyoku tyou. nen gatu karaha torisimariyaku wo kennin sita.
nen gatu niti ni sikyo.
tinzi ken
tubaki ha torisimariyaku houdoukyoku tyou ni zainintyuu no nen gatu, nippon minkan housou renmei no kaigou de, sousenkyo kikantyuu ni hizimin seiken zyuritu wo unagasu houdousisei deatta mune wo hatugen. korega sankeisinbun no houdou niyotte hyoumenka si, henkouhoudou wo kinzi ru housouhou ni ihan sita kanousei wo siteki sareta. koreniyori, tubaki ha gatu ni torisimariyaku to houdoukyoku nagamoto wo kainin sareta. dougetu, tubaki hakono mondai de syuugiin niyoru syouninkanmon wo uke, keisotu na hatugen wo tinsya sitaga, syanai heno houdou naiyou no gutaiteki na sizi nituiteha ikkan site hitei si, akumade henkouhoudou ha itte inaitosita. touzi no yuuseisyou ha terebi asahi no menkyotori kesi mo kentousi taga, saisyuuteki ni gyouseisyobun tosita.
kyakutyuu
kanrenkoumoku
tinzi ken ken
henkouhoudou henkouhoudou
housouhou housouhou
mediariterasii mediariterasii
watanabe tuneo tubaki no wasinton tokuhain zidai karano yuuzin. tinzi ken ikou, tubaki nokotowo ikamesiku hihan siteiru.
kanehira sigeki sigeki
kawamura kouzi kouzi
gaibu rinku
dai kaikoku kai seizikaikaku ni kansu ru tyousa tokubetu iinkai dai gou heisei nen gatu niti tubaki sadayosi heno syouninkanmon no kokkai kaigiroku siozaki tutomu siozaki tutomu, nen syouwa nen ha, nippon no moto saibankan, bengosi daiiti toukyouben go samurai kai, hiranuma myoubou ritu zimusyo . moto toukyou koutou saibansyo hanzi bu soukatu . houseidaigaku daigakuin houmu kenkyuuka kyouzyu.
ryakureki
nen syouwa nen gatu sihousiken dainizi siken goukaku goukaku
nen syouwa nen gatu oosakaitiritudaigaku hougakubu sotugyou sotugyou
nen syouwa nen gatu niti kyouto tihou saibansyo hanzi ho ken kyouto kateisaibansyo hanzi ho ho
nen syouwa nen gatu niti yamaguti tihou saibansyo simonoseki sibu hanzi ho kaneyama kuti kateisaibansyo simonoseki sibu hanzi ho ho
nen syouwa nen gatu niti hirosima tihou saibansyo hanzi ho ken hirosima kateisaibansyo hanzi ho ho
nen syouwa nen gatu niti kusiro kateisaibansyo hanzi ho ken kusiro tihou saibansyo hanzi ho ho
nen syouwa nen gatu niti kusiro kateisaibansyo hanzi ken kusiro tihou saibansyo hanzi hanzi
nen syouwa nen gatu niti toukyoutihou saibansyo hanzi hanzi
nen syouwa nen gatu niti sapporo koutou saibansyo hanzi hanzi
nen syouwa nen gatu niti toukyoutihou saibansyo hanzi saikousaibansyo saibansyo tyousakan tyousakan
nen syouwa nen gatu niti toukyoutihou saibansyo hanzi bu soukatu
nen syouwa nen gatu niti sizuoka tihou saibansyo hanzi bu soukatu ken sizuoka kateisaibansyo hanzi hanzi
nen heisei nen gatu niti hakodate tihou saibansyo tyou ken hakodate kateisaibansyo tyou tyou
nen heisei nen gatu niti nagoya koutou saibansyo hanzi bu soukatu
nen heisei nen gatu niti toukyou koutou saibansyo hanzi bu soukatu
nen heisei nen gatu niti teinentaikan teinentaikan
nen heisei nen gatu niti bengosi touroku daiiti toukyouben go samurai kai
nen heisei nen touin yokohama daigaku hougakubu kyouzyu kyouzyu
nen heisei nen gatu houseidaigaku daigakuin houmu kenkyuuka kyouzyu kyouzyu
nen heisei nen gatu niti zuihou sigemitu syou zyusyou zyusyou
tyosyo
gendai minzisaiban no kadai koutuu songai roudou saigai hentyo sinnihon houki syuppan, nen
saiban zitumu taikei kubun syoyuu kankei sosyou hou hentyo seirinsyoin, nen
saiban zitumu taikei kinyuu sinyou kyouyo torihiki sosyou hou hentyo seirinsyoin, nen
mansyon no houritu hentyo gyousei, nen
kinsen taisyaku no kisotisiki ue sita hentyo seirinsyoin, nen
hudousan torihiki no kisotisiki ue sita sawano yosihiko to kyouhen tyo seirinsyoin, nen
saiban zitumu taikei syakuti syakuya sosyou hou sawano yosihiko to kyouhen tyo seirinsyoin, nen
saiban zitumu taikei sourin kankei sosyou hou andou itirou to kyouhen tyo seirinsyoin, nen
saiban zitumu taikei songaihoken sosyou hou kanazawa ri to kyouhen tyo seirinsyoin, nen
gendai saiban houdai kei ginkou torihiki syouken torihiki sin mituaki to kyouhen tyo sinnihon houki syuppan, nen
saiban zitumu taikei sinsai kankei sosyou hou sawano yosihiko to kyouhen tyo seirinsyoin, nen
gendai saiban houdai kei seimeihoken songaihoken hentyo sinnihon houki syuppan, nen
gendai saiban houdai kei gakkou ziko hentyo sinnihon houki syuppan, nen
sin saiban zitumu taikei kentikukankei sosyou hou andou itirou to kyouhen tyo seirinsyoin, nen
gendai songaibaisyou hou no syomondai hanrei taimuzu sya, nen
koutuu songaibaisyou no syomondai hentyo hanrei taimuzu sya, nen
saiban zitumu taikei seizou mono sekinin kankei sosyou hou hanari mamoto kyouhen tyo seirinsyoin, nen
gendai saiban houdai kei syakuti syakuya sibukawa man, tamada katuya to kyouhen tyo sinnihon houki syuppan, nen
bessatu kinyuu syouzi hanrei syougaku sosyouuu riron to zitumu hentyo keizai hourei kenkyuukai, nen
gendai saiban houdai kei syouhou sousoku syoukoui kawakatu takayuki to kyouhen tyo sinnihon houki syuppan, nen
sin saiban zitumu taikei syakuti syakuya sosyou hou nakano tetuhiro to kyouhen tyo seirinsyoin, nen
sin saiban zitumu taikei hudousan kyoubai sosyou hou sawano yosihiko to kyouhen tyo seirinsyoin, nen
kinyuu syouzi hanrei no kenkyuu kinyuu zaiseizizyou kenkyuukai, nen
kinyuu syouzi torihiki hou no syomondai hanrei taimuzu sya, nen
touki seikyuuken zirei kaisetusyuu hentyo sinnihon houki syuppan, nen
sin saiban zitumu taikei hudousan kantei sosyou hou sawano yosihiko to kyouhen tyo seirinsyoin, nen
sin saiban zitumu taikei hudousan kantei sosyou hou sawano yosihiko to kyouhen tyo seirinsyoin, nen
sin saiban zitumu taikei koutuu songai sosyou hou sonobe hideho to kyouhen tyo seirinsyoin, nen
sin saiban zitumu taikei senmonka sekinin sosyou hou kawai takesi to kyouhen tyo seirinsyoin, nen
iryou kago hanrei no kenkyuu minzi hou zyouhou sentaa, nen
sin saiban zitumu taikei hoken kankei sosyou hou yamasita take to kyouhen tyo seirinsyoin, nen
minzisaiban no zitumuteki kadai minzi houken kyuu kai, nen
zitumu huhoukoui hou kougi hanari mamoto kyouhen tyo minzi houken kyuu kai, nen
sin saiban zitumu taikei ginkou kankei sosyou hou amemiya sinya, yamasita take to kyouhen tyo seirinsyoin, nen
hanrei nimiru kyoudou huhoukoui sekinin hentyo sinnihon houki syuppan, nen
koutuuziko sosyou ogano syouiti, simada kazuhiko to kyouhen tyo minzi houken kyuu kai, nen
minzi hou minpou minzisosyouhou endou kenzi, siomi yosio, tagasira syouiti, masuda zyun to kyouhen tyo minzi houken kyuu kai, nen hoterunyuuwaarudo houkai ziko tyuugokugo sinsekai saketen tou ziken maree go tamiru go toha, nen gatu niti ni singapooru de oki ta biru houkai ziko dearu. tizyou kaidate no biru ga totuzyo houkai si nin ga gareki no sitaziki tonari, uti nin ga kyuuzyo saretaga, nin ga sibou sita.
biru no gaiyou
hoterunyuuwaarudo ha singapooru hokutou no seranguun eigoban niaru, seranguun touri to ooen touri no kousaten ni iti siteita biru dearu rianyakkubiru tyuugokugo masu taika, renmei biru no i no kai kara kai ni nyuukyo siteita hoteru dearu. biru ha nen ni syunkou si, tizyou kai to tikatyuusyazyou kara natu teita. biru niha hokani ginkou no siten ga kai ni, naitokurabu to resutoran ga kai nisorezore tenanto tosite nyuukyo siteita.
ziko no keii
nen gatu niti no gozen toki hun, totuzyo biru ha hun tara zude kanzen ni houkai sita. biru no nyuukyosya ga biru no gareki no sitani torinokosa reta. ziko no ippou wo uke ta touzi no riikuanyuu syusyou ha biru no houkai ha yosougai no dekigoto dattato nobe ta.
kyuuzyo katudou
biru no houkai noti, tuukounin ha seizonsya wo sukuo utosi, sono noti singapooru syoubou kyoku, singapooru keisatu, singapooru gun, kinrin zyuunin mo kyuuzyo katudou ni sanka. zikogo no zikan de nin no seizonsya ga kyuusyutu sareta. singapooru kuugun guni no hayasi mei takesi to hokano kuugun guni, oyobi singapooru hoken syou no nin no isya ha, gareki no okuhukaku ni iki, gareki no sitano seizonsya ni budou tou to seiri syokuensui wo atae ta.
singapooru no masurapiddotoranzitto kensetu ni tazusawa tteita igirisu, airurando, nippon no tikatetu tonneru senmonka ga kyuuzyo katudou ni kyouryoku sita. karera ha zyuuki wo siyousu ruto gareki ga rakka si seizonsya ga husyou surukotowo kenen si, gareki no sitani hon no tonneru wo kussaku site seizonsya wo kyuuzyo sita. kono kouseki kara senmonka raha singapooru seihu kara hyousyou wo uke ta. saigo ni kyuusyutu sareta seizonsya dearu sai kinsyu ha gatu niti ni kyuusyutu sareta. nitikan ni watatu ta kyuuenkatudou ga syuuryou sita noti, nin ga kyuusyutu sare, nin no sibou ga kakuninsa reta.
ziko genin
singapooru seihu no tyousa niyori, biru no konkuriito ha kizyun wo mita siteitakotoga kakuninsa reta. mata tikatetu no kensetu genba ha zikogenba kara yaado no kyori niari, tikatetukouzi ga tatemono ni eikyou wo atae teinaikotoga kakuninsa reta. biru no kanseigo, sekkei niha naka tta okuzyou no kuutyousetubi ya ginkou no oogata kinko nadoga tuika de setti sareteitaga, koreraha sekisai kazyuu no haninai deari, houkai no omona genin dehanaikotoga waka tta.
saisyuuteki na tyousa no kekka, sekisai kazyuu no keisan wosubeki kentikusi ga biru no oonaa kara zinkenhi wo haratu temoraenakattatameni keisan wo kyohi. sono kentikusi no minarai ga sikaku ganainimo kakawa razu biru no oonaa kara muri yari sekisai kazyuu no keisan woyaruyou iwa re sikatanaku itta monodatta. minarai kentikusi ha keisan no ayamari ganaikawo kentikusi ni chekku wo motome taga zenzyutu no zinkenhi no hubarai wo riyuu ni tori atu temoraenakatta. sositesono keisan sita itiren no yousi wo yakusyo ni teisyutu surukotoninattaga, yakusyo mo chekku wo itte inakatta. sarani tatemono ga tae rukotoga dekiru kouzouteki huka wo ayamatu te keisan siteori kotei kazyuu ha keisan sareteinakattakotoga akiraka ninatta. tumari biru ha kansei tousyo kara sudeni zityou ni tae rarenai zyoutai niari, tatemono wo sasae ru hasira nihazutto genkai wo koe ta huka gakakari tuzuke teita. sonotame houkai ha zikan no mondai datta. ziko touzitu, naganen no kahuka ni tae rarezu ippon no hasira ga hason suruto, rensateki ni hokano hasira mo kazyuu wo sasae kirezu hason. hasira wo utu ta biru ha kazyuu wo sasae kirezu, tuini houkai ni itatu ta.
ziko wo daizai tosita sakuhin
nasyonaruziogurafikkutyanneru no terebi bangumi syougeki no syunkan dai siizun dai hanasi singapooru no hoteru toukai ziko gendai
kiseki taiken anbiribaboo nen gatu niti housou housou
kanrenkoumoku
mitoyo hyakkaten kankoku souru niatta hyakkaten. nen ni houkai ziko wo oko si, sono houkai ni itaru madeno mekanizumu ga honzi ken ni ruizi siteiru.
syutten pakurikon ha, koyama motoo niyoru nippon no manga sakuhin. syuukansyounen tyanpion akitasyoten nite rensai sareta. tankoubon ha zen kan.
gaiyou
tuuka seido ga haisi sare, kaitou ga bakko suruyouninatta sekai. densetu no dai kaitou kaitou sirukiido ni akogare, kaitou pakurikon ninatta koukousei, kou makoto haku rou kurama pakurouno monogatari. itiwakanketu dattaga, totyuu kara kaitou sirukiido tono kaitou kassen ninaru. zyuurai dete kuru kaitou mono ga nin nin kaitou kasono kaitou no nisemono ni taisi, butai sonomonoga kaitou ga tasuu syutubotu suru mati de ou yaku ga keizi dehanaku masukomi sibousya toiunomo mezurasii.
touzyouzinbutu
kou makoto haku rou kurama pakurou pakurikon pakurikon
kono manga no syuzinkou.
hudan ha tuneni nemuso una kao wosita sae nai dansikoukou nama. takuetu sita undousinkei wo motu ga syuui karaha kakusi tousi teiru. kaitou pakurikon ni hensin sitatokihasono nouryoku wo ikan naku hakki si, arayurumonowo karei ni nusumi dasu.
tokusyu na syutuzi wo moti, akanbou nokoroni kaitou sirukiido ni hirowa re, sodate rareta. sirukiido ha hutuu no kodomo tosite sodate rutumoridattaga, haku rou zisin ga zibun ga hontou nihosiimonowo nusumi dasi taito negaide takotokara, kaitou gyou no kiso wo tataki komu kotoninaru.
todoroki no ki a todoroki nokia nokia
kou makoto no osananazimi. koukou no sinbun bu ni syozoku suru katudouteki na syouzyo. sukuupu wo nerai, pakurikon wo oi tuzuke ru. hokano buin kara kiken dakara tome toitahougaiito sinpai sareteiru.
todoroki todoroki
keibu. no ki a no titi. no ki a niha keisatukan ninattehosiito negatu teiru. tugitugi to kaitou ga touzyou si tounan ziken ga zokusyutu, izuremo tukama ranaitame syusse ha zetubouteki de, genzyou ni zetubou siteiru.
kodomo nokorokara syounen tantei tosite katuyaku siteori, sirukiido tomo asaka ranu innen wo motu.
kaitou sirukiido sirukiido
haku rou no sodate no oya oziityanto yoba reteiru. katute seken wo sawaga seta densetuteki na dai kaitou. tou ougi novu a kuesutyon wo yuusu ru. omote no kao ha syakaitekitatiba noaru zinbutu.
saru daiziken no noti, touzi akanbou datta haku rou wo hirotu takotowo kini intai siteita. pakurikon no tyouhatu ni nori, genekihukki site pakurikon ni siren wo atae ru.
hokano kaitou tasuu huzimoto takasi huzimoto takasi nen gatu niti ha toukyoudenryoku torisimariyaku hukusyatyou ken denryoku ryuutuu honbutyou. toukyoutosyussin, kanagawaken kawasakisizaizyuu.
ryakureki
nen gatu keiougizyukudaigaku kougakubu sotugyou sotugyou
nen gatu toukyoudenryoku kabusikigaisya nyuusya nyuusya
nen gatu toukyoudenryoku kabusikigaisya daihyoutorisimariyaku hukusyatyou syuunin syuunin
nen gatu niti tainin tainin
zinbutu
toukyoudenryoku torisimariyaku hukusyatyou zidai, zisin no sekimu wo kokoroyoku omotte inaikotowo kougen siteiru. touden yakuin wo yame rarerunara, minna yame tyauyo. nani nimo yoi kotonaizyanaikato, hokano touden yakuin mo onazi isiki wo kyouyuu siteirukotomo honome kasiteiru.
zisin no nigaoe to yakusyokumei iri no meisi to tenugui wo zyouyou, deau nin ni kubatu te mawatu teiru.
kyakutyuu odoru tuinzu odoru tuinzu, gendai ha, nen ni koukai sareta indo no romanteikkukomedi eiga. deviddodawan ga kantoku wo tutome, sarumankaan, karisyumakapuuru, ranbaa ga syutuen siteiru. nen koukai no no rimeiku dearu.
arasuzi
kyasuto
razya, puremumaruhotora sarumankaan sarumankaan
marasyaruma karisyumakapuuru karisyumakapuuru
rupa ranbaa ranbaa
sandaribatowani bindou bindou
syarumasaabu kadirukaan kadirukaan
ranziira syakuteikapuuru syakuteikapuuru
havu a rudaaruvidiyarudi anupamukaa anupamukaa
havu a rudaaru sateiisyusyaa sateiisyusyaa
wakai korono razya omukarukapuuru omukarukapuuru
ratanarutaigaa mukeesyurisi mukeesyurisi
maruhotora daripputahiru daripputahiru
razya, puremu no haha riimaraguu riimaraguu
housekisyou dineesyuhinguu gesuto syutuen
hoteru no ueitaa ramusetei gesuto syutuen
kougyou syuunyuu
niyoruto, honsaku ha koutyou na sutaato wo kiroku sita. indo kokunai no kougyou syuunyuu ha oku man rupii wo kiroku sita. sonouti kokunai zyunrieki ha oku man rupii tonatteori, dounen no kougyouseiseki ha dai kurai wo kiroku siteiru. kaigai no kougyou syuunyuu ha man doru wo kiroku si, goukei kougyou syuunyuu ha oku man rupii tonatta.
ribuuto
nen gatu niti ni honsaku no ribuuto tonaru no seisaku ga happyou sareta. kantoku ha dawan ga hutatabi tutome, syuen niha kano musuko vu a rundawan ga kiyou sareta. eiga ha nen gatu niti ni koukai sareta.
syutten
gaibu rinku
eigo
odoru tuinzu ryomuteoku hanguru , tyousengo raten honzi , ren dai , nen gatu niti ha, kitatyousen, heizyou tyokkatu si syussin no zyosei figyuasukeeto sensyu peasukeeteingu . paatonaa ha kimuzyusiku.
omona senseki
siizun madeha otyangon tono pea pea
siizun ha kimumuson to pea pea
siizun karaha kimuzyusiku tono pea pea
syousai
puroguramu siyou kyoku
sono hoka
ryomuteoku to kimuzyusiku no pea ga tosihira masa orinpikku no syutuzyouwaku wo kitatyousen de yuiitu eta ga nen getumatu no kigen madeni kokusai sukeeto renmei ni syutuzyou tuuti wosinakatta. naoha suisenwaku wo atae rukotowo kentousi teori, gorin syutuzyou no miti ha nokotu teiru.
sankoubunken
kokusai sukeeto renmei niyoru ryonteoku kimuzyusiku no baiogurafii eigo
kyakutyuu sitai wo kau otoko sitaiwokauotokoha, utano syougo niyoru nippon no syousetu.
arasuzi
edogawaranpo no mihappyou saku hakkotu oni ga hakken sare bungeisi ni keisai sareru sorewo mita sakka no hosomi tatu toki ha taihen na kyoumi wo simesu. sikasisono sakuhin niha sakusya mo sira nai zizitu ga kakusa reteita.
hakkotu oni oni
omou youni sakuhin ga kake zu, kunou no matu ni zisatu wo hakaro utosita tanteisyousetu ie no watasi ha, omoi gakezu zisatu wo habama reru. sukutu tekureta tukamoto tyoku wo inoti no onzin to sitau watasi deattaga, kano kiheki wo siri keien suruyouninaru. kan monaku, kareha zisatu wositesimau. watasi no yuuzin hagiwara sakutarou no si no ippen tenzyou isi ninazoraetayouni. sikasi, ikkou ni itai ha aga razu, husin na ten moikutuka mitu kari, watasi ha tantei syumi wo motu sakutarou to tomoni ziken wo sirabe hazime teyuku.
touzyouzinbutu
hakkotu oni
watasi edogawa ranpo edogawa ranpo ranpo
sakka. omou youni syousetu ga kake zu, zisatu wo kokoromi youtositatokorowo tukamoto suguni tasuke rareru. honmyou oyobi hitumei wo kakusi, kou u raita hirou raitatoiu gimei honmyou hirai tarou no anaguramu de tousyuku si, naotto saikai suru.
tukamoto tyoku tukamoto tadasi tadasi
hamakaze sou ni syukuhaku siteiru urizane kao no bi seinen. koukousei. zisatu wo hakaro utositeita watasi wo tasuke ru. hiruma ha hutuu ni sugo suga, yoru ha zyosou si gatu ni koi i koga reru sugata kara, ryokan no zyuugyouin kara gatu koi yano kanzya to kimiwaru garareteiru. hagiwara sakutarou no gatu ni hoe ruwo yonde iru.
akamatu mon tarou akamatu montarou montarou
kii sirahama tanabe keisatusyo no keisatukan.
okumura genzou okumura genzou genzou
tukamoto no sitai no daiiti hakkensya. yatai uri.
tukamoto taizou tukamoto daizou daizou
suguno titioya. aitiken gi.
tukamoto hitosi tukamoto hitosi hitosi
suguno hutago no otouto. watasi ni suguno yuurei to matigae rareru.
kitagawa yukie kitagawa yukie yukie
hamakaze sou deno suguno yousu wo kika sete hosii, to watasi ni menkai wo motome tekita zyosei. tukamoto kyoudai toha you nazimi. hitosi tono endan ga kima tteitaga, suguno houga suki datta.
hagiwara sakutarou hagiwara sakutarou sakutarou
sizin. watasi no kazusukunai yuuzin. zibun no si wo motiihu ni zisatu saretanoha huyukai datosite, ziken no sinsou kaimei wo watasi ni moti kakeru.
genzitusekai
hosomi tatu toki hosomi tatutoki tatutoki
syouwa nen, tosi no tokini suiri bundan ni debyuu. debyuu saku kara tuzuku mugen yonbu saku wo kanketu saseta noti ha, yoi monoga kake zu, kiyosi ku intai sita.
kanno kenitirou sugano kenitirou kenitirou
ao kaze sya toiu syuppansya no syatyou. hosomi ga intaigo yuiitu tukiai wo tuzuke ru syuppangyoukai no nin.
nisizaki kazuya nisizaki kazuya kazuya
sinzin sakka. keikan datta sohu no syuki wo motoni hakkotu oni wo sippitu sita. hosomi no hu a n.
bikou
sakutyuu saku hakkotu oni no syoudai niha, edogawaranpo no sakuhinmei ga ooku siyousa reteiru. mata sakutyuu nimo ooku touzyou suru nomi hagiwara sakutarou no sakuhin . ika hasono itibu.
dangai dangai
kitan kitan
gatu ni hoe ru ru
tenzyou isi
yuurei yuurei
souseizi souseizi
nin denasino koi koi
giwaku giwaku
yaneura no sanpo mono mono
isikure no himitu himitu
peten si to kuuki otoko otoko
yubi yubi
oni oni
siraga oni oni
dai ansitu ansitu
akunin sigan sigan
hyaku mensou yakusya yakusya
oodanen oodanen
osorosiki sakugo sakugo
akuryou akuryou
hitori niyaku niyaku
kanrenkoumoku
sakutyuu saku saku
kyakutyuu hurumetarupanikku no touzyouzinbutu hurumetarupanikku notouzyouzinbutuha, tyosya ga higasi syou ni, irasuto siki douzi no raitonoberu oyobi sorewo gensaku tosuru manga, anime hurumetarupanikku ni touzyou suru kakuu no zinbutu no itiran dearu. anime mangaban deha sutoorii ga raitonoberu han to saibu de kotona tteirutokoromoaruga, kihonteki ni honkou ha raitonoberu han wo kihon tosuru.
koe no hyouki ha anime han dorama han dearu. kisaisa reteiru seiyuu ga mei no baai ha anime han wo sasu.
syuyouzinbutu
sagara sousuke sousuke
honsaku no syuzinkou. misuriru sakusen bu nisi taiheiyou sentai touahaadedanan rikusen yunitto tokubetu taiou han syozoku. kaikyuu ha gunsou.
tidori kaname kaname
honsaku no hiroin. tousyo ha hutuu no zyosikoukousei dattaga, uisupaado to yoba reru tokusyunouryoku mono dearukotoga kakuteisi, sekaizyuu no sosiki kigyou kokka kara hisoka ni migara wo nerawa reru koto ninaru.
misuriru sakusen bu
sakusen honbu
zieroomubooda zieroomubooda
koe kisino kazuhiko kazuhiko
misuriru sakusen bu no sou sekininsya. kaikyuu ha meizi sareteinaiga, teitoku to syousa rerukotokara syoukan kurai niaruto suitei sareru.
moto amerika kaigun koukan de, tessa no titi kaarutesutarossa ha buka deari yuuzin demoaru. teresatesutarossa karaha zierii ozisama to yoba reteiru.
tuzuku onmaioun niokeru amarugamu no issei kougeki no kiwa, sidonii niaru sakusen honbu biru no bakugeki ni makikoma re seisi humei dattaga, notini kaimetu sita misuriru no saiken wo susume teitakotogazutto, sutandobaimii nite akiraka ninatta.
moderu ha zituzai sita zinbutu zieremiibooda taisyou.
zyakuson han settei
koe ootaki sinya sinya
misuriru sakusen busyo zoku. booda teitoku no hisyokan. kaikyuu ha taii.
sakusen bu nisi taiheiyou sentai touahaadedanan
sentai zyoukyuusikikan
teresatesutarossa teresatesutarossa
koe yukana minami omi omi
misuriru sakusen bu nisi taiheiyou sentai sousireikan touahaadedanan kantyou. kaikyuu ha taisa. monogatari kaisizi no nenrei ha tosi. koorusain ha ansuzu . aisyou ha tessa . uisupaado.
nagai ginpatu sakutyuu deha assyuburondo to hyouki to haiiro no hitomi wo motu, suisuoosutoria kei oyobi itaria kei no ti wo hiku amerika nin.
tyokkan tikara ya dousaturyoku, sikou bunseki nouryoku ni masare, butai sikinouryoku ha hitori de beteran senzyutu sakusen sikan tiimu wo daikou suruhododearu. tohaiekanameto dounenrei dearu koto kara keiken gayaya tari naitokoromoari, mata nengoro no syouzyo tosite omoi nayamu tokoromoaru. keikenbusoku ni kansi teha, ikani nobe ru hukukan rano zyogen ga zyuuyouna youso tonatteiru. mata, nisi taiheiyou sentai sousireikan oyobi kantyou ni tyakunin sita tyokugo ha, ooku no buka karasono nenrei yuenitadano komusume toiu mede mira reteori, sono kankei gakanari gikusyaku siteita.
yousyouki kara uisupaado tositeno nouryoku wo hatugen siteori, ani no renaado to tomoni kisoriron wo kumitate tawo ouyou sita kaku misairu ga kuueeto de siyousa re, suusenmannin no sisyousya ga deta kotogakikkakede, sono syokuzai notameni misuriru he nyuutai si tatakau miti wo erabu.
kihonteki niha nyuuwa na seikaku nanodaga, tuzuku onmaioun de merida kiti no zenin ga si wo kakugo suru zyoukyou ni otiiri, youin no itibu ga tessa wo temiyage ni amarugamu he negaero utositatoki mikata demo uragiru nara korose rutoiu kakugo wo kime rareru dokyou wo mise ta noti, kono zyoukyou demo akirame zu sinu natoiu meirei wo hassi, rekisen no sensitati dearu misuriru no zenin kara ikei no henrei wo uke ta.
onazi uisupaado no banimorauta no zisatu noti, sousuke ni koui wo dai taga, kare nihaakumade tyokusetu sessu ru saizyoui no zyoukan de ihu to tyuusei no taisyou tosika mira reteorazu, hotondo kouryuu monaimama hura reta. kanametoha onazi uisupaado toiu koto moari yuuzinkankei dearu. honpentyuu ban ikou ha tessa siten de monogatari ga susumu koto mo ooku nari, zissituteki na zyun syuzinkou toiu tati iti tonatteiru.
misuriru kaimetu noti ha misuriru zantou no sousikikan ninatteori, tohou monai zyuuseki wo seoi, buka tatiwo matome age te saisyuukessen made tatakai nui ta.
nande mokonaseru hutago no ani renaado toha tigai kyokudo no undou onti tadasi suiei, toriwake sensui eihou ha tokui deari, sibasiba kabe nibutukattari, nanimo nai tokorodetumazuite koron darisuru. sikasi, ne boketeiru tokini ha, sousuke tooru puro nisura kehai wo sattisa renai. tanpen deha megami no rainiti de touahaadedanan no seibi no mani kyuuka wo tukatte, sousuke raga kayou zin dai koukou ni tanki ryuugaku wosita. saisyuukessen noti ha booda kara touahaadedanan gou kan ga tukura retara kantyou wosinaikato dasin saretagamappiragomendesuto kyohi si, nyuuyooku niaru mao no apaato ni isourou site, katuteno buka ya banimorauta no hakamairi wosuru hibi wo okutu teiru. karetu na sentou no hibi kara sutoresu de geki yase sitaga, kessen noti hasono handou de tabe aruki ya muda na kaimono wosurukotoga hue teori, taizyuu ga modoru to douzini basuto mawari ga seityousi tutuaru.
zyuusuunen notino hurumetarupanikku anazaa deha, kasiramozi karato yoba reteori, saisyuukan de zyuusyou kara kaihuku sita merissa wo rana to tomoni houmon siteiru.
rityaadohenriimadeyuukasu rityaadohenriimadeyuukasu
koe nisimura tomomiti ootukaakira otto otto
touahaadedanan hukutyou. kaikyuu ha tyuusa.
moto igirisu kaigun torahu a rugaa kyuu gensiryoku sensuikan taabyuranto kantyou fookurando hunsou toki ha tyaatiru kyuu gensiryoku sensuikan konkaraa hukutyou .
seikaku ha kimazime de, zyakkan syakusizyougi ni sugi rukiraigaari, kodomo no goro kara seizen to tituzyo tate rareta zyoutai wo konon deita. sono seikaku wo arawasu kanoyouni chesu wo tasinamu. sonoatariwo hukume te indoa ha to me sareteori, honnin mosorewo mitome teiruga, tokuni undou ga nigate toiuwakedehanai.
tokiori, tessa ni taisi te zibun no musume wo miru youna men wo mise, kanozyo ga koui wo yose teiru sousuke wo zyakkan so nziteiru kiga aru. tessa to tomoni zin dai koukou wo otozure ta saini ha sousuke ni kozyuuto nogotoku puressyaa wokake, kanozyo ni nanika attara, kun wo bakuyaku to tomoni gyoraihassyakan ni tume te syasyutu siteyarutomade odosi teita. tessa ni taisi teha zyoukan tosite mamu zyosei no zyoukan ni taisuru keisyou de yobu ga, kanozyo no huan niha binkan ni hannou sitesarigenaku foroo wo ire runadosuru kizukai no nin de, yutaka na zinseikeiken ga miekakure siteiru. kikonsya deattaga, wangansensou no goroni rikon siteiru.
sensuikan niyoru sentou sikinouryoku no takasa, reitetu de tekikaku na saihai kara kousyaku deyuuku no imyou wo motu. honki wo dasu saini haitumo ootu teiru bousi wo zengogyaku ni koumuru kuse gaaru. senkyoku wo chesu noyouni hukan si, tuneni tugino itte wo sakiyomi suru sutairu wo moti, pasifikkukurisarisu gou no ziken de tessa huzai no wo siki sita saini ha, amarugamu no kousoku sensuikan rivu a iasan seki wo honrou si, yasuyasu to sou tta.
sakutyuu de ootu teiru bousi ha, igirisu kaigun zidai, kaarutesutarossa ga kantyou wo tutome ru sensuikan wo sukutu ta saino o rei to, keii to zyooku no imi mo kome te kare kara okura reta mono. nao, kaaru ha seizen, kare ni tessa tooru no nouryoku no koto wo hanasi teita.
andoreiserugeivittikariinin andoreiserugeivittikariinin
koe ootukaakira otto otto
misuriru sakusen bu nisi taiheiyou sentai touahaadedanan rikusen komando sikikan. kaikyuu ha syousa. koorusain ha paasu . nao, tanpen deha titi sei wo serugeeiviti to hyouki sareteiru hatuon tositehakotirano houga yori neiteivu ni tikai .
katuteha so turano tokusyubutai supetunazu sikikan dattaga, inbou niyotte genzai ha so ren wo owa reteiru.
ikanaru zitai nimo zyuunanni taiou si, ninmu tassei to buka no anzen wo zyuusi suruga, hituyou toareba buka wo kirisute ru handan wo kudase ru hizyou samo motu yuusyuu na sikikan dearu. sousuke ha taizi sita kiwa, katu bekusite kati, make rutokiniha songai wo saisyougen ni osae ru tegatai siki wotoru kyouteki dato ronzi ta.
iriina toiu vu a iorinisuto no tuma gaitaga, ninsintyuu no taityouhuryou niyoru syoti tokini tantoui ga iryou ziko wo oko si bosi tomoni sikyo siteiru. nao, ahuganisutan de sousuke to saikai sita tousyo ha, kare wo yousi nisite reninguraado de nin de kura sukotomo kangae teita.
kare ga tukuru tuma no aziwo saigen sitatoiu borusiti ha kokoapaudaa to miso peesuto ga itutu teori, sono azi ha tessa gaatatakai dokutaapeppaa to hyousi teita. kariinin hakorewo saigen suruniatari, nabe nokaki maze hou yasono kaisuu, hi nokake hou ya zikan wo hizyouni ikamesiku keisoku sitedeha ritomasu sikensi de sanseido made kakuninsi teiru kanseisa seta. kono borusiti wo tabe ni konai kato sousuke wo sasou ga, sousuke ha koe wo urakaesi nagara senyaku gaaruto tatu tahododearu. tessa ha, iriina ga kariinin nikonoyouna borusiti wo tukutu teitanoha, sigoto dehotondo ie ni kaetu tekonai otto heno, semetemono iyagarase dehanaikato suisoku siteiru. douzini, kakoku na senzyou seikatu no eikyou de, konoyouna borusiti wo oisii to kanzi ru mikaku ninattesimatta kariinin ni douzyou sita.
tuzuku onmaioun nioite tessa tooru wo syuugeki butai kara mamori, sono kiwa nige okure te yukuehumei tonaruga, tudou meikumaidei deha amarugamu kanbu misuta kariumu tosite araware ru.
igo no koudou nituiteha amarugamu no koumoku wo sansyou.
tokubetu taiou han
beruhu a ngankuruuzoo ngankuruuzoo
koe oyama rikiya rikiya
rikusen komando tokubetu taiou han no sikikan. kaikyuu ha tyuui noti taii . koorusain ha uruzu . ahurika kei kanada nin no isuramu kyouto.
moto tityuukai sentai paruhooron syozoku katuteha kanadian ni syozoku .
kano zyouki ha keiretu ki hu a ruke. sono sentou ginou ha sousuke wo haruka ni uwamawari, aabaresuto tono mogisen deha sousuke wo attou siteiru. to kodaaru tono tui de hazimete syouri wo osame tanomo kare dearu.
tyuugoku buzyutu ni tuuzi, taizyutu ni kansi teha waza sukiru dehanaku zyutu aato ga daizi to katatu teori, no kinsetu sentou demo tyuugoku buzyutu no waza wo kuri dasu kotoga kanou.
syumi ha anime kansyou de, sinsaku chekku notameni nyuutaipu. . . wo aidoku. mata, sono teno hyouron saito no zyouren demoarurasii. sono koto ha hokano taiin niha himitu nisiteiruga, honnin hakorewoakumade butai no siki ni kakawa rutamedeari, kessite hazukasii kara nado toiu riyuu dehanaito hissi ni kyoutyou siteita. nihongo no benkyou wo sukosi zutu susume teori, intaigo ha honyakuka wositaito kangae teiru.
kuti niha dasa naimonono hizyouni nakama omoi na zinbutu deari, senpai deari senyuu demoaru geirumakkaran wo sonkei siteita. mata kurutuueebaa toha tyakuninzi kara kenaku na kankei ga tuzui teitaga, naisin deha hyouka siteiru kare wo soutyou ni syoukaku saserukotowo teian sitanoha kuruuzoo dearu.
metarikkugaadian tono kurosuoobaaripurei deha, gensakusya dearu ga higasi ga pureiyaa wo tutome ru kyarakutaa tosite touzyou. gensaku syuuryougo ni anime no seisaku sinkou no syoku nituiteitaga, isekai ni toba sareru.
geirumakkaran geirumakkaran
koe ogawa takasi si si
honpen zyoban niokeru rikusen komando tokubetu taiou han no sikikan. kaikyuu ha taii. koorusain ha uruzu kuruuzoo no zenninsya .
moto oosutoraria syozoku. zayuu no mei ha ike ru ku ha, sise ru sisi ni masare ri. kouhai dearu kuruuzoo mokono kotoba wo kiniitu teita.
syuukou issyuunen kinen paateii deno bingo taikai de itii wo kati tori, tessa no kisu toiu eiyo wo kati toru. sikasi, sono kouhatu nasi ta kannai deno sentou de, amarugamu to tuuzi teita guenbienboo niyori syasatu sareru.
merissamao merissamao
koe neya mitiko mitiko
rikusen komando tokubetu taiou han syozoku. kaikyuu ha soutyou noti syoui tyuui . koorusain ha uruzu zenninsya no tainin izen ha uruzu . ninsiki bangou ha . tosi. tyuugokukei amerika nin de, tyuugokugo mo hanase ru. nyuuyooku syussin.
moto amerika kaiheitai syozoku humeiyo zyotai . titi ha amerika kuugun no bakugekiki pairotto de, genzai ha kigyou no syatyou daga, mukasi kara ori ai ga waruka tta. nyuutai no riyuu ha, titioya ga eran da kekkonaite to muriyari kekkon saseraresouninattanoni hara ga tati, uedingudoresu sugata nomamade kaiheitai no tyoubo zimusyo ni itte nyuutai no mousikomi wositatoiu goutan na riyuu. densi sen no supesyarisuto deari, kougaku no syuusigou mo motu teiruhoka, gaanzubakku no kaihatu nimo kakawa tteiru.
seikaku haiwayuru anego hada. mata, ikara seruto yousya nai tekken seisai to kaiheitai sikomi no barizougon ga tobu.
biiru igai no sake wo non deiruto, hukou nakotoga oki rutoiu zinkusu wo motu teiru.
sakutyuu deha behemosu nigoto nigiri tubusaretari, gaurun nide taosa rete zyuusyou wo otu taritoyarareru koto ga ooi ga, akuun ga tuyoi tameka nanigoto monaku iki nobi teiru.
semaru nikkuobutaimu nite kurutu to danzyo no naka ninaruga, nenreisa wo kini siteka koui wo kuti nisuru koto hanakatta. amarugamu tono tatakai ga owa tta noti ha kurutu tono mani kodomo wo mi gomori, nyuuyooku no apaato ni teizyuu site ansei ni sugo siteiru.
hurumetarupanikku anazaa deha, . . . . sya no syatyou tonatteori, kurara toiu musume gairu.
tananamasaato tananamasaato
moto rikusen komando tokubetu taiou han syozoku. kaikyuu ha tyuui. koorusain ha uruzu mao no zenninsya .
engeezisikkususebun no boutou ni touzyou. no kouka kunren nakani tuirakuziko wo oko sita zyakkuuein ni makikoma re husyou suru. sono saino kouisyou de migiasi to kosi ni syougai ga nokotu tatameni opereetaa wo tuzuke rarenakunari, zyouhoubu ni tenzoku sita.
kyasutero kyasutero
koe itou kazuaki kazuaki
rikusen komando tokubetu taiou han syozoku. kaikyuu ha tyuui. koorusain ha uruzu .
zinsyuteki niha raten kei de, kuti higega tokutyou. syoki taiou han no sikikan mo kenmu siteiru.
tuzuku onmaioun nioite, boroboro ninari nigekire zuni behemosu ni humi tubusa resouninatta mao no wo kanippatu de kyuusyutu sitaga, sono tyokugo mao wo kiti he niga sutameni mizukara otori tonari sonsyou sita zibun no de behemosu to tatakai, saigo ha miri houdan wo tairyou ni uke, kitai goto barabara nisare sibou sita.
hamaa hamaa
rikusen komando tokubetu taiou han syozoku. kaikyuu ha tyuui. koorusain ha uruzu .
kyousyuu yusou tai no sikikan mo kenmu siteiru. sakutyuu niha namae ga deru dakedearu.
rozyaasandaraputa rozyaasandaraputa
koe kimura masasi masasi
rikusen komando tokubetu taiou han syozoku. kaikyuu ha gunsou. koorusain ha uruzu .
namae ha tatakau booimiitugaaru de sudeni touzyou siteiruga, zissaini kyarakutaa tosite touzyou sitanoha owa ru deibaidei no gekan.
neiteibuamerikan doragonmagazin keisai han no odoru beriimeriikurisumasu no kizyutu niyoreba nabaho zoku no kyokan deari, tuneni reisei de kamoku. sikasi amari ni kamoku dearutameni, makkaran, kuruuzoo no souhou kara ude ha tasika daga riidaa muki dehanaitoiu hyouka wo uke teiru.
tuzuku onmaioun deha kurutu ya supekku rato tomoni behemosu wo geigeki sita saini zyuusyou wo oi, rihabiritoreeningu wo itte kaihuku sita.
kurutuueebaa kurutuueebaa
koe miki sinitirou sinitirou
rikusen komando tokubetu taiou han syozoku. kaikyuu ha gunsou noti soutyou . koorusain ha uruzu . ninsiki bangou ha . nippon sodati no doitu nin.
titioya ga sinbunsya no tokuhain datta kankei de, tyuugakusei madeha toukyou no edogawaku ni sumi, titi no housin de nasyonarusukuuru dehanaku, zimoto no kouritu kou kasai daiyon tyuugakkou ni tuugaku siteita. doitu go yorimo nihongo no houga ryuutyou de, honnin mo zisin ha nihonzin dearutoiu isiki ga tuyoku, hakumai ya yakitori nadono nihonsyoku wo konomu. nihonsi mo itiou geneki no nippon no koukousei demoaru sousuke ni dame dasidekiruhodo. syumi no hitotu dearu gitaa no ude ha semipuro kyuu deari, tyuugakuzidai no onsi no siiba to deatu ta saini ha, taieki site gitarisuto wo mezasu kotowo kangae kaketa.
akaruku youki na seinen de, zassi no moderu wo tutome takotogaaruhodono bikei daga, kuti wo hirake ba gehin geretu na seikaku ga tuyu ninari, sekuhara soudou mo nitizyousahanzi deari, honsaku niokeru komikkuririihu tekina yakuwari wo ninau. sikasi, reitetu na sogeki te tositeno bou moari, sono bou niha mao desura tasyou no kyouhu wo kanzi rukotogaaru.
tero niyotte ryousin wo usinai, hukusyuu wo mokuteki ni youhei tonatta keii wo motu. kasupaa no butai to yoba reru sogeki mono syuudan no naka de toukaku wo arawasu ga, kazoku no ada wo sogeki suru saini rana toiu syouzyo wo maki kon desimatta zissaini te wo kudasi tanoha kasupaa tame kasupaa no sita wo satu ta. rana wo iki nagara esaserubeku kanozyo wo iryousisetu heto syuuyou sase, genzai demosono iryouhi wo enzyo si tuzuke teita. mata, rebanon de sousuke to tatakatu ta koto gaattaga, misuriru ni nyuutai sitekaramoo tagaini sono zizitu wo sira naideiru.
sakutyuu deha kuruuzoo to tomoni hi ramudadoraiba tousaiki touzyousya tositeha kyouiteki na senka wo age teiru. kano sogeki ginou ha namami touzyou toki wo towa zu tyouzinteki deari, genkai made supiido wo age te soukoutyuu no keitora kku no nidai kara behemosu no toubu kikanhou no houkou ni raihuru dan wo uti kon de hakai surunado, zuisyo de kamiwaza tekina tekunikku wo mise ru. ni tousai sareteiru tyoukou seinou na syouzyun hoseikinou desura kano sainou no mae deha zyama ninari, kurutu hasono kinou wo katto siteiruhodo. sono ginou ha kariinin kara sagara sousuke ga touzyou sita reebatein yorimo kyoui to hyousa reteiru ippou de, kakutou hasahodo tokui dehanairasiku, mao nimarude tinpira to hyousa reteiru.
semaru nikkuobutaimu deha sogeki no si dearu kasupaa to taizi. dousi no sogeki sen ni yabure te kitai ha taiha si zisin mo timeisyou wo ou ga, teki ni houi sareta sousuke tatiwo sukuu tame, namami de kasupaa no kiroku wo uwamawaru kyori deno sogeki ni tyousen. kasupaa wo sitome ruga tikaratuki, sibou sitato omowa reta. zissaini ha, sousuke raga tettai sita tyokugo ni yamusuku ni kake tuketa so turano tyokuzoku no tokusyubutai ni syuuyou sareteori, zutto, sutandobaimii de sogeki sen siyou no syadou wo katu te kaku misairu kiti syuuhen no sentou ni kake tuketa.
amarugamu tono tatakai no noti ha arata na zigyou wo hazime ru zyunbi notame, sekaikakkoku wo tabi suru tabou na hibi wo sugo siteiru. sono totyuu de teruabibu ni tati yori, rana woyori setubi noii byouin ni utusu tameno tetuzuki wo itte iru.
zyuusuunen notino hurumetarupanikku anazaa kan ni touzyou si, uruzu no koorusain wo tukatte kurara no kyuusyutusakusen ni sanka si, tyouzinteki na sogeki wo itta. honrai no dame na bubun ga medatu tekiteiruga, musume no kurara niha sitawa reteiru. mata, mao toha rikon to saikon wo kurikaesi teiru.
zyakkuuein zyakkuuein
moto rikusen komando tokubetu taiou han syozoku. kaikyuu ha gotyou. koorusain ha uruzu sousuke no zenninsya .
engeezisikkususebun no boutou de touzyou. no kouka kunren nakani tuirakuziko wo oko sita. ooki na kega ha naka ttamonono, tuiraku no syunkan kami ga mie nanzi, mayoe ru kohituzi yo. buki wo sute te, ebiwo kaku reto tuge rareta.
genzai ha misuriru wo yame, hurorida nite ryousi wositeiru.
supekku supekku
koe iizima hazime hazime
rikusen komando tokubetu taiou han syozoku. kaikyuu ha gotyou. koorusain ha uruzu .
moto amerika kaigun tokusyubutai syozoku. no souzyuu gizyutu hakanarino reberu wo motu. kabu torihiki ga syumi de sizyou zyouhou nadoni kuwasiku, kurutu ni man doru wo bai nisite kaesu to hutu kaketa koto gaaru.
owa ru deibaidei kouhen niokeru honkon deno sentou deha venomu niyotte kitai wo gekiha sareruga, sono kiwa ha seikan suru.
tuzuku onmaioun nioite, syutugeki no tyokuzen niha katime ga nai toiu handan kara misuriru wo uragiro utosita. sikasi tessa no kakugo wo meno atari nisi kangae wo aratame, amarugamu no kyousyuu butai to kousen. behemosu no sogeki ni sippai sita kurutu ni saido tyansu wo atae rutameni mizukara otori tonari, ramudadoraiba no tyokugeki wo uke te sibou sita.
yanzyungyu yanzyungyu
koe sasaki bou, okada takayuki oodiodorama nomi nomi
rikusen komando tokubetu taiou han syozoku. kaikyuu ha gotyou notino gunsou . koorusain ha uruzu . ninsiki bangou ha . kankoku no taikyuu syussin.
nisi taiheiyou sentai no youin no naka de yuiitu no touzyou sikaku wo motu teinaiga, hohei tositeno nouryoku ya kuruma no untengizyutu ni masare teiru. mukasi ha reesingudoraibaa wo mezasi te touge wo seme teitaga, kinsenteki na mondai desono yume wo akirame ta. sono noti, bokoku no tyouheisei ni ouzi te rikugun ni itutu ta notini sainou ga kaika si, uyokyokusetu wo hete misuriru ni nyuutai. onkou na seikaku de taiintati no isakai nadono tyuusai yaku mo kare ga tutome rukotoga ooi ga, senzi ya kinkyuuzi niha hokano taiin douyou no sensi tositeno huukaku wo mise ru. sikasi kyasutero karaha kokoro gakeno men de otoru to hyousa re, heno koukaku mo kentousa reteita. syuui niha akuun haaru yuusyuu daga, nin ga yosu girunoga ketten zimi de medata nai yatu toiu ninsiki wo mota reteiru.
sakutyuu deha youin no uu to issyoni koudou siteiru koto ga ooi.
mandera mandera
rikusen komando tokubetu taiou han syozoku. kaikyuu ha humei. koorusain ha uruzu .
kouzyutu suru guen no kounin tosite, nisi taiheiyou sentai ni haizoku saretamonoto omowa reru. gutaiteki na zinbutu byousya ha ima no tokoro hotondo nai.
tuzuku onmaioun de hatutouzyou si, kurutu ya supekku rato tomoni behemosu wo de geigeki sita.
syoki taiou han
hawaado hawaado
rikusen komando syoki taiou han syozoku. kaikyuu ha gotyou.
odoru beriimeriikurisumasu nioite, pasifikkukurisarisu gou wo nisi taiheiyou sentai ga siizyakku sita kiwa, zyuu wo ubatu te tousou suru zyoukyaku kiriiseiraa kome kaigun tyuusa no tinatu ni muka uga, tessa ga hitoziti nisareteitatameni torigaa wo hiku kotoga dekizu, gomu dan wo kura ttesimau.
sono noti sennai ni araware ta arasutoru wo sousuke ya kurutu tatito tomoni geigeki si, mune ni zyuudan wo ukeru ga, bodiiaamaa wo soubi siteitatame nan wo nogare ta.
uu uu
koe hakutyou satosi satosi
rikusen komando syoki taiou han syozoku. kaikyuu ha ittouhei odoru beriimeriikurisumasu ikou ha zyoutouhei . koorusain ha kano .
zinsyuteki niha tyuugokukei daga, nanboku tyuugoku no syussin nanoka, aruiha mao douyou no tyuugokukei imin nanokaha humei. no souzyuu sikaku wo motu teiruga, sakutyuu deni touzyou sitakotoha nai .
sakutyuu deha yan to koudou wo tomoni siteirukotoga ooku, yan to douyou ni sokona yaku mawari ga mawatu tekurukotomo ooi.
zutto sutandobaimii nite, ahugan no kaku misairu kiti dakkan sakusen ni sankatyuu, notte ita yusouki ga kougeki sareta saini zyuusyou wo otu ta. soutou ikamesii dameezi wo otu taga, buzi ni kousou sarete kuruuzoo to issyono byouin ni katugi koma re, inoti ha tori tome ta.
ryansyaopin ryansyaopin
koe sugita tomokazu tomokazu
rikusen komando syoki taiou han syozoku. kaikyuu ha ittouhei.
yure ru intouzaburuu nioite, youin dearu zyondanigan to tomoni, tora eta gaurun no kansi wositeitaga, danigan ni uragira re syasatu sareta.
haturei syoyou in
uiriamugodaato uiriamugodaato
koe usuitakayasu usuitakayasu
haturei tokoro kanpan sikan. kaikyuu ha taii.
din din
haturei tokoro koukaisi kan. kaikyuu ha taii.
dezirani dezirani
koe yamagisi kou kou
haturei tokoro sonaa in. kaikyuu ha gunsou.
houkoku no kiwa, rizumu wo toru youna kutyou de syaberu kuse gaaru.
heitan guruupu
edowaado buruuzaa sakkusu sakkusu
koe murozono takehiro takehiro
heitan guruupu dai seibityuu tai no sikikan. kaikyuu ha tyuui. hurorida syussin.
moto amerika rikugun syozoku. nyuutai tousyo ha hohei dattaga, sakusen nakano husyou niyotte seibi hei ni tenkou suru. sono noti ha seibi hei tosite zituryoku wotuketeitaga, kuruzisutan deno sakusenkoudou nakani ni hassei sita toraburu wo genin ni rikugun wo zyotai. rikugun zidai ni gakusi gou wo yagaku de syutoku siteiru. honnin iwaku, syoukou rasiku atukawa rerunoga sei ni awa nairasiku, saa to yobu yatu no siri wo keritoba su koto nisiteirutoiu.
titioya ha arukooru izonsyou de, kare ga no tokini zisatu siteiru. ani ha goutou no zyousyuuhan deari, ane ha baisyun ni te wo some teita. tadasi hahaoya ha zonmei de, kareha nen ni do, rikon sita tuma to kura su kodomo to issyoni hurorida he kisei site tesei no miitopai wo tabe runowo tanosimi nisiteiru.
semaru nikkuobutaimu nite noora to koinaka ninatteirukotoga noora no kuti kara katara re, zutto, sutandobaimii deha atarasii tuma no kouho tomade mizukara katatu ta.
merida sima kougeki mae ni kara gesen site noora to tomoni hurorida he kaeru tumoridattaga, sakkusu zisin mo nakaba nozon deita tessa no meirei de zanryuu si reebatein no tyousei wo itte ita kiwa, gyorai no syougeki de kotei wo okotatu teita hane aga tta dengen yunitto to tenzyou ni hasama rete timeisyou wo oi, sousuke no ganzen de sibou sita. aabaresuto no goro kara kitai no seibi wositeita kano si ha, aru ni kanzyou to ie ru mono wo yobi oko sita.
minoogu minoogu
heitan guruupu dai seibityuu tai syozoku. kaikyuu ha ittouhei.
tanpen ontei ha kanasi ku, syatei ha tooku nite ruisu to tomoni kurutu no sokuseki bando ni sanka siteiru. paato ha beesu.
ruisu ruisu
heitan guruupu dai seibityuu tai syozoku. kaikyuu ha nitouhei.
tanpen ontei ha kanasi ku, syatei ha tooku nite doramu no ude wo mikoma rete, minoogu to tomoni kurutu no sokuseki bando ni sanka siteiru.
denisuhu a rukousukii rukousukii
heitan guruupu heitan sien tyuutai syozoku. kaikyuu ha nitouhei. moto goutou.
tanpen rouhei tooru no huuga ni touzyou suru. musuko danii no youikuhi ni komari, ryougaezyo wo syuugeki site doru wo ubai, sarani sousuke to tessa ga booda tosono kyuuyuu tooru tono paateii ni tukiawa sareteiru resutoran ni goutou ni osi iru mo sippai sita. sikasi, booda rano siriai dearu ruisuhu a rukousukii no musuko to siru to, misuriru sakusen bu no tikara wo tukatte denisu wo musuko danii ni awa serukototonaru. sari kiwa booda ni misuriru heno syuusyoku wo susume rare, gozitu, nisi taiheiyou sentai ni haizoku sareru.
isitubutu kakari kakari
koe nakamura tosihiro tosihiro
heitan guruupu sisetu tyuutai syozoku. kaikyuu ha nitouhei. simei ha humei.
tanpen warito hima na sentai tyou no tuitati nite merida sima kitinai niokeru isitubutu no tantou wositeitaga, honrai ha bitiku kanri in.
aru aru
koe murozono takehiro takehiro
aabaresuto oyobi reebatein ni tousai sareteiru.
kitai no sekkeisya demoaru misuriru kenkyuubu no banimorauta niyotte keiretu noto tomoni kaihatu sare, ramudadoraiba no sadou ni zyuuyouna yakuwari wo hata siteiru. no saisekkei mono nazuke oya demoaru.
tousyo ha nado ni tousai sareteirutonanra kawari naka ttaga, owa ru deibaidei nioite, sousuke tono bani ni kakawa ru kaiwa niyotte kakusa reteita huragu ga tati, tuneni ziyuu kaiwa moodo tonatta. ikou, katte nisyaberi dasu dakedenaku, sakusen zikangai ni katte ni intaanetto nado ni akusesu site tayou na tisiki ya bokyaburarii wo kyuusyuu si, hoka kitai noyorimo koudo na gizi zinkaku wo seityousa se, dokuzi no yuumoasensu wo hirou suru. ikou, ziisiki ya zyousyo, tyokkan nimo mezame teiru byousya mo egaka reteita.
tuzuku onmaioun deha renaado no karu beriaru ni de idomi zanpai. kitai wo hakai sare kinouteisi ni oikoma reruga, hantaa ya reisu, mira nado niyotte kaisyuu syuuri sare, tudou meikumaidei deha karera no sien nomoto mizukara ga saisekkei sita reebatein ni tousai sare sensen ni hukki.
semaru nikkuobutaimu deha ningen no kanzyou wo rikai suruto douzini ziko douitusei ni nita monowo kakutoku si hazime teori, notino zutto, sutandobaimii deha kitai no setteingu ni mayotu tari, sakkusu tyuui no si wo itamu kanoyouni huru mau nado, zissaini kanzyou wo motu teirukanoyouna byousya gaaru. monogatari no syuuban deha, sousuke tono watasi ha, kikai ka, ningen katoiu mondou no matu, gizi denaku sinsei no ziga wo ninsiki si, ningen nisika dekina ihazuno ramudadoraiba no kidou ni seikou. merida sima ni hirai sita kaku misairu kara sousuke wo mamori nui ta. sono noti ha sousuke to tomoni beigun ni kaisyuu sareruga, sousuke niyotte dakkan sare tomoni dassyutu si, sousuke no kyuusyutusakusen wo zikkou siyoutositeita mao rani ki bakukano yunitto to tomoni azuke rareta.
kessen noti ha karada nonai zyoutai de sekai nodokokani hokan sareteiruga, amarugamu no sisetu de rokaku sita buhin kara mira ga kumitate ta arasutoru no bodi wo, eiseikaisen keiyu de sousa site sintai kawari ni siyousi teiru. sikasinagara, imamade tukatte itano bodi toha ookisa ya zyuuryou ga tigai sugirutameni sousa ni nare teorazu, tyokkanteki ni sousa dekiruyouninarutameni kurou siteiru.
sousuke tono unmeiteki tomo ie ru deai ya kazukazu no kannansinku wo hete, tuini ha ziga wo kakutoku si, burakkutekunorozii no kai tomo ie ru reebatein wo saisekkei, saraniha omunisufia ni akusesu suru tikara womo eta zinkouteki na uisupaado tomo ie ru sonzai heto sinka sita aru wo, tessa ha banimorauta ga zikan saigai ni taisuru hitotu no kaitou tosite umidasi ta kikai zikakeno kami dehanaikato suisoku siteiru. mata, sousuke ga tigau zinsei wo ayun deitara aru noyouninattakamosirenaito yosou siteiru.
daana daana
koe murai kazusa kazusa
ni tousai sareteiru. beida to yoba reru tokusyu na puroguramingu gengo wo tukatte kaihatu sareta saisinei no zinkoutinou de, wo unei suru uede ooki na yakuwari wo ninatu teiru.
hizyouzitai niha kan nohobo subete wo seigyo surukotomo kanou daga, saiteigen no kinousi ka hakki dekinakunaru. yure ru intouzaburuu deha, ga haizyakku sareta saini renaado no tukutu ta puroguramu niyotte, chenziobukomando sikikan koutai saretesimai, gaurun ga sikiken wo syouaku sitaga, noni itutu ta tidori kanameno katuyaku niyotte sikiken wo dakkan sareta.
matasono koudo na syorinouryoku wo ika site sekaizyuu no konpyuutaa wo kurakkingu si, samazamana kimituzyouhou no nyuusyu ya zyouhousousa wosurukotomo dekita.
merida sima no saisyuukessen de, tinbotu suru touahaadedanan to unmei wo tomoni sita.
huraidee huraidee
koe hukuyama zyun zyun
mao kini tousai sareteiruoyobisono koorusain. ikaonazi ku. mao noo asobi no ikkan tosite, gohoubiwo youkyuu suruyou kyouiku sareteiru.
mao ha situ ru wannaitosutando oyobi tuzuku onmaioun de kitai wo gekiha sareteiruga, sore igo ni touzyou siteiru kitai nomo onazi namae dearu.
yuukari yuukari
koe tamura yukari yukari
kurutu kini tousai sareteiru. nippon no zyosei aidoru no koe wo sanpuringu siteno koe ni settei siteiru. kurutu hasono aidoru niwazato hiwai nakotowo iwa sete tanosi ndeirukotomoaru.
doragonhurai hu a ruke
koe yamaguti katuhira katuhira
kuruuzoo kini tousai sareteiru. doragonhurai toha nihongo de tonbo toiu imi deari, kuruuzoo ga keiai suru anime sakuhin mazyo no takkyuubin no touzyouzinbutu tonbo ni yurai suru.
sono hoka sakusen bu
pegiigoorudoberi pegiigoorudoberi
koe kuzira kuzira
sien guruupu iryou han syozoku no guni. kaikyuu ha taii. pegii obasan to yoba rerukotomoaru.
merida sima kitinai ya kannai no iryou ni kansu ru sekininsya deari, kenkouzyou no riyuu ga han eba, tessa no sikiken wo hakudatu suru kenri wo yuusi teiru.
madeyuukasu ga taiin kara toriage ta tessa no syasin wo azuka tteiru.
nao, hourai gakuen siriizu niha doumei no kyarakutaa pegiigoorudoberi kyoutou ga touzyou siteiru.
ebasantosu ebasantosu
koe mizuoti yukiko yukiko
kyousyuu yusou tai syozoku. kaikyuu ha syoui notini tyuui . koorusain ha geebo .
bokokugo ha porutogaru go.
peivumea yusou heri no souzyuu wo tantou si, sakutyuu deha aabaresuto no kuuyu wo itte iru koto ga ooi.
tuzuku onmaioun naka, toukyou no sousuke tokanameno kaisyuu ni muka uga, tyakuriku no sunzen ni kitai ni taikuu misairu no tyokugeki wo uke te sibou suru.
saruvio saruvio
kyousyuu yusou tai syozoku. kaikyuu ha syoui. koorusain ha geebo . itaria nin.
semaru nikkuobutaimu nioite hatutouzyou si, kurutu to kano wo yamusuku heto kuuyu siteiru.
fissyaa fissyaa
kyousyuu yusou tai syozoku. kaikyuu ha syoui. koorusain ha geebo . amerika nin.
semaru nikkuobutaimu nioite hatutouzyou si, sousuke to reebatein wo yamusuku heto kuuyu siteiru.
zyakuriinuviran zyakuriinuviran
koe okamoto maya maya
teresatesutarossa no hisyokan. kaikyuu ha syoui. kenkyuubu kara syukkou siteiru.
kanozyo ni taisuru sisei hasokkenaimonogaari, puraibeeto na kaiwa hahotondositeinai. koreha tanni tanpaku na seikaku wositeirutameni sugi zu, kanozyo wo kiratu teirutoiuwakedehanai. kiwo kika sete koutya wo ire tari, tesei no sifonkeeki wo motu tekitarisurukotomoaru.
satisinohara satisinohara
koe utida sai sai
merida sima kiti no tuusin tantou kasikan. kaikyuu ha gunsou. daigakusotugyou notini koukuuzieitai de suunenkan kinmu sita noti, misuriru ni seki wo utusu.
sakutyuu deha suukai sousuke to kousin wo itte iru siin gaari, kare wo hu aa sutoneemu de yon deiru.
tuzuku onmaioun nite ni zyoukan si, merida sima wo dassyutu. no kuruu rato koudou wo tomoni siteiru.
kasuyahirosi kasuyahirosi
koe hukuyama zyun zyun
kannai de kokku wo tutome teiru nihonzin. kaikyuu ha zyoutouhei. toukyoukinkou ni zikka gaaru.
yure ru intouzaburuu dehakanameno ryouri no ude wo home, sinkai ryouri no sinzui wo denzyu suruto gougo siteita.
mata, tanpen no megami no rainiti zyunan hen deha madeyuukasu no tuuyaku tosite rainiti siteiru sakutyuu deha touzyou sezu.
guroria guroria
nisi taiheiyou sentai no ryourityou huzin.
tessa no heya no souzi wo tantou siteiru. uwasa suki de, tessa ga kituen ya insyu zissai ha mao no siwaza wositeirukotowo madeyuukasu ni hanasi tesimatta.
sakaba no masutaa masutaa
koe hirota yukio anime dai ki , mizuno tatuzi
merida sima kiti no pabu daaza no masutaa.
kappuku no yoi syorou no hakuzin dansei de, sono yousi ha aanesutoboogunain ni nite iru.
moto youhei deari, genekizidai ni migiasi wo husyou sitatameka, zyakkan hiki zuruyouna arukikata wosuru. honnin iwaku kongo ya roodesia deha sira nai mono hainakattatoiu. kanarino seisinron mono demoari, pabu de mukiryoku ni daradara non deita kurutu to sousuke wo sikari tuketa koto moaru. matasono kiwa, daikaizoku kyaputenamiigo no tizu wo watasi teiru.
tuzuku onmaioun deno amarugamu no kougeki no saini ha ni zyoukan si, merida sima wo dassyutu siteiru. sakerui ha motidase nakattamonono, sensi sita makkaran tooru no syasin dakeha kaban ni tumekon deita.
sakusen bu indo hirosi sentai firuforuvu
anime daiissaku kokyou ni mau kaze de sousuke to tomoni koudou sita butai. sakusenkoudou nakani gaurun no karu venomu no syuugeki wo uke, zenmetu sitesimau.
buraianto buraianto
koe nakada kazuhiro kazuhiro
sakusen bu indo hirosi sentai syozoku. herumazisutan ni haken sareta butai no sikikan. kaikyuu ha tyuui.
gaurun no ningen hanare sita zituryoku to venomu no zyousiki hazure na seinou wo keikokusu ru sousuke no iken wo keisi hasinakattamonono, gaurun no zituryoku wo sira nai hokano taiin tatino iken wo zyuusi sitatame gaurun ga matikamae ru naka de kougeki wo kaisi sitesimau. tai no naka de saisyo ni gaurun no venomu ni taosa reru.
gureesuwaizuman gureesuwaizuman
koe murai kazusa kazusa
sakusen bu indo hirosi sentai syozoku. herumazisutan ni haken sareta butai no hukukan.
yuiitu no zyosei de aisyou ha gurei. kako ni higasi yooroppa de naisen teikou undou ni sanka siteita. tai no naka deha mottomo onkou na seikaku de, hokano taiin noyouni sousuke wo kirau soburiwo mise nakatta. sousuke wo tai ni sasou ga, gaurun no venomu ni tan bunsi kattaa wo kokupitto ni tuki tate rarete sibou.
andi andi
koe takada yuuzi yuuzi
sakusen bu indo hirosi sentai syozoku. herumazisutan ni haken sareta butai no itiin.
tengaronhatto ga toreedomaaku. gaurun no venomu ni taosa reru.
zyakuson zyakuson
koe ugaki hidesige hidesige
sakusen bu indo hirosi sentai syozoku. herumazisutan ni haken sareta butai no itiin.
doreddohea ga tokutyou. sousuke wo kiratu teori, sibasiba syoutotu siteita sousuke no zituryoku ha mitome teita. zyouki wo batisuto ni ubawa reta noti ha kaku misairu tousai no toreeraa wo unten siteitaga, gaurun no venomu ni taosa reru.
batisuto batisuto
koe kitagawa katuhiro katuhiro
sakusen bu indo hirosi sentai syozoku. herumazisutan ni haken sareta butai no itiin. tai no naka deha sainentyou.
zyakuson kara pookaa deno kari ga doru aru. gaurun no venomu ni zyouki wo hakai sare zyuusyou wo otu taga, zyakuson kara zyouki wo ubatu te venomu ni taisi te zibaku kougeki wo itta.
misuriru tabu tai
kanbu
marorii kyou kyou
koe ootuka tikao tikao
misuriru no sousetusya. syakui ha hakusyaku.
senzo kara uke tui da kyodai na sisan wo motode ni misuriru wo sousetu sita. sikasi douzini, amarugamu kanbu no misuta maakyurii demoari, amarugamu wo seturitu sita mei no yuusi no mago demoaru.
bousou wo hazime ta amarugamu no houkai wo mokuron deitagasono konnan sani zasetu si, tousyo no mokuteki wo miusinai tutuatta amarugamu wo yokusei surutameni misuriru wo seturitu sita.
renaado ga amarugamu no syouaku wo seikou sase, sarani misuriru wo kaimetu ni oi yara rete karezisin ha kako no ningen tonari, igirisu no katainaka ni kakure sun deitaga, zutto, sutandobaimii zyoukan nite ibasyo wo tuki yamera re, kariinin tono taiwa kara sinsou wo siri, uragiri ni ikidooru musuko no edomondo ni syasatu sareta.
edomontomaroriizyunia edomontomaroriizyunia
marorii kyou no tyousi de misuriru sousetusya no hitori. misuriru seturituizen ha, igirisu kaigun no tokusyubutai nobori no syoukan deari, madeyuukasu no zyoukan demoatta.
fookurando hunsou heno zyuugun keiken ya heri tuiraku niokeru youzin kyuusyutu, zyouhoubuin tosite sekaikakkoku no gunzi kiki wo ikudo mo kaihi saserunado bukun ha ooku, misuriru no sousetuzi ni yuunou na ningen wo sukauto surunoni hitoyaku katu teiru.
amarugamu no soukougeki niyoru misuriru kaimetu noti ha senpuku sinagara dokuzi ni misuriru no amarugamu no naituu mono wo sousa si, sorega zibun no titioya dearu marorii kyou dearukotowo tuki tome, ibasyo wo tuki tome te taizi. zibun wo bikou siteita kariinin ni sinsou wo kika saretakotode, damasa reteitakotoheno ikidoori kara, saisyuuteki ni titioya wo syasatu sita.
zyouhoubu
meiyaaamitto meiyaaamitto
koe sugou takayuki takayuki
misuriru zyouhoubu no saikousekininsya. kaikyuu ha meizi sareteinaiga, syougun to syousa rerukotokara syoukan kurai niaruto suitei sareru.
booda teitoku no tyousa deha amarugamu ni naituu siteiru utagai gaarurasii. amarugamu niyoru soukougeki noti ha zyouhoubu no kinou wodokokahe iten si, hantaa ra zyouhoubuin ni koudou wo kinzi ta uede namegata wokuramasita. sono noti, booda teitoku niyotte amarugamu ni sanka sitakotoga sisasa reteiru.
zyouhoubu sanbou sanbou
koe iizima hazime hazime
misuriru zyouhoubu no sanbou.
gyabinhantaa gyabinhantaa
koe simada tosi tosi
misuriru zyouhoubu honkon sikyoku no sekininsya.
omotemuki ha boueki gyousya wo yosootu teori, nanboku tyuugokugun no ryouhou ni paipu wo yuusi teiru. gaiken ha bonyou na syou hutori no otoko dearuga, dousaturyoku zyouhou bunseki nouryoku ya buka haaku nouryoku ha tatakiage no zyouhoubuin rasiku, samazamana houmen heno nemawasi mo yuusyuu. tounin ga genba wo ugoku kotohahotondonaiga, yuusyuu na buka wo yousu ru sosiki rikimo motu teiru.
tuzuku onmaioun deha amarugamu no kougeki kara turaku mo nan wo nogare, ankarezi de hisoka ni reebatein no kenzou wo itte ita. sikasisono ugoki ha amarugamu ni sattisa reteori, tudou meikumaidei de toubou naka, amarugamu ni ne kaetu teita kariinin niyotte zyuugeki sare, zyuusyou wo ou monono inoti ha tori tome ta.
reisu reisu
koe oohara sayaka sayaka
misuriru zyouhoubu syozoku no eeziento. koodoneemu ha reisu zittai nohakkirisinai yuurei .
syussin ha kitatyousen. touzyouzi ha seibetu sura humei dattaga, tuzuku onmaioun de zyosei dearukototo, sokoku wo owa reta mi dearu koto ga hanmei sita. sousuke to douzini kanameno goei ninmu ni tui teiruga, kihonteki ni ryousya ga sessyokusu rukotoha nai.
sousuke toha kotona ri, kanametomo sessyokuse zu, enkyori karano kansi keikai wo tyuusin ni itte itaga, owa ru deibaidei nioite renaado ni kousoku sareta ageku, goei taisyou dearuhazunokanameni tasuke raretatame, ikou kanamenihasono koto wo neta ni sousuke no misuriru deno doukoutyousa nadowo tanoma rerukototonaru.
sono ninmu no seisituzyou, hensou ginou ni hiide teori, sarariiman kara syuhu made, samazamana sugata wo zyoukyou ni awa sete tukaiwake te keikai ni ata tteiru. hensou naka ha boisuchenzyaa de koe mo kae teori, han deha tousyo enzi ru seiyuu mo huse rareteita. kibarasi tosite sousuke ga zin dai koukou oyobi sono syuuhen de abare mawaru genin no ittan wo tukutu teiru. tadasikono koudou ha zyousoubu no ikou wo kanozyo narini handan sita kekka tosite, youdou notameno sousuke wo medata seru tekitai sosiki wo kakuran saserutamenadono riyuuzuke moaru moyou.
reisei tintyaku de zyoukyouhandan nouryoku nimo hiide teori, sentougizyutu ya iryougizyutu mo takai nodaga, sorega urame ni dete yosougai no toraburu ni makikoma rerukotoga ooi kurounin dearu. mata, ninmu yorimosono ba no zyoukyou heno taiou wo yuusen suru itimen gaaru.
tuzuku onmaioun de zissituteki ni misuriru ga kaimetu sita notini ha, senpuku siteita hantaa no irai wo uke te aabaresuto no zangai kara aru wo kaisyuu siteiru. mata, honmono no reebatein wo sousuke ni todoke rutame, tudou meikumaidei nioiteha mekisiko nioite kare to koudou wo tomoni siteita remon tatito gouryuu siteiru.
semaru nikkuobutaimu deha remon to mosukuwa ni sennyuu sita saini, renaado no syuugeki wo uke husyou. sono noti mosukuwa keisatu ni renkou sareru. sikasi, supai kouhosei tosite so turani ryuugaku siteita saino no moto kyoukan ni syakuhou sitemorai, mao tatino tiimu ni gouryuu. ahugan no kaku misairu dakkan sakusen ni hituyou na saisinzyouhou wo todoke ta.
honmyou ha kakusi teiruga remon no yosou niyoruto kimuokuhi deari, nihongo deha kingyoku hime tonattesimau. remon no setumei deha hime toiu sitano kanzi ha utukusii toiu imi wokomerareteiruga, nihonzin nitotteha warai wo sasou namae ninattesimatteori, sonotameni remon niha gan tosite honmyou wo osie teinai.
mattosieido mattosieido
misuriru zyouhoubu syozoku no eeziento.
tatakau booimiitugaaru no boutou nioite, no uisupaado kenkyuusisetu kara kudanmira wo kyuusyutu sita. sousuke rato gouryuu surutameni kuruma de idoutyuu, haindo niyoru tuigeki wo uke, sibou suru. honrai no ninmu ha kenkyuu deeta no dassyu de mira no kyuusyutu dehanakattaga, sousuke nisouiu otoko dattato hyousa reruhodo zyou no hukai zinbutu.
kenkyuubu
peinroozu peinroozu
misuriru kenkyuubu butyou. banimorauta ya nooraremingu no zyousi niataru.
sugino yase kata no dansei misuriru seturituizen no hanasi dearu touahaadedanan gou no tanzyou niokeru byousya . sakutyuu deha hakase toiu katagaki de yoba rerukotogaaruga, ikanaru hakusigou wo syutoku siteirunokaha humei.
banimorauta banimorauta
misuriru kenkyuubu syozoku. kaikyuu ha taii. ninsiki bangou ha .
minamitaiheiyou no syoukoku, sanhoruhe kyouwakoku no syussin. uisupaado deari, aru wo hazime tosuru siriizu no kaihatu syunin. tessa to tomoni no kenzou nimo kakawa tteita. nenrei ha tosi to hizyouni wakai ga, kariforunia daigaku wo sotugyou si, ziotoron sya nimo syozoku siteita.
aru ni nyuuryoku sareta zyouhou niyoreba, syumi ha igo to piano, suki na kasyu ha zyonrenon, suki namonoha heiwa to aru to teresatesutarossa.
honpen kaisi izen nisasayakini nottora rete kenzyuu zisatu sitesimattaga, sorewo mikosi te aru ni burakkubokkusu kasi ta messeezi to, aru sikake wo nokosi teita.
nooraremingu nooraremingu
koe yamaguti yuriko yuriko
misuriru kenkyuubu syozoku. kaikyuu ha syoui notini tyuui .
masatyuusettu koukadaigaku syussin. gunzoku no keiken ha kaimu deattaga, bani no sigo, teresatesutarossa niyotte sukauto sareta. uisupaado dehanaiga, tensai no burui niha iru. tadasi, tessa ni taisi te zyakkan no konpurekkusu wo dai teiru husi gaaru.
sousuke no mitate niyoreba kariinin no naki tuma dearu iriina ni omokage ga nite irutonokoto.
nisi taiheiyou sentai nite ramudadoraiba no kenkyuu wo tantou siteori, sono tokusyusei yueni seibi in tokuni edosakkusu to syoutotu suru koto moatta.
notini sakkusu to koinaka ninatteirukotogasemaru nikkuobutaimu de katara re, saisyuuteki ni sakkusu kara hurusatohe tomoni kuru youni sasowa reteitakotoga, zutto, sutandobaimii de sisasa reteiru.
beriizu kunren kyanpu
maateinesuteisu maateinesuteisu
koe naka hirosi hirosi
beriizu kunren kyanpu sou sekininsya. kaikyuu ha syousa. zinsyuteki niha puerutoriko kei.
syageki taikai deno yuusyou keiken gaari, ofisu ni torofii wo kazatu teitaga, kurutu no sogeki wo uke te makoto tu hutatu nisareteiru.
misuriru houkai noti ha kunren kyanpu wo houki site toho de dassyutu si, koronbia keiyu de kita ahurika ni muka tte minkan gunzi kaisya tosite senpuku si, sekaikakuti no misuriru zanson butai wo atume teita. semaru nikkuobutaimu nite nisi taiheiyou sentai to gouryuu suru.
zimaa zimaa
koe murozono takehiro takehiro
beriizu kunren kyanpu kyoukan. kaikyuu ha gunsou.
kunren kyanpu zidai no sousuke to kurutu ni taisi teha yoi hyouka wositeinakattakoreha nin tomo itoteki ni te wo nui teitatame. sikasikodawarinoaru kakumei iesato no tudoi tono ikken de hyouka wo aratame tanoka, sousuke toha utitoke ta moyou. tanpen no tairitu no fesuteibaru deha sousuke no syoutai wo uke, zin dai koukou no bunkasai wo otozure teiru.
kunren kyanpu zidai no sousuke ha sousukiisegaaru toiu namae wo siyousi teitatame, zin dai koukou wo otozure ta saini mo segaaru to yon deita.
daniereburiassi daniereburiassi
kunren kyanpu uno nin. moto itaria gun tui tero butai syozoku.
keisatukan karani batteki sareta keireki wo moti, heisyo sentou kinsetu sentou ni tyouzi teiru. karate no tatuzin de nihongo moaru teido tukae ru.
no souzyuu nouryoku moari, hurumeta sekai niokeru nen ni rooma de hassei sita tero ziken no kiwa ha, simin ni nin no husyousya mo dasa zuni tekiki wo muryoku kasi teiru.
yonatanhareru yonatanhareru
kunren kyanpu uno nin. moto isuraeru gun kuuteibutai syozoku.
kunrensei no naka deha toppukurasu no seiseki wo osame teita. tadasi, itoteki ni te wo nui teita sousuke no noru sabeezi wo aite ni, de mogisen wo itta saini yabure teori, sukunakutomo souzyuu ni kansi teha, sousuke niha nouryokuteki ni oyoba naimonoto omowa reru.
keizaigaku to kougaku no syuusigou wo motu interi de, heisi tositeno nouryoku mo masare teiru. zissenkeiken mo houhu deari, rebanon nanbu deha tasuu no gokuhi sakusen ni zyuuzi siteita. sono mani siria gun no sabeezi wo ki gekiha siteiru. mata, mosaddo demo kunren wo uke teita.
rikarudopurado rikarudopurado
kunren kyanpu uno nin. moto peruu gun tokusyubutai syozoku.
no souzyuu keiken koso nai monono, kuutei kouka, suityuu sakusen, teisatu sakusen ni zoukei ga hukaku, bakuhatubutu no ekisupaato demoaru. mata, souhatu hikouki to heri no souzyuu raisensu wo motu teori, hikouzikan ha awa sete zikan wo kazoe ru.
sayoku gerira kagayake ru miti wo aite nikanarino bakazu wokonasitekita.
nao, beriizu kunren kyanpu ni youin no sukauto ni otozure ta mao ha, tousyo ha zyouki mei no naka kara nin wo erabu tumoridatta.
amarugamu
sekai wo ura kara kontorooru suru himitukessya.
amarugamu kanbu
gaurun gaurun
koe tanaka masahiko masahiko
koodoneemu misuta aian han nai deno byousya ha nai . tuno kokuseki wo motu tosareru terorisuto. tyuugokugo de kyuuryuu to kaku ga, sokoku ha nippon.
no souzyuu ginou ni masare, kanameno sentoukiroku no bunseki niyoruto, hukusuusonzai suru kodaaru no touzyou hei no naka de, mottomo sono seinou wo hikidasi teita zinbutu demoaru.
sousuke ya kariinin toha ahuganisutan zidai karano innen. syounenzidai niha porupoto seiken sitano kanbozia niori, tounin iwaku, gyakusatu sita ningen no sitai wo mainiti noyouni katazuke teitarasii. seikaku ha zannin zangyaku katu reikoku hizyou. tintyakureisei na sikou to, tyokkan to kikikaihinouryoku ni nagake teiru. sono seikaku kara dokuzi no biisiki wo moti, sousuke kasimu ni syuutyaku suru. kare iwaku, reitetu na gorono sousuke ha kizon no seisi kan wo tyouetu sita satuzin seizya dattatoiu.
amarugamu kanbu deattaga, hokano kanbu tono sori ha awa nakattayoudearu. kare ga amarugamu wo uragitu ta noti ha misuta toiu koodoneemu ga tuuretu na hiniku tonatta suigin to tetu toha maza ranainode, amarugamu nihanaranai.
youhei kunren kyanpu no kyoukan nadowositeitakotomoarutameka, buka no sinnin ha atui. sikasi karezisin ha hukusin dearouto si wo zentei ni okuri komu kotowonanra tyuutyo sinai, nakaba buka wo mozidoori no imi de teasi to kangae teiru.
ahuganisutan zidai, sousuke niyotte toubu ni zyuudan wo ukeru ga, sono tokini ha kakudo ga asaka ttakotoni kuwae, sudeni zugaikotu ni titan ga umekoma reteitatame nan wo nogare ta. honpen deha tatakau booimiitugaaru , yure ru intouzaburuu no do anime han deha kokyou ni mau kaze ga kuwawa ri do ni watatu te sousuke ni touzyou ki wo gekiha sareruga, soredemonaosibutoku ikinokori, owa ru deibaidei dehamohaya ziriki deha iki rarenai sintai ni nari hate teita zyoutai de hi kyoudai anime han deha natu simai ni sizi wo dasi, misuriru, hiiteha sousuke to taizi sita. saisyuuteki niha sousuke niyotte syasatu sareruga, sono kiwa beddo ni sikake rareta bakudan de sousuke wo mitizure nisiyoutosita. zituha suizou gan wo wazuratu teiru mi deari, uni taisuru syuutyaku ga kihaku dearu. sonotame, sinu koto wohotondo osore teinai. byou wo wazurau mae ha gyakuni zibun no inoti ha tikyuu yori omoi to kangae teita.
misuta kariumu
gaurun ga sugoude no ikare yarou to iu hodono kyouzin. honkon de tobiwasi wo syukusei sita notini misuriru to taizi suruga, sousuke niyotte zyouki wo gekiha sare sibou suru.
suteiibunharisu niyoruto sougouteki na zituryoku deha misuta gaurun yori suudan otoru tonokoto.
misuta no koodoneemu hasono noti, amarugamu ni kuragae esita kariinin ni hikituga reta.
anime han niha touzyou sezu, kawari ni kaki no geitu ga touzyou suru.
geitu geitu
koe ootuka yositada yositada
han dai saku hurumetarupanikku ni touzyou. gensaku no misuta niataru kyarakutaa deari, gensaku ni kurabe tokutyou ga kuwae rareteiru. mata misuta toha yoba reteinai.
zibun no gendou wo hitei sarerukotowo kirai, tukkomi woireru buka wo syasatu sitari, sakusen ga sippai sita saini gyakuzyousi te, houkoku sitekita buka wo gyakutai surunado buka no atukai ha kyokutan ni warui. mata, ken katugi notameni momiage no nagasa wo kini siteori, sousuke ni taosa reta kiwa motyotto momiage ga mizikatu takanato tubuyaki nagara sibou sita.
gaurun toha betuno imi de zannin na seikaku deari, syoudouteki ni nin wo korosi, tanin no si wo tanosi mutokorogaaru.
kyouiteki na sou uti no meisyu deari, heiki no daikin siharai wo kyo nda maresu taisa wosono buka ga suubyou azen tositesimauhodono hayasa de zyuu wo nuki taisa wo syasatu sita. mata, taisa no buka wo douyou ni syasatu sita.
zikkoubu tai wo hikii te honkon ni araware, misuriru to kousen siteita natu gyokuhou wo satugai suru. sono noti, misuriru no butai nimo osoi kakaruga, engo ni kake tuketa sousuke to kousen. gekitou no matu ni kuruuzoo ga touzyou sita hu a ruke wo hagaizime nisite tate nitoruga, aabaresuto ga hatudou sita ramudadoraiba niyoru hu a ruke wo touka sase, sono haigo no geitu kini nomi syougekiha wo tyokugeki saserutoiu tyouzyou tekina kougeki niyori sibou suru.
renaadotesutarossa renaadotesutarossa
koe namikawa daisuke daisuke
koodoneemu misuta sirubaa . teresatesutarossa no hutago no ani de, imouto douyou uisupaado dearu. uisupaado tositeno nouryoku hakanari takaku, kodaarusiriizu ya arasutoru nado, amarugamu sei heiki no taihan ni kakawa tteirutomirareru.
wo kaisi te genteiteki nagara miraiyoti ga dekiru tame, sono nouryoku wo riyou site amarugamu no nettowaaku wo syouaku, mizukara no syutyuu ni osame ru.
sono mokuteki ha, uisupaado ga umare ru mae no kako wo kaihen suru koto de honrai no sekai ni tukuri kae youtosurukotodearu.
no souzyuu gizyutu mo masare teori, kouseinou dearu beriaru wo ku monaku tukai konasiteiru. mata, sen no komai yasaotoko zen tosita gaiken ni hansi te namami no sentouryoku mo takaku, kakutousen deha reisu wo karugaru to tori osa e, sousuke to zyuugeki tatakawo tenkai sita koto moaru.
sousuke no saigo made akirame nai sin no tuyosa ni hara wo tate tehairuga, tagaini syougaibutu toiu ninsiki sikanaku, syukuteki ya raibaru toitta ninsiki hanai.
monogoto wo syousyou sya ni kamae te miru sono seikaku ha, younen zidai ni hahaoya ga hokano dansei to kankei wo motu teita zizitu wo sitte itakotoya, sono hahaoya niyotte syuugeki mono ni hikiwatasa retakotonado, tanteki ni ie ba nikusin ni uragira retakotoni yurai suru. nao, kono itiren no keiken hatudou meikumaidei nioite, kanameni kyousin wo riyou site mise teiru. mata yousyouzi ha titi no kaaru iwaku, kanarino hitomisiri dattarasii.
kanameni koui wo dai teori, tuzuku onmaioun ikou, kanozyo to koudou wo tomoni siteitaga, aru dekigoto gakikkakedekanameno motu ta kenzyuu ga bouhatu sitesimai hinsi no zyuusyou wo otu tesimau. semaru nikkuobutaimu deha itininsyou ga boku kara ore ninari, izen to kurabe, gendou ga sobou ninaru nado no henka ga araware teiru.
zutto, sutandobaimii deha, merida sima niteno saigo no mamori tosite beriaru wo katu te, sousuke no reebatein to taizi. izen attouteki yuui wo hokori ippouteki ni oitume ruga, sousuke kara kika sareta tessa no kotoba, sosite henkaku ga tyuudan sitakotoni douyou sita geki wo tuka re, reebatein wo otori nisita sousuke no saku nikakatte beriaru wo hakai sareru. saigo ha tessa no kokoro no tuyosa wo mitome, sousuke ni zibun mo hutuu no ningen tosite umare takattakotowo katari wakai sikaketaga, zibouziki ninatteno zibakusouti wo kidousi youtositatame, sekai kaihen no keikaku wo akirame kirenai kariinin niyotte syasatu sareta.
andoreiserugeivittikariinin andoreiserugeivittikariinin
koe ootukaakira otto otto
koodoneemu misuta . moto misuriru sakusen bu nisi taiheiyou sentai touahaadedanan rikusen komando sikikan.
tanpen deha midoruneemu titi sei ga serugeeiviti to hyouki sareru hatuon tositehakotiragayori gengo ni tikai .
tuzuku onmaioun nioite tessa tooru wo syuugeki butai kara mamori, sono kiwa nige okure te yukuehumei tonaruga, tudou meikumaidei deha amarugamu kanbu misuta tosite araware ru. notini kurisumasu ni renaado to sessyokusi ta saini kare kara zikan saigai no hanasi wo kika sare, kano omunisufia wo tukatta yogen ga tekityuu sitakotowo uke, honrai no sekai ni modosu kangae ni sandou si amarugamu no gawa nituitakotoga akiraka tonari, igo, renaado no haika tosite sentou no siki wototta.
semaru nikkuobutaimu nite renaado wo bousatu siyoutositeita misuta rano syukusei no siki wotori, mizukara buki mo tukawa zu misuta wo satugai.
zutto, sutandobaimii nite marorii oyako no mae ni araware, sekai kaihen ni hituyou na amarugamu kanbu no meibo wo nyuusyu. igo, no bouei tosite merida sima no sentou siki wotoruga, yosou wo haruka ni uwamawaru sousuke no reebatein ya tessa ra no katuyaku de boueitai wo kaimetu ni oi yara reru.
saigo made keikaku wo akirame kirezu, zibakusouti wo kidousa seyoutosita renaado wo syasatu. kanamewo rati sitesonomama heri de tousou wo hakaru ga, sousuke niyotte heri wo tuiraku saseraretatame sousuke to taizi si, kakutousen tonari sousuke wo attou surumo, heri no tuiraku tokini uke ta kizu ga timeisyou ninatteita. saigo ha zibun nitodomewosasenakatta sousuke ni taisi, sousuke zisin no honsitu wo toki, katute sousuke no hahaoya ga nokosi ta kotoba dearu ikinasai wo tutae iki tae ta.
sousuke nitotte mottomo ongi noaru oya to yobe ru zinbutu daga, douzini honsaku niokeru saigo no teki deari, geemu han hurumetarupanikku tatakau huudeaazuuinzu deha kare to sousuke no saigo no tatakai wo imeezi sita oyako toiu senyou no gakkyoku ga youisa reteiru.
viruherumukasupaa viruherumukasupaa
koe terasomamasaki terasomamasaki
koodoneemu misuta tein . renaado no buka de, kare niyoru amarugamu syouaku no saini satugai sita kanbu kara koodoneemu wo tui da. higasi doitu syussin no sogeki hei dekatuteha kasupaa no butai to yoba reru sogeki mono syuudan wo hikii teita. kurutu no sisyou tomo yobe ru sonzai de, sogeki taisyou no ugoki ya dandou wo kanzen ni yosoku sikitta tokini yuurei ga kuru toiu dokuzi no kankaku wo motu teiru. sono udemae ha kurutu kara mazin to yoba reru hodo no sogeki sensu wo motu. desi dearu kurutu no nami hazure ta sogeki no sainou wo mitome tutumo, yuurei wo yobe nakatta deki sokona ino sogeki hei tosite anadotu teiru husi moatta.
tudou meikumaidei deha renaado no teitaku ni syuugeki wo sikake ta kurutu, mao, kuruuzoo no wo akano erigooru de geigeki. kurutu kino sogeki hou wo hakai si, oitume ta.
semaru nikkuobutaimu zyoban deha, aramo toride de reebatein no sogeki wo kokoromi rumo kurutu ni minuka rete sippai suru. syuuban deha yamusuku de kurutu to taizi. dousi no sogeki sen ni syouri si, kurutu no wo gekiha site karezisin nimo zyuusyou wo atae ruga, sousuke no tyouhatu ni notte kara ori ta geki ni hinsi no kurutu ni sinzou wo sogeki sarete sibou sita. kitai ha kasupaa syasatu notini reebatein ni touzyou sita sousuke niyotte hakai sareta.
misuta maakyurii
suigin goukin amarugamu no baikai ninaru suigin no mei wo motu kanbu. sono mei ga simesu touri, hokano kanbu tooru no mae niha sugata wo mise zu, seisakukettei ni kanyo surukotomonaku, tada kouseiin ni ba wo teikyou si tyousei wo okonau nomino sonzai. hudan ha kaigi wo boutyou siteirudakedaga, semaru nikkuobutaimu nite itibu kanbu ga syukusei sareta koto wo izyou zitai tominasi, koe nomidehaaruga kanbu no syuukai ni araware ta.
zutto, sutandobaimii nioite, misuriru sousetusya no marorii hakusyaku ga misuta maakyurii dearuto hanmei sita. zinrui no mirai toiu tousyo no amarugamu no mokuteki ga, sidai ni kakuzi no kitokuken masu wo mamoru kotoga syutai no sosiki ninatteiki, sosiki ga kakudai site naibu karadeha kaimetu hunou tonatteitatame, taikou sosiki tosite misuriru wo sousetu sita.
misuta goorudo
koe zyou kiri an an
amarugamu kanbu no hitori. nihonzin.
kokkaigiin no kaneyamatakesi wo damii tosite ayatutu teita kaneyama ha tatakau booimiitugaaru de namae dake touzyou siteiru. renaado toha ori ai ga waruku, tudou meikumaidei dehatuiniwo tyuusin tosita sentou butai wo sasi muke te massatu wo hakatu ta. sikasi, kono sakusen ha sippai ni owari, kyoubou sita amarugamu kanbu misuta kappaa koe arai ryouhei , misuta , misuta natoriumu koe ono atusi ga renaado no buka ni douzini massatu saretanoto toki wo onazi ku, karezisin mo kariinin niyotte syukusei sareta.
misuta zuinku
misuriru ni okuri koma reta supai. sono syoutai ha misuriru sakusen busyo zoku no booda teitoku no hisyokan zyakuson dearu.
odoru beriimeriikurisumasu desono syoutai ga hakkaku si, kariinin niyotte kousoku sareta.
yonatankurupinsukii yonatankurupinsukii
honpen niha touzyou sinaiga amarugamu kanbu misuta nikkeru de, renaadotesutarossa no buka datta. zyuusuunen notino sekai wo egai ta hurumetarupanikku anazaa deha ziotoronerekutoronikusu sya no gizyutusya tosite touzyou siteori, sutehu a nmihairohu ga syatyou ni syuunin sita notino. . . . ni syukkou site, renaadotesutarossa heno rettoukan no hussyoku to hukasigi na rikiba wo hassei saseru gizyutu no hukkatu wo mokuron de, sinsei. . . . no itinose tatuya tatito tekitai suru.
amarugamu zikkoubu tai
guenbienboo guenbienboo
koe iwamatu ren ren
moto misuriru sakusen bu nisi taiheiyou sentai rikusen komando tokubetu taiou han syozoku. kaikyuu ha gunsou. koorusain ha uruzu .
danigan douyou ni amarugamu niyoru baisyuu man doru wo uke, misuriru wo uragiru.
motomoto ha betonamu rikugun ni syozoku siteori, naihu no atukai nimo masare teiru.
naibu de makkaran wo satugai si, sono noti kurutu wo kyuuti ni otiire ruga, mao ni kiwo tora reta geki wo tuka re, gyakuni kurutu niyotte korosa reru.
nao, uruzu no koorusain ha notini mandera ni warihura reteiru.
zyonhawaadodanigan zyonhawaadodanigan
koe kaneko yosiyuki yosiyuki
moto misuriru sakusen bu nisi taiheiyou sentai rikusen komando tokubetu taiou han syozoku. kaikyuu ha gunsou. koorusain ha uruzu .
nisi taiheiyou sentai ni tenzoku suru mae ha, minami taiseiyou sentai nevezu ni zokusi teita. sikasi amarugamu niyoru baisyuu wo uke, misuriru wo uragiru.
motomoto ha amerika rikugun no kuutei taiin de, bakuhatubutu no atukai nimo kuwasii. meiyo husyou syou ya seidou seisyou wo nando mo zyuyo sareteiru.
mao yakaname, gaurun mademo tyainiizu to yobu nado, touyouzin ni taisuru sabetuisiki ga tuyoi. zyon to kiyasuku yoba rerukotowo kirau.
no burijzi kara tousou sitakanamewo oitume ruga, issyun no geki wo tuka re, kake tuketa sousuke niyotte syasatu sareru.
tobiwasi feizyuu natu gyokuhou syayuihu a n rena rena
koe sinohara emi syayuihu a n
gaurun ni hirowa re, kare wo sensei to yobi sitau hutago no ani mosikuha ane. touzyou baitai tobiwasi gensaku gyokuhou anime rena manga niyotte settei ga kotonaru ga, kihonteki na tati iti ha subete kyoutuu siteirutame ikkatusi te sirusu.
sakutyuu dehano souzyuu wo omoni itte ori, gaurun no sizi niyotte kodaaru wo dassyu sita noti ha, honkon deno hakaikatudou wo itte ita. touahaadedanan no butai to kousen sita notini misuta geitu hikii ru amarugamu no zikkoubu tai to kousen surumo, gekiha sarete sibou suru.
nao, han no monogatari syoki niha geitu no buka tosite syadou wo katu teiru.
izureno sakuhin nioitemo, kanzyou ga keturaku siteirutoiu ten ha kyoutuu siteiru.
hi kou feihon natu gyokuran syayuiran zyuria zyuria
koe sawasiro miyuki syayuiran
