gaurun ni hirowa re, kare wo sensei to yobi sitau hutago no otouto mosikuha imouto. ani ane to douyou ni touzyou baitai niyotte kyarakutaa ga mattaku kotonaru ga, namami deno kakutouzyutu ni nagake rutoiu kihonteki na tati iti ha douyou dearu. gyokuran ha yanagiba katana noyouna dai huri no hamono woyoku siyousi teori, sakutyuu deha mao womo attou suruhodono sentou ginou wo motu.
sakutyuu deha gaurun no sizi wo uke, kanameno ansatu wo hakari toukyou heto muka u. sikasi kanozyo no kiten niyotte sippai si, sono ba ni araware ta renaado no hikii ru arasutoru niyotte syukusei gensaku deha keitui wo hakai sareta notini zyuugeki. anime deha kubi wo sime rare tissoku. manga deha asi wo tukama rete hobaku sareta zyoutai de zyuugeki sareru. sono itai gensaku nioiteha toubu nomiha honkon ni hakoba re, nakaba mise simetositesarasarerukototonaru.
ani ane douyou ni kanzyou ga keturaku siteori, toriwake gyokuran ni kansi teha, ane no gyokuhou ni seisinteki sityuu wo izon siteiru husi gaari, sono mukiteki na me ha mao iwaku marude nanimo nai kanzen na zetubou .
binsentoburuuno binsentoburuuno
koe gouda hozumi hozumi
gensaku han moto misuriru sakusen honbu syozoku. zinzi tantou syoki kan. kaikyuu ha syousa.
yure ru intouzaburuu nioite sitani sirusu danigan to guen no baisyuu kousaku ni kanyo si, gaurun niyoru dassyu no itiin wo tukutu ta.
yure ru intouzaburuu no tyokugo ni misuriru kara sugata wokuramasi, sitiria sima kanikattei no sitiriamafia barubeerahu a mirii no motoni miwo yose teita. sikasi, kurutumao sousuke toiu honrai narakokoniiruhazunonai nisi taiheiyou sentai youin sitiria sima ha honrai, tityuukai sentai paruhooron no tantou kuiki dearuniyotte migara wo kakuho sare, sidonii no misuriru sakusen honbu he renkou sareta.
mangaban deha zyosei kyara ni okikaera reteiru.
han moto misuriru zyouhoubu syozoku. kaikyuu ha taii. koorusain ha ooma .
gizyututantou tosite tyoukou oudan tonneru niokeru hitoziti kyuusyutusakusen ni sanka si, tonneru nai to no musen tyuukei oyobi musen tyuukei kino teikyou wo itte ita. sikasi amarugamu ni baisyuu sareteori, zyouhou rouei to sakusenkoudou no kakuran wo itta. naituu hakkaku noti ha sitiria sima kanikattei no sitiriamafia barubeerahu a mirii no motoni miwo yose teitaga, kurutumao sousuke niyotte migara wo kakuho sare, sidonii no misuriru sakusen honbu he renkou sareta.
kurama kurama
koe yamazi kazuhiro kazuhiro
amarugamu no korosiya. amerika no haiyuu zyanreno wo imeezi siteiruga, zinsyuteki niha touyouzin. yure ru intouzaburuu nioite, rokku gotyou toiu nahuda notuita beigun no yasen huku wo tyakuyou siteiru byousya ga mira retaga, seikaku na kokuseki nadoha humei dearu.
ninmu ni hituyou toaraba hizyou na syudan wo tyuutyo i naku tukau purofessyonaru. sono ippou de bunmeizin wo zihu siteiru. sousuke tono innen ha hukai monogaari, amarugamu ni zokusuru mae, rebanon de teki tosite tatakatu takotogaaru. honpen deha gaurun ga sibou sita noti tuzuku onmaioun ikou ni sousuke to taizi suru koto ninaru.
kinen naka de, sigarettokeesu niha tabako no kawari ni ninzin no suteikku wo ire teiru. sousuke ni zyuusyou wo owa serumonono, geki wo tuka re gyakuni inoti wo oto su.
zyooziraburokku zyooziraburokku
koe hayami syou syou
moto misuriru sakusen bu tityuukai sentai paruhooron no rikusen komando tokubetu taiou han syozoku. kaikyuu ha gunsou.
tuzuku onmaioun niokeru amarugamu no syuugeki no kiwa, saiwai nimo eege umi no kiti wo hanare teitatame nan wo nogare, yamuwo ezu amarugamu ni toukou suru.
sono noti ha amarugamu nioite aguressaa yaku wo tutome teitaga, moe ru wanmanfoosu niokeru yami batoru de sousuke no sabeezi to kousen site zyouki dearu wo gekiha sareru. sentougo niha sousuke niyotte zyouhou wo hikidasa re, igo no syousoku ha humei.
geemu tatakau huudeaazuuinzu deha kutihige wohayasita kurokami no otoko daga, anime deha kinpatu no otoko tonatteiru.
suteiibunharisu suteiibunharisu
koe ookawa touru oodiodorama
odoru beriimeriikurisumasu ni touzyou. goukakyakusen pasifikkukurisarisu gou no sentyou. sikasisoreto douzini, amarugamu no kouseiin toiu tatiba nimoaru. pasifikkukurisarisu gou niha uisupaado no zikken tyousa wo okonau kizai ga gokuhi ni tumi koma reteori, sekaikakuti wo koukai situtu, kakuti de rati sitekita hikensya no tyousa wo itte ita.
kanameni taisi temo saisyo ha monogosi yawara kana sisei wo mise teitaga, nisi taiheiyou sentai niyoru siizyakku no kiwa ha naihu wo teni kiri tuke teiru.
sousuke raniyotte kousoku sarerumonono, geki wo tui te tousou si, sarani tessa wo rati. sosite yusouki de toubou wo hakaru ga, kinkyuu tenkai buusutaa wo soubi sita aabaresuto ni oi tukare, saisyuuteki niha sousuke ni taosa reru.
riihu a uraa uraa
koe sugita tomokazu tomokazu
renaado tyokuzoku no buka no touyoukei amerika nin. donna toki demo sinsiteki na taido de, sorega teki niha inginburei na taido to mira rerukotomo. renaado niha zettaiteki na tyuusei wo tikatu teori, kano kataude tosite kakuti de anyaku suru. kako no keireki ha humei daga, moto ha gun ya tero sosiki niha syozoku siteorazu ikkai no buzyutu ie dattarasiku, sen demo tan bunsi kattaa wo motiita kakutousen ga senmonbunya. sono zituryoku ha onazi kudeno kakutousen wo tokui tosuru kuruuzoo womotte onazi kitai dattatositemo yatu no houga ue tomade iwa simeta. sikasitoruni tara nai dai no mayakutyuudoku mono ni yabure tatomo ie ru, saisi wo mamore nakattanadono danpenteki na zyouhou moaru.
hatutouzyou hatuzuku onmaioun de, boutou niaru hakamairi no siin dede hukasi kasi ta kodaaru ni touzyou si, renaado wo goei siteita.
tudou meikumaidei deha tessa no rati wo kokoromi rumo sippai ni owa ru. sono noti, renaado no teitaku ni syuugeki wo sikake ta kurutu, mao, kuruuzoo no wo kuro no erigooru de geigeki siteiru.
zutto, sutandobaimii nite kaku misairu kiti no bouei tosite kuruuzoo rato taizi. soremadeno sinsiteki na taido wokanaguri sute te idomi, ramudadoraiba no tikara wo matuwa seta nihontou no katati no kinzoku kai de attou situtumo, seinou no otoru kitai de zisin to watari au kuruuzoo wo syousan si, keii wo haratu teita. sikasi saigo ha kuruuzoo no kitai wo bousou saseta sutemi no tokkou de sibou. gyakuni iki teita kuruuzoo nohouga, un dakede iki nobi tesimattakotoheno usirometasa wo kanzi teita.
dai tugi suupaarobotto taisen tengoku hen oyobideha siki douzi kakiorosi no kao gurafikku ga youisa reta.
sabiinarehunio sabiinarehunio
koe inoue marina marina
renaado no tyokuzoku no buka. kuroi suutu to megane wotuketa syootokatto no poorando nin zyosei de, kanameya renaado ga seikatu siteiru teitaku wo tori sikitu teiru. heisi tositemo yuusyuu de, mao to gokaku no souzyuu ginou wo motu hoka, teki no kitai ni hakkingu site bousou saserunadono densi sen mo tokui.
syussin ha utti si no suramu mati de, sokodeno hisan na seikatu no naka de renaado ni deai, kare ni sukuwa retakotode koui wo daki, sekai kaihen keikaku no tedasuke wosurukotoninatta. sikasi, kanameni keitou siteiku renaado no sugata ni sittosin wo daki, sonna kano sugata wo mita kunaigatameni enpou heno syutugeki wo sigan surunado, sizyou wo sute kire teinai bubun ga miuke rareru.
tudou meikumaidei deha renaado no teitaku ni syuugeki wo sikake ta kurutu, mao, kuruuzoo no wo siro no erigooru de geigeki.
zutto, sutandobaimii nite, senkyo sita kaku misairu kiti no dakkan ni sasi muke rareta so rengun wo kaeriuti nisita noti, sarani kougeki wo sikake tekita misuriru no butai to taizi. mao ki woato ippo no tokoro made oitume ruga, kake tuketa kurutu kino huiuti tito mao kino sikinkyori karano toubu kizyuu no zyuugeki niyotte kitai ga hakai sareru. sono noti, wo tuuzi te keikaku ga tonza sitakotowo sitte zibouziki tonari, kaku misairu wo merida sima ni muke te hassya. tyokugo ni kanseisitu ni kake tuketa mao niyotte syasatu sareta.
toritu zin dai koukou
nen kuno seito
isomura kazumi isomura tomomi tomomi
koe takahasi mikako mikako
onodera koutarou onodera koutarou koutarou
koe okada takayuki takayuki
tuusyou ono. dansi basukettobooru buin. nekketu kaikatu de tekido ni sukebe na seikaku dearu. sinzi to uma ga ai, sousuke mo koudou wo tomoni suru koto gaaru. mata kurutu toha, sukebe dousi toiukotode ikitougou.
gakuensai no utiage konpa de, biru no okuzyou karakanameni kokuhaku sitaga gyokusai sita. ima ha tokiwa kyouko nokotoga kini natteiru.
gozi genme no hottosupotto nite bakunetu goddokareepan wo tabeta kiwa, amari no turasa ni temoto niatta saikin heiki botoru wo goin si, sugoi nokasoudenainoka nanto mo ii gatai baiohazaado wo hikioko sita. mata, migatte na buruusu deha sousuke to sinzi wo tomonai goukon ni sanka si, sono saino toraburu ni ata tteha zibuntati nin wo zin kousan kyoudai to katte ni meimei siteiru.
tuzuku onmaioun deha, kyouko tokanamewo mamori kirenakatta sousuke wo seme, gekizyou ni kara rete naguri kakaroutosite mawari no seito ya kagurazaka sensei ni osae rareteiru.
sikasi, zutto, sutandobaimii no zyoukan de sousuke wo seme ta koto wo koukai suruyouna yousu wo mise teori, gekan deha sousuke ga mira kara watasa reta memoriitippu ni kiroku sareta douga no naka de sousuke ni wabi teita.
zyuusuunen noti wo egai ta anazaa deha, zin dai koukou ni tiri kyousi tosite hunin siteiru.
kazama sinzi kazama sinzi sinzi
koe noto mamiko mamiko
syasinbu in. gunzi otaku de, sousuke mo kansin suruhodono tisiki wo motu teiru. titioya, kazama sintarou ha rikuzyou zieitai narasino tyuuton ti no zimukan wositeori, anime han hurumetarupanikku dehani notte oyako de kibasen ni sanka sita. saikin hao syare nimo kiwo tukatte irurasii.
izimeniatteori, tatakau booimiitugaaru dehaizimetu ko ni tora reta nega wo kaesi temorautamenikanameno zitaku no beranda ni sinobi komi, sono sitagi wo toro utosita koto moaru. kono saini sousuke niyotte tori osa erareta koto gakikkakede, yuuzyou ga mebae rukotoninaru. nao, kare honnin mosorenarini sukebe natokorogaaruyoude, aizou no puropaganda nioite, kanamewo tyuusyou suru rakugaki wo makoto ni uke, kanamekara sawaya ka hentaiyarou yoba warisareteiru. maokurutu rawo hukume te onsenti ni ryokou sita kiwa ha kurutu ni kanyuu sare, onnaburo wo nozoku tameni inoti gakeno totugeki wo kankou sita. kono kiwa, nanika gahazikeruyouna byousya no noti, kurutu kara takusa reta kaabin zyuu de musuu no sentoriigan wo gekitui surutoiususamazii sentouryoku wo hakki sita.
zutto, sutandobaimii zyoukan deha, kurasumeito tatini namegata sire zuno sousuke tokanameni taisuru messeezi wo kiroku sita douga wo intaanetto de haisin surukotowo teian si, zikkou sita. kono douga ha mira ga intaanetto uede hakken si, saisyuukessen mae ni memoriikaado ni ire te sousuke ni tewatasi teiru.
kudou siori kudou siori siori
koe takahasi tiaki konno hiromi humofhu ikou
kanameno yuuzin no nin. issyoni kaimono ni deka ketari, karaoke ni itta risuru naka. kamigata ha syootobobu.
daigakusei no karesi gairu.
tokiwa kyouko tokiwa kyouko kyouko
koe kimura humie toyoguti megumi megumi
kanamega zin dai koukou de saisyo ni siriatu ta yuuzin. itumo dezitarukamera wo syozisi teite iroiro namonowo satuei siteiru.
tonbo megane nio sage kami, hatuiku tozyou no osanai sitai, tensinranman na seikaku nadokara, hisoka ni hu a n ga ooi. aizou no fesuteibaru de misu zin taka wo mezasi teitakanameha, zibun toha seihantai no hou e bekutoru wo motu saidai no kyouteki kyouko ga syutuzyou sinaikotoni mune wo nade kudaro siteita.
kanamega sousuke nikimeta maniakku na puroresu waza wo sitte itarisuru.
osu no amerikansyootohea wo katu teori, namae ha mia . sono syasin woatikotini mise mawatu teiru. tada, kanameha, naka no warui syouzi mia wo rensou sitesimautame, sibui kao wosita.
tuzuku onmaioun deha, amarugamu niyotte hitoziti tosaretesimatta. sousuke to reisu niyotte kyuusyutu saretaga, sono notino sentou de zyuusyou wo otu tesimau.
notini kurasumeito ga sousuke wo kyuudan suru naka, kanozyohitori dakega sousuke yakanameno sinpai wo saigo madesiteite, sousuke nikanameno hamusutaa no sewa wo tanoma reta. taiin sita noti hao sage kami woyame, megane wo kontakutorenzu ni kae takotode, otona bita youbou ni imeezichenzi siteiru. sarani, ono to kousai wo hazime teiru moyou.
mukai maya mukai maya maya
koe kikuti siho siho
gaiken ha san hakugan ni ronguheaa. syuugakuryokou deha, renraku kakari ni ninmei sareteiru.
toritu zin dai koukousei to kai
rinsui tonsin hayasimizu atunobu atunobu
koe morikawa tomoyuki dousa dousa
nensei de, dai dai seitokaityou. sagara sousuke karaha kaityou kakka to yoba reteori, nanika ga tuuzi atu tesimau naka. itumo sensu wo motu teiru. rui mare naru zunou no motinusi de, honrai naramotto ueno koukou niiketahazudaga, aru riyuu niyori zin dai koukou ni nyuugaku sita. sorega genin de oomono seizika dearu titioya toha tagaini igami au dakeno naka tonatta.
kabu de seikei wo tate teiruga, sumai ha gaikokuzin you no kakuyasu no kasi heya. herikutu gaumaku tuneni zisinmanman. seito no kenri notametoiroirona sigoto wo sousuke tooru ni osituke teiruga, kyousyokuin no zyama wosuru koto wo tanosi ndeiruyounimo mie nakumonai. tokutyouteki na taka warai ya sondai na taido de, issyudokutoku no biisiki kara siroi gakuseihuku anime han deha samazamana kakugen ga kaka reta sensu mo motu toiuidetatiwositeiru. yousitanrei demoarutame, gakunai ni hu a nkurabu gaaru moyou.
zin dai koukousei to kai ha kare ga sisan unyou niyotte bai ni hukurama seta kaikei naru ayasi gena sikingen wo zaigen no hitotu tosite unei sareteiru.
odoru beriimeriikurisumasu ikou, kanameno nouryoku ya sousuke no syoutai, sono haigo no misuriru no sonzai ni kan tui teori, kaityou wo tainin suru saini ha, sousuke nimou muri dato omou to keikoku wo atae ta.
sousuke momata, kare ni taisi te misuriru no douryou ni taisuru soreto nita sinrai wo yose teori, zenzyutu no keikoku wo uke ta saini ha mizukara no syoutai wo hanasi tesimauhododatta.
tuzuku onmaioun nite zin dai koukou syuuhen ga amarugamu ni syuugeki sareta saini ha, sousuke no yousei wo uke te, heta wosureba teigaku syobun wo ukeru to siri nagaramo sousuke ga kounai ni tisi sei no kagakubussitu wo motikon da. zinsoku ni hinan sinaito zenin sinu toiu kyogi no hinan kankoku wo dasi te, zenkouseito wo kounai kara hinan saseta. sakutyuu de rinsui to sousuke ga kaiwa wo maziwa sitanoha, konotokiga saigo ninatta.
sinzi kara onraingeemu ni kanyuu sareta mentu no naka de, kareha issyuukan tara zude geemu nai no keizai zyoukyou wo syouaku sitesimauhodo, itiban hama rikonda.
sotugyougo no singakusaki ha, zibun no kinsen ni hureru hon wo kai ta zyokyouzyu noiru daigaku nisuru yotei. sakuhin syuuban deha sudeni sotugyou siteiruga, dono daigaku ni singaku sitanokaha byousya sareteinai.
miki hara hasu mikihara ren ren
koe tanaka rie rie
nensei de, seitokai syoki. tuusyou o hasu san. ie ha edozidai kara tuzuku yakuza miki hara kumi de, titioya hasono siti daime kumityou dearu. nao titioya ni taisuru tukkomi ha yousya ga nai. iwayuru yamatonadesiko.
take no nagai sukaato wo hai tari, karada no rain ga dena i huku wo kita risiteiru. sikasisono sitani ha, nikkan tekina sitai to soso tosita iroka wo yuusi teori, dansiseito tooru karaha taisou kisugata ha tobi dougu to hyousa reru.
nanika to tanin ni kiwo tukau nodaga, sinpai suru ten gadokoka zure teori, sonokotode aite ga zekku sitesimaukotomosibasiba. rinsui ni kataomoi naka.
rinsui ga seitokaityou wo intai sita noti mo seitokai ni nokori, kaikeikansa wo tantou suru.
okada hayato okada hayato hayato
seitokai kaikei kakari.
daikuumaryuukingugai satugaiziken no saini ha hannin nokanameni kuti huuzi notame korosa rekaketa.
kanamekara oka pii to yoba retakotomoaru.
sasaki hiromi sasaki hiromi hiromi
koe asano mayumi mayumi
nensei de, seitokai bihin kakari. mokei doukoukai ni zokusi teori, figyua ga suki. mata, ganpura moikutuka tukutu teiru.
zitaku deha siizuu wo katu teitaga, houkago no piisukiipaa nioite naku natteiru. sono kiwa ha syokku no amari, seitokai hou zin taka dayorini nose teita essei wo kake naihodoni husagi kondesimau. sikasi, sousuke no sitta niyotte, zikkenteki de sanpiryouron no essei wo kakiage teiru.
rinsui seitokaityou intaigo, seitokai hukukaityou ni syuunin suru.
morikawa tada morikawa yui yui
nen kuni zaiseki. suieibuin. tuzuku onmaioun boutou nite rinsui no noti wo tui de zin dai koukou dai dai seitokaityou ni syuunin sita. genkan dearunimokakawarazu kyouei mizugisugata de rikkouho enzetu wo itta.
soga takasi soga takasi takasi
nensei de, rinsui seitokaityou intaigo no seitokai syoki.
kurata hirosi kurata hirosi hirosi
nensei de, rinsui seitokaityou intaigo no seitokai kaikei.
maeda eizi maeda eizi eizi
moto seitokai sennyuu sousakan. rinsui ga kounai de hassei suru mondai wo soukikaiketu surutameni huryou guruupu no nakani moguri koma seta. tyuugakuzidai ha rinsui to onazi gakkou ni tootte itaga, hotondo yuuzin gainakatta. sonotame rinsui ni ongi wo kanzi teiru.
girininzyou no andaakabaa nite, maburahono saisinkan woukkari kaban ni ire ppanasinisitesimai, sonokotokara sennyuu sousakan tositeno suzyou ga bare runowo osore teita. notini denwa de banri ni yobidasa re, kanozyo wo hukumu sono hokano menmen kara tanzyoubi wo syukuhuku sarete sukazyan wo purezento sareruga, zenzyutu no ikken niyoru kyouhusin de, honnin ha zibun no tanzyoubi dearu koto wosukkari wasure teita.
saisyuuteki niha, kare ga sennyuu sousakan tosite mibun wo kakusi tuzuke rukotoni genkai wo kanzi teita rinsui mizukara, kare ga supai dearu koto wo banri ni aka si, sennyuu sousakan tositeno nin wo toka rete meizitutomo ni huryou no itiin tonaru.
hokano kuno seito
saeki ena saeki ena ena
koe kikuti siho siho
nen kuni zaiseki. engekibu butyou. zennen misu zin kou kurai nen gakunenmatu tesuto kurai no saisyoku kenbi.
tanpen dai hanasi minami kara kita otoko nite, sousuke ni itimoku boresite raburetaa wo getabako ni sinoba seteoitaga, husin mono to matigawa rete sousuke ni getabako goto bakuha sareta ue, yakekoge ta raburetaa no bunmen kara kyouhakuzyou to handan sarete mati huse sareru hame ninari, sarani sousuke wo matu teiru totyuu de huryou ni karama rerunado sanzan na meni atu teiru.
aizou no fesuteibaru deha misu zin takani syutuzyou sita.
otonano suniikingumissyon deha imeezisaron de arubaito wositeita.
inaba mizuki inaba mizuki mizuki
koe yosida sayuri sayuri
nen kuni zaiseki. kanameno yuuzin. wagamamade gouzyou de inken de mie tu hari toiuyakkaina seikaku no motinusi daga, yuuzyou hakoni ha meguma reteiru.
hatutouzyou hanasi dearu aizou no puropaganda deha, kouzyutu suru sirai satosi gakanamewo kudoi teirutokorowo mokugeki sitatame, toire nikanamewo tyuusyou suru rakugaki wo tasuu kakikon deiru notini wakai site yuuzin ninaru.
kogara nagara deru tokoroha dete iru, iwayuru toranzisutaaguramaa.
tanpen teki hazure no emoosyon nioite tubaki kazunari ni itimoku boresi syuusi matowarituku han deha gozi genme no hottosupotto .
sirai satosi sirai satoru satoru
koe konisi katuyuki katuyuki
nen kuni zaiseki. inaba mizuki no motokare si.
mizuki karaha yano konsaatotiketto nadowo purezento sareteita. aizou no puropaganda no notini wakare ta moyou. nao, kono toki mizuki kara kazyou namadeno houhuku wo uke ta.
syouzi mia syouzi mia mia
nen kuni zaiseki. zyosi basukettobooru bu no hukubutyou. doryoku no nin.
kanametoha kenen no naka. sikasisoreha, tenpu no sai wo mudazukai surukanameni sitto siteiru bubun ga ookii.
daimeiwaku no suusaido deha zisatu wo honome kasu hu a kkusu wo okuri tuke, kyuugi taikai wo tyuusi saseyoutosita. zissaini tobiori teyarutokaname tooru wo odosu ga, sousuke ga zyuu wo muke tobiori temo, kun ga zimen ni gekitotu suru mae ni syasatu suru. kun ha zisatu dekinai sousuke niyoru tasatu ninarunodeto sengen sitakotode, yaru kiga naku natte keikaku ga tonza. aizou no fesuteibaru deha misu zin taka syutuzyou ni kinori siteinakattakanamewo sousuke wo tukatte taki tuke ta. nao, sono misu zin taka dehakanameni ittensa de uti katu ta.
tubaki kazunari tubaki issei issei
koe hukuyama zyun zyun
nen kuni zaiseki. karate doukoukai kaityou. satuzin kobusi dai dou myakuryuu kassatu zyutu ika, dai dou myakuryuu no tukai te. seikaku ha nekketu kan. tyuukaryouriten de baito wositeiru.
aite no kao no hanbetu ga dekina ihodono kingan sousuke to kyouko wo matigae ruhodode, honki wo dasu toki dake kame soko megane wokakerukotonisiteiru.
zyun de huzyun na gurappuraa nitekanameni hitomebore sita. dousaku nite sousuke wo raibaru si suruyouninari, nanika nitukete hari ao utosuruga, kanamewo renaitaisyou tositeha isiki siteinakatta gorono sousuke niha rikai sarezuni issyuu sare, karamawari wo tuzuke teiru. zutto sutandobaimii no sasie nimo karera siki sugata ga kakunin dekiru.
itido kanameni kokuhaku siyoutosita koto gaattaga, sono kiwa ha megane wo hazusi teitatame, sousuke ni muka tte kokuhaku sitesimatta. sonotame, zin dai koukou nai de itiziki, sousuke to tubaki noyaoi giwaku ga huzyou surutoiu zitai ni itatu teiru. renai ni taisi teha keiken ni tobosiku, dokokazureta koudou mo sukunaku nai. nao zissai ha yukusaki kurikaeside zyosei niii otoko kakkoiito hyousa reru ikemen dearu. nao dai dou myakuryuu oyobisono waza no namae ha byoumei hitosika ra kite iru.
akutu banri akutu mari mari
koe asano mayumi mayumi
kinrin ittai no huryou tatiwo tabane ru onna bantyou. sintyou izyou no oogara na taikaku to satuzin kobusi dai dou myakuryuu wo motii ru kenkazyouzu. nakama no tanzyou paatei wo syusai si, aite ga hontou ni hossi gatteiru purezento wo youisu ru mendoumi no yosa wo yuusi teiru.
itido ryuunen siteiruga, sono saidai no genin ha zin dai koukou no seihuku wo kiru tokawaiku mira retesimaukara. rahu na imeezi wo dasu tame, ribontai wo hazusi, sukaato no sitani kuroi supattu wohaiteiruga, soredemokaname iwaku, kawaiirasii. nao, kanamekaraha banri tyan yoba warisareteiru.
kanozyo wo kounai de mikake rukotohahotondo naku, toukou siteinai toki ha baito wositeiruka, tabi ni dete iru.
ryousin toha ori ai ga warui ga, otouto no yosiki niha kokoro wo yurusi teiru. sikasisono yosiki ha sousuke niomotyade baisyuu sareteiru.
tubaki to douyou ni dai dou myakuryuu no tukai te zissaini siyousi teiru siin hanaidaga, sakutyuu no tubaki no serihu niyoreba dai dou myakuryuu ha issisouden deari, naze kanozyo mosikuha tubaki gakono ryuuha wo tukai konaserunokaha humei tada, mayonaka no reidaasu de tubaki ha titioya kara denzyu saretato tore ru hyouki gaaru.
tokiwa kyouko kara, katu teiru amerikansyootohea no syasin wo mise rare omowazu kao gahenyahenyatositesimau.
rinsui toha kusareen. kusakabe kyou ya ni rinsui wo syoukai sitanohasono osananazimi dearu mari toiu onna dearutame, douituzinbutu no kanousei gaaru.
anime han deha akutu mari to hyouki sareteiru.
nanba sirou nanba sirou sirou
koe tiba kazunobu kazunobu
nensei de, syakai kenkyuubu butyou. busitu wo ake watasu zyouken tosite, kakubu katu no daihyou ga tuitati de nannin no zyosei wo ture tekorareruka, toiu nanpakontesuto wo kaisai sita.
gouda yuu gouda yuu yuu
koe kyouri daisuke daisuke
tanpen yarisugino uookurai ni touzyou. ragubii bu syusyou. musi mo korose naihodoni onwa na seikaku dattaga, bu no sonzoku wo kake ta garasu yamataka kou ragubii bu tono siai ni muke te okonawa reta sousuke niyoru kaiheitai siki sinpei kunren no kekka, hokano ragubii buin mo hukume sentou masiin tosite sennou sare, buin to tomoni garasu yamataka kou ragubii bu wo hansoku suresure no rahupuree de nikutaiteki, seisinteki ni dai dameezi wo owa seta. sono siai ha hutagotamagawa no akumu to katari tuga re, garasu yamataka kou ragubii bu ha haisen no syokku kara tatinaore zu, igo tyouki ni watatu te seisekihusin ga tuzuku kotoninaru. mata, sibarakuno kan, zin dai koukou ragubii bu ha koukou ragubii kai nioite kyouhu no daimeisi tonatta.
geemu suupaarobotto taisen demo touzyou siteori gensaku to tigai sennou hasarezu, asyura dansyaku gekitai notameni ragubii buin tomodomo ryousangata bon hutoku nwo kikomi sousuke to tomoni tatakatu ta. dai tugi suupaarobotto taisen toki goku hen deha gensaku doori sennou sareta.
isihara isihara isihara
koe ineda tooru tooru
ragubii bu buin. himantai no aidoruhu a n. syusyou douyou, sousuke niyoru kaiheitai siki sinpei kunren no kekka, sentou masiin tosite sennou sareru.
komuro komuro komuro
eiga kenkyuukai buin. zisyuseisaku eiga koisuru sitinin no kantoku.
sudou sudou sudou
eiga kenkyuukai buin. zisyuseisaku eiga koisuru sitinin no zyokan toku ken kameraman.
maron, wafhuru, syokora syokora
koe kuroda takaya maron , ineda tooru wafhuru , egawa hisao syokora
karate doukoukai buin. zyuudou ba wo katte ni senkyo si, seitokai karano tati sirizoki youkyuu wo tutu panete sousuke ni tatakai wo idomu monono, kaeriuti nisareru.
nao, kono mei no meisyou hakanameniyoru katte na meimei deari, honmyou ha humei dearu. doragonmagazin rensai han deha raimu, cherii, buraddoberii to yoba reteita.
kyousyokuin
tuboi taka ko tuboi takako takako
koe arima mizuka mizuka
koutyou. dokusin. kyouben wo totu teita goro ha suugaku wo tantou siteita.
megami no rainiti zyunan hen deha, madeyuukasu ga kanozyo toha sisou ya seizitekisinzyou ni aiire naito hyousi teiru.
tuzuku onmaioun nite zin dai koukou ga syuugeki sareta saino eikyou niyori kanozyo niha tyokusetu no sekinin ha nai ga, takou he idou sitesimattakotogazutto sutandobaimii de katara reteiru.
kagurazaka eri kagurazaka eri eri
koe natuki rio rio
eigo kyousi. nen kuno tannin. seitokai no komon mo tutome ru.
sousuke tatiga oko su soudou ni makikoma re, sonotabini syokku de kiwo usinau.
koukouzidai ni kouhai no nisino kozuenoseidesibaraku dansei kyouhusyou ninari, sakutyuu de suisei ga syokuzi ni sasou madesibaraku otoko ni heri ganakattarasiikotowo hatugen siteori, sukunakutomo suisei to kousai surumadeha syozyo dattarasiku, ziki ninatta tokini sonokotowo sousuke tooru no mae de zigyaku no neta nisiteita.
yuuben na pootoreito ikou, bizyutu kyousi dearu suisei iori to kousai siteiru. tadasi, hitori mi dearu tuboi koutyou karaha sitto no nen wo daka reteiru yousu.
geemu suupaarobotto taisen siriizu deha kanozyo no ukemotu kurasu niha mazinkaizaa no kabuto kouzi nado, suupaarobotto no pairotto tooru ga zaisekisi teiru.
zin dai koukou node burasubando bu ni syozoku siteita.
sousuke no doukyuusei raga sotugyou suru goroni ha sudeni suisei to kekkon siteori, sousuke ni muke ta bideomesseezi de kainin naka dearukotowo aka si, syussan madeni modotu te hosii to katari kaketeiru.
suisei iori mizuhosi iori iori
koe miyamoto zyuu zyuu
bizyutu kyousi. sono gendou ha ekisentorikku katu bousou tokkyuu gensaku deha tyuuryaku ga tayou sareteiru. henzin kyousi tosite toritu zin dai koukou no kyousi seito souhou ni hiroku ninti sareteiru.
sikasitesono zittai ha pyua na haato wo motu geizyutuka deari, hizyouni toomawari na gendou ha kutibeta dearu koto no araware. mata, nuruka na ningensei ga egaki dasa reta kaiga ha eigo kyousi no kagurazaka eri ga norokeru hododearu.
sono kagurazaka eri toha kousai naka de, saisyuuteki ni kekkon wo hata sita. mata, sousuke toha henzin dousi kiga au youdearu. mottomo, sousuke zisin ha suisei no kotoba no imi wohotondo rikai siteinai.
kogure itirou kogure itirou itirou
koe ikemizu mitihiro mitihiro
hokentaiiku kyousi de, seikatusidou wo tantou. yoku donari tira siteiru. sousuke ya rinsui ni taisi te yoi insyou wo motu teorazu, sure tigai no hosuteiritei de seitokai unei no pan ya ni bougaikousaku wo sikake youtositakotoga koutyou ni hakkaku sitatame, kyuusyoku suru koto ninatta.
sousuke ha kantigai niyotte subarasii kyousi toiu ninsiki wo dai teiru.
huzi saki huzisaki sensei sensei
koe naka hirosi hirosi
kokugokyousi kobun wo tantou . baiohazaado ziken no kiwa, osen tiiki wo gakkou nakani kakudai saseta tyouhonnin.
syukudai ha zyugyou no saisyo ni kaisyuu suru hun igai ha uketuke zu, mata, tikokusya ha kesseki tosite atukau toiu housin kara, kounai deha ikamesii kyousi tosite sira reteiru.
usui usui usui
rinri kyousi. kiyowaso ude insyou ga usui.
otonano suniikingumissyon de imeezisaron huuzoku mise dehanaku, akuyaku wo enzi ru hosutesuhosuto aite ni zibun no seigikan wo omoi kiributuke, sutoresu wo kaisyou suru saron ni tootte iru koto ga hanmei sita.
sayama sayama sayama
syakaika kyousi.
nisino kozuenisino kozue kozue
koe konno hiromi hiromi
hoken i. zin dai koukou no. kagurazaka eri no itinengo yakara de onazi ku burasubando bu ni syozoku. osanai kaodati to kyonyuu no souzyoukouka de mukasi kara mote teita.
eri nitottekozueha, mizukara no konpurekkusu wo sigeki si, akui nasini hidoi kotowo ii, toraburu wo hikioko su komatu ta kouhai. daga zibun ga seisinteki ni oitume rareta tokini ha, yokukozuenoiru hokensitu ni komo ri guti wokobositeiru.
oonuki yosiharu oonuki zenzi zenzi
koe aono takesi takesi
kinzoku nen no youmuin. hudan ha onkou de mono sizuka daga, kire ruto cheensoo wo hurimawasi te ooabare suru. sono saino sentounouryoku ha susamaziku, zyuudan womonotomosinaihododearu anime han deha syuryuudan wo kami kudai temiseta. sousuke wosite betuno zinsei wo ayun deireba, sizyousaikyou no youhei tosite mei wo nokosita darouto iwa simeta.
tanpen no zeni no toresupasu nioite, kawaiga tteita koi no katoriinu wo korosi ta yuusyoku ni kyousi ta sousuke to kazunari wo zettaizetumei no kyuuti ni oikon da hoka, mayonaka no reidaasu nioite, onazi ku kawaiga tteita sakura no ki no gureesu wo taosa reta tokini mo cheensoo wo huru tteiru. tadasikono kiwa ha, gureneedorantyaa, koukei raihuru, sandan zirai oyobi, dai dou myakuryuu no tyou kyuukyoku ougi kokoro hu zen niyotte muryoku kasa reta.
geemu dai tugi suupaarobotto taisen toki goku hen deha makoto gettaarobo sekai saigo no niti no ryuu ryuuma ga oonuki no douryou ninatteiruga, sono saini mo genin ha humei daga ikara setarasiku, oonuki no osorosisa wo sitte ita.
onmaioun humofhudeha kurama ya kodaaru kazu ki, beriaru made gekiha surutoiu susamazii tuyosa wo mise teiru.
nao, katoriinu oyobi gureesu no namae nituiteha, sorezore katoriinudonuuvu to gureesukerii kara tora reteiru.
zin dai koukousei itazurano kazoku enzya
tidori ayametidori ayame ayame
tidori kanameno imouto. titioya to nyuuyooku de kurasi teirutame, honpen niha tyokusetu touzyou siteinai. tadasi, kokusaidenwa wo tukatte kanametoha renraku wo tori atu teiru.
gatu nissei marenokanameha kurisumasupurezento to tanzyoubi purezento wo setto nisaretesimaunoni taisi te, ayameha getusei maredearukotokarasorezorewo betuni morae teita. sonotame, tiisai goroni hasorega genin de kenka wositakotomoaru.
komura syuuzirou komura syuuzirou syuuzirou
kyuunihonkaigun dai syoukai tyuutai syozoku. touzi no kaikyuu ha tyuui. tai deha kazusukunai ikinokori.
kanameno hahakata no sohu. musume kanameno haha ga kakeoti douzen de ie wo deta tame, kanameto komura ie hahotondo zetuen zyoutai niaruga, kare dakehakanamenokotohaitumo kini kaketeiru.
maigo no oorudodoggu de touzyou si, kanameni kanozyo no haha zibun no musume no nikki wo todoke rutameni toukyou wo otozure teitagasono nikki wo kaban goto hitu takurini ubawa retatame, iawa seta sousuke to tomoni sono sousaku wo okonai, kare wo busi mononohuto tonae ta.
akutu yosiki akutu yosiki yosiki
koe hamada makoto zui zui
sibasaki syougakkou no gonen nama. akutu banri no otouto. ebara ya amemiya takami toha osananazimi.
dakyou muyou no hosuteezi deha sousuke ni baisyuu sare, wazato hitoziti tonatta.
kurayami no peisiento deha hai byouin de kura su gen sannotameni kaidanbanasi wodetti age, yuuzintati to tomoni, kyoumihanbun niyattekuru kappuru nadowo tesei no sikake ya hensou nadode oi kaesi teita.
houkago no piisukiipaa deha sibasaki syougakkou seiryoku no sikikan tosite seiti no ryouyuuken wo izumikawa syougakkou seiryoku to arasotu teita.
miki hara kanzi mikihara kanzi kanzi
koe oyama takehiro takehiro
zyakusyou bouryokudan miki hara kuno siti daime kumityou. sakutyuu deha yani huse tteiruga, edozidai kara tuzuku dentou, girininzyou ni atui situzitu na hitogara kara, kobun nominarazu syuui no oyabun syuu karamohitokadono keii wo arawasa reteiru. wakai goro ha butumetu no kanzi to osore rareta gokudou deatta.
wakagasira no sibata ni, bon hutoku n sousuke wo youzinbou tosurukotowo teian sareta kiwa hahuzaketeirumonoto omoikomi, tyou dosu de kiri kakaruni itatu taga, sunzen ni bon hutoku nno tobi keri de muryoku kasa reru. soreniyotte bon hutoku nno tuyosa wo mitome rumonono, siti dai tuzui ta kumo, osimaiyoto in de namida sita.
hayami nobuhiko hayami nobuhiko nobuhiko
toukyouto gikai giin. moto sakka deari, hayami nobuhiko no mei hasono toki karano hitumei. honmyou ha rinsui nobuhiko . toritu zin dai koukousei to kaityou rinsui tonsin no titi demoaru.
seigikan ga tuyoku, soreyue aihansu ru sisou no seizi kessya kara inoti wo nerawa rerunado, teki ga ooi.
toritu zin dai koukou igai no seito kyousyokuin
ebara ehara ehara
izumikawa syougakkou no gonen nama. akutu yosiki ya amemiya takami toha osananazimi.
houkago no piisukiipaa deha izumikawa syougakkou seiryoku no sikikan tosite seiti no ryouyuuken wo sibasaki syougakkou seiryoku to arasotu teita.
amemiya takami amemiya takami takami
koe simokawa mikuni mikuni
sibasaki syougakkou no gonen nama. akutu yosiki toha osananazimi de doukyuusei. ebara toha osananazimi.
youtienzidai ni ryousya kara puropoozu sareta.
siobara siobara siobara
koma oka gakuen koukou no nensei de seitokaityou wo tutome ru. rinsui toha onazi tyuugakkou.
sousuke yakanamewoakarasamani mikudasi tayouna taido wo totu tatame, sousuke ni nisemono no seitokaityou to handan sarete ganmen ni gomu dan wo tataki koma reta.
kouzan kiyosi takayama kiyosi kiyosi
garasu yamataka kou nensei. huryou guruupu no hitori. nisiyama tyuugaku ni kayou tosi no imouto gairu sousuke no kyouhaku no taisyou tonatta.
huwa senpai huwasenpai huwasenpai
koe uedayuuzi koyasu takehito takehito
tidori kanameno tyuugakkouzidai no senpai de, kanozyo no hatukoi no nin. kanametono deeto no saini zibun no omoi wokanameni uti ake ruga, hura retesimau. dagakanameni hokani suki na otoko gairutoiukotoha usuusu kan zuiteitayoudearu.
niura tomoko niiura tomoko tomoko
rinsui tonsin no tyuugakuzidai no yuuzin. iedesyouzyo de nusumi no tensai.
toritu zin dai koukou heno singaku wo kibou siteitaga, koutuuziko de sibou sita.
kono dekigoto ha, rinsui tonsin ga oya no hantai wo osi kiri toritu zin dai koukou he nyuugaku sita genin nimonatteiru.
kusakabe kyou ya kusakabe kyouya kyouya
niura tomoko no yuuzin datta huryou syounen. rinsui wo nikun deitaga, notini wakai. rinsui ga namae wo yobisute nisuru yuuzin.
akagi manami akagi manami, tuge madokatuge madoka, heki kawa syouko midorikawa syouko syouko
koe simazaki haruka akagi mizuhasi kaori tuge murai kazusa heki kawa
inaba mizuki no tyuugakuzidai no tomodati. mizuki ha hikkosi de gakku ga katu tatame, kanozyo rato onazi koukou he singaku dekinakatta.
namae wo oboe runoga nigate nakanamekaraha singouki torio to kokoro no naka de yoba reteita.
garasu yamataka kou ragubii butyou butyou
koe watanabe takesi takesi
garasu yamataka kou no ragubii butyou. gorira kao.
zin dai koukou ragubii bu tono siai no saini ha, sousuke ni pantokikku ganmen kikku wo kura wasare husyoutaizyou sita.
koganei koganei sensei sensei
moto toritu zin dai koukou kyouyu. genzai ha kumamotoken ritu asa ryuu tyuugaku dai sora sima bunkou no kyouyu.
katuteha gakkai demo mei no sire ta seibutugakusya dattaga, genzai ha syousyou boke kimi deari, tadano sazae wo sinsyu no kai daikuumaryuukingugai dato syousi te toritu zin dai koukou ni okutu tekita.
kakkoku seikigun zyouhou kikan kankeisya
amerika gun taiekigunzin hukumu
kevinsukairei kevinsukairei
taieki kaigun tyuuzyou. booda teitoku no kyuuyuu deari, tessa no daifan.
sentouki pairotto tosite betonamu sensou wo moguri nuke, sono noti koukuu dan sirei, saraniha kuubo no kantyou wo tutome age ru. betonamu deha beiruauto site tekiti wo houkou tta keiken moaru.
wakai goro ha amai masuku de uki mei wo nagasi teitaga, sakutyuu deha kami no usuku natta, nizyuu ago noossan dearu. tadasi, honnin hamadamada irootoko dearutoiu ninsiki wo motu teiru.
sousuke ha kurutu ga nen wo totu tarakounarudearouto souzou siteiru.
toomasurosu toomasurosu
taieki kaigun syousyou. booda teitoku no kyuuyuu deari, tessa no daifan.
sensuikan kantyou wo tutome ta notini, uyokyokusetu wo hete taiheiyou sensuikan tai no sireikan tonatta.
rosyutu kuse gaari, tessa no mae de kahansin ni hodokosi ta irezumi wo mise tukeru tameniyatarato zubon wo nugi tagaru. sakutyuu deha egaka reteinaiga, honpen no nenmae ni zissaini nui deori, sorewo meno atari nisita tessa nitotteno issyou no torauma tonatta.
madeyuukasu ga hakkyou sitarakounarudearou, to sousuke ha souzou sita.
amarugamu tono tatakai wo tuzuke ru tessa ni, hawai no sensuikan tai sireibu tono kone wo riyou site zyouhou wo okuru nado, nanika to bengi wo hakatu teiru.
roisiiruzu roisiiruzu
koe aoyama zyou zyou
taieki kaigun taisa. suunenmae made kaigun tokusyubutai ni syozoku siteita. booda teitoku no kyuuyuu deari, tessa no daifan.
kazuooku no gokuhi sakusen ni zyuuzi siteori, kao nihaikutumono kizuato ga nokotu teiru. sikasi kowamote no gaiken toha urahara ni, tessa ni iki araku moosyon wokaketekurutame, betuno imi de abunai nin ninatteiru.
kariinin ga syoku boke sitarakounarukamosirenai, to sousuke ha souzou sita.
tudou meikumaidei deha sousuke notameni daakubussyuneru wo tyoromakasite tyoutatu sitekita. sono notino amarugamu no kyoten heno syuugeki sakusen nimo sanka siteiru. zutto sutandobaimii deha, sousuke notameni wotyoromakasita koto ga beigun nibaretayoude, ryuuti tokoro kurasi wositeirukotoga rosu no kuti kara katara retaga, saisyuukan no epiroogu de muzaihoumen ninattakotoga katara reta.
zyonzyoozikootonii zyonzyoozikootonii
koe ikeda kati kati
taieki kaihei tyuusa. booda teitoku no kyuuyuu deari, tessa no daifan. to kotoba no tukai tede, nanika to hu a kkin rouhei tatino huuga deha a kkin toiu kotoba wo atama ni tukekuwae ru kuse gaaru.
syoukan ninarukotode genba kara hanare runowo kirai, zyoukan wo naguri tukete syousin wo tori yamesaseta koto moaru. sousuke no souzou ha waruyoi isita mao.
taieki sitemonao tensyon ga takaku, kinzyo no kaiheitai kiti ni nori komi, no souzyuu wo tanosi ndeiru.
tudou meikumaidei deha hurorida nite sousuke no rihabiri toiu mei no kaiheitai siki kunren ni kyouryoku si, sono koukou wareta syuugeki sakusen nimo kyouryoku siteiru. nao, sono saino hatugen kara betonamu sensou nioite, kesan kiti koubousen ni sanka siteitakotoga hanmei sita.
zutto sutandobaimii zitende ha, rosu iwaku gunkei satu no torisirabe wotonzurasite yukuehumei ninatteitaga taiho sare, saisyuukan no epiroogu de muzaihoumen ninattakotoga katara reta.
hurumetarupanikku anazaa no zitende ha, kanrenkiki meekaa tuusoninsurumentu syatyou. bussyumasutaa you pawaaasisuto kikou bururoodaa ya, handogan wo yoni okutu teiru.
kaarutesutarossa kaarutesutarossa
kaigun tyuusa. rosanzerusu kyuu gensiryoku sensuikan darasu no kantyou.
renaadotessa kyoudai no titioya.
barentu umi de madeyuukasu ni tasuke rareta rei tosite, pootumasu no zitaku ni kare wo manei takotogaaru. sono kiwa, sudeni uisupaado tositeno nouryoku wo kaika sasetutuatta renaadotessa kyoudai no syourai wo anzi teori, madeyuukasu nisono koto wo hanasi teiru. nao, kono saini honpen de madeyuukasu ga ootu teiru bousi wo watasi teiru.
sono noti taiheiyou kantai ni idou tonatte itiziteki ni okinawa ni haizoku sareruga, sono nengo ni zitaku de goutou zissai ha tessa to renaado no rati wo mokuteki tosita dokokano tyouhou bu ni osowa re, tuma no maria to tomoni satugai sareru.
kanarino aienka deari, kaigun sanka no kaeuta wo tukuru hodo ni hamaki wo si ndeita.
kiriibenzyaminseiraa kiriiseiraa
koe hirota yukio yukio
kaigun tyuusa. kairyougata rosanzerusu kyuu gensiryoku sensuikan pasadena no kantyou.
sintyou fiito yaku , kurokami, tanpatu, kinnikusitu no hakuzin dansei. sono youbou ha komedi ni dete irutokino aanorudosyuwarutueneggaa ni nite iru.
gensiryoku baka ya suityoku hassya siki baka nado, tanin wo batou suru kiwa ha sensuikan kanrenyougo baka toiu hyougen wosuru.
yure ru intouzaburuu nioite toibokkusu niiiyouniasirawaretatame, ni taisuru sinsyou ha warui.
kantyou ninaru izen niha, senzyutu sita kaarutesutarossa tyuusa renaadotessa no titioya ga kantyou wo tutome ru rosanzerusu kyuu gensen darasu nite kanpan sikan wo tutome teita. nao, darasu ha barentu umi de touzi madeyuukasu ga siki siteita taabyuranto niyotte gekitin no kiki wo manukare tatame, kareha madeyuukasu wo onzin to omotte iru.
iraiza toiu mei no tuma gairuga, sono naka ha kanzen ni hie kitu teiru. odoru beriimeriikurisumasu deha goukakyakusen no kuruuzu ni sasoo utositanodaga, sonotokiniha sudeni zikka ni kaetu tesimatteita. sono noti, misuriru niyoru siizyakku ni makikoma re, tessa wo rati zizyou wo sira nai kantigai niyoru hogo site ootati ti mawari wo enzi ru.
kyarakutaa ha hourai gakuen siriizu no kiri bu seirou kiribe seiryouga motoneta.
maasiitakenaka maasiitakenaka
koe matumoto dai dai
kaigun taii. kairyougata rosanzerusu kyuu gensiryoku sensuikan pasadena no hukutyou.
nikkei amerika nin. tyokuzyou keikou na seiraa toha taisyouteki ni, reisei na seikaku wositeiru. sonotame seiraa no osae yaku tukkomi yaku tonatteiru.
odoru beriimeriikurisumasu deha hawai de kyuuka wo tanosi muhazuga seiraa ni muriyari tukiawa sareta ageku, siizyakku ni makikoma retesimau. sikasi siizyakku han ga misuriru deari, sono mokuteki moatte, koreto itta kigai wo kuwae rareru koto ha naka tta. nao, sono kiwa ha sennyuu siteita reisu to dinaa wo tomoni siteiru.
kyarakutaa ha hourai gakuen siriizu no takenaka masaki takenaka masakiga motoneta.
edoorumosu edoorumosu
koe murozono takehiro takehiro
kaigun nitou gunsou. tokusyubutai syozoku.
yure ru intouzaburuu nite, perio syo sima wo senkyo sita terorisuto amarugamu no seiatu sakusen ni sanka sitaga, gaurun no kodaaru niyotte touzyou ki dearu wo gekiha sarete sibou suru.
zienkinsu zyunsyou zyunsyou
koe isi nami yosito yosito
ban dai saku nomini touzyou suru kyarakutaa.
kaigun zyunsyou. pentagon no toppu.
nisi taiheiyou sentai ga perio syo sima wo seiatu sita kiwa, kariinin tono kaidan notame iizisu kan bankaahiru ni zyoukan siteita.
bankaahiru kantyou kantyou
koe syuu yagi rai rai
amerika kaigun syozoku. kaikyuu ha humei. simei humei. taikonderoga kyuu misairu zyunyoukan bankaahiru kantyou.
igirisu gun
buraun buraun
kaigun tyuusa. tyaatiru kyuu gensiryoku sensuikan konkaraa kantyou. fookurando hunsou touzi no madeyuukasu no tyokuzoku no zyousi.
nao, kakuu no zinbutu dearu madeyuukasu toha kotona ri, kareha genzitu ni fookurando hunsou ni zyuugun sita, zituzai suru gunzin. huruneemu ha kurisutohu aa riifoodoburaun, syousai ha eigoban sansyou.
bariku kyouwakoku seihugun
maresu taisa taisa
koe goou sirou sirou
han hurumetarupanikku ni touzyou suru kyarakutaa de, naisen nakano bariku kyouwakoku seihugun no sikikan.
ikyouto dearu nanmin wo massatu siyoutositaga, misuriru no kainyuu niyotte sosi sareta. amarugamu no zikkoubu tai kara heiki no kyouyo wo uke teitaga, daikin wo harawa naito itta tame geitu ni korosa reta.
huransu taigai hoan soukyoku
misieruremon misieruremon
koe tuda kenzirou kenzirou
megane wokaketa dansei de, huransu taigai hoan soukyoku ni syozoku suru eeziento. sorubonnu daigakusyussin de, honnin iwaku ha .
moe ru wanmanfoosu nite, namusaku niaru tougizyou ga amarugamu to kankei gaarutomite sennyuu wo kokoromi teita. sono kiwa ha mibun wo ruporaitaa to nise tteori, sizyou wo teisatu nakani tinpira tatini karama re kyoukatu saretatoki nami ni tasuke rarete siriatu te, kanozyotati kurosubou no menbaa oyobi sousuke to sessyokusi ta.
moe ru wanmanfoosu no rasuto de zyuusyou wo otu ta sousuke wo hogo si, tudou meikumaidei deha zyousi no derukuuru no sigo, buka wo tomonatu te kare to koudou wo tomoni siteiru. nao, sono rasuto de tessa ni hitomebore sita. saisyuukessen deha, kakkoku no zyouhou kikan ni kaku misairu no zyouhou wo teikyou si, daisan tugi sekaitaisen no boppatu wo husegu tameni kouken sita.
saisyuukessen noti hawo kubi ninari, booda no sita de hataraku kotoninatta.
derukuuru derukuuru
no eeziento de remon no zyousi. sugino yase kata no dansei de, kurokami de kuti higewo takuwae teiru.
sono kini nareba koukyuukanryou nimonareruhodono keireki wo motu remon toha kotona ri, tatakiage no eeziento dearu. sore yueni remon wo daigakuin deno obottyantosite anadotu teiru husi gaaru.
marukiizu syo sima no hibaoa sima de sousuke kara zyouhou wo hikidaso utositeitaga, sono tyokuzen ni amarugamu no kisyuu wo uke te sibou suru.
zieitai
han dai saku no orizinaruepisoodo narasino ha moe teiruka ni touzyou suru kyarakutaa.
kazama sintarou kazama sintarou sintarou
koe sawaki humiya humiya
kazama sinzi no titi daga, gensaku niha touzyou siteinai. rikuzyou zieitai narasino tyuuton ti nioite zimukan wo tutome ru.
kanren no syokuiki ni kinmu sinagara nori ninarazu zimukan syoku ni tui takotoga riyuu de, sinzi tono naka ha yoku nakattaga, narasino tyuuton ti deno kibasen wo kini oyako no kizuna wo tori modosi ta. nao, kono toki ha sinzi to tomoni siki ni touzyou siteitaga, touzyou sikaku no umu nituiteha humei.
akagi ryuunosuke akagi ryuunosuke ryuunosuke
koe ineda tooru tooru
rikuzyou zieitai nerima tyuuton ti no touzyouin de, buka to tomoni nerima reddodoragon toiu tiimu wo kun deiru sousuke ha karera wo nerima daikon to issyuu sita.
narasino tyuuton ti de okonawa reta ibento deha, ruuru ihan wo kusi site maitosi narasino gawa wo kanpu nakimade tataki nomesiteitaga, kono hanasi deha, saigo no kibasen de nie yu wo noma sareru koto ninaru.
suupaarobotto taisen deha, nippon ga teki no syuugeki wo uke ta saini suukai kinkyuu syutudou siteiruga, touzyou ha siki dehanaku deari, maikai nanimo dekina imamaassari gekitui sare, sono do ni kidousensi gandamu no kyarakutaa no sute serihu wo nokosi te dassyutu siteiru. dai tugi suupaarobotto taisen toki goku hen demo sousuke tono mogisen de dou kyara no serihu wo motiita maekuti ue wo nobe kengaku siteita amurorei ga hukuzatu na kanzyou wo mise teiru.
so rengun wo hukumu
suminohu suminohu
koe kisino kazuhiko kazuhiko
so ren kokka hoan iinkai syozoku. kaikyuu ha taisa. tatakau booimiitugaaru no boutou, habarohusuku nite uisupaado no syouzyo kudanmira wo motiite zikken wo itte ita.
saisyuuteki niha niyoru zyunkou misairu kougeki de kenkyuusyo wo kaimetu saserare, mata, gaurun niyotte tou honbu ni mudan de itte ita kenkyuu ga hakkaku sitatame, rubianka ni kousoku sareta.
serugeihabarohu serugeihabarohu
tanpen kyokuhoku karano koe ni touzyou suru kyarakutaa.
so ren kaigun syozoku. puroiekuto kata vikutaa kyuu gensiryoku sensuikan kantyou. kaikyuu ha tyuusa.
dai nakaba no taisyokukan de, ki sakuna seikaku wositeiru. kariinin toha doukyou noyosimideyoku hanasu aidagara datta. ahuganisutan ni musuko ga syussei siteori, kariinin kara ahuganisutan no zyousei wo kiki tagatteita.
sakutyuu deha hokkyoku umi nioite himituri ni zyouhousyuusyuu ninmu ni tui teitaga, sono kiwa musasi koukuu no booingu ga hukin ni tuiraku sita koto wo sattisi, kyuuen ni muka u ketudan wosurusoreniyotte sousuke ga kyuuzyo sareta.
sikasi, kikou notini meirei musi wo towa rete kantyou syoku wo toka re, kyokutou kantai deno kinmu tonattatosareru kariinin ha siberia ni isou saretato suisoku siteiru. sono kiwa hasubeteno sekinin wo oi, kuruu niha issai toga ganaito kyouzyutu sitatoiu.
kirienko kirienko
so rengun sanbouhonbu zyouhou soukyoku syozoku. kaikyuu ha tyuusa.
reisu ga kitatyousen no supai kouho tosite, kunren notameni mosukuwa ni watatu teita touzi, kyoukan wo tutome teita. sono noti, semaru nikkuobutaimu nai nioite, mosukuwa heno sennyuu niatatteita reisu ga husyou site keisatu ni renkou sareta kiwa, torisirabe tantoukan tosite saikai. zyouhoukoukan to hikikae ni, reisu no syakuhou ya ahugan no kaku misairu kiti kouryaku sakusen ni hituyou na zyouhou no teikyou, hinsi no zyuusyou wo otu teita kurutu no kyuuzyo, oyobi syadou sogeki siyou no kasidasi nadono bengi wo hakatu ta.
saisyuukessen noti, beikoku no kimituzyouhou dearu sousuke tooru no seizon zyouhou wo reisu wo tuuzi te watasi ta.
kurivenko kurivenko
tanpen kyokuhoku karano koe ni touzyou suru kyarakutaa.
so turano tokusyubutai supetunazu hukukan. kaikyuu ha tyuui. kariinin no buka.
osukin osukin
tanpen kyokuhoku karano koe ni touzyou suru kyarakutaa.
so ren kaigun syozoku. vikutaa kata gensiryoku sensuikan kata sensuikan sityuuka kikanbu kuruu. kaikyuu ha soutyou.
suverudorohusuku no tankou otto no ie no syussin de, tozan keiken moaru. mata, atama ga kire te kansaturyoku moaru.
kariinin to tomoni tuiraku genba ni mukai, seizonsya no kyuuen ni ata tteiru.
taketi seizi taketi seizi seizi
youhei tosite senti wo tenten tosita notini, muzin sima wo kaitori, hikousyounen wo kousei saserutameno sosiki wo tatiage ta zinbutu.
muzin sima ni hikousyounen tooru wo houri komi, sabaibaru ya sentou no gizyutu wo tataki komu kotode karera ni zisin wo atae, hanzai ni te wo some ru hituyou wonakusukotoniha seikou sitaga, higouhou ni syozisi teitatomirareru kikenbutu wo, sennyuu syuzai wositeita masukomi ga katte niizitte bakuhatu sasetesimai, sonokotode sisya ga deta koto niyori syakai kara hihan sareru. sono noti kouryuu sare, situi no naka de gokutyuu zisatu suru.
seina iwaku, kariinin to huniki ga nite iru.
suupaarobotto taisen deha toreezukusyurinaada no sinpousya, dai tugi suupaarobotto taisen toki goku hen nioiteha kuro no kisidan no itiin tosareteiru.
kugayamatakuma kugayamatakuma
koe tiba sinpo sinpo
kouseiin. honmyou tatekawatakuma. ramudadoraiba no kyousei wo uke ta behemosu no opereetaa. sonotame kusuri wo noma naito reisei sawo tamote nakunaru. mata, mi no ane wo satugai siteori, ramudadoraiba no zikken moaimatte seisin ni hentyou wokitasi, seina wo ane to omoikon deiru. kousoku sareteita saini koudou wo tomoni siteita tessa ni koui wo dai teitaga, sono omoi ga todoku kotoha naka tta.
husyou sita mi de behemosu wo kidousa se, mao no wo gekiha surumonono, sousuke no aabaresuto niyotte gekiha sare, sibou suru.
seina seina
koe asano mayumi mayumi
kouseiin. zissituteki na riidaa yaku wo tutome teita. nihonseihu ni kousoku sareta takuma wo dakkan surutameni sabeezi ni touzyou site boueityou no sisetu wo kyousyuu si, sono saini kariinin wo kousoku sita.
behemosu wo kidousa serutameni hituyou na zinzai dearu takuma wo seigyo siyasuiyouni, zibun wo ane dato omoikoma seteiru. zissai ha tengaikodoku no mi deari, kanozyo ha takuma wo riyou siteiru koto ni zyakkan no zaiakukan wo dai teita.
kyoten nisiteita zyoozikurinton gou ga sizumu saini, kariinin to tomoni dassyutu suruga, sono tyokuzen ni otu ta kega ga genin de sibou suru.
suupaarobotto taisen deha sin kidou senki gandamu no tyou go toni tasuke rare, igo ha kare to tomoni koudou suruga, notini oobu rengou syutyou kuni nite minkanzin no yuudou wositeita saini rengougun no kougeki wo uke, go toni kotoba wo nokosi takuma nokotowo omoiuka benagara sibou sita.
ooi, ueda, yasiro, hatano hatano
kouseiin. konouti mei ga takuma wo dakkan surutameni sousuke no mansyon wo syuugeki site kaeriuti niatte sibou si, mei ha husimi dai koukou nioite hassei sita zyuugeki sen de sousuke ni syasatu sareteiru darega husimi dai koukou de sibou sitanokamadeha kuwasiku kaka reteinai.
ahuganisutan herumazisutan kankeisya
maziido maziido
imyou badahusyan no tora . ahuganisutan anime han deha herumazisutan toiu kakuu no kuni gerira no sikikan. sangakutitai deno tatakai nikaketeha narabu monono nai senzyutuka dearuto douzini sizin demoari, kentikugaku mono demoaru.
so turano ansatu mono tosite okuri koma reta sousuke wo tora etaga, zihi hukai kareha kasimu toiu mei wo atae te zibun no ko tosite mukae ta.
zaiido zaiido
koe koyasu takehito takehito
han dai saku no orizinaruepisoodo kokyou ni mau kaze ni touzyou suru kyarakutaa.
sousuke ga kasimu to yoba reteita goroni deatu ta mittu tosiue no seinen.
sousuke ni samazamana tatakai no iroha wo osie taga, gerira no kyanpu niirutokorowo gaurun hikii ru butai niyotte kyousyuu sare, seisi humei tonaru. sentou no zyoukyou kara, seizon ha zetubouteki to kangae rareteita.
sikasi syadou ni touzyou si, gaurun no buka tosite touzyou suru. sousuke tono tatakai deha zyoban ha gatoringukyanon wo tukai yuuri dattaga, tan bunsi kattaa niyotte kokupitto wo turanuka reru. sono noti saigo no tikara wo huri sibori gaurun wo taosi ta tyokugo no sousuke no usiro wotori, gatoringukyanon no yobi dansou wo tukau ga hiniku nimosono syunkan ni tikaratuki, iki tae ta.
hamidoraa hamidoraa
gerira no nin. hunsou izen niha kabuuru de denkiya wo itonan deori, naisen de mise wo utu ta koto kara gerira ni kuwawa tta.
rokaku sitawo kaizou site, mada kodomo datta kasimu sousuke nimo souzyuu dekiruyounisitanoha kare.
yakobu yakobu
ahuganisutan anime han deha herumazisutan toiu kakuu no kuni gerira no rou sensi.
zyoukan no maziido yori kasimu sousuke wo azuka ri, tatakai no zyutu ya zihi no kokoro wo sazuke ta.
tougizyou areenu kankeisya
tyouhen moe ru wanmanfoosu ni touzyou suru kyarakutaa.
nami nami
koe kayahara misato misato
tounanazia no tosi namusaku niaru tougizyou areenu de, zyakusyou tiimu kurosubou no oonaa ken seibisi wo tutome ru syouzyo. kanozyo ga syoyuu suru ha kokyou no mura ni uti sute rareteitamonodeari, sono de tougizyou de kin wo kasegi, kouhai sita mura wo hukkou saseru koto, toriwake, gakkou no saiken wo yumemi teita.
titioya ha nippon no syousya man. hahaoya ha naisen no eikyou de sibou siteiru. mata, katorikku sinzya dearu.
opereetaa tosite tiimu no itiin ninatta sousuke ni koui wo yose ruyouninattaga, kurama niyotte hitoziti nisare uti korosa retesimau. sono nakigara ha remon niyotte kokyou no mura ni houmura reta.
ni kansi te izyou tomo ie ru tisiki wo yuusi teori, mita dakedeno naibukouzou wo rikai sitari, senmon no gizyutusya demo syuusei ni suuzitu hakakaru seigyo sohuto wo hanniti de syuusei siteori, sousuke ha kanozyo ga uisupaado dehanaikato utagatu teita zissaini sigo, kanameno yume ni dete kita.
geemu sakuhin suupaarobotto taisen siriizu ya, tatakau huudeaazuuinzu deha uisupaado dearuto settei sareteiru.
namusaku keisatusyotyou keisatusyotyou
koe genda tessyou tessyou
areenu no unei wo zesei surutame, sousuke ni yaotyou wo moti kakeru.
amarugamu no kankeisya demoaruga, sono tatiba ha hikui.
sousuke to dao ga kousen siteiru kiwa, hukitoba sareta dao no no migiude no sitaziki tonatte sibou suru.
dao dao
koe sakurai tooru tooru
kyougou tiimu ooga de souzyuusi wo tutome ru otoko. touzyou ki ha .
syouri notameni hiretu na te wo tukau kotomo itowa zu, taisenaite wo siai toha mukankei no tokoro de wana nihame, satugai suru koto mo tata aru. moe ru wanmanfoosu no rasuto de sousuke no noru sabeezi ni gekitui sare sibou.
rairii rairii
koe saitou zirou zirou
kurosubou de seibisi wo tutome ru. seibisi no nin no naka deha mottomo beteran de ri daa kaku.
assyu assyu
koe endou taiti taiti
kurosubou de seibisi wo tutome ru seinen. higasi doitu syussin de, touzai doitu touitu no tyokuzen, wazuka niti hodo warusyawa zyouyaku kikou gun no wo seibi sita keiken gaarutoiu hure komi dakede namusaku ni nagare tuki, kurosubou de hatarai teiru.
sousuke ya remon tomo siai wo kasaneru utini naka wo hukame teittaga, karera no mokuteki wo sitte karaha ketubetu siteiru.
geeo geeo
koe yonaga tubasa tubasa
kurosubou de seibisi wo tutome ru seinen.
rikku rikku
amerika kaiheitai syussin de, youhei zidai no sousuke no senyuu. kurosubou de sousuke ga kuru mae nino souzyuu wo itte ita. areenu deha miturin no arawasi toiu hutatu mei wo nanotu teita.
sibasiba sousuke karaha senaka ni kiwo tukeruyou tyuui sareteitaga, sono sitekidoori, dao ni senaka wo naihu de sasa rete korosa retesimau.
sonotame, serihu ya gutaiteki na zinbutu byousya ha kaimu dearuga, nami niyoruto, kanari zisinkazyou na seikaku de, onnazuki na ningen deatta.
masukotto
bon hutoku n bon takun takun
sono hoka han gensaku han ni touzyou
kudanmira kyuu dan hituzi ryou
koe kikuti siho siho
tatakau booimiitugaaru no boutou anime han dai saku dai hanasi de sousuke ni hogo sareta uisupaado no syouzyo. rati sareru mae ha tenisu bu ni syozoku siteita.
kokuseki ha aka sareteinaiga nihongo wo rikai dekiru nippon ni kaesu to iwa reteirunado, nihonzin dearu kanousei ga takai.
tousyo hano sisetu de zintaizikken taisyou tonatteori, kusurizuke kede haizin ka ga kigu sareruhodono hidoi zyoutai dattaga, misuriru ni hogo saretanotini rihabiri wo itta kekka, tudou meikumaidei no zitende ha tuuzyou no komyunikeesyon ga tore ru reberu nimade kaihuku. uisupaado tositeno nouryoku mo kaika saseteiru. beriaru ni yabure kinou wo teisi sita aru wo saikidou saserunado, reebatein no kansei ni tadai na kouken wositarasiiga, honnin ha tetudatu tadaketo hikaeme deatta. sono noti, kanamega nokosita deeta kara yousei no hane wo kanseisa seteiru.
izen sousuke ni tasuke raretakotowo oboe teori, reebatein no kaihatu niha sousuke heno ongaesi no imi moatta.
hizyouni yuusyuu na uisupaado dearuga, renaado noyouni ippanzin wo mikudasi tarisezu, tessa to onazi ku taitou ni sessi teiru.
zibun wo kyuusyutu sita sousuke niha tokubetu na omoi wo dai teiru husi gaari, intaanetto uede mitu keta zin dai koukou no kurasumeeto tooru no eizou wo, zihitu no tegami to tomoni memoriikaado ni ire te tewatasi ta. amarugamu tono kessen noti ha heion na hibi wo sugo siteiruga, tessa ya aru tono sinkou ha tuzui teori, amarugamu no sisetu kara sessyuu sita arasutoru no paatu wo kumi age, no bodi wo utu ta aru no arata na karada tosite purezento siteiru.
wakana youko wakana youko youko
koe hiramatu akiko akiko
izumikawa syo koutuu ka no kurutu ta huzinkeikan. zisyou kyouakuhanzai ka tokumei busou keizi.
keizi sibou daga, hudan kara kire kakatta seikaku to, koumuin tosite mondai noaru koudou ga wazawai site, nakanaka tenzoku dekinai. sonotame hima wo mitu keteha dokuzi de mikaiketu ziken wo tyousa si, kaiketu sasete pointo wo kasego uto yakki ninatteiru. keizi wo sibou surukikkakeninattanoha amerika no dorama maiamibaisu . dousaku ni touzyou sita feraaritesutarossa wo kounyuu surutameni kin wo tame teita ziki gaattaga, sasugani dannen siteiru.
tousou suru koutuuihan mono ni taisi teha, arayuru unten tekunikku wo kusi si, zigoku no hate made minipato de tuisou suru. syageki, kinsetu kakutou nimo nagake teori, bon ta kun wo soubi sita sousuke tono sentou deha, sousuke wo oitume ruhodono sentounouryoku womiseta.
sisutemu kanrisya wo marume komi, syonai nowo tukatte kinmuzikannai ni onraingeemu doragononrain woyarikomunado, syakaizin tositeno sisitu mo utagawasii.
nao, ziman ninaranai sankanou noatogakiniyoreba, kanozyo niha genzitu no moderu ga sonzai suru.
poni otoko ponio ponio
koe narita turugi turugi
ponii no hukumen wosite, zyoseito wo osou sinsyutukibotu no tikan. hukumen wototta kao mo umagao deatta. anime han no kurezitto deha ponii to kaka reteita. ponii no hukumen wositeiru tokini ha, serihu nohotondogaponiponitoitta nazo no kotoba wo hanasi teitaga, bon hutoku n sousuke tohaponiponihumofhunomide kaiwa wo seiritu saseteita.
kaname iwaku kiwame te tokusyu na hentai deari, tyouhatu no zyosei no kami wo burasi wokake, harigane de poniiteeru nisita ue, syunkansettyakuzai de katame tesimai poniiteeru wo kyouyou suru. kare iwaku, syooto nounazino syoku pposa, rongu no onnanoko rasisatoiu, ikken muzyun suru hutatu no youso wo kane sonae ta kanpeki na heasutairu ga poniiteeru nanodearu.
moderu ha sakusya ga higasi syou ni no yuuzin de gyoukai iti no poniiteerufeti no yobigoe mo takai mangaka no inoue yosihisa.
beaaru beaaru
koe humei humei
berugii de buririantoseehutekku sya wo itonamu bukisyounin. ryousangata bon hutoku nno kyoudoukaihatu mono. sousuke iwaku kane nihaurusaku, manuke natokoromo ooi ga, dougi ha mamoru otoko .
sousuke ha kare wo tousi te buki danyaku rui wo kounyuu siteiruga, gensaku han deha purutoniumu no kounyuu wo moti kakeraretakotomoaru.
mata, kenzyuu no buhin to matigae te kagaku seni wo bunkai suru seibutu heiki hurumonteibakuteria wo hassou sitesimai, sorega genin de zin dai koukou ga baiohazaado ni mimai waretakotogaaru.
uekusa uekusa
koe kawatu yasuhiko yasuhiko
hurumetarupanikku no animeorizinaruepisoodo dearu suimenka no zyoukei ni touzyou suru kyarakutaa.
seito hukukaityou erani yabure ta hara isekara, kanameno tousatu syasin wo intaanetto ueni appu siteitaga, kazama kara zyouhou wo sira sareta sousuke ga uekusa wo tokutei si, pasokon wo kowasi teyamesaseta.
kamoi kamoi
koe humei humei
tyouhen owa ru deibaidei ni touzyou suru kyarakutaa.
enzyo kousai wo moti kaketekanamewo rabuhoteru ni ture kon da tyuunenotoko. gyakuni kanameni riyou sareru.
sibata sibata sibata
koe nisiwaki ho ho
miki hara kumi wakagasira. tyuugi kokoro ni atuku ippon kina seikaku daga, sakeguse ga waruku kenka tu hayai. tosi ninaru kodomo gairu.
barubeera barubeera
koe mikeerukamandoona mikeerukamandoona
sitiriamafia barubeerahu a mirii no oyabun. misuriru wo uragitu ta buruuno wo teitaku ni kakutu teita.
gensaku han deha kurutu no motikon da feraari no bakuhatu ni makikoma rete sibou sita.
daikusutora gityou gityou
koe utida naoya naoya
kodawarinoaru kakumei ie no tudoi no zanteiteki eikyuu sidousya. kyuuba no kasutoro gityou ha hatoko no tomodati .
beriizu no daitouryou reizyou wo rati site minosirokin wo youkyuu si, kyuusyutu ni muka tta beriizu no kunren kyanpu nama wo kaeriuti nisuruga, kunren kyanpu zidai no sousuke raniyotte seiatu sareru.
daitouryou reizyou reizyou
koe tamura yukari yukari
beriizu daitouryou no musume. mei ha maria. kodawarinoaru kakumei ie no tudoi ni yuukai sare minosirokin wo youkyuu sareta.
kyouhaku bideo gensaku deha toransufoomaa no bideo ni uwakaki siteitaniha kanozyo no baniigaaru sugata ga utusa reteita.
tanpen kurayami no peisiento ni touzyou suru kyarakutaa kyarakutaa
gen san san
koe uemura kihatirou kihatirou
hai byouin de hahaoya zisatu sita intyou no tuma to kurasi teiru.
gen sanno haha haha
koe ootori yosino yosino
hai byouin ni araware ru rouba no yuurei gen sanniyoruto nenmae no kasai de naku natta nin rasii.
syoutai ha gen sanno haha deari, hai byouin de musuko totomoni kurasi teiru. deiri suru kodomotati niha naisyo nisiteita. tanpen koutetu no samaairyuuzyon ni touzyou suru kyarakutaa kyarakutaa
hyuuga masa tami hyuuga masatami masatami
koe noda zyunko zyunko
toaru kaigan niaru goutei no syuzin. byouzyaku na ooganemoti tino kodomo.
uragira rerukotoga kirai daga, koreha ippouteki na omoi wo yose teita zyuusi ga kakeoti site kano zenka ra sugata wo kesi takotoni yurai suru.
kanameni itimoku boresite teitaku ni ture kon daga, kanozyo ga rati saretato omoikon da sousuke ni humikoma reru. sono kiwa ha batahurainaihu wo teni sousuke ni tati mukai, issyuu sarerumonono, sono dokyou ha mitome rareta. nande mo higekiteki ni kangae tesimaigatina seikaku dearu.
wasio wasio wasio
koe sawa rituo rituo
hyuuga masa tami tei no untensyu ken bodigaado. moto huransu gaizinbutai syozoku. kakutouzyutu tyuugokuken hou no meisyu.
hyuuga tei ni sinnyuu sita sousuke wo mukae uti, torikkii na dousa de kare wo honrou surumonono, sousuke ga gosya sita zitudan no gureneedo niyoru bakuhatu de rakka sita kenzai ga tyokugeki site kontou suru wasio ha keisan site zitudan wo utu tato omotte ita. nao, wasio same sima hyou dou no mei ha taiyou sentai sanbarukan heno omaazyu dearu.
same sima samezima samezima
koe kiyokawa genmu genmu
hyuuga masa tami tei no kokku ken bodigaado. moto huransu gaizinbutai syozoku. naihu no meisyu. nagai riiti wo ika sita muti noyouna zangeki de kiri saki samii no imyou wo motu.
hyuuga tei ni sinnyuu sita sousuke wo mukae utu ga, katuteno senreki wo katatu teiruutini gureneedo no kunren dan wo ganmen ni uke te kontou suru.
hyou dou hyoudou hyoudou
koe houki katu hisasi hisasi
hyuuga masa tami tei no niwasi ken bodigaado. moto huransu gaizinbutai syozoku. hanare ta emono no medama sura hazusu kotoha nai to iwa reta bougan no meisyu.
hyuuga tei nite sousuke wo saisyo ni mukae utu taga, marude te mo asi mo dezu ni itigeki de taosa reru.
sono hoka gensaku han nomi touzyou
tanpen touahaadedanan gou no tanzyou ni touzyou suru kyarakutaa kyarakutaa
mariatesutarossa mariatesutarossa
renaadotessa kyoudai no haha. zitaku de goutou ni osowa re, otto no kaaru to tomoni satugai sareru. omotemuki ha teisyuku na tuma wo yosootu teitaga, otto kaaru ga sigoto deinai mani, sabisisa karaka betuno dansei to kankei wo motu teitato mira reru byousya gaaru.
izyouna madeni kasikoku, sarani hurin nokotowo siru renaado ni taisi te osore wo dai teite, goutou ni syuugeki sareta saini nanimo sira nuto omotte ita tessa nomiwo tasuke, renaado wo goutou ni sasi dasi takotokara kano kokoro wo yami ni oto su itiin ninatta. tanpen kyokuhoku karano koe ni touzyou suru kyarakutaa kyarakutaa
iriinakariinina iriinakariinina
kariinin no tuma de tyomei na baiorin sousya.
tadasi sakutyuu nioitesono sonzai ga katara rerunomideari, serihu ha nai.
kokoa to miso peesuto iri no tokusei borusiti no kouansya. koreha omotezata niha dekina i ninmu ni tui teirunoto zibun no kouen ni zyouzi te ninmu notameni nisigawasyokoku he iku otto ni taisuru hinan tositeno iyagarase to omowa reruga tessa niyoru suisoku , musiro kou wo sousi teita.
iryou ziko niyotteo hara no kodomo to tomoni naku nattesimau. konokotoga kariinin ni sokoku wo sute, gerira ni miwo touzi saseru tyokusetu no genin tonatta.
sousuke ha kanozyo toha tyokusetu no mensiki hanaiga, kariinin karano syasin de kao ha sitte ori, kenkyuubu no nooraremingu to iriina no omokage ga nite iruto mitate teiru.
sousuke no haha haha
honpen no nenmae ni oki ta hokkyoku umi deno koukuu ziko ni makikoma reru. karouzite kariinin tooru ga kyuusyutu ni kita zitende ha seizon siteitaga, kyuusyutu nakani tuiraku ki ga suibotu si hazime tatame dassyutu dekizu, saigo no syunkan, sousuke nitatakatteto kotoba wo nokosi sonomama umi ni oti teitta. sono tyokuzen ni sousuke to wakare ru tokini hassi taikinasaino kotoba ha iki nasaitomo iki nasaitomo yome ru, hukai serihu dearutosono ba ni iawa seta kariinin ha kanzi teita. tanpen kagemusya no syoubizu ni touzyou suru kyarakutaa kyarakutaa
kira kousuke kira kousuke kousuke
haiyuu. sousuke nisokkurina zinbutu. tadasi seikaku ha seihantai de akarui kyarakutaa onkou na katarikuti syaapu na youbou .
hutuu no seikatu ni akogare, guuzen deku wasita sousuke to itiziteki ni irekawa ru. sosite zin dai koukou ni tuugaku suruga, soremadeni sousuke ga itte kita syogyou no tuke wo issin ni ukeru kotoninari, saisyuuteki niha tidori nokotowokanameto yon desimattatame syoutai ga bare ru.
kono kan, kousuke tosite geinoukatudou wo itte ita sousuke ha, kare toha seihantai na kazukazu no gendou wo itte iru.
imura kotomi imura kotomi kotomi
kira kousuke no maneezyaa. tanpen ontei ha kanasi ku, syatei ha tooku ni touzyou suru kyarakutaa kyarakutaa
siiba natuko siihara natuko natuko
kurutuueebaa ga tyuugakuzidai ni tootte ita kasai daiyon tyuugakkou de ongakukyousi wositeita.
zyazupianisuto wo kokorozasi teitagasono yume ni yabure, hosutesu ni miwo yatusiteiru.
kurutu nitotte natuko ha, kuriin na zyuu ni hureru mae no zidai no syoutyou toieru zyosei datta.
suunen burini natuko to saikai sita kurutu ha, sibarakuno kan, ikikata wo mosaku surukotoninaru.
kouda sirou kouda sirou sirou
siiba natuko no motoo. yakuza mei to keizi mei wo zyuugeki sita ageku, mototuma to ippansimin wo hitoziti ni rouzyou sitaga, kurutu no sogeki niyotte zyuusyou wo ou. tanpen tairitu no fesuteibaru ni touzyou suru kyarakutaa kyarakutaa
kosutero kosutero
raten kei no youhei de, sousuke no syoutai wo uke te, mou nin no nakama meisyouhumei to zin dai koukou no bunkasai wo otozure teiru.
norisu iwaku, katute koronbia de kare ga tatakatu ta teki ni nite irutonokotodattaga, kekkyoku ha betuzin datta.
zyaiido, hu a himu, gururoosu gururoosu
pakisutan nin no youhei de, sousuke no syoutai wo uke te zin dai koukou no bunkasai wo otozure teiru.
karera haizuremo sousuke nokotowo kasimu to yon deori, mata badahusyan no tora koto, maziido nokotomo sitte iru.
norisu norisu
amerika nin no youhei de, sousuke no syoutai wo uke te zin dai koukou no bunkasai wo otozure teiru.
sousuke ni tasuke raretakotogaarurasiku, kare wo inoti no onzin to katatu teiru. tanpen miira torino dorankaa ni touzyou suru kyarakutaa kyarakutaa
natariyachedaakowa natariyachedaakowa
rinsui tonsin no sumu gaizin muke apaato no zyuunin. rosia nin. siberia no naisen kara nige rutame rainiti site sutorippaa woyatteiru. syugou.
bizuoniiru bizuoniiru
rinsui tonsin no sumu gaikokuzin muke apaato no zyuunin. kokuseki humei no kokuzin bokusi. miseinen ni kinsyu wo siiru kotoha satan no tesaki tonatta iseisya no siwaza to dangen suru. syugou. hourai gakuen siriizu nimo doumei no kyarakutaa ga touzyou suru. tanpen batu atari na riisaruuepon ni touzyou sita kyarakutaa kyarakutaa
hinokigawa yosikatu hikawa yosikatu yosikatu
kou haba zinzya kannusi. wakai goro ha huryou deattaga, kekkon to musuko ga umare tanowo kini kaisin site sinsyoku wo tugu.
sono gorono syasin wo osame ta arubamu ha zinzya no honden ni ugan takara tosite genzyuu ni hokan sareteori, honden no keikai sisutemu ni kin wo kake sugitatame, honrai no ugan takara muromatizidai kara tutawa ru tuzumi wo baikyaku suru hame ninatteiru.
hinokigawa katuhiko hikawa katuhiko katuhiko
hinokigawa yosikatu no musuko. titioya tono ori ai ha waruku, kokugakuindai manano sintou gakka wo tyuutai si, tamani kaneme no mono wo nusumu kotomoaru.
sousuke wo ii kurumete ugan takara wo nusumi daso utosurugasoreha sippai ni owa ru. tadasi, titioya no mi no sugata wo meno atari nisite wakai sita. tanpen migatte na buruusu ni touzyou sita kyarakutaa kyarakutaa
mitinoku mutumi mutu mutumi mutumi
suiren zyosidaigaku no nensei. sousuke iwaku, huransu toukyoku ga simeitehai nakano onna terorisuto ni nite irutonokoto. sono terorisuto ha keikan mei wo syasatu si, gun no sisetu wo hakai sita notini higasi azia ni senpuku atato sareru.
kaizu kaiko ko kaizu kaiko kaiko
suiren zyosidaigaku no nensei. sinzi to yoi huniki ninarikakeruga, kekkyoku ha umaku ikazuzimaitonatta.
sinzi ha kanozyotati no namae wo zieitai mitaito katatu teiru.
kuuzyou kumi kuuzyou kumi kumi
suiren zyosidaigaku no nensei. sakini karesi to wakare teori, sono kokoro no kizu wo ume youtositaigatameni koutarou to yoi naka ninarikakeru. sikasisono sunzen ni ken no motokare gayoriwo modosi ni kita tame, sokuza ni miwo hirugaesi ta. ferunandesu ferunandesu
beriizu rikugun syozoku. kaikyuu ha taisa. kodawarinoaru kakumei ie no tudoi niyoru yuukaiziken no kyuusyutusakusen wo misuriru kunren kyanpu ni irai sita zinbutu.
gotou syouzi gotou syouzi syouzi
tanpen otonano suniikingumissyon ni touzyou suru kyarakutaa.
imeezisaron no maneezyaa.
sia sia
tanpen yakusoku no baatyaru ni touzyou suru kyarakutaa.
doragononrain toiu onraingeemu no pureiyaakyarakutaa. syokugyou ha sinkan. zama kazama sinzi no geemu nai gaaruhurendo.
zama to tomoni paatei wo kun deitaga, daimaou yooko wakana youko ni torae raretesimattatame, sia wo sukuu tameni, kazama sinzi ha siriai ni geemu sanka wo yobi kakeru.
gendou nadoga tessa ni nite iruga, pureiyaa ga dareka ha saigo made humei.
siro siro
hidarime notubureta siroi bengarutora byakko . sousuke ga myanmaa de youhei dattakoroni deai, sousuke nitotteha ningenigai no senyuu tomo ie ru sonzai dearu.
taisyoku ino komuraado deha, senyuu no mituyu gyousya karano zyouhou de, toukyou no mituyu gyousya no motoni hakobi koma re, yakusatu sare hakusei nisareru tokoro wo, hutyuusi nai no souko kara sousuke niyori kyuusyutu sareru. sono noti, sousuke no heya ya, zin dai koukou no okuzyou wo sumai tositeitaga, iroiroto mondai gaattatameni merida sima no ensyuuzyou ni okura re, genzai hasokode kurasi teiru. nao, tessa niha neko itizu to syorui de sirase teatta. tuzuku onmaioun deha, teki kara nogare ru mao no mae ni araware teiru.
zutto, sutandobaimii sita nimo, siro tomirareru siroi tora ga touzyou. merida sima dassyutu noti, hawai no doubutuen ni hikitora reta.
hu mozawa humozawa humozawa
tanpen tuburana terumopyurai ni touzyou suru kyarakutaa.
bon hutoku n senmon no douzin ibento humohumo maaketto ryakusyou humo ketto no syusaisya. kyouka kata bon hutoku nno kaihatusya dearu sousuke ni kanmei wo moti, tokubetu gesuto tosite syoutai sita. hu mozawa toiu namae ha ibento tokini nanoru penneemu noyounamonode, honmyou ha husyou. sirozi ni gin nomadara moyou, manto to bousi wo mini tuketa kihin aru bon hutoku nno tyaku gurumiwo tyakuyou siteiru.
ibento kaizyou wo syuugeki sita pankubando ahasyuerosu no kagekiha hu a n bannin wo, bon hutoku n karada sousuke no kyouka kata bon hutoku n hukumu no sentou ni tatu te geigeki sita.
roniizenmeruvu a isu isu
mazi de abunai kyuusi ni issyou ni syuuroku sareta kakiorosi tanpen tessa no hakamairi ni touzyou suru kyarakutaa.
minamitaiheiyou niaru syoukoku, sanhoruhe kyouwakoku no rantanhusi sima ni, ryousin to wakare te hitori de sumu syounen titi ha sibou, haha ha zonmei daga doukyo ni nazime zu, hitori de sima ni modotu tekita. bunmei gasahodo hattatu siteinai sima de, intaanetto wo riyou site seikatu ya benkyou no hibi wo okuru zunou meiseki na syounen de, sontyou kara tanoma rete kodomo no rika no kyousi wo tutome takotogaaruhodo. hanmen, dokotonaku yononaka wo takkan site mite iruyouna husi gaaru.
bani no hakamairi niyattekita tessa to aru no hutari to siriai, mura wo annai sitemawatta.
seityougo ha amerika kaigun ni nyuutai. hurumetarupanikku anazaa kan ni touzyou si, no taiin tosite tatuya wo tasuke ta.
kyakutyuu gin no supuun ginno supuun ha, ozawa sinri niyoru nippon no manga sakuhin. koudansya nen dai gou kara nen gatugou made rensai sareta. kazoku no syokutaku wo teema ni, ryouri tukuri ni mezame ta dansikoukou nama tosono kazoku, yuuzin tatino nitizyou to seityou wo egai teiru. tankoubon ha koudansya komikkusukisu kara zen kan ga hakkousa reteori, matubi niha, kakuwa ni touzyou suru ryouri wo sakusya ga zissaini tukutu te syoukai suru tyouri no kotu ya resipi nadoga syoukai sareteiru.
nen gatu niti kara gatu niti made toukai terebi seisaku huziterebi kei hiru no obi dorama nite asita mokitto, oisiigo mesi gin no supuun no taitoru de takasugi makoto tyuu syuen de terebidorama kasa reta.
arasuzi
ikemen koukousei no hayakawa ritu ha, nyuuin sita haha ni kawa tte teimai tatino syokuzi wo youisi takotogakikkakede, sidai ni ryouri ni mezame te iku. ritu wo hisoka ni sitau doukyuusei no yuuko ha, ryouri no adobaisu wo tuuzi te kare to sitasiku naruga, sore izyou no kankei ninarukotogadekinaideita. sonna naka, ritu ha zibun ga yousi dato siri syokku wo ukeru ga, yuuzin no hagemasi ya kazoku tono omoide ni kokoro ga iyasa reru.
omona touzyouzinbutu
hayakawa ritu hayakawa ritu ritu
honsaku no syuzinkou. karei dai koukou ni kayou dansikoukou nama. nen kumi dorama han deha daigaku nensei . yousitanrei katu syuusai de, zyosiseito kara kami purinsu to syousa reru. teimai tatini yasasi ku, ani tosite sitawa reteiru. haha no byouki nadowo riyuu ni itido ha singaku woakirametaga honi site toukyoutonai no daigaku ni singaku, hyonnakikkakede sinema kenkyuukai ni iru.
kurasina yuuko kurasina yuuko yuuko
ritu wo hisoka ni sitau, zimi deotonasii doukyuusei. manga kenkyuukai ni syozoku. ryouri no adobaisu wo tuuzi te kare to sitasiku naruga, sore izyou ni sitasiku narenaikotode nayamu. koukousotugyougo senmongakkou de manga wo manabu.
hayakawa tyou hayakawa sirabe sirabe
ritu no otouto. tyuugaku nensei dorama han deha tyuugaku nensei de basukettobooru bu ni syozoku. imouto ya kazoku niha namaiki na taido de sessu ruga, kazoku omoi.
hayakawa sou hayakawa kanade kanade
ritu no imouto. syougakkou nensei dorama han deha tyuugaku nensei de aidoru sibou. dansusukuuru ni kayou. tyou toha kuti genkaga tae naiga, ritu nokotoha sonkei siteiru.
hayakawa kyouko hayakawa kyouko kyouko
ritu tatino haha. kekkongo, kodomo ni meguma rezu sisetu kara ritu wo hikitori yousi nisuru. sono noti, tyou to sou wo un da. sarani, ritu no zitubo dearu sinya kara ruka wo hikitotu ta.
suzui keisuke suzui keisuke keisuke
ritu tatino ozi de kyouko no otouto. kan no titi.
suzui kan suzui tamaki tamaki
ritu tatino zyuusi. bareriina womezasite koukou nensei kara kaigai ni ryuugaku siteitaga, kosi wo itame, kikoku sita.
ookouti akinori ookouti akinori akinori
ritu no yuuzin de doukyuusei. ada mei ha doruzi.
wakatuki yuu wakatuki suguru suguru
ritu no yuuzin de doukyuusei. daigakuzyuken ni sippai rounin, itinengo ni goukaku sita.
saiki satoru saiki satosi satosi
ritu no doukyuusei. daigakunyuugaku noti saikai si, sinema kenkyuukai wokikkakeni sitasiku naru. ada mei ha saikikkusu.
amemiya sinya amamiya maya maya
ritu no zitubo. tosi no tokini tyuugaku no senpai tono mani dekita ritu wo syussan. sono noti, ruka wo un daga kodomo wo sodate rarenaito satori ritu to kyouko ni takusi ta.
amemiya ruka amamiya ruka ruka
ritu no zittei de, sinya ga ritu no tugini un da otokonoko. haha ni negurekuto kimi ni atukawa reteitakotode hayakawa ie ni hikitora rerukotoninaru.
