nen gatu niti hakkou douzitu hatubai ,
nen gatu niti hakkou douzitu hatubai ,
nen gatu niti hakkou douzitu hatubai ,
nen gatu niti hakkou douzitu hatubai ,
nen gatu niti hakkou douzitu hatubai ,
nen gatu niti hakkou douzitu hatubai ,
nen gatu niti hakkou douzitu hatubai ,
terebidorama
asita mokitto, oisiigo mesi gin no supuun asitamokitto, oisiigohan ginno supuun no taitoru niyori, nen gatu niti kara gatu niti made toukai terebi seisaku huziterebi kei hiru no obi dorama getuyou kinyou waku nite terebidorama ka. takasugi makoto tyuu ha toukai terebi hiru dora deha danyuu tosite tandoku sainensyou syuen tonaru.
kyasuto
hayakawa ie
keikyuu dentetu kanazawa bunko ekisyuuhen no ikkenya ni zaizyuu dai hanasi dai hanasi .
hayakawa ritu ritu
en takasugi makoto tyuu tyuu
nen gatu nissei mare dai hanasi . hayakawa ie no tyounan de, gensaku to onazi ikemen de seikaku ha dare nidemo yasasi ku komatu teiru nin gairutohottokenai taipu. osanaikoro ha ninzin ga kirai dattaga haha kyouko ga arenzi sita ryouri de tabe rareruyouninatta. haha ga gan ninari nyuuin sitatoki, teimai ni ryouri wo tukutu te age takotogakikkakede, ryouri ni mezame suki ninatta. sono noti, zituha kyouko ga zitubo dehanaikotowo situ ta tyokugo ni zitubo ni ai ni iki, otouto gairu koto to zibun no oitati wo sitte syokku wo ukeru ga tatinaotu ta.
hayakawa kyouko kyouko
en tomita yasuko yasuko
otto taiyou to deai, kekkon sitanoha tosi no toki dai hanasi . dai hanasi de gan ga hakkaku sita. sono noti, gan hanakunari, taiin suruga ka getugo ni saihatu si, syuzyutu wo ketudan suru saisyuuwa .
dai hanasi de haha kinue to saikai sita kiwa ha, hukuzatu na omoi wo daki nagaramo, kanozyo no buzi wo yorokonde ita. dai hanasi de, ritu keiyu de misaki kara takusa reta haha no tegami wo yonde zibuntati wo sute tekarano sinzyou wo siri, kako wo mizu ni nagasi te haha to wakai suru dai hanasi . seikaku ha yasasii ga, ritu to onazi o nin kou sinatokorogaaru.
hayakawa tyou tyou
en maeda ou sirou sirou
hayakawa ie no zinan de namae no yurai ha kyouko to taiyou tomodomo uta ga suki de ongakuyougo no tyou kara totu tamono. namaiki daga, kazoku omoi na seikaku de ritu ga zikkei denaku yousi dearu koto wo sitte simatta toki hadou sessu rebaiika nayan da koto mo mo mo mo. yousyoku misakino tensyu misaki kara hanbaagu no tukurikata wo denzyu sitemorau.
hayakawa sou sou
en tatuki hituzi koromo ai ai
hayakawa ie no tyouzyo de tyou to onazi ku namae no yurai ha ongakuyougo no kanade rukara totu tamono. aidoru ni akogare teori kyouko ga nyuuin sita tokini ha sukosi demo kakei ni kyouryoku siyouto geinou zimusyo ni sukauto sareni itta koto gaaru. ritu ni burazaakonpurekkusu womotteori tezukuri bentou wo ko tukutu ta toki ha kanozyo ga dekita ndeha nai kato gekido suru koto mo mo mo mo. tyou tohakenkasitebakari.
hayakawa taiyou taiyou
en kawai tosikazu tosikazu
kyouko no otto. ritu no youhu deari, tyou sou no zippu. syokugyou ha kouzyou no syainsyokudou no kokku dai hanasi .
tuma ni make zu otora zuno murui noii nin deari, kazoku hamotironnokoto, osananazimi de isya no daisuke wo hazime, mawari no hitobito karamo sitawa reteita.
nenmae, tosi no wakasa de sikyo siteori, syasin to kaisou igai deha gekityuu ni touzyou sinai.
suzui ie
suzui kan kan
en iwata sayuri dai hanasi kara kara
suzui ie no hitorimusume. osanai toki karano yume dearu bareriina ninarutame rondon ni ryuugaku siteitaga kosi ni kega wo oi yume wo akirame yogina kusareta tokini oba kyouko no mimai wo kouzitu nisite kikoku suru dai hanasi . kyouko no nyuuintyuu kara kawari ni motegi kanzume kakou de syuu niti hatarai teitaga taiin noti ha issyoni hatarai teiru.
haha mitu ko no katte na omoikomi de kan no daizi nisiteiru omoide no tuma tta baree no tousyuuzu wo sute ta koto ga hikigane tonari haha heno human ga bakuhatu si, iede wosuru. sono saini itido ha kouzyoutyou no motegi ni zihyou wo watasi, nettokafe ni tomari nagara ritu no zitubo sinya ga hatarai teirude tankikan hosutesu no arubaito wositeita dai hanasi . daga sugu ni haha to wakai si ie ni modori, zihyou ha tekkai sitemorai titi keisuke no yuuzin de oba no syuzii hanayama ga syoukai sitekureta byouin ni kosi no tiryou de tuuin si, heikou site hataraki nagara bareriina tositeno hukki wo mezasi teiru.
ritu ha osanai toki kara otouto noyouni omotte itaga oba ni ritu ni morai tega nakereba watasi ga moratu teageruto itta koto kara koui womotteiru koto ga ukagae ru. ritu nitotteno kan ha nayan deiru tokini dare yori sakini sattisi, soudan ni notte kurete zyogen sitekureru ane noyouna sonzai.
suzui mitu ko ko
en yosimoto miyoko dai hanasi kara kara
keisuke no tuma. o syaberi de ritu ga yousi datoiukotowo hanasi tesimatta syubousya.
musume kan no bareriina ninaru koto ha hontou hamitu ko no yume de musume ni zibun no yume wo osituke te omoni dato omoi, baree ni kansu ru mono wosubete syobun sita koto de musume to gekitotu sita. daga kan ga zibun no isi de baree wositeita koto ni kizu iteyarenakatta koto wo koukai si, gomi syuuseki tokoro made sute ta sinamono wo sagasi ni iki tori modosu kotoga dekite musume toha wakai suru.
hayakawa ie ni ritu no zittei no ruka ga azuke rareta kikan no heizitu no hiruma ha suzui ie de mendou wo mite ite ruka ni taisi te meromero ninatteita.
suzui keisuke keisuke
en kobayasi hirosi dai hanasi kara kara
kyouko no otouto. ane omoi de zibuntati wo sute ta haha kinue ni taisi te, ikari ya nikusimi kosoha dai teinaiga, ane no kurou wo kenti tteitadakeni, sono ten ni kansi teha imada tuyoi ikidoori wo kanzi teiru dai hanasi . daga, haha ga ane ni ate ta tegami no soku wo watasa re, sorewo yonde kanzi tamonogaattanoka, haha no kaiki iwai deha tere kakusi niwazato akaruku karuku hurumai, kare narini haha tono saikai wo yorokonde miseta.
kan no arubaito no ikken gakikkakede yame ta atode moni heri ga deki, kyouko no syuzii de mukasi karano yuuzin hanayama to ippai nomi ni iku kotomoaru dai hanasi .
amemiya ie
keikyuu dentetu keikyuukamataeki syuuhen no mansyon sanmooru kamata gousitu ni zaizyuu dai hanasi .
amemiya sinya sinya
en kawai aoba aoba
kurabu no ko ware mama. nagoya wo tyuusin ni zenkokutenkai suru zyueriiburando no sousui amemiya miyako ha haha.
tosi no tokini ritu wo un de koukousotugyou to douzini zyoukyou sitekita. sono noti, sudeni tuma noiru ritu no zippu takasi to nenmae ni guuzen saikai site kousai toiu meimoku no hurin wo hete ruka wo un da. yousyouzi ni hahaoya ni uke ta gyakutai no keiken ga genin de, musuko no ritu ruka nimo taisi tedou sessu rebaiikawakarazu, kunou siteiru.
dai hanasi de ruka to sinzyuu siyoutosite unga ni tobikomi kakeruga, ritu no hissi no yobi kakeniyori, sunzen de omoi toma tta.
ikou, hahaoya tosite ritu to ruka wo ukeire rutame, seikatutaido wo aratame rubeku samazamana doryoku wo kasaneru hibi wo okutu teiru. sonotameno syudan no ikkan tosite, enzyo wo motome rubeku hisabisa ni haha wo tazune tatokoro, tegire kin wo watasa retadakede atu temomoraenakattakotoni, hagesiku rakutan sita dai hanasi .
amemiya ruka ruka
en yamaguti yuuki yuuki
ritu no zittei. ritu ga zitubo sinya ni ai ni kita tokini ha ikuzi houki sareteita. haha ni katu temoratta gin no supuun wo takaramono ni syokuzi wosuru toki haitumo tukatte iru. itiziki, hayakawa ie ni hikitora reteitaga dai hanasi karaha sinya tono kurasi wo saikai si, hayakawa ie niha nitiyoubi nio tomari ni iku, toiu sutansu wo toru youninatta.
yousyoku misaki
ritu no arubaito suru yousyoku mise. azi mo nedan mo kyuudai izyou daga, zyoseikyaku ga ritu meate de yasumi no niti niha kyakuasi ga gekigen sitesimau.
yousyoku ya daga hanbaagu wo toriatukatu teinai dai hanasi riyuu ha, koreha hanbaagu ga kinue no syuppon touzitu no kioku ni tyokketu suru ryouri dearutame, tensyu misaki ga kanozyo no sinzyou wo ryo tta kekka dai hanasi .
ritu ga arubaito suruyouninattanoha, mattaku no guuzen de kinue mo odoroi ta.
ogawa kinue kinue
en huzita yumiko zyakunen ki akazawa mukku
sekkyaku tantou. taido habukkiraboude kuti mo warui ga, ne ha yasasii onna zyoubu.
kyouko keisuke kyoudai no zitubo. kyouko ga tosi no toki, gaka ninaru yume wo oi kakerutame, otto to kodomo tatiwo sute te itaria he syuppon sita kako wo motu tadasi, kodomo tatini syousai wo sirase naitoiu zyoukentuki dearuga, otto ha syouti no uede nokotodeatta dai hanasi . taiyou no si wo sitte, nenmae ni kikoku ikou, kyouko nosobade mimamotu teagetai omoi kara tikaku niaru yousyoku misakide sumi komi zyuugyouin wositeiru.
sorewo siru mono ha misaki to, dai hanasi de honnin kara kokuhaku sareta sinya nomi. ritu mosoutoha sirazu ni hatarai teitaga, dai hanasi de hayakawa ie ga ikka sorotu te raiten sita kiwa, nen burini kyouko to saikai surukototonatta.
sono noti, nou kousoku wo hassyou site taore tari dai hanasi nadono uyokyokusetu mo hete, kyouko keisuke kyoudai to wakai, misaki ya kazoku rato tomoni arata na zinsei wo ayun deikukotowo ketui suru dai hanasi .
mise de tyouri kosositeinaiga ryouri ha tokui de, zyuuhatiban ha miso tomentuyuwo kakusi azi ni kuwae ta hanbaagu dai hanasi . dai hanasi deha, kono resipi niyoru oyako baagu ga, misakino arata na menyuu tosite kuwawa tta.
misaki moto moto
en maruoka syou si si
tensyu tyouri tantou. tuusyou masutaa . mukuti de zittyoku na syokunin taipu no zinbutu.
kinue toha konin kankei nihanaku, akumade tensyu to zyuugyouin no aidagara dai hanasi daga, motomoto hisoka ni kinue wo yoi teita. sou ni senaka wo osa re, dai hanasi no kinue no kaiki iwai no sekizyou de kanozyo ni puropoozu, medetaku kaidaku wo eta. tadasi, kekkyoku sono noti mo seki ha ire teorazu, houteki na kankei ha genzyou nomama dai hanasi .
byouin
hanayama daisuke daisuke
en yamada zyundai zyundai
byouin kinmui de, kyouko keisuke kyoudai no osananazimi. kyouko no syuzii demoaru.
hayakawa ie suzui ie no kodomo tatinitotteha aniki hun tekina sonzai de, tokuni tyou toha tame kuti wo tataki au hodo naka ga yoku yoki soudanaite.
isya tositeno zinmyaku mo ooku, kan no kosi no kega wo tiryou dekiru isi wo sagasi ate, kanozyo ni syoukai siteiru dai hanasi .
zituha kyouko ni omoi wo yose teirunodaga, taiyou heno enryo moatteka, kanozyo tono kyori no torikata ni hibi atama wo nayama seteiru.
zikka ha nikuya de genzai ha ani ga tui deiru dai hanasi .
mizusima tada tada
en kaetu keito keito
daigaku
wakatuki yuu yuu
en mizoguti taku ya ya
ritu no osananazimi. kano daigaku no doukyuusei demoaru.
oote kareecheen mise no onzousi deari, iwayuru, bonbon. sotugyougo ha mise wo tugu isi wo simesi teiru. yueni adana ha karee ouzi dai hanasi .
doukyuusei no saiki toha kutigenka ga tae naiga naka no yoi yuuzin de, ritu wo mazie temisakini iri bitatteha dansyou siteiru.
dai hanasi kara, itiyanagi kentiku zimusyo deno arubaito wo hazime ta ritu no suketto tosite, misakide arubaito wo hazime ta. honnin iwaku, kagyou wo tugu tameno syugyou no ikkan tonokoto. tousyo ha ima hitotuo asobi kibun ga nuke teinakattaga, kinmu wo tuzuke ru nai nisoremo kaizen sare, tousyo ha tensuu ga turaka tta kinue mo, saikin deha kare ni taisuru hyouka wo kouten saseteiru.
saiki satoru satoru
en ozeki riku riku
ritu no daigaku no doukyuusei.
adana ha gensaku to onazi ku saikikkusu . daga, dai hanasi no zitende ha, kare wokou yobu noha sou nomi. syouwa zidai no hu a ssyon huuzoku ga kiniiri de, zidaisakugo ni omoe ru hurui iimawasi wo tayou suru kawari mono.
kawari mono deattemo yuuzyou niha atuku, ritu ga nayami wo kakae teiru saini ha, kare itiryuu no serihu mawasi de, insyou ni nokoru zyogen wo okonau kotomosibasiba.
zituha kekkou na kugaku nama de, hutokoroguai haitumo sabisii rasii.
koubutu ha hanbaagu de tako san uinnaa mo suki rasii. hudan no gyouzyou to awase te, sou niha hanbaagu suki no ayasii nin tosite ninsiki sareteiru dai hanasi . dai hanasi demisakino menyuu ni oyako baagu ga nose rareta kiwa, mottomo yorokonda nohayahari kare deatta.
wakatuki toha, arayuru imi demo taisyouteki nagara, tagaini ii tai houdai wo ii ae ru yoki yuuzin.
sono hoka
motegi kazuhiko kazuhiko
en kimoto takehiro
kyouko kan no kinmusaki motegi kanzume kakou no kouzyoutyou. tosi dokusin.
kan ni kiga ari, ano te kono tede apurooti wokaketeiruga, kanozyo no hou nisono kiha mattaku naitame, itumo karamawari bakarisiteiru.
itiyanagi takasi takasi
en wada soukou soukou
ritu ruka no zippu de, ikkyuu kentikusi. zitaku ni itiyanagi kentiku sekkeizimusyo wo kamae teiru.
ritu toha tyokusetu no mensiki hanaiga, ruka toha kako ni doukyo siteori, kare niha papa tosite ninsiki sareteiru.
sinya to tuma siho tono kan de yure ugoku yuuzyuuhudan sahaarumonono, kihonteki niha yasasi ku seizitu na zinbutu de sinya iwaku ritu to seikaku gasokkurirasii. kirai na tabemono mo osanaikoro no ritu to onazi de ninzin ga nigate de kokuhuku suru tameno resipi wo ritu ga motu tekitekureta. musuko tatiniha zibun nodekiru hani de, saidaigen no zyosei wositai, to kokoro kara negatu teiru.
torihikisaki tono settai de otozure ta kurabu de sinya to guuzen saikai suru. sonna yasaki, daigaku karano irai de kentiku zitumu wo tumu tameno arubaito no mensetu wo tugou de ike nakunatta yuuzin saiki no kawari niyatte kita ritu ga zibun no zippu to sirazu ni guuzen no saikai wo hata si dai hanasi , kyouko no syoudaku wo eta uede kare wo seisiki ni saiyou suru dai hanasi .
itiyanagi siho siho
en ono mayumi mayumi
dai hanasi kara touzyou suru takasi no tuma. zitaku no itiyanagi kentiku sekkeizimusyo wo tetudatu teiru.
nenmae ninakanaka ie ni kaetu tekonai otto takasi to sinya tono kako karano kankei wo kousinzyo wo tukatte sirabe agetesubete sitte inagara mokunin siteita. sono noti suguni ninsin sita koto de otto ga zibun no motoni modotu tekuru. dagakono kodomo ha ke gatu de ryuuzan sitesimau. sono noti ha ninsin dekinai karada tonari, kodomo ha akirame tagasonokotoga genin de takasi no kimoti ga zibun kara hanare teikundehanaikato hibi huan datta.
ritu ga sekkeizimusyo de hataraku youninattekara takasi no yousu gaokasiito sattisi ie sagasi wosuruto tukue no naka kara otto ga irai sita ritu no tyousahoukoku syorui wo mitu keta koto de sinya ni ai ni iku. sono tokini ruka wo mite mizukara miwo hiko utosuru.
teppei teppei
en tettowada tettowada
kurabu no ko ware tentyou.
sinya ni taisi te tentyou to mama no kankei ha kuzusu kotonaku, bizinesuraiku ni tantan to sessi teiruga, bukiyou nagara kanozyo wo rou waru soburi wo mise rukotomoaru.
gesuto
koutyousensei koutyousensei
en nakamura naotarou dai hanasi
tannin no sensei sensei
en wakabayasi hidetosi dai hanasi
nakamura masao masao
en takanasi rie dai hanasi
sutafhu
kikaku yokota makoto toukai terebi
gensaku ozawa sinri gin no supuun koudansya rensai
kyakuhon moriyama akemi, nisii humiko, nakamura yukari hoka hoka
ongaku itikawa atusi
syudaika takahasi yuu okaeri waanaamyuuzikkuzyapan
sounyuuka takahasi yuu warau yakusoku yori waanaamyuuzikkuzyapan
syoumei kaneko takuya takuya
satuei sinoda tadasi tadasi
onsei kagawa syou si si
gizyutu purodeyuusaa isii katuhiro katuhiro
hensyuu kisino yukako yukako
onkyoukouka himoto mai mai
bizyutu sinkou saitou suguru suguru
bizyutu purodeyuusaa morikawa kazuo kazuo
ryouri tantou sekine tatuko, takahasi rie rie
hensei itou masaaki toukai terebi
kouhou tanaka si megumi, hattori akihiro, yamamoto akiko toukai terebi
gizyutu kyouryoku basuku basuku
bizyutu kyouryoku aato aato
sutazio sutazio sutazio
ensyutu kaneko yosi iti, simazaki tosiki tosiki
purodeyuusaa matumoto keisuke toukai terebi , nisi asami, hara katuko, takeuti e syou syoutiku
seisaku kyouryoku syoutiku satueizyo toukyou sutazio sutazio
seisaku tyosaku syoutiku kabusikigaisya kabusikigaisya
seisaku toukai terebi housou housou
kyakutyuu
gaibu rinku
toukai terebi asita mokitto, oisiigo mesi gin no supuun kousiki saito satomi si satomisiha, nippon no sizoku nohitotu. tyuusei ni nippon no buke tositehazimatta. honsei ha genzi kawauti genzi . gen nitta yosisige no ko gisyun wo so tosuru sizoku de, nitta si no syo souke dearu. sengokuzidai, itizoku karaha bousou tihou wo ryou suru sengokudaimyou awa satomi si ga deta.
gaiyou
satomi si ha nitta si no syo souke deari, dai nitta si tomo yoba reta. kamakurazidai niha o kazin tosite syougun ni kinzi si, kamakurazidai matu no douran deha souryou ie no nitta yosisada to koudou wotomonisita. nanbokutyou ki niha itizoku mo waka re, nantyou hou hokutyou hou ni wakare te tatakatu ta.
awa satomi si no kaden deha, satomi si no tyakuryuu dearu satomi yosizane ga awa ni nyuukoku sitatosareruga, keihu kankei ha sadaka dehanai. awa satomi si ha sengokudaimyou tosite seityousi te bousou ni kakkyo si, edozidai syotou niha awa ikkoku wo osame ru tateyama hansyu tonattaga, nen ni satomi tyuugi no dai de kaieki sareta.
konohoka, kamakurazidai kara muromatizidai nikakete syokoku ni waka reta satomi si gaaru. dewa satomi si, mino satomi si, etigo satomi si, haruna satomi si nitayama satomi si nadodearu.
satomi si no hassyou kara muromatizidai made
satomi si no oko ri
satomi si ha zou tinzyu hu syougun nitta yosisige no syo tyousi nitta gisyun satomi tarou wo syodai tosuru. satomi no mei ha nitta gisyun ga ueno kuni usui gun hatiman sou satomi sato genzai no gunmaken takasaki sizyou satomi mati nakazato ken mati simozato ken mati ni uturi, sono ti no mei wo myouzi tositakotoni hassu ru ru ru
keizu niyoruto gisyun ha nitta tikurin rokurouta rou tomo syousi teirukotokara, nitta syounai nimo syoryou wo motu teori, satomi si no honkyo wo tikurin takabayasi sato tosuru kenkyuu moaru.
kamakurazidai muromatizidai
kamakurazidai ninaruto, gisyun no tyousi satomi yosinari ga minamotonoyoritomo ni tukae te o kazin tonatta. yosinari ha yoritomo ni tyouyou sare, yoritomo no sigo mo daidai no syougun ni kinzi sita.
kamakurazidai matu no satomi yositane gisyun no yono mago ha, honsyuu ie no nitta si to tomoni toubaku gun ni sanka. nitta yosisada ni zuikou si, kamakura seme ni kuwawa ri kou wo age, sengo etigo kuni no syugo dai ni nin zerareta. nanbokutyou no douran deha nantyou hou ni sitagatte itamonono, souke ga boturaku suruto itizoku no nakani hokutyou gawa ni sanka suru mono ga araware ta. muromatibakuhu ni sitagatte mino kuni ni syoryou wo eta satomi yosimune mosonohitoridearu. yosimune ha kannou no zyouran de asikaga naoyosi ni sitagatu taga, naoyosi ha haiboku site mino satomi si ha syoryou wo usinai, boturaku sita.
sono noti, kamakura kubou asikaga mitukane ni mesi dasarete hitati kuni ni syoryou wo eta zinbutu ni, satomi ie ken gairu. ie kano ko no satomi iemoto ha, asikaga motiuzi ni houkou syuu tosite tukae ta. iemoto ha, ueno kuni hitati kuni nadoni syoryou wo atae rareteita. sikasi eikyou no ran de ie ken ga zigai, tuzui te yuuki kassen de iemoto ie si husi ga uta re, ueno satomi si tyakuryuu hakokode danzetu sita.
iemoto nomouhitorino ko tosareru yosizane ha awa kuni ni oti nobi, notini awa satomi si no so tonattatosareteiru. daga, kinnen nioite, yosizane aruiha ie ken wo kyuurai no densyou niyoru ueno satomi si tyakuryuu dehanaku, mino satomi si yosimune no matuei deattatosuru setu ga dasa reteiru.
muromatizidai ikou, hassyouti ueno kuni niokeru satomi si ha, satomi gi ren yositane no ko no mituo dearu nitayama si turano keitou ni zokusi te, sengokuzidai ni nikaidou masayuki haika de nitayama zyousyu deatta satomi ie ren syuu ren nadoga sanken sare, ie ren ha notini uesugikensin no toubatu wo uke te sensi wo toge te, ko no syuugi notini sensi to yosimune ha usui gun satomi sato ni nogare te, haruna satomi si to syousi tatoiu. mata, ie turano moto niha douzoku no heri wo tayori, awa kuni wo owa reta awa satomi si itizoku no satomi katuhiro toiu zinbutu ga miwo yose tato tutae rareru.
awa satomi si
awa satomi si awasatomisiha, sengokuzidai ni awa kuni wo syouaku, bousou han sima ni seiryoku wo kakudai si, sengokudaimyou kasi ta sizoku dearu. kantou huku sui kantou kanryou no isyou mosikuha kantou hukusyougun wo zisyou sita.
awa satomi si syodai satomi yosizane ha, yuuki kassen de utizini sita satomi iemoto no sisoku tosareru zinbutu de, awa kuni ni uturi anzai si wo tuihou site ryousyu tonattatosareru satomi yosizane no awa nyuukoku densetu . sikasi, yosizane no syutuzi ya awa nyuukoku no keii nituiteno syousai ha humei dearu. douzidai siryou de kakunin gadekinaikotokara, awa satomi si no keihu uede syodai tosareru yosizane, dai tosareru nariyosi wo kakuu no zinbutu tosuru setu moaru. tenmon no naikou no keii ya dainizi kounodai kassen no zyoukyou nado, edozidai ni sirusa reta gunki mono no kisai wo dodai tositeita zyuurai setu ha, kinnen no siryou hakkutu to kenkyuu no sinten nisitagatte ooki na gigi ga simesa reteori, saikentou ga okonawa reteiru reteiru reteiru
rekisi
sengoku syoki no awa satomi si
douzidai no bunsyo de kakunin dekiru saisyo no awa satomi ie tousyu ha, daime tosareru satomi yosimiti dearu. eisyou nen nen gatu niti ni awa kuniiti miya turuya hatimanguu ni osame rareta munahuda niha tinzyu hu syougun gentyou sin masauzi koga kubou asikaga masauzi no mei totomoni huku sui genyosi toori satomi yosimiti no mei ga sirusa reteiru. koreha satomi yosimiti no zituzaisei to awa sihai no kakuritu wo simesu meisyou dearuto kangae rareteiru. sono notino koga kubou ie no naihun ni saisi teha, syou yumi kubou asikaga yosiaki wo hou zi, kazusa simousa sagami hetabitabi sinnyuu si, noti houzyousi wohazimetosuru han syou yumi kubou ha no daimyou kunibito to arasou. daiei nen nen gatu niti niha, satomi si no gunzei dai tousyu satomi yositoyo no koukennin deatta ozi no satomi mi gyou no gunzei tosareteiruga, tousyu yositoyo honnin tosuru setu moaruga miura gun kamakura gun he sinnyuu si, turuoka hatimanguu wo yaki, tamanawa zyouka de houzyou hou to tatakatu teiruga, koremo syou yumi kubou no ikou ni sitagatu tamonodearutosareteiru turuoka hatimanguu no tatakai .
tenmon nen nen gatu niti, satomi yositoyo ga ozi no satomi mi gyou wo utu ga, yokunen gatu niti niha mi gyou no zissi no satomi yositaka ga, noti houzyousi no yoriki wo ete, satomi yositoyo no komo ru inamura siro wo otosi, yositoyo wo zigai ni oikomi katoku wo tui da. kono itiren no naihun wo tenmon no naikou inamura no hen to yobu. tenmon no naikou nituiteha, zyakunen no yositoyo ga mu siryo ni koukennin dearu ozi wo haizyo sitakotogakikkakedearuto egaka retekitaga, kinnen no siryou hakkutu no kekka tosite yositoyo hasudeni sounen wo mukae teori, syoryuu dearu satomi mi gyou yositaka husi niyoru souke ni taisuru gekokuzyou no ikkan deattatono mikata ga tuyoma tteiru. konotame, yositoyo izen wo zenki satomi si , yositaka igo wo kouki satomi si to yon de kubetu suru kenkyuuka moiru.
mata tenmon no naikou ni kanrensi, kouki satomi si gasono seitousei wo syutyou surutameni zenki satomi si ni kansu ru kiroku wo kaihen sita utagai mo mota reteiru. yositoyo ga zyakunen no tousyu tosareta ten ya, dai dai tousyu satomi nariyosi no zituzai ga utagawa reru ten nadogasoredeari, yositoyo izen no satomi si no kiroku ga izyouni sukunai kotomo kouki satomi si niyoru siryou no inmetu ni kankei siteiruto iwa reteiru. mata, zenki satomi si no itizoku yosimiti mataha yositoyo no sison to suitei sareru gen minbu taisuke toiu zinbutu ga awa kuni sirahama siro niitakotomo kakuninsa reteiru.
tenmon no naikou igo
tenmon no naikou nioite noti houzyousi to musubi dai dai tousyu tonatta satomi yositaka deattaga, sono noti ha noti houzyousi to te wo kiri, hutatabi syou yumi kubou hou nituku. sono noti ha noti houzyousi ya kazusa takeda si totabitabi kanka wo mazie ta. satomi si ha, tenmon nen nen no daiitizi kounodai kassen niokeru taihai, noti houzyousi niyoru awa seme nadodetabitabi kukyou ni otitu taga, etigo uesugi si to doumei wo kumu kotoniyori kirinuke, kazusa ni seiryoku wo sintyou sita.
satomi yositaka yosihiro no oyako ha, eiroku nen nen oyobi eiroku nen nen no dainizi kounodai kassen de noti houzyousi ni haiboku wo kissu ruga, eiroku nen nen no mihune yamaai sen de houzyousi wo yaburi, kazusa deno seiryokuken wo kakko tarumononisita. noti houzyousi ga uesugi si to renkei suruto, koreni taikou site yosihiro ha kai no takeda si to doumei wo kumi kabuto bou doumei , tyakutyaku to seiryoku wo kakudai. simousa nanbu nimo eikyou wo oyobo suyouninari, saiseiki wo mukae ta. daga, tensyou nen nen ni yositaka ga bossi ta goro yori houzyousi no makikaesi ga hassei si, tensyou nen nen , satomi yosihiro hatabitabi kousen sita houzyousi maturigoto to waboku bou sou iti wa site simousa kara tettai si, igo ryougoku keiei ni sennen suru.
yosihiro ga tensyou nen nen ni bossu ruto, tyakusi umeoumaru to otouto yosiyori yosihiro no syosi tomotono kan de katoku arasoi ga hassei si, mata kazusa kunibito no rihan nadoniyori itizi ie sei ha otoroe ta. sikasi katoku arasoi wo sei site tousyu tonatta satomi yosiyori ha toyotomi hidekiti ni sekkinsi, awa kazusa zeniki to simousa nanbu no ando wo eru kotoni seikou suru.
tateyama han no naritato kaieki
yosiyori no ato wo tui da satomi yosiyasu ha, odawara seibatu ni sanzin surumo, sou buzi rei ihan wo okasi tatameni hidekiti no ikari wo katu ta. koreniyori kazusa simousa ha bossyuu sare, awa ikkoku nomiga ando sareta. konotoki tokugawaieyasu gatorinasitakotoniyori, ikou satomi si ha tokugawa si to gi yosimiwo tuuzi ruyouninaru.
keityou nen nen no kan ke hara no tatakai noti, ronkou kousyou niyotte hitati kasima ryou mangoku ga kazou sare, tateyama han ha tugou man isi no daimyou tonatta. mata, yosiyasu no otouto no satomi tadasige mo ueno itahana mangoku no hansyu ni nin zirareta. daga, keityou nen nen ni satomi tadasige ga totuzyo kaieki syobun tonari, yoku keityou nen nen niha souke no satomi tyuugi mo syuuto syuutodearu ookubo tadatika sikkyaku ni renza site awa wo bossyuu sare, kasima no daigaeti tosite houki kurayosi mangoku ni tenpou tonatta. sikasi zissai ha, kare niha nin huti hodono ryoumai sika atae rareteorazu, hairu to onazi atukai datta. sosite genna nen nen , tyuugi ga byousi suruto, atotugi gainaitosite kaieki sareta.
awa satomi si no matuei
zissaini ha, tyuugi niha seisitu ni nin no zyosi gaitahoka, sokusitu ni nin no dansi gaitatoiwareteiru.
tyuugi no ko dearutosareteiru satomi ri teru ha, moto kasin no indou si ni sodate raretatoiu. sison ha etizen sabae hansyu manabe si ni tukae ta. hokano ko mo sison wo nokosi teori, sorezore tawara tori no kakyuu hatamoto ya take ni sikan sitatoiu.
tyuugi no ozi dearu satomi tadasige moto itahana hansyu ha kaieki noti, sakai ie ni azuke rare, sison ha dewa syounai han no kasin tosite tukae teiru.
mata, satomi yositaka no ituo ni satomi yosimasa gaori, sono go yono mago satomi gi huyu ga hitati mito hansi tonatteiru.
syouwa zenki no zitugyouka syakai kyouiku ie dearu satomi zyun kiti daimaru dai dai syatyou, tibaken syussin mo, awa satomi si no itizoku dearu. sono so ha edoki ni tootoumi kakegawa han oota si ni tukae teitaga, meiziisin ki no hansyu tenpou kazusa kunimatu o han niyotte bousou ni modotu ta.
awa satomi si rekidai tousyu
satomi yosizane yosizane
satomi nariyosi nariyosi
satomi yosimiti satomi mi gyou gyou
satomi yositoyo yositoyo
satomi yositaka yositaka
satomi yosihiro satomi yosisige yosisige
satomi yosiyori yosiyori
satomi yosiyasu yosiyasu
satomi tyuugi tyuugi
syuyou na kasin
awa satomi si no syuyou na kasin tosite masaki si gairu.
o itimon syuu syuu
masaki si si
masaki tameharu sono hoka hoka
nado nado
bikou
kyokutei bakin no nansou satomihakkenden ha, awa satomi si no syoki no ziki wo settei nendai tositeiru. bakin no kousou ha, yuuki kassen ni yabure awa ni oti nobite ko no yosinari nariyosi totomoni sedai ni oyobu bousou ni kuni no sihai no kiso wo uti tate ta yosizane wo rekisi kara toriage zinkun tosi, sono zinsei no konkyo wo hati kensi toiu kyokou niyotte urazu keyoutositamonoto torae rukotogadekiru.
etigo satomi si
etigo kuni ha kamakurazidai irai, satomi si to heri ga hukai toti deari, sizoku ga ne wo kudaro sita. satomi gisyun no zinan tanaka yosikiyo ha etigo ni syoryou wo ete gekou sitatoiu. satomi yosinari no zinan yositugu ha etigo kuni hata si sou ooi tagou gen niigataken tookamati si ni syoryou wo e, yosinari no mituo toriyama tokinari mo hata si sou ni syoryou wo eta. ooi ta si toriyama si tanaka si nado, satomi si no sizoku ha etigo nitta tou wo keisei si, nanbokutyou no douran ki niha souke no nitta yosisada ni sitagatte katuyaku sita.
ooi ta si
ooi ta si ooidasiha, satomi yosinari no ko yositugu tosono ko no si tuga, etigo uonuma gun ooi tagou niigataken tookamati si wo ryouti tositakotokara hazima ru.
ooi ta si ha etigo nitta tou womatome, nitta yosisada ga suuzyuu ki de kyohei sita saini ha, tunetaka ga etigo yori , ki no gunzei de sanzyou si, yosisada gun no tyuukaku tosite kamakura seme ni kuwawa tta. kenmu sinsei karaha tunetaka no zinan uzitune sikibu taihu, danzyou syouhitu ga yosisada haika no syou tosite yuusen si, minatogawa no kassen deno haiboku no noti, etizen niyotta yosisada wo kyuuen subeku etigo de man no hei wo atume taga, yosisada no sensi no mukuwo uke gakai sitesimatta.
etigo ooi ta si
kono noti, honkyo no ooi tasiro ga asikaga hou no taigun no kougeki wo uke, karouzite metubou hamanugaretamonono, syou dogou tosite tuzuku kotoninaru.
sengokuzidai niha nagao si no taitou to tomoni, tokuni kinrin no ueda nagao si to kankei wo hukame, ooi ta si kei ha nagao masakage no otouto, kei kuni wo musumemuko tosi, uesugi keisyou no yousyouzi no moriyaku mo si kei no otouto ga tutome ta. keisyou ga uesugi ie tousyu tonattekaraha, kei kuni to ko no ooi ta moto maturigoto ha sokkin tosite uesugi iezyuu demo omoki wonasitaga, tensyou nen nen ni totuzyo, kei kuni ha seppuku wo meizi rare, moto maturigoto ha ransin niyori take azuka ritonari danzetu sita.
ooi ta si no myouseki ha, sinzoku no simakura syun tuga tugi, igo mo yonezawa hansi tosite tuzui ta.
kyoutodai ida si
konohoka, muromatibakuhu no asikaga syougunke kara tabayama siro oumi ni syoryou wo kyuu i, houkou syuu tosite katuyaku sita ooi ta si gaita.
oosima si
nitta yosisada ni sitagai kamakurabakuhu kanraku wonasita oosima si nonakade, notini asikaga takauzi ni sitagai mikawa syugo nimade hatten sita oosima si gaita.
awa kei no etigo satomi si
awa satomi si no naihun tenmon no naikou de uta reta satomi yositoyo no izi satomi ie syuu ha etigo ni nogare tatoiu. kono keitou wo sasi te etigo satomi si to iu.
mino satomi si
mino satomi si minosatomisiha, satomi yosinari no massi yosinao ga zyoukyuu no rango ni mino kuni engyou tera no zitou tonari, douti ni izyuu sitakotoni hazima ru sonpi bunmyaku .
nanbokutyou zidai, satomi yosimune ha hokutyou hou nituite syoryou wo eta ga, kannou no zyouran de asikaga naoyosi ni mikata si boturaku sita.
awa satomi si syodai satomi yosizane no syutuzi nituiteha, mino satomi si no keitou tosuru kanrenzuke no setu moaru.
dewa satomi si
dewa satomi si dewasatomisiha, zyouki no satomi yosinao wo syodai tosuru kakei dearu. sison ga dewa kuni sei nama syou gen yamagataken tendousi wo kyoten ni seiryoku wo husyoku sitaga, dewa heno izyuu no keii nadohahakkirisinai.
tendou si
nanbokutyou zidai, sei nama syou wo kyoten tosita dewa satomi ie no dai dai tousyu satomi yosikage ha ko ganaku, onazi genyosi kuni no kakei dearu asikagasi no itimon siba ie kano mituo yosimune wo yousi tosita. satomi yosimune ha katoku wo tugu to tendou si to syousi ta. yosimune no notini ha, siba si no sizoku dearu saizyou si kara saizyou naoie no ko yorinao ga itutu teiru yorinao ha siba ie kano zinan dearu saizyou kaneyori no mago de, yosimune no dai oi niataru. nitta kei no kakei nagara asikaga kei no ti wohikukototonatta tendou si ha, satomi si no itimon wo kasin dan tosite hensei site seiryoku wo kakudai surutotomoni, ueyama si higasine si takanosu si toiu syoryuu wo ryounai kakuti ni izyuu sasete sihaiken wo kakuritu siteitta.
nanbokutyou zidai kara muromatizidai nikakete, dewa kuni nanbu deha saizyou si ga kunibito wo tougou si sihai ken wo katame teori, itizoku ga yousi iri sita tendou si ni taisi temo zyuuzoku ka wo motome ruyouninaru. sikasi, tendou si ha siba si kara yousi wotottadakede kakei ha nitta si no itimon dearukotokara ittei no dokuritu wo izisi tekita. tendou si ha nobezawa iida obanazawa tateoka nagatoro mututa sei seika ratotomoni saizyou hati tate wo keisei si, saizyou si ya dewa ni sinkou wotakuramu date si to taikou siteitta.
tensyou nen nen , mogamiyosimitu ha tendou si dai dai tousyu tendou yorisada tono kouwa wo musubi, yorisada no musume tendou omae wo sokusitu ni mukae taga, sono noti mo saizyou si to tendou si itizoku ya saizyou hati tate no arasoi ha tuzui ta. tensyou nen nen , dai dai tousyu tendou yorizumi notokini tendou siro ha rakuzyou. tendou si dewa satomi si no itimon ya kasin dan ha saizyou ie ni kyuusyuu sare, saizyou ie no seiryoku kakudai ni kouken siteyukukotoninaru.
saizyou ie ni tukae ta satomi si no zinbutu tosite, satomi minbu gairu. ueyama zyousyu ueyama mitukane satomi mitukane no itizoku de zyuusin deatta minbu ha, tensyou nen nen ni saizyou hou ni tenzi, syukun wo utu te ueyama zyousyu tonatta. minbu ha yosimitu no ko saizyou yosiyasu wo zangen zangensiteo ie soudou saizyou soudou no itiin wotukuri, syukusei saretatoiu.
sendai hansi satomi si
tendou yorizumi ha datemasamune wo tayotu te nogare, tendou si ha sendai han zyuusin tosite myouseki wo nokosi teiru.
tensyou nen nen ni satomi minbu ga syukun no ueyama zyousyu ueyama mitukane wo utu ta kiwa, minbu ha zikkei no satomi kuranosuke wotomoni satugai siteiru. satomi kuranosuke no ko ga satomi motokatu de, motokatu hanotini ozi no itizoku no ooku wo utu te sendai han ni tukae ta. motokatu no ko satomi sigekatu ha kisyuu han ni syussi sita noti sendai han ni tukae ta.
mito hansi satomi si
dewa satomi si no bouryuu ha, mito han ni tukae ta.
edozidai syoki, saizyou ie yamagata han ha saizyou ietika no dai ni hassei sitao ie soudou saizyou soudou niyotte, edobakuhu no inoti niyori kaieki sareta. saizyou kasin deatta satomi gisin ha kaga hansyu matudaira tikuzen syu ni syou kakae raretaga, katuteno syuusuzi no yamanobe noritada saizyou ietika no zittei ga mito han ni sikan sitanoni tomonai, kaga han wo zisi te mizukara mo mito han ni sai sikan surukototonatta.
kono gisin no sison ni bakumatu no sisi satomi sirou zaemon oya tyou gairu. oya tyou ha toda san emon tadayuki no musume to konin si, tyakunan satomi tikakata ga umare ru. oya tyou tikakata oyako ha, enseki dearu mito han karou toda tyuudayuu an sima taitou kyoudai tomo kankei ga hukaku, sonnouzyoui ni maisin, tengu tou no ran nite syosei tou no kougeki wo uke te uti sini siteiru.
konohoka, mito han ni tukae ta satomi si niha, zenzyutu no awa satomi si no bouryuu satomi yositaka no ituo no keitou gaaru.
siryuu
tikurin si takabayasi si
usi sawa si si
nitayama si si
nakazato si si
touzyou si si
horiuti si si
yamamoto si si
kohara si si
kaiho si iemoto mituo no satomi si gi ga yuuki kassen noti, tiba si ni tukae, kaiho wo syousuru. notini matuei ga tiba ie sikken noti houzyousi kasin.
matuei ni kaiho tango syu tiba kati tane sitennou no hitori tera dai siro kurikaesi omono kaiho tane suke tanba syu kaiho kai morizou kiti, kaiho gyoson, kaiho seiryou nado.
tanaka si etigo kuni no yuuryoku o kazin. sen rikyuu gasono matuei to zisyou suru.
itoi si si
sinohara si si
oota si si
haneda si si
oosima si mikawa syugo syugo
ooi ta si houkou syuu syuu
hagawa si hane kawa si
yazima si si
oooka si oooka si sansyou.
toriyama si si
toyooka si buzen si tendou si dewa kuni no yuuryoku kunibito. asikagasi kei no siba ie kano mituo tendou yosimune satomi yosikage no yousi ga kaso
keihu
kyakutyuu
tyuusyaku
syutten
sankoubunken
itimura takao toyotomi seiken to bousouu satomi bunkoku kazusa bossyuu womeguttee tibaken si kenkyuu dai gou, tibaken bunsyo kan, nen gatu, .
oota akira kokuritu kokkaitosyokan dezitarukorekusyon satomi satomi seisi kakei daiziten dai kan, ueda mannen, mikami sanzi kansyuu seisi kakei daiziten kankou kai, nen, peezi. zenkoku syosi bangou . . . . kokuritu kokkaitosyokan dezitarukorekusyon.
oono taihei bousou satomi si no kenkyuu oono taihei, tibaken tateyama houzyoutyou, nen gatu. .
kawana tou hen subetewakaru sengokudaimyou satomi si no rekisi kokusyokankoukai, nen gatu. .
kawana tou bousou satomi itizoku zouho kaiteiban sinzin mono ourai sya, nen gatu. .
moro gonzou kokuritu kokkaitosyokan dezitarukorekusyon ueno kuni kokorozasi kan mizu dou, gunmaken sera tamura, nen gatu. zenkoku syosi bangou . . . . kokuritu kokkaitosyokan dezitarukorekusyon.
dezitaru han nihonzin meidai ziten . satomi motokatu . kotobanku. nen gatu niti eturan.
dezitaru han nihonzin meidai ziten . satomi sigekatu . kotobanku. nen gatu niti eturan.
nihondai hyakka zensyo. nansou satomihakkenden . kotobanku. nen gatu niti eturan.
satou hironobu kenkyuu nooto satomi yosimiti siron zenki satomi si kenkyuu no sinka notameni tiba sigaku dai gou, tiba rekisigaku kai, nen gatu, peezi, .
sudou satosi tyo kamakura ki satomi itizoku no doukou to hiraga itizoku , tanaka daiki hen ueno nitta si ebisukousyou syuppan tyuusei kantou busi no kenkyuu kenkyuu dai kan , nen gatu. . syosyutu gunma rekisi minzoku gou nen
takikawa kousyou bousou satomi si no rekisi katei niokeru tenmon no naikou no itizukee kankei siryou no syoukai wokanetee tiba zyoukaku kenkyuu dai gou, tiba zyoukaku kenkyuukai, nen gatu, .
takikawa kousyou ueno kuni itahana zyousyu satomi sanuki syu nituite tateyama to bunkazai dai gou, tateyama si bunkazai hogo kyoukai, nen.
takikawa kousyou mino satomi si syou kou tiba sigaku dai gou, tiba rekisigaku kai, nen gatu, peezi, .
takikawa kousyou tyo bousou satomi si ron kenkyuu si no seiri wo tyuusin ni, takikawa kousyou hen bousou satomi si ebisukousyou syuppan tyuusei kantou busi no kenkyuu kenkyuu dai kan , nen gatu. .
tino hara yasusi hou bousou satomi suigun no kenkyuu ron syobou, nen gatu. .
tino hara yasusi hou bousou satomi suigun no kenkyuu saikan han ron syobou, nen gatu. .
tino hara yasusi hou sinpen bousou sengoku si ron syobou syuppan, nen gatu. .
tino hara yasusi hou satomi ie kaieki simatu bousou sengokudaimyou no rakuzitu ron syobou hurusato bunko, , nen gatu. .
tibaken siryou kenkyuu zaidan hen dai hen sengokuzidai no bousou tibaken no rekisi tuusi hen tyuusei kan tibaken kensi siriizu , nen gatu. .
naritasi kikaku seisaku bu kouhouka narita yukarino hitobito kouhou narita heisei nen gatu nittoku syuu gou, naritasi kikaku seisaku bu, nen gatu, zenkoku syosi bangou .
hayakawa masasi satomi yositaka toobinzurusama sikaban hayakawa masasi, tibaken sirahamatyou, nen gatu. .
minegisi sumio tyo tyuusei zyoukan ato no tyousa to hozon katuyouu satomi si inamura siro wo tyuusin nii, inamura siroato wo hozon suru kai hensyuu hen satomi si inamura siroato womitumete dai syuu kan satomi si inamura siroato wo hozon suru kai, nen gatu. .
minegisi sumio tyo kyoutoku no ran to satomi yosizane , inamura siroato wo hozon suru kai hensyuu hen satomi si inamura siroato womitumete dai syuu kan satomi si inamura siroato wo hozon suru kai, nen gatu. .
gaibu rinku
satomi monogatari tekisuto han tateyama siritu hakubutukan ha, hukuokakougyoudaigaku no kogata zinkoueisei puroziekuto daihyou zyouhoukougakuka kyouzyu tanaka takasi niyori kaihatu sareta nodearu. aisyou haniwaka eisei. hakata no dentougeinou hakataniwakani yurai suru.
gaiyou
kounotorini tousai sare, nen gatu niti ni syusi sima utyuu sentaa kara roketto gouki niyotte kokusai utyuu suteesyon heto hakoba reta. nen gatu niti toki hun ni kokusai utyuu suteesyon no nippon zikkentou kiboukara kogata eisei housyutu gizyutu zissyou missyon no ikkan tosite, hokano ko no eisei , , , totomoni utyuukuukan he housyutu sareta. niwaka eisei ha syu missyon . kousokutuusin to huku missyon kasikou tuusin wo tousyoyotei no niti inai ni seikou saseta. ke gatu niti notino nen gatu niti, toki hun ni niigata de zyusin sareta biikon ga saigo tonari, douzitu rakka sitamonoto omowa reru.
kouzou
niwaka eisei ha no arumi kaku paipu wo yori sukosi nagaku katto si, ryoutan ni huta wosuru katati ni tukura reteiru. ha tuuzyou, hon no hasira ni paneru wo haru katati de tukura reruga, kono atarasii houhou ha sotowaku no kumitate seido no mondai ga sonzai sinainode housyutu utuwa tono kan de hutekigou wo syouzi rukotoganai. kaku paipu no mai no sokumen hasorezore mai no taiyoudenti wo tyokuretusetuzoku si, saidai . . . wo hatuden suru. zyoumen niha . no pattiantena to ko no midori, mae kamera no renzu ana wo motu. teimen niha . no pattiantena, ko no aka, noti kamera no renzu ana, no antenaeremento ga nobi deru tameno ana gaaru. eisei ha eikyuu zisyaku wo tun deirunode houi zisin noyouni ziryokusen ni sotte tuneni nanboku wo muku. nippon deha tiziki ga do hukkaku de tityuu ni itutu teori, eisei ga kansokutiten no minami do wo tuuka surutokiha maikuro nami . no biimu mo midori no biimu mo tizyou no kansokutiten wo muku kotoninaru. ippou, minamihankyuu deha akano wo tuke ta teimen ga tizyou wo muku kotoninaru.
tuusin sisutemu
appurinku ha enkaku komando notameni keitou motu teiru. mein ha , , . wo motiite iru. hokani bakkuappu kei tosite . nodemo enkaku komando wo okuru kotogadekiru. daunrinku ha keitou motu teiru. . , de tuneni biikon singou wo dasi teiru. eisei nai ni takuwae ta teremetoriideeta ha . , , . de tizyou ni okuru. eisei ga satuei sita gazou ha . , . , de tizyou ni okuru. hokani hikari huku missyon de tizyou ni singou wo okuru.
syu missyon
tyoukogata eisei deha hazimete no maikuro nami . niyoru kousokutuusin . niyori, housyutu tokini satuei sita kokusai utyuu suteesyon ya tihyou no gazou no tensou ni seikou sita. gazou pikuseru wo mai atari byou de okuru kotogadekita. singou ha hukuokakoudai no tizyou kyoku dakedenaku, niigatasi, ageo si, amerikabaamonto syuu baarinton demo amatyua musenka niyori zyusin sareta. doitu deha tiimu ga boohumu niaru tyokkei no antena wo tukatte okura rete kita mai no gazou naka, itido ni mai no gazou no hukugen ni seikou sita.
huku missyon
tousai sitawo hakkou sase, nen gatu niti ni ooitaken yuu si to kankoku node sekaihatu tonaru utyuu tizyou mano niyoru kasikou tuusin no zikken wo itta. no tentou ha moorusukoodo de tentou saseru moodo to bizyaku hikari kensyutu moodo no hutatu gaaru. bizyaku hikari kensyutu moodo ha de tenmetu suru deyuutei hi no hikari wosarani de hentyou siteiru. tizyou deha no firutaa wo tousi te noizu wo zyokyo si singou dakewo toridasu. bizyaku hikari kensyutu moodo deha midori ha izyou no parusu, heikin denryoku teido de hakkou saseta. saisyo no zikken deha eisei karano hikari ha kurasiki kagaku sentaa to kankoku souru node syasin ni satuei sareta. tuzuku zikken deha kanagawaken ebinasi, hatanosi, toyamasi tenmondai muubii , ehimeken seiyo si, tibaken kimitu si, kumamotoken no ogunimati nadode ooku no tenmon hu a n niyori satuei sareta. mata hukkoudai tiimu ha bouenkyou ni torituke ta kouden ko zoubai kan niyori denkisingou no toridasi nimo seikou sita.
kansoku deeta
eisei kara tasuu no kansoku deeta ga era reta. taiyoudenti no kaku paneru no denatu henka kara eisei ga kita wo sasu ziku ni kansi te, hidarimawari ni kaiten siteirukotoga waka tta. sarani, kotonaru niti ni totu ta douyou no deeta kara, kono eisei no kaitensokudo ga sidai ni zyousyou siteirukotoga hanmei sita.
kanrenkoumoku
wakayamadaigaku, touhokudaigaku niyori kaihatu sareta sareta
myouzyou denki niyori kaihatu sareta sareta
sannoze syuuritudaigaku no no
betonamu no daigaku utyuuken kyuu bu supeesu ga kaihatu sita sita
no itiran itiran

tanaka munekazu, tanaka takasi tyoukogata eisei niwakato musen sisutemu , waarudo, . , syuppan, . , . . . . . .

gaibu rinku
hukuokakoudai kogata zinkoueisei puroziekutomihairugureboviti rosia go ihail lebovich, nen nen ha rekidai berooozero kou noutino hitori dearu. zaii nen nen, nen nen. titi ha rosutohu kou, berooozero kou no gurepuvu a sirikoviti . haha ha zyotiurusu no hansarutaku no musume feodora seimei ha feodora to tutawa ruga syussyou mei ha husyou .
nen, zyotiurusu no han dearu monketemuru niyoru kahukasu heno ensei deyuden no sinkou ni sanka sita. nen gatu, yarosuravuri nioite, yarosuravuri kou huyoodoru no suemusume mei ha husyou to kekkon sita.
nen, rosutohu kou domitorii niyotte berooozero koukoku kara owa retaga, domitorii to konsutantin niyoru rosutohu koukoku no ryouyuuken womeguru tousou no saityuu no nen ni, hutatabi berooozero kou kurai wo ete iru. nao, berooozero wo owa retekara hukui surumadeno sokuseki ha humei dearu.
nen, gorodetu kou andorei niyoru, uraziimiru taikou domitorii ni taisuru ensei ni sanka sita. nen niha andorei ra syokou to tomoni zyotiurusu he omomuku ga, dounen natu, zyotiurusu de sibou sita. itai ha rosutohu no usupensukii daiseidou ni maisou sareta.
mihairu niha huyoodoru, roman, vu a sirii no mitugo gaori, mihairu no sison ha mosukuwa taikou kuni nadono kizoku no kakei tosite sonzoku siteiru.
sankoubunken
inogradov. . ostovskie i elozerskie udelnye knyazya usskiy biograficheskiy slovar v tomah. b. . , .
ihail lebovich ovyy entsiklopedicheskiy slovar tomah vyshlo tomov . b. , g. , . ootuti mati ootutityouha, nippon no iwateken kamihei gun ni syozai suru mati.
zyoumonzidai no iseki ga ooku mira reru. taiheiyou ni mensi teiru. sinkou sanson, henti, kaso tiiki no sitei wo uke teiru. zeniki ga sanriku ziopaaku no itibu wonasu.
tiri
ootuti kawa to kozuti kawa ga, kitakami santi ni hassi tehobo heikou ni nantou houkou he nagare, taiheiyou no ootuti wan heto sosoi deiru. sokoni keisei sareta tyuuseki heiya ni mati no tyuusinbu gaaru. ootuti wan no kita niha hunakosi wan moaru.
zinkou ha engan bu ni syuutyuu siteori, tetudou ya syuyoudouro mo kaigan ni sotte hasitu teiru. seibu no sankan tiiki nimo syuuraku gaaru.
kaki ga syuyou na tikei tosite age rareru.
yamakuzira yama kuzirasan, kuzirayama hyoukou . . ookuzira yama to syou kuzira yama karanaru.
isizaka mori isizakamori hyoukou . .
siro miyama siromiyama hyoukou , . .
taka takiyama kasen ootuti kawa ootutikawa ootutikawa
kozuti kawa kozutikawa kinkai engan tikei hunakosi wan, nami ita kaigan, kirikiri kaigan, ootuti wan wan
kouiki tiikikubun
touhokutihou no ikkaku dearu sanriku tihou ni hukuma reru.
iwateken nai no tihouku hun dearu, kenpoku engan kenou kennan nouti, engan tihou ni zokusuru. . iwateken no tihouku hun zu sankou gaibu rinku iwate aomori akita eria tizu . nabi. sougou koukoku sya. nen gatu niti eturan.
rinsetu suru zititai
. iwateken no sityouson zenzu gaibu rinku kennai kakusi tyouson . kousiki uebusaito . iwateken. nen gatu niti eturan. yamadatyou hokubu de habahiroku rinsetu.
miyako si hokusei bu de rinsetu.
toono si seibu de rinsetu.
kamaisi si nanbu de habahiroku rinsetu.
tyounai no tiiki
. ootuti mati kamihei gun iwateken no zyuusyo timei no yomi kana . sityouson. . nen gatu niti eturan.
rekisi
sinreki dounyuuizen nen izen no hizuke ha wareki niyoru kyuureki. marukakko nai ha seireki de, nen izen ha yuriusu koyomi, nen ikou ha guregorio koyomi.
morioka han no minatomati
sengokuzidai, touti ha syuuhen tiiki no yuuryoku busyou deatta ootuti si no sihaika deatta. ootuti si ha kunohe masami no ran ya iwasaki kassen de nanbu hou no busyou tosite katuyaku sita. ootuti si ha tokusan no nanbu sake no koueki de zai wo nasi taga, tyuuou syuuken ka wo susume ru nanbu tosinao niyotte muhon no kengi wokakerare, syobatu sareta.
ootuti si naki noti, kono ti ha ootuti sirodai ga oka rete morioka han no kanrika tonari, sono noti ha ootuti daikan tokoro minami hei daikan tokoro ga oka re, genzai no yamadatyou to kamaisi si no itibu wo hukume ta tiiki no gyousei wo kankatu sita.
higasinihon taisin sai
nen heisei nen gatu niti toki hun byou, magunityuudo . no touhokutihou taiheiyou oki zisin ga hassei si, ootuti mati mo tuyoi yure ni osowa reta tyounai deha sinmati ni zisinkei ga setti sareteitaga, sindo ha humei tonatteiru. rinsetu suru sityouson ha, kamaisi si ga zyaku, miyako si to toono si de kyou, yamadatyou ha zyaku deatta.
kuwae te, kono zisin ga hikioko sita ootu nami tosoreniyotte hassei sita kasai niyori, mati ha kaimetuteki higai wo uke ta. hukkou ni muke te hukkou virejzipuroziekuto ga susume rareteiru.
hassai toki, tyoutyou katou hirosi ki wo hazime tosuru mati syokuin kanbu ra yaku nin ha saigai taisaku honbu wo tatiage rubeku mati tyousya kai no soumuka ni sansyuu sitaga, yosin ga tuzuku tameniittan tyuusyazyou he idou si, sarani tunami sekkin no mukuwo uke te okuzyou ni hinan siyoutositamonono, yaku nin ga okuzyou ni aga ttatokorode tunami ga toutatu. tyoutyou to suuzyuunin no syokuin ha maniawa zu, tyousya no kai wo osotu ta tunami ninomikomarete, sonomama syousoku ga todae ru. tyoutyou igai nimo katyou kurasu no syokuin ga zenin yukuehumei tonattatame, gyousei kinou ga mahi sita. kento dearu moriokasi kara kuruma de suuzikan kakaru tisei mo wazawai site, higai no zenyou ga gaibu ni tutawa rinikuku, syuui kara koritu sitayouna zyoukyou gasibaraku tuzui ta.
yamadasen no ootuti eki ha ekisya nadoga tunami de ryuusitu si, senro nimo ooki na higai ga deta.
toukyoudaigaku kaiyouken kyuusyo huzoku no kokusai engan kaiyouken kyuu sentaa ha, zinteki higai koso naka ttamonono, tatemono ha kai made tunami ni arawa re, tokuni kaimetuteki zyoutai tonatta , kai deha kami baitai to densibaitai niyoru hozon deeta no subete ga usinawa reta. mata, minato ni keiryuu siteatta kenkyuusen ha tinbotu sita.
sanrikukaigan hatu no soudou kata kousoku ryokyaku hune dearu kamaisi si syozoku no kankousen hamayuri , nin nori ha, teiki kensa notameni akahama tiku no iwate zousenzyo de rokuni age rareta zikango, tunami nisarawareta. dai nami ga kita tokiniha bouhatei wo koe te nairiku he osi nagasa re, hodo kita niaru kaidate teno minsyuku no yane ni hitu kakattesono ueni noru katati dehobo mukizu nomama toma tta.
gatu niti yukuehumei tonatteita katou tyoutyou ga itai de hakken sareru. tunami higai notame senkyo ga zissi dekizu, igo ke getuyo riniwatatte tyoutyou ga kuuseki tonaru.
gatu niti kono zitende hanmei sita zinteki higai ha sisya nin yukuehumeisya , nin hinan mono , nin, tatemono higai ha syousaihumei.
gatu niti tunami de minsyuku no okuzyou ni hyoutyaku sita kamaisi si no kankousen hamayuriha, bousai kyouiku wo syumokuteki tosita sinsai no monyumento tosite hozon suru an ga zisinken kyuu mono rano teigen de huzyou siteitaga, kono niti, kamaisi si ha mati no hukkyuu ni sisyou ga deru tosite kaitai wo kime ta.
gatu niti tyouritu ootuti syougakkou no undouzyou nite, ootuti matiyakuba no kari tyousya ga kaityou.
gatu niti kamaisi si no kankousen hamayuriga dai no kureen niyotte minsyuku no yane kara tihyou ni kudaro sarerusono noti, genti nite yaku ke gatu kakete kaitai sareta.
gatu niti kono zitende hanmei sita zinteki higai ha sisya nin yukuehumeisya nin zyuukeisyou mono humei, tatemono higai ha izen tosite syousaihumei.
gatu niti kono zitende hanmei sita zinteki higai ha sisya nin yukuehumeisya nin.
gatu niti huku tyoutyou higasi ume masaaki no ninki ga manryou si, yoku niti ni soumuka tyou no heiya kouzou ga tyoutyou syokumu daikou wo hikitugu. tyoutyou senkyo ha gatu niti ni zissi to kima ri, syutyou huzai no izyou zitai hanaomo tuzuku kototonatta.
gatu niti tyoutyou senkyo ga zissi sare, motomati soumuka tyou no ikari kawa yutaka ga tousen suru.
genzai, tyounai no bousai gyousei musen no hiru no tyaimu niha, tyounai niaru hourai sima ga moderu no tuto iwa reruhyokkorihyoutan sima no teemasongu ga tukawa reteiru.
hinanzyo seikatu wookuru nin tatinotameni minyou wo utatu te imon katudou wositeita zimoto no zyosityuugakusei ga terebi no houdoubangumi ni uturi, soregakikkaketonatte, nen gatu ni usu sawa misakitosite kasyu debyuu sita.
nenpyou
kinsei izen
kenmu syouhei nenkan seiki yokota zyousyu aso numa asatuna . aso numa si no zinan dearu ootuti zirou ga, toubu kaigan tihou wo bunti sare, kyozyou tosite ootuti siro wo kizui tato tutae rareru.
tensyou nen nen natu toyotomi hidekiti no odawara seibatu de noti houzyousi no odawara siro ga rakuzyou sitakotoniyori, syuka wo naku sita izu simizu si ga hune de kesen ura ni nogare ru.
sono noti kan monaku kirikiri mura gen ootuti mati kirikiri ni izyuu sita simizu si ha, kokyou dearu sagami kuni maekawa mura nitinande maekawa sei ni kaimei. tousyu ha daidai maekawa zenbee wo nanori, kaisanbutu wo edo zyouhou nagasaki nadoni okuru youninatte, kirikiri mura ni kyoten wo oku kaisen tonya dearu gousyou kirikiri zenbee no meide sira reruyouninatta.
azuti momoyama zidai makki ootuti zyousyu ootuti magohati rou maturigoto tei ga, tokusan no sake wo aramaki siozake ni kakou suru houhou wo kaihatu si, nanbu hanamagari gari sake no meide edo to tuusyou site ooi ni tomi wo eru.
genna nen nen ootuti magohati rou maturigoto tei ga nanbu tosinao kara muhon no kengi wokakerarete seppuku si, ootuti si ha kamei danzetu suru.
kindai ikou
nen syouwa nen gatu niti kokutetu no zensin yamadasen no ootuti eki to kirikiri eki ga kaigyou.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti kyuu ootuti mati to kanazawa mura ga gappei si, gen tyousei sitano ootuti mati ga tanzyou.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti yamadasen no nami ita eki gen nami ita kaigan eki ga kaigyou.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti kyuu ootuti gyokyou, oyobi, akahama gyokyou, kirikiri gyokyou ga gappei si, sinsei no ootuti mati gyogyou kyoudoukumiai tosite kaisyo suru.
nen syouwa nen
inoue hisasiga tyouhensyousetu kirikirizin no sippitu wo hazime ru.
gatu toukyoudaigaku kaiyouken kyuusyo genzai no toukyoudaigaku taiki kaiyouken kyuusyo ga akahama tiku ni ootuti rinkai kenkyuu sentaa genzai no kokusai engan kaiyouken kyuu sentaa wo kaisetu.
nen syouwa nen tiiki okosino ikkan tosite, kirikiri eki wo yousu ru ootuti mati ga mini dokuritukoku kirikiri kuni tosite dokuritusengen si, nendai niokeru mini dokuritukoku buumu nokikkaketonatta.
nen heisei nen gatu niti nami ita eki ga nami ita kaigan eki ni kaisyou.
nen heisei nen gatu toukyoudaigaku kaiyouken kyuusyo no ootuti rinkai kenkyuu sentaa ga kokusai engan kaiyouken kyuu sentaa ni kaisyou kaiso.
nen heisei nen gatu niti footoburaggu si . amerika gassyuukoku kariforunia syuu to simaitosi meiyaku wo teiketu.
nen heisei nen gatu niti higasinihon taisin sai ga hassei si, ootuti mati mo higaizindai husi wo aratame te syouzyutu suru.
nen heisei nen gatu niti higasinihon taisin sai no eikyou de unkyuu ga tuzui teita yamadasen miyako eki kamaisi ekikan wo hukkyuu, sanriku tetudou ni ikan.
gyouseiku iki no hensen sityouson sei sikou igo
nen meizi nen gatu niti minami hei gun de ootuti mura ootutimura kozuti mura kozutimura kirikiri mura kirikirimuraga gappei sita uede tyousei wo sikou si, ootuti mati ga seiritu suru. onazi ku, kanazawa mura kanezawamuraga tandoku de mura sei wo sikou si, dougun ni kanazawa mura ga seiritu suru. . tyounai no tiiki.
nen meizi nen gatu niti minami hei gun to nisi hei gun ga gappei si, kamihei gun tonaru.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti ootuti mati to kanazawa mura ga gappei si, sinsei no ootuti mati ga tanzyou.
gyousei
rekidai tyoutyou
nen gatu niti ni oko tta higasinihon taisin sai de tunami ni noma rete yukuehumei tonatteitaga, dougetu niti ni mati tyousya kara yaku hanare ta kokudouzoi ide itai ga hakken sare, yoku niti ni tounin to kakuninsa reta. tyoutyou no yukuehumei noti, tyoutyou syokumu daikousya niha huku tyoutyou no higasi ume masaaki ga tuki, tyoutyou no sibou kakuningo mo daikou wo keizoku sita.
huku tyoutyou syoku ga ninki manryou tonaru gatu niti no yokuzitu, tihouziti hou dai zyou dai kou ni sitagatte soumuka tyou no heiya kouzou ga kounin no syokumu daikousya ni tui ta. nao, sono gotyou tyou tonatta ikari kawa yutaka ga zennin no soumuka tyou deattaga, sinsai izen ni tyoutyou sensyutuba zyunbi wo riyuu ni zisyoku siteori, sinsai no zitende soumuka tyou ha kuuseki tonatteita. mata, teinentaisyoku wo yotei siteita mono wo nozoku hokano katyou kurasu no syokuin mo zenin ga katou totomoni sibou mosikuha yukuehumei tonattatame, sinsai touzi syukan deatta heiya ga soumuka tyou ni syoukaku siteita.
sosiki
mati no sosiki ha tugino toori.

ootuti mati ha tizyou ippan housouzigyousya tosite tizyou ippan housoukyoku no menkyo wo syutoku, hurusegu oyobi wansegueria housou wo zissi siteita.
tizyou ippan housoukyoku ga tyounai no kozuti ni setti sareteita.
simaitosi yuukou tosi
footoburaggu si . amerika gassyuukoku kariforunia syuu to, nen heisei nen gatu niti, simaitosi meiyaku wo teiketu.
keisatu
kamaisi keisatusyo ootuti kouban hontyou nen gatu niti yori, kamihei gun ootuti mati uemati ban gou ni syozai

yuubin
tyokuei kyoku kyoku
ootuti yuubinkyoku syuuhaikyoku syozaiti hontyou . nen gatu niti yori, ootuti dai ziwari zi sakoda banti ni syozai
kirikiri yuubinkyoku syozaiti kirikiri .
an watari yuubinkyoku syozaiti an watari . kani yuubinkyoku yuubinkyoku
akahama kani yuubinkyoku yuubinkyoku
ootuti sakuragityou kani yuubinkyoku yuubinkyoku
dai ke kuti kani yuubinkyoku yuubinkyoku
kanazawa kani yuubinkyoku yuubinkyoku
namiita kani yuubinkyoku yuubinbutu nado no syuuhai gyoumu ha, honrai ha ootuti yuubinkyoku no tantou daga, higasinihon taisin sai de hisai sitakotoni tomonai doukyoku no syuuhai gyoumu ga teisi sitatame, kamaisi yuubinkyoku ga daikou site tantou.
iryou
iwateken ritudai tuti byouin syozaiti suehirotyou .

suisan gyou
kirikiri gyokou hunakosi wan niaru kirikiri kounai.
ootuti gyokou ootuti wan niaru ootuti kounai.
ootuti mati gyogyou kyoudoukumiai . . honbu an watari tiku , kirikiri sisyo kirikiri tiku , ootuti sisyo sugatyou tiku , an tosi tokoro sugatyou tiku , akahama sisyo akahama tiku
ootuti mati gyogyou kyoudoukumiai uoitiba syozaiti an watari .
tiiki
ken zentai no heikin syotoku ga manen nanoni taisi, ootuti mati deha manen to, kakusa ga itizirusii.
ippou, kokuminkenkouhoken ryou ha, zenkoku banme ni kougaku dearu.
zinkou
heisei nen kokuseityousa kara nentyou sa nikakete zinkou ha . no gensyou de, iwateken zentai no . wo ookiku uwamawatu tadakedenaku, rikuzentakata si no . , yamadatyou no . nadowo koe ru kennai saidai no gensyouritu datta. nao heisei no dai gappei izen no kubun mo hukume reba miyako si no itibu tonatta kyuu tarou mati no . ga kennai saidai no gensyouritu dearu.
kenkou
heikinnenrei . tosi otoko . tosi, onna . tosi heisei nen gatu niti genzai
kyouiku
gimukyouiku syogaku kou
ootuti tyouritu ootuti gakuen gimukyouikugakkou gimukyouikugakkou
ootuti tyouritu kirikiri gakuen heisetu kata konaka ikkan kou kou

iwateken ritudai tuti koutougakkou koutougakkou

meisyo kyuuseki kankou supotto saizi saizi
ootuti zyousi ootuti siroyama kouennai niaru zyousi. honmaru si, ni no kaku si, san no kaku si nado gaaru. hourai sima houraizima ootuti wannai niaru sima de, hyokkorihyoutan sima no moderu tonatta sima. nami ita kaigan namiita kaigan nami ita kaigan kaisuiyokuzyou kaesi nami ga nai kotode yuumei na saafin ga sakan na kaigan.
kirikiri kaigan kirikiri kaigan kaigan
kirikiri kaigan kaisuiyokuzyou
kirikiri fissyariina
miya no kuti hangan dou minamotoyositune itigyou ga ani minamotonoyoritomo no otte kara nogare takotowo sinobi, touti no nin ga tate tatosareru si. iwateken miti gou ootuti syoukoku sen kara kanban ga mie ruga, santyuu niari syuui kara sinin sizurai. nao hangan ha yositune no yakusyoku deari, yowai mono ni taisi te douzyou wo yose ru hangan hiiki ha yositune ga kigen tosareru. ootuti daikan tokoro ato nanbu han ga kanei nen nen ni setti sita daikan tokoro no ato. katuteno ootuti syougakkou, genzai no ootuti matiyakuba sikitinai ni iti sita. minami ha hirata mura genzai no kamaisi si kara kita ha toyomane mura genzai no yamadatyou , nairiku houmen no syoukoku genzai no miyako si kou han mura made ka mura wo touti siteita. meizi nen nen ni daikan seido ga haisi sare, genzai hasorewo simesu sekihi ga matiyakuba nantou gawa no kouen ni tatu nomidearu. nao, sono sekihi gaaru kouen tyuuou niha ike gaari, hyoutan katati wosita nakano sima gaaru. toramai iwateken engan tihou ni huruku kara tutawa ru kyoudo geinou no hitotu. yurai ha syosetu aruga, daihyouteki namonotositeha edozidai tyuuki no gousyou maekawa zenbee ga edo he kaisen de kaisanbutu wo ryuutuu siteita goro, sono hune no norikumiin tooru ga kinsyou monzaemon saku no zyoururi kokusenya kassen wo kangeki si, sono itibamen dearu ootora taizi ni kandou sita. korewo kokyou ni kaetu te sousaku buyou tosi, kami ni hounou sitato tutae rareteiru.
syussin tyomeizin
nidaime maekawa zenbee touri mei kirikiri zenbee syounin kaisen tonya . nensei mare. mitinoku kuni ha morioka hanryou no kirikiri mura gen iwateken ootuti mati kirikiri syussin. itizoku ha sagami kuni gen kanagawaken no syutu noti houzyousi haika .
ootuti magohati rou busi ootuti zyousyu . kaisen gyousyu.
matuhasi ki otoko tougou zinzya meiyo guuzi. kozuti zinzya negi.
kositatetuhiro mangaka. kirikiri tiku syussin.
sasaki katuhiko mangaka. kirikiri tiku syussin.
satou hiro bi singaasonguraitaa singaasonguraitaa
nakamura ryuutoku irasutoreetaa. sakuragityou tiku syussin.
himegami yuri gurabiaaidoru.
yamaguti tomomi kyuu geimei yamazaki yumi enkakasyu. kirikiri tiku syussin.
heiya hitosi kakutouka. nami ita tiku syussin.
miti no ku kyoudai enkakasyu. kirikiri tiku syussin.
usu sawa misaki kasyu kasyu
sono hokano kanren zisyou
