kyakutyuu
gaibu rinku
takemura youko kabusikigaisya kikaku ueibakkumasin nen gatu niti aakaibu hun
takemura youko tyuuou housou kenkyuukai nyuususukuranburu syutuen touzi no purofiiru ga kisaisa reteiru. saveiziamyuuzumento gendai ha, doitu no no
haadorokkuguruupusukoopionzu no maime no sutazioarubamu. nen ririisu. honsaku ga saigo no diitaadaakusupurodeyuusu sakuhin.
syuurokukyoku
sanka myuuzisyan
sukoopionzukurausumaine riidobookaru riidobookaru
mateiasuyapusu riidogitaa, rizumugitaa, suraidogitaa, akoosuteikkugitaa, tookubokkusu tookubokkusu
rudoruhusienkaa rizumugitaa, riidogitaa, suraidogitaa, akoosuteikkugitaa, bakkingubookaru bakkingubookaru
huransisubufhuhorutu beesu, bakkingubookaru .
haamanrareberu doramusu, paakassyon, bakkingubookaru . gesutoriiaaron bakkingubookaru .
piitaabarutesu intorobookaru .
syutten saikai mati nisiumityouha, ehimeken no nanyo tihou niatta mati dearu.
nen no minamiuwa gun zentai deno gappei niyori, zititai tositeno saikai mati ha syoumetu sita.
syouwa nendai niha zinkou ga , nin wo koe teitaga, koutuu zyouken nado ni meguma rezu, gappei mae niha , zindai heto kaso ga susun deita.
tiri
iti tikei
uwa sima si kara kokudou gou wo zidousya de yaku zikan nanka. hunakosi han sima nanbu nohobo tyuuou niaru gongen yama wo tyuusin tosita tiiki de, syuui no kozima izuremo muzin sima wo hukumu. kaigan ni sotte han sima wo issyuu suru kendou gaari, ensen noikutukano irie niha gyogyou syuuraku ga keisei sareteiru. kaigan hahotondoga iso deari, sono okiai no tasuu no kozima ya ha ha kouryou ba tonatteiru. kasima ha kankouti tositemo sira reteiru.
hunakosi, kuge, sita kuge, tarumi, taisei kawa, syousei kawa, hukuura, mugi ke ura, musya haku, gaihaku, nakadomari, nai haku, kosida, koura, yumi ritu, kasizuku kasizuku nado ni gyogyou syuuraku gaaru. takasi, musya haku no basu tei, dourohyousiki no hyouki hamusyadomaridaga zimoto no nin habisyadoto yobu.
yama gongen yama hyoukou .
sima kasima, yokosima, nozi sima nadoizuremo muzin sima
tyoumei no yurai
nen syouwa nen no tyousei sikou no saini, koubo, koutyoukai wo kaisai sitatokoro saikai mati ga tasuu no sizi wo eta kotokara meimei. sore izen nokotoha rekisi no kou sansyou.
rekisi
kodai tyuusei tyuusei
iseki nado gahotondonaku, touti no tyuusei izen no rekisi ha mikaimei dearu. gorin tou ga nokotu teirukotokara tyuusei niha touti ni nin ga sumi tui teitakotoga suisatu sareruga, nendai ha sadaka denai. bungo suidou ni mensi tukidasi ta tikei de, mata hune kakusi nimo tekisi teirukotokara, tyuusei kara suigun no toride tosite riyou sareteitatomomirareruga, iyo kuni ni zokusi teitaka tosa kuni ni zokusi teitaka meikaku na siryou hanai.
nen hukuura ga hiraka retatono densyou gaaru.
heike no otiudo densetu gaaru. koura, hunakosi, musya haku nado hansei ki ki
hansei ki niha uwa sima han no ryouti de misyou kuni zokusi, touti, hunakosi han sima no nanbu kara sukumo nikaketeno ittai ha gaikai ura to yoba reteita. meiziikou meiziikou
nen meizi nen syouya ga minsen sei tonattaga, mutouhyou de kyuu syouya gasonomama minsen syouya tosite toma ttakotowokikkaketosite, kaneteyorino syouya no senou no human moari, sonmin no hanpatu tuyoma ru.
nen meizi nen gatubun ri dokurituundou ga hunakosi ura no suzuki kihatirou rawo tyuusin ni hassei. syouya ha to tairitu si, suzuki raha itizi tora eraretaga, uwa sima keisatusyo made motikoma reta kekka, kyuu syouya ha no gikei ga hakkaku, dounen gatu, kyuu syouya ha ha syobatu sareta. kono kekka, higasi gaikai ura kara bunri, saikai mati ni soutou suru hunakosi, kuge, hukuura, nai haku hokano ka ura ga nisi gaikai ura to yoba reruyouninatta.
nen meizi nen gatu niti tyouson sei sikou niyori nisi gaikai mura tonaru. yakuba wo zi hunakosi nioku.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti tyousei sikou, kaisyou site saikai mati tonaru.
nen syouwa nen iwasiami no huryou, tyoumin tasuu ga senin ni tengyou. ikou, ippon turi ryou nohoka, hamati taguhe no kaimen yousyoku gyou heno tenkan ga kokoromi rareru.
nen heisei nen gatu niti minamiuwa gun zentai katyouson no gappei niyori ainan mati ga seiritu si, zititai tositeno rekisi wo tozi ta. saikai mati no keihu keihu
tyouson sei zissi izen no mura meiziki syouwa no gappei heisei no gappei
tyouson sei sikou toki syouwa nen gatu niti tyousei sikou sikou
nisi gaikai ura nisi gaikai mura saikai mati
utumi mura heisei nen gatu niti niti
misyou mati sinsetu gappei gappei
gusukube mati ainan mati mati
ipponmatu mati
tyuuki utumi mura hokano gappei izen no keihu hasorezoreno tyouson no kizi wo sansyou nokoto.
tiiki
syuuraku ha, taihuu ya kisetuhuu nozoke notame, taihan ha hunakosi han sima mataha saikai han sima to yobu kotomoaruno kita mataha higasigawa ni iti siteiru.
nisi gaikai mura seirituzi kara ooaza hanaku, kyuu no zimei wo keisyou si, no ziga atta.
kosida kosida, yumi ritu yudati, koura koura, kasizuku kasizuku, hunakosi hunakosi, kuge hisage, sita kuge simohisage, tarumi tarumi, taisei kawa oonarukawa, syousei kawa konarukawa, hukuura hukuura, mugi ke ura mugigaura, musya haku musyadomari, gaihaku sotodomari, nakadomari nakadomari, nai haku utidomarino no zi dearu. nao, timei hyouki ha, heisei no gappei niyori ainan mati tonattemo, saikai mati touzi nomama, saikai mati wo ainan mati to okikaete taiou siteiru.
rei saikai mati kosida ainan mati kosida kosida
gyousei
saigo no tyoutyou nakada kou nakata hirosi hirosi
heisei no sityouson gappei gappei
saikai mati nitotte kouiki gyousei wotomoni itte kita minamiuwa gun zentai deno gappei ni mattaku izon hanaku, gappei kyougi mo sumuuzu ni susun da.
keizai sangyou
syuryoku sangyou ha suisan gyou. huruku ha, katuo maguroryou, aruiha engan deno ippon turi ryou de seikei wo tate teitaga, yousyoku gizyutu ga dounyuu sare, yousyoku ni ututu teitta. wannai deha gyorui no yousyoku ga sakan de, hamati, tai nado no yousyoku ga okonawa reteiru. yousyoku ikada no narabu koukei ha, sudeni gyoson keikan no itibu tomonarinazindeiru. saikai no yousyoku gyou ha, kigyou tekina taisitu gaari, gyogyou kyoudoukumiai heno izon ha sukunai noga tokutyou dearu.
nao, genzai demo ippon turi ha kenzai dearu. hukin no kaiiki ha kouryou ba tosite sira re, ooku no turi kyaku ga sikoku soto karamo otozure ru. sikasinagara, sousita yuugyo tono kyouzon, sigen kanri, kaiyoukankyou hozen ga kadai tonatteiru.
nougyou ha, keiei kouti menseki zero nen dearuyouni, gyou dearuka gimon na zyoukyou dearu. yama gasutonto umi ni otikomu youna tikei de heiti gahotondonaku, zyuukyo no mawari nowazukana hatake de ukon, imo rui nado ga zikyuuzisoku tekini itonama reteiru teido de, kome yasai nado no taihan ha tatiiki ni izon siteiru. wazuka na zika saien nimo, saru ya inosisi no higai gaarutoiu.
sono hokano sangyou tositeno kankou ha kouzyutu.
kyouiku
tyounai ni koutougakkou hanai. ehimeken ritu minamiuwa koutougakkou noaru misyou gusukube made deru hituyou gaaru.
tyuugakkou hukuura tyuugakkou hukuura , saikai tyuugakkou hunakosi , syougakkou hukuura syougakkou, hunakosi syougakkou, nisiura syougakkou nai haku haikou nisiura tyuugakkou oyobi hunakosi tyuugakkou tougou site sinsetu no saikai tyuugakkou tonaru tarumi syougakkou, musya haku syougakkou syougakkou
koutuu
kokudou gou kara saikai yuuryoudouro genzai ha muryou kaihou wo keiyu surunoga itiban no tikamiti.
hokani, kaki no kendou nohoka, kyuu misyou matizyuu ura houmen karamo kyouai nagara zidousya no toure ru douro gaaru.
tetudou
tyounai ni tetudou hanai.
douro
kokudou kokudou
tyounai ni kokudou hanai.
kendou kendou
kendou gou gou
kankou
kankou ha suisan gyou igai nikoretoitta sangyou nonai touti iki nioite ooi ni kitai gakakerareta. tokuni, kaityuu ni sango muraga kakuninsa retakotoniyori, kaityuu tenbou hune gurasubooto no tounyuu nado niyori, mati mizukara ga kankouzigyou wo itonan dekita.
sikasinagara, tousyo nomokuromi touri no seikou wo osame teirutoha iigatai. sono riyuu ha kaki notoori. izurenisitemo, kankou no tate naosi, arata na ekotuurizumu nado no dounyuu ga kadai tonatteiru. tada, kadai na kankou kanren no hakomono tousi wositeiruwakedehanaku, sono ten deha kankou no yume yabure itade wo uke, mati zaisei ga ooi ni itan deiruwakedehanai.
han sima sentan no taka sigeru misaki ha, asizurimisaki ni hitteki suru danseiteki kaigansen wo moti, huukoumeibi de tokuni kyuusyuusanti heno nitibotu huukei ha zekkei dearu.
kongo no kankousigen tosite kitaisa reru. gatukoro niha gunsei suru nozigiku ga utukusiku, aikousya no kan dehatutoni yuumei dearu. genzai tenboudai oyobi sinsyousya yousui sen toire nado seibi sareteiru. hunakosi yori, nisi mawari de hodo hodo
tokai kara tooku hanare ta enkakuti deari, kyori no handi gaaru.
kokudou gou kara mati heno akusesu douro ga, yuuryoudouro deari, kono ten mo nekku tosareta. ippandouro wo touru ruuto moaruga, kyouai de, kukkyoku ga ooku, sengyo unpan kuruma nado no rigou mosibasiba hassei. tadasi, nen gatu niti ni muryou kaihou sareta.
umi ni tayotu teori, kaki ni gentei sareruue, tenkou nimo sayuu sareru kankou siizun ga mizikaku, sikamo kazusukunai natu no kyuuzitu ni taihuu nado ga raisyuu suruto, daidageki wo koumuru .
kaze no huku ura hukuura , nami no utidoma ri nai haku to iwa reruyouni, touki no kyouhuu ya sike ha souzou wo zessu rumonogaaru.
yousyoku ga sakan ninaruni ture te, kaiyoukankyou ga akka si toumeido ga teika sita.
sango wo kui arasu kai ga hassei si, sango gun ni higai ga hassei sita.
douyou ni, taihuu no aranami niyori kaityuu no sango ga itami, syouhinkati ga teika sita. kankouti meisyo kyuuseki kyuuseki
kasima udoto yoba reru kaisyoku gake gamirareru gamirareru
taka sigeru misaki koumomisaki, isigaki no sato gaihaku tiku , uwami kaityuukouen sango gun, kaityuu tenbou hune , ubamegasi gunsei, hiyou kuzirazuka syukuhakusisetu minsyuku suuken turi yado kengyou de sakanaryouri wo urimono nisiteirutokoroga ooi ibento maturi maturi
kaityuukouen maturi, hotaru sansettouottingu kasima , gionmaturi, usi maturi kuge
tokusanbutu tokusanbutu
kaisanbutu mezasi, iriko, surume, moika no itiya kan, utubo, hugutyoutin, kaizaiku nado nado
bunka syuppan
kaoru kusunoki syuu senryuu kawasaki hyaku kusunoki kusunoki
kanrenkoumoku
ehimeken no haisi sityouson itiran itiran
gaibu rinku
ehimeken minamiuwa gun saikai mati rekisiteki gyouseiku iki deetasetto beta han ripozitoriwareriiiwanobittiwasiriehu rosia go aleriy vanovich asilev, raten mozi tensya , nen gatu niti nen gatu niti ha, sobieto renpou no goorikii gen nizininovugorodo syussin no moto aisuhokkee sensyu. pozisyon ha difensuman.
sobieto renpou riiguoorusutaageemu ni kai sensyutu sare, aisuhokkeesobieto renpou daihyou de nenkan purei, kyaputen wo tutome takotomoaru. kare to uraziimiruruuchenko, wareriiharuramohu, uraziimirupetorohu, borisumihairohu no yunitto ha suupaa to yoba reta.
keireki
mosukuwa niaru supootusosaeteii de kitae rareta. sobieto renpou daihyou tosite aisuhokkee sekaisensyuken de do kin medaru wo kakutoku, doudai kai de kai taikai oorusutaa ni eraba re, mata nen, nen, nen niha saiyuusyuu syubi sensyu ni eraba reta. orinpikku deha sapporo orinpikku, insuburukkuorinpikku de kin medaru, reekupurasiddoorinpikku de gin medaru, hokani nen no samittosiriizu, nen kanadakappu, nen kanadakappu nadoni syutuzyou siteiru. nen kanadakappu deha kyaputen wo tutome ta.
genekiintaigo no nen kara nen made dinamomosukuwa no zyuniatiimu no kooti, sono noti doitu deno kooti wo hete nen niha suparutakumosukuwa no asisutantokooti ni syuunin, nen niha hokkee no dendou iri wo hata sita.
mata nen ni roudou akahata kunsyou wo zyuyo sareteiru.
nen gatu niti, byouki notameni sikyo. tosi botu.
pureisutairu
so ren kokunai deha fizikaru ni tahu dearukototo kitanai purei wosuruto hyouka sareteitaga, nen no samittosiriizu wo kansen sita supooturaitaa no niyoruto kanada sensyu ni kurabe teharukani kuriinhitto siteitato hyousa reta. sobieto renpou aisuhokkee sizyou mottomo tahu na difensuman to mira reteori, hitobito ni teimuhooton wo omoidasa seta. arekuseikasatonohu ya vuyachesurahufeteisohu noyouna kougekiryoku ha mota nakattagayori masare ta bougyoryoku wo hokotu ta. aitesensyu ha kare to taizi surunowo iyaga rareta. kareha sono pureisutairu kara sensyu to taisen surunowo tanosi ndeori, nen no samittosiriizu, nen tyarenzikappu, nen kanadakappu nadode ueinguretukii, giirahureeru, maaserudion rato taisen siteiru.
syousaizyouhou
kiroku
sobieto renpou riigu siai riigu kiroku syutuzyou, gooru gooru
sobieto renpou daihyou siaisyutuzyou, gooru gooru
kyakutyuu
gaibu rinku
h rosia go
eigo
eigo siti mentai sitimentai, nanamentai, ei toha, tuno men karanaru tamentai dearu.
gokaku hasira ya rokkaku sui ha ooku no nin ga siru siti mentai dearuga, siti mentai ha hokani mo samazamana keizyou nomonogaari, totu siti mentai dakedemo syurui no toporozii tekini kotonaru monoga sonzai suru.
zyonson no rittai no naka deha syouzou kakusui hasira nomiga ate hamaru.
kanzyou tamentai tositeha, nen ni hakken sareta sirassi no tamentai gaaru.
men dousino ziko kousa wo yuruse ba, itiyou tamentai mugenkei retu wo nozoi ta baai deha simen han roku mentai nomiga ate hamaru.
omona siti mentai
kanrenkoumoku
nanakaku katati katati
kyakutyuu niitaka seika niitakaseikaha, nippon touti sitani atta taiwan taihoku si ni honsya wo oi teita seika kaisya. sagaken kitayama mura genzai no sagasi huzi mati syussin no kasi syou mori heitarou ga sougyou sita. niitaka doroppu ya bananakyarameru nadode yuumei de, senzen ha morinagaseika, meiziseika to tomoni sandai kasi meekaa tomo ezakiguriko wo kuwae te dai kyarameru tomo iwa retaga, nen no mori no botugo ha zidai no nami ni norikire zu, nen syouwa nen ni haigyou sita.
rekisi
nen meizi nen ni taiwan ni watatu ta mori heitarou ga nen meizi nen ni sougyou sita. syamei ha taiwan no saikouhou niitaka yama touzi no nihonmei, genzai no tamayama kara nazuketa. kyarameru ya doroppu nado tayou na wayou kasi wo uridasi, nipponhondo ya tyuugokutairiku nimo sinsyutu sita. nen syouwa nen goroniha kokusan saisyoki tonaru tyuuingamu no seizou nimo sinsyutu. nen syouwa nen niha huusen gamu wo hatubai si buumu wo tukutu ta.
koukoku senden
hokano kasi meekaa to onazi ku syouhin niomakewotukeru hansoku wo itte itaga, sono ikkan de toukyou hibi sinbun ni rensaimanga wo keisai surunado katuyaku siteita nisikawa kou kura nisikawa koozoo saku no umaimon tarou ya bakudan kozou nadono manga syousassi wo hakkousi teita.
sono hoka
sougyousya no mori heitarou tosono tuma ha sakka hoppou kenzou no sousohu haha niataru. hoppou ha husai wo moderu ni syousetu boukyou no miti wo seisaku sita.
yo no zin taiko nadode sira reru kumamotoken no kasi meekaa o kasi no kaori ume no sougyousya dearu huku sima umetarou ha niitaka seika no zensin dearu itiroku ken de syugyou wo tun deita.
kyakutyuu kokonoobiarumaziro zoku ha arumaziro ka no zoku no hitotu de, kokonoobiarumaziro aka yuiitu no zoku dearu.
kokonoobiarumaziro,
nanatuobiarumaziro,
muritaarumaziro,
komukugearumaziro,
yatuobiarumaziro,
mukugearumaziro,
,
kyakutyuu kurisaki hideo kurisaki hideo, nen gatu niti ha, hukuokaken syussin no moto puro yakyuusensyu. pozisyon ha gaiyasyu.
raireki zinbutu
yanagawa syougyou koutougakkou deha goban de tyuuken te. koukouzidai no tuusan daritu ha san wari roku hun dai de hoomuran ha hon utu teiru.
nen no dorahuto de nankai hookusu kara kurai de simei sare nyuudan.
itigun kousikisen ni syutuzyou surukotohanaku, kyuudan kara taidan wo iiwatasa reta.
syousaizyouhou
nendo betu tousyu seiseki
itigun kousikisen syutuzyou nasi nasi
sebangou
nen nen
kanrenkoumoku
hukuoka sohutobankuhookusu no sensyuitiran tougei tougei, ei toha, nendo wo seikei site kouon de syousei surukotoniyori touziki nadowo tukuru gizyutu nokoto. touziki igai nimo syurui haaru. yaki monotomo yoba reru. nariwai tosite tougei wo okonau mono wo toukou mosikuha tougeika to yobu.
yaki monoha seyuu sinai doki oyobi kouon de syousei sita sekki to, seyuu sita touziki touki to ziki toni taibetu sareruga, kono kubun niha tiiki ya bunka niyoribaratukigaari, oubei deha seyuu saretamonomo sekki sutoonuea ni hukumi, mata tyuugoku deha doki to touki wo kubetu sinai.
zoukei houhou niha, te bineri, kata wo motiite tuti no katati wo totonoe ru houhou, rokuro rokurono ueni oki teasi ya kikai de mawasi nagara ryoute de sara ya tubo nadono katati wo tukutu teiku houhou nadogaaru. yaki hou niha, kama wo motii nai no yaki ya, sitirin wo motii ru sitirin tougei nadotoiu syuhou moaru. tuti no syurui yakone hou, yuu, sosite yaku ondo nado, samazamana youso ga sakuhin ni kouken suru. sitagatte, sekaizyuu niiroirona gihou ga sonzai suru.
tougei ha zinrui nomottomo hurui tekunorozii oyobi geizyutu keisiki noutinohitotudeari, kyou monao syuyou na sangyou deari tuzuke teiru. koukogakusya tatinoyoru teigi deha, ningyou nadono utuwa dehanaimonoya, rokuro niyotte tukura retanodehanaimonoha, douyou no katei de, osorakuha onazi hitobito niyotte tukura reta seramikkusu seihin deattemo tougei hin ni hukume nai keikou niaru.
taido
tougei deha, nendo no sozi taido wo motome ru sinamono no sugata ni seikei si, kama de kanetu surukotode kyoudo wo takame, kouka sase, katati wo kotei saseru tokini ha kihou notame koware tesimaukotomoaru. tougei ni motii rareru sozai no seisitu niha tiiki niyori ooki na barieesyon gaari, konotameni kakutiiki ni dokutoku no yaki monoga umare ru. aru mokuteki ni tekisi ta taido wo eru tameni nendo tosono hokano kakusyu sozai ga kongou sarerukotoga hutuu dearu.
seikei wo okonau mae ni, taido no nakani itutu ta kuuki wo torinozoku hituyou gaaru. kono sagyou ha dakki to yoba re, sinkuu tutineri ki wo tukau ka, mosikuha tede tuti momi tutineri risite okonawa reru. tuti momi niha taido zentai no suibun ganryou wo kinitu nisuru hataraki moaru. taido no dakki tuti momi ga sumu to, samazamana gihou wo motiite seikei ga okonawa reru. seikei sita taido ha yaku mae ni kansou sareru. kansou nihaikutukano dankai gaaru. hankan ki ha suibun gaoyoso no dankai wo sasu. kono dankai no taido ha hizyouni kengo de, kasosei ha ookiku nai. kezuri ya, totu teno tori tukenadohakono dankai de okonawa rerukotoga ooi. zettai kansou ha suibun gahobo tonatta dankai wo sasu. yaku mae nomonoha nama sozi to yoba reru. kono dankai no taido ha hizyouni zei ku, kantan ni koware tesimau.
seikei no houhou
tougei no seikei nihasamazamana houhou gaaru.
te bineri
te bineriha saisyoki kara sonzai sita syuhou dearu. tama, himo himo tukuri nadono katati wosita nendo wo tede konete katati wo tukuru. hokani, itazyou ni nobasi ta nendo tatara wotunagi awa setari sara zyouni seikei sitarisuru tatara seikei ya, naka wokuri nui ta nendo kai wotunagi awa serukuri turanuki toitta syuhou gaaru.
tede seikei sita utuwa no buhin ha, taido to mizu no suisei kendaku eki dearu surippu deisyou wo motiite ketugou sarerukotoga ooi. te bineriha rokuro niyoru seikei yori zikan gakakaruga, utuwa no ookisa ya katati woyorikime komakaku seigyo surukotogadekiru. zinsoku de hanpuku siyasuihokano gihou ha teeburuuea noyounapittari atu ta soroi no utuwa wo tukuru noniyori tekisi teiru ippou de, tada tusikanai geizyutusakuhin wo umidasu niha te binerino houga yoito kangae ru tougeika tatimoiru.
rokuro
rokuro niyoru seikei deha, nendo no tama ga kagami ban to yoba reru kaiten dai no tyuuou ni oka re, korewo toukou ga bou, asi, mosikuha sokudo wo seigyo dekiru dendouki wo motiite kaiten saseru.
kyuusoku ni kaiten suru rokuro no uede, yawarakai nendo no tama ga tede osa re, tubusa re, zyouhou mosikuha sotogawa heto hika re, kuudou noaru katati ga tukura reteiku. arai nendo no tama wo kahou to utigawa ni osi te kanzen na kaitentaisyou tosuru saisyo no koutei ha kokoro dasi tuti korosi to yoba re, ikou no koutei ni iru mae ni syuutoku subeki zyuuyouna ginou dearu. sorekara, ana wo hirake, hiroge, soko wo tukuri, hekimen wo hiki age, atumi wo kintou nisi, kiri soroe te katati wo totonoe, asi wo tukuru nadotoitta sagyou wo okonau.
rokuro niyori ittei suizyun no utuwa wo tukuru tamenihakanarino ginou to zyukuren wo yousi, takai geizyututeki kati wo motu sakuhin mo tukuridase ru ippou de, saigensei niha tobosii. kaiten niyoru seikei toiu seisituzyou, enkei no kaitentaisyou katati sika tukuru kotogadekinai. seikei no noti, kata osi, moriage, senkoku, mizo hori, tyoukoku nadoga hodokosa rerukotomoaru. toukou no teno hoka, hera, kanatoko to ribu, setuzyo ya anaake kenotameno naihu, kanna, kiri ito nadomo motii rareru. sarani totu te, huta, asi, sosogi kuti nadowo tori tukerukotomoaru.
huntai seikei
huntai seikei ha, ryuuzyou nisita hankan kino nendo wo kata ni ire aturyoku wokakete seikei suru houhou dearu. nendo ha syoukou noaru daisu niyotte kata ni osi koma re, syoukou wo tousi kouatu no mizu ga tyuunyuu sareru. hunmu kansou niyori, hodono suibun wo hukumu seisai de zizai ni nagare ru kona ryuutai no nendo ga tukura re motii rareru. huntai seikei ha tairu no seizou ni hiroku motii rareruhoka, sara nimo motii rareruyouninaritutuaru.
syasyutu seikei
syasyutu seikei ha netu kasosei zyusi ya kinzokubu hin no seikei ni naganen motii raretekita houhou de, syokki sangyou nimo ouyou sareruyouninatta. hukuzatu na katati wosita hinmoku no tairyouseisan ni muku kono gihou no ooki na riten nohitotuha, teiikappu wo totu te mo hukume tuno purosesu de seisan dekirukotodeari, totu te wo torituke ru koutei ga habuke runominarazuyori zyoubu namonoga tukure ru. seikei daisu niha no hituzi syousei no toudo no huntai to, ketugou zai, zyunkatuzai, kaso zai naranaru no yuuki tenkazai tono kongoubutu ga kyoukyuu sareru. kono gihou hahokano seikei hou hodo hiroku ha siyousa reteinai.
zigaringu to zyoriingu
zigaringu to zyoriingu ha rokuro no uede okonawa re, utuwa wo kakuituteki na katati nisurunonikakaru zikan wo tansyuku suru. zigaringu ei ha, rokuro no ueno sekkou kata ni setto sareta taido ni, seikei sita kougu wo sessyokusa seru sousa dearu. zigaa kougu ga ippou no men wo, kata ga tahou no men wo seikei suru. zigaringu ha sara noyouna taira na utuwa no seisan ninomi motii rareruga, kappu noyouna hukami noaru utuwa horoouea nimokoreni ruizi sita gihou dearu zyoriingu ei ga motii rareru. korerano gihou ha osoku tomo seiki niha tougei ni motii rareteita. kouzyou deno tairyouseisan deha tuuzyou koreraha zidouka sareteori, hanzyuku ren roudou niyotte sougyou surukotoga kanou tonatteiru.
rooraaheddomasin
rooraaheddomasin ha zyoriizigaa douyou ni kaiten suru kata no uede seikei wo okonau ga, zigaa kougu no kotei sareta purofiiru no kawari ni kaitensiki no seikei gu ga siyousa reru. kaitensiki no seikei sonaha seikei sareru utuwa to onazi hankei no asai ensui deari, seizou suru utuwa no haimen no katati ni tukura reteiru. seizou suru seihin no ookisa nimoyoruga, hun ni ko hodowo hikakuteki tanzyunna roudou niyotte seikei surukotogadekiru. kono gizyutu ha dainizisekaitaisen tyokugo no igirisu de saabisuenziniaazu sya niyori kaihatu sare, suguni sekaizyuu no seizougyousya ni saiyou sareta. kyou mo taira na utuwa hurattouea seizou no syuryuu deari tuzuke teiru.
aturyoku ikomi mi
tokubetu ni kaihatu sareta koubunsizairyou niyori, . megapasukaru madeno gaiatu ni tae ru kata wo tukuru kotogadekiru. koreha mousai kan tikara ga . . hodono aturyoku soutou tonaru sekkou kata deno surippu ikomi miyorimoharukani ooki na atai dearu. kouatu ha hizyouni kousoku na ikomi mi sokudo womotarasi, yotte seizou saikuru mo hayaku naru. sarani, ikomi mi mono wo toridasu saini koubunsizairyou no kata ni kouatu no kuuki wokakerukotode, onazi kata de sokuza ni tugino ikomi mi saikuru wo kaisi surukotogadekiru. sekkou kata deha kansou ni tyouzikan wo yousu runodearu. mata koubunsizairyou ha sekkou yorimoharukani taikyuusei ni masare runode, yoriyoi sunpou kyoyou sa wo motu seikeihin wo tukuru kotogadeki, kata no zyumyou mozutto nagai. aturyoku ikomi miha nendai ni eisei touki seisan notameni kaihatu saretaga, kinnen deha teeburuuea nimo ouyou sareruyouninatteiru.
syoukibo na koubou nadodeha, rokuro de mizu hiki sita sozi wo kata ni ire tatai te seikei suru kata uti, kata oko sito yoba reru houhou ga okonawa reteiru. rokuro seikei niha tekisa nai sara ya hati no seisan ni mui ta syuhou deari, nippon dehaomoni ziki no seisan ni tukawa re edozidai syoki kara arida yaki nadode okonawa reteiru.
ramu ikomi mi
ramu ikomi miha, syoukou noaru tuno ikomi mi ita no kan de tyougou sita taido ni kaatu site teeburuuea ya sousyokuhin wo seikei suru kouzyou deno koutei dearu. kaatu notini ha, ikomi mi ita kosi ni assyukukuuki wo huki tukerukotode seikei sitamonowo torihazusu.
surippu ikomi mi
surippu ikomi mi surippukyasuteingu, deisyou ikomi miha touki no tairyouseisan nisibasiba motii rareru houhou de, hokano syudan deha seikei dekinaiyounamonono seizou nimo risouteki dearu. taido wo mizu de usume tamonodearu surippu deisyou ga kyuusyuusei no takai sekkou kata heto sosogi koma reru. surippu no suibun ha kata ni kyuusyuu sare, kata no hyoumen nisono katati wosita taido no sou ga nokoru nodearu. amatu ta surippu ha kata kara zyokyo sare, sorekara kata wo hirai te mokuteki no katati tonatta buttai wo toridasu. surippu ikomi miha eisei touki no seisan ni hiroku tukawa reruhoka, hukuzatu na katati no ningyou noyounayori tiisai sinamono nimo tukawa reteiru.
sousyoku to seyuu
sousyoku
tougei deha ikano monowohazimetosurusamazamana houhou de sousyoku ga okonawa reru.
taido no hyoumen ni kizamu nadosite monyou wo ire ru ru
yuu sita sai sitae tuke niyoru sousyoku. sometuke nado.
yuu naka sai ingureezu
yuu ue sai uwae tuke
hou rou rou
neri komi
taido wo seikei suru mae ni nanika wo neri kon deokukotode, yaki mononi nozomu kouka wo umidasu kotogadekiru. suna ya syamotto yai ta nendo wo hunsai sitamonotoitta zarazara sita maze mono ga, kanseihin ni motome ru situkan wo dasu tameni motii rarerukotogaaru. taisyouteki na syoku no nendo ya syamotto wo monyou wo tukuridasu tameni motii rukotomoaru. kinzoku sankabutu ya tansan sio nadono ganryou wo tandoku mataha hukugou sasete kuwae, motome ru syoku wo eru kotomosareru. kanenbutu no syouhen wo taido ni kuwae, mosikuha hyoumen ni osi tukerukotoniyottemo situkan wo umu kotogadekiru.
agaatouea
agaatouea menou yaki ha syoku no tigau taido wo, kokono syoku ga usinawa retesimawanai teido ni kongou site tukura reru. hukusuu no sikisai no obi mosikuha sou ga konzenittai tonatta sekiei koubutu dearu menou kara nazuke rareta. dokutoku no simamoyou ya han moyou wo motu. agaatouea ha igirisu nomonowo sasu kotoba dearu. nippon deha ren age te to yoba reru. tyuugoku deha toudai yorikono tane no yaki monoga tukura reteori, to yoba reru. agaatouea wo tukuru saini motii ru taido no sentei niha saisin no tyuui ga hituyou de, netu idou tokusei ga turi atu teinakerebanaranai.
bandingu
bandingu mataha rainingu ha, te mosikuha kikai de sara ya kappu no heri ni syoku no obi wotukerukotowo sasu. rokuro de okonawa rerukotoga ooi.
tuyadasi si
ki, tetu, sekisei no yougu wo tukai syousei mae ni hyoumen wo migaku kotode, syousei notini mo nokoru tuya wo tukuridasu kotogadekiru. seisai na taido wo motii ruka, taido ga nakaba kansou site suibun wohotondo hukuma nai zyoutai dekorewo okonau kotode, kiwamete tuya noaru yaki monowo tukuru kotoga kanou dearuga, kono zyoutai nomonoha hizyouni zeizyaku deari, hason sitesimau risuku mo ookii. mizudome meno kouka moari, yakisime me tou ya seyuu ga okonawa reruyouninaru mae no doki dehasibasiba okonawa reta.
kesyou kake
kesyou kake engoobe ha, siramo sikuha kuriimu syoku nadono surippu de tuuzyou ha syousei mae ni yaki monono hyoumen wo oou kotodearu. sousyokuteki na mokuteki de hodokosa rerukotoga ooi ga, mata taido no kekkan wo kakusu tamenimo motii rareru. kesyou kake ha nutu te hodokosu kotomo, kinitu de nameraka na hihuku wo zitugen surutameni hitasi te hodokosu kotomodekiru. kesyou kake ha sensi zidai kara genzai made tukawa re tuzuke teiru gihou dearu. kesyou kake no itibu wo kezutu te taido no syoku wo rosyutu saseru zuguraffiito kaki oto sino gihou tomo heiyou sarerukotogaaru. syoku no tigau kesyou kake wo nizyuu ni hodokosi, ueno sou dakewo kezuru kotode sitano sou no syoku wo dasu sousyoku wo okonau kotomo sintyou ni okonae ba kanou dearu. konoyounisite motii rareru kesyou kake niha soutouryou no no
ritogurahu
ritogurahu mosikuha dekarukomanii ha isyou wo sakuhin ni tensya suru gihou dearu. ritogurahu ha tuno sou karanaru.
sousyoku dezain karanaru, syoku mosikuha zuzou no sou sou
toumei na hogo sou. tei yuuten garasu wo hukumu kotomoaru kotomoaru
sukuriin insatu mosikuha risogurafii de isyou ga insatu sareta uragami uragami wo zyokyo suru saini isyou wo tensya suru houhou nihasamazamanamonogaari, kikai niyoru seizou ni mui tamonomoaru.
kinsai
koukyuu na yaki mononiha kin niyoru sousyoku ga hodokosa rerukotomoaru.
seiyu to kinko no kendaku eki ga, youbai to suigin sio to maze awa sareru. korewo hude nadode nutu te egaku. syousei notino hassyoku ha nibuku, migai te hassyoku saseteyaru hituyou gaaru.
nendai syotou ni igirisu ha sutooku sutookuon sutookuontorento no minton no kouzyou de kaihatu sareta kinsai no gihou dearu. seyuu sita hyoumen wo kisyaku sita hutu ka suiso san de husyoku sase, sono ueni kinsai wo hodokosu. hizyouni takai ginou ga hituyou tosare, saikoukyuuhin no sousyoku nisika motii rarenai.
kin no suruhon san zyusi san sio oyobihokano kinzoku no zyusi san sio to youbai tokaranaru youeki wo motii ru. syousei tyokugo kara sousyoku ga kagayaki, kenma suru hituyou ganaikotokarakono mei gaaru.
huruku karaaru kinsai no houhou dearu. kinpaku wo sio ya satou totomoni suri tuke, sorekara suiyousei bussitu wo arai nagasu. isuraamu no tougei deha kinsai ni nita kagayaki wo motu rasutaa sai ga okonawa retaga, koreha dou ya gin no sankabutu wo motii ru.
seyuu
yuu ha yaki monono garasu situ no kooteingu dearu. sousyoku to hogo woomona mokuteki tosuru. takousitu no yaki monono utuwa wo, mizu yasono hokano ekitai ga somi dasa naiyounisurukotomo zyuuyouna yakuwari dearu. yuu ha kotai nomonowomabusitari, yuuyaku to mizu no usui kendaku eki wo huki kake tari hitasi tari nagasi tari hake de nutu tarisite hodokosa reru. syousei suru mae to noti todeha yuu no syoku ha ookiku tigau baai moaru. syousei no saini seyuu sita sakuhin ga kama no bihin nikuttuitesimawanuyou, sakuhin no itibu asi nadoni seyuu sinai bubun wo nokosi teokuka, aruiha supuuru hama to yoba reru taikasei no sizi karada ga motii rareru. hama ha syousei ga owa ruto torihazusa re haiki sareru.
tokusyu na seyuu hou ni ikano monogaaru.
sio yuu syousei nakani, enka natoriumu ga kama ni ire rareru. sio ha kouon notame kihatu si, yaki monono hyoumen ni taiseki site taido to hannou si aruminokei san natoriumu no yuu wo keisei suru. seiki niha kateiyou no touki no seisan ni sio yuu ga motii rareteita. kyou deha, itibu no tougeika ga okonau nomitonatteiru. sio yuu no gesuidou kan no seisan ga daikibo na siyou no saigo no rei de, taikiosen no mondai notameni okonawa renakunatta.
kaiyuu syokubutu wo nensyou site deta hai ga yuu no youzai no seibun tosite motii rareru. hai ha kama no nenryou no moe nokori ga motii rarerukotoga hutuu dearuga, kousaku mono nogomino hai ga motii rareteita kanousei mo kenkyuu sareteiru. nenryou no hai ga ori kakarihitorideni yuu ga keisei saretamonoha sizen yuu to yoba reru. kaiyuu ha kyokutou nioite rekisiteki zyuuyousei gaaruga, amerika gassyuukoku no katooba tani no tougei nadodemo syoukibo ni okonawa reteitatoiu houkoku gaaru. genzai deha, sozai no kahen sei kara kuru yoki dekinai kouka ni kati wo oku itibu no tougeika ga okonau nomitonatteiru.
syousei
syousei ha taido ni hukagyaku na henka womotarasu. syousei wo hete hazimete sakuhin ha yaki monotonaru. teion syousei deha, taido nakano arai hunmatu dousi ga setten de toke au syouketu toiu henka ga oko ru. tigatu ta sozai ga tukawa re, yori takai ondo de syousei sareru ziki nioiteha, kousei seibun no buturiteki kagakuteki koubutu gakuteki seisitu ni ooki na henka ga oko ru. izureno baai mo, syousei no mokuteki ha touziki wo koukyuuteki ni kouka saserukotodeari, syousei hou ha motii ru sozai to gatti sitamonodenakerebanaranai. ooyosono meyasu tosite, touki ha tuuzyou , , , sekki ha , , , ziki ha , , de syousei sareru. sikasinagara, kama no naka deno yaki monono henka ha saikou ondo dakedenaku zikan no nagasa niyottemo eikyou sarerutame, itteizikan ha kama no saikou ondo wo tamotu kotoga okonawa rerukotoga ooi. mata zyouken wo kae te sousyoku nadowo okonau tameni suyaki kito hon yaki nado hukusuukai ni wake te syousei sarerukotomoaru. kouzyou deno tairyouseisan deha, tana noaru daisya ni nose, niti hodowokakete tonneru kama wokugurase yonetu syousei zyorei wo itido ni okonau.
syousei nakano kama no kuuki kankyou ha kanseihin no gaikan ni eikyou wo oyobo siuru. kama ni kuuki ga iru younisurukotode era reru sanka kankyou deha taido to yuu no sanka hannou ga hikioko sareru. kama heno kuuki no ryuunyuu wo seigen surukotode era reru kangen kankyou deha taido to yuu no hyoumen kara sanso ga ubawa reru. koreha yaki aga rino gaikan ni eikyou wo atae, tatoeba tetu wo hukumu yuu no nakani ha sanka kankyou deha tyairo ni, kangen kankyou deha ryokusyoku ninarumonogaaru. kama no kankyou wo tyousei surukotode, hukuzatu na kouka wo yuu ni umidasu kotogadekiru.
kama ha mokuzai, sekitan, gasu nadowo moya si, mataha denki wo motii rukotode kanetu sareru. nenryou tosite sekitan ya mokuzai wo motiita baai, kemuri susu hai ga kama ni iru kotode, hogo sareteinai yaki monono gaikan ni eikyou wo atae ru kanousei gaaru. konotame, mokuzai ya sekitan wo motii ru kama deha saya sayato yoba reru huta nodekiru touki no hako ni yaki monowo ire te hogo suru. gasu ya denki wo motii ru gendaiteki na kama hayori seizyou deari, mokuzai ya sekitan niyorumonoyori seigyo mosiyasuku, mata tanzikan de yaki age rareru baai ga ooi. nippon no dentouteki na rakuyaki oyobikoreni eikyou wo uke ta seiyou no tougei deha, yaki monohamada atui utini kama kara toridasa re, hai kami kikuzu nadono nakani ume rukotode tokutyouteki na tanka sita gaikan wo tukuridasu. kono gihou ha mareesia demo dentouteki na rabusayu to yoba reru mizusasi wo tukuru nonimo motii rareru.
rekisi
kodai
saisyoki no tougei ha tede konete taki hi de yaka reteitamonoto kangae rareteiru. syousei zikan ha mizikai ga, katyuu de era reru saikou ondo haosorakuha zengo to takaku, mata hizyouni sumiyaka ni toutatu sitamonodearou. taki hi niyoru doki niha suna, zyari, kudai ta kaigara ya doki no hahen nadowo maze ta nendo ga motii rarerukotoga ooka tta. koreniyori sozai wo araku si, nendo ni hukuma reru suibun ya kihatusei no seibun ga sizen ni housyutu sareruyounisitanodearu. nendo nai no arai ryuusi hamata reikyaku nakani oki ru yaki monono syuusyuku wo osae, netu ouryoku niyoru hason no risuku wo teigen saseru yakuwari mo hata sita. gaisi te, syoki no taki hi niyoru doki ha, hason siyasui eikaku wo sake ta marui soko wo motu kotoga ooka tta. itoteki ni tukura reta saisyo no kama ha, ana wo hotu te nenryou de ootu ta ana kama mosikuha mizo kama deatta. zimen ni hirake ta ana ha dannetu wo teikyou si, syousei wo seigyo siyasukusita.
genzon suru saiko no yaki monotosareteirunoha, kyou no cheko no dorunivesutonittue nadode hakken sareta guravetto bunka no ningyou dearu. dorunivesutonittue no viinasu ha kigenzen man man nen nomonotosareru rahu no ningyou dearu. genzai madeni hakken sareteiru naka de saiko no yaki monono utuwa tosarerumonoha tyuugokunanbu no tama sen iwa iseki kara hakkutu saretamonode, nen no beikoku kagaku akademii kiyou dehakoreraha man nenmae nisakanoborutosareteiru. kigenzen man nen goronomonotosareru, nippon no zyoumonzidai syoki no zyoumondoki mo hakken sareteiru. zyoumon toiunoha nawa no monyou gaarutoiu imi deari, nawa wo maki tuketa bou wo motiite doki no utuwa ya ningyou nitukerareta monyou kara tora reta namae dearu. kita ahurika demo kigenzen mannen ki goroni, minami amerika demo kigenzen sennen ki goronihasorezore dokuritu site tougei ga hattatu siteitayoudearu. ooku no bunkaken nioite, saisyoki no utuwa ha tede konete seikei si, mosikuha nendo wo komaku marui himozyou nisitekaratogurowo maka sete utuwa no katati nisite tukura reteita.
tyuukintou deno saisyoki no tougei seisan no rekisi ha tuno zidai ni kubun dekiru. hassuna ki kigenzen nen , harahu ki kigenzen nen , ubaido ki kigenzen nen , uruku ki kigenzen nen dearu. mesopotamia deha harahu ki niha yuuyaku ga hakken sare, ubaido ki deno rokuro no hatumei ha tougei ni kakumeiteki henka womotarasita. senmonka sita toukou tatiha sekaisaisyo ki no syoto si deno kakudai suru zyuyou ni kotae rareruyouninattanodearu. kodai indo demo meherugaru ki kigenzen nen kara sinsekkizidai douki zidai tosite sira reteiru. edozuuru utuwa tosite sira reteirumonowo hukumu indasu senryuu iki wo kigen tosuru tougei hin ga indasu bunmei no syo tiiki kara hakken sareteiru.
tityuukai engan deha, kodai girisia no ankoku zidai kigenzen nen deha anfora yasono hokano tougei hin no sousyoku ni sikaku, maru, sen toitta kikagaku monyou ga motii rareteita. kodai tyousen no kigenzen nen no ziki ha mumon doki zidai tosite sira reteiru.
tyuusei kara gendai made
seiki niha tyuugoku de siroku kataku usui hakuzi ga syutugen si, seiki niha sen yakana tousansai mo umare ta. tyuugoku no touziki ha isuraamu syounin raniyoru seramikkuroodo to yoba reru boueki ruuto ni nori nippon kara tyuutou madeno hiroi tiiki heto yusyutu sare, tintyou sare ooki na eikyou wo oyobo sita.
isuraamu no tougei deha ziki wo mohou suru doryoku ga okonawa retaga kaorin ga nyuusyu dekinakattakotonadokara hata sezu, sekiyuu wo motiite siroi touki ga tukura re, rasutaa sai ya miinaaii tena do tasai na dokuzi no gihou ga umare tougei ga ookiku sakae ta. seiki niha supein heto ryuunyuu sita musurimu no toukou tatiniyori rasutaa saitou utuwa ga tukura re isupanomoresuku touki ga tanzyou si, mata itariarunesansu wo daihyou suru sekiyuu touki dearu mayorika yaki ha mayoruka sima kara motikaera reta rasutaa saitou utuwa wo kigen tositeiru.
daikoukai zidai ninaruto keitokutin kama ni daihyou sareru tyuugoku no ziki mo tyokusetu yooroppa nimotarasareruyouninari, tyuugoku ya nippon no touziki ha bizyutuhin tosite kyuuden no ziki no kan nadoni kazara reruyouninari hyouka ga takama tta. kouhinsitu na touziki seisaku no mosaku ganasareruyouninari, deruhuto, maisen, seevuru nadono meiyou ga umare ta.
nippon de dokusouteki na tougei ga hazima runoha momoyama zidai deari, sen rikyuu ga tyatou wo midasi atarasii katikan wo uti tate takotode souzousei ga takama ri, sino ya karatu deha etuke kega okonawa reruyouninaru. edozidai ni iru to tyousen no toukou tatiniyori ziki no imari yaki ga tukura reruyouninari, meizizidai madenikake yooroppa hemo yusyutu sareta.
sangyoukakumei ni tomonai touziki mo gendaiteki na sisetu de tairyouseisan sareruyouninatteitta naka de, kinoubi wo tuikyuu suru uiriamumorisu rano aatuandokurahutu undou ga oko ri, tiisa na koubou de geizyutu mosikuha kougei tositeno tougei sutaziopottarii ga sekaizyuu de okonawa reruyouninatteiru.
koukogaku
koukogaku zinruigaku rekisigaku nioite, tougei no kenkyuu ha kako no bunka heno dousatu womotarasiuru. yaki monoha zyoubu deari, hokanoyori taikyuusei ni masare nai sinamono ga huuka site ninsiki hukanou ninattesimattazutto noti mademo, yaki monono sukunakutomo hahen ha zanson siteirukotoga ooi. hokano syouko to kumiawase rukotode, tougei no ibutu no kenkyuu hasorewo umi dasi mosikuha nyuusyu sita syakai no kousei, keizai zyoukyou, bunkateki hattatu nadoni kansu ru riron no hatten ni kiyo suru. tougei no kenkyuu kara, aru bunka niokeru nitizyouseikatu, syuukyou, syakaiteki kankei, rinzin ni taisuru sisei, zibuntati zisin no sekai ni taisuru sisei, saraniha utyuu no rikai yousiki madewomo suisoku surukotogadekiru.
tougei ni motozu ku nendai gaku ha mozi wo mota nai bunka no nendai wo sadame ru uede ha hukaketu dearukotoga ooku, rekisiteki bunka no nendai doutei nioitemosibasiba tasuke tonaru. omoni tyuuseisi housya ka niyoru biryougenso kaiseki ha taido no yurai no seikaku na doutei wo kanouni si, mata neppatu hikari siken niyori saigo ni syousei sareta ziki wo suisoku surukotomo kanou dearu. sensi zidai no yaki monono hahen no tyousa wo tuuzi, kagakusya tatiha nendo nai no tetuzai gasono ziki no tikyuu no ziba no seikaku na zyoukyou wo kiroku siteirukotowo hakken sita.
kankyoumondai
touziki no seisan niyoru kankyou heno eikyou ha suusennenmae kara sonzai siteitaga, sono itibu ha gendai no tekunorozii to seisan kibo notameni zouhuku saretekiteiru. kouryosu beki mondaiten ha tuni taibetu sareru. roudousya heno eikyou to, kankyou zentai heno eikyou dearu. roudousya heno eikyou nouti syuyou namonotositeha, okunai no kuuki situ, souon niyoru kenkouhigai, kazyou syoumei gaaru. kankyou zentai heno eikyou tositeha, nenryou no syouhi, gaibu no suisituosen, taikiosen, kikenbutu no haiki nadogaaru.
rekisiteki ni, yuuyaku wo motiita tougei deha namari tyuudoku ga zyuudaina kenkou mondai deatta. koreha sukunakutomo seiki niha ninsiki sareteori, igirisu deha toukou tatino bakuro wo seigen suru hatu no houritu ga nen ni dounyuu sareta. kyou deha tougei kankei no roudousya no risuku ha ookiku keigen sareteirutohaie, izen tosite musi dekirumonodehanai. kuuki situ ni kansi teieba, roudousya ha huyuu ryuusi zyou bussitu, issankatanso, zyuukinzoku nadoni sarasa reru kanousei gaaru. saidai no kenkou risuku ha, ni sanka kei moto no kessyou ni tyoukikan sarasa re tuzuke rukotoniyori keihai tonaru kanousei dearu. tekisetu na kanki niyori risuku ha keigen kanou deari, korewo sadame ta houritu ga igirisu de nen ni seitei sareteiru. ookurando no reiniikarejzi deno saikin no kenkyuu deha, korerano youso subeteha koubou kouzyou no kankyou no dezain niyori seigyokanou dearuto sisasi teiru.
enerugii to osenbussitu no siyou mo ooki na mondai tonaritutuaru. denki niyoru syousei no houga nenryou no nensyou niyoru syousei yori kankyou ni yasasii kotohahobo matigai naiga, hatuden no housiki niyori kankyou heno eikyou niha saga aru .
kyakutyuu
sankoubunken

nobuhara, taku zi , daredemodekiru saisin tougei kyousitu, toukyou seibundousinkousya,
peezi. tougei zissaku nyuumonyou no tekisuto. seikei te binerito rokuro , sousyoku, syousei ni kansu ru yakugo oyobi naiyou no kakunin ni motiita.
kuupaa, emanyueru , sekai no tougei si, toukyou nitibou syuppansya,
nagumo ryuu hiko wake, peezi. saisyoki kara seiki madeno zensekai no tougei wo tiiki zidai betuni hukan.
huzita, eiiti sugiyama, masaaki , seramikkusu hakubutukan, toukyou agune gizyutu sentaa,
peezi. rekisi geizyututeki na touzi wo hakubutukan no honkan, kougaku kougyouteki na seramikkusu wo sinkan ni mitate, sensi zidai kara gendai madeno tougei wo kougakusya no mede hukan.

peezi. yaki monono kakera kara bunka kouryuu wo ato tukeru koukogaku no kaisetu.

peezi, hurukaraa. kanmatu ni zyuuzitu sita nenpyou tizu bunken sakuin wo sonae ru.
hasebe, raku zi , karaa han sekai yakimono si, toukyou bizyutusyuppansya,
peezi, hurukaraa. yabe no simaihen.

tonari no eki
syanhai kidou koutuu koutuu
gousen gousen
suisan miti eki takara you miti eki yuugi miti eki dai kai berurin kokusai eigasai ha nen gatu niti kara gatu niti made kaisai sareta.
gaiyou
syuunen wo mukae ta nen no berurin kokusai eigasai deha, koremade zyouei sareru kikai no sukunaka tta so turana dono higasigawasyokoku no eiga ga tyuumoku sareta. kinkuma syou niha hangarii no zyosei kantoku kantoku ga, dai noaru zyosei ga, yousi wo toru madeno sugata wo egai ta ta ta taga eraba reta.
mata, kumai kei no sandakan hatiban syoukan boukyou ni syutuen sita tanakakinuyo ga zyoyuu syou wo zyusyou sita.
zyusyou
kinkuma syou maarutameesaarossyu
ginkuma syousinsain tokubetusyou ivubowasse , heisi toomasu sutyuwaatokuupaa
kantoku syou serugeisoroviyohu omoide no natuyasumi
danyuu syou burasuteimiiruburodosukii usotuki yakobu
zyoyuu syou tanakakinuyo sandakan hatiban syoukan boukyou
geizyutu kouken syou udiaren udiaren no ai to si
zyouei sakuhin
konpeteisyon bumon
tyouhen eiga nomi kisai. aruhu a betto zyun. houdai gatuiteinai baai ha gendai no sitani eidai.
sinsain
siruviasimuzu igirisu zyoyuu
ottookaaruntue nisidoitu kantoku
. indo kantoku
anrisyapie huransu haiyuu
nisidoitu

so ren
gaibu rinku
kousiki uebusaito doitu go eigo tatyu mongoru go , seibotunen husyou toha, mongoru teikoku ni tukae ta syougun no hitori de, tanguuto no syussin. gensi nadono kanbun siryou niokeru kanzihyouki ha tou syutu .
gaiyou
tatyu ha tingisukan no sinei sennin taityou tosite nadakai tyagan no ko no nuno kotu ratu no ko de, ozi ni ata ru mukari ki hanazato no sigo hakono kakei wo daihyou suru zinbutu tonatta. osanaikoro ni titi wo naku sita tatyu ha nen sigen gannen yori kubirai no sineitai kesikutei ni tukae hazime, nen sigen nen niha sohu no tyagan no touka ryou karano zeisyuu no nai hanbun wo uketoru kotoga mitome rareta. nen sigen nen niha akira yuudai syougun santou tou gunsi ni nin zirarete kyo syuu mitu syuu kousyuu gisyuu tan siro syuu yado syuu soku sumi no syozyou wo mamori, nansou karano sinkou wo yose tuke nakatta. nen sigen nen niha sarani gyou suumitu in karani sen suumitu in koto aratame rare, nansou nisibasiba sinkou si tuini nansou no syougun no syou tokumasari wo toukou saseru kouseki wo age ta.
nen sigen nen , sen wai nisi nado tokoro gyou suumitu in koto tosare, nansou no syougun no tin eki to tatakai korewo yabutu ta. nen sigen nen niha sarani tinkoku zyousyou gun wai saigyou syou san ti seizi ni aratame rare, an yutaka ro syuu hisasi syuu wo kouryaku sita. dounen niha nansou no syougun no natuki ga man no taigun wo hikii te seiyou wo houi sitatame, kubirai no inoti niyotte tatyu ga engun tosite haken sareta. seiyou nitadori tui ta tatyu ha atakai totomoni nansou gun wo yaburi, seiyou no houi wo toka seta. kono kouseki niyotte tatyu ha wai saigyou in tosare, waiga wo watatu te ro syuu yousyuu no mani tyuuton suruyouninatta.
nen sigen nen , bayan wo sousi rei tosuru nansou sinkou ga hazima ruto, tatyu ha yousyuu houmen no kouryaku wo makase rareta. tatyu ha zizen ni tyouhou niyotte nansou gun ga yasyuu wo okonao utositeirukotowotukami, hukuhei wo mouke tekono yasyuu gun wo yaburi yousyuu ittai wo heitei sita. kono kouseki niyotte tatyu ha wai higasi hidari hukuto gensui tosare, nen sigen nen niha wai saigyou tyuusyo syou koto tosareta. dounen nakani ha kousei miyako gensui tosite kanton houmen ni sinsyutu si, kono ittai wo heitei sita. nen sigen nen niha imada toubou wo tuzuke ru nansou no masu ou tyou kou ou tyou no toubatu ga tyou hirosi han sumomo tune rani meizi rare, tatyu ha karera no kouhou sien wo meizi rareta. nen sigen nen niha kubirai no sita wo otozure te kousei gyou syou tosaretaga, kan monaku byou de tosi nisite naku natta.
musuko ha nin ori, tyounan no sai kiba ha naka hou taihu kousei sen i si ni, zinan no hitu sai kiba ha seitou gyoutyuu kaki syou sazyou nisorezorenatta.
kyakutyuu
sankoubunken
tutumi kazuaki gendai kahoku no mongoru gundantyou no kakei sirin dai kan dai gou, sigaku kenkyuukai kyoutodaigaku bungakubu nai , nen gatu, peezi, . , , .
gensi kan retuden tou syutu den nakadate kou kura nakadate kouzou, nen meizi nen gatu niti nen syouwa nen gatu niti ha, nippon no ongaku maneezyaa, gakkouhouzin keieisya. gen kokuritu ongakudaigaku no souritusya no hitori. itibu ni sei wo nakadate tosuru kisai moaruga, kokuritu ongakudaigaku no kisai ni sitagatte nakadate to sirusu.
ryakureki
iwateken kamihei gun toono mati gen toono si ni umare ru. nen meizi nen gakugyou wo oe ruto, dounen gatu kara nen taisyou nen gatu made iwateken kamihei gun tutibuti zinzyou koutou syougakkou kyouin tosite kinmu suruga, syoku wo zisi te zyoukyou suru. nakadate ga syougakkoukyousi wo zisi zyoukyou sitaikisatunituiteno syousai na kiroku ha nokotu teinaimonono, zyoukyou noti, touen no syoukai de kanda no toukyou rakuyuu kai de vu a iorin wo narai, nippon niokeru ongaku maneezimento no kusawake tekina sigoto wo hazime ru nen taisyou nen ni kanda no gakuyuukai yuusi de ongakukai wo okonau kotoninari, tihou nomatome yaku wo ninai, takasaki kokode nakadate to kobayasi syuu tukuto no kouryuu ga umare ta. kouzyutu to numazu de ongakukai wo hirai takoto, dounen gatu niha miyauti syou sikibu syoku gakubu kyousi yuusi to tomoni toukyou kyou raku awo sosiki si, ongaku kyouzyu wositatoiu kiroku gaaru. nen taisyou nen zyosi ongakugaku kou gen ariake kyouiku geizyutu tankidaigaku nen meizi nen souritu no keiei ni tazusawa ru. touzi no toukyou no syuyou na ongakugaku kou ha, kanritu no toukyou ongakugaku kou gen toukyou geizyutu daigaku nen meizi nen souritu to, siritu deha zyosi ongakugaku kou to touyou ongakugaku kou gen toukyou ongakudaigaku nen meizi nen souritu nomideatta.
nen taisyou nen siritu no ongakugaku kou wo seturitu siyoutono tosi dai no kiei no ongakuka tatino nakama ni kuwawa ri, toukyou koutou ongakugakuin no souritu menbaa seigaku ie takeoka turuyo, ongaku maneezyaa nakadate kou kura, seigaku ie yatabe kei kiti, pianisuto sakakibara tyoku, syuukyougaku mono de syodai gakuin tyou watanabe kan tonaru. gattou kyou si yotuya ku bansyu mati no kari kousya de kaikou. dounen gatu yaho mura kokuritudaigaku mati ni kousya syunkou, iten suru.
souritu no yokunen no nen syouwa nen , sekaiteki vu a iorinisuto no arekusandorumogirehusukii wo syouhei si, gatu gatu ni rekisiteki ensoukai, tokubetu kouza ya koukaikouza wo kaisai sita. hakaku no koukyuu dattatoiwareru. kono daitan na kikaku wo zikkou sitanoha, keiei tantou no nakadate dearu. kono kouza ha tyomei na ensouka mo zyukou surunado, gakunai, gakugai ni yuukou na kouhou tonatta.
mata, nakadate ha sin koukyougakudan ni kyouen no hanasi wo motikake, nen syouwa nen gatu niti ni sin koukyougakudan koukai dai ensoukai to daisi te beetooven daiku ensoukai wo kaisai si, gassyou ha gakuin no gakusei ga zenin syutuen sita. koreha nen reiwa gannen made koukyougakudan to kokuritu ongakudaigaku no nenmatu no koureigyouzi tosite keizoku siteori, nenmatu no daiku toiu nihondokutoku no syuukan ga umare ru tansyo no hitotu tonatteiru.
nen syouwa nen gatu kara, sinbunsizyou de gakuin no sukyandarasu na kizi ga nando mo keisai sare, gakusei, hukei wo maki kon da naihun tonatta. hunsou ha getumatu ni watanabe gakuin tyou no zinin, nakadate kanzityou no zisyoku de syuusyuu sita. sikasi nakadate ha gakuin saiken notame hukki suru. nakadate no kotoba tosite koutyou ha gakuseitati no ningen tukuri ni sensin suru, sensei tooru ha ongakukyouiku ni sensin suru. watasi ha keiei ni sensin simasyou. keiei dehago meiwaku hakakenaito itta to tutae rareteiru.
notini rizityou gakutyou wo tutome ta arima daigorou ha, ziyuu to zisyu ga kokuritu ongakudaigaku no kengaku no seisin da, to meigen si, sensou toiu zidai moattakeredo, gakkou ha, tuneni tyuui wo mamotu te, sayuu izure nimo i ranakatta. koreniha, yuuki ga youtu taga, soremo tanosika tta. to itta toiuga, sono ittan tosite, sensou zenya senzityuu no episoodo wo inyou suru. kokuritu ongakudaigaku souritu syuunen kinen sassi noayumiyori noayumiyori
gakuin ageteno saiken isiki ga kou maruniturete syouwa , nengoro kara sidai ni gakuseisuu mo hue te itta. sikasi, moukono goro kara gunka no hibiki ga kappatu ninariyagate nippon ha sensou heto susun danodearu. ima ha naki komori soutarou kyouzyu ga kotekitai wo hensei si, sintai no ooki na zyosigakusei no oodaiko wo sentou ni hitotubasi touri, huzimi touri wo kousin siteitanomokono goro deattasi, tuugaku no kiwa ha dansi ha sensei mo gakusei mo geetoru, zyosi ha monpe toiu senzi syoku ni nuri kaeraretesimatta. sikasi yononaka ga sensou ni oi yararete ongaku toieba gunka dakega oukou sita saiaku no ziki nimo, honrai no simei dearu ongaku kara tuitati mo oidasa rezuni kora retakotoha saiwai deattato ie you. hokano ongakugaku kou ha senzi douin de mina gunzyu kouzyou ni deka kete zyugyou gadekinakatta. tumari gunbu ha gakusei wo gunzyu kouzyou ni douin site kinrou housi wo youkyuu si, sora ninatta kousya ha gunziteki sisetu ni tenyou siyoutositanodeatta.
sokode kokuritu de kangae takotoha, kousyanai nisore souou no gunzyu kouzyou no sisetu no itibu wo utusi, sokode gakusei ga housi suru houhou wotoreba gakusei douin ya, sisetu tenyou no men de muda ganaku koukateki dehanaika, tumari gakkou kouzyou housiki deatta. sokode sassoku kono gakkou kouzyou housiki no gusin wo ketui si sessyou wo hazime taga, monbusyou karahanakanaka meikaku na hentou wo era rezu, tugini koukuu honbu ni demuki, iroiro hanasiatu ta kekka gakkou kousyanai no itibu wo sigotoba nisite housi wosuru. tadasi zyouken tositeha ongaku woyarunode tearai sigoto hasakerukoto, ongaku no senmon zyugyou ha zettai ni tuzuke rutoiukotode ryousyou wotottesimatta. koreha touzi no sinbun nimo daidaiteki nitoriagerare monbusyou mo ore te zenkokuteki ni zissi sareruyouninatta.
kokuritu deha hikouki no tenka sen no seiri toitta, tanzyunna sigoto ga omona rumonode, zyugyou mo tuzuke rare, sono mani gakkou kouzyou ya gunzyu kouzyou ni demui te seisan tokurei notameno ensou angya de nihonzyuu wo mawatu te arui taga, geetoru to monpe sugata deno ensou ha ima dehanatukasii omoide tonatta.
senzityuu nikonoyouna gakkouunei wo kanou tositanoha, toukyoku to kousyou sita nakadate no kousyouryoku no tamamono dearu. kanken no aturyoku ni kuse zu, hudan no doryoku wo katamuke te mizukara no honbun wo mamoru. korega zisyu deari tyuui tyuui tyuuritu wo mamoru toiukotoda. sorenihamotiron yuuki ga you ru. sikasisousita yuuki to doryoku no ueni hazimete era rerunoga, hontou no ziyuu nanoda. o ue ya tadaigaku no yousu woukagainagara ippo okure te miti wo mosaku surunodehanaku, hokani sakigake te miti wo kiri hiraki, han tonatte hoka wo mitibiku. sousita sisei to kigai wo motu ta senzin tatiniyotte, kunitatino ziyuu ha kizuka re, mamora retekitanodearu.
sengo ha nen syouwa nen ni huzoku tyuugakkou koutougakkou, nen syouwa nen niha huzoku youtien entyou niha, izen takasaki no ensoukai kara nakadate to kouryuu wo tuzuke teita ritomikku kyouikusya de, kuroyanagitetuko mado giwano totto tyande tyomei na tomoe gakuen koutyou no kobayasi syuu saku wo syouhei , nen syouwa nen ni huzoku syougakkou wo seturitu. genzai no ikkan kyouiku no kiso wo tukuriage ru. nen syouwa nen gakkouhouzin kokuritu ongakudaigaku rizityou ni syuunin. nen syouwa nen takeoka turuyo no daigaku sou nioite sougi iintyou wo tutome ru.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti seikyo. tosi botu.
nakadate ha toono si no meiyo simin tonatteori, maitosi gatu ni sityou to si no kanbu syokuin niyoru hakamairi ga okonawa reteiru.
kokuritu ongakudaigaku deha, nakadate no kouseki wo tatae nakadate kou kura syougakukin wo mouke teiru. sotugyou tokino seiseki ga tokuni yuusyuu na mono ha henkan zengaku mataha itibu ga menzyo sareru.
kyakutyuu syutten bankuubaaairando daigaku ei ha, kanadaburiteissyukoronbia syuu no bankuubaa sima toubu engan ni iti suru daigaku. nen souritu no marasupinakarejzi wo zensin tosi, gakusi syuusikatei wo motu sougoudaigaku dearu. meinkyanpasu wo nanaimo ni, eisei kyanpasu wo dankanpaueruribaapaakusubiru ni kamae ru. toudaigaku ha, omoni bizinesu suisan gyou senzyuumin kyouiku ongaku puroguramu ni tikara wo ire teiru.
ryuugakusei kazu ha yaku , nin.
sisetu
kinnen zoukakeikou niaru gakuseisuu ni bengi wohakaru tame, ooku no zoutiku kaitiku ga okonawa reta. nin syuuyou no singeki ba, kaisou sareta tosyokan bukkusutoa taiikukan fittonesusentaaaato ongaku sutazio kagaku konpyuutaarabo kenkyuusyo syokugyou soudansyo kafeteria gakuseikai kan
meinkyanpasu niaru atarasii tosyokan deha, , satu izyou no hon zassi onrainrisoosumarutimediakonpyuutaa sisetu wo teikyou siteiru. mata, kyanpasu nai no ooku no basyo de, waiyaresuintaanetto no riyou ga kanou dearu.
kyanpasu nai niha, heya wo teikyou siteiru gakuseiryou gaaru. kinnen, kyanpasu soto nimo hukusuu no atarasii gakuseiryou ga tate rareta.
meinkyanpasu kara toho hun kennai niha, orinpikkusaizupuuruuootaasuraidaasukeeto you to aisuhokkee you no okunai sukeetorinku meetorutorakku rikuzyoukyougizyou sakkaa ba yakyuuzyou basukettobooru oyobi biitibaree okugai kooto gaaru.
puroguramu
bankuubaaairando daigaku ha, sateifikeetodipuroma gakusi syuusikatei wo taki no bunya ni kou tte teikyou siteiru.

takasi, bankuubaaairando daigaku ha, ryuugakusei no tameno puroguramu mo kaikou siteiru.
nihonzinryuugakusei muke no panhuretto mo daigaku no saito kara nyuusyu dekiru.

paakusubiru kyanpasu kyanpasu
puroguramu okumura tooru okumura tooru, nen syouwa nen gatu niti ha nippon no bengosi. oosakaben go samurai kaisyo zoku. okumura tanaka hourituzimusyo. zidou seihanzai zidou baisyun zidou hukusi hou ihan seisyounen zyourei ihan kyousei waisetu kango mono waisetuya zidou poruno mondai ni kuwasiku, media nado de kenkai ya komento wo hassi teiru. mata, intaanetto mondai nituite kuwasii to syousi teiru.
zinbutu
keireki
oosakahutoyonakasi syussin. oosakahuritu kitano koutougakkou wo hete, tyuuoudaigaku hougakubu sotugyou. nen gatu ni bengosi touroku. saisyo, zidou poruno zidou baisyun kinsi hou de kiso sareta kagaisya no bengo wo kokusenbengonin tosite tantou sitakotogakikkakede, sono noti, dousyu no ziken no kagaisya no bengo wo ooku tantou suruyouninaru.
bengosi tosite
zinsoku na tatiaga ri tettei sita syoukosyuusyuu genba zyuusi wo kokorogake teiru. soudan tyousairai utiawase niha densimeeru de zinsoku na taiou ni tutome teiru. zidou poruno zidou baisyun mondai, deai kei saito mondai nituiteha, zidou hogo wo tettei saseru tatiba kara kenkyuu siteiru.
kanyo sita ziken saikousaibansyo saiban rei zyouhou niokeru okumura tooru no kensakukekka
saikousai hanrei heisei a zidou baisyun , zidou poruno ni kakaru koui nado no kisei oyobi syobatu narabi ni zidou no hogo nado ni kansu ru hourituihan , kyousei waisetu, toku sima ken seisyounen kenzen ikusei zyourei ihan , toukyouto seisyounen no kenzen na ikusei ni kansu ru zyourei ihan hikoku ziken reiwa nen gatu niti saikousaibansyo daisan syou houtei hanketu kikyaku hirosima koutou saibansyo saibansyo
saikousai hanrei heisei a zidou baisyun , zidou poruno ni kakaru koui nado no kisei oyobi syobatu narabi ni zidou no hogo nado ni kansu ru hourituihan ,waisetu denziteki kiroku kirokubaitai yuusyou hanpu mokuteki syozi hikoku ziken reiwa gannen gatu niti saikousaibansyo daiiti syou houtei kettei kikyaku nagoya koutou saibansyo saibansyo
saikousai hanrei heisei a zidou baisyun , zidou poruno ni kakaru koui nado no kisei oyobi syobatu narabi ni zidou no hogo nado ni kansu ru hourituihan , kyousei waisetu, hanzai niyoru syuueki no iten bousi ni kansu ru hourituihan hikoku ziken heisei nen gatu niti saikousaibansyo taihou tei hanketu oosaka koutou saiban saiban
saikousai hanrei heisei a zidou hukusi hou ihan , zidou baisyun , zidou poruno ni kakaru koui nado no syobatu oyobi zidou no hogo nado ni kansu ru hourituihan hikoku ziken heisei nen gatu niti saikousaibansyo daiiti syou houtei kettei sapporo koutou saibansyo saibansyo

saikousai hanrei heisei a zidou baisyun , zidou poruno ni kakaru koui nado no syobatu oyobi zidou no hogo nado ni kansu ru hourituihan , kanzeihou ihan hikoku ziken heisei nen gatu niti saikousaibansyo daini syou houtei kettei nagoya koutou saibansyo saibansyo

saikousai hanrei heisei a waisetu zuga hanbai , dou hanbai mokuteki syozi , zidou baisyun , zidou poruno ni kakaru koui nado no syobatu oyobi zidou no hogo nado ni kansu ru hourituihan hikoku ziken heisei nen gatu niti saikousaibansyo daisan syou houtei kettei nagoya koutou saibansyo kanazawa sibu sibu
kousai hanrei kakyuu sai saiban rei heisei u zidou baisyun , zidou poruno ni kakaru koui nado no syobatu oyobi zidou no hogo nado ni kansu ru hourituihan hikoku ziken heisei nen gatu niti oosaka koutou saibansyo nara tihou saibansyo saibansyo

saikousai hanrei heisei a zidou baisyun , zidou poruno ni kakaru koui nado no syobatu oyobi zidou no hogo nado ni kansu ru hourituihan ,waisetu zuga hanbai mokuteki syozi hikoku ziken heisei nen gatu niti saikousaibansyo daini syou houtei hanketu oosaka koutou saibansyo saibansyo
kousai hanrei kakyuu sai saiban rei heisei u sinyou kison , gyoumubougai , settou hikoku ziken heisei nen gatu niti oosaka koutou saibansyo saibansyo
koutou saibansyo hanreisyuu heisei u zidou baisyun , zidou poruno ni kakaru koui nado no syobatu oyobi zidou no hogo nado ni kansu ru hourituihan hikoku ziken heisei nen gatu niti nagoya koutou saibansyo haki sa rei nagoya tihou saibansyo saibansyo
koutou saibansyo hanreisyuu heisei u zidou baisyun , zidou poruno ni kakaru koui nado no syobatu oyobi zidou no hogo nado ni kansu ru hourituihan hikoku ziken heisei nen gatu niti oosaka koutou saibansyo nara tihou saibansyo saibansyo
koutou saibansyo hanreisyuu heisei u sinyou kison , gyoumubougai , settou hikoku ziken heisei nen gatu niti oosaka koutou saibansyo kikyaku kikyaku
kakyuu sai saiban rei heisei u zidou baisyun , zidou poruno ni kakaru koui nado no syobatu oyobi zidou no hogo nado ni kansu ru hourituihan hikoku ziken heisei nen gatu niti oosaka koutou saibansyo nara tihou saibansyo saibansyo
kakyuu sai saiban rei heisei u sinyou kison , gyoumubougai , settou hikoku ziken heisei nen gatu niti oosaka koutou saibansyo kikyaku kikyaku
kenkai hatugen
rindenrabo no unei suru kasoukuukan de, zidou to sei kankei wo motu tato yuuza ga ayamatu te kengi wokakerareta doitu no zirei nituite, nen gatu niti ni ikano youna kenkai wo simesi ta. kasou no seikoui de batu serareru kanousei ga deta koto ni kansi teha, nippon no zidou baisyun, zidou poruno ni kakaru koui nado no syobatu oyobi zidou no hogo nado ni kansu ru houritu deha batu serareta keesu hanaiga, souitta gazou hasono riaru sani ouzi te, waisetuto nintei sare, hou ni teisyoku suru kanousei gaari kiken da.
nen gatu niti gazou tyannerudewaisetu zuga kouzen tinretu no tumi de kanrinin ga taiho sare, keiziban ga heisa sareta ken ni kansi teha, heisei nen gatu niti saikousaibansyo hanketu wo age odoroku koto ha nanimo naimou zizen syounin sei nisurusikanaito kataru. zidou to seitekikankei wo motu koto ni kansi teha aite ni motome raretato syutyou suru otona ni taisi houritu ha, souiu zyoukyou demo otona ha kodomo wotasinameyoto itte imasuto nobe ru.
purobaida sekinin seigen hou nituitemoikutuka genkyuu siteiru. seizin muke manga toitta zituzai sinai zidou ni kansu ru koto nituiteha kihonteki ni seikan kisei ni sansei hantai dotiranimoataranaino tatiba deiru. zidou poruno kinsi hou nituite, waisetu mono hanpu tumi no kousei kara antyoku ni tukura reta ten nado nituite siteki sita.
syozokudantai yakusyoku
syozokudantai yakusyoku ha, nippon keihou gakkai, tyosakukenhou gakkai, zyouhou nettowaaku hougaku kai, hou to konpyuutaa gakkai, ansin netto zukuri sokusin kyougikai tokubetukaiin. oosakaben go samurai kai tosyo zyouhou iin oosakaben go samurai kai keizi bengo iin. nitibenren no saibaa hanzai zyouyaku waakinguguruupu no menbaa.
hitogara
syumi ha engei. syoyuu sikaku ha kaizi dairi samurai, kaizi hosa nin, kome renpou koukuu kyoku zyoukyuu tizyou kyoukan nado.
sippitu
bizinesuman notameno intaanetto houritu ziten bubun sippitu
houritu gyoumu notameno pasokon tettei katuyou bubun sippitu
kaisya bunkatu no riron zitumu to syosiki bubun sippitu
kozinzyouhou hogo hou bubun sippitu
kokkaitosyokan niokeru okumura tooru bengosi no kensakukekka
ihou yuugai zyouhou to firutaringu densi syoutorihiki okumura tooru syouhisya hou nyuusu kou bun sya hen toori gou . .
keitai kanren ziken no hannin ha naniwo siteiruka zyouhou moraru sidou to syoutyuugakusei no keitaidenwa kodomo to keetai no genzyou okumura tooru gakusyuuzyouhou kenkyuu toori gou . .
kaisei zidou poruno kinsi hou wo kangae ru sonoda hisasi, sokabe masahiro hentyo nihonhyouronsya .
roozyaanaru zidou baisyun zidou poruno kinsi hou no kaisei tanzyun syozi tumi tousatu niyoru seizou tumi wo sousetu okumura tooru hougaku seminaa . .
sinpoziumu zidou poruno kisei no genzyou to tenbou okumura tooru , kitamura kazuhiro , narihara kei , hukamati sinya zyouhou nettowaakuroorebyuu. kouen roku hen kenkyuu taikai kouen roku zyouhou nettowaaku hougaku kai hen . .
bengosi suki na sigoto sigoto keiei nosusume bunya wo sibotu temo keiei wo naritata seru syuhou hokusyuu samurai hen daiiti houki .
zidou inkou tumi to kango mono waisetu tumi kango mono seikou nado tumi tokusyuu seihanzai kitei no kaisei to keizi bengo heno eikyou okumura tooru keizi bengo gendaizin bun sya hen . kaki .
kyousei waisetu tumi no naritato kouisya no seiteki ito no youhi saikousai taihou tei . . hanketu tokusyuu saikousaihanketu bengosi ga kataru matuki tosiaki , okumura tooru , sonoda hisasi hougaku seminaa . .
saikousai taihou tei heisei ni kyuunen itiiti gatu ni kokonoka hanketu no haikei okumura tooru hanrei zihou . . .
zidou poruno zidou baisyun bengonin tokusyuu seihanzai bengo ni idomu okumura tooru keizi bengo gendaizin bun sya hen . .
intaanetto ueno zidou poruno no giritu okumura tooru zyouhousyorigakkai kenkyuuhoukoku . . .
okumura tooru bengosi ni kiku houdou deha tutae rarenai zyuuyou ronten kinkyuu syuuroku hu a iru kyouyuu sohuto ziken no sinsou ni semaru okumura tooru bizinesu houmu . .
densibaitaizyou no tanin no denziteki kiroku no bossyuu nituite toukyou kousai heisei . . no zirei wo motoni tokusyuu saibaa keizi hou no doukou to kadai okumura tooru keihou zassi nippon keihou gakkai hen . .
densibaitaizyou no daisansya no deeta no bossyuu nituite tokusyuu tayou na syakaitekisekinin wo ninau konpyuutasekyuritei gizyutu okumura tooru zyouhousyorigakkai ronbunsi . .
keizi bengo repooto seizoutyuu no zidou poruno syozi tumi wo hitei okumura tooru keizi bengo gendaizin bun sya hen . .
kyakutyuu
gaibu rinku
okumura tooru bengosi no kenkai burogu burogu
okumura tooru oosakaben go samurai kai siisaidomootaa ha, katute kanagawaken yokohamasi ni sonzai sita yunyuusya diiraa. ranborugiini ya maseratei no nihondairiten wo tantou siteita. no sutekkaaenburemu ga yuumei dearu.
rekisi
sougyou
sougyousya dearu matuzawa onore sei nen nen ga, gakuseizidai ni gaikoku syahan bai no arubaito wo itta kotoga kikkake datta. omoni beikoku hei kara kaitori hotondoga amerika kuruma , nihonzin ni utu ta. nengoro niha yokohama motomati ni yunyuu tyuukosya diiraa siisaidomootaa tosite kaigyou sita. mata, matuzawa ha hunabasi saakitto de okonawa reta kusa reesu nimo sansen si, ikuzawa tooru, yasuda gin ni, ukiya kou zirou ukiya touzirou no titi nadoto kouryuu wo motu youninatta.
zisya biru kensetu
zigyou ha zyuntyou ni susumi, nendaizenhan kara, kanagawaku san tu sawa no kokudou gou soi ni kaidate teno zisya biru wo kensetu sita. sikasi, oirusyokku de kenzai no kakaku ga kyuutou si, tagaku no husai wo kakae ruyouninaru.
suupaakaabuumu tourai
zisya biru ga kanseisi ta noti, ranborugiini ya maseratei nadono itariansuupaakaa wo hanbai suruyouninari, sono noti, ikezawa satosino manga saakitto no ookami no eikyou de renzitu syooruumu no mae niha kamera wo motu ta kodomotati deippaidatta.
tousan
suupaakaa no timeido ha aga ttamonono, kuruma ga hizyouni kouka deattatameni uriage ga ookiku nobi rukotohanakatta. nendaikouhan niha buumu ga sugi sari, keiki no akka totomoni keieizyoutai hasarani akka. nen, siisaidomootaa ha tousan sita. tousango, kyaku kara azuka tteita kuruma wo tanpo kawari ni motu teikarerunowo husegu tame, syain soude de kuruma wo kaesi niittatoiu.
kyakutyuu
kanrenkoumoku
simizu kusa iti ottoofongiiruke , nen gatu niti nen gatu niti ha, doitu no hougaku mono.
zinbutu
seiki ni doitu ni hassei sita rekisi syugi ni motozu ku rekisi hougaku ha nouti gerumanisuten ni zokusi, gerumanisuto saigo no kyosyou to yoba reta. kareha, hou wo gengo to onazi youni minzoku kyoutuu no kakusin dearu minzoku seisin no haturo tosite torae, minzoku no rekisi totomoni onozu kara hatten surumonodearutosite, hou tosono minzoku no doutoku wo itti surumonototorae, onazi rekisi hougaku ha no romanisuten wo kuukyo na kozin no gainen wo kiso tosuru hou zissyousyugi tosite ikamesiku hihan sita. zinkakuken no gainen no teisyousya demoaru.
ryakureki
puroisen oukoku syutettein umare. haideruberuku daigaku, berurin daigaku de houritugaku wo manabi, georukubeezeraa wo si ni, nen tosi de gakuironbun wo kakiage te bengosi ni, nen, sihou kan siho ninaru.
nen haideruberuku daigaku zyokyouzyu, nen bureusurau daigakukyouzyu, nen berurin daigakukyouzyu, nen berurin daigaku soutyou tonaru. nen gatu niti, syarurottenburuku de sikyo.
tyosyo
doitu dantai houron zen kan , , , nen
doitu sihou ron .
giiruke bunko
giiruke no zousyo no itibu ha daiitizi sekaitaisen noti, toukyou syouka daigaku niyotte kounyuu sare, sono tyokugo no kantoudaisinsai no gataka ra nogare tanoti, toukyou syoudai no kousin kou dearu hitotubasidaigaku no giiruke bunko tosite keisyou sareteiru.
sankoubunken
katuta aritune, yamauti susumu hentyo kinsei kindai yooroppa no hougaku mono tatii guraateianusu kara kaarusyumitto made mineruvu a syobou, nen
kanrenbunken
kawasumi yosikazu ottoofongiiruke no hou sisou to sihou no syakaika hitotuno hihanteki oboegaki tatibana seri na tatibana serina, gatu niti ha, nippon no nyuuhaahu zyoyuu. asi no saizu .
ryakureki
nen gatu, zessei no bisyouzyo sou ko debyuu otoko no musume nyuuhaahu soretomo bisyounen tatibana seri na de debyuu.
nen gatu, saikoukyuu zyosou musume saigo no niti gekitin porutio daruma akume tatibana seri na de intai.
nen gatu, zessei no bizyo nyuuhaahu ninatte sai debyuu tatibana seri na de sai debyuu.
nen gatu, no reeberu boku tati otoko no musume no senzoku zyoyuu tonari, tyou bi kei nyuuhaahu no kyodai penikuri biyaku tuke tatibana seri na wo ririisu.
nen, no maniakkufeti bumon ni yume no kyouen ippakuhutuka no huru bokki nyuuhaahu onsen tatibana seri na araki rena boku tati otoko no musume ga entorii, awase te zyoyuu bumon ni, nyuuhaahu de yuiitu nomineeto sareta.
nen, nyuuhaahuhu a n syusai no kotosiitiban no nyuuhaahu bizyo wo kime ru nyuuhaahukuiinobukuiinkontesuto de yuusyou suru.
nen gatu niti housou no tokini mutyuu no yuukan besuto de yuukan huzi no saisin sizyou sisyakai no kizi hamipeni ga daiitii ni eraba reru.
nen gatu, boku tati otoko no musume sotugyou kinen biyaku de syasei si osame tairyou renzoku hassya ni tairyou bukkake tatibana seri na de boku tati otoko no musume senzoku zyoyuu wo sotugyou si kyuugyou.
nen gatu, serebu no tomo guruupu no nyuuhaahureeberu no senzoku zyoyuu ninari, osananazimi ha nyuuhaahu nando mo nando mo tagai no anaru wo itosi ai o tagai syasei simakuri tatibana seri na wo ririisu. ninki ikemen danyuu no kou ri kito kyouensaku hin. gatu no saku douzihatubai nyuuhaahu otokono musume sansimai no penikuri renkinzyutu penikuri daisuki na otoko ni kyodai penikuri de name te name rare tairyou syasei , tatibana seri na wo tizyo ru hatano yui motizuki ayaka nyuuhaahu tatibana seri na wo reziendo zyoyuu no hatano yui to motizuki ayakaga tizyo rimakuru dokyumento sakuhin de senzoku zyoyuu wo sotugyou suru.
nen gatu niti nen gatu niti no nitikan renzoku de debyuu syuunen kinen gurabia syasinsyuu hibarikorekusyon eizou wo satu hatubai suru.

kyakutyuu
gaibu rinku
tatibana seri na beibiifirikkusu ha, firikkusuzakyatto wo daizai tosita terebianime sakuhin. firikkusu no kyarakutaa no youzi han wo saisettei si, mazikkubaggu nadono syuyou na settei wo ika site nippon de seisaku sareta orizinaru sakuhin dearu.
nippon deha kyouiku de housou sare, minnano hiroba da wan paaku ni hasama rete housou sarerukotogaatta. izureno hanasi mo hun hodotonatteiru.
mata, youtien ni nen gatu kara rensai sareta.
touzyouzinbutu
firikkusu firikkusu
koe touma yumi yousyouki sekitosi hiko seizin ei yousyouki donoriooro seizin
konsaku hin no syuzinkou. mada youzi de, yumeha dai riigaa nado hukusuu no kai de mirai no zibun ni deau.
komatu ta tokini ha zyumon zimakkukujzimamakkuzimazikku wo tonae ru. tyokoreeto ga koubutu.

gaibu rinku
eigo sizuokasi ritu ikawa syougakkou sizuokasiritu ikawasyougakkouha, sizuokaken sizuokasi aoi ku ikawa niaru kouritusyougakkou.
enkaku
nen syouwa nen gatu niti ikawa syougakkou to ikawa kita syougakkou no tougou niyori, tasiro banti ni iten sizuokasi ritu ikawa syougakkou tosite hossoku.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti genzaiti ni kousya ga kanseisi iten.
nen heisei nen gatu niti sizuokasi ritu ikawa syougakkou tosite saigo no syuuryou siki.
gatu niti sizuokasi ritu ikawa syougakkou to sizuokasi ritu ikawa tyuugakkou wo tougou si konaka ikkan kou sizuokasi ritu ikawa syoutyuugakkou ga hossoku.

kyakutyuu syutten
kanrenkoumoku
sizuokaken syougakkou itiran itiran
gaibu rinku
kousiki uebusaito sankiti tutomu miyosi tutomu, nen meizi nen gatu niti nen syouwa nen gatu niti ha, nippon no bokusi, huzimityou kyoukai no dai daime syunin bokusi dearu.
keireki
tosidaka tiken nagaoka gun sinkai mura ni umare ru. nen oosaka minami kyoukai de suzuki tosikazu kara senrei wo ukeru. nen ni meizi gakuin singakubu ni nyuugaku sitaga, tyuutai suru.
nen gatu ni nippon kirisutokyou kai no kyousi siho siken ni goukaku si dendousi ni zyun in sareru. sono noti, hukui, takatuki, dairen no kyoukai syunin wo tutome ta. nen tobei site irinoi syuu omaha singaku kou to purinsuton singaku kou de manabu.
nen gatu ni dairen kyoukai syunin tonaru. nen minami renpei no noti wo tuide, huzimityou kyoukai bokusi ni syuunin suru. nen ni zinin si, meiyo bokusi ninaru. niti hiki sin akira rato tomoni mansyuu dendou awo kyou sitari, nihonkirisutokyoudan no syodai toukyou kyouku gikai giin wo tutome ru.
sankoubunken
kirisuto kyou zinmeiziten nihonkirisutokyoudan syuppankyoku, nen nen
nippon kirisuto kyoureki si daiziten kyoubun kan, nen singaasonguraiaa ha, wasizaki takesi no maime no orizinaruarubamu. nen gatu niti ni atomikkumonkii kara hatubai sareta.
kaisetu
zensaku douyou, maituki itte iru akoosuteikkuraibu obi gensei akogi na yoru notameni sakusi sakkyoku sita kyoku wo tyuusin nimatometa arubamu dearu. ryuutuu ga genteiteki deari, . . , animeito tentou, bunkahousou tuuhan, syozokuzimusyo atomikkumonkii tuuhan nomino hanbai deattanimokakawarazu, orikonarubamudeiriirankingu nioite, nen gatu hizuke de hatutouzyou si kurai, dou hizuke de kurai ni iru. dou hizuke no uiikuriirankingu deha kurai. mata, douzitu tuki no indiizuuiikuriirankingu deha, zisin hatu no kurai wo kakutoku sita.
wasizaki ga paasonaritei wo tutome ru tyou anisupa no tuuhan koonaa anisupa keizai tokku wasizaki no syouhin wo tuuhan surutokiha takenetto takesito yoba rerude senkou hanbai wo itta tokoro, kaisi zikan hodode yotei maisuu no mai wo kanbai sita. nao, tousyo ha senkouyoyaku gozitu hassou no yotei dattaga, tetigai de hassou sitesimai senkou hanbai tonatta.
syuurokukyoku
kantanhusu kantanhu no imi to yomu. honrai ha, suki na mozi wo ire rutoiu syusi no taitoru de, yomi ha kima tteinakattaga, ka niyori yomi wo kime ru hituyou gaatta. seisaku dankai dehaosamutyanto yoba reteita.
wasizaki ga hu a n dearu kankoku no ongaku yunitto no syuuroku no doumeikyoku ni nihongo si wotuketa kabaa dearu. wasizaki hano ooku no kyoku wo raibu nadode yakusi kabaa siteiruga, sono naka kara kyoku gensen sareta.
