mooningu mooningu
agaramain agaramain
enka runba runba
yaayo ha hutari noaikotoba noaikotoba
bunkahousou tomokazu miki no raziobigguban oopuninguteema dansei ha, no aikata dearu ihukube suu ga moderu ninatteiru.
tomokazu miki no raziobiggubanendinguteema raziobiggubanendinguteema
warutu warutu
sanka myuuzisyan
zenkyoku no arenzi to saundopurodeyuusu ha dou zimusyo syozoku no sugiura rafin seiitirou niyoru. zenkyoku no doramu, oyobi paakassyon ensou ha wasizaki to heri no hukai utida minoru niyoru.
sono hokano sanka myuuzisyan ha kaki no touri.
gitaa tamagawa yuuiti yuuiti
beesu kasahara naoki, romii kinosita kinosita
kinkan sima yuusuke yuusuke
vu a iorin okamoto nobuhiko nobuhiko
gaibu rinku
yasu mikado kyouteiha, tousin no dai dai saigo no koutei. dai koutei koubu mikado no zinan. ki ha toku bun, zi ha toku bun.
syougai
titekisyougai tosareru doubo ani no antei to kotona ri, hideaki na sisitu gaattato hyousa reru. ryuuyuu ga antei wo satugai site sandatu siyoutositeirunowo sattisi, tuneni antei no bou niitaga, gi ki nen nen , siba toku bun ga huzai no saini antei ha satugai sareta. sono noti, ryuuyuu niyori koutei tosite youritu saretaga, korehamohaya zenzyou no huseki tositeno kairai ni sugina katta. sosite kekkyoku, moto ki nen nen ni ryuuyuu ni zenzyou surukotowo yogi naku sareta. kousite tousin ha metubou si, aratani ryuuyuu kouso butei niyoru nantyou sou ga seiritu sitanodearu. kono toki, susumu tousin hatouni horon deitahazudatta, naniwo uramu kotogaarouto itta to sinzyo nihaaru.
siba toku bun ha nantyou sou niyotte reiryou ou ni huuzi raretaga, yokunen ansatu sareta.
tousin no seitousei wo mitome teinai gisyo niyoruto, matu ryou miya ninadare kon dekita butei no hei ni hukudoku zisatu wo meizi raretaga, bukkyou deha, zisatusya ha nin ni tensyou dekinaito kyo ndanode bokusatu saretatoiu. tumari, siba toku bun ha bukkyouto deatta. mata, dousyo niyoreba kougou tyo rei hime no ani no tyo tosiyuki to otouto no tyo tan yuki ha butei ni tuuzi te, siba toku bun no ko ga umare ru do ni satugai sitatoiu.
sousitu
sizyo
kaien kousyu siba sigeru ei nantyou sou no syoutei no kougou kougou
touyou kousyu kousyu
hokani, gisyo niyoreba sukunakutomo hitoizyou no satugai sareta ko gaita.
kanrenkoumoku
tousin no zinbutu itiran dankin tai dankintaiha, bosinsensou niokeru tosa han sinsei hu gun no yuugeki butai. nen gatu niti keiou nen gatu niti ni, kyuu takeda ieie sin no sison dearu kannusi rousi rano sigan hei niyotte kessei sare, nen gatu niti meizi nen gatu niti hanmei niyori kaisan. douyou no syusi de, dankin tai no noti wo otu te kessei sareta butai ni gokoku tai gaaru.
raireki
kessei madeno keii
nen keiou nen , tyoutei yori ousei hukko no dai gourei ga hasse rare, yokunen syougatu toba husimi no tatakai no noti, tokugawakeiki tuitou no syoutyoku ga hasse rarete, kangun ha toukaidou tousandou no ryouhou men kara edo wo tinbu surutameni syutuzin. tosa han zin syou tai no daitai sirei deatta itagaki taisuke touzi ha inui taisuke ha, tousandou senpou soutoku wo haimei si daitai sirei wo kennin site, nen gatu niti keiou nen gatu niti kyouto wo syutuzin. sono niti ga, taisuke no keihu ueno dai mae no senzo itagaki nobukata no nenme no meiniti deattatame, sono buun tyoukyuu niayakaranto, senzo no koti kouhu heno singeki he sonae ta tousei no tozyou, mino oogaki de gunryaku wo saku si, dou gatu niti gatu niti , sei wo itagaki he huku sita.
dou gatu niti gatu niti , tousandou soutoku hu gun no senpou itagaki taisuke ha, tosa han zin syou tai , insyuu tottori hanpei wo hikii te kouhu ni iri, tokugawakeiki tuitou no syoutyoku to, mizukaraga itagaki nobukata no sison dearukotowo simesi, kouhu sirodai satou sin suu suruga syu ni siro ake watasi kaizyou wo sematu ta. sin suu ha, tyokumei wo kasikomi itagaki no kankoku ni sitagai, dou gatu niti gatu niti kouhu wo kaizyou.
taisuke ha, kanpatu irezu, kouhu ryounai no yuisyo aru takeda rounin kyuu takeda kasin no sison dearu rousi ya kanetake kannusi busou sita kannusi rani kangun heno kyouryoku wo yobi kakeru hukoku wo itta. yoku gatu niti gatu niti , itagaki rano butai ha kousyuu katunuma no tatakai de, ookubo yamato kondou isami hikii ru kouyou tinbu tai wo gekiha.
koreniyotte, itagaki no meisei ha kai kunizyuu ni sire watari, itagaki no hukoku ha, takedasingen wo keibo si kouhu ryounai de tokugawa no assei wo kokoroyoku omotte inakatta kai no hitogokoro ni hiroku sintou si, korerani koou site zokuzoku to kangun heno kyouryoku wo sigan suru mono ga nanori deta.
kessei kara gatutyuu no senka
gatu niti gatu niti , kangun heno kyouryoku wo sigan suru syosi mei wo atume, iwa kubo mura no takedasingen byousyo mae de kesseisiki houkoku iwa kubo no meiyaku wo itta. dankin tai no meimei ha gozitu. syousai ha kouzyutu
obi syuuri susumu gensou gi tosi kai kuni koma gun obi mura sinkan kyoudou yaku
akaoka itumi ta huziwara soutyou doukoku dougun ookura mura sutama kannusi kyoudou yaku
akaoka sikibu huziwara sinzyou tosi doukoku dougun itumi ta no titi kannusi sityou mamoru
akaoka hyoubu huziwara koubun tosi doukoku dougun asao mura akeno kannusi kannusi
akaoka ho maruhuzi hara masataka tosi doukoku dougun ue kamitori mura akeno kannusi kannusi
utada zin osu huziwara ari makoto tosi doukoku dougun sita marui mura nirasaki kannusi kannusi
tuta ki sou sirou gen morimasa tosi doukoku dougun makinohara mura takekawa syuu rounin rounin
yamasita matakiti genkou sigeru tosi doukoku yamanasi gun ogawara mura rounin rounin
naitou ki uemon genyosi sei tosi doukoku koma guzyou marui mura nirasaki rounin rounin
yonekura zen hati gen norisige tosi doukoku dougun miyawaki mura takekawa syuu kyuusin kyuusin
yonekura sati siti gen masayuki tosi douzyou douzyou
nakagome haba rou zaemon den sigetugu tosi doukoku dougun kamiisida mura mura
yamakawa zirou gen seikou tosi taityou ha, yosimasa ken sin kaniti rou de, notini, owari nagoya rounin murai naosaburou, sagami rounin ozaki hikosirou yukimasa yosimasa no utizini noti nidaime taityou tonaru. ozaki yukio no titi ga tutome ta. , kageyama tougo nadoga taisi ni kuwawa tta.
gatu niti gatu niti , tousandou gun tuti syuu han daitai noatoni sitagai, edo ni muke te syutuzin. douzitu ban ha isawa de syukuei.
gatu niti gatu niti , sasako touge wo koe te kurono ta he singun.
gatu niti gatu niti , sarubasi he singun.
gatu niti gatu niti , kobotoke touge wo koe te hatiouzi he singun.
gatu niti gatu niti yuugata, edo no naitou sinzyuku ni toutyaku.
gatu niti gatu niti , itigaya no bisyuu tokugawa tei gen bouei syou honbu de dankin tai to meimei sareta. taisi niha nisiki no kensyou, gunpuku tosite uwagi, manteru, sitagi, zubon, syouzyuu nadoga taiyo sare, gatu atari san ryou no teate ga sikyuu sarerukototonatta. douzitu naka, syougi tai ga seme tekurutoiu zyouhou gamotarasare, naitou yosinari, yonekura sati siti, utada zin osu no mei ni, ousyuu kaidou no tansaku wo meize rareru.
gatu niti gatu niti , naitou ra mei ga simotuke kuni oyama ni toutyaku si zyoukyou wo teisatu. syougi tai yo mei ga huzin si, yuuki siro wo yaki uti sitakotoga hanmei. mei ha, isogi hiki kaesi, niti, sekiyado kara yohune de kudatu te, niti, itigaya no bisyuu tokugawa tei no kangun honzin ni kisan si, syougi tai no doukou wo syousai ni houkoku.
gatu niti gatu niti , naitou yosinari, yonekura sati siti, utada zin osu no mei ga dankin tai hontai ni hukki si, nitikan, bisyuu tokugawa teinai de, sinsiki syouzyuu no uti hou, oyobi kindai sen niokeru kassen no kokoroe ewo kunren.
gatu niti gatu niti , dankin tai no taityou ni, tosa han oome tuki yaku yosimasa ken sin kaniti rou ga meize rareta.
kono toki, ousyuu kaidou no tansaku de reisei tintyaku na handan nomoto tekizyou wo sisatu si, kibin ni houkoku sita utada no koudou wo yosimasa ga hyouka si, hukusin no denrei yaku tosurutame, utada zin osu ha, yosimasa taityou tuki sieki wo meize rareta.
gatu niti gatu niti , dankin tai ni taihou tai ga kuwawa ri, taisi tatiha edo sityuu no keigo to husin zinbutu no tansaku wo meize raru.
gatu no senka
gatu niti gatu niti , dankin tai ni yatusiro guntyuu kawamura rounin oyamada mondo gen masanori tosi ga kuwawa ru. mata sieki tosite, koma gun miyawaki mura yonekura tan san tosi ga saiyou sareta.
gatu niti gatu niti , edozyou muketu kaizyou ake watasi ga okonawa re, kangun ga nyuuzyou, tokugawakeiki ha inkyo site mito he kinsin sitaga, korewo kokoroyoku omowazu, kin hata ni taisi te tettei kousen wo tuzuke ru itibu no seiryoku ni taisi tyousyuu hanpei ga kusen si, tosa hanpei ni engun wo motome tekitatame dankin tai ha, zin syou tai ni sitagatte bisyuu tokugawa hantei no honzin wo sinpatu. sato wo kyoukougun site isogi, kurihasi ni toutyaku. taikyaku sitekita tyousyuu hanpei wo engo si, yahan, koga zyouka ni toutyaku. koga zyousyu tutii tosinori ha kin hata heno kizyun wo kobami, hikone hanpei mo kusen wosiirareteirutono zyouhou wo eta tame, gatu niti gatu niti , tuti syuu hanpei ha, dankin tai utada zin osu ya insyuu tottori hanpei miyaki dai kura wo zui i, koga siro ni omomui te tutii tosinori ni kizyun wo settoku si sitagawa seta. mata simotuke kuni mibu zyousyu torii tadatomi no karou wo toi te kizyun sasetaga, syougi tai ha gatu niti gatu niti , utunomiya siro wo senkyo.
gatu niti gatu niti , nikkou tousyouguu ni ritu komoru syougi tai ga, itagaki taisuke, tani kanzyou rano settoku ni ouzi te imaiti no no ni deta tame, dankin tai mokorera kassen ni sansen si tekikata wo haisou saseta. kono kassen deha, notini taisi ni kuwawa tta dankin tai usui seizaemon ga utizini. kono niti, dankin tai ha imaiti ni syukuei si, senbon kiguti wo keigo.
gatu niti gatu niti , imaiti no minami, utunomiya kaidou kara tekikata ga seme tekitatame, ousen surukoto yaku zikan. karou zite kanawo ketira si, syouzyuu tei, mouhu mai, katana kuti, wakizasi kuti wo rokaku.
gatu niti gatu niti , yasuzuka ni tyuuryuu siteita sinsei hu gun syohan hei ga ootori keisuke sikika no dassou gun ni kusen si, sohue kanari hikii ru tosa zin syou tai syoutai ga kitamura sigeyori haika no houhei to tomoni kasei site densyuu tai nado to kassen. kono toki, dankin tai mo densyuu tai ya kuwana hanpei nado no dassou gun to kassen. utada zin osu ha, sekkou no nin wo meize rare tekizin tikaku made sinobi yori, puroisen sei no sougankyou de doukou wotubusani kansi. honei ni hiki kaesi te yosimasa ken sin ni houkoku. . kawata kei yo ga tottori hanpei wo hikii te raien si, tottori hanpei to tomoni moukou wo kuwae te dassou gun wo haisou saseta. tosa han deha, taityou ooisi rizaemon ga utizini sita. dankin tai ha hunsen site, tekikata no syouzyuu tei wo rokaku. kono notino utunomiya siro no kouryaku sen deno sisya ha, tekikata mei, mikata no sisyousya ha mei tonatta.
konoyouni, gatutyuu, dankin tai ha touhokuhoumen he singun. honsen de tatakai nagara teisatu kantyou wo okonau yuugeki butai tosite katudou sita.
gatu no senka
gatu niti gatu niti , imaiti oyobi utunomiya houmen wo keigo si, utunomiya no senpuku hei wo tansaku surutame, utada zin osu ha, nouhu ni hensou. asa go tu toki imaiti wo hassi, utunomiya houmen he mui, moritomo mura no minka de teki no kyodou wo ukagau. kono toki, utada no koudou ga, tekikata no meni domari, tukama tte touhou no santyuu de zyumoku ni sibara re kitumon saretaga, ituwari wo kotae teyari sugo su. tekikata no itimei ga kiri koroso uto teian si, si wo kakugo sitaga, betuno hitori ga, nani zo nouhu nado korosu ni oyoba n. soreyori asita, imaiti heno singeki no youi wo totonoe youto sibari wo toi te tati satu tatame, kyuuti ni issyou wo eru. kono tokino kotowo utada hanotini yori turugi syuku to daisi, ryou tati wo saya niosamuru yona ritomo, kati te kabuto no o katamubesito ei zite kyoukun tositatoiu. utada ha, notini mito hiromiti kan ni manan da. minoru to kaimei si, en no syougakkou no syodai koutyou, takeda hatimanguu no guuzi nadowo rekinin sita.
dounen gatu, ousyuu tanakura wo kudasi, gatu madeni, miharu, nihonmatu, aizuwakamatu to kakuti wo tensen.
tokuni, miharu han no muketu kaizyou ha, dankin tai taityou yosimasa ken sin kaniti rou no zinryoku ga ookii to hyouka sare, notini yosimasa no eirei wo maturu zinzya ga konryuu sareta.
gaisen
dounen gatu, taisyou wo nasitoge edo ni gaisen si, siba zouzyouzi ni syukuzin.
yoku nen gatu niti meizi nen gatu niti , taisyou wo nasitoge, kaiyaku zyotai . taisi ha kakukaku kokyou ni gaisen si kou kyuu wo tamatu ta.
taimei no yurai
taimei no dankin ha ekikyou no hutari dousin, sono ri dankin toarunoni motozu ki, ningendousi no kessoku no katasa wo imi suru.
sangokusi engi ni touzyou suru koutou no busyou sonsaku tosono sinyuu syuuyu no kizuna wo arawasi tamonotosite sonsaku syuuyu no dankin no maziwari toiu kotoba ga yoku sira reteita tamede aru. meimei sitanoha zin syou tai no gunkan ooisi yatarou moto tosa kinnou touin de, bisyuu tei de tousandou soutoku iwakura tomomi no saikyo wo ete kettei sita.

kanrenkoumoku
yosimasa no kosikake isi miharu zyounai niaru yosimasa kaniti rou ga kosikake tatosareru isi seikan tera ki tei seikanzi hirosada, kyuuzitai hima tera ki tei ha, edozidai zenki kara tyuuki nikaketeno kugyou. ken dainagon seikan tera ki bou no ko. kani ha zyuu nii ken dainagon. akimasa tennou gokoumyou tennou gosai tennou reigen tennou higasiyama tennou no godai ni tukae ta.
asano naganori ga kira yosinaka ni ninzyou ni oyon da saini edo ni gekou siteita in tukato site sira reru.
keireki
hirohumi nen nen gatu niti, kyou nite tanzyou. hirohumi nen nen ni syouroku kurai ni zyonin. hirohumi nen nen ni tosi de genpuku site syouden sita. uemon ken sa kurabito migi syouben hidari syouben utyuu ben satyuu ben nadowo rekinin site, tenhou nen nen ni tosi de kurabito atama ni syuunin. sarani teikyou gannen nen niha sei yoni ueno sangi hidari daiben tonari, kugyou ni retu sita.
teikyou nen nen ni ken tyuunagon he susumi, genroku nen nen niha ken dainagon tonattaga, kan monaku zisyoku sita. genroku nen nen gatu niha reigen zyoukou no sisya tosite edo he gekou si, asano naganori niyoru kira yosinaka heno dentyuu ninzyou ni souguu sita.
houei nen nen gatu niti, koukyo. kyounen .

kyakutyuu
kanrenkoumoku
akou ziken ziken
akou rousi rousi
tyuusingura hasimoto motohiro hasimoto motohiro, nen ha, nippon no kenpougakusya. tyuuoudaigaku kyouzyu. tyuuoudaigaku zyounin rizi, hinosi zyouhoukoukai kozinzyouhou hogo sinsakai iin kaityou , hatiouzisi kozinzyouhou hogo singikai iin kaityou . tyuuoudaigaku hakase hougaku .
ryakureki
toku sima ken syussin. toku sima kenritu ikeda koutougakkou sotugyou. nen gatu, tyuuoudaigaku hougakubu houritugaku ka sotugyou, doudaigaku daigakuin hougaku kenkyuuka kouhou senkou hakasekoukikatei tani syutoku manki taigaku. nen gatutyuu ou daigaku hakase hougaku syutoku. sihousiken zyuken dantai zui houe kenkyuusitu zaiseki.
gakuseizidai ha hasimoto kou kou ni sizi si, ienaga saburou no zyugyou wo risyuu siteita.
koutiken ritu kouti zyosidaigaku gendaka tiken ritudai gaku bunka gakubu bunka gaku kyouzyu wo hete, nen gatu, tyuuoudaigaku hougakubu kyouzyu ni syuunin si, nen gatu kara nen gatu made dougaku bu gakubutyou nohoka, nen gatu nen gatu ha doudaigaku hukugakutyou, nen gatu nen gatu ha doudaigaku zyounin rizi wo tutome ta. nen gatu yori hutatabi doudaigaku hukugakutyou ni syuunin.
mata, nen hinosi zyouhoukoukai kozinzyouhou hogo sinsakai iin kaityou , nen hatiouzisi kozinzyouhou hogo singikai iin kaityou nadowo rekinin.
tyosyo
kenpou no kiso hokuzyu syuppan, nen
sin hanrei handobukku kenpou kyoutyo, nihonhyouronsya, nen
kindai kenpou niokeru dantai to kozin huma syobou, nen
putizemi kenpou zinken hougaku syoin, nen
yokuwakaru tihouziti hou hentyo, mineruvu a syobou, nen
kenpou dai han kyoutyo, huma syobou, nen
hyougen no ziyuu riron to kaisyaku tyuuoudaigaku syuppanbu, nen
nihonkokukenpou wo manabu tyuuou keizai sya, nen
kenpou hanrei hyakusen dairoku han dai ziken eiriteki na koukoku no ziyuu no seigen yuuhikaku, nen gatu
kenpou hanrei hyakusen dainana han dai ziken hanzai no sendou to hyougen no ziyuu yuuhikaku, nen gatu hoka hoka
gaibu rinku
tyuuoudaigaku kenkyuusya purofiiru hasimoto motohiro arekusandorosutuoruvu a su girisia go lphalambdaxialphanudeltarhoomicronfinal sigma auzetarhobetaalphafinal sigma, raten mozihyouki , nen gatu niti ha, girisyaatene syussin no moto doukoku daihyou sakkaa sensyu. genekizidai no pozisyon ha goorukiipaa.
keireki
kurabu
nen, girisya no meimon dearu panasinaikosu ni nyuudan. sikasinagara syutuzyoukikai ni meguma rezu, nyuudan kara kan monaku kabu riigu no kurabu heto kigen tuki iseki wo siira reru.
rentaru wo kurikaesi te nen ni panasinaikosu ni hukki surumo, yahari syutuzyoukikai wo atae rarezu nen ni kureta heto kanzen iseki, kokode masano za wo kakuritu suru. suruto, siizun syuuryougo ni masano nuke ta panasinaikosu kara hukki yousei wo ukeru. korewo uke hurusu ni modoru to, regyuraa tosite tiimu wo sasae ru sonzai tonatta.
nen gatu niti, itaria no tittadiparerumo ni iseki. nenkei yaku wo musun da. sikasi, parerumo deha zyoban koso regyuraa dattamonono tosiake ikou ha emiriaanoviviaano emiriaanoviviaano
ni teiiti wo ake watasi tesimatta.
nen gatu niti, suteiivufonberugen tono toreedo de zienoa he iseki.
nen gatu niti, aratani kaimaku suruni sansen yotei no noosuiisutoyunaiteddo he kanyuu surukotode goui sita.
daihyou
girisya daihyou tositeha, daihyou wo hete nen ni daihyou he hatu syousyuu. zettaiteki syugosin deatta antonisunikoporidisu no koukeisya tosite kitaisa reta. waarudokappu niha regyuraa tosite zen siai ni syutuzyou. naizieria sen deha girisya no hai hatusyouri mo kiroku sita. sikasi, kati hai de guruupuriigu haitai ni owa tta.
hai noti ha konsutanteinosuharukiasu, miharisusihu a kisu, oresuteisukarunezisu nado tono hagesii pozisyon arasoi wo enzi ta.
kozinseiseki
taitoru
panasinaikosugirisyasuupaariigu
kiperoeraadasu
kyakutyuu
gaibu rinku
wasinton syuu tizi ha, amerika gassyuukoku no wasinton syuu no syuu tizi dearu.
itiran
wasinton zyunsyuu tizi
wasinton syuu tizi
sankoubunken
gaibu rinku
. . . koziki koziki, hurukotohumi, hurukotobumiha, ippanni nihonsaiko no rekisisyo dearutosareru. sono zyo niyoreba, wadou nen nen ni tayasu man ryo ga hensan si, motoaki tennou ni kenzyou saretakotode seiritu suru. kaminaka sitano kan. naiyou ha tenti kaibyaku kara suiko tennou no kizi dearu.
nengo no yourou nen nen ni hensan sareta nihonsyoki totomoni kamisiro kara zyouko madewo sirusi ta sisyo tosite, kindai ninatte kokka no seiten tositemirare, kiki to sousyou sarerukotomoaruga, koziki ga izumosinwa wo zyuusi surunado ryousyo no naiyou niha sai moaru.
gaiyou
koziki no genpon ha genzon sezu, ikutuka no syahon ga tutawa ru. seiritunendai ha, syahon no zyo ni sirusa reta nengappi wadou nen syougatu niti yuriusu koyomi nen gatu niti niyori, seiki hazime to suitei sareru.
naiyou ha, kamisiro niokeru tenti no hazimari kara suiko tennou no zidai ni itaru madeno dekigoto ga, sinwa ya densetu nadowo hukume te, kiden karada de kisaisa reru. mata, kazuooku no kayou wo hukumu. takamagahara toiu go ga tayou sareru ten demo tokutyouteki na bunsyo dearu.
koziki ha nihonsyoki totomoni kousei deha kiki to sousyou sareru. naiyou niha itibu ni tigai gaari, nihonsyoki noyouna tyokusen no seisi dehanaiga, koziki mo zyobun de tenmu tennou ga,
to mikotonori sitato kisai gaarutame, tyokusen tomo kangae rareru. sikasi siryou no uede ha, zyobun ni kaka reta seiritukatei ya kousitu no kanyo ni humei na ten ya muzyunten ga ooi tosuru kenkai moaru.
zoku nippon ki niha nihonsyoki no kizi gaarunoni taisi, koziki nihasonoyouna kizyutu wo kai teiru. hieda are no zituzaisei no hikusa, zyobun no husizen sakara, gisyo setu kouzyutu mo tonae rareteiru.
koziki ha rekisisyo dearuto tomoni bungakuteki na kati mo hizyouni takaku hyouka sare, mata nihonsinwa wo tutae ru sinten no hitotu tosite, sintou wo tyuusin ni nippon no syuukyou bunka ya seisinbunka ni tadai na eikyou wo atae teiru. koziki ni araware ru kamigami ha, genzai deha ooku no zinzya de saizin tosite matura reteiru. ippou bunkateki na sokumen ha nihonsyoki yorimo tuyoku, sousakubutu ya densyou nado de tabitabi inyou sarerunado, sekenippan heno nihonsinwa no sintou ni ooki na eikyou wo atae teiru.
hensan no keii
nakanoooe ouzi tenzi tennou raniyoru soga iruka ansatu ziken kinotomi no hen ni hungai sita soga ezo ha daiteitaku ni hi wokake zigai sita. kono tokini tyoutei no rekisisyo wo hokan siteita syoko mademoga enzyou sitato iwa reru. tennou ki nado kazuooku no rekisisyo hakono tokini usinawa re, kokuki ha nan wo nogare te tenzi tennou ni kenzyou saretatosareruga, tomoni genzon sinai. tenzi tennou ha hakusukinoe no tatakai de tou to siragi no rengou ni haiboku si, yosou sareta tokai kougeki heno zyunbi notame sisyo hensan no yoyuu hanakatta. sono zitende sudeni syoka no teiki kyuu hon zi kyuuzi ha kyozitu nai maze no zyoutai deatta. zinsin no rango, tenzi tennou no otouto dearu tenmu tennou ga sokui si, tennou ki ya yake te kake tesimatta kokuki ni kawa ru kokusi no hensan wo meizi ta. sono kiwa, tosi de takai sikizi nouryoku to kiokuryoku wo motu hieda are ni teiki kyuu hon zi nadono bunken wo syou syuu saseta. sono noti, motoaki tennou no inoti wo uke, tayasu man ryo ga are no syou syuu siteita mikado kou hitugi tennou no keihu to sendai kyuuzi hurui densyou wo hensan si koziki wo kanseisa seta.
seiritu
seiritu no keii wo sirusu zyo niyoreba koziki ha, tenmu tennou no inoti de hieda are ga syou syuu siteita zyouzyutu no mikado kou hitugi to sendai kyuuzi wo tayasu man ryo ga kaki sirusi, hensan sitamonodearu. katute syou syuu ha, tanni ansyou surukototo kangae rareteitaga, kozima noriyuki kamisiro nihonbun gaku to tyuugokubungaku ue hanawa syobou ya nisinomiya kazutami koziki koubun watasi kai koziki nenpou raniyotte mozi siryou no yomikata ni syuuzyuku suru koui deattakotoga tasika merareteiru.
syomei
syomei ha koziki tosareteiruga, sakuseitouzi nioiteha hurui syomotu wo simesu ippanmeisi deattakotokara, seisikimei dehanaitoiwareru. mata, syomei ha yasumaro ga tuke tanoka, kouzin ga tuke tanokaha sadaka dehanai. yomi hahurukotobumitono setu moattaga, genzai ha ippanni onyomi de koziki to yoba reru.
teiki to kyuuzi
koziki ha teiki teki bubun to kyuuzi teki bubun tokara naru.
teiki ha syodai tennou kara dai dai tennou madeno mei, tennou no kouhi ouzi ouzyo no mei, oyobi sono sison no sizoku nado, konohoka koukyo no mei, tisei nensuu, hounen eto zyumyou, ryoubo syozaiti, oyobi sono tisei no omona dekigoto nadowo sirusi teiru. koreraha tyoutei no kataribe nadoga ansyou site tennou no taisou no hin no saigi nadode syou mi age ru kansyuu deattaga, seiki nakaba ninaruto mozi niyotte kaki arawasa retamonodearu.
kyuuzi ha, kyuutei nai no monogatari, kousitu ya kokka no kigen ni kansu ru hanasi womatometamonode, onazi goro kaka retamonodearu.
takeda yuukiti ya okada sei tukasa, sekine atusi nadoha, koziki no honbun ga suiko asa de kanketu siteirukotokara, koziki no moto tonatta teiki ga suiko asa de owa tteita tteita suiko asa kara tooku nai ziki ni sirusa retato siteki siteiru. tadasi, zyomei tennou wo okamoto miya ni masi te tenka wo naora simesisi tennou to sirusi teirukotokara, zyomei asa dankai no kahitu haattatosareru.
nao, sasagawa naoki ha, zyomei tennou no zidai no kouhan ni tennou to soga si no tairitu ga hukama ri, zyomei tennou ga soga si ga kakawa tta tennou ki nadoni kawa ru ziko no seitousei wo syutyou surutameno teiki to kyuuzi wo kaitei to hensan wo okonawa se, notini ko dearu tenmu tennou ni hikituga retesorega koziki no motoni nattato suisoku siteiru.
hyouki
honbun ha hentai kanbun wo syutai tosi, kogo ya koyuumeisi noyouni, kanbun deha daiyou sizuraimonoha itizi ition hyouki tositeiru. kayou ha subete itizi ition hyouki tosareteori, honbun no itizi ition hyouki bubun wo hukume te kamisiro tokusyu kanazukai no kenkyuutaisyou tonatteiru. mata itizi ition hyouki nouti, itibu no zinmei nadono migi bou ni ue, kyo to, tyuugoku no bunsyo nimirareru kango no seityou dearu sisei nouti zyousyou to kyosyou to onazi mozi wo hai siteiru.
kayou
koziki ha monogatarityuu kokoro ni kaka reteiruga, soredakedenaku ooku no kayou mo sounyuu sareteiru. korerano kayou no ooku ha, minyou ya zokuyou deattamonoga, monogatari ni awa sete sounyuu sareta kanousei ga takai.
yuumei na utato site, susanoo inoti ga kusi nada hime to kekkon sitatokini utai, waka no hazimari tosareru yakumo tatu izumo yaegaki tuma gomini yaegaki tukuru sono yaegaki woya, yamatotakeru inoti ga tousei no kito de kokyou wo omotu te utatu ta wa ha kuni nomahoroba tatanazuku aogaki yama kakure ru wa si uruwasinadogaaru.
kousei
agatu kan zyo sinwa
atatu kan syodai kara zyuugo dai tennou made made
kudatu kan dai zyuuroku dai kara sanzyuu sandai tennou madeno kan yori natu teiru.
tokutyou
koziki no keihu kizi de tokutyouteki nanoha, syuuroku siteiru sizoku keihu ga ooku touitusei ga takaku, bokei no keihu wo zyuusi siteiru ten ga age rareru. nihonsyoki de sirusa reru touzyou suru keihu ha sizoku daga, koziki ha si wo kazoe ru. kuwae te, iti so ta si kata no keihu mo ooi tosareru.
mata, nihonsyoki de youmei tennou no kougou nituite nobe ta bubun ha anahobe hasihito ouzyo wo tate te kougou tosu. kore ni uma seru si no otoko, sono iti ha umayado ouzi to iwaku huto sirusi, sono notini umayado ouzi yasono sinzoku nituite sirusi ta notini, soga daizin iname sukune no onna isikina wo tate te hin tosu. kore ni tame ouzi wo uma serito sirusa reteirunoni taisi, koziki deha iname sukune daizin no onna i tomi gei ta sihi bai wo metori te uma seru miko, ta kome ou. mata syo imouto hasihito anou bu ou wo metori te uma seru miko, zyouguu yuki umayado toyotomimi inoti tonatteori, soga si ga yuusen sare, zyouguu ouke nituiteno kizyutu ga notini natteiru. sosite, koziki niha syoutoku taisi ni kansu ru kizi ga issai mie nai. konotame, koziki ha syoutoku taisi no sonzai wo soga si yori koutai sasetari, syoutoku taisi no rekisi wo musisi teirutosareru. seikikouhan kara seiki syotou nikaketeno nihonsyoki no hensyuusagyou deha, syoutoku taisi wo raisan suru sityou ga mie runoni taisi, onazi ziki ni seiritu sita koziki dehasonoyouna sityou ga mira renaidokoroka, sono ziseki wo musisi teiru. sono ue, soga mago ga syudou sita susyun tennou no ansatu ni kansu ru kizyutu mo koziki niha sonzai sinai.
koziki no ouzyo no kisai houhou niha touitusei ganaku, hime inoti ya iratume nadoga konzai siteori, ouzyo de touitu sareteiru nihonsyoki toha ookiku kotona tteiru. sikasi, koziki no kinmei ki bidatu ki deha ouzi mo ouzyo mo ou de touitu sareteiru. koreha, kinmei outou to soga si ga musubi tuita seizikeitai ga seiritu siteitakaradearuto kangae rareru.
kuwae te, koziki no tuuzyou no youzi hou deha kazuraki to hyouki sarerubekidearuga, nintoku ki rityuu ki deha katuragi to kouzi ni aratame rareteiru kasyo gaari, koreha soga mago ga katuragi sin wo syousi tatamedearuto kangae rareteiru.
mata, koziki deha kougen tennou takeuti sukune soga isikawa soga si toiu keihu wo sirusi teirunoni taisi te, nihonsyoki dehasorewo sirusi teinai. mata, ketu si yatusiro no koukyo to goryou ha soga si no seiryoku kiban dearu katuragi takaiti tiiki ni syuutyuu siteiru. koreha, ketu si yatusiro ya takeuti sukune no keihu ga suiko asa nioite soga si no teni yotte keisei saretakaradearuto kangae rareru. sikasi, suiko asa no dankai de soga si no subete no keihu ga kakuteisi teitanodehanaku, soga isikawa sukune ha soga kuranoyamada isikawamaro niyotte sousaku saretamonodearuto kangae rareru.
syahon
genzon suru koziki no syahon ha, omoni ise hon keitou to urabe hon keitou ni waka reru.
ise hon keitou
genzon suru koziki no syahon de saiko nomonoha, ise hon keitou no nantyou kentoku nen hokutyou ouan nen nen kara yoku, nantyou buntyuu gannen hokutyou ouan nen nen nikakete sinpukuzi no sou satosi yu niyotte utusa reta sinpukuzi hon koziki san tyou kokuhou dearu. okugaki niyoreba, sohon ha ue gekan ga oonakatomi tei yo hon, tyuukan ga huziwara mitimasa hon dearu. douka hon zyoukan no zenhan nomi. nantyou kouwa gannen hokutyou eitoku gannen nen sya , miti syou hon zyoukan nomi. ouei nen nen sya , haru yu hon zyoukan nomi. ouei nen nen sya no douka hon kei hon ha sinpukuzi hon ni tikaku, tomoni ise hon keitou wonasu.
urabe hon keitou
ise hon keitou wo nozoku syahon ha subete urabe hon keitou ni zokusuru. sohon ha urabe kanenaga zihitu hon kaminaka sita kan. muromatizidai kouki sya dearu.
zyuyou kenkyuu si
tyoutei deha heianzidai, nihonsyoki nituite daigaku ryou no gakusya ga kugyou ni kaisetu suru nippon ki kouen nippon ki kou, kousyo ga okonawa re, koziki ha sankoubunken tosite tukawa reta. kogo wo tutae ru kaki tosite zyuusi sarerukotomoareba, yatabe kinmoti noyouni hennen karada denaikotode hikuku hyouka sitauede sendai kyuuzi hongi no houga yori hurui sisyo dearuto syutyou suru kousi moita.
kamakurazidai niha, tyoutei demo hiken dekiru nin ga sukunai hihon atukai de, tokuni tyuukan ha konoe kaden kono kaki wo osame ta kamo in o bunko nisikanaito iwa reteita. sousita naka, koutyou nen nen ni ukon mamoru taisyou huziwara mitimasa ga huryo ni tyuukan wo teniire ta. zingi kan no urabe kanebumi urabe kanekata no titi ha bunei nen nen ni mitimasa kara, bunei nen nen niha takatukasa kanehira kara tyuukan wo kari te syosya sita. hiroyasu nen nen niha huziwara si itizyou ie ga urabe ie kara kari ta koziki wo syosya site zika denrai hon to kyougou si, yokunen sarani isezinguu saisyu no oonakatomi tei yo ga itizyou ie kara kari te syosya sita. mago no oonakatomi tikatada ga isezinguu geguu negi no watarai ieyuki ise sintou no taisei mono ni kasi te syahon ga bu tukurareta. korega, isezinguu to missetu na kakawa rigaatta sinpukuzi ni tutawa ru koziki saiko no syahon no motoni nattato suisoku sareru. watarai ieyuki ha zityo ruizyu zingi hongen ni koziki wo inyou sita.
muromatizidai kouki no sintou ie no yosida kanetomo mo, nihonsyoki wo saizyou tositutumo sendai kyuuzi hongi to koziki wo sanbu no honsyo to yon de zyuusi sita.
edozidai syoki no kanei nen nen ni kyouto de insatu niyoru kanpon koziki iwayuru kanei koziki ga syuppan sare, kenkyuu ga sakan ninatta. deguti nobuyosi ga goutou goutou koziki wo teikyou nen nen ni kankou sitahoka, dainippon si nitunagaru syuusi zigyou wo hazime ta tokugawa mitukuni mito hansyu nimo eikyou wo atae ta.
edozidai ni ryuusei suru kokugaku demo zyuusi sare, kada azumamaro ha koziki sakki sakki, kamo mabuti ha koziki tousyo tousyowo itizirusi ta. sosite kyouto yuugaku nakani kanei han koziki wo nyuusyu sita motoori norinaga ha, kamo mabuti tono matusaka no itiya demo koziki no zyuuyousei wo toka rete honkakuteki na kenkyuu ni torikumi, zen kan no tyuusyaku kaki koziki den wo kansei nen nen ni kanseisa seta. koreha koziki kenkyuu no koten deari, genmitu katu zissyouteki na koutei ha kousei ni ooki na eikyou wo atae teiru.
dainizisekaitaisen noti ha, kurano kenzi ya takeda yuukiti, saigou nobutuna, nisinomiya kazutami, kounosi takamitu raniyoru kenkyuu ya tyuusyaku kaki ga happyou sareta. tokuni kurano kenzi niyoru iwanamibunkoban ha, syohan nen syouwa nen kankou irai, zyuuhan no tuusan ha yaku manbu ni tassi teiru. seikikouhan ninari, koziki no kenkyuu hasoremadeno seiritu ron kara sakuhin ron heto sihuto siteiru. seiritu ron no daihyou tositeha tuda soukiti ya isimota sei gaari, sakuhin ron no daihyou tositeha, yosii gan saigou nobutuna kounosi takamitu gairu.
gisyo setu
koziki niha, kinsei edozidai ikou, gisyo no utagai wo motu mono gaatta. kamo mabuti norinaga ate syokan ya numata zyun gi, nakazawa ken mei, ikada isao, matumoto masaaki, yamato iwao, oosima hayato, miura yuu yuki, houga tosio raha, koziki seiritu ga kou no sisyo ni kisai ganaikotoya, zyobun no husizen sanadohe gimon wo teizi si, gisyo setu wo tonae teiru.
gisyo setu niha omoni nitoori ari, zyobun nomiga gisyo tosuru setu to, honbun mo gisyo tosuru setu ni waka reru. ikani gaiyou wo sirusu.
zyobun gisyo setu deha koziki no zyobun zyouhyou bun nioite katara reru koziki no seiritu zizyou wo syousu ru gaibu no yuuryoku na syouko ganaikotonadokara zyobun no seitousei ni gigi wo siteki suru. mata hieda are no zituzaisei ga hizyouni hikui kotoya, hensan no tyokumei ga dasa reta nengou no kisai ganaikoto, kani no kisai ya seiritu madeno kisai ga zusan nakotokara gisyo no kanousei wo siteki siteiru. nao gisyo toha tyosya ya sippitu ziki nadono raireki wo nise tta syomotu nokotodearukara, sono imi deha zyobun ga gisaku deareba koziki ha gisyo toiukotoninaru. motiron, sono baai mo honbun no seitousei ha betuno mondai dearu.
honbun gisyo setu deha, koziki niha nihonsyoki yori atarasii sinwa no naiyou ya, engi siki ni mie nai zinzya ga hukuma reteirutosite, yori zidai no kudaru heianzidai syoki koro, mataha kamakurazidai no naritato minasu. kono setu niha kousei ni zyobun honbun no zenbu wo sousaku sitatosuru setu to, nihonsyoki douyou no hurui siryou ni totyuu totyuu kahitu si tuzuke tamonotosuru setu gaaru. mata sinsen seisi roku demo koziki honbun ni touzyou suru keihu densyou ga inyou sareteinainado, sono seiritu ni husin na ten ga tata aru. konouti, honbun gisyo setu nouti zenbu wo sousaku sitatosuru setu ha kamisiro bungakukai rekisigaku kai niha ukeire rareteinai. kamisiro tokusyu kanazukai no naka demo, manyousyuu nihonsyoki deha sudeni syousitu siteiru syurui no mo no hyoukizyou no kubetu ga, koziki niha zanson surukaradearu. nao zyobun niha kamisiro tokusyu kanazukai ha issai tukawa reteinai.
zyobun gisyo setu no ronkyo ni, hieda are no zituzaisei ga hikuku, tayasu man ryo noyouna sei no kisai ganaikotoga kokusi tosite husizen dearukoto, kani nonai teikyuu mibun no ningen wo toneri tosite touyou sitatoha kangae rarenaikoto, hensan no tyokurei ga kudasa reta nen no kisai ganaikoto, koziki igai no sisyo zoku nippon ki kounin siki nippon ki kyouen waka nadodeha tayasu maro to kaka reteirunoni, koziki zyobun nomi tayasu man ryo to kotonaru hyouki ninatteirukotogaatta. tokoroga, nen syouwa nen gatu ni narasi kore se konose mati yori tayasu man ryo no bosi mei ga syutudo si, sokoni sokoni
toattakotoga hanmei si, kanzihyouki no idou toiu ronkyo ni kansi teha hitei sarerukototonatta. sikasi, gisyo setu nioiteha tayasu man ryo no hyouki no idou ga mondai dehanaku, yasumaro zisin ga koziki hensan ni kanyo sitakotoga nanra syoumeisa reteinaikotoga mondai tosareru.
mata, nara kyou ato kara syutudo sita, tayasu man ryo no bosi mei wo hukumu mokkan no kaiseki niyori, koziki seiritu touzi niha, sudeni koziki de siyousa reru kakikotoba ha ippanteki ni siyousa reteitato hanmei sita. soreniyori zyobun nakano sikare domo, zyouko no toki, geni kotobakokoro narabi ni boku sunahonisite, bun wo siki ku wo kou hurukoto, zi niokitesunahati muzukasi. ha zyobun no sakuseisya ga touzi no nihongo no siyouzyoukyou wo sirazu ni souzou de kai tanodehanaikato siteki sareteiru.
honbun mokuzi
zyo
koden uketamawato sono igi igi
tenmu tennou to koziki no kikaku kikaku
tayasu man ryo no koziki sen roku roku
zyoukan
tyuukan
gekan
naiyou
zyo wo awase tari
senzya dearu ta ason yasumaro ga tensi ni souzyou suru keisiki ni naratu ta zyobun dearu.
zyo dai dan keiko syoukon ko wo kei hete, ima ni tera su su
kokodeha koziki no naiyou no youten wo tenti kaibyaku kara age, sarani, sorezoreno miyo no ziseki ha kotonaru ga seizi nituiteno kisai nihahobo ayamari hanakattato nobe teiru.
sin yasumaro gen su. sore, kongen sudeni kori te, kisyou imada kou araharezu. mei monaku tame mo nasi. dare rekasono katati wo sira mu.
ho syuu hosiu kakui onoonokotoni, bun situ onazi kuarazuto iedomo, ko wo kei kamugahete kaze yuu wo sudeni sutare taruni nawa tadasi, ima ni tera site ten osowo tae mutosuruni ho hazutoihukotonasi.
zyo dai dan koziki sen roku no hottan hottan
kokodeha, mazu, tenmu tennou no ziseki wo ogosoka ni nobe ta noti, tenmu tennou ga hieda are ni tyokugo site, teiki kyuuzi wo syou syuu sasetaga, kekkyoku bunsyou ni nokose nakatta keii wo sirusi teiru.
kokoni tennou tenmu mikotonori noritamahisiku tin ware kiki tamaheraku, syoka nomotarasu teiki oyobi hon zi, sudeni masami ni tagahi, ooku kyogi wo kuhahu. toiheri. ima no tokini atari te, sono situ ayamariwo aratame zuha, imada ikunen womo hezu sitesono mune horobi nantosu. koresunahati, houka no keii, ouka no kou motona ri. yue kore, teiki wo sen roku si, kyuuzi wo tou kaku site, ituwari wo kezuri mi makotowo sadame te, kouyou notinotini ryuu tutahemuto yoku omohu. tonoritamahiki. tokini toneri toneriariki. sei uziha hieda hieda, mei ha are are, nen hakore nizyuu hati. nin to suri soumei nisite, mimi ni do watareba kuti ni syou yomi, mimi ni hutu hurureba kokoro ni roku sirusiki. sunahati, are ni tyokugo site mikado kou hitugi sumeramikotonohitugi oyobi sendai kyuuzi sakituyonohurukotowo syou mi naraha simetamahiki.
zyo dai dan koziki no seiritu seiritu
kokodeha, motoaki tennou no yo tonatte, mikotonori niyori yasumaro ga hieda are no syou narawo sen roku sita keii wo nobe, saigo ni naiyou no kubun nituite sirusi teiru. keii deha kotoba wo mozi ni okikaeru noni hizyouni kurou sita mune ga gutaiteki ni sirusa reteiru.
kokoni, kyuuzi no ayamari tagaheruwo osi mi, saki ki no byuu ri saku mazireruwo tadasa mutosite, wadou yonen kugatu zyuuhati niti womotite, sin yasumaro ni mikotonori risite, hieda are no syou mu tokoro no tyokugo no kyuuzi wo sen roku site kenzyou sesimurutoihereba, tutusimi te mikotonori mune ohomikotono zui manimani, sisai ni tori hirohinu. sikare domo, zyouko no toki, geni kotobakokoro narabi ni boku sunahonisite, bun wo siki ku wo kou hurukoto, zi niokitesunahati muzukasi.
taitei sirusu tokoro ha, tenti kaibyaku yori hazime te, syou haruta woharidano miyo ni kitu woharu. yue, amenominakanusi kami amenominakanusinokami ika, nissi nami gen ken ugaya huki hugou inoti hikonagisatakeugayahukiahezunomikoto izen wo zyoukan tonasi, kanyamatoiharebiko tennou kamuyamatoiharebikonosumeramikoto ika, hin hebi miyo homudanomiyo izen wo tyuukan tonasi, oosazaki koutei ohosaginomikado ika, syou haruta oomiya woharidanoohomiya izen wo gekan tonasi, awase te sankan wo roku site, tutusimi te kenzyou ru. sin yasumaro, makoto kou makoto kyou, tonsyu tonsyu.
zyoukan kamitumaki
tenti kaibyaku kara nippon retu sima no keisei to kokudo no seibi ga katara re, tenson kourin wo hete iwarehiko zinmu tennou no tanzyou madewo sirusu. iwayuru nihonsinwa dearu.
tenti kaibyaku no notini siti dai no kami ga koutai si, sono saigo ni izanagi, izanami ga umare ta. hutagami ha takamagahara ten kara asihara nakatu kuni tizyou sekai ni ori, kekkon site musuba re, sono ko tosite, daihati sima kuni wo umi, tuide, yama no kami, umi no kami nado samazamana kami wo un da. kousita kokusan mino totyuu, izanami ha hi no kami wo un datame, yakedo wo oi sin desimai, izumonokuni to houki kuni no sakai niaru hiba yama gen simane ken yasugi si ni houmura reta. izanagi ha izanami wo koisi gari, yomi no kuni sisya no sekai wo otozure ture modoso utosuruga, ture modose zu, kokusan miha mikansei nomama owa ru.
izanagi ha yomi no kuni no kegare wo oto sutame, misogi wo okonai, hidarime wo aratu tatokini amaterasu oomika amaterasuoomikami , migime wo aratu tatokini tukuyomi inoti tukuyominomikoto , hana wo aratu tatokini susanoo inoti susanoonomikoto wo umu. sono noti, saisyo ni un da awazi sima no yuu miya de sugo sita. korera mikami ha mikiko to yoba re, kamigami no naka de zyuuyouna iti wo sime runodaga, tukuyomi inoti ni kansi tehasono tanzyougo no kizyutu ga issai nai. susanoonomikoto ha ranboumono natame, ane no amaterasu ni hangyaku wo utagawa reru. sokode, amaterasu to susanoonomikoto ha kokoro no keppaku wo sirabe ru seiyaku ukeiwo okonai ituo sanzyo kami ga tanzyou suru. sono kekka, susanoonomikoto ha keppaku wo syoumeisu ruga, tyousi ni notte abare tesimai, sonotame amaterasu ha ten iwaya ko ni tozi komoruga, atuma tta syosin no tie de soto ni dasu kotoni seikou suru.
ippou, susanoonomikoto ha kamigami no sinpan niyori takamagahara wo tuihou sare, asihara nakatu kuni no izumonokuni ni kudaru. kokomadeha ranbou nadakedatta susanoonomikoto no yousou ha henkasi, eiyuu tekina monotonatte yamatanooroti taizi wo okona u. tugini, susanoonomikoto no sison dearu ookuninusi kami ga touzyou suru. ookuninusi no inaba no sirousagi inaba no sirousagi ya kyuukon to zyunan no hanasi ga tuzuki ookuninusi no sinwa , sukunahikona totomoni kunitukuri riwo susume takotoga sirusa reru. kokudo ga totonou to kuni yuzuri no sinwa ni uturu. amaterasu oomika ha asihara nakatu kuni no touti ken wo tenson ni izyou surukotowo youkyuu si, ookuninusi to kodomo no kotosironusi kami hasorewo zyudaku suru. ko no takeminakata kami ha, syoudaku sezu teikou suruga, notini zyudaku suru. asihara nakatu kuni no touti ken wo eru to takamagahara no kamigami ha tenson ninigi wo hyuuga no takatiho ni kourin saseru. tugini, ninigi no kodomo no yamasatihiko to umisatihiko no setuwa tonari, urasima tarou no ruutu tomoiwareru umigami no kyuuden no houmon ya i zoku no hukuzoku no yurai nadoga katara reru. yamasatihiko ha umigami no musume to kekkon si, tanzyou sita musuko momata umigami no musume to kekkon si, mago no zinmu tennou ga tanzyou site zyoukan ha owa ru.
zyoukan ni dete kuru omona kamigami
betten tu kami kotoamatukami kotoamatukami
tenti kaibyaku to tomoni arawareta kamigami. mazu saisyo no hasira zouka no mikami gaaraware, notini nokori no hasira gaarawareta. hasira subete miwo kakusi ta. amenominakanusi kami amenominakanusi amenominakanusi
ten hara no tyuusin no kami kami
takamimusuhi kami takamimusubi takamimusubi
seisei tikara no sinkaku ka, tensin kami no syugo syugo
kamimusubi kami kamimusubi kamimusubi
seisei tikara no sinkaku ka, kunitukami no syugo syugo
uma kokorozasi a si ka bi hiko ti kami umasiasikabihikozi umasiasikabihikozi
ten yuki tune tategami amenotokotati kami yo siti dai kamiyonanayo kamiyonanayo
betten tu kami ni tuide araware ta hasira dai no kamigami, oyobisono zidai wo sasu. kuniyuki tune tategami kuninotokotati kuninotokotati
kokudo no kongen kami kami
toyokumono kami toyokumono toyokumono
uizini kami uhizini suizini kami suhizini suhizini
daime ikou haizuremo kyoudai kami dearu.
tunogui kami tunoguhi ikugui kami ikuguhi ikuguhi
ootonozi kami ohotonozi daito no ben kami ohotonobe ohotonobe
o haha hebi ryuu kami omodaru a yoru ka kokorozasi ko doro kami ayakasikone ayakasikone
izanagi kami izanami kami kami
kyoudai deari huuhu. mikiko mihasiranouzunomiko mihasiranouzunomiko
izanagi kami zisin ga un da syosin no naka de mottomo toutoi tositatokorokarakou yoba reru. amaterasu oomika oomika
izanagi ga hidari no me wo aratu tatoki umare ta.
tukuyomi inoti tukuyominomikoto tukuyominomikoto
izanagi ga migi no me wo aratu tatoki umare ta.
susanoo inoti inoti
izanagi ga hana wo aratu tatoki umare ta. notini takamagahara wo tuihou sareru. ookuninusi kami kami
susanoo inoti no sison. kuni yuzuri izen ni asihara tyuugoku wo osame teita kunitukami.
tizin godai godai
ikano hasira oyobi tenzin kara zinkou heno ikouki wo sasu. amaterasu oomika oomika
amanoosihomimi inoti inoti
tizin godai no daime. amaterasu oomika to susanoo inoti no seiyaku niyori umare ta.
ninigi inoti inoti
amanoosihomimi inoti no ko. ten de umare, ookuninusi kami karano kuni yuzuri wo uke te asihara tyuugoku ni hutu ta tenson kourin .
hoori inoti inoti
ninigi inoti no ko. yamasatihiko tositemo sira reru.
ugayahukiaezu inoti inoti
hoori inoti no ko. syodai tennou no titioya. sanzyo kami to ituo kami kami
amaterasu oomika to susanoo inoti no seiyaku niyori umare ta, amanoosihomimi inoti wo hukumu kamigami. megami tooru ha munakata sanzyo kami tomo yoba reru.
tyuukan nakatumaki
syodai zinmu tennou kara dai ouzin tennou madewo sirusu. dai kara dai madeha ketu si yatusiro to yoba re, keihu nadono kizyutu nomide, setuwa nadoha kisai ga sukunai. sonotame, kono yatusiro ha kousei ni tuika sareta kakuu no sonzai dearutoiu setu gaaruga, zituzai setu mo sonzai suru. nao, zinmu tousei ni hazimari, yamatotakeru ya zinguu kougou nituite sirusu. zinmu tennou nadono kaku tennou no kanhuu sigou ha koziki hensan touzi ha sadame rareteinaitame, kuniburi sigou nomide sirusa reteiru. kaku tennou ryou no genzai no hitei ti nituiteha tennou ryou itiran mo sansyou.
tyuukan ni dete kuru omona zinbutu
dai zinmu tennou tennou
kanyamatoiharebiko inoti kamuyamatoiharebikonomikoto, une hi no siro yusuhara miya kasiharanomiya naraken unebi santou minami no ti ni za imasite, ten no sita osamu sirasimesiki. tennou no o nen kyounen ha ippyaku sanzyuunanasai momoamarimisozimarinanatose. goryou mihakaha unebi yama no kita no hou no siro tou kasino o no ueni ari naraken kasihara si .
dai suizei tennou tennou
kami numa kawa mimi inoti kamununakahamiminomikoto, katuragi no takaoka miya naraken gosyo si ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesiki. tennou no o nen ha yonzyuugosai yosozimariitutose. goryou ha syou ta tukidano oka niari naraken kasihara si .
dai annei tennou tennou
si kizu nissi gyokusyu ken inoti sikituhikotamademinomikoto, hen sio no ukiana miya naraken yamatotakada si ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesiki. tennou no o nen ha yonzyuukyuusai yosozimarikokonotose. goryou ha unebi yama no okage mihotoniari naraken kasihara si .
dai itoku tennou tennou
yamato nissi tomo inoti ohoyamatohikosukitomonomikoto, karono sakai okamiya naraken kasihara si ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesiki. tennou no o nen ha yonzyuugosai yosozimariitutose. goryou ha unebi yama no manako manago tani no ueni ari naraken kasihara si .
dai kousyou tennou tennou
o makoto tu nissi ka megumi kokorozasi doro inoti mimatuhikokaesinenomikoto, katuragi no wakigami miya naraken gosyo si ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesiki. tennou no o nen ha kyuuzyuusansai kokonosozimarimitose. goryou ha wakigami wakigamino hakata hakata yama no ueni ari naraken gosyo si .
dai kouan tennou tennou
yamato obi nissi kuni ou zinmei ohoyamatotarasihikokuniosihitonomikoto, katuragi no situ no akitu sima naraken gosyo si ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesiki. tennou no o nen ha ippyaku nizyuusansai momoamarihatatimarimitose. goryou ha gyokusyu tamadeno oka no ueni ari naraken gosyo si .
dai kourei tennou tennou
yamato neko nissi hu to zi inoti ohoyamatonekohikohutoninomikoto, kuroda no iori ko miya ro ko miya naraken tawaramoto mati ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesiki. tennou no o nen ha ippyaku rokusai momoamarimutose. goryou ha kataoka no uma saka no ueni ari naraken ouzi mati . ketu si yatusiro de yuiitu, daikiti bi tu nissi inoti to wakatake kibituhiko inoti niyoru kibi heitei ga kanketu ni kaka reteiru.
dai kougen tennou tennou
yamato neko nissi kuni ku ryuu inoti ohoyamatonekohikokunikurunomikoto, karono sakai hara miya naraken kasihara si ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesiki. tennou no o nen ha gozyuunanasai isozimarinanatose. goryou ha turugi ike no nakano oka no ueni ari naraken kasihara si .
dai kaika tennou tennou
zyaku wa neko nissi dai bi bi inoti wakayamatonekohikoohobibinomikoto, kasuga no iza kawamiya izakahanomiya narasi ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesiki. tennou no o nen ha rokuzyuusansai musozimarimitose. goryou ha iza iza kawa no saka no ueni ari narasi .
dai suzin tennou tennou
o maki irihi ko in megumi inoti mimakiirihikoinienomikoto, si ki sikino mizugaki miya mizugakinomiya naraken sakurai si ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesiki. tennou no o tosi ha ippyaku rokuzyuuhassai momoamarimusozimariyatose. tutinoetora no zyuunigatu ni kuzuri masiki. goryou ha yamabe yamanobeno miti no kou magarino oka no ueni ari naraken tenrisi .
dai suinin tennou tennou
iku kome iri hiko isa timei ikumeiribikoisatinomikoto, si ki no tamagaki miya naraken sakurai si ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesiki. tennou no o nen ha ippyaku gozyuusansai momoamariisozimarimitose. goryou ha sugawara no o tateno no nakani ari narasi .
dai kageyuki tennou tennou
ootarasihiko osirowake tennou ohotarasihikoosirowakenosumeramikoto, makimuku makimukuno hisiro miya naraken sakurai si ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesiki. tennou no o nen ha ippyaku sanzyuunanasai momoamarimisozimarinanatose. goryou ha yamabe no miti no ueni ari naraken tenrisi .
yamatotakeru inoti yamatotakerunomikoto yamatotakerunomikoto
nou han no nobono mieken suzuka gun ni itari masi, uta hi kyou wohuru sunawati kuzuri masiki. goryou wo tukuru. kokoni yahiro siro satoru tori yahirosirotidorini bari te, ten ni kakeri te hama ni muki te tobi gyou demasiki. kawauti kuni no kokorozasi ki sikini tomari masiki. yue, sono ti ni goryou wo tukuri te tutusima ri masa simeki. sunawatisono goryou wo gou kete, hakutyou no goryou to iu.
dai seimu tennou tennou
zyaku obi nissi tennou wakatarasihikonosumeramikoto, siga no taka anaho miya takaanahonomiya sigakenootusi ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesiki. tennou no o nen ha kyuuzyuugosai kokonosozimariitutose. kinotou no nen no sangatu zyuugo niti ni kuzuri masiki. goryou ha saki no ta hoka nami tatanaminiari naraken narasi .
dai tyuuai tennou tennou
obi tyuuniti ko tennou tarasinakatuhikonosumeramikoto, anato anado yamagutiken simonosekisi tyouhu , mata tikusi no si sihi miya kasihinomiya hukuokasi kasii ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesiki. tennou no o nen ha gozyuunisai isozimarihutatose. mizunoeinu no nen no rokugatu zyuuiti niti ni kuzuri masiki. goryou ha kawauti no megumi ga no tyoukou nagaeniari oosakahu minamikawati gun .
zinguu kougou kougou
okinaga obi niti hi bai inoti okinagatarasihimenomikoto. kougou ha o tosikazu hyakuzyuusai momotosenisite kuzuri masiki. kyou siro no tate retu tatanamino ryou ni houmuri maturiki narasi .
dai ouzin tennou tennou
hin hebi waki inoti homudawakenomikoto, karusima no mei miya akiranomiya naraken kasihara si ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesiki. tennou no o nen ha ippyaku sanzyuusai momoamarimisotose. kinoeuma no nen no kugatu kokonoka ni kuzuri masiki. goryou ha kawauti kahutino megumi ga no mo huku mohusino oka niari oosakahu minamikawati gun .
gekan simotumaki
dai nintoku tennou kara dai suiko tennou madewo sirusu. dai ninken tennou kara suiko tennou madeha ketu si yatusiro to onazi ku keihu nadono kizyutu nomide gutaiteki na tyozyutu ga sukunai. koreha, touzi nioiteha zidai ga tikaku zimei nokotonanode kaka renakattanadotoiwareru.
gekan ni dete kuru omona zinbutu
dai nintoku tennou tennou
oosazaki inoti ohosazakinomikoto, nanba no takatu miya oosakasi ni za imasite, ten no sita osamu sirasimesiki. tennou no o nen ha hatizyuusansai yasozimarimitose. hinotou no nen no hatigatu zyuugo niti ni kuzuri masiki. goryou ha mozu mozuno mimihara mimiharaniari oosakahusakaisi .
dai rityuu tennou tennou
iza hon waki inoti izahowakenomikoto, inami rei ihareno wakasa miya naraken sakurai si ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesiki. tennou no o nen ha rokuzyuuyonsai musozimariyotose. zinsin no nen no syougatu mikka ni kuzuri masiki. goryou ha mozu niari oosakahusakaisi .
dai hanzei tennou tennou
mizu ha betumei mizuhawakenomikoto, tazihi tazihino sibagaki miya ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesiki oosakahu minamikawati gun . tennou no o nen ha rokuzyuusai musotose. hinotousi no nen no sitigatu kuzuri masiki. goryou ha mozu no mozunoniari.
dai ingyou tennou tennou
otoko asazu kan wakako sukune inoti woasazumawakugonosukunenomikoto, tootuasuka miya tohotuasukanomiya naraken asuka mura ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesiki. tennou no o nen ha nanazyuuhassai nanasozimariyatose. kinoeuma no nen no syougatu zyuugo niti ni kuzuri masiki. goryou ha kawauti no megumi ga no tyou eda nagaeniari oosakahu minamikawati gun .
dai ankou tennou tennou
anaho miko anahonomiko, isigami isonokamino anaho miya anahonomiya naraken tenrisi ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesiki. tennou no o nen ha gozyuurokusai isozimarimutose. goryou ha sugawara no husimi no oka niari narasi .
dai yuuryakutennou yuuryakutennou
oohatuse wakatake inoti ohohatusewakatakenomikoto, hase hatuseno asakura miya naraken sakurai si ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesiki. tennou no o nen ha ippyaku nizyuuyonsai momoamarihatatimariyotose. tutinotomi no nen no hatigatu kokonoka ni kuzuri masiki. goryou ha kawauti no tazihi no taka takawasiniari oosakahu minamikawati gun .
dai seinei tennou tennou
siraga yamato neko inoti sirakanoohoyamatonekonomikoto, inami rei ihareno kame kuri miya mikakurinomiya naraken kasihara si ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesiki.
dai kenzou tennou tennou
en ke yuki isi su betumei wokenoihasuwakenomikoto, kin asuka miya tikatuasukanomiya oosakahu minamikawati gun ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesukoto hassai nariki. tennou no o nen ha sanzyuuhassai misozimariyatose. goryou ha kataoka no isi hai ihatukino oka no ueni ari naraken kasiba si .
dai ninken tennou tennou
i ke inoti okenomikoto, isigami no hirotaka miya naraken tenrisi kani masi te, ten no sita naora simesiki.
dai buretu tennou tennou
ohase zyaku suzume inoti ohatusenowakasazakinomikoto, hase no retu kimiya namikinomiya naraken sakurai si ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesukoto hassai nariki. goryou ha kataoka no isi hai no oka niari.
dai keitai tennou tennou
en hon inoti wohodonomikoto, inami rei no tamaho miya tamahonomiya naraken sakurai si ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesiki. tennou no o nen ha yonzyuusansai yosozimarimitose. hinotohituzi no nen no sigatu kokonoka ni kuzuri masiki. goryou ha misima no ai no goryou nari oosakahu misima gun . iwai no ran isii to hyouki nituite kanketu ni hurete iru.
dai ankan tennou tennou
hirokuni ou ken kin niti inoti hirokuniositakekanahinomikoto, kou magarino kin hasi miya kanahasinomiya naraken kasihara si ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesiki. kinotou no nen no sangatu zyuusan niti ni kuzuri masiki. goryou ha kawauti no huruiti hurutino takaya mura niari oosakahu minamikawati gun .
dai senka tennou tennou
ken syou hirokuni ou tate inoti takeohirokuniositatenomikoto, hinoki hinokumano ro irino miya ihorinonomiya naraken asuka mura ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesiki naraken asuka mura .
dai kinmei tennou tennou
tengoku ou nami ryuu si koutei tennou amekuniosiharukihironiwanosumeramikoto, si kizima sikisimano oomiya naraken sakurai si ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesiki.
dai bidatu tennou tennou
nuna kura hutodama siki inoti nunakurahutotamasikinomikoto, osada miya wosadanomiya naraken sakurai si ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesukoto, zyuuyonsai nariki. kinoetatu no nen no sigatu muika ni kuzuri masiki. goryou ha kawauti no katyou sinaganiari oosakahu minamikawati gun .
daiyou mei tennou tennou
tatibananotoyohi inoti tatibananotoyohinomikoto, ikebe miya naraken sakurai si ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesukoto, sansai nariki. hinotohituzi no nen no sigatu zyuugo niti ni kuzuri masiki. goryou ha isi sun ihareno wakigami ikenoueniarisiwo, notini katyou no nakano ryou ni sen siki oosakahu minamikawati gun .
dai susyun tennou tennou
hasebe zyaku suzume inoti hatusebenowakasasaginomikoto, kurahasi no sibagaki miya sibakakinomiya naraken sakurai si ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesukoto, yonsai nariki. mizunoene no nen no zyuuitigatu zyuusan niti ni kuzuri masiki. goryou ha kurahasi no oka no ueni ari naraken sakurai si .
dai suiko tennou tennou
yutaka mike kasikiya hime inoti toyomikekasikiyahimenomikoto, syou haruta miya wowaritanomiya naraken asuka mura ni masi te, ten no sita naora simesukoto, sanzyuunanasai nariki. tutinoene no nen no sangatu zyuugo niti ni kuzuri masiki. goryou ha oono no oka no ueni arisiwo, notini katyou no ooki ryou ni sen siki oosakahu minamikawati gun .
zenbun
zenbun tekisuto oyobi zenbun kensaku
motoori yutaka rai, inoue yorikuni, ueda mannen koutei koutei koziki kou ten koukyuu tokoro, nen nen

takeda yuukiti wake tyuu gendaigoyaku koziki , nen nen
eiin hukusei
bon syun hude koziki zyoukan muromatizidai makki sya kokugakuindai gaku dezitaruraiburarii syosyuu syosyuu
bon syun hude koziki tyuukan muromatizidai makki sya kokugakuindai gaku dezitaruraiburarii syosyuu syosyuu
bon syun hude koziki gekan muromatizidai makki sya kokugakuindai gaku dezitaruraiburarii syosyuu syosyuu
motoori norinaga kun kokun koziki kan kyouto nagata tyou bee, . kokuhon kokuritu kokkaitosyokan kindai dezitaruraiburarii dezitaruraiburarii
kada azumamaro kunten koziki zyoukan kanei nen nen kan kokugakuindai gaku dezitaruraiburarii syosyuu syosyuu
kada azumamaro kunten koziki tyuukan kanei nen nen kan kokugakuindai gaku dezitaruraiburarii syosyuu syosyuu
kada azumamaro kunten koziki gekan kanei nen nen kan kokugakuindai gaku dezitaruraiburarii syosyuu syosyuu
satosi yu hude sinpukuzi hon koziki makiage nen koten hozon kai hukusei kokuritu kokkaitosyokan kindai dezitaruraiburarii dezitaruraiburarii
satosi yu hude sinpukuzi hon koziki kan naka nen koten hozon kai hukusei kokuritu kokkaitosyokan kindai dezitaruraiburarii dezitaruraiburarii
satosi yu hude sinpukuzi hon koziki kan sita nen koten hozon kai hukusei kokuritu kokkaitosyokan kindai dezitaruraiburarii dezitaruraiburarii
kouda sigetomo koutei koziki nen iwanamisyoten iwanamibunko kyoukasyo han kokuritu kokkaitosyokan kindai dezitaruraiburarii dezitaruraiburarii
satosi yu hude kokuhou sinpukuzi hon koziki nen kyouto insyo kan hukusei hukusei
satosi yu hude kokuhou sinpukuzi hon koziki nen ouhuu sya eiin eiin
douka hude douka hon koziki nen kityou tosyo hukusei kai hukusei hukusei
miti syou hude ise hon koziki nen koten hozon kai hukusei hukusei
haru yu hude haru yu hon koziki nen koten hozon kai hukusei hukusei
haru yu hude koziki zyoukan ouei sanzyuu sannen haru yu sya zinguu koten seki eiin sou kan koziki nihonsyoki ue nen yagi syoten eiin eiin
urabe kanenaga hude urabe kanenaga hon koziki nen bensei sya eiin eiin
urabe kanenaga hude kanenaga hon koziki izumo hudoki syou kokubun gakken kyuu siryoukan deetabeesu koten korekusyon nen iwanamisyoten iwanamisyoten
suke han hude koziki mikoto kei kaku sou kan nen maeda ikutoku zaidan hukusei hukusei
suke han hude koziki mikoto kei kaku zenpon eiin syuusei daiyon syuu kodaisi seki nen yagi syoten eiin eiin
inokuma nobuo kura koziki nen koten hozon kai hukusei hukusei
si you hude koziki sakamoto ryuumon bunko zenpon sou kan nen bensei syuppan eiin eiin
tyuukai kankou
asahisinbunsya nippon koten zensyo koziki ue sita oota zenmaro kanda hideo nen nen

iwanamibunko koziki kurano kenzi nen kaihan nen

gaikokugoyaku
koziki no saisyo no eigo kanyaku ha, nen meizi nen ni syohan sareta eikokuzin no baziruhooruchenbaren niyoru dearu. nippon ni kansin wo motu teita rahukadiohaan koizumi yakumo ha, kono eiyaku hon wo amerika no syuppansya kara watasa re, nippon iki no ketui wo kataku sita.
sabukarutyaa deno zyuyou
koziki ha sabukarutyaa demo zyuyou sare, mangaka raitonoberu ka nadomosareteiru.

aozora bunko bunko

koziki seikai seikai
koziki gakkai gakkai
kokun koziki motoori norinaga koutei niyoru koziki no honbun to kun mi.
koziki honbun teisei kokun koziki no honbun no tekisuto tekisuto
koziki no genbun kensaku koziki genbun kanbun wo kensaku dekiru saito seiwa izumi nisiizumiha, toukyouto komaesi no timei. genkou gyousei timei ha seiwa izumi ittyoume kara seiwa motozi tyoume. yuubinbangou ha .
tiri
si seibu ni iti si tamagawa zyuutaku no komaesi bubun niaru. sinai saisyou no mati tyou deari nakaizumi, tyouhusi someti, kokuryou mati to sessu ru.
rekisi
setaisuu to zinkou
nen reiwa nen gatu niti genzai no setaisuu to zinkou ha ikano touri dearu.
syou tyuugakkou no gakku
siritu syou tyuugakkou ni kayou baai, gakku ha ikano touri tonaru.
koutuu
tetudou
tyounai ni tetudoueki hanai. moyori eki ha odakyuu odawara sen no komae eki ya, keiousen no kokuryou eki. kaki no rosen basu de kakueki ni deru kotomodekiru.
basu
koma odakyuu komae eki tamagawa zyuutaku tyuuou seiwa izumi tamagawa zyuutaku minamiguti komae eki eki
tyou odakyuu keiou tyouhueki minamiguti tamagawa zyuutaku tyuuou seiwa izumi zyuutaku higasiguti tyouhueki minamiguti minamiguti

kyakutyuu
gaibu rinku
komaesi yakusyo kurourii ha, amerika gassyuukoku ruiziana syuu akadia gun no gunto. nen kokuseityousa deno zinkou ha , nin dearu. mainenkaisai sareru kokusai raisufesuteibaru to, rekoodingusutazio ga yuumei dearu. suwanpuburuusu de sira reru miraa no sutazio ga sira reteiru. kurourii hakatute kome no syuukaku to seimai no syuyou na tyuusinti deattakotokara, amerika no kome no syuto toiuada mei gaaru.
tiri
kurourii ha hokui do hun byou seikei do hun byou . , . ni iti siteiru. amerika kokuseityousa kyoku niyoruto, mati no soumenseki ha . . de, subete rikuti dearu.
zinkou dousei
ika ha nen no kokuseityousa niokeru zinkou toukei deeta dearu.

gaibu rinku
kousiki eigo . .
maitosi gatu dai syuu no syuumatu ni okonawa reru eigo . . syuuda syuu hebi, gakumei ha, namihebi ka namera zoku ni bunrui sareru hebi.
bunpu
. . tyuugokusyuuda tyuugokusyuuda
tyuugokunanbu, taiwan, nippon senkaku syo sima
zetumetu kigu rui kankyou syou reddorisuto
. . yonagunisyuuda yonagunisyuuda
nippon yonakuni sima koyuu asyu asyu
zetumetu kigu rui kankyou syou reddorisuto
keitai
zentyou ha . osu yorimo mesu nohouga ookiku naru.
doukou ha tate ni nagai daenkei. uroko niha suzi zyouno moriagari kiiru ga iru. tane syoumyou ha sekiryou noaruno i de, kono kiiru ni yurai suruto omowa re eimei to dougi.
you hebi ha taisyoku ga tan kassyoku de, kuroi hon no tatezima to zyouhansin ni kuroi yokozima ga iru.
nippon ni seisoku suru aodaisyou to douzoku de, aodaisyou mo akusyuu wo houttu kotogaarukotokara, honsyu to aodaisyou ha hizyouni heri no tikai, osorakugoku saikin ninatte onazi sosen kara bunka sita hebi dehanaikato suisatu sareru.
. . tyuugokusyuuda tyuugokusyuuda
zentyou . taisyoku ha an kassyoku de, zyouhansin ni kiiro ya siro no hanten ga iru.
. . yonagunisyuuda yonagunisyuuda
zentyou . taisyoku ha tan kassyoku de, naname ni turani natta doutai no uroko no kazu karada retu uroko kazu ha mai. sei hebi demo kahansin ni tatezima ga nokoru.
asyu
, tyuugokusyuuda tyuugokusyuuda
, yonagunisyuuda yonagunisyuuda
seitai
heiti kara teizan ti no sinrin, sougen, suihen, noukou ti ni sumu. tizyou demo kinoe demo katudou si, zinka hukin nimo syutubotu suru. kiken wo kanzi ruto hunki oto ya karada wo hukurama seteno ikaku nohoka, sou haisetu ana kara akusyuu nosuru bunpibutu wo dasi, korega wamyou no syuuda syuu hebi no yurai tonatteiru. kono bunpibutu ha hihu ni tuku toikura aratu temo suuzitu ha tore zu, ihuku ni tuku to haiki surusikanaitoiu kyouryoku namonodearu. tyuugokusyuuda, yonagunisyuuda ha sou zite arai seikaku wositeiru.
syokusei ha doubutu syoku de, nezumi, kotori, tokage, kaeru nado, gyorui igai no kogata sekituidoubutu subetega taisyou ninaru.
hansyoku keitai ha ransei de, moto asyu ha gatu ni sanran suru.
sankoubunken
hatyuurui ryouseirui zukan dai han , piisiizu, nen, , peezi.
syougakukan no zukan ryouseirui hatyuu rui , syougakukan, nen, peezi.
yamada kazuhisa hatyuu ryouseirui bizyuarugaido hebi , seibundousinkousya, nen, peezi.
kanrenkoumoku
namera zoku zoku
gaibu rinku
syuuda kotobankupain kabusikigaisya . , . ha, oosakahudai saka si tennouzi ku ni honsya wo oku, ame wo tyuusin tosuru kasi meekaa. nen sougyou.
kaisya gaiyou
kansai wo ziban tosuru kasi meekaa no hitotu. nen ni hatubai sare, painappuru no azi to katati wo mosi, ana noaita painame ha dousya wo daihyou suru ronguseraa syouhin tosite sira reru.
hokani mo ame no nakani gamu wo naizou sasetadonguri gamu , ame wo name ruto, nakano zyuusou ga happou suruawa tama nadono syouhin gaaru.
zigyousyo
honsya oosakahudai saka si tennouzi ku ikutama teramati ban gou siga kouzyou sigakenkusatusi oiwake minami tyoume ban gou toukyou siten toukyouto koutouku kameido tyoume ban gou hutami biru tyuubu eigyousyo aitiken itinomiya si kamiyama tyoume ban gou hukuoka eigyousyo hukuokaken kasuya gun kasuya mati ae
enkaku
nen sougyou.
nen kabusikigaisya narihira seika tosite souritu sareru. honsya kouzyou wo tennouzi ku uehonmati he iten suruto tomoni, painame no daiiti gou wo hanbai suru.
nen syamei wo pain seika kabusikigaisya he henkou.
nen honsya syaoku wo tennouzi ku uehonmati kara ikutama teramati ni iten.
nen sigakenkusatusi no meisin kousokudouro soi ni kouzyou wo kensetu.
nen tyokoreeto naizou kyandi no tokkyoken wo syutoku.
nen kyandigamu donguri gamu wo syouhinka.
nen syamei wo gen syamei no pain kabusikigaisya ni aratame ru.
nen dai kai zenkoku kasi daihakurankai nite painame ga meiyo mukansa syou wo zyusyou.
nen painame no burandomaaku ga touzyou.
painame
syuryoku syouhin dearu painame ha painappuru azi no kyandi de, tyuuou niha zyouni ana ga hirai teirunoga tokutyou. nen syouwa nen ni hatubai si, tousyo ha binzume nisite tubu en datta. sengo kan monaku, uno painappuru hamotiron kanzume desaemo koukyuu syokuhin deatta zidai nioite, pain kan nooisisawo kigaru ni aziwa eruyounitono omoi kara tanzyou sitatoiu.
painame no torendomaaku ninatteiru ana ha hatubaitousyo no painame nihanaku, henpei na ame ni wagiri no painappuru no moyou wo kata osi sita gaiken deatta. yotte, syouhinmei mo touzi ha painappuru ame deatta. sikasi, touzi no syatyou haakumade ana wo hirake rukotonikodawari, nen syouwa nen ni zidou kyandi anaake ke ki ga kanseisi, genzai no painame no genkei ga kanseisi ta.
painame ha korisu no huegamu hueramune to keizyou ga nite ite, korisu mo nen gatu ni, tousya tono koraboreesyon niyoru kikangentei syouhin tosite hueramune painame azi wo hanbai siteita. tadasi, tousya deha painame zitai nituite, ana wo iki de hui temo hue noyouna oto ha nara naitono kousikikenkai wo simesi teiru. no kousiki akaunto kouzyutu de singata koronauirusu heno kansen ga kakudai siteiru nen ni kansensyou taisaku no ikkan de painame no huki nara sino zisyuku wo yobi kake ta saino tuiito nimo, motomoto oto ga naru youniha tukutu tenaitono kenkai wo soe teita. mottomo, itibu no syouhisya ha painame wo hui te tanosi mumono to ninsiki siteite, zyouki no tuiito ni taisi temo motomoto naru youniha tukutu teinaitoiu zizitu wo hazimete situ tatono hensin ga yose rareta.
nen niha sintyousya hakkou no zassi gatugou nonandemo rankinguame bumon de kurai ni sensyutu sareta.
hatu no sekkyokutekina kouhoukatudou
tousya deha, terebi ga karaa housou ni tenkan sitekarawo nagasi teorazu, sinbun heno koukoku no syukkou mo nen kai nitodometeiru. sono ippou de, nen ni uede kaisetusi ta kousiki akaunto kara, zyouhou wo sekkyokutekini hassin. touroku sareteirudakedemo bannin izyou no forowaa ga tuku nado, nihonkigyou niyoru kousiki akaunto deha kussi no ninki wo hakusi teiru.
kousiki akaunto no meisyou ha painame wo rooma zi ni henkan sitadakede, eigo de kutuu wo imi surudehanai. nen ikou no maitosi gatu niti niha, eipuriruhuuru nitinande, kakuu no seihin kyanpeen ni kansu ru tuiito wokono akaunto kara hassin. kousiki saito niha, kako no tuiito womatometa peezi ga mouke rareteiru.
tuiito no hassinsya ha makkii to syousuru syain de, zisin gani hukairi siteitakotowo haikei ni, sinki zigyou tosite kousiki akaunto no kaisetu wo teian. touzi hani kuwasii syain ga hokani inakattatame, kono teian ga keiei kaigi de seisiki ni saiyou saretekaraha, iwayuru nakano nin tosite akaunto no unei wo itinin sareteiru.
makkii ha suzyou ya sugao wo issai aka sazu, kousiki akaunto wo kaisetu notini kakarityou he syousin sitatono zyouhou dakewo kouhyou. syanai de zissaini tui teiru yakusyoku ga kakarityou dearukaha sadaka denaiga, hirasyain kara kakarityou ni syousin sitatosareru nen gatu niti niha, seme ru ronguseraa painame nakano nin no kokoroe toiu tyosyo ga kurosumediapaburissingu kara kankou sareteiru. mata, kou no ba ni deru baai niha, painame wo mosi ta tezukuri no koumuri mono wo atama ni soutyaku. katuteha hitomae de hanase naitoiu settei mo nasa reteitaga, nen gatu niti kara gatu niti madeha, hare, noti, painame oosaka ga maisyuunitiyoubi no ni kikangentei de housou sita painame tanzyou syuunen kinen bangumi nowo kakarityou makkii toiu meigi de tutome teiru. tinamini, painame wo iki de hui temo oto ha nara naitoiu zenzyutu no kenkai ha, nen kara saisan niwatatte makkii no tuiito ni morikoma reteiru.
sarani, sigakenkusatusi no zisya kouzyou kara kennai no souko heno seihin yusou wo zimae de ninau youninatta nen gatu karaha, sekai ni dai dakeno painametorakku tono hure komi de kontena tuki no tontorakku wo sintyou. syanai no kaihatubu in iwaku mire ba siawase ninarerutono densetu gaaru dokutaaieroo wo isiki sitatoiu dezain de, kontena no sokumen ni ooki na painappuru ga egaka reteiruhoka, nanbaapureeto no bangou niha kibou bangou seido wo tuuzi te syutoku sita pain sanwo motiite iru. tinamini, nen nimo painametorakku to douyou no rappingu wo torakku no nidai ni hodokosi teitaga, kono torakku ha ibento dewazukani tukawa retadaketoiu.
omona koraboreesyon syouhin kikaku
tousya deha, maitosi gatu niti wo painame no niti ni seitei. touzitu nodeha, tasyutayou na kigyou ga painame wo tukatta gazou wo kousiki akaunto de koukai siteiru. kono hokani mo, ikano youna koraboreesyon kikaku wo zissaini tenkai. kousiki saito niha, koraboreesyon syouhin wo itiran de syoukai suru peezi ga mouke rareteiru.
tousya no honsya hukin kintetu minamioosakasen abeno hasi eki ue niaruabeno harukasu kai no tenboudai harukasu deha, nen gatu niti no oopun tousyo kara, painamesohutokuriimu wo kai no kafedaininguresutoran gentei de hatubai. painamesohutokuriimu niha, painame no imeezikaraa dearu kiiro no kuriimu no ueni kudai ta painame wohurikaketeiruhoka, painame no syouhin rogo wo ire ta kami de koon wo tutun deiru. tadasi, harukasu deha gensoku tosite nyuuzyousya niyoru insyokubutu no motikomi wo kinzi teirutame, painamesohutokuriimu wo tabe rarerunoha to tenkuu teien kai niaru sansou hukinuke kouzou no oopundekki no nakani kagira reru.
nen niha, painamesohutokuriimu igai no koraboreesyon syouhin mo, kikangentei de aitugi ide sihan sareteita. gatu niha, hu a miriimaato imuraya tono kyoudoukaihatu niyoru painameaisu ga hu a miriimaato gentei de hatubai. mata, korisu tono koraboreesyon syouhin tosite, painame azi no hueramune ga hanbai sareteita. sarani, gatu niha sega touzi ga toiu rizumuakusyongeemu wo ririisu. pureiyaa ga rizumu ni awa sete botan wo tataku taimingu wo gamenzyou ni simesu maakaa no dezain to, painame no mitame ga nite irukotoga ririisu nokikkakeninattatoiu.
nen gatu niha, kobayasi seiyaku no kamu buresukea gumitaipu no seiryou syokuhin kara painame azi ga kikangentei de hazimete hanbai. nen gatu niha, youki raberu ni painame kun syurui wo kuwae tauede, kikangentei de aratame te hatubai sareta.
nen gatu ni kaisai sareta mizuki nana no konsaatotuaa deha, painappuru wo motu ta mizuki no syasin wo pakkeezi ni insatu sita mizukinana painame wo, kaizyou gentei guzzu tosite hanbai siteita.
nen gatu niha rozetto yori dousya no ronguseraa syouhin dearu rozetto sengan pasuta no koraboreesyon syouhin tosite kaidei sumuusu painame no kaori orizinarupooti tuki ga suuryou gentei de hatubai sareta. yoku nen gatu nimo dai dan tosite howaitodaiya painame no kaori orizinarupooti tuki wo suuryou gentei de hatubai siteiru.
painame ga hatubai syuunen miyosi sekken ga sougyou syuunen wo mukae ta nen niha, painame no keizyou kaori toumeikan wo sekken de saigen sita painamesoopu wo miyosi sekken ga kaihatu. de nin ko nitikan gentei no senkou hanbai wo zissi sitatokoro, mokuhyou hitai , en wo , koe ru uriage de kanbai sitakotokara, painame no niti gatu niti kara suuryou gentei deno honkaku hanbai ni humikitu ta.
painame tanzyou syuunen no zenzitu nen gatu niti niha, zyari n ko tie honsya noaru oosaka ga butai ni egaka reteiruharuki etu si no manga sakuhin tono koraboreesyon kikaku niyoruzyari n ko tie painame no kan ga, asahisinbun no yuukan asahisinbun oosakahonsya hakkou han ni maru peezi keisai. harukigazyari n ko tie no sinsaku wo kakiorosi tanoha nen huri de, kinokuniyasyoten dehakono kikaku ni awa sete, hutaba bunkoban nozyari n ko tie wo umeda honten oosakasi kitaku sinzyuku honten toukyoutosinzyukuku de kounyuu sita kyaku ni tie tyan tyan painame tokusei bukkukabaa wo yoku niti no painame no niti kara suuryou gentei de haihu sita.
kuriyama kou hyougoken koubesi syussin no saitama seibu raionzu gaiyasyu ga yousyouki karano painame suki de, seibu heno nyuudango mo rensyuu noti ya siaityuu niyoku tabete irukotonitinande, kuriyama no nippon puro yakyuu itigun kousikisen tuusan anda tassei ga mazika ni sematu ta nen gatu niti karaha kuriyama kou sensyu tuusan anda tassei kinen kikaku wo kaisi. kuriyama ga seibu no honkyoti mettoraihudoomu deno hoomugeemu de tassei sita baai niha touzitu, takyuuzyou deno bizitaageemu de tassei sita baai niha tugino hoomugeemu kaisaibi ni, kuriyama kou sensyu tuusan anda tassei kinen orizinarupakkeezi no painame wo doomu heno raizyousya zenin ni mei atari hukuro haihu surukotowo happyou siteita.
kuriyama ha nen gatu niti ni, touhoku rakuten goorudeniigurusu tono deegeemu rakuten seimei paaku miyagi deno bizitaageemu de itigun kousikisen tuusan anda wo tassei sita. seibu kyuudan ga kousiki saito nai de unei suru raionzusutoa onrain deha, douzitu no siaisyuuryougo kara, tourokuzumi mino yuuzaa ga syouhizei wo hukume te , en izyou no guzzu wo kounyuu surutabini, zyouki no orizinarupakkeezibaazyon hukuro wo suuryou gentei de purezento. seibu nitotte tugino hoomugeemu syosen ni ata ru gatu niti no tui hukuoka sohutobankuhookusu sen deha, zyouki no happyou ni sotte, mettoraihudoomu heno raizyousya zenin ni onazi baazyon wo haihu sita. sarani, pain kabusikigaisya deha kuriyama ni taisi te, hukuro nioyoso tubu ga itutu teiru gyoumuyou painame wo purezento. kuriyama ga tassei sita andasuu to onazi tubusuu tubu nitinande, zissaini ha hukuro wo zoutei siteiru.
teikyou bangumi
yoru noo tanosimi ne oti tyan hokkaidou terebi nen gatu niti no housou de painame wo tukatta hue tyarenzi gakikkakeni tousya hatu no teikyou bangumi tonatta.
hare, noti, painame oosaka syousai ha zenzyutu. kakarityou makkii ga kao wo dasa zuni, umeyama akane sikoku housou syussin ofisukiiwaado syozoku no huriianaunsaa tono konbi dewo tutome teiru.
kyakutyuu
gaibu rinku
pain pain
painame no pain kabusikigaisya
pain kabusikigaisya .
painame no pain kabusikigaisya kousiki keezutoransumissyon ha, maisyuukinyoubi ni de nen gatu niti kara housou sareteiru bangumi. bando no sakazaki kounosuke gawo tutome teiru. tuusyou tora .
gaiyou
nioite sakazaki kounosuke hakono bangumi no izen kara, nen ya, nen no bangumi wo tantou siteiru.
kouyuukankei wo tyuusin tosita gesuto mo habahiroku syutuen si, kihonteki ni kare yori tosiue no aateisuto ga syutuen suru baai, tosite bangumi zenhan kara kouhan totyuu made gesuto tono tooku no zikan gatorareru. wakate aateisuto syutuen no baai, zenhan zikan nomino syutuen tonaru.
nama gitaa no bansou desono ba de utau namauta nama rikuesuto ga bangumi no daigomi dearu.
kihonteki ni namahousou dearuga, raibu touzitu ongakubangumi syutuen nado niyori, rokuon housou tonarukotogaaru. sikasinagara honnin ha rokuon toha iwa zu, sasi tekudasaideattari tyokuzen no ongakubangumi syutuen atode hade ton dekimasitanadono iimawasi wo tukau.
oopuningu kyoku ziesika oorumanburazaazubando oorumanburazaazubando
endingu kyoku ituwarino hitomi iigurusu iigurusu
koonaa
nendai, nendai no yougaku no naka kara kano omoiire noaru kyoku wo ikkyoku, kano kaisetu totomoni okuru.
arufii ni kansu ru kinkyou zyouhou. tanase tiihumaneezyaa ga omoni konsaato zyouhou nadowo tutae ru. kare ga syutuen dekinai baai, mareni kawara maneezyaa ga touzyou sitari, sakazaki honnin ga tantou suru baai moatta.
sakazaki syouten syumi ya kansin noaru gitaa, kottouhin, wa garasu, kurasikkukamera, nettaigyo, neko, ryousei hatyuurui, utyuu nado nituiteno situmon gimon wo meeru, hagaki totomoni kotae ru.
kaki koumoku de syouzyutu.
no nagare wo tukutu tekita aateisuto, muubumento ya gensyou, ibento, sonna hanasi wosinagara nippon no ongaku no ayumi wo sagatu teikoutoiu koonaa. kousi ha sakazaki kounosuke. kansyuu ha taya hideki. tuuzyou, toki tyoudokara toki hunkoro made. maikai aru teema womotonisoreni kanrensi ta kyoku wo tu senkyoku si, sono gorono hanasi ga taya si no genkou to sakazaki honnin no kioku niyori susume rareru. kokode iu toha, nippon no kayoukyoku toiu habahiroi imi de tukawa re, tokuni nendai, nendai no kyokuga tori agerareru. bangumisyoki niha aateisuto hitori ga teema tosite age rarerukotoga ooka ttaga, saikin ha samazamana kirikuti kara teema settei ga okonawa reteiru.
kono koonaa womotonisite, tugino syoseki toga hatubai sareteiru.
sakazaki kounosuke tyo sakazaki kounosuke no sukuuru iwanami akuteibu sinsyo sinsyo
sakazaki kounosuke senkyoku sakazaki kounosuke no sukuuru tousiba tousiba
sakazaki kounosuke senkyoku sakazaki kounosuke no sukuuru tousiba tousiba
topikku
koremade suudo, tokusyuu ga kuma reteori, nen no kensyou nakatugawa fookuzyanborii , nen no supesyaru urawa rokku densetu ga nippon minkan housou renmei syou no yuusyuusyou, nen no supesyaru imuzin kawa ga saiyuusyuusyou wo zyusyou siteiru.
nen gatu niti ni hazimete no koukairokuon ga takadanobaba node okonawa reta. gesuto ha osio kootaroo to. bangumihousou ha yokuzitu no niti.
nen gatu niti, nen gatu niti hao daiba fooku mura tono rendou kikaku deo daiba no kaizyou kara namatyuukei sareta. nen no gesuto hakamayatuhirosi, simizu mitiko. nen ha no kaime no baasudee tosite nin sorotteno housou tonatta.
nen gatu niti niha koukairokuon ga soukasi tami bunkakaikan de okonawa reta. gesuto niha oono masumi, ootomo kouhei ga yoba re, tooku to sessyon ga okonawa rete kaizyou ha ooi ni moriaga tta. bangumihousou ha gatu niti.
nen gatu niti housou deha yokuzitu ni yosida takurou kaguya hime konsaatoin tuma koi no tyuukei gaarutame genti kara namahousou sareta. kaguya hime ga intabyuu syutuen. raibu kousei no taya hideki mo syutuen.
syuukan sakazaki sakazaki gesuto karano messeezi, kyoku no risuto, sono hoka infomeesyon ga kisaisa reta haisin saabisu ga nen gatu niti nousoubun dai kai kara netto haisin tonaru. soremadeno haisin ni kawari, saito nai karano daunroodo ga kanou tonatta.
nen gatu niti housou de housou kaisuu ga mawato nari, arigatou kai korekaramoyorosikuneto daisi te housou sareta. housounaiyou ha sakazaki santo hamo rou koonaa, tora karutokuizu, meibamen tokusyuu nado.
nen gatu niti ni koukairokuon ga urawa no roiyarupainzuhoteru de okonawa reta. koreha konpon you tono bangumi korabo kikaku deari, hutari no naka no yoi kankei ga kaimamira reta. bangumihousou ha gatu niti.
nen gatu niti ha higasinihon taisin sai niyoru koutuu mahi de hudan housou siteiru ginza sutazio ni tadori tuku koto ga dekizu, totyuu ni suukai denwa syutuen si, nokori ha anaunsaa niyoru infomeesyon to no kyoku de ume rareta.
nen gatu niti ni koukairokuon gogo no sati oisii ikaga gasaitama suupaaariina node okonawa reta. gesuto noto erekiakogi deno sessyon tooku de moriaga tta. bangumihousou ha gatu niti.
nen gatu niti housou deha sakazaki ga kaze notameni koe ga dezu, honnin ha namasyutuen sitamonono, sakurai satosi ga oopuningu kara sinkou wo tutome ta. totyuu karaha takamisawa tosihiko mo kuwawa ri, nin denonigiyakana housou tonatta.
nen gatu niti housou nite housoukaisi nen tonari, tora kentei ga okonawa reta. kenteigoukaku mono niha sain iri goukaku syou ga okura reta.
nen gatu niti nite housou kai wo mukae ta. kono housou demo kai kinen tora kentei ga okonawa reta.
