kousiki peezi
kousiki peezi
syuukan sakazaki bangumi infomeesyon . mouhitotuno tanzyou dottohakku anazaa baasu mouhitotunotanzyouha geemu . wo motoni sita kawasaki miwa no syousetu. zen kan no kousei desorezore geemu no. kara. nihobo taiou siteiru.
gaiyou
tannaru noberaizu dehanaku geemu han no kyarakutaaburakkuroozu kyarakutaaburakkuroozu hayami aki ryou wo syuzinkou tosi, kanozyo no otouto ga isikihumei ni otitu tekara geemu syuuryougo madewo hayami aki ryou no genzitu men deno dekigoto to tasogare no hibun no nazo nituiteno genkyuu wo mazie te kai teiru. honpen no syuzinkou dearu kaito kara burakkuroozu he siten wo henkou suruniatatte,
kanarazusimo burakkuroozu wo ture te ika nakutemo yoi bamen de burakkuroozu ga paatei ni kuwawa tteitari, kaito no paatei ga sanka suru ibento to douzisinkou de burakkuroozu ga onazi ibento ni sanka siteitarisuru.
mia ga burakkuroozu ni kaito no kako no eizou wo mise ru ibento no tuika.
itibu no ibento no tyokugo no dekigoto ga burakkuroozu no siten deno tuika.
misutoraru kurokawa mayumi to sinmitu ninari ohu de atu tari denwa nadode renraku wotoru bamen.
itibu kyarakutaa ga kanrensu ru honpentyuu deamari zyuuyou denai ibento no katuai. nadono henkouten tuikaten gaaru.
touzyouzinbutu
burakkuroozu wohazimetosuru omona touzyouzinbutu nituiteha. geemu touzyouzinbutu wo sansyou no koto.
itiou geemu nakani mo touzyou suru kensi. wo hazime tabakarino burakkuroozu ni sousahouhou wo osie ru. kanga surudoku, burakkuroozu ga zinzyou denaikotoni kakatu teiruto kizu itaga, douzini kanozyo gasonokotonituite genkyuu saretakunaidearou koto mo satori, akumademo hutuu ni asobu nakama deari tuzuke rukotowo ketui suru.
timuni timuni
to paatei wo kumu sou kensi.
haru haru
kazu to naka ga yoka tta kensi. koge tya no tuinteeru ga tokutyou. totuzen roguin sinakunatta kazu wo sinpai siteiru.
tarou tarou
timuni to koudou wo tomoni suru syosinsya. wo warawa seru taimingu wo rensyuutyuu. ha, zinno maime, supurittosinguru wo hukume ruto tuusan maime no singuru. nen gatu niti ni urutorasiipu yori ririisu sareta.
gaiyou
zensaku yori nen ke gatu buritonaru singuru. sorezore zisin ga gensaku wo tutome ru anime mekakusiteiakutaazu no oopuninguteema oyobi endinguteema ni kiyou sareta.
siyou
tuuzyouban syokai seisan genteiban syokai seisan genteiban no keitai de hatubai. subete tuki.
tyaato seiseki
nen gatu hizuke no orikon syuukan rankingu deha syuukan kurai ni rankuin sita.
myuuzikkubideo
nen gatu niti niga, nen gatu niti ni koukai. dotiramo kantoku hasizu.

zikeiretu nenpyou
syutten enmei kouen ha oomuta sinaityuusinbu ni iti suru kouen dearu.
gaiyou
taiikukan ya yakyuuzyou, puuru, doubutuen wo sonae ta daikibo na kouen. hamanaka hirohisa hamanaka hirohisa, nen gatu niti ha, no moto eguzekuteibuanaunsaa. genzai ha huriianaunsaa, siniasutafhu.
zinbutu
kyoutosi ritu murasakino koutougakkou wo hete toukyoutoritudaigaku sotugyougo, nen nyuukyoku.
supesyaru ya haibizyon tokusyuu nado tasuu no dokyumentarii no nareesyon de naganen katuyaku siteiru. kinnen ha bungeisakuhin no roudoku nimo haba wo hiroge, miyamoto teru no tanpen sakuhin tyou wo yonda razio bungei kan ha, nen gyarakusii sensyou wo zyusyou. nen ha razio sinya bin no genzimonogatari sennen ki roudoku tokusyuu de, tanabe seiko no sin genzimonogatari wo roudoku sita zyosei anaunsaa to buntan roudoku .
kenkou bangumi ya zyazu ya tanka nado samazamana bangumi de sikai wo tutome ta.
nen tosi teinen. genzai mono bangumi ni syutuen suruhoka, nen kara huriianaunsaa tositemo katudou siteiru.
genzai no tantou bangumi
supesyaru nareesyon, tihoukyoku kinmu toki mo toukyouhatu no bangumi wo tantou .

sono hoka
nen nengoro ni tantou siteita bangumi rekisihakken ni syutuen sita sugiura hinako ni sasowa rete, sobaya suki no atumari soba suki ren so ren ni sanka sita.
gaibu rinku
kabusikigaisya zieituu hamanaka hirohisa siobara mati siobaramatiha, totigiken hokubu niatta mati dearu. nisinasuno mati heno tuukin ritu ha . heisei nen kokuseityousa . nen gatu niti, kinrin no kuroiso si nasu gun nisinasuno mati tono sinsetu gappei niyori nasusiobara si tonattatame haisi sita.
houkigawa soi ni iti suru siobaraonsen sato ga yuumei. hai mati toki ha nasu gun syozoku deattaga, tousyo ha sioya gun syozoku deatta.

rekisi
enkaku
nen gatu niti sioya gun siobara mura, sou ne mura houkinemuraga hossoku.
nen gatu niti siobara mura ga tyousei sikou, siobara mati tonaru.
nen gatu niti siobara mati sou ne mura ga gappei si, atarasii siobara mati tonaru.
nen gatu niti sioya gun kara nasu gun he tenzoku.
nen gatu niti kuroiso si nisinasuno mati to sinsetu gappei site nasusiobara si tonaru.

gaibu rinku
kokudotiriin tizu eturan saabisu uotu tizu man senbun tikeizu mei siobara hokutou
siobara mati hoomupeezi aakaibu kokuritu kokkaitosyokan nippon saikurusupootusentaa nihon saikurusupootusentaa, eigo ha, sizuokaken izu si kyuu syuzenzi mati ni syozai suru zitensya kyougi notameno sisetu oyobi yuuenti dearu. ryakusyou ha .
gaiyou
nen gatu niti ni kaisetusa reta. saikurusupootu no hukyuu wo hakaru mokuteki de tate rareta sisetu deari, nado keirin unei dantai no kihukin ya hozyo nadode kensetuhiyou ya uneihi gamakanawareteiru.
sikiti ha tousyo, mootaasupootu you saakitto tosite keikaku sareteita. sono noti uyokyokusetu wo hete, nippon keirinsensyu youseizyo kyuuzitu hon keirin gakkou to dousyo no sikiti tonattaga, zisei ga kawa reba huzi supiidouei gakokonidekiru kanousei gaatta. koreha huzi supiidouei saisyo no nen toiu syoseki nimo kisaisa reteiru.
keirinsensyu wo yousei suru nippon keirinsensyu youseizyo ni rinsetu siteori, zitensya kankeisya no kan de syuzenzi toieba, kono nippon saikurusupootusentaa ka nippon keirinsensyu youseizyo nodotirakawo sasu daimeisi tonatteiru.
toukyou orinpikku no zitensya kyougi deha, izu koosu no kaizyoumei de, kurosukantorii ga zissi sareta. tadasi, onazi zitensya kyougi dearuha, touti dehanaku toukyou no ariake aabansupootupaaku de zissi sareta.
orinpikku kaizyou seibikou koto notame, nen gatu niti yori yuuenti zoon zitensya no kuni ha kyuuen si, sono kan ha pataagoruhu ba nomino eigyou tonatteita. zitensya no kuni ha genzyou kaihuku kouzi ga kanryou si, nen gatu niti yori rinyuuaruoopun si eigyou wo saikai sita.
sisetu no tokutyou
syumokuteki ha zitensya kyougi notameno sisetu tonatteirukotokara, zyounai niha roodo kyougiyou saakittotorakkureesu you pisuto souro mauntenbaiku koosu nadogaari, yuuryou de ippan kaihou siteiru. tadasi pisuto nadono kyousou miti wo ippanriyousya ga riyou suru saini ha kiso kyakuryoku kensa ga okonawa re, kizyun wo mita sanai baai ha rakusya nadono kiken ga syouzi rutame, sono riyou ga mitome rarenaikotogaaru. nao rinsetu siteiru nippon keirinsensyu youseizyo no sensyu kouhosei ya, geneki no keirinsensyu nadoga soukou kunren wo okonau kotomoaru. nao, kirosaakittokoosu pisuto no sisetu nituiteha yuuryou de zitensya no motikomi mo kanou dearuga, hensokuki ga nai monoha motikomi dekinainadono seigen gaaru.
mata, sisetu gotono kasidasi mo okona tteori, roodo you koosu ha zitensya niyoru ippanteki na reesu dakedenaku, zidousya ootobai nadono sizyoukai kaizyou tosite tukawa rerukotomoari, kaagurafikku asahi nadodeha satuei nimo tukawa reru.
hokani mo kakusyu no yuugu sisetu ga sonzai suruga, sisetu tositeno housin kara yuugu nohotondoga zinriki de ugoka sumonodeari, sono kouzou mo zitensya no gizyutu ga ouyou saretamonotonatteiru.
atorakusyon
omosiro zitensya pedaru ya cheen ganai zitensya ya yonrin zitensya nado kawa tta zitensya wo taiken kanou.
zyanguruzimu nipponiti no mokusei zyanguruzimu.
huwahuwa doomu toranporin.
sukairooraa zentyou no suberi dai.
asuretikku meiro kyassuruadobentyaa meiro.
saikuru reeru no ue wo hasiru zitensya zitensya
suizyou zitensya pedarubooto pedarubooto
saikurumonoreeru takasa no reeru no ue wo hasiru zitensya zitensya
saikurukoosutaa ziettokoosutaa ziettokoosutaa
saikurugoorando meriigoorando meriigoorando
ryuusui puuru puuru puuru
taiikukan basukettobooru, takkyuu, bareebooru nado nado
saakittokoosu
koosu mauntenbaiku you koosu nen gatu niti womotte eigyousyuuryou. toukyou gorin syuuryougo, saikai yotei.
kirosaakitto hosouro no koosu koosu
koosu zitensya motokurosu you koosu eigyousyuuryou.
hu a miriisaakitto tegaru ni tanosi meru hosouro no koosu
sutoraidaapaaku pedaru ganai zitensya no sutoraidaa you koosu nen gatu niti womotte eigyousyuuryou. .
izu berodoroomu nihonhatu no okunai mokusei souro kyougizyou. nen gatu ni tyakkou. nen gatu niti ni syunkou si, gatu niti oopun. dougetu niti kara hiraka reta dai kai zennihon zitensya kyougi sensyukentaikai torakkureesu ga oto si taikai tonatta. nen kaisai sareta toukyou orinpikku oyobi pararinpikku deha, zitensya kyougi no torakku syumoku no kaizyou tonatta.
sono hoka sisetu
tamokuteki hooru hooru
syukuhakuzyo saiteru syukuhakusisetu syukuhakusisetu
pataagoruhu pataagoruhu
genki no mori kyanpu ba gakkou dantai muke tyouri taiken higaeri kyanpu ba ba
saikuru onsen yuu saron nen gatu niti womotte eigyousyuuryou onsen setubi setubi
ippan zaidanhouzin nippon saikurusupootusentaa
tou sisetu ha, ippan zaidanhouzin nippon saikurusupootusentaa niyori unei sareteiru. ippan zaidanhouzin nippon saikurusupootusentaa ha, saikurusupootusentaa no unei nohoka, saikurusupootu hukyuu ibento no kaisai, tiiki supootu nado wo sinkou surutameno katudou, zitensya kyougisya no kyouka ikusei katudou heno kyouryoku, saikurusupootu ni hituyou na zitensya nado ni kansu ru tyousakenkyuu, saikurusupootu no anzen na riyou wo kakuho suru housaku no kenkyuu wo okona tteiru.
touti de kaisai sareru omona kyougitaikai
tuaaobuzyapan izu suteezi
tyarenzisaikururoodoreesu taikai taikai
syuzenzi kappu zyosi oopun torakku roodoreesu taikai taikai
kako no taikai
zennihon tiimu taikou zitensya kyougitaikai kyougitaikai
dai kai azia zitensya kyougi sensyukentaikai nen
keizai sangyou daizin hata dai kai zennihonzitugyoudan taikou saikururoodoreesu taikai taikai
koutuu akusesu
yuuenti zoon zitensya no kuni kyuugyou ni tomonai basu rosen ha totyuu no mawatari hasi saikurusupootusentaa kan ga unkyuu naka deari, genzai ha takusii igai de koutuusyudan hanai. zitensya no kuni ha genzyou kaihuku kouzi ga kanryou si nen gatu niti yori eigyou saikai sitaga, basu rosen ha mawatari hasi ien no unkyuu ga tuzui teiru. nao, mawatari hasi basu tei karaha izyou hanare teori, toho yaku waka karukatu noborizaka ga tuzuku .
unkyuu mae ha, izuhakonetetudou syuzenzi eki yori toukai basu saikurusupootusentaa okoni zyousya, syuuten de gesya.
kanren gazou
kyakutyuu
tyuusyaku
syutten
kanrenkoumoku
nippon keirinsensyu youseizyo youseizyo
keirin keirin
kansai saikurusupootusentaa saikurusupootusentaa
gunma saikurusupootusentaa saikurusupootusentaa
gaibu rinku
nippon saikurusupootusentaa saikurusupootusentaa
izu berodoroomu berodoroomu
nippon saikurusupootusentaa
nippon saikurusupootusentaa ibento zyouhoukan
nippon saikurusupootusentaa tyanneruantehu yo ha, kodai eziputo dai outyou no dai dai mataha dai hu a rao ou . siryou niyotteha antehu yo tomo yoba reru. sokui mei ha sekemuraaheruuherumaato.
gaiyou
touti no zittai ga humeiryou na ou ga ooi dai outyou demo tokuni siryou ga tobosiku, ruuvuru bizyutukan ni syozou sareteiru hitugi ga yuiituti rareteiru ihin dearu. sonotame, zissaini ou tosite touti siteitaka utagawasii to kangae ru kenkyuusya moiru. ha hitugi ni inku de sirusa reta sokui mei ga, noti kara tukekuwae raretamonodearukotoni tyuumoku si, antehu yo ha sendai no ou antehu yono kyoudou touti mono aruiha sessyou de, sousei sitatameni honrai antehu yono tameni youisa reta hitugi ni ire rarete maisou saretato suisoku siteiru. taisi te dodoson ha, ou ga sokui kara suukagetu hodo de sibou sitatameni tekisetu na hitugi wo youisu rukotogadekizu, maniawase no hitugi ni namae wo kakikuwae te siyousi tato suisoku siteiru.
kazokukousei
sendai no ou tono kankei ha waka tteinai. antehu yono ouhi sebekuemusahu ha ou no simai toiu syougou wo atae rareteori, kono ou ga antehu yono kotodearu kanousei gaaru. sikasi, sono koukeisya no sebekuemusahu yo ka senakutoenraa nokotodearu kanousei moarutame, genziten deha kakusyou ga era reteinai.
namae nituite
sekemuraaheruuherumaatoantehu ga antehu no namae de yoba reta nanninme no ou dearukaha, daini tyuukan ki no rekisiteki siryou ga tobosii kotomoari, seikaku niha waka tteinai. ooku no kenkyuusya ha, zanteiteki ni antehu yo mosikuha yo to yon deori, kono kizi deha saisin no siryou ni sitagatte antehu yo to hyouki siteiruga, kongo no hakken sidai deha suuzi ga kuriage rareru kanousei gaaru.
kyakutyuu
tyuusyaku
syutten
sankoubunken
piitaakureiton kodai eziputohu a rao rekidai si , yosimura sakuzi kansyuu, huzisawa kuniko wake sougensya, nen gatu. .
eidandodoson, dianhiruton zenkei zu tuki eziputo rekidai outyou si , ikeda hirosi wake touyou syorin, nen gatu. .
. . . , , . , . . , .
gaibu saito
dai outyou kigenzen , , nengoro nihongo . kodai eziputo siryou kan. nen gatu niti eturan. honkou niokeru tyuuka minkoku taiwan to honkon tono kankei ha, tyuuka minkoku tairiku ziki to, tyuuka minkoku seihu sen dai notino ryouhou wo hukume te kizyutu suru.
rekisi
nen izen ha ryouti iki tomo kiyosi ni zokusi teori, nen niha daiitizi ahen sensou de honkon sima ga igirisu teikoku ni katuzyou sare, nen niha daiitizi nissin sensou de taiwan ga dainipponteikoku ni katuzyou sareta. sonbun ha nendaikouhan ni honkon de manan deitaga, daiitizi nissin sensou deno kiyosi no muryoku sato haiboku niyori, kyuurai no ousei wo kindai no kyouwasei ni okikaeru kakumei ga hituyou dato kangae teita. nen niha honkon de kiyosi no datou wo giron surutameni atuma tta yondai kou no itiin tosite syasin wo tora re, nen niha kiyosi wo datou surutameno koutyuu kai no kessei ni tyakusyu sita. nen gatu niti, honkon de hiraka reta koutyuu kai no kaigi de, riku kou higasi ha seitenhakuzitu hata wo happyou si, korega tyuuka minkoku no kuniaki tonatta. koutyuu kai ha honkon no sutanton mati banti ni honbu wo oki, nen ni hokano dantai to gappei site tyuugoku doumei awo kessei sita. doukai ha sinkoku nin no kan de hiroku sizi sare, kiyosi wo datou sita nen no kanotoi kakumei wo hazime tosuru kakumei ie tatino hanran ni zyuuyouna yakuwari wo hata sita. kanotoi kakumei no seikou wo uke te, sonbun ha nen gatu niti ni tyuuka minkoku no kenkoku wo sengen si, syodai rinzi oobusa tou ni syuunin sita. dounen gatu, tyuugoku doumei kai ha hokano dantai to gappei site tyuugoku kokumintou wo kessei si, sonbun gasono rizityou ni eraba reta.
sonbun ha nen ni honkon ni modori, zisin no bokou dearu honkon nisi isyo in wo igakubu tosite hennyuusi ta honkon daigaku wo houmon sita. honkon daigaku deno houmon naka, sonbun ha enzetu wo okonai, saisyuuteki ni tyuuka minkoku wo tanzyou saseta kakumei nioite, honkon ga kano insupireesyon no gen dearuto nobe ta. korega, watasi no kakumeiteki na tyakusou hadokokara eta nokatoiu toi ni taisuru kotae da. sonosubeteha honkon niaru. sonbun ga kiyomasa hu ni simeitehai sareta noti, sonbun no haha dearu you si ha, zisin no tyounan deari sonbun no tyoukei demoaru mago mayu to issyoni kyuuryuu siro ni sun deita. nen ni sonbun ga naku naruto, syou kaiseki ga sonbun no koukeisya tonari, nen niha zendo wo touitu site syou kaiseki seiken tonatta.
amerika gassyuukoku to datu syokumintika
amerika ha naganen niwatari, kiyosi wo syokumintika subekidehanaitoiu seisaku teki sinnen wo motu teita. amerika ha nen ni monko kaihouseisaku wo teisyou si, kiyosi wo bunkatu site syokumintika subekidenaikotowo hyoumei siteita. nen ni igirisu ga syomei sita kyuu ka kuni zyouyaku ha, monko kaihouseisaku to tyuugoku no ryoudohozen wo koutei siteita. nen gatu, ei syusyou uinsutontyaatiru ha kokkai de wareware ha tyuugoku no tii to kanzensei no izi wo nozomi, nen gatu niti no wareware no nooto ni simesa reteiruyouni, wahei teiketu noti, tyuugokuseihu tono kan de, tigaihouken no haisi, zyouho no hyoumei, gokei to byoudou ni motozu ku zyouyaku no kaitei wo kousyou suru youi gaaruto sengen si, tyuugoku niokeru ryoudo no kanzensei to tigaihouken no houki wo koutei sita. ryoudo no kanzensei to datu syokumintika no kangaekata ha, syokuminti syugi ni danko tosite hantai siteita beidaitouryou hurankurinruuzuberuto to tyaatiru ga nen gatu ni happyou sita taiseiyou kensyou no seimei desarani youyaku sareteori, beiei ryougoku ha kankei kokumin no ziyuu ni hyoumei seru kibou to itti sezaru ryoudo teki henkou no okonawa rurukotowo hosse zuto kitei sareteita. tyaatiru ha igirisu ryou honkon no datu syokumintika wo nozon deinakattaga, rengoukokugawa no gunzi enzyo de amerika wo sensou ni sanka saserutameni, taiseiyou kensyou no datu syokumintika zyoukou ni doui sita. nen gatu niti, yondai kuni kome, ei, so, hana ga syomei sita rengoukoku kyoudou sengen deha, taiseiyou kensyou no kouyaku wo sizi surukotoga meiki sare, notini nen no kokusairengou kensyou no kiso tonatta.
dainizisekaitaisen nakano honkon
nen gatu, nihongun ga tyuugokuhondo kara igirisu ryou honkon ni muke te singeki sitekuruto, ei syusyou tyaatiru ha zikoku no syokuminti dearu honkon no bouei ni syoukyokuteki de, boueigun wo syoutyouteki na kibo ni syukusyou subekidato hatugen sita. nen gatu, bouei tikara no yowai syokuminti ni nihongun ga kaisyou suruto, nippon niyoru honkon no senryou ga hazimari, honkon to taiwan ha tomoni dainipponteikoku no zokuryou tonatta.
dou nen gatu, amerika ha taiseiyou kensyou wo hakkousi, tyaatiru ni datu syokumintika ni doui saseta suukagetu notini dainizisekaitaisen ni totunyuu sita. honkon no hogo ga yowaku, igirisu ga kyuu ka kuni zyouyaku, taiseiyou kensyou, rengoukoku kyoudou sengen ni goui sitanimokakawarazu, igirisu ha datu syokumintika wo kyohi si, honkon wo tyuuka minkoku ni hikiwatasu kotowo kyohi sita. nen, tyuuka minkoku ha hubyoudou zyouyaku wo haki si, igirisu tono kan de, yori kouhei na zyouyaku no teiketu ni muke ta kousyou wo kaisi sita. syou kaiseki ha honkon no mondai wo ryougoku no gidai ni kuwae youtosi, kyuuryuu no sokai wo hokano gaikoku no sokai to issyoni tyuuka minkoku ni henkan subekidato teian sita. koreha tyaatiru niyotte dankokyohi sare, kyuuryuu no riken ga hubyoudou zyouyaku ni hukuma renaikotowo syomen de doui sinakereba zyouyaku heno syomei wo kyohi suruto syutyou sitatame, tyuuka minkoku ha kyuuryuu no riken wo gidai kara hazusa zaruwo ena kunatta. nen niha tyuugoku niokeru tigaihouken no henkan ni kansu ru tyuuei zyouyaku ni tyouin si, tyuuka minkoku ha eikoku ni seisiki na syokan wo kaki, gozitu honkon mondai wo teiki suru kenri wo ryuuho sita.
dainizisekaitaisen noti
dainizisekaitaisen makki, nippon ga kouhuku suru mae, beidaitouryou ruuzuberuto ha syou kaiseki no tuma dearu sou birei ni, honkon wo tyuuka minkoku no touti sitani modosu kotowo yakusoku sita. sikasi, syuusen magiwa no nen gatu, igirisu ha honkon no touti ken wo dakkan siyouto sousou ni ugoki dasi, honkon to tyuuka minkoku no touitu wo sosi sita. nen no kokkyounaisen deno haisengo, syou kaiseki seiken ha taiwan heto taihi sita. tyokugo no nen gatu niti, igirisu ha keizaitekirieki wo riyuu ni tyuuka zinmin kyouwakoku wo tyuugoku no seitou na seihu to mitome, nen no nihonkoku tono heiwa zyouyaku de taiwan wodono seihu ni kumi ire rukatoiu mondai wo teiki sita tyuuka minkoku taiwan kokumin seihu no sanka wo sosi sita. nen, ei syusyou harorudomakumiran ha amerika to mituyaku wo musubi, honkon ga tyuuka zinmin kyouwakoku ni kougeki sareta baai no kyoudou bouei mondai tosite, amerika ha igirisu tono kan de honkon wo boueisu rukotoni goui sita. sono daisyou tosite, igirisu ha tyuuka zinmin kyouwakoku no kokusairengou heno kamei wo suisin sinaikotowo yakusoku si, kokuren no giseki wo tyuuka minkoku ni nokosu kotoninatta. sikasi, nen, arubania ketugi ga igirisu no sizi wo ete kaketu sare, kokuren deha tyuuka minkoku dehanaku tyuuka zinmin kyouwakoku wo tyuugoku no seitou na seihu tosite mitome rukotoninatta. sono noti, igirisu to tyuuka zinmin kyouwakoku ha honkon no hikiwatasi kousyou wo kaisi si, saisyuuteki ni honkon no mirai ha tyuuka minkoku taiwan dehanaku tyuuka zinmin kyouwakoku nomonotonatta.
kokkyounaisen naka mo naisen noti mo, tyuugoku kokumintou ha no nanmin ya genhei samurai nado, tyuugokuhondo kara ooku no hitobito ga honkon to taiwan no ryouhou ni nogare tekita. nenhan bamadeni, yaku bannin no tyuugoku kokumintou no heisi ga honkon ni toutyaku si, ma hosi mine no toride ni itiziteki ni syuuyou sareteita. nen gatu, heisi tatiha tyuugokukyousantou ha no bouryokuteki na syoutotu no hyouteki tonari, syuukango ni , nin no heisi ga tyou kei mine ni utusa reta. sarani bannin kara bannin no minkoku ha no nanmin ga tyou kei mine ni teizyuu si, taiwan no tyuuka kyuuzyo soukai karano minkoku ha no sikin de honkon tyou kei mine nanmin kyanpu kyuusai iinkai ga seturitu sareta. tyuuka kyuuzyo soukai ha, honkon ni koukyuuteki na minkoku ha, han naka ha no kyoudoutai wo seturitu si hazime, tyou kei mine ha ritoru taiwan tono imyou wo eta. suusennin no nekkyouteki na minkoku ha ga tyuuka kyuuzyo soukai niyotte taiwan ni isou sareta.
minkoku ha ya nanmin mo kyuuryuu zyousai ni teizyuu si, nen madeni , nin no huhou senkyo mono wo atume, kono tiiki ha tyuuka minkoku no kankatuka niaruto kakusin siteita. nen no hazime, syou kaiseki seiken hakono tiiki no touti ken wo syutyou si, kono mondai nituite igirisu seihu ni aturyoku wokake hazime ta. nenmatu, syou kaiseki seiken no yakunin ga genti wo otozure, kono tiiki wo touti surutameno keikaku wo tate, touti hukken notameno taikou an wo sakusei sita. nen gatu ni tyuugoku kokumintou no toukyokusya gakono tiiki ni iri, honkon seityou niyoru tati sirizoki ni teikou suruyou zyuumin ni hataraki kake, saisyuuteki niha kyuuryuu zyousai deno boudou ya tyuuka minkoku touti sitano tyuugokutairiku deno gakusei no kougiundou nitunagari, kanton no igirisu ryouzikan ga ryakudatu sarete houka sarerukotoninatta.
kokkyounaisen noti, honkon minkoku ha dantai ha honkon no syuyou na seizi seiryoku tonatta. sarani, honkon no minkoku ha niyoru kyousansyugisya ni taisuru sakusen ha, nendaikouhan kara nendai syotou nikakete tokuni hagesika tta. tyuuka minkoku kokkei niti niha, honkon deha tyuuka minkoku no kokki ga hinpan ni keiyou sareta. seihu no kakyuu kanryou ga kokki no tekkyo wo meizi takotode, sou zyuu boudou ga hassei si, minkoku ha uha to yoba reruga kensei ha saha to yoba reruto tatakatu ta. nen no honkon henkan ikou, tyuuka minkoku kokkei niti niokeru seitenhakuzitu manti kouki no keiyou ha gensyou sitaga, genzai demo, oberisuku to sonbun no kyouzou gaaru ton mon ku no nakayama kouen nadode miru kotogadekiru.
kousiki no kankei to seizi
nen ikou, tyuuka minkoku taiwan to honkon no kankei ha, dai minato keizai bunka gassaku saku susumu ato minato dai keizai bunka gassaku kyou susumu kai niyotte kanri sareteiru. ippou, honkon deha tyuu honkon taihoku keizai bunka benzi tokoroga taiwan no honkon tyuuzaiin zimusyo tonatteori, taiwan deha honkon keizai boueki bunka benzi tokoroga honkon no taiwan tyuuzaiin zimusyo tonatteiru. mata, honkon tono kankei ha, tairiku tiku ni tekiyou sarerusubeteno kisei ga zidouteki ni tekiyou sareruwakedehanaiga, tairiku iinkai niyottemo okonawa reteiru.
kinnen, ryouti iki hao tagaini seiziteki ni kakawa ttekita. nen niha, honkon no gakusei ga taiwan nohimawari gakuseiundou wo sien si, taiwan no gakusei ga honkon no amagasa undou wo sien sita. nen ni honkon nin zyosei ga taiwan taizaityuu ni, kousai siteita honkon nin dansei ni satugai sareta han akatuki ei satuzinziken wokikkakeni, honkon tokubetu gyouseiku seihu ha nen ni toubouhan zyourei kaiseian wo teisyutu si, taiwan dakedenaku tyuugokutairiku ya makao nimo yougisya wo hikiwatasu kotogadekiruyounisita. korewo uke te honkon deha nen nen honkon minsyuka demo ga hazimari, tyuuka minkoku seihu hakono houan ga houritu ninarukotowo nozoma zu, demo wo sizi sita. tyuuka minkoku seihu ha, genzai ha tekkai sareta toubouhan zyourei kaiseian wo, tyuugoku ga taiwan tono touitu notameni teisyou sitekita ikkoku ni seido no gensoku wo singai siteiruto mite iru. nen gatu niti, taihoku si deha suumannin no taiwanzin ga honkon no minsyuka undou wo sizi site kousin sita. taiwan ga sizi siteirukotokara, kougikoudou deha tyuuka minkoku no kokki ga hinpan ni mira reta.
nen gatu, tyuu honkon taihoku keizai bunka benzi tokoro no tyuu honkon saikousekininsya dearu taka mei mura ha, hitotu no tyuugoku no gensoku wo sizi suru syoudakusyo heno syomei wo kyohi sitatame, honkon tokubetu gyouseiku seihu kara syuugyou sasyou no kousin wo mitome rarenakatta. tairiku iinkai ha, tyuu honkon taihoku keizai bunka benzi tokoro no hokano seihu daihyousya mo honkon tokubetu gyouseiku seihu karano sasyou no oohaba na tien wo keiken siteirukotoni genkyuu sita.
nanmin no tii
mata, honkon syussin no seizika ki yuki hou ha, honkon no kougi mono ga taiwan de seizi boumei wo motome ru kanousei nituite tyuuka minkoku seihu to kaidan surutameni taiwan wo otozure teiru. honkon sin kai daigaku gakusei rengoukai tyou no hou tyuuken mo, taiwan deha boumei tetuzuki ga okonawa reteinaitoiu ki yuki hou no hatugen ni hannou si, minsyu sinpo tou ha nanmin wo tasuke rutameno gutaiteki na houritu wo seitei siteinaito nobe teiru. tyuuka minkoku soutou no sai eibun ha soosyarumedia de teikiteki ni kougi mono wo sien siteori, tyuuka minkoku no honkon makao kankei zyourei dai zyou niha seizitekiriyuu niyori tadati ni anzen to ziyuu ga kyou kasareteiru honkon mataha makao no zyuumin ni taisi teha hituyou na enzyo wo okonau to kitei sareteiruga, tyuuka minkoku seihu ha seizi nanmin notameno tetuzuki wo totonoe teinai. tyuuka minkoku gaikou butyou no kure syou ha, nanmin ni taisyo surutameniha kizon no houritu de zyuubun dearuto nobe teiruga, nyuuyookutaimuzu no eizou deha honkon karano nanmin no itibu ga taiwan tiku ni huhou ni nyuukyou siteirukotoga simesa reteori, kizon no houritu ga huzyuubun dearukotono syousa tonatteiru. honkon ziyuu sinbun no kizi ha, hitobito ha tuuzyou, honkon kara taiwan ni nogare rutameni mootaabooto wo siyousu ruto nobe teiru. nyuuyookutaimuzu no douga wo uke te, tairiku iinkai ha kougi mono ni taisi te taiwan tiku ni huhou ni nyuukyou sinaiyou keikokusi, ryuugaku sasyou ya tousi sasyou, kankou sasyou nadono tokusyu na baai sika taisyou nisiteinaiga, kizon no houritu de zyuubun dearutono seimei wo aratame te happyou sita. ryuugaku sasyou nituiteha, nen gatu ni tyuuka minkoku kyouikubu yori, honkon no daigakusei ga taiwan tiku de kougi wo uke tari, benkyou wo tuzuke tarisurukotowo kyoka suruto happyou sita. ryuugaku sasyou ya tousi sasyou no sikaku wo mota nai nanmin no baai, seisiki na boumei tetuzuki gadekinaitame, nitikan no kankou sasyou de taiwan tiku ni nyuukyou surukotoninaruga, gouhouteki ni syuurou surukotohadekinai.
minsyu sinpo tou ga genkouhou de zyuubun datosuru tatiba toha taisyouteki ni, nenzyuu hana minkoku soutou senkyo de haiboku wo kissi ta tyuugoku kokumintou no kankoku yu ha, honkon karano boumeisya wo sien surutameno nanmin hou no seiritu wo zenmenteki ni sizi suruto nobe teiru. mata, nen gatu ni zidai rikiryou ha, minsyu sinpo tou to rippou in ni taisi, honkon karano seizi boumeisya ni taisuru tetuzuki ga meikaku ninaruyouni honkon makao kankei zyourei dai zyou wo kaisei surutotomoni, nanmin hou no seiritu wo yousei siteita. nen gatu genzai, tyuuka minkoku soutou no sai eibun to gaikou butyou no kure syou ha kizon no houritu de zyuubun dato syutyou siteirunimokakawarazu, honkon ya makao no kyozyuusya ha douzyou rei dai zyou ni motozu ite taiwan karano seisiki na enzyo wo uke teinai. mata, tyuugoku kokumintou syuseki no kou hiroomi ha, sai eibun nomotode minsyu sinpo tousei ken ha honkon nin no sien wo kowadaka ni syutyou sitekitaga, imi noaru sien wositekonakattatosi, honkon nin ni seizi boumei wo mitome ru houritu wo seitei subekidato syutyou siteiru. kou hiroomi ha, minsyu sinpo tou ga houritu wo seitei siteinaikotonituite, honkon sien wo karayakusoku no hyougo nisubekidehanai. houseika he muke te tie wo sibori, zissai no koudou de honkon wo sasae youto nobe ta.
tyuuka minkoku seihu ga seisiki ni nanmin tositeno tii wo mitome teinainimokakawarazu, honkon no itibu no hitobito ha taiwan ni nogare tekitaga, sono nakani ha dora wan syoten no sousisya dearu hayasi sakae moto mo hukuma reteiru. hayasi sakae moto ha, taiwan ha honkon nin nitotte tyuugokutairiku no danatu ni taikou suru saigo no toride deari, wakai honkon nin ha taiwan ni dete iku bekidato nobe teiru. sikasi, taiwan niha nanmin hou ganaitame, wakai honkon nin gadonoyounisitekorewo zitugen surukaha humei. hayasi sakae moto zisin ha, taiwan deno tousi sasyou syutoku ni hituyou na kingaku dearu man doru wo atarasii syoten notameni tyoutatu sita.
tyuuka minkoku tairiku iinkai ha taiwan tiku ni nogare tekita hitobito wo sien siteinaitame, hi seihu sosiki gayori sekkyokutekini sien katudou wo itte iru. taiwan kirisuto tyourou kyoukai no sainan kirisuto tyourou kyoukai ha, honkon kara taiwan ni nogare tekita hitobito ni hinanzyo wo teikyou sitari, honkon niiru kougi mono ni bussi wo okuru nadono sien wositekita. taiwan gakusei rengoukai hisyo tyou no tin ko kuma ha, taiwan no hi seihu sosiki no kihonteki na simei ha, seihu ni nanmin hou wo kaisei suruyou aturyoku wokakerukotodatosi, hi seihu sosiki ha tyoukiteki na sien gadekinaitame, nanmin wo gouhouteki ni ukeire rukotogamottomo koukateki dato nobe teiru.
nen gatu niti, tyuuka minkoku soutou no sai eibun ha, honkon kara nogare tekita hitobito ni taisuru zindou sien wo okonau tameno keikaku wo sakutei suruto happyou sita. nen gatu niti, keikaku no syousai ga akiraka ninatta. nen gatu niti, dai minato keizai bunka gassaku saku susumu kai no sitani dai minato hukumu kouryuu benkou situ ga taihoku ni kaisetusa reru yotei de, zinkendantai ya simindantai to kyouryoku site, kihonteki na seikatuhi, kyozyuu, teizyuu, syuurou, hogo nadono mondai wo kakae ru hitobito wo sien surukotowo ito siteirutoiu. benkou situ no sien ha taiwan ni nyuukyou sitekaratonaru. nanmin boumei hou no sikou nituiteno happyou hanaku, tyuuka minkoku seihu ha sien wo motome ru nin wo nanmin dehanaku you hogosya to yon deiru.
nen gekka zyun, honkon kara kita nin ga hune no nenryou kire de higasi sa syo sima ni muka tte hyouryuu siteirutokorowo, tyuuka minkoku umi zyun syo ga hakken sita. honkon tokubetu gyouseiku seihu hoan kyokutyou no rinoie tyou ha hanzaisya wokakumatteiruto taiwan ni keikoku wo hassi, hanzai nin hikiwatasi kyoutei ga musuba reteinainimokakawarazu, nin no henkan wo motome ta. nen gatu niti niha, honkon karano nin ga tyuugoku umi kei kyoku niyotte hakken sareta. izureno ziken demo, zyoukyaku ha taiwan tiku heno toubou wo nozon deitato kangae rareteiru.
tyuuka minkoku naisei bu imin syo niyoruto, syurui no zairyuu kyoka syutoku puroguramu no sita de taiwan ni izyuu suru honkon nin no zairyuu kyoka ga zoukakeikou niarutoiu. nen niha, , ken no zairyuu kyokasyou no hakkou to , ken no eizyuuken huyo gaari, nen niha , ken no zairyuu kyokasyou no hakkou to , ken no eizyuuken huyo gaatta. nen gatu kara gatu made, , ken no kyokasyou to , ken no eizyuuken huyo ga hakkousa reta. imin syo no kankeisya ha, kono zyousyoukeikou ha saikin no honkon no seizizyoukyou to ookiku kankei siteiruto nobe teiru.
bunkateki oyobi keizaiteki kankei
bunkateki niha, taiwan tiku no syuyou gengo ha kokugo, honkon no syuyouti iki gengo ha kantongo daga, ryouti iki tomo tyuugokutairiku no syuyou gengo dearu tyuugokugo nite siyousa reteiru kantaizi toha taisyouteki ni, ima monao kyuurai no hantaizi wo siyousi teiru.
kokkyounaisen no kekka, taiwan tiku to tyuugokutairiku mano tyokkoubin ha mitome rareteinakattatame, nen ni ryougan teiki tyaataa bin ga sousetu sarerumadeha, ooku no zyoukyaku ga honkonkeiyu de norikae teita. ryouti iki no souhou mano ryokou ha ninki gaari, nen niha, nippon bannin , tyuugokutairiku bannin ni tugu banme no mokutekiti dearu honkon ni ryokou sita taiwan tiku no zinmin ha yaku bannin ni atu ta. kono bannin ha honkon deha, tyuugokutairiku karano kankoukyaku ni tuide banme ni ooi ikigai karano kankoukyaku dearu. honkon to taihoku taiwan momozono kokusaikuukou , taityuu si, tainan si, takao si no kaku kuukou wo musubu tyokkoubin ga unkou sareteiru.
tyuuka minkoku taiwan to honkon ha dainizisekaitaisen noti, kyouiku to syakai kiban ni tagaku no tousi wo okonai, ryouti iki no keizai ha oohaba ni kaizen sare, azia yonsyou ryuu no itiin tonatta.
kanrenkoumoku
tyuutai kankei kankei
honkon no taigai kankei kankei
tyuuka minkoku no kokusaikankei kokusaikankei
honkon minkoku ha dantai dantai
nakayama kinen kouen kouen
mago nakayama kinen kan honkon
mago nakayama siseki kei kei
nakayama kouen ton mon
kyou no honkon, asita no taiwan yohankaruro , nen gatu niti ha, amerika gassyuukoku no zyoyuu.
syutuensakuhin
boodouookuenpaia yokubou no mati mati
zasopuranozu aisyuu no mafia dai siizun
roo oodaa siizun
saikopasu sitai no kokuin kokuin
feageemu feageemu
roo oodaa siizun
kuraimusutoorii kuraimusutoorii
gaibu rinku
yohankaruro eigo
yohankaruro intaanettoburoodoueideetabeesu eigo
bureda no kaizyou bureda nokaizyou, , ha, diegoberasukesu niyoru kaiga. nen kara nen ni egaka reta. nen gatu niti no bureda kanraku wo nasitoge ta itaria umare no syougun anburoziosupinora totomoni itaria wo otozure takotoga, kono e no seisaku nokikkaketonatteiru. bureda no kaizyou ha berasukesu no daihyousaku no tudearu. zyanmorisu hakono e woarayuru kaiga no naka demo mottomo supein tekina mai dato hyousi teiru.
rekisi
nen no bureda kanraku ha, hatizyuu nen sensougo han nioite kazusukunai supein gun daisyouri no tudearu. zienovu ano kizoku de supein gun no syougun deatta anburoziosupinora ha, zyousi no sizi wo musisi te bureda wo senryou sita. bureda senryou no mae ni supein seihu ha, hokkai engan teiti obi no kenrou na tosi ni houi tatakawo sikake runoha kin no rouhi da, neederuranto renpoukyouwakoku no keizaihuusa ni syuutyuu subekida, toiu housin wo sudeni kettei siteita. kono dankai de supein gun no daibubun ha, ookiku tenkai suru sanzyuu nen sensou no hou ni hurimuke rareteita.
bureda ha kokkyousen tikaku niaru oranda no tosi de, nen irai aruba kou no sihai wo uke, nengo ni dakkan sarerumo hutatabi syuugeki wo uke ta. mati ha oranie oranienassau ie no syoryou de, karera ga kizui ta kengo na siro ha to yoba reta. nen, doitu deno sensou ga teisen tonari, supein gun hasono seiryoku wo bureda ni syuutyuu saserukotogadekita. nankouhuraku de sira reru yousai wo kougeki surukotoha kenmei dehanaitoiu kangaekata ga syuryuu dattaga, anburoziosupinora ha bureda ni muka utoiu hizyouni zyuuyouna handan wo kudasi ta. reganesu kousyaku diegoferipedegusuman to, karurosukoroma mo supinora ni tui te bureda ni muka tta.
supinora ga gunkou wo tate tanoha, nen ni hurandoru no oosutende wo kanraku sasete kin youmou kunsyou wo eta tokidearu. sitagatte bureda no houi ha, oranda to supein no kousen dearudakedehanaku dearudakedehanaku
supinora to oranda no nassau toiu daisyougun no gekitotu demoatta. souhou tomo yousai no koubou wo zyukuti siteori, sono hyouban nokakaru tatakai deatta. oranda gawa no meisyou oranie kou maurittuhu a nnassau ha supinora to gokaku no tatakai wo maziwa siteitaga, houi sen ga syuuryou suru mae ni sibou siteita. sono noti wo tui da oranie kou hurederikkuhendorikku ha oranda gun no ikioi wo mori kaeso utositeumakuyukazu, saisyuuteki ni gatu ni kouhuku sita. bureda no haiboku no go ha touzi no kouketu sato kandai sawo arawasi teita.
supinora no yuumou to seikou ni kanka sarete berasukesu no egai ta e ga bureda no kaizyou deatta. berasukesu gakono e wo egai teita goro, sudeni bureda ha oranda ni dakkan sare, supinora mo sikyo siteita. supinora ga sikyo sitanoha nen no aki, kare ga berasukesu totomoni itaria he koukai sitawazuka nengo nokotodeatta. berasukesu ha bureda no kaizyou wo, supein kokka to supinora heno keii wo arawasi te egai ta.
diegoberasukesu to anburoziosupinora ga hizyouni sinmitu ninattanoha ninattanoha
nen, baruserona kara zienoba heno tabi no totyuu deatta. gaka hananiyorimo bureda houi gamotarasita higekiteki ketumatu ni kokoro wo ugoka sareta. kono tabi nosugu noti, humeiyo nimo supinora ha zaisan wo usinau hame ninattanodearu. kano gunkou saemo tyuusyou wo uke, supinora ha kan monaku situi noutini haka ni itutu tanodearu. berasukesu ha, supinora no sigo kanari kibun wo syoutin sase, kano meiyo wo kaihuku sitaito kangae ta. berasukesu ha supinora to siriatu takotode, naki supinora heno sanzi tosite bureda no kaizyou wo egai tanodeatta.
kaisetu
bureda no kaizyou ha, feripe yo gun no syouri wo kinen site egaka reta zitubutudai no senkyou kaiga mai noutino tude, buenreteiiro miya no ousitu saron ni kakage rareteita. egaka reteirunoha, supein to oranda kan de kouhuku bunsyo ga nen gatu niti ni tyouin sareta nitigo, kagi no ukewatasi no bamen dearu. soreyue e no syouten ha, sentou sonomonodehanaku wakai ni oka reteiru. kagi ha ha
kousei nomasani tyuusinten ni egaka reteiru. heikousihenkei de kakomu kotode kagi wo kyoutyou si, ooki na kanbasu zentai no syouten tonatteiru. mozidoori kousei no kagi deari, hokano youso no kousei wo kime rumototonatteiru.
e no tyuusinten ha hiyuteki nimo, yusuteinusuhu a nnassau kara supinora he tewatasa reru kagi ni oka reteiru. kono e no tokutyou ha, sentou wo byousya sita e nagara, seiteki de kansyouteki na ten niaru.
mokugekisya no seimei niyoreba, supinora to nassau ryousya ga uma kara ori tatoiu. supinora ha, ouzi no oukan ya kouki na umare no sikan tatini kakoma reta yusuteinusu ga toutyaku surunowo matu ta. tuide araware tanoha, soutoku tosono kazoku, sinzoku, rikugun sikangakkou no seito daihyou deatta. karera ha houi no kan, ka tokoro ni tozikome rareteita. supinora ha teki no haisyou ni odaya kana hyouzyou de aisatu wosite daki sime, nagai koubou de karera ga mise ta yuuki ya nintairyoku wo tatae ru kotoba saekaketeiru.
bureda no kaizyou wo tousi te, supinora ha, oranda gun ni simesi ta sonkei no taido wo kyou made tatae rareteiru. supinora ha ha
zibun no guntai ni, make ta oranda gun woazakettari gyakutai sitarisurukotowo kinzi ta. kinnen no ripooto niyoreba, karezisin yusuteinusu ni keirei sitatoiu. berasukesu no e ga simesi tanoha, sensou no hate ni nin ganozokaseru zindou mede ari, yusuteinusu ya oranda gun ni taisi supinora ga simesi ta hairyo wo tatae teiru.
berasukesu ha supinora to kouyuu gaattatame, bureda no kaizyou wo rekisiteki nimo seikaku ni egaku kotogadekita. supinora no gaiken byousya no seikakusei hamotiron, sentou nituite supinora ga kioku siteita naiyou mo, berasukesu no e no kousei ni yakutatu ta. bureda houi sen ni kansu ru kozintekina taiken ni motozu ita rekisi tisiki wo tousi te, bureda no kaizyou ha hizyouni zyuuyouna rekisiteki zikkyou wo hata siteiru. berasukesu ha ha
hizyouni ninzyoumi noatta, ari si niti no meisyou no kinenhi wo, hikaeme nayari hou de uti tate taito nozon deita. sokode, kare dokuzi no himitu no houhou de, e no nakano zinbutuzou ni eien no inoti wo huki kon da. bureda no kaizyou ha, sen no ba niokeru supein no tikara, nintai, nasakebukasa ga tuninatta syunkan ni keii wo arawasi teiru. gamenzentai no migisita hazi ni kamikire ga oti teiru byousya gaaruga, korehamotomoto gaka ga syomei surutameni egaka retatosareteiruga, hokano berasukesu no sakuhin to douyou ni saisyuuteki ni syomei sarerukotohanakatta.
sankoubunken
, . . . . , .
, . . , , .
, . . , .
, . . , .
kyakutyuu
gaibu rinku
, , . , .
, . , . , . . . nen gatu niti eturan . haridoahumadosyoukiieru haridoahumadosyoukiieruisuranburi arabia go , eigo , nen gatu niti nen gatu niti ha, eziputo no gunzin. anwarusaadaato daitouryou wo ansatu sitakotode sira reru.
oitati
isuranburi ha eziputo no miniyaa ken no tyuuryuu katei no syussin de, titi ha eziputo no komonbengosi. eziputo rikugun sikangakkou wo yuusyuu na seiseki de sotugyougo, eziputo rikugun no houhei butai ni syoui tosite haizoku sareta. nen gatu, hazimete zissenteki na siki wo situ ta. kono saino tantou ha, kairo wo kyoten tosuru dai yasen houhei dan no syoutai no houretu.
sadato no ansatu
nen gatu niti ni okonawa reta dai kai nen gatu no syouri kinen pareedo deha, honrai ha isuranburi hikii ru syoutai no sanka ha yotei sareteinakattaga, sanka wo menzyo sareta dai houhei tai no kawari tosite sanka surukotoninatta.
kanon hou woken hiki suru dai no oogata torakku wo hukumu syoutai ga daitouryou no endai ni tikazu ki hazime ruto, abudiruhamidoabudourusaraamu naka gunsou, atateieruhamiidaraiiru gotyou, huseinabasu gotyou ratotomoni torakku kara tobiori, hokano eziputo nin ya gaikoku no youzin noiru nakani, daitouryou he muke te ko no te ryuu dan wo touteki sita. mata, kanetu sutando ni muke zyuu wo ransya sita. saisyuuteki ni, isuranburi ga hu a rao heno si to sakebi nagara kanetu sutandoni hasiri yori, taore ta sadato no karada he zyuu wo happou sita.
isuranburi ha ansatu noti torae rare, yoku nen gatu, hoka mei no kyouhansya to tomoni zyuusatukei tonatta.
syokei noti
isuranburi ha, sono saigo niyotte isuramu kagekiha kara gendai isuramu hatu no syahiido zyunkyou mono to hyouka sareruyouninatta.
kyoudai ga syuukyou guruupu tono kankei niyori taiho sareteori, konokotoga ansatu heno sanka no ooki nakikkaketonattato bunseki sareteiru.
nen, iran ha isuranburi wo kinen si, kano sugata wo egai ta kitte wo hakkousi ta.
nen gatu niti, arukaida no aruisuranburi ryodan ha, touzi no pakisutan syusyou kouho, syookattoaziizu no ansatu misui ziken no hankouseimei wo dasi ta. mata, nen gatu niti, dou ryodan wo nanoru chechen nin no guruupu ga, rosia no ryokyakki no bakuhaziken ni taisi te hankouseimei wo dasi ta.
kanrenkoumoku
kairo kairo
anwaruatu anwaruassaadaato biitoruzu gayatte kuru ya a ya a ya a eigo ha, nen ni koukai sareta biitoruzu hatu no syueneiga. rityaadoresutaa no kantokusakuhin de, igirisu de tanpen komedi wo tukutu teita rityaado ga eigakai he sinsyutu surukikkaketonatta sakuhin tomonatteiru.
kyakuhon no aranoouen ha, amerika dekoremade ryousan sareteita myuuzisyan eiga no merodorama toitta sutairu wo tousyuu sezu, igirisu kisitu noaru komedi sakuhin nisiyouto kangae, biitoruzu no isogasii nitizyou wo dokyumentariitatti de egaku kotonisita. tumari, biitoruzu ga biitoruzu zisin no huusi geki wo enzi rutoiu sakuhin tonatta. nao, kono sakuhin deha nin gasorezore syuyaku dearuga, naka demo ringosutaa no engi ga hyouka sare, zisaku herupu nin ha aidoru ya biitoruzu kaisango no eigasakuhin heno syutuen ni tunaga tta.
amerika deno seikou wo nentou nioiteitatame, saundotorakku mo kane ta doumei no arubamu wo seisaku. biitoruzu ga debyuu noti hazimete, karera no orizinaru kyoku nomide kousei sareta arubamu tonatta.
eiga sakusei ni ata tteha, amerika deno sippai wo osore te teiyosan monokuro de seisaku saretaga, kekka ha daihitto tonari, amerika demo biitoruzu no sakuhin ga nokinami mi daihitto wo kiroku sita.
nen ni houdai wo gendai ni tikai haadodeizunaito ni henkou site ribaibaru zyouei sare, genzai sohuto han dehakotirano houdai ga saiyou sareteiru.
sutoorii
biitoruzu ha, oi kakete kuru nekkyouteki na hu a n no gun wo huri kiri, ressya ni tobi noru. pooru no zaseki no tonari niha, syuui wo soudou ni makikomu itazura suki na pooru no sohu, zyonmakkaatonii ga suwatu teiru. kareha ressyanai demo taizai suru hoteru demo sawagi wo oko si, ringo ni todoi ta kazino no syoutaizyou wo toriage te asobi ni itte simau. biitoruzu to maneezyaa no noomu to sieiku ha pooru no sohu ni hurimawasa reru.
kisyakaiken ya terebisyoo no rihaasaru nadode isogasii biitoruzu. sonna naka, zyoozi ha hitotigai wosarete sinsaku no huku no maaketeingu kaigi ni sanka saseraretesimau. dokusyo siteita ringo ha, pooru no sohu nisosonokasarete sanpo ni deka ketesimau. ringo ha kamera wo motu te mati ni deka keruga, sippai bakari oko si, keisatukan ni husinsya to omowa re keisatusyo ni renkou sareru. honban madeato suuzyuppun, zyon, pooru, zyoozi no nin ha modotu tekonai ringo wo sagasi ni iku. sono goro, pooru no sohu mo nise sain iri no biitoruzu no syasin wo hu a n ni uro utosite keisatukan ni tukama ri onazi keisatusyo ni renkou sareru. pooru no sohu ha ringo no ibasyo wo nin ni sirase rutame keisatusyo wo dassou suru. nin ha ringo wo ture modosi, terebisyoo no honban de nekkyou suru kankyaku wo mae ni ensou suru. sosite, yasumu kan monaku herikoputaa de tugino basyo heto idou suru.
kyasuto
nihongo hukikae syokai housou ha nen gatu niti youga tokubetuseki
sono hoka koe no syutuen hitosi nai ken yuki, yanami zyouzi, naya rokurou, siomi ryuusuke hoka hoka
taitoru no yurai
taitoru hano notini gakurutoiu, bunpouzyou ayamatu ta iimawasi dearuga, koreha ringosutaa ga . to itta ato, soto wo miru tosudeni kuraku natteitakotoni kizuki . to tuketasi tatoiu episoodo niyoru.
houdai no biitoruzu gayatte kuru ya a ya a ya a ha eigahyouronka mizuno haruo ga yunaito eiga zaisekizi ni nazuketa toiu hanasi ga sira reteiruga, biitoruzu gayatte kuru ha zennen no nen ni sya ga seisaku sita nyuusu eiga nen no manchesutaa kouen wo osame tamonoto honsaku wo toritigae te meimei sitanodehanaikatoiu iken gaaru. mata, nippon yorimo sakini ei sanka no odeonrekoodo kara hatubai sareta doitu ban niha toiu taitoru ga tuke rareteiru. doitu igai nimo odeonrekoodo hanken no kuni deha ga tui teiru han ga hukusuusonzai suru nippon mo odeon kei .
nihongoban dekonoyouna taitoru ga eraba reta riyuu nituite, touzi tousiba ongakukougyou de biitoruzu tantou deari, hon eiga no puromoosyon nimo kakawa tteita takasima hiroyuki ha toritigae no kanousei ha hitei dekinaiga, musiroano zidai no zyoukyou ya hu a n no kimoti woumaku torikon da kekka dehanaikato katatu teiru.
nen ni saizyouei toga ririisu sareta saino houdai ha, haadodeizunaito ni aratame rareta.
siyou kyoku
honsaku de siyousa reta gakkyoku ha, zyooziharisun saku no dontobazaamii wo nozoki, izuremo renon renonmakkaatonii niyotte tukura reta.
ahaadodeizunaito oopuningukurezitto
koisuru hutari hutari
aiuonabiiyuaman sanpuru
dontobazaamii sanpuru
oorumairavingu sanpuru
koi niotitara niotitara
kyantobaimiiravu kyantobaimiiravu
andoairavuhaa andoairavuhaa
sutekina dansu dansu
ringo no teema insutourumentaru
kyantobaimiiravu ripuriizu
terumiihowai terumiihowai
siiravuzuyuu siiravuzuyuu
ahaadodeizunaito insutourumentaru, endokurezitto aiuonabiiyuaman dontobazaamii oorumairavingu siiravuzuyuu no kyoku wo nozoi ta subete no gakkyoku ga, eiga to doumei no saundotorakku ban ni syuuroku sareteiru. mata, nen gatu niti ni paarofon yori ga hatubai sareta. men niha koisuru hutari to koi niotitara, men niha terumiihowai to andoairavuhaa ga syuuroku sareta.
siyou kyoku nituiteno bikou
honsaku no doumei no arubamu ni syuuroku sareteirubokuga naku ha, honsaku notameni kaka reta gakkyoku no tudatta. tousyo ha menbaa nin ga kaidan wo kake kudari, hiroba dehasyaideru siin de siyousa reru yotei dattaga, kantoku no handan niyori kyantobaimiiravu ni sasikae rare, saisyuuteki ni misiyou tonatta.
yuukyantodouzatto ha, eiga no syuuban no terebisyoo no siin de siyousa reru yotei de, ensou siin mo satuei saretaga, saisyuuteki ni katto sareta. kono ensou siin ha, nen gatu niti ni housou sareta edosarivu a nsyoo de, rondon de okona wareta biitoruzu heno intabyuu eizou totomoni housou sareta.
aikooruyuaneemu mo honsaku ni siyousa reru yotei dattaga, ikanaru riyuu ka katto sareta.
episoodo
sakusei sareta gakkyoku nohotondoha sakuhintyuu de ensou sareta. mata, koukai housou no honban toiu settei de ensou sareta siin no kankyaku no nakani ha, ekisutora tosite wakaki niti no firukorinzu gaita. koregakikkakeninari, notini happyou sareta meikingu eizou genzai ha haiban deha hosuto yaku wo firukorinzu zisin ga tutome teiru.
biitoruzu ga hu a n no onnanoko ni oi kakerarerutoiu oopuningu deha, satueizi ni hasitu teiru zyoozi ga koron desimai, zyoozi nitumazuita ringo mo koron desimau. eiga dehasono katto ga tukawa reteiru.
koi niotitarano ensou siin de, zyoozi gamotare kaka tta anpu ga oti souninaru.
gekityuu de norikon da ressya no naka de biitoruzu ga nanpa suru zyogakusei no itiin ni, notini zyoozi no saisyo no tuma tonaru pateiboido kurezitto hituzi hyouki ga syutuen siteiru. satueityuu ni zyoozi to patei ga koinaka ninari kousai ga sutaato sita. touzi no senden siryou tosite satuei sareta syasin ni eiga nai de touzyou sita zyogakusei yakuno zyoyuu tooru nin ga menbaa sorezoreno namae ga kaka reta direkutaazucheaa ni suwatu ta biitoruzu no menbaa no kami wo kusi detokasiteiru syasin gaaruga, zyoozi no kami ha pateiboido gatokasiteiru.
honsakuhin to arubamu no seikou de hazima tta hatu no amerikatuaa notameni, kenedi kuukou ni ori tatu ta karera wohito mami youto osi kaketa hu a n no kazu ha, genzai demo dou kuukou ni osi yose ta kenbutukyaku no saikoukiroku wo hokotu teirutoiu.
pooru no sohu ga nanika toiutokogireina rousinsi to hyousa reruga, koreha enzi teiru uiruhureddoburanbiru ga nen karade houei sareteita komedidorama de, kitanai ziisantoitumo iwa reteiru syuyaku no rouzin wo enzi teitakotoni yurai suru.
parodiomaazyu
nen koukai nokomadori simai no dokyumentarii eiga komadori simai gayatte kuru ya a ya a ya a ha, honsaku no kyuuhou dai ga motoni natteiru.
biitoruzu no parodibando, ratoruzu no terebi eiga ooruyuuniidoizukyassyu kin kososubeteno nakani, honsaku no parodisiin ga touzyou suru.
nen no gatu kara hazima tta siseidou noni, oguri zyun, miura haruma, tumabuki satosi, eita no nin gakono eiga no biitoruzu wo omowa seru kyarakutaa ni hunsi teiru. siyousa reta kyoku ha biitoruzu dehanaku, misieruruguran no digudindin .

oorumuubii eigo
eigo sakamura sadao sakamura sadao, nen taisyou nen gatu niti nen reiwa nen gatu niti ha, nippon no nougaku mono kagakusya. senmon ha, nougeikagaku nousanbutu riyougaku tennenmono yuukikagaku. nougaku hakase hokkaidoudaigaku . hokkaidoudaigaku meiyokyouzyu. moto obihiro tikusan daigaku gakutyou.
keireki
gunmaken tatebayasi si umare. nen syouwa nen hokkaidoudaigaku nougakubu sotu. dou nougakubu zyosyu. nen syouwa nen masatyuusettu daigaku ni ryuugaku. nen syouwa nen hokkaidoudaigaku nougakubu zyokyouzyu. nen syouwa nen dou nougakubu kyouzyu. nen syouwa nen dou nougakubu tyou. nen heiseigannen hokkaidoudaigaku teinen taikan. doumei yo kyouzyu. rakunou gakuen daigaku rakunou gakubu kyouzyu.
nen heisei nen obihiro tikusan daigaku dai gakutyou ni syuunin. nen heisei nen obihiro tikusan daigaku taikan.
nen hokkaidoudaigaku yori nougaku hakase. ronbun no dai ha amino san, tanpakusitu no hikari bunkai to kappen ni kansu ru kenkyuu .
nen gatu niti, sapporosinai no byouin de sikyo. tosi botu. zyo zyuu sani.

nousanbutu riyougaku kyoutyo, asakurasyoten, nen
nousan syokuhin kagaku to riyou kyoutyo, buneidou, nen
saisin syokuhin eiseigaku hentyo, sankyou syuppan, nensyo han nen dai han
saisin syokuhin kakou gaku kyouhen tyo, sankyou syuppan, nensyo han nen dai han
saisin syokuhin gaku kakuron hentyo, sankyou syuppan, nensyo han nen dai han
saisin syokuhin gaku souron hentyo, sankyou syuppan, nensyo han nen dai han
kyakutyuu syodai haatofoodo kousyaku huransisusiimoa huransisusiimoakonuei eigo , , , nen gatu niti nen gatu niti ha, igirisu no kizoku, gaikoukan, seizika.
tyuu huransu taisi zaisyoku nen nen , airurando soutoku zaisyoku nen nen , miyauti tyoukan zaisyoku nen nen nadowo rekinin sita. nen ni titi kara konuei dansyaku no syakui wo keisyou si, nen niha haatofoodo hakusyaku, nen niha haatofoodo kousyaku ni zyo serareta.
keireki
nen gatu niti, syodai konuei dansyaku huransisusiimoa huransisusiimoakonuei tosono tuma syaarotto kyuusei syootaa no tyounan tosite umare ru. samasetto kousyaku siimoa ie no bunryuu no iegara deatta.
iiton kou wo sotugyou sita. nen gatu niti no titi no sini yori dai dai konuei dansyaku kurai ingurando kizoku syakui to dai dai konuei konueikirurutaa dansyaku kurai airurando kizoku syakui wo keisyou sita.
nen ni airurando oukoku suumitu komon kan ni retu si, dounen gatu niti niha haatofoodo hakusyaku kurai to biityamu sisyaku kurai izuremo gureetoburiten kizoku wo atae rareta. kono tuno syakui ha otouto henrii heno tokubetu keisyouken wo mitome teita.
nen ni gaataa kunsyou wo zyukun. nen kara sikyo made uirikkusyaa tizi wo tutome, nen niha gureetoburiten oukoku suumitu komon kan ni retu suru.
nen kara nen nikakete tyuu huransu taisi wo tutome ta. nen kara nen madeha airurando soutoku wo tutome ta. tuide nen kara nen made miyauti tyoukan wo tutome ta. sono mano nen gatu kara gatu nikakete kazuma atama, nen kara nen nikakete montogomeriisyaa tizi mo tutome ta.
nen gatu niti niha haatofoodo kousyaku kurai to yaamasu hakusyaku kurai izuremo gureetoburiten kizoku wo atae rareta.
yoku nen gatu niti ni sikyo sita. syakui ha tyounan huransisu ga keisyou sita.
eiten
syakui
nen gatu niti no titi no sini yori ikano syakui wo keisyou.
uorikku syuu niokeru ragurii no dai dai konuei dansyaku ,
nen gatu niti no tyokkyo zyouni yoru ingurando kizoku syakui
antorimu ken niokeru kirurutaa no dai dai konuei konueikirurutaa dansyaku ,
nen gatu niti no tyokkyo zyouni yoru airurando kizoku syakui nen gatu niti ni ikano syakui wo sinki ni atae rareru rareru
syodai haatofoodo hakusyaku
tyokkyo zyouni yoru gureetoburiten kizoku syakui. zisin no dankei dansi no hoka, otouto henrii heno tokubetu keisyou kitei ari ari
syodai biityamu sisyaku
tyokkyo zyouni yoru gureetoburiten kizoku syakui. zisin no dankei dansi no hoka, otouto henrii heno tokubetu keisyou kitei ari nen gatu niti ni ikano syakui wo sinki ni zyo sareru.
syodai haatofoodo kousyaku
tyokkyo zyouni yoru ingurando kizoku syakui
noofooku syuu niokeru syodai yaamasu hakusyaku
tyokkyo zyouni yoru gureetoburiten kizoku syakui
kunsyou
nen, gaataa kisidan kunsyou naito
kazoku
nen ni dai dai gurahuton kousyaku tyaaruzufitturoi no musume izabera nen nen to kekkon. kanozyo tono mani ikano ko wo mouke ta.
dai ko tyounan huransisusiimoa huransisusiimoakonuei nen nen dai dai haatofoodo kousyaku kurai wo keisyou keisyou
dai ko tyouzyo ansiimoa ansiimoakonuei nen nen syodai doroheda kousyaku tyaaruzumuua to kekkon kekkon
dai ko zinan henriisiimoa henriisiimoakonuei nen nen syomin ingi in in
dai ko zizyo sarahuransesusiimoa sarahuransesusiimoakonuei nen nen syodai rondonderii kousyaku robaatosuteyuwaato to kekkon kekkon
dai ko mituo robaatosiimoa robaatosiimoakonuei nen nen syomin ingi in in
dai ko sanzyo gaatoruudosiimoa gaatoruudosiimoakonuei nen nen dai dai guradison hakusyaku zyoozimeeson zyoozimeesonviriaazu to kekkon kekkon
dai ko si onna huransesusiimoa huransesusiimoakonuei nen nen rinkan haku girei syougou henriiperamu henriiperamukurinton to kekkon kekkon
dai ko yonnan edowaadosiimoa edowaadosiimoakonuei nen nen
dai ko go onna erizabesusiimoa erizabesusiimoakonuei nen nen ruiizizyaffeeri to kekkon kekkon
dai ko roku onna izaberareicherusiimoa izaberareicherusiimoakonuei nen nen zyoozihatton to kekkon kekkon
dai ko ituo hyuusiimoa nen nen kaigun gunzin. haatofoodo kou kurai ha dai ikou kano sison ga keisyou keisyou
dai ko mutuo uiriamusiimoa uiriamusiimoakonuei nen nen
dai ko siti otoko zyoozisiimoa zyoozisiimoakonuei nen nen syomin ingi in in
kyakutyuu
tyuusyaku
syutten
gaibu rinku
uikimediakomonzu niha, syodai haatofoodo kousyaku huransisusiimoa huransisusiimoakonuei ni kansu ru kategori gaarimasu. kottonkurabu ha, nen no amerika gassyuukoku no hanzai eiga.
kantoku ha huransisufoodokoppora kurezitto ha huransisukoppora , syutuen ha rityaadogia to guregoriihainzu nado.
nendai kara nendai nikakete nyuuyookuhaaremu tiku ni zituzai sita koukyuu naitokurabu kottonkurabu wo butai ni, hanaya kana syoo ya mafia no haken arasoi nadowo, zituzai no zinbutu wo mazie te egai ta fikusyon dearu.
sutoorii
gyangu ga masingan wobutu hanasu kinsyuhou zidai no nyuuyooku nendai . manhattan no haaremu niaru kottonkurabu ha, zyuugyouin to dansaa ha kokuzin daga, kyaku ha seisou sita hakuzin ni kagira reru koukyuu naitokurabu datta. kurabu no oonaa dearu ounii to hurentii ha, ankokugai no kuromaku teki sonzai de, gyangu tatiwo gyuuzi tteita.
gyangu no bosu dearu datti ha, haaremu de syuugeki wo uke, korunetto sousya ken pianisuto no dikisiidowaiyaa rityaadogia ni inoti wo sukuwa reta. dikisii ha makizoe wo kututu ta kasyu no bera daianrein ni itimoku boresuruga, bera ha datti no aizin ninaru. bera niha, buroodouei ni zibun no naitokurabu wo motu toiu yasin gaattanoda. dikisii ha, datti ni ago de tukawa reru tatiba ni iyake gasasi, dakkyaku no kikai wo ukagau.
wakate no kokuzin tappudansaa dearu sandoman guregoriihainzu ha, ani no kurei to konbi de kottonkurabu no oodisyon wo uke, goukaku suru. sandoman ha ani tono tairitu ya, konketu no kasyu raira tono koi ni nayami tutu, kottonkurabu deno ninki wo kakuzitu namonotosite iku.
dikisii ha kottonkurabu no oonaa dearu ounii no kutikiki de, hariuddo no gyangu eiga ni syutuen si, sutaa ninaru. daga, dikisii no otouto no vinsento nikorasukeizi ha, ankokugai deno nariagari wo mezasi, hurentii no yuukai wo ki teta ageku ni syasatu sareru.
daikyoukou niyoru hukeiki no zidai gakitemo, kottonkurabu ha aikawarazu no nigiwa idatta. toppudansaa tonatta sandoman ha, butai de karei na tappu wo hun deiru. onazi goro, gyangu dousi no kousou kara datti ga syasatu sareta. dikisii ha, aizin kankei kara kaihou sareta bera to tomoni hariuddo heto tabidatu ta.
kyasuto
dikisiidowaiyaa dikisiidowaiyaa
en rityaadogia rityaadogia
korunetto sousya de zyazupianisuto no seinen. datti no inoti wo sukutu takotode me wokakerareru.
bikkusubaidaabekku nen nen wo motiihu nisita kyarakutaa.
sandoman derubaato uiriamuzu uiriamuzu
en guregoriihainzu guregoriihainzu
kottonkurabu no oodisyon ni uka tta tappudansaa. raira ni hitomebore suru.
berasisero berasisero
en daianrein daianrein
kasyu. mada dai daga otona bita yousi wo buki ni zibun no mise wo motu kotowo mezasi teiru.

titioya ga kokuzin de hahaoya ga hakuzin no kasyu. hada ga siroi node hakuzin nimo mie ru.

kottonkurabu no keieisya de ankokugai no don. airurando kei.

kyoubou na seikaku no gyangu no bosu. honmyou aasaahuregenhaimaa. yudaya kei.
vinsudowaiyaa vinsudowaiyaa
en nikorasukeizi nikorasukeizi
dikisii no otouto. nariagari sikou ga tuyoku, dikisii ga datti no inoti wo sukutu takotowokikkakeni datti no youzinbou ninaru.
maddodoggukooru nen nen wo motiihu nisita kyarakutaa.
