gaibu rinku
kousiki kokusai amerikanhuttobooru renmei eigo
koueki syadanhouzin nippon amerikanhuttobooru kyoukai nihongo riigu nasyonaruhuttobooruriigu nihongo
riigu nihongo nyuumon amerikanhuttobooru no ruuru nihongo sono hoka amerikanhuttobooru kotobankunamitisuikoumori nami ti kyuu koumori, ha, tisuikoumori ka herakoumori ka ni hukume te, tisuikoumori aka tosuru setu moari tisuikoumori zoku ni bunrui sareru koumori. honsyu nomide tisuikoumori zoku wo keisei suru.
tisuikoumori zoku ha tisuikoumori ka no mosiki zoku. zokuni kyuuketu koumori tomo yoba reru.
bunpu
aruzentin hokubu, ekuadoru, erusarubadoru, gaiana, kosutarika, koronbia, surinamu, tiri hokubu, nikaragua, panama, paraguai, buraziru, huransu huturyou giana , benezuera, beriizu, peruu, boribia, mekisiko mekisiko
keitai
taityou . taizyuu . haimen no taimou ha kassyoku, hukumen no taimou ha siroi.
hana ha ookiku sori agari, emono ga dasu sekigaisen netu wo kanti siteiruto kangae rareteiru. koreniyori emono wo sagasi, mata emono ni tori tui taato, hihu sitano atatakai ti no nagare ru kekkan wo saguru. siretu ha monsi ga uwaago hon, sitaago hon, kensi ga zyouge hon zutu, syoukyuusi ga uwaago hon, sitaago hon, dai kyuusi ga uwaago hon, sitaago hon no kei hon no hawo motu. uwaago no monsi ya kensi ha kamisori zyou de, emono no hihu wo kiri saku noni tekisi teiru. mata kireazi ga surudoi kotoya, nete iru tokini kama rerukotoga ooi tame kama reta emono ga itami wo kanzi rukotoha sukunai. sosite inu noyouni kizuguti wo name te nagare te oti tekita ti wo nomu. sarani daeki niha ketueki no gyouko sayou wo samatage ru bussitu ga hukuma reteirutame, emono no ketueki ga katama razu sessyu wo tuzuke rukotogadekiru.
oyayubi ha nagaku, atoasi mo tikarazuyoi. sonotame, koumori tositeha reigaiteki ni hokou ga tokui deari, emono ni sekkinsu ru toki ya ti wo sutu taatonadoha tizyou wo idou surukotoga ooi.
seitai
sinrin ni seisoku suru. yakousei de, hiruma ha horaana ya ki hora no naka de syoukibo na syuudan debura saga ri nemuru. syakaisei ga hattatu siteori, tuuzyou hiki, toki tosite , hiki nimo oyobu daikibo na mure wo keisei surukotomoaru.
syokusei ha doubutu syoku de, tyourui ya honyuurui, omoni katiku usi, uma, buta nado no ketueki wo suu. koumori mede ha honsyu nomiga honyuurui no ketueki mo sessyu suru. nemutu teiru emono no tikaku de tyakuti noti arui te sinobi yori, surudoi ha de emono no taimou ganai bubun ni kami tuitaato, kizuguti ni sita wo kousoku de dasiire site ketueki wo sessyu suru. hun hodono mani, zibun no taizyuu no mono ketueki wo sessyu surukotogadekiru. honsyu ha kogata notame ketueki wo sessyu sitaatoha ketueki no zyuuryou ya syouka notameni hikou surukotogadekinakunari, zimen wo tobi hane ruyounisite idou suru. sono noti, suibun wo tairyou ni sessyu si haisetu wo okonau. hun ha ketueki nomiwo sessyu surutameka kuroku nentyaku situ de kusai.
mata, onazi negurani ketueki wo sessyu dekinakatta kotai gairu baai, hokano kotai ga kutiutusi de ketueki wo wake atae ru.
yasei deno zyumyou ha yaku nen. hansyoku keitai ha taisei de, do ni atama no youzyuu wo nen kai syussan suru.
ritakoudou
kigazyoutai no nakama ni taisi te ti wo wake atae ru rita koui no syuusei womotukotode sira reru. kako ni guruumingu wositakotonoaru naka no yoi kotaikan nadodemareni kakuninsa reteiru. mata, bekko karada no kodomo ni titi wo wake atae ru gensyou mo kakuninsa reteori, syuzoku niokeru syakaisei no takasa ni kenkyuu no syouten ga atuma tteiru.
ningen tono kankei
kyuuketuki toyoku kanrenzuke rare, eimei mo daga, ippanteki ni sira reru kyuuketuki densyou ha higasi yooroppa yurai ni taisi, honsyu ha nanboku amerika tairiku ni bunpu suru.
kyuuketuki dorakyura demo, gensakusyousetu nakani ha dorakyura hakusyaku ga koumori ni hensin dekiru setumei to, yasei doubutu tositeno kyuuketu koumori nituiteno setumei haaruga, hakusyaku zisin ga koumori keitai de nin wo osou byousya setumei hanaku, kousya ha amerika no panpasu ni seisoku si, uma ya usi wo osoi suizyaku saseru kyuuketuki vu a npaia to yoba reru ookii koumori ya taiseiyou syo sima de hiruma ha ki nibura saga tteiruga, yoru ninaruto katudou wo hazime te kanpan de nete iru senin nadowo osoi korosu kotomoaru kyodai na koumori. to itta akumadesouiu ikimono moirutoiu setumei ninatteiru.
honsyu ha ningen no ketueki mo suu kotogaaruga, gaikai kara syadan sareta zinka ni sinnyuu surukotoha konnan dearukotonadokara, nin wo osou kotohamaredearu. emono wo sini itara simeruhodono tairyou no ketueki wo suu wakedehanaiga, katiku wo hukusuu hiki de osotu te suizyaku saserukotoni kuwae, kami kizu kara kyoukenbyou nadono uirusu ya densenbyou wo baikai surukotomoarutame, gaizyuu tosareru.

nasyonaru ziogurafikku mitaeki samuzyon ekiha, daikanminkoku souru tokubetu itimatu ha ku mita hora niaru souru tikatetu gousen no eki. eki bangou ha .

kyakutyuu
kanrenkoumoku
kankoku no tetudoueki itiran miura masaki miura masaki, nen gatu niti ha, kanagawakensyussin no sakkaa sensyu, sakkaa sidousya.
syounenzidai ni kanagawaken yokohamasi niaru tiiki sakkaakurabu. de sakkaa to deau.
sono noti tosi made puree si, yokohama marinosu no zyuniayuusutiimu ni iseki.
sarani seisa kokusai gakuen koutoubu syounan kou supootuakademiikoosu no sakkaa senkou wo hete, riigu yokohama de ganzitu hondai omote no miura kazuyosi ya yamaguti motohiro ya siro syouzi to puree sitaga, zankoku nimo kareha nen de kaiko tuukoku sareru.
sono noti, kaigai deno tyousen wo mezasi doitu he watatu ta.
doitu no zaaruranto syuu no raimusubahha de suukagetu puree sita noti, rain kawa to moozeru kawa ga gouryuu suru rainranto puhu a rutu syuu no ni iseki sita.
de zaisekityuu pokaaru ni huru syutuzyou si, touzi doitu daihyou maruseruyansen ya oribaanoibiru, amerika daihyou keesiikeraa nadoga zaisekisu ru, bundesuriigu bu no borusiamenhienguraatobahha to taisen.
siaigo ni yuppuhainkesu kantoku kara nyuudan tesuto no ohu aawomorattaga, siizun nakano siai de youtui yoko tokki kossetu niyori ka tukiteido no ansei wo siira reta.
sono kan nyuudan tesuto no ohu aaga kaisyou.
sono noti, genzai bundesuriigu no kantoku tosite katuyaku suru syutehu a nkureemaa to kazu siizun wotomonisitanoti intai.
intaigo kare ga syounenzidai ni syozoku siteita. no sidousya tosite youzi kara tyuugakusei madewo sidou siteiru.
kyakutyuu hatiman yawataha, tibaken kimitu si no timei. tyou ban wo mota nai tandoku tyoumei de, yuubinbangou ha .
tiri
sinai hokusei bu no koito kawasimo ryuu sagan ni iti suru. zinai ha dourozoi iniwazukani syuuraku ga sonzai suruhokaha suiden ga hiroga tteiru.
kita de moku si, higasi de soto minowa tuneyo, minami de sugitani, minami kara nisi nikakete zyougen tosorezore sessu ruizuremo kimitu si .
kasen
koito kawa kawa
rekisi
enkaku
edozidai syusu gun hatiman mura seiritu. iino han to hatamoto aoki si no aikyuu.
nen meizi nen hatiman mura, tibaken ni syozoku.
nen meizi nen gatu niti tyouson sei sikou niyori syusu gun zyougen mura daime ooaza hatiman tonaru.
nen meizi nen gatu niti zyougen mura, gun tougou niyori kimitugun syozoku tonaru.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti zyougen mura to kimitu mati syodai syuunan mura ga gappei si kimitugun kimitu mati daime ga seiritu, doutyou no ooaza tonaru.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti kimitu mati ga siseisikou si, kimitu si tonaru.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti moku si tono mani kimitu sinbasi ga kaituu.
setaisuu to zinkou
nen heisei nen gatu niti genzai no setaisuu to zinkou ha ikano touri dearu.
syou tyuugakkou no gakku
siritu syou tyuugakkou ni kayou baai, gakku ha ikano touri tonaru.
koutuu
zinai wo touru tetudou rosen hanai. moyorieki ha utibousen kimitu eki.
basu
kimitu si komyuniteibasu komyuniteibasu
koito kawa zyunkansen kimitu guraundogoruhu ba tuneyo tyoume sin midou iriguti kimitu eki minamiguti kimitu siyakusyo kimitu basutaaminaru tuneyo tyoume kimitu guraundogoruhu ba zyunkan ruuto
sisetu
kimitu sinbasi sinbasi
medikeaa kimitu kimitu
hatiman kouminkan kouritusyougakkou no gakku ha zeniki de kimitu siritu zyougen syougakkou, kouritutyuugakkou ha kimitu siritu kimitu tyuugakkou.

kyakutyuu
syutten otiai tomoyuki otiai tomoyuki, nen gatu niti ha, koberuko koube suteiiraazu ni syozoku suru ragubii sensyu.
purofiiru
niigataken gosen si syussin.
pozisyon ha uingu .
sintyou , taizyuu

raireki
koukou nensei kara ragubii wo hazime ta.
nen, hokuetu koukousotugyougo, ryuutuu keizai daigaku ni iru.
nen, ryuutuu keizai daigakusotugyou noti, koubeseikou koberukosuteiiraazu gen koberuko koubeseikou suteiiraazu ni kanyuu.
nen gatu niti ni okonawa reta zyapanragubiitoppuriigu sougouzyuni kettei toonamento dai husi no rikooburakkuramuzu sen ni senpatu syutuzyou de kousikisenhatu syutuzyou wo hata su.

kanrenkoumoku
niigataken syussin no zinbutu itiran itiran
hokuetu koutougakkou koutougakkou
ryuutuu keizai daigaku ragubii bu bu
koberuko koube suteiiraazu suteiiraazu
gaibu rinku
koberuko koube suteiiraazu sensyu purofiiru yosimotokougyou kabusikigaisya yosimotokougyou, ei . , . ha, oosakasi tyuuouku toukyoutosinzyukuku ni honbu touki ueno honten ha oosaka wo oku yosimotokougyou guruupu no geinou purodakusyonpuromootaaterebi bangumi seisaku purodakusyon dearu. kyuusyamei ha kabusikigaisya yosimoto kurieiteibueeziensii.
enkaku gaiyou
nen gatu niti ni kyuu yosimotokougyou kabusikigaisya gen yosimotokougyou hoorudingusu kabusikigaisya ga motikabukai sya sei ni ikou sitanoni tomonai, dousya no seisaku eigyou toukatu honbu ga kakawa tteita tarentomanezimento to seisaku eigyou toukatubu mon ga bunsyaka si, yosimotokougyou hoorudingusu no syussi no zigyou kogaisya tosite kabusikigaisya yosimoto kurieiteibueeziensii ga seturitu sareta.
kono kaisya no seturitu ni tomonai, nen gatu hizuke de douzitu ziten zaiseki no kyuu yosimotokougyou syozoku tarento zenin yaku hitoizyou ga kabusikigaisya yosimoto kurieiteibueeziensii he keisyou ikan tonatta.
kyuu yosimotokougyou no motikabukai sya sei heno ikou ni tomonau dousya no seturitu noti mo, terebi bangumi no seisaku kurezitto ha yosimotokougyou nomamatonatteoritadasi, sutafhu kozin no syozoku tositeno meigi ha betu. mata, adore na garejzi terebi asahi no seisaku kyouryoku kurezitto nimo tousya mei no hyouki ga mira reta, tarento no syozokuzimusyo meigi nioitemo douyou no keesu ga mira reru hama tyanto yomiuri terebi no nyuu hossyan. kikaku suberi gei ziman koonaa no youni dousya no meigi ga mira reru baai moatta.
kyuu yosimotokougyou zidai kara, nenizyou niwatari, huruku ha syodai katura harudanzi, yokoyama entatu karyou atyako, yanagiya kingorou, simada sinsuke matumoto ryuusuke hitosika ra, genzai no nisikawakiyosi, akasiya sanma, dauntaun, marumusi syouten, imada kouzi, higasino kouzi, tukitei housei, nainteinain, , hakata hana maru daikiti, kokoriko, takaandotosi, huttobooruawaa, tidori, , kamaitati, tyokoreetopuranetto, mirukubooi, nyuuyooku, simohuri myouzyou nado ni itaru made, touzainanboku no ooku ni tyouninki geinin nado ga syozoku suru. mata supootu sensyu, haiyuu, bunkazin nado no maneezimento zigyou mo itte iru.
nen gatu niti, kabusikigaisya yosimoto aaruandosii wo kyuusyuugappei.
nen gatu niti, oyagaisya no yosimotokougyou kabusikigaisya ga yosimotokougyou hoorudingusu kabusikigaisya ni syameihenkou sitanoni tomonai, kabusikigaisya yosimoto kurieiteibueeziensii kara yosimotokougyou kabusikigaisya ni syameihenkou.
nen gatu niti, zyuugyouin ni karousi rain wo koe ru zangyou wosaseteitatosite rouki syo kara zesei kankoku wo uke ta. mata, syozoku tarento ga hurikome sagi guruupu no enkai ni kinsen wo uketotu te sanka siteita yami eigyou mondai ga houzi rareru katei de, syozoku tarento tono gyara haibun no hukouhei saya seisiki na syozoku keiyakusyo wo maziwa siteinaikotonadoga siteki sareta. geinoukai niokeru roudou mondai nadono syoutyou zirei tosite burakku kigyou taisyou ni nomineeto sareta.
syozoku tarento
nao, nen gatu niti ikou ni syozoku siteiru tarento ha, yosimotokougyou no motikabukai sya sei heno ikou ni tomonai, manezimento seisaku eigyou toukatubu mon ga bunsyaka site seturitu sareta, dousya no syozoku tonatteirutame, notu teinai tarento gairu.
honbu zigyousyo
honten oosaka honbu kigou oosakasi tyuuouku nanba sennitimae
toukyou honbu kigou toukyoutosinzyukuku sinzyuku tyoume

sizuoka zimusyo sizuokaken numazusi nen gatu kaisetu.
hirosima zimusyo hirosima sityuu ku

okinawa zimusyo naha si

yosimotokougyou kabusikigaisya kabusikigaisya
yosimotokougyou
yosimotokougyou .
yosimotokougyou tyanneru sannan mura yamaminamimuraha, koutiken kami gun niatta mura. genzai no kounan si kagami mati zyoubun kagami mati sita hun niataru.
tiri
kasen kaori syuu kawa, sannan kawa kawa
rekisi
nen meizi nen gatu niti tyouson sei no sikou niyori, kinsei irai no sannan mura dai tugi ga tandoku de zititai wo keisei. ooaza ha hensei sezu.
nen meizi nen kara nen meizi nen no mani ooaza zyoubun sita hun wo setti.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti toku ouzi mura tomiie mura kaori munemura to gappei site dainin mura ga hossoku. douzitu sannan mura dai tugi haisi.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti dainin mura ga bunkatu si, itibu zyoubun sita hun no kuiki womotte sannan mura dai tugi ga hossoku.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti kisimoto mati toku ouzi mura sanpoku mura oyobi higasikawa mura no itibu huku hou yamakawa hituzi en matu kiyosi masanobu betuyaku bu kawa nisikawa mura no itibu maekawa oyobi kuti nisikawa nakanisi kawa okunisi kawa no kaku itibu to gappei site kagami mati ga hossoku. douzitu sannan mura dai tugi haisi.
sankoubunken
kadokawa nippon timei daiziten koutiken koutiken
kanrenkoumoku
koutiken no haisi sityouson itiran takiura sizuo takiura sizuo, nen gatu niti nen gatu niti ha, nippon no tetugakusya. touhokudaigaku meiyokyouzyu.
zinbutu
iwateken syussin. touhokudaigakubungakubu tetugakuka sotugyou.
iwatedaigaku zyokyouzyu, nen touhokudaigaku kyouzyu. nen teinentaikan, meiyokyouzyu. iwateken ritudai gaku morioka tankidaigakubu gakutyou.
tosiaki, zuihou naka zyusyou zyukun.
huransu oyobi igirisu no tetugaku wo kenkyuu, meruro meruropontei no honyaku wo ooku itta.
nen gatu niti, igan notame sendaisi no byouin de sikyo. tosi botu.
tyosyo
souzou no gensyougaku nen kinokuniya sinsyo
zikan sono tetugakuteki kousatu nen iwanamisinsyo iwanamisinsyo
gengo to sintai nen iwanami gendai sensyo
uitogensyutain iwanamisyoten seiki sisouka bunko
tetugaku no saikoutiku hen nansou sya nen nen
metahu aano gensyougaku sekai syoin nen nen
zibun to tanin wodoumiruka atarasii tetugaku nyuumon nipponhousou syuppan kyoukai bukkusu
doutoku no keiken kanto karano ririku nansou sya nen nen
honyaku
meruro pontei koudou no kouzou kida moto kyouyaku misuzu syobou nen nen
meruro pontei me to seisin kida moto kyouyaku misuzu syobou nen nen
barouzudanhamu eiyuu to itan han kenryoku no sisou si dai kimura tuyosi, myoutin syouzi wake misuzu syobou nen nen nen
meruro pontei bensyouhou no bouken misuzu syobou nen nen
aranrityaadoson sinzou kizawa tei kyouyaku kinokuniyasyoten nen nen
remi. kuwanto meruroo pontei no gensyougaku teki tetugaku takemoto sadayuki, hakoisi kyou gyou kyouyaku kokubun sya nen nen
meruro pontei sekai no sanbun kida moto kyouyaku misuzu syobou nen gatu gatu
. . edi kotobato imi gengo no gensyougaku nen iwanami gendai sensyo
. meruro pontei sinsin no gouitu maaruburansyu to biran to beruguson niokeru nakamura humio, sunahara youiti kyouyaku asahisyuppansya nen notitikuma gakugeibunko gakugeibunko
meruro pontei imi to muimi misuzu syobou nen nen
herumuutopuresunaa warai to naki no ningen gaku kinokuniyasyoten nen nen
meruro pontei mie rumonoto mie naimono kida moto kyouyaku misuzu syobou nen gatu gatu
poorurikuuru isi tekina monoto hi isi tekina mono zen kan kinokuniyasyoten nen nen nen
meruro pontei ningen no kagaku to gensyougaku kida moto, takeuti yosirou kyouyaku misuzu syobou nen nen
meruro pontei tetugakusya tosono kage kida moto kyouyaku misuzu syobou nen meruro ponteikorekusyon
meruro pontei youzi no taizinkankei kida moto kyouyaku misuzu syobou nen meruro ponteikorekusyon
meruro pontei gengo no gensyougaku kida moto, takeuti yosirou kyouyaku misuzu syobou nen meruro ponteikorekusyon
sankou
takiura sizuo sensei ryakureki kenkyuu reki takiura sizuo sensei o taikankinen gou sisaku nen nen
kyakutyuu isite isiteha, ehimeken matuyamasi no timei dearu. isite ittyoume kara isite go tyoume madega setti sareteiru.
nen gatu niti genzai no zinkou ha , nin, setaisuu ha , setai. yuubinbangou ha, .
tiri
ehimeken matuyamasi toubu ni iti suru. mati no minamigawa niha isite kawa ga nagare ru.
mizobe mati, zyoukou teramati, dougo himezuka, kamiiti, kouyou mati, tarumi, higasino, sin isite to sessi teiru.
rekisi
kouku
siritu no syou tyuugakkou ni kayou baai, matuyamasi tatemiti noti syougakkou, matuyamasi tatemiti noti tyuugakkou no gakku tonaru.
koutuu
kokudou gou, ehimeken miti gou matuyama toubu kanzyousen, ehimeken miti gou roku ken ya isite sen ga hasiru.
kousaten henro kyouhoku kousaten kousaten
sisetu
tera isite tera sikoku yasohati kasyo no daigo zyuuiti ban hudasyo
gakkou matuyamasi tatemiti noti syougakkou syougakkou
syougyou sisetu ihui isite honten, hu a miriimaato matuyama isite mise, hu a miriimaato matuyama isite tyoume mise, sebunsutaa isite mise, tokiwa gaarando gaarando
kyakutyuu
kanrenkoumoku
ehimeken ehimeken
matuyamasi bappudoroppuderakkusu gendai ha, amerika gassyuukoku no myuuzisyan, raikuudaa ga nen ni happyou sita, soro meigi deha sakume no sutazioarubamu.
haikei
mezyaareeberu kara hatubai sareta poppurekoodo tositeha hazimete, dezitarurekoodingu niyori seisaku sareta sakuhin tosite sira re, sei no torakkurekoodaa ga siyousa reta. ongakuteki niha souru wo beesu tositeori, ritorusisutaa ha eruvisupuresurii no kasyou de sira reru kyoku no kavu aade, waakuautohu a in ha aiku teinataanaa no kyoku no insutourumentaruarenzi dearu.
teimudoramondo to zimukerutonaa ga rizumusekusyon wo tutome, mata, deviddorindoree ga aikyantouin wo nozoku zenkyoku ni sanka sita. dauninhariuddo to dontoyuumesuappuaguddosingu niha, tyakakaan ga bookaru de sanka siteiru.
hankyou hyouka
amerika no deha kurai ni tassi, zisin hatu no zenbei toppu iri wo hata sita. mata, kuudaa ha honsaku de zisin hatu no zenei arubamutyaato iri wo hata si, syuu toppu iri site saikou kurai wo kiroku sita.
nyuuziirando no arubamutyaato deha syuu renzoku de toppu iri si, uti goukei syuu toppu iri site, nen gatu hizuke no tyaato nioite saikou kurai wo kiroku suru daihitto tonatta. mata, honsaku karano singuru ritorusisutaa ha, nyuuziirando no singurutyaato de kurai wo kakutoku siteiru.
ha oorumyuuzikku nioite ten manten naka ten wo tuke, rokuon ni kansi te kakkyoku no usui oto ga ensou wo dainasi nisiteori, kuudaa ha dezitarurekoodingu ga genin to syutyou siteiruto hihan suru ippou, zentaiteki na naiyou ni kansi teha kuudaa no idai na kyoku wo erabu sensu hamotiron, taito na pafoomansu, migoto na gitaawaaku, tyakakaan wo hukumu suumei no masare ta gesutobookarisuto toiu imi demo kati gaaruto hyousi teiru.

gureggupuresutopiino bakkuguraundobookaru
zyoozimakuhu aa den bakkuguraundobookaru
kyakutyuu syutten mino siritu geboku syougakkou minosiritu simomakisyougakkouha, katute gihuken mino si ni sonzai sita kouritusyougakkou.
gaiyou
kouku hano nagase, kami hora, hen ti, warabi nama deari, kyuu mugi gun geboku mura no tiiki ni, hobo gaitou suru.
geboku tiku no tuno syougakkou nagase syougakkou kami hora syougakkou hen ti syougakkou warabi nama syougakkou wo tougou si, sinsetu sareta syougakkou daga, nen, kanmaki syougakkou to tougou si makiya syougakkou wo sinsetu niyoriwazuka nen de haikou tonatta.
kousya ha kyuu nagase syougakkou no kousya wo siyousi teita. nenzi ten de kousya ha nagase syougaigakusyuu sentaa oyobi geboku hoikuen ni siyousa reteiru.
enkaku
nen heisei nen gatu niti geboku tiku no tuno syougakkou nagase syougakkou, kami hora syougakkou, hen ti syougakkou, warabi nama syougakkou wo tougou si, mino siritu geboku syougakkou tosite kaikou. kouti kousya ha kyuu nagase syougakkou wo siyousu ru.
nen heisei nen
gatu niti heikou siki siki
gatu niti haikou.
kyakutyuu
kanrenkoumoku
gihuken syougakkou no haikou itiran itiran
gaibu rinku
mino siritu geboku syougakkou kyuu hoomupeezi kokusaihyouzyun kikaku ha, arabia mozi wo raten mozi he honzi suru taikei dearu. nen ni tosite tuika ga okonawa reta.
ika ha arabia go no siin wo simesu.
ha, kansoka sareta arabia mozi wo raten mozi ni honzi surutamenoniyoru teigi dearu.
omoni raiburarikontekisuto tosite siyousa reta honzi taikei dearuga, raiburarikatarogu no ikkansei ni hukaketu na sakuin no kinou ni taisyo siteinakatta tame, wo kaisei si saiyou saretamonodearu.
ha, arabia mozi wo raten mozi ni honzi suru syoki no taikei dearu.
kanrenkoumoku
arabia go no raten mozi tensya eigoban
kokusaihyouzyun ka kikou ga sadame ru rooma zihyouzi kokusaikikaku itiran itiran
kyakutyuu
gaibu rinku
, . . . yukawa yasu tosi yukawayasutosi, nen gatu niti nen gatu niti ha, nippon no gengogaku ahurika gogaku mono, toukyoudaigaku meiyokyouzyu. bantou go ga senmon.
wakayamaken umare. nen toukyoudaigaku bungakubu gengogaku ka sotu, nen doudaigaku in syuusikatei syuuryou, toukyou gaikokugo daigaku kenkyuusyo zyosyu, zyokyouzyu, nen toudaibungakubu zyokyouzyu, nen kyouzyu, nen teinentaikan, meiyokyouzyu, kumamotodaigaku kyouzyu, nen taisyoku.
nen toukyoudaigaku hakase bungaku ronbun no dai ha bantou syogo dousi akusento no kenkyuu .
tyosyo
gengogaku no kihon mondai taisyuukansyoten,
bantou syogo dousi akusento no kenkyuu hituzi syobou,
gengogaku hituzi syobou,
bantou syogo bunki si no kenkyuu hituzi syobou,
kyoutyo
gengogaku ooe takao kyoutyo. housou daigaku,
honyaku
gengo syakaigaku nyuumon zyosyua. fisyuman taisyuukansyoten,
kinenronbunsyuu
gengoken kyuu no syatei yukawa yasu tosi sensei kinen ronsyuu katou zyuu kou, yosida hiromi hen. hituzi syobou,
sankou
kaken deetabeesu
kyakutyuu temuzutonneru ha, rondon no temuzu kawa katei ni, rozaahaizu to wappingu wo musun de kensetu sareta suitei tonneru dearu. haba fiito yaku meetoru , takasa fiito yaku meetoru no danmen de, zentyou ha , fiito yaku meetoru ari, mantyou tokino kawa no suimen no sita fiito yaku meetoru notokorowo tootte iru. koukou kanouna kasen no sitani hazimete kensetu ni seikou sita tonneru dearutosare, tomasukokuran oyobi maakuizamubaadoburuneru ga aratani hatumei sita siirudo kouhou no gizyutu wo tukatte, buruneru tosono musuko no izamubaadokingudamuburuneru ga nen kara nen madekakete kensetu sita.
kono tonneru hamotomoto, basya wo tousu tameni sekkei sareteitaga, zissaini basya ga touru kotohanakatta. genzai deha rondonoobaaguraundo no tetudou ga tootte iru.
rekisi to hatten
kensetu
seiki syotou no zitende, temuzu kawa no ryougan de hattatu situtuatta dokku wo musubi tukerutameni, hokugan to nangan no kan wo musubu arata na koutuusyudan no zyuyou ga takama tteita. gizyutusya no raruhudoddo ga nen ni, gureibuzuendo to teiruberii wo musubu tonneru no kensetu ni torikunda ga, sippai siteita.
nen kara nen nikakete, rityaadotorebisikku wo hukumu koonuooru nin no kouzan hori no hitobito ga, yori zyouryuu no rozaahaizu to wappingu raimuhausu no kan de tonneru wo horu kotoni tyou ndaga, tisitu ga waruka ttatameni sippai sita. karera ha katai iwa wo kussaku suru syuhou wo motiita ga, yawarakai nendo ya kuikkusando no tisitu ni taisi temo horu houhou wo kae nakatta. kono temuzuaatiuei puroziekuto ha, zentai no , fiito yaku meetoru naka , fiito yaku meetoru notokoromade sensin dou kou wo hotu ta zitende kai suibotu site tyuusi tonatta. kono tonneru no danmen ha, wazuka fiito fiito fiito yaku sentimeetoru sentimeetoru . meetoru sikanaku, ryokyaku ga tuukou surutameni motii ru, yori ooki na tonneru wo horu saino haisui miti tosite kensetu saretamonodeatta. temuzuaatiueipuroziekuto no sippai niyori, gizyutusya tatiha tonneru no kensetu ha higenzituteki dearuto kangae ruyouninatta.
sikasi, huransu kara igirisu ni kika sita maakuburuneru hakono kangae wo ukeire nakatta. nen niha kareha, rosia no arekusandoru yoni taisi te, sankutopeteruburuku no nevu a kawa no sita wokuguru suitei tonneru no kensetu wo teian siteiru. kono teian ha ukeire rarezu, kawari ni hasi ga kensetu sarerukotoninattaga, buruneru ha atarasii tonneru kouhou no aidea wo hatten sasetutuatta.
buruneru to toomasukokuran ha, nen gatu ni tonneru kouhou tositeha kakumeiteki na sinpo tonaru siirudo kouhou no gizyutu no tokkyo wo syutoku sita. nen ni buruneru ha, rozaahaizu to wappingu wo musubi kano siirudo kouhou wo tukatte kensetu suru tonneru keikaku wo sakusei sita. uerinton kou nado kozintousika karano syussi wo era re, nen ni temuzutonneru kaisya ga seturitu sare, nen gatu ni tyakkou sita.
saisyo no kouzi ha, nangan no rozaahaizu de, kawagisi kara fiito yaku meetoru hanare ta iti ni ooki na tatekou wo kensetu surukotodeatta. tyokkei fiito yaku meetoru no tessei no entou ga tizyou de kumitatera re, korewo motiite tatekou no kensetu ga okonawa reta. kono entou no ueni takasa fiito yaku meetoru , atusa fiito yaku sentimeetoru no renga no kabe ga tukura re, saranisono ueni ha kussaku tokini ponpu wo kudou suru kyouryoku na zyoukikikan ga sue tuke rareta. kono soutizentai no zyuuryou haoyoso , ton deatta. entou no kabu hahutiga togara sareteori, kono sitano dosya wo sagyouin ga tesagyou de torinozoi ta. koreniyori entou zentai ha zityou niyori, marude kyodai na katanuki kiga yawarakai dozyou wokurinukukanoyouni, sidai ni tityuu ni moguri kondeitta. tinka no totyuu de, doatu ga entou wokituku sime tuketekitatameni entou no tinka gaaru titen de toma ttesimattaga, tuika no , ko no renga noomoriga kuwae rarete tinka wo saikai sita. kousita mondai ha, entou no sokumen ga kanzen ni heikou ninatteirutameni oki tamonodato hanmei sitatame, notini wappingu gawa no tatekou wo kensetu sita saini ha, kabu ga zyoubu yori tyokkei ga hutoku naruyouni sekkei sareta. kono teepaa no tuke rareta sekkei niyori, totyuu de doatu ni tukama razuni tinka dekiruyouninatta. nen gatu ni rozaahaizu tatekou ha syotei no iti made kussaku sare, tonneru kouzi ni tyakusyu dekiru zyoutai tonatta.
siirudo ha, henriimoozurii no ramubesu niaru kouzyou de seisaku sare, rozaahaizu tatekou nioite kumitatera reta. siirudo ha buruneru ga temuzutonneru wo kensetu suruniatatte kagi tonaru gizyutu deatta. irasutoreitedorondonnyuusu dehasono dousa wo ikano youni setumeisi teiru.
siirudo ni torituke rareta ko no waku ha, sorezore ton izyou no omosa gaatta. siirudo kouhou no zyuuyouna kakusin ha, mada hukkou de oowa reteinai zenpou oyobi syuui no zimen wo siirudo ga sasae te houkai no kiken wo hera sukotoniatta. sikasi, zyoubu no kawa kara sintou sitekuru huketu na osui mazi rino mizu niyori taihen hueisei na kankyou tonari, buruneru zisin wo hukume ooku no sagyouin ga byouki ninatta. kono osui karaha metangasu ga hassei si, sagyouin ga tukau oiruranpu niyori hakka surukotogaatta. zyoutyuu gizyutusya no uiriamuaamusutorongu ga nen gatu ni yani taore ruto, maakuburuneru no musuko no izamubaadokingudamuburuneru ga tosi de ato wo tui da.
sagyou ha osoku, syuukan de fiito yaku meetoru sika susuma nakatta. tonneru karaikurakademo syuunyuu wo eru tameni, kaisya no zyuuyaku ha sagyoutyuu no siirudo wo kankoukyaku ga kengaku surunowo kyoka sita. kono kengaku de nin siringu wo tyousyuu si, niti oyoso nin ga kengaku sita.
kussaku ha kiken ni miti tamonodeatta. fiito yaku meetoru made kussaku sareta nen gatu niti ni tonneru ha totuzen mizu gaahure dasi ta. buruneru ha sensui kane wo booto kara huro site kawa no soko ni hirai ta ana wo ume youto kokoromi, tonneru no tenzyou ni tuuzi ru sakeme ni nendo iri no baggu wo tumekon da. kono syuuhuku wo oe, tonneru no haisui ga kanryou suruto, buruneru ha tonneru nai de bansan wo hirai ta.
nen
yokunen no nen gatu niti ni tonneru ha hutatabi mizu gaahure, nin ga sibou sita. buruneru hakono ziko dehakanarino kouun de ikinokotu ta. sibou sita nin ha, hizyouyou no dassyutu kuti ga heisatyuu dearukotowo sitte itatame, ooki na hukinuke kaidan notokoromade nige youtosita. buruneru hasousezuni heisatyuu no hizyouyou dassyutu kuti ni nige, sokode ooki na oto wo tate ta. biimissyu toiu namae no kukkyou na sagyouin gakono oto wo kii te, doa wo hakai site isiki wo utu ta buruneru wo hikiage, sosei saseta. kareha kenkou kaihuku notameni, burisutoru kinkou no burisurinton he okura reta. sokodeha kareha, kurihuton turibasi no kensetu kyousou no hanasi wo kii teiru.
zaimu mondai mo hassei si, gatu niha siirudo no tyokugo madeno kabe wo kanseisa seruto, nenkan ni watatu te houti sarerukotoninatta.
saikai
nen gatu ni buruneru ha ookurasyou kara kari uke ta , pondo wo hukume, kensetu zokkou ni zyuubun na hiyou wo tyoutatu surukotoni seikou sita.
nen gatu ni kouzi ga saikai sare, mazu huruku nari sabi tuiteita siirudo ga kaitai tekkyo sareta. nen gatu niha, kairyou sareyori omoku natta atarasii siirudo ga genba de kumitatera re, kussaku ga saikai sareta.
nen gatu niti, nen gatu niti, nen gatu niti, nen gatu niti to nando mo hassei sita sinsui ya metan, ryuuka suiso no more ya kasai nadoni samatage rarenagaramo, kouzisaikai kara nenhan notino nen gatu ni tonneru kouzi ga kanseisi ta. tonneru kouzi no okure to nando mo kurikaesa reta sinsui notameni, tonneru ha zyooku no taisyou tonatta.
nen kara nen nikakete tonneru niha syoumeisetubi no kouzi ga okonawa re, syadou ga seibi sare, rasen kaidan ga setti sareta. genzai ha buruneru hakubutukan tonatteiru rozaahaizu gawa no kikaisitu ga, tonneru no haisui notameno setubi wo syuuyou suru sisetu tosite kensetu sareta. saisyuuteki ni tonneru ha nen gatu niti ni kaituu sita.
hokousya muke no riyou
temuzutonneru ha, doboku kougaku ueno igyou dehaattaga, zaimu tekini ha seikou sinakatta. tonneru ha, tousyo no hiyou mitumori wo oohaba ni uwamawari, kussaku notameni , pondo, sono hokano setubi wo setti surutameni , pondo wo yousi ta. syaryou ga tonneru ni ire ruyouni iriguti wo kakutyou suru teian moattaga, hiyou mondai notameni miokura re, hokousya nomikono tonneru wo siyousi ta. tonneru ha kankoukyaku wo atume ruyouninari, touri nuke runoni nin penii wo tyousyuu sitaga, nen ni yaku bannin no hitobito ga otozure ruyouninatta. sosite ninki noaru uta no teema nimonatta. amerika no ryokousya no uiriamuarendoruu ha, rondon ni itta monoha daremo ga tonneru he iku to komento si, mata sekai banme no husigi dearuto hyougen sita. karezisin ga nen nikono tonneru wo mita toki, ikurakagakkarisitato hyoumei siteirumonono, sikasisono naibu wo koutuu no doumyaku tositeyori tika no syoutengai dearukanoyouni ikiiki tosita byousya wo itte iru.
doruu haosoraku, tonneru nituite kandai na mikata wositeiruga, yagate tonneru ha syouhu ya, aati ni hison de tuuka suru nin wo osou tonneru touzoku toitta nin tatinotamari ba tominasareruyouninatteitta. amerika no sakka, nasanieruhoosoon ha doruu no suunengo ni otozure ta saino tonneru nituitekanari hiteiteki na mikata wo nen no hon de kai teiru.
tetudou tonneru tositeno riyou
tonneru kensetu ni tousi sita nin nitotte akiraka ni kyuusai tonattanoga, nen gatu ni tonneru ga iisutorondon tetudou ni baisyuu saretakotodeatta. kono kaisya ha wappingu saraniha notini ribapuurusutoriito eki to sausurondon sen no kan de ryokyaku to kamotu wo yusou suru tetudou renraku wo okonau tamenikono tonneru wo tukao uto kangae ta tuno honsen tetudougaisya no konsoosiamu deatta. tousyo no sekkei deha basya wo tousu tameni kangae rareteitakotokara youisa reteita yoyuu noaru tonneru danmen no takasa ha, tetudou no syaryou wo tousu tamenimo zyuubun na syaryougenkai wo zitugen dekita. tonneru wo touru saisyo no ressya ha nen gatu niti ni unten sareta. nen niha, hokugan no tukawa renakunatta kensetuyou tatekou ga wappingu eki tonatta.
iisutorondon tetudou ha notini rondonoobaaguraundo ni kyuusyuu sare, sono iisutorondon sen tonatta. nen madeha kamotuyusou wo itte ita. tikatetu tosite unkou sareteita touzi, temuzutonneru ha tikatetu no kouzoubutu no naka deha saiko nomonodeatta.
iisutorondon sen to zyubirii sen entyoukukan no kan de kanadauootaa eki de kousa wo kensetu surukotoga keikaku sareta. konotameniha iisutorondon sen wo itizikyuusi surukotoga hituyou deattatame, kono kikai ni tonneru no tyouki hosyuu wo okonau kotoninatta. nen ni iisutorondon sen ha kensetu hosyuu kouzi notameni kyuusi tonatta. teian sareta tonneru hosyuu kouhou ha, rousui wo husegu tameni huki tuke konkuriito wo zissi surumonode, koreniyori tousyo no tonneru no gaikan wo kanzen ni sokona ukotokara, dekirudake sagyou wo anka ni subayaku kanryou sasetai toukyoku to, tonneru no gaikan wo hozon surukotowo nozomu kentikubutu ni kansin noaru nin tatino kan de ikamesii giron wo maki oko sita. rondon tikatetu ga tyouki hosyuu wo kaisi suru yotei tositeita nen gatu niti ni, tonneru ga dai kyuu touroku kenzoubutu ni kisaisa retakotode hozon wo nozomu nin tatiga syouri wo osame ta.
tonneru no ittan no tankukan ha hosyuu kouzi wo okonawa naimamatosi, mata nokori no kukan nituitemoyori hairyo sita hosyuu kouzi wo okonau kotode goui ganasare, hosyuu kouzi ha zissi sarete, tousyoyotei siteitayorimokanari okure te nen ni siyou ga saikai sareta. iisutorondon sen entyoukouzi notameni nen gatu niti kara saido unten ga kyuusi sare, senro no husetu sagyou to singou no kairyou sagyou ga okonawa reta. kono entyoukouzi niyori tonneru ha rondonoobaaguraundo no itibu tonatta. nen gatu niti ni unten ga saikai saretanotiha, hutatabi honsen no ressya ga hasiru youninatteiru.
eikyou
temuzutonneru no kensetu niyori, soremade ooku no gizyutusya ga kaigiteki deattanoni hansi te, suitei tonneru no kensetu ha zissaini kanou dearukotoga simesa reta. koreni tuzuku suuzyuunen mano mani, igirisu dehaikutumono suitei tonneru ga kensetu sareta. rondon no tawaa tikadou, sevu aa n kawa no sita wokuguru sevu aa ntonneru, maazii kawa no sita wokuguru maazii tetudou tonneru nadodearu. mata buruneru ga kaihatu sita siirudo kouhou ha notini sarani kairyou sare, zieemuzugureetoheddo ga gizyutu no hatten ni zyuuyouna yakuwari wo hata sita. temuzutonneru no rekisiteki na zyuuyousei ga kouryosa re, nen gatu niti ni dai kyuu touroku kenzoubutu ni touroku sareta. itiziteki ni kyuusi sareru mae ha rozaahaizu eki no purattohoomu he kudaru kaidan no ueni kinen no pureeto ga torituke rareteita. kono pureeto ha sagyoutyuu anzen notameni torihazusa reteitaga, tonneru no kabe ni saido torituke rareteori, eki no ryokyakuyou kaidan kara miru kotogadekiru.
houmon
rozaahaizu no tikaku ni, buruneru ga tousyo kensetu sita kikaisitu ga buruneru hakubutukan tosite koukai sareteiru. motomoto tonneru no haisui ponpu wo syuuyou surutameni tukura retamonode, genzai ha syuuhuku sareteiru. iisutorondon sen ga nen ni daikibo kaisyuukouzi notameni kyuusi tonarumadeha, hakubutukan ha tonneru wo ressya de touri nuke ru tuaa wo zissi siteita.
ima demo wappingu kara rozaahaizu he, sositemada modotu tekuru toho deno tonneru tuukou mo kanou dearu. sikasi, koreha rosen ga hosyuu kouzi notameni heisa sareteirutokininomi kanou dearutame, tokiori sika kikai ganakusikamo baatariteki dearu.
tatekou
nendai ni ressya no unkou ga kaisi saretatoki, tatekou ha kanki notameni siyousa reteita. kaidan ha kasai no kikensei wo hera sutameni tekkyo sareteita. nen ni, rosen kairyou kouzi notameni heisa sareteita mani konkuriito sei no kiso ga tatekou no soko hukin, senro yoriha ueni koutiku sareta. kono supeesu ha, zyoukikikansya kara hakidasa reta kokuen de kabe ga kuro zundeiruga, genzai ha semai iriguti to asiba wo touri nuke rukotode ire ruyouninatteori, konsaato no kaizyou tosite tukawa reteiru. mata tatekou no tyouzyouhukin niha okuzyou teien to baa ga kensetu sareteiru.
kyakutyuu
gaibu rinku
,
,
,
bensedora supein go , , ha, supein kaigun no korubetto. desukubieruta kyuu korubetto no ban kan. kanmei ha syourisya wo imi suru supein go ni yurai suru.
kan reki
bensedora ha, basanferoru zousenzyo de kenzou sare, nen gatu niti ni kikou, nen gatu niti ni sinsui, nen gatu niti ni syuueki si karutahena kiti no dai goei tai ni haibi sareru. sinsui notino nen gatu niha kenzou sagyoutyuu ni bakuhatu ziko ga hassei si roudousya mei ga sibou, mei ga husyou sita.
nen, wangan kiki ni tomonai kokusairengou syudou niyoru kinyu kansikatudou notame, hurigeeto bikutoria , korubetto inhu a ntaerena to tomoni perusya wan ni haken sareru.
nen, korubetto tositeha saigo tonaru garuhurekkusu ensyuu ni sanka sita.
nen gatu niti ni syoukai kan ni kansyu ga henkou sare, bangou mo ni henkou sareru. sono noti, kanariasu syo sima no rasuparumasudegurankanaria ni idou si, sousaku kyuunan katudou ya mayaku mituyu oyobi huhou imin taisaku ni zyuuzi siteiru.
nen gatu niti ni kokusairengou anzen hosyou rizikai ketugi to kokusairengou anzen hosyou rizikai ketugi ni motozu ku wakugumi de, rebanon deno hizubora muke heiki mituyu kansikatudou notame supein, huransu, itaria oyobi porutogaru de butai wo kousei si kokusairengou rebanon zantei tyuuryuu gun ni sanka surutame, karutahena kiti wo syukkou site inhu a ntakurisuteina to koutai si ninmu ni tuku.
nen gatu kara gatu made ataranta sakusen ni sanka surutame somaria oki aden wan ni tenkai siteiru. suesu unga wo koe teno katudou ha nen irai tonatteiru.
kyakutyuu
gaibu rinku
supein go kaigun kousiki peezi peezi
kanrenkoumoku
supein kaigun kaigun
supein kaigun kantei itiran mahiru gaku mahirudaketoha, akitaken senboku gun misato mati to iwateken waga gun nisiwaga mati tono kenzakai niaru yama dearu. mahiru yama tomo. mahiru santi no syuhou de, hyoukou ha dearu.
gaiyou
akitaken gawa no syuui ha maki mahiru kenritu sizenkouen ni sitei. nao, kenzakai womatagu mahiru gaku rindou minegosi renraku rindou ga hukin wo touru ga, mihosou katu taihen semai.
huruku kara sinkou no taisyou tosite mahiru yamadai gongen sya miwa zinzya ga mouke rare, tyuusei niha syuuhen no onodera si ya hondou si no uzigami tomonatteita.
sanmei ha densetu no sakanouetamuramaro ga tousei no ori, hirugoro ni santyou nituitakaratosareteiru. santyou no miwa zinzya hasono toki syougun ga konryuu sitamonotoiu. edozidai no kiroku niha humoto ni isi no torii gaaru. miwa zinzya gaaru. daidou nen ni tamuramaro ga kaiki sita. sairei ha gatu no gatu tomo niti dearu. kono yama niha kaii no hanasi ga nokosa reteiru.
tozanguti ha akita gawa ni akakura kuti to utou kuti, iwate gawa ni sawauti kuti gaaru. mata, minegosi minekosi rindou no akita, iwateken sakai karano tozan ga mottomo youini noboru kotogadekiru.
minegosi rindou karaha, kita no mata gaku kitanomatadaketo oto dou gaku ondoudakewo touri, yaku zikanhan teido de santyou ni toutyaku suru. syasin migi no yama ga oto dou gaku dearu.
tozandou ya santyou karaha, kita ni yuudai na waga sankai wo miru kotogadekiru. utukusii kesiki wo miru kotogadekirunogakono yama no tokutyou dearu. tada, santyou bubun ha sasa ga ooku kouyou ha kitai dekinai. sanpuku no kouyou ya sinryoku tono taihi ha utukusii.
minwa
senboku gun no higasi ni uma hiru mahiru yama toiu yama gaaru. syunken de ganseki ga byoubu noyouninatteirutokoroga ooku, soumoku ga kukkyoku site hae teite, ueno kataha okko to iwa reru ki ga tatami wo sii tayouni hae teiru. kono yama no kita no hou ni suukasyo no sawa gaaru. sousyou ha oomata toiu. mahiru gaku no syoumen no sawa wo katono sawa toii, korerano sawa kara nagare deru kawa wo uma hirukawa toiu.
nen tenpou nen gatutyuu zyun ni yokobori mura zin yuki zyou toiu mono ga, wakamono suunin to sannin ture de oomata sawa ni mizu uwabamisou wo tori ni deka keta. wakamono ha hidari no sawa he, zin yuki zyou ha migi no sawa ni iri, kaeri ha sawa no iriguti de mati au kotonisita. tokoroga, zin yuki zyou ha wakamono ga matu teitemo kaera nakattanode, niti ga kure te kita nodesono niti ha ittan kaeri, yokuzitu oozei desono sawa wo sousaku sita. sikasi, zin yuki zyou no namegata ha waka ranakumata sokuseki mo naka tta. husigi ni omoi nagara, nao okuhukaku ni wake iru to, ganseki ga takaku sobie, sono ueni noboru houhou ga nai youna basyo ni tui ta. koreyori oku ha iku kotoga dekina ito, hoka wo syuuzitu mawatu tamonono nanra syouko ganakusugosugoto kaetu ta. tokoroga, sawa no iriguti no temae ni isikiri koya gaatte, kono koya no naka de zin yuki zyou ga mizu wo seotu te yasun deita. mina ha odoroi te kinou karano zizyou wo kii ta. zin yuki zyou ga iu tokoroniha, kinou ha mizu wo sagasi taga ippon mo naku, sidai ni oku ni iku to, iwa ga takaku natte noboru kotogadekinai. sibaraku tatu teiruto, dokono kuni ka waka ranaiga, zyosei no takehito ga kite watasi nituite kona saito iu. kare ga iwa wo noboru kotoga dekina ito iu to, onna ha watasi ni seoi warenasaito iu. kotoba ni sitagau to, onna ha nanno ku mo naku surasurato nobotu te iku. ueni ha kekkou na ie gaatta.
nai niha yama no kami wo hazime, iroiro na kamigami, oni noyounamonoga kazuooku ita. yokukitato syokuzi ninatta. zin yuki zyou ha ban ninatte hara mosuitanode, kuo uto omoi zisan no yaki mesi wo dasi tatokoro, oni tatiha yaki mesi hayametemazukorewo kue to moti wo nanko ka dasi ta. moti wo miru to tuki tatemoattaga, hurui moti moaru. korewo tabete koyoi ha toma tte, mina ga yasun deiru asita no asahayaku oki te kaero utositaga, oni tatiha zin yuki zyou nimata moti wo tabe sase, sonataniha musume ga iru kato tou. zin yuki zyou ga yoku odoru musume ga hitori iruto kotae ruto, oni ha gatu niti ni musume ga odori ni deta ra oni gasarauto iu. mata, niti ni moti wotukinarubeki takai tokoro niokubesito iu. tugino niti, onna ga zin yuki zyou wo seoi, mata motono sawa ni tobu ka hasiru kasite idou sita. kinou to tigai sawa niha mizu gatakusanari, onna tomo tetudatu temorai okura rete konrai ta tokoro datoiu. onna ha mina to atu teiruga, hokano nin niha mie nai. ie ni kaetu ta zin yuki zyou ha kokoro arazuno zyoutai deattaga, kusuri wo non de ima ha zenkai siteiru. zin yuki zyou no ie deha gatu niti niha moti wotuite takai tokoro ni oita ga, nanno kawari mo naka ttatoiu. mata, zisan no yaki mesi hasonomama motikaetu tatoiu.
uma hiru yama yori kita ni oota yama kyuu senhata sukii ba gaatta kurosawa oodai yama toiu yama gaaru. onazi nen no gatu niti ni yokozawa mura no mono ga, mizu tori ni oota yama ni itta ga, soutou totu ta atode, sawa de ne wo aratu teitatokoro, hiihii toiu oto ga kiko ete, kimi ga waruku omotte itatokoro, dokokaraka hayaku kaere to yama ni hibiku oogoe ga kiko eta. kareha nige te ie ni kaetu tatoiu, yokozawa mura sitinozyou no uwasa gaaru.
mahiru yama nouti, nin ga noboru kotowo kinzi teiru sawa gaaru. kankou masumi no gatu no dewa miti nimo kisai gaaru. nen hodo mae, oota mati kunimi mura no sinsuke toiu nin ga, kinoko kari ni itu kiaru sawa de ooki na maitake wo mitu keta. hitotu no kabu wo zenbumotu teikenai ookisa dakara, hanbun wo totu te hitoiki totte ue wo miru to, oroti ga kinoko ga hae teiru ki ni karada wo, tonari no ki niha atama wokaketeita. taihen osore ononoite nige kaetu taga, sorekara tosihodo de hate tato kunimi mura no mono ga katatu ta.
mata kankou masumi no gatu no dewa miti deha, mahiru gaku ni ayasii monoga sun deite, ganpon dou mura no otoko ga, hutoi toriasi no akai otona wo mite kara haizin noyouninattesimattatoiu densetu mo kiroku siteiru. sarani, nen bunsei nen gatu niti, manta ga nakama nin to oomata sawa ni mizu tori ni itta. tori owari, nakama no sugata wosita otoko nin ga kita node kaero uto kasa wo ootu tatokoro, kasa wo wasi zukaminisareta. nakama gayouyaku sagasi dasi taga, sokoha mahiru gaku no itadaki tikaku de, oomata sawa karaha sato mo hanare teita. sugegasa wo miru to tuno soukon gaari, sanzin ka tengu kaga tawamure ni nage toba sitanodearoutoiu kiroku moaru. sarani sugegasa ni hirai ta tume no ato wo masumi ha e nisiteiru.
sankoubunken
nippon rekisi timei taikei onrain han syougakukan nippon rekisi timei taikei heibonsya, nen nen wo motoni sita deetabeesu
kyakutyuu aasaakoonbaagu , nen gatu niti nen gatu niti ha, amerika gassyuukoku no seikagaku mono de, no nama gousei no mekanizumu wo kaimei si, nyuuyooku daigaku no seberootyoa totomoni nendo no nooberu seirigaku igaku syou wo zyusyou sita. nen ni iesiibaa daigaku kara. . . gakui wo eta.
kareha, seikagaku no naka demo kouso kagaku yano nama gousei, doubutu, syokubutu, biseibutu, uirusu no iden wo sihai suru kakusan no kenkyuu wo omoni itta.
syoki
kareha zyosehukoonbaagu to renakoonbaagu no musuko tosite nyuuyooku de umare ta. ryousin ha, genzai ha poorando ryou tonatteiru garituia kara kekkonmae no nen ni ututu tekita imin dearu. kano titikata no sohu ha, tanin no meigi wo tukatte tyouhei wo nogare rutameni, sei wo kuueraa kara koonbaagu he henkou sita. zyosehu ha nen ni renakattu to kekkon sita. kareha nen tikaku nyuuyooku seigan no misin ya de hatarai teitaga, kenkou wo kuzusi tekaraha burukkurin de kouguten wo hirai ta. aasaa ha tosi no toki karakono mise de miseban wosuruyouninatta. zyosehu ha kouteki na kyouiku ha mattaku uke teinakattanimo kakawa razu, sukunakutomo ke kokugo wo hanasi ta.
aasaakoonbaagu ha, eiburahamurinkaan koukou wo sotugyou sita noti, nyuuyooku no nyuuyooku siritudai gaku siteikarejzi ni nyuugaku sita. kokode nen ni rigaku samurai wo syutoku si, nen ni rochesutaa daigakuigakubu beikoku deha igakubu ha senmonsyoku daigakuin wo sotugyou si, isimenkyo . . wo syutoku sita. koonbaagu ha, kettyuu no birirubin noudo ga zyousyou suru, zirubeeru syoukougun tosite sira reru karui oudan ni ri tta. kareha igakubu no gakuyuu tokono byouki no hassyou hikiwo tyousa si, nen ni hazimete no ronbun tositematometa.
kareha nen kara nen no mani nyuuyooku syuu rochesutaa no sutorongumemoriaru byouin de rinsyouken osamu wo itta. kensyuu ga syuuryou suruto, kareha nen ni taii tosite amerika engan keibitai ni nyuutai si, seni tosite hatarai ta. amerika kokuritu eisei kenkyuusyo no rooradaiaa ga kano ronbun wo yomi, kare wo kenkyuusyo ni manei ta. nen kara nen nikakete, koonbaagu ha ratto ni tokutei no bussitu wo atae, atarasii bitamin wo sagasu kenkyuu wo itta.
kenkyuu
kare nitotte ratto ni esa wo atae runoha taikutu na sigoto deari, kareha sidai ni kouso ni miryoku wo kanzi teitta. kareha nen ni nyuuyooku daigaku no seberootyoa no kenkyuusitu ni uturi, kouso no seisei ni hituyou na yuukikagaku, buturikagaku no tisiki wo oginau tameni koronbia daigaku no samaakoosu ni kayotu ta. kareha nen kara nen madeno kouso taisya bumon no tyou wo tutome, yakaranono nama gousei no kenkyuu wo itta. kono kenkyuu ga, sarani tanzyunna bunsi dearuno nama gousei no kenkyuu nitunagatta.
nen, kareha mizuuri syuu sentoruisuwasinton daigaku no kyouzyu tonari, nen made tutome ta. kokodemo kareha no gousei ni kakawa ru kouso no kenkyuu wo itta. nen, kareha porimeraaze tosite sira reru hazimete no gousei kouso wo tanri si, kono gyouseki de nendo no nooberu seirigaku igaku syou wo zyusyou sita. kareha nen ni nyuuyooku siritudai gaku siteikarejzi de hougaku hakase wo syutoku si, nen niha rochesutaa daigaku de rigakuhakusi wo syutoku sita. nen karaha sutanfoodo daigaku no seikagaku no kyouzyu wo tutome ta.
koonbaagu no hahaoya ha, nen ni tannou no syuzyutu wo uke ta noti, kurosutoriziumu zoku saikin no gahou ni kansen site gasu eso notameni naku natta. koregakikkakede, kareha sono noti, gahou no kenkyuu ni issyou wo sasage ta. nen kara nen nikakete, koonbaagu ha nama gousei no kenkyuu wo okonau katawara de, ga hukusei si gahou ni iru kikou ya gahou kara atarasiku zousyoku kata no saibou gadekiru hatuga kikou no kenkyuu mo itta. koreha ryuukou no kenkyuu dehanakattaga muzukasii mondai de, ikutukano sinpo ga mira retamonono, koonbaagu ha notini akirame tesimatta.
nen ni kensetu sareta, rochesutaa daigaku no aasaakoonbaagu igakukenkyuu tokoro ha kano namae wo kansi tamonodearu.
nen ni sikyo suru tyokuzen made, sutanfoodo daigaku de kenkyuu wo okonai, gakuzyuturonbun wo rebyuu sitari, ronbun wo teikiteki ni happyou siteita. konokorono kenkyuu no taisyou ha muki poririn san sio no taisya deatta.
kazoku
koonbaagu ha, seikagaku mono no siruviruusurevi to nen gatu niti ni kekkon sita. kanozyo ha koonbaagu to tikai bunya de kenkyuu wo okonai, gousei kouso no hakken nimo ookiku kouken sita. koonbaagu ga nooberu syou wo zyusyou suruto, kanozyo ha sinbun ni, watasi no syou ga ubawa reta retatoiu komento wo yose ta.
karera niha nin no kodomo gairu. nen ni umare ta tyounan no rozyaakoonbaagu ha sutanfoodo daigaku no kouzou seibutugaku no kyouzyu de, nen ni nooberu kagakusyou wo zyusyou siteiru. nen ni umare ta zinan no toomasukoonbaagu ha porimeraaze oyobi no hakkensya de, kariforunia daigaku sanhuransisuko kou no seikagaku mono dearu. nensei mareno mituo, kenesukoonbaagu ha kenkyuusyo senmon no kentikuka dearu.
siruvi ha nen ni sikyo si, aasaakoonbaagu ha nen ni syaariinwarusyureburingu to saikon sita. syaariin mo nen ni sikyo si, aasaa ha nen gatu ni kyarorindikuson to saisai kon sita. kareha tosi wo koe temo syuu ni nanniti kaha sutanfoodo daigaku ni syukkin siteita.
nen gatu niti, kokyuu huzen notame tosi de sikyo sita.
zyusyou reki
nen kouso kagaku bunya niokeru pooruruisu syou amerika kagaku kai
nen nooberu seirigaku igaku syou syou
nen amerika kokka kagakusyou kagakusyou
nen gaadonaa kokusai syou syou
gaibu rinku
.

. , .
,
, .
, , you ra tuma naasu haratuma naasu ha, nippon no adarutogeemuburandosuwanmania ga nen gatu niti ni hatubai sita kin adobentyaageemu.
gaiyou
yuugengaisya asendoai no renkaban burando no hitotu suwanmania no dai saku. nen gatu ni simai burando dearu suwan yori hatubai saretaoppai naasu hakui no sakunyuu byoutou deha hiroin ga syuzinkou no ko wo ninsin suru byousya ga naka ttanoni taisi te, honsaku ha nen gatu ikou no suwan kei burando ni kentyo na bote moe rosen heno keisya ni koou suru katati de hiroin no ninsin wo syudai tositeiru.
mata, sutoorii no kouhan deha you ra miko simai no butai tonatta zinzya to onazi haikei ga tukawa reteori, meigen hasareteinaimonono dousaku no hiroin dearu kagura simai rasiki miko simai ga serihu nomi touzyou suru bamen gaaru.
touzyouzinbutu
hisahiro hisahiro hisahiro
syuzinkou. gaityuu de adarutogeemu no sinario wo tantou siteiruga, hitto niha meguma reteinai. apaato de tonari no heya ni sun deiru siroisi ie no musume hikariga mansyon no kai kara tenraku sita saini kabatte husyou si, nyuuin. sono saini apaato de ryoudonari no keiko to mari kaori ga naasu dearukotowo hazimete siri, nin wo moderu ni sinsaku no sinario wo kakihazime ru.
hiroin
siroisi keiko siraisi keiko keiko
mansyon de hisahiro no migidonari no heya ni sun deiru siroisi ie no huzin. hisahiro ga musume nohikariwokabatte husyou si, nyuuin sitakotode naasu to kanzya tosite sessu rukotoninaru. takikawa mari kaori takigawa marika marika
mansyon de hisahiro no hidaridonari no heya ni sun deiru niizuma. naasu tositeha keiko no kouhai dearuga, keiko yorimosikkarisiteiru. hayaku kodomo wo sazuka ritaito omotte iruga otto ha kodomo wo nozon deorazu, kankei ga umaku itte inai.
sabukyarakutaa
siroisi hikarisiraisi hikari hikari
keiko no musume. hisahiro niyoku hutokoro iteorihiroto yon de sitatu teiru. sono hanmen, zibun no titioya ni taisi teha soto de uwaki wositeirukotoni kan zuiteori amari kokoroyoku omotte inai. mansyon no kai kara tenraku sita tokoro wo hisahiro ni tasuke rareta.
sutafhu
sinario nanzyou tomoe tomoe
genga oni oni
ongaku
gaibu rinku
suwan nenrei kakunin ari hurankufosu , nen gatu niti nen gatu niti ha, amerika gassyuukoku no rikuzyoukyougi sensyu. nen antowaapuorinpikku no kin medarisuto dearu.
keireki
fosu ha, bou takatobi no sensyu de, nen gatu ni . no sekai sinkiroku wo zyuritu. yokunen no antowaapu taikai deha, mizukara no motu sekaikiroku wo kousin si, . de, kurai no denmaaku no henriipeterusen, kurai no amerika no edouinmaiyaazu rawoosae kin medaru wo kakutoku sita.
gaibu rinku
hurankufosu eigo
hurankufosu . no aakaibu eigo kyouiku saisei syutyou kaigi ha, syutyou sikutyousontyou ga sou tudoi, tagaini renkei si, kyouiku saisei sisaku ni tie wo dasi ai, kyouiku saisei no sendouteki yakuwari wo sossen site hata siteikukotowo mokuteki tosuru dantai dearu. abe sinzou naikakusouridaizin no siteki simonkikan kyouiku saisei zikkou kaigi ga souridaizin kantei ni setti sareta. yokunen, nen gatu niti ni hossoku sita. zimukyoku ha nippon kyouiku saiseiki kou ni itaku siteiru.
sanka syutyou
matuura masahito yamagutiken houhu sityou kaityou kaityou
tatiya syuusei hukusima ken souma sityou hukukaityou hukukaityou
yamagisi masahiro hukuiken katuyama sityou hukukaityou hukukaityou
sinsyutu masami wakayamaken kainan sityou hukukaityou hukukaityou
yokoo tosihiko sagaken taku sityou hukukaityou hukukaityou
kyakutyuu hu no syotokuzei hunosyotokuzei, ei , ha, ruisinkazei sisutemu nohitotudeari, ittei no syuunyuu nonai hitobito ha seihu ni zeikin wo osame zu, gyakuni seihu kara kyuuhukin wo uketoru toiumono. nendai no zyuriettoraisu zyuriettoraisuuiriamusu, notini ha keizaigakusya mirutonhuriidoman no tyosyo sihonsyugi to ziyuu niyori tenkai sareta seisaku aidea dearu.
moderu
hu no syotokuzei sisutemu nioite, aru syotoku reberu no hitobito ha kazei sarenai sorewo koe ru syuunyuu noaru mono ha, sono reberu wo koe ru syotoku no ittei wari wo siharau sositesono reberu wo sitamawaru mono ha, husokubun, sunawati syotoku gasono reberu wo gekai tteiru hitai no ittei wari no kyuuhu wo ukeru zengaku dehanai .
korewo sikou suru teian tosite tenkeiteki nanoha, teigaku kyuuhukin to kotei zeiritu no kumiawase dearu. tatoeba, kotei zeiritu de seihu no kyuuhukin ga , dearutosuruto
nenkan syuunyuu ga , dearu mono ga kinkou ten niataru. karera ha nouzei hitai to seihu kyuuhukin ga dougaku tonarutame, nouzei wo okonawa nai.
nenkan syuunyuu ga , , dearu mono ha, hobo mangaku wo nouzei suru. koreha nouzei hitai no , ni kurabe te seihu kyuuhukin gawazukadearutameda.
nenkan syuunyuu ga nisuginai mono ha, wo nouzei situtumo , no kyuuhu wo ukeru tame, zyun syotoku ga , ninaru, mataha zissitu , no seihu kyuuhukin wo uke tatoiukotoninaru. kono zissitu kyuuhu hitai ha, karera no syotoku to kinkou ten syotoku no sa no tonaru.
douki
kousita zeisei ha, seihu no zaisei to, syakaiteki mokuhyou dearu saitei reberu syotoku hosyou wo douzini tassei suru tanitu no sisutemu wo sikou surukotowo douki tosuru. ga sikou sareteireba, zyouki no syakai mokuhyou ga tassei sareteirutame, gyousei tekini ha taisita doryoku nasini saiteitingin, huudosutanpu, kouteki huzyo, syakaihosyou puroguramu toittamonono hituyousei wo haizyo dekirukamosirezu, sikamo tyouhuku suru enzyo puroguramu noaru sisutemu ni sonzai suru otosiana ya gyaku insenteibu wo sake rareru.
saiteitingin ga, aru tane no sigoto wo sizyoukakaku soto ni oi yaru kiken gaarunoni taisi, ha teitingin sizyou wo konran sasenai.
enzyo puroguramu no manen ga okikae youtosurumonoha, gyaku insenteibu wo teikyou siuru. syotoku reberu ga hue reba enzyo ga hetu te zyun syotoku ueno sonsitu wo maneku tame, teitingin roudousya ga takai housyuu no sigoto wo sagasu kiga kuzikarerutoiukotoda. korewo hukusi no wana toiu. sitani okeru roudousya ha, sukosi demo kasege ba tuneni ittei no wariai de mouka runode, roudou heno insenteibu ga tuneni ittei tonaru.
hu no syotokuzei ha, kazei to hukusi no sisutemu wo ninau boudai na koumuin wo haizyo surutame, gyouseizyou no oobaaheddo wo sakugen suru. kousita koumuin no sakugen niyori setuyaku sareta risoosu ha, yori seisanteki na katudou ni tuiyasu kotogadekiru.
hu no syotokuzei hamata, zidou anteika souti tositeno yakuwari wo tyokusetuteki ni hata sutame, keizai noniwaka keiki to hukeiki no koutai baburu no seisei to houkai saikuru ni taisi te yoi eikyou womotarasukotoga kitaisa reteiru.
hihan
hihansya ga hiki ai ni dasu youna omona ketten ha, hobo subete no syotoku beesu zeisei ni mira rerumonoda. sunawati, huseikoui wo bousi surunihasorenarino houkoku to kansi ga hituyou dearu, toiukotoda. hokano kenen tositeha, nouzeisya nitotte huseikoui no kinsenteki mikaeri ga kase rareru zei no sougaku wo uwamawari urutame, huseikoui ni te wo some ru insenteibu ganioiteha takama riuru, toiumonogaaru. hihansya no syutyou niyoreba, husei torisimari niyoru sisyutu no zouka ga, genzai no hukusi saabisu no kaisyou niyoru gyousei syukusyou hun wo uwamawatu tesimautoiunoda.
hokano hihan tosite, niokeru zyunou mono ha situgyou zisei hu kyuuhu ni hitosii saiteitingin wo hosyou sarerutame, ha roudou heno insenteibu wo genzi uru, toiumonogaaru. nen no gassyuukoku de, roudou no insenteibu heno eikyou wo kensyou surutameno itiren no kenkyuu ga kaisi sareta. korerano kenkyuu ga simesi tanoha, saisyougen no disuinsenteibu yokusi tikara ga sonzai suruga, kyuuhukin ga dentouteki hukusi sisutemu niyori sudeni era reteirunoto douteido ninarutame, bunseki ga konnan toiukotodearu. kousita kekka karaha, kizon no puroguramu no tuyomi woniyori hozi situtu yuui no yokusi tikara ha souzou sezu, sikamo tekiyouhani wo kanri kanouna ninzuu ni osae ru, toiu akiraka na zirenma ga mitibika reru.
sigeki yuuin tuki syotoku hosyou keikaku to yoba re, roudouiyoku roudou nouryoku wo kai ta zyoukyouka deha sigeki yuuin no seisaku ha yuukouteki ni sayou surutohaienai.
syotoku sinkoku wo seikaku ni haaku surukotoha koku ku konnan deari sikyuu no zentei tonaru kankyou koutiku ha muzukasii. kouteki huzyo niokeru sagaku sikyuu ha katoku syotoku ni kazei wo okonai saitei hosyou suizyun wo zengaku hosyou surutoiumonode, koredeha katoku syotoku wo takame youtoiu keizaiteki yuuin ga syoumetu si, kinrouiyoku ni ketteiteki na akueikyou wo yo ru. keizai hikouritu no genin ninarusarani siryoku tyousa ni gyousei no siisei ga kanyo si teisyo e mono no hukusi ga sokona wareru.
hu no syotokuzei ha syotoku husoku ni motozu ku hinkon dakeni yuukou de hokani ha kouka ganai. izyou ten ha samueruson no keizaigaku kougi kara bassui sita.
gutaiteki na moderu
mirutonhuriidoman ha, kouzyo no misiyou bubun no ittei wari ga nouzeisya ni kanpu sarerutoiu moderu wo teian sita. zinka zoku de kouzyogaku ga , , zyosei ritu huriidoman ga suisyou sita ritu tosite, kono kazoku no syuunyuu ga , dearutoki, , ga sikyuu sareru. misiyou no kouzyo ga , arutame, sono hanbun no , no sikaku gaarutoiukotoda. huriidoman ha, zyosei ritu ga koyou kakutoku heno insenteibu wo genzu ruhodo takaku narukotowo osore teita. kareha mata, hukusi ya enzyo nogotta ni ni tuika surumonotosite hu no syotokuzei wo zissi sureba, kanryousyugi ya muda no mondai wo akka saserunisuginakunattesimaukotowo keikokusi teiru. soudehanaku, subeteno hukusi wo kozinteki ni kanri suruyouna kanzen na ziyuu hounin syakai ni itaru miti no naka de, hu no syotokuzei niyori hokano subete no hukusi enzyo puroguramu wo tyokusetu okikaeru bekinanodato kareha syutyou sita. hu no syotokuzei hadounika gassyuukoku gikai de singi sareruyouninattaga, huriidoman ha, hu no syotokuzei ni gyakukouka tonaru hokano nozomasiku nai youso to dakiawase ninatteiru, tokoreni hantai sita. miruton ha syotokuzei sonomonowo naku sukotowo konon daga, touzi sorewo haisi surukotoga seiziteki ni kanou datoha omowa naito hatugen siteori, sonotameyori kiken nonai syotokuzei no wakugumi wo teian sitanodatta.
kotei zeiritu wo tomonau hu no syotokuzei
houkoku to kansi no tema hakanari oohaba ni genzu rukotoga kanou da. kotei zeiritu to kouzyo no kumiawase niyori, hu no syotokuzei to zissituteki na zeiritu ruisin no izi ga kyokudo ni hikui kanri kosuto de zissi sareru korehatatoeba gekkyuu no naka karasubeteno nouzeisya ni sikyuu sareru kouzyo heno zei wo harau kotoniyori tassei sareru. kouzyo sikyuu sareru hu no syotokuzei ni taisuru zei ha, kouzyo ni meimoku kotei zeiritu wo zyouzu rukotode keisan sareru. syuunyuu heno kazei ha gensen kara, tatoeba koyousya kara, tyokusetu tyousyuu sareru. syuunyuu heno kazeigaku ha, syuunyuu ni meimoku kotei zeiritu wo zyouzu rukotode keisan sareru.
kono tanzyunna houhou niyori, gensen de tyousyuu sareru zeiritu ha kotei dearinagara kouzyo wo uwamawaru syuunyuu gaareba masani naru zissitu ruisinkazei tonaru. sosite, mosi syuunyuu ga kouzyo yori sukunake reba, ruisin suru zissitu zeiritu ha, zeimu kikan nado issai naku temo zidouteki ni hu ninaru. ruisin ga masani naru bubun nituiteha, zissitu zeiritu ga meimoku kotei zeiritu ni tikaku narunoha, hizyouni ooki na syuunyuu gaaru baai nomida.
kouzyo heno kazei ha, syuunyuu ga kouzyogaku no reberu ni tassu ruto harai modosa reru takkusukurezitto zeigaku kouzyo tosite rikai surukotomodekiru. kono reberu ha, nouzei hitai to takkusukurezitto no hitai ga hitosiku naru ten wo simesu. kono ten wo koe reba, kokka ga nouzeisya kara zeikin wo eru. kono ten ni tassa nakereba, kokka ha nouzeisya ni zeikin wo siharau.
hu no syotokuzei wo tomonawa nai kotei zeiritu no zissi niha, zissaini ha hu no kazei wo sake rutameno tuika no doryoku ga hituyou tonaru. kousita zei nioite, kouzyo ha syuunyuu wo sira sareta notini hazimete siharau kotoga kanou tonaru. hu no syotokuzei wo tomonau kotei zeiritu no zissi ha, zissai no syuunyuu hitai toha dokuritu ni kouzyo heno zei wo siharau kotowo kanou tosuru.
zissi
kono gainen ha, itibu no hitobito no kan deha nagaku popyuraa dattaga, sono zissi ga seiziteki ni kanouna kotohakoremadenakatta. riyuu nohitotuha, taiteino kuni niokeru genkou zeihou ga hizyouni hukuzatu deyuruginai seisitu wo motu teirutamedearu. donoyouna sisutemu demo, korerawo kakikaeru hituyou gaaru. tohaie, itibu no kuni deha kanpu kanouna muda ninaranai , sousai subeki zeihutan ganai baai nimo siharawa reru takkusukurezitto wo dounyuu siteori, kono rei tositeha gassyuukoku no kinrou syotokuzei hitai kouzyo ya, igirisu no kinrousya takkusukurezitto gaaru.
rityaadonikuson daitouryou osamu maturigoto sita deha, aruno an ga gikai wo tuuka sisouninattakotogaaru. tousyo huriidoman hakoreni muke ta robii katudou wo seiryokuteki ni itte itaga, kono an ga genkou sisutemu wo okikae zu, sono tuika tonarukotoninattatame, huriidoman hasonotameni tatakau kotowoyameta.
mata, hu no syotokuzei ha, kouteki huzyo ni kurabe masare teirutosuru koe mo ooi. nazenara kouteki huzyo noyouni yakusyo de kyuuhu wo ukeru kotoni tomonau hazi raiga naku nari, katu miinzutesuto nikakaru kosuto no taihan ga osae rarerukaradearu. kuwae te hu no syotokuzei no baai, syuunyuu no hikui hitobito ninomi kyuuhu wo okonau tame, zaigen kakuho no kanten deha beesikkuinkamu yori zitugen no kanousei ga takai. sikasinagara ooki na demeritto ga sonzai suru. soreha, hu no syotokuzei ga roudouiyoku no gentai nitunagaru seisaku dearutoiukotoda. nazenara, hu no syotokuzei ha beesikkuinkamu to douyou, issai syuurou sinakutomo kinsen wo eru kotoga dekiru seido dearutameda. zyouki no reino baai, kinrou syuunyuu ga zero demo nen man no tedori gaarutame, kuhuu sureba huziyuu naku seikatu wo okuru kotogadekiru. koreniyori, kenkou na nin deattemo, syuurou toiu sentakusi wo eraba nai nin ga zokusyutu surukamosirenai. kono ten wo kaizen sitanoga tugini nobe ru kyuuhu tuki zeigaku kouzyo to yoba rerumonodearu.
ikeda nobuo ha hu no syotokuzei ha, sono kouritusei ga genin dedono kuni demo zissi sareteinai. tairyou no kanryou ga syoku wo usinau karadearuto siteki siteiru.
nen kara nen nikakete, hu no syotokuzei no saidai no syakai zikken ga gassyuukoku de zissi sareta. zikken ha tugino tudearu
nyuuzyaazii, pensirubenia ryousyuu no tosibu, setai .
aiowa, noosukaroraina ryousyuu no nouson bu, setai .
indiana syuu geerii, setai .
siatoru oyobi denbaa, setai .

sankoubunken
, . , . . . . . . goroozubaa ha, keiretu de, nen gatu niti niti sinya kara nen gatu niti madeno kan, mokuyoubi yoku ni housou sareteita sinya baraetei bangumi.
nen gatu madeno housouzikan ha, kinyou mokuyou sinya . nen gatu kara nen gatu madeno housouzikan ha, mokuyou yoku .
nen gatu niti, nen gatu niti, nen gatu niti, nen gatu niti no kai, supesyaru han ga seisaku houei sareteiru. nen no supesyaru ha hazimete no puraimutaimu sinsyutu de, toki karano zikan, nen to nen ha sinya no zikanhan, regyuraa han ga douzi netto sareteinai keiretukyoku demo housou sareta.
mata, nen gatu niti niha saisyuukai tyokuzen niyoru zikanwaku no terebidorama han ga seisaku housou sareta syousai ha kouzyutu .
gaiyou
toukyou akasaka no roziura niaru, kakuu no sinise koukyuu kurabu wo butai nisita baraetei bangumi dearu. inagaki gorou ga baa no daime oonaa toiu settei de, huroaredi kouho tosite zyosei gesuto wo sukauto si, ruumu deno oonaa tono mensetu tooku ya, mama ya senpai huroaredi niyoru seikaku busu kentei wo tousi, zyosei gesuto no honne wo mise teiku bangumi dearu.
endingu ha, oonaa ga gesuto ni saiyou sitai mune wo tuge rumo, gesuto ga nanraka no riyuu wo tuke te zitai suruka, hokano huroaredi kouho ni hantai sarerukasi, otikomu oonaa wo booi tatiga ippatu gei de nagusame runoga pataan ninatteiru. reigai tosite, nen gatu niti housou kai no kasyu sibou tosite raiten sita sugita kaoruya, nen gatu niti housou kai no ono mayumi hosinoakinado, tabitabi saiyou toiu katati ni owa rukotomoaruga, kekkyoku, hitori mo saiyou sareteinai settei rasii.
tousyo ha, banguminai ni syootaimu, minidorama onna gokoro, tomotika mama to booi niyoru konto kokyakumei bo yorinadowo hasamu kousei dattaga, zikantai idougo ha, booi kara maneezyaa ni syoukaku sita kawamoto zyuniti niyoru kawamoto purezentu kikaku wo mein nisita kousei heto kawa tta. sonotame syootaimu ya konto ga gekigen si, oonaa tono mensetu ya seikaku busu kentei ga katto sareru baai mo ooi. endingu mo, oonaa ga kakuteru wo tukuru mani booi ga gesuto to hanasi, booi no hatugen gakikkakede mise wo dete simau pataan ya, oonaa ga nanraka no tyarenzi ni seikou sureba nyuuten sitekurerutoiunoni, oonaa ga seikou sitemo huroaredi ni oidasa reru pataan nadoga hue ta. mata, nen gatu niti housou kai kara, setto ga kurotu poimonokara aka wo kityou tositamononi rinyuuaru sareta.
syuu niyotteha, tyokuzen nimousugu to daisi ta mokuyou no hun wakuban kumi ga houei sarerukotogaaru. kono baai mousugu de syutuensya no syoukai ya koonaa kikaku no yokoku ga nagare, karano hun waku dehaikinari koonaa kikaku honpen kara sutaato suru.
supesyaru han deha, oonaa no zikkei toiu settei no kimura takuya hunsu ru takuya niisan ga syutuen si, oonaa to taiketu sitari tooku wo kurihiroge ta. oonaa niyoruto kyoudai ha nin kuraiirurasii. mata, kondou masahiko ga syutuen sita nen gatu niti housou kai deha, ga mattikontuerun sanka niari, mise no keiri ha oonaa dehanaku kontuerun syatyou dearu kondou ga tantou siteirukotoga hanmei sita. mata, sono kai kara gatu made kondou no syanhai bozyou ga endinguteema tosite nagare ta.
sousyuuhen ha, kanarazu mikoukai kura dasi to daisi, subete mikoukai siin dakede kousei sareteita.
tosiharu kaihen de suiyou waku nite maifearedi no housoukaisi ga happyou saretakotoniyori, dounen gatu niti no housou womotte heiten housousyuuryou si, nenhan no eigyou housou ni maku wo tozi ta.
omona koonaa
seikaku busu kentei kentei
zyosei gesuto ga renai no sityueesyon dedonna koudou wo toru kawo tesuto si, renai ni taisuru katikan ya taikendan wo kiku koonaa. gesuto nohoka, mama ya huroaredi mo tyousen suru.
syootaimu syootaimu
tyabangeki to syousuru minikonto wo maehuri tosite, tomotika mama ya huroaredi, tokini ha oonaa ga utawo hirou suru. sukosi natukasi meno kayoukyoku ga ooi.
onna gokoro gokoro
banguminai no minidorama. tomotika mama to tiimama aoki sayakano kakusa reta himitu wo ziku nisita monogatari dattayoudaga, kouzyutu no zizyou de tiimama ga zyun regyuraa no za wo hazure tatame, suzigaki gahakkirisuru mae ni mikan ni owari, masani tyabangeki tonatta. sono noti, onna gokoro syouwa to daisi, oonaa no sohu no dai no hanasi tosite, senzen no maru ware ya toiu kafe wo egaku suzigaki de hukkatu sitaga, hanasi ka housou sarenakatta.
kawamoto purezentu kikaku kikaku
kawamoto maneezyaa niyoru, kuizu ya geemu, huroaredi no situren episoodo hirou nadono kikaku koonaa. tadasi kawamoto maneezyaa ha kareeraisu no hukuzinzuke teido nisika eikyouryoku wo mota naito iwa reru.
kono kikaku koonaa deha, uranai geinin no ogasawara masaya, sinriken kyuu ie no amon nizi hiko, biyou seikei i no hukuda keizou nadogade syutuen suru. baa no zyourenkyaku toiu settei rasii. oonaa ya booi inoue ga suziganeiri no gandamumania toiukotomoari, kidousensi gandamu wo teema nisita kikaku moikutuka okonawa reteiru. nen gatu niti housou kai deha, nin to gesuto no katase nana ga gandamu no mei zerihu wo ate ru gandamukuizu narumonowo itta. kono kiwa inoue ha amurorei no kosupure de touzyou sita.
roke kikaku kikaku
tokubetukikaku tositegoku mare ni roke wo okonau kotomoaru.
nen gatu niti no sinsyun supesyaru bangaihen dai tyabangeki supesyaru deha, huroaredi sizutyanwo sagasu tabi tosite, umi hotaru paakingueria, mazaa bokuzyou, tateyama gyokou deno roke wo itta. tadasi, daitahikaruga taiki siteita umi hotaruha matigae te tuuka sitesimattatame kekkyoku ika nakatta. kono kiwa, itigyou ha oonaa ga zigen daisuke, tomotika mama ga mine huziko, kawamoto ga rupan sansei, inoue ga isikawa goemon to rupan sansei no kosupure wosi, tyabangeki wo taigen sita.
nen gatu, syuu niwatatte housou sareta supesyaru deha, oonaagoroo gano katudou de oosaka he kita kotoni binzyou site, oosaka tindoutyuu ga kurihiroge rareta. kono supesyaru no saigo dearu dai yoru ga bangumi kaime de, sono endingu deha, matudaseiko no monomane wosuru megumariko to hasi yukio no monomane wo tokui tosuru tensin no kimura suguru hirosi toiu, zenkoku netto deha touzi nakanakao meni kakarenai konbi ga touzyou sita sutoriiku no yosimoto mine yuki mo touzyou sitaga, yuiitu no gyagu ga uke nakatta.
nen gatu niha, zityou katyou to diran kyasarin nadagi takesi tomotika ga, oonaagoroo ya zyuugyouin ni naisyo de haku niti no amerika oudan roke wo kankou sita moyou wo, yaku ka gatu niwatari housou. rosanzerusu de kinniku ryuugakutyuu no kyaputenbonbaa nakayamakinni kun ya honmono no diranmakkei ruukuperii to taimen sita. nao, oonaagoroo ha, huziterebi no zikan terebi ni syutuen siteitatame, kono kakoku na teiyosan roke niha sanka dekinakattarasii.
housouzikan no hensen
housoukyoku
housoukyoku hasubete keiretu nite houei.
ai terebi ha nen goroni netto kaisi.
ryuukyuuhousou ha nen gatu ni utikira reta.
syutuensya
sikai
inagaki gorou , oonaagoroo
asisutanto
kawada ako anaunsaa huroaredi akotyan akotyan
koakumateki miryoku de oonaa wo madowa su yaku dokorode, hokano huroaredi karaakirerarenagaramokawaigarareteitaga, taisya ni tomonai, nen gatu niti housou kai kawada ako sotugyou supesyaru wo saigo ni kouban. soubetukai deha namida wo mise ta.
regyuraa syutuensya deha yuiitu, bangumi kara sotugyou surukotowo meigen sita huroaredi dearu.
aoki yuuko anaunsaa oonaa hisyo
nen gatu niti no kai kara syutuen. mattikontuerun kara mise no keiei kaizen kansi wo mokuteki tosita oonaagoroo senzoku hisyo tosite haken saretekitatoiu settei ninatteiru. nao, nen gatu niti kara nen gatu niti made honzi kantai nite kuizu no sinkou anaunsaa wo tutome teita.
regyuraa
tomotika mama
kuwabataohara huroaredi rietyan, maatyan maatyan
oosima miyuki mori santyuu, huroaredi miyukityan miyukityan
daitahikaru huroaredi hikarutyan nen gatu gatu gatu
harisenbon huroaredi harukatyan, haruna tyan tyan
zityou katyou katyou
kawamoto zyuniti booi maneezyaa
inoue satosi booi karasu gundan
syaka syaka
uematu syunsuke booi
ookuma kei yo booi
aoki sayaka tiimama
nen gatu ikou, bangumi no waku idou ni tomonai, regyuraa syutuen suru kuizupurezenbaraeteii sama to zikan ga batteingu surutame, roppongi no kurabu toiu mise no herupu ni iku toiu settei de, tuuzyou no housouzikan to kotonaru supesyaru nisika syutuen sinakunatta. tadasi, waku no batteingu ga kaisyou sita nen gatu ikou mo regyuraa hukki hasezu, mizukara no syutuensaku ya kekkon houkoku nado, tokubetu na kikai ninomi tiimama tosite syutuen.
sizutyan nankai kyandiizu, huroaredi sizutyan sizutyan
tiimama aoki to onazi zizyou niyori, nen gatu ikou ha, supesyaru ya mizukara no syutuensaku nado, aoki douyou, tokubetu na kikai ninomi huroaredi tosite syutuen.
zyun regyuraa
itouasako huroaredi atyako karasu gundan
tubaki kina huroaredi oniyakkotyan karasu gundan
akai purutoniumu huroaredi akai tyan karasu gundan

hyoudou yuki sekusii yose, senzoku souzihu
namita youku booi
nen gatu niti no housou de, booi uematu no daiyaku terebi toukyou do tanki tumekomi kyouiku gouwan kootingu toukyoudaigaku zyuken kikaku ni sanka site kai dake bangumi wo kesseki sitatametosite touzyou. saigo no syutuen kai dounen gatu niti housou deha, uematu to regyuraa no za wo arasoi, zimetu toiu settei no tyabangeki no matu ni, wazuka ka gatu de regyuraa wo utu ta.
