dorama ka
doramasupesyaru sekai ni hitotu dakeno hana sakasu no taitoru de, nen gatu niti no baraeteiinyuusu kimihabureiku nai de supesyarudorama ga housou sareta. syuen de oonaa no inagaki mo bangumi boutou ni namasyutuen siteiru. sityouritu . de, kimihabureiku zentai tositeha saitei sityouritu tonatta.
bangumi regyuraa nituiteha, aoki yuuko ana nozoki, yakugara ha tuuzyou no baraetei han deno kyarakutaa wo tousyuu siteita.
syutuensya
kokodeno syutuensya ha, zyouki ni sirusa reteinai zinbutu wo kisaisu ru.
tano kura kanae kuninaka ryouko ryouko
saionzikou hiko abe tikara tikara
ebisawa papaiya suzuki suzuki
oonaa no ani takuya kimura takuya takuya
hanaya kosumosu no tenin koyuki koyuki
tano kura zyunzou denden denden
o konomi yaki ya husae noobatyan kaga mariko mariko
oogawara tomekiti inoue zyun zyun
sutafhu
nareesyon wakamoto norio norio
kyakuhon magii magii
ensyutu isii yasuharu yasuharu
sutafhu
ten no koe nareesyon sibata hidekatu hidekatu
bangumi no oopuningu no nareesyon wo tantou siteiru. nen gatu niti ni housou sareta sinsyun supesyaru mikoukai eizou kura dasi sousyuuhen de honnin ga, wo sendai kara siru, akasaka gooruden mati nooden ya no syuzin tosite hatutouzyou sita. seiyuu reki nen toiu keiken wo ika si, mazingaa noasyura dansyaku, kidousensi gandamu no deginsodozabi eigaban nadowo hirou site oonaa ya booi tooru wo yorokoba seta. tokuni oonaa ha omowazu isu wo atama ni nose tari, sibata no tantou kyarakutaa demonai syaaazunaburu wo rikuesuto sitari, nado daikouhun datta.
kousei tuzuki hirosi, suzuki osamu, wakao morisige, takeda iku yuki suke, minobe tooru hirosi, yanagi syuuhei, nisimura kouhei kouhei
hensei tantou yamada yasuhiro yasuhiro
tekunikarumaneezyaa kouno sirou sirou
tekunikarudirekutaa hasiba teruyuki, abe tomoaki tomoaki
kameraman saitou miyuki miyuki
bideoenzinia sirakawa akira, aioi takasi takasi
onsei tamura maki, higuti sinsaku sinsaku
syoumei suzuki hidetaka, sinohara hideki hideki
hensyuu oohasi kazuaki kazuaki
mizuoti youitirou youitirou
onkyoukouka takeda syuuzi syuuzi
bizyutu purodeyuusaa saizyou takako, huzii yutaka yutaka
bizyutu dezain takamatu hironori hironori
bizyutu seisaku sugiura hitosi, taiboku akiko akiko
souti sagara hisa otto, suzuki masato masato
densyoku inoue yuuhei, nisiyama kuniaki kuniaki
sousyoku hirabayasi tieko tieko
seika isii nobuhiko nobuhiko
isyou atumi tie tie
meiku aatomeikutoki aatomeikutoki
kobayasi takahiro, higasi mituhiro mituhiro
irasuto innamirisa innamirisa to kurezitto sarerukotomoaru sarerukotomoaru
taimukiipaa tunetou naoko naoko
direkutaa angen hideyuki, matuura kentarou, kaziura hiroto, itou daisuke, kumakura tetuo, tuburaya kouiti kouiti
ensyutu yatagai yosiyuki kurezitto haya ta kai yosiyuki , izen hadatta hadatta
asisutantopurodeyuusaa hisamatu rie rie
purodeyuusaa suzuki sinzi, obi zyunya zyunya
tiihupurodeyuusaa kotani kazuhiko nen gatu niti kara kara
gizyutu kyouryoku higasidoori, omunibasuzyapan omunibasuzyapan
kikaku kyouryoku zyaniizu zimusyo zimusyo
seisaku kyouryoku botomu nen gatu kara kara
seisaku terebi terebi
seisaku tyosaku
kako no sutafhu
kikaku huruya eiiti eiiti
tiihupurodeyuusaa abe ryuuzi rou rou
gaibu rinku
supesyaru han nen gatu niti no kousiki saito saito
dorama han nen gatu niti no kousiki saito nago si nagosi, okinawa hokubu hougen naguu ha, okinawa hon sima hokubu ni iti suru okinawaken dai no tosi.
gaiyou
nen ni okonawa reta syuyou kuni syunou kaigi kyuusyuu okinawa samitto no kaisaiti tonatta.
tyuusin sigai ha nago wan ni nozomi, haigo ha kosei sou no santi gasobieru. okinawa hon sima hokubu tiiki no tyuusin tosi de kuni ya ken no desaki kikan mo ooku, syougyou ga kappatu dearu. mata nougyou deha, ran, kiku nado kaki nohoka kazyu yasai saibai ga sakan de, gyogyou deha, katuo no mizuage ga ooku, taikurumaebi yousyoku mo okonawa reru.
okinawa zidousyadou ga tuuzi, kaigan ha keisyouti de kaisuiyokuzyou moaru. sigaiti touhou niaru nago zyousi ha kanhizakura no meisyo de, tikaku niha zyurei nen nohinpun gazyumaru gaaru.
nen irai, hokkaidou nipponhamu hu a itaazu no syunki kyanpu ga nago siei kyuuzyou de okonawa reteiru.
zinkou
tiri
okinawa hon sima hokubu ni iti si, soumenseki . de okinawaken no soumenseki . no yaku . wo sime, taketomi mati . , isigakisi . ni tuide banme, mata okinawa hon sima ni zokusuru sityouson de saidai no menseki wo yuusu ru. okinawa hon sima nai no sityouson deha, hokutan no kunigami mura to nantan no itoman si wo nozoke ba, yuiitu nisikaigan gawa to higasikaigan gawa no ryouhou ni kaigansen womotteiru. nago si no menseki no yaku wo beigunkiti ga sime teiru.
omona kyuuryou
yae gaku
kazu u gaku
anna gaku
tano gaku
nago gaku
hisasi gaku
iti tu gaku
u hasi yama
isi gaku
rinsetu siteiru zititai
honbu mati mati
nakizin mura mura
oogimi mura mura
higasimura higasimura
ginoza mura mura
onna mura mura
nago si niaru beigunkiti
nago si no menseki no yaku ga beigunkiti tonatteiru.
sudeni henkan sareta beigunkiti hisasi kunren ba . genzai kensetutyuu no beigunkiti henoko sin kiti kensetu nai ume tate menseki
kikou
rekisi
edozidai izen
hirohumi nen nen enpou gannen nen nago magiri no toubu ga hisasi magiri tosite bunri sareru.
genroku nen nen agarie minato notino nago gyokou kinbou ni sigeru hinpun gazyumaru gazyumaru no kyoboku kotai ha, kono goro sudeni yuumei deatta.
meizizidai
nen meizi nen gatu niti nago yuubin toriatukai tokoro gen nago yuubinkyoku no kaisyo.
nen meizi nen bougetu bouzitu kunigami gun kakukan setu sima kumiai ritu nougaku kou gen okinawaken ritu hokubu nourin koutougakkou no zensin no kaikou.
nen meizi nen gatu niti kunigami gun ga tousyo tyouson sei wo sikou si, nago hanezi hisasi no magiri ga, nago mura hanezi mura hisasi mura ninaru.
taisyouzidai
nen taisyou nen bougetu bouzitu kunigami gun kakuson kumiai ritu zikka koutou zyogakkou gen okinawaken ritu nago koutougakkou no zensin no souritu.
nen taisyou nen gatu niti hisasi mura no hokubu tiiki ga higasimura tosite bunritu suru.
nen taisyou nen gatu niti nago mura ga tyousei wo sikou si, nago mati ga hossoku suru.
syouwa zidai
nen syouwa nen gatu hanezi mura arasiyama nite arasiyama ziken ga oko ru.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti okinawaken rikkoku atama ai rakuen gen kokuritu ryouyouzyo okinawa ai rakuen no zensin no kaien.
nen syouwa nen gatu bouzitu beigun ga ippanzyuumin muke no syoubyou mono iryousisetu gen okinawaken ritu hokubu byouin no zensin wo kaisetu.
nen syouwa nen
gatu niti beigun ga kaisetusi ta ippanzyuumin muke syoubyou mono iryousisetu gen okinawaken ritu hokubu byouin no zensin ga, ryuukyuu seihu ritu nago byouin he kaisyou.
gatu niti nago mati kara hokusei bu tiiki yabu anna yamanoha umusa ga yabu mura tosite bunritu suru. hanezi mura kara yagazi sima tiiki ya ware gabe zyou taira mei sumuide ga yagazi mura tosite bunritu suru.
nen syouwa nen gatu bouzitu yagazi oohasi syodai no kyouyou kaisi hanezi mura ou sima to yagazi mura yagazi sima towo musubu hasi tosite.
nen syouwa nen
gatu niti hinpun gazyumaru ga, okinawaken no tennenkinenbutu ni siteisa reru.
bougetu bouzitu henoko tiku nite, beigun ga henoko danyaku ko to henoko kaigun danyaku ko tomoni genzai no henoko danyaku ko no zensin wo siyoukaisi.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti nago mati nite, okinawa biiru kabusikigaisya gen orionbiiru kabusikigaisya no seturitu sougyou.
nen syouwa nen
bougetu bouzitu ooura saki syuuyouzyo ato ni kyanpusyuwabu zainitibeigun kiti no kensetu ga hazima ruhobo douziki ni rinsetu suru kyanpuhansen no kouzi mo kaisi sareta.
bougetu bouzitu nago mati minato tyoume nite, nago basutaaminaru no kyouyou kaisi ryuukyuu basu gen ryuukyuu basu koutuu to okinawa basu ga betubetu ni setti siteita basutaaminaru wo tougou sitauede.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti tiri zisin niyoru tunami de, hanezi mura no maki ya syougakkou to yagazi oohasi ga ooki na higai wo ukeru. yagazi oohasi syodai hakonotoki ryuusitu sita.
nen syouwa nen bougetu bouzitu yagazi oohasi daime no kyouyou kaisi.
nen syouwa nen bougetu bouzitu ryuukyuu seihu ritu nago koutougakkou gen nago koukou no kikaika denkika ga, ryuukyuu seihu ritu hokubu kougyou koutougakkou gen okinawaken ritu hokubu kougyou koutougakkou tosite bunridokuritu site kaikou.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti nago mati hanezi mura hisasi mura yabu mura yagazi mura no tyouson ga gattai sinsetu gappei si, okinawaken sita banme no si tosite nago si ga hossoku suru.
nen syouwa nen
gatu niti okinawa no hondo hukki ni tomonai, henoko no sisetu kuiki ga beigun ni teikyou sare, henoko danyaku ko to henoko kaigun danyaku ko ha tougou sarete henoko danyaku ko tonaru.
gatu niti okinawa no hondo hukki ni tomonai, ryuukyuu seihu ritu nago byouin gen okinawaken ritu hokubu byouin no zensin ga okinawaken ritu nago byouin he kaisyou.
gatu niti sisyou to si hata no seitei.
bougetu bouzitu heriosu syuzou kabusikigaisya ga, honsya to kouzyou wo naha si kara nago si kyoda genzaiti he iten.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti okinawa zidousyadou no kyoda isikawa kan ga kaituu konohoka, honbu mati de kaisai sareru okinawa kokusai kaiyou hakurankai muke no yusou kakuho notame, kaizyou nitunagaru syuyoudouro ga oohaba ni kairyou sareta.
nen syouwa nen bougetu bouzitu miyazato tiku nite, nago siei kyuuzyou no kaizyou.
nen syouwa nen
bougetu bouzitu minato tiku nite, nago gesuisyorizyou no kyouyou kaisi.
bougetu bouzitu puro yakyuukyuudan no nipponhamu hu a itaazu gen hokkaidou nipponhamu hu a itaazu ga, syunki kyanpu wo nago si nago siei kyuuzyou de hazimete okonau.
nendai matu nago basutaaminaru ga, minato tyoume kara dousi minato tyoume he iten.
nen syouwa nen
gatu bouzitu minato tiku nite, nago si sintyousya genzai sisetu ga syunkou si, agarie niaru kyuu tyousya kara kinou ga iten sareru.
bougetu bouzitu nago sityousya ga, dai kai nihonkentikugakkai syou sakuhinsyou wo zyusyou suru.
nen syouwa nen
bougetu bouzitu oonisi tiku nite, okinawaken ritu nago syougyou koutougakkou no kaikou.
bougetu bouzitu zigen kawa gen kawati ku no iti tiiki oosittai ni syouyou denki ga touru doutiku womotte okinawaken no subete no teizyuu ti ni syouyoudenryoku ga iki watatu ta.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti nago basutaaminaru ga, minato tyoume kara miyazato tiku genzaiti he iten.
nen syouwa nen bougetu bouzitu agarie tiku nite, nago si kyuu tyousya wo kaisou sita, nago hakubutukan no gurandooopun.
nen syouwa nen
gatu bouzitu kokudou gou nago baipasu ga zensenkaituu surukoreniyori, yoku nen, doukoku miti nouti sigaiti hukin no ruuto ga oohaba ni henkou sareru.
gatu niti nago si to amerika gassyuukoku hawai syuu hiro si ga, simaitosi meiyaku wo teiketu.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti okinawa zidousyadou ga naha made zensenkaituu douti madeno syoyouzikan ga zyuurai no hanbunika no yaku zikan yo de musuba reru.
nen syouwa nen
bougetu bouzitu okinawa zidousyadou de naha to nahakuukou towo musubu kousoku basu ga unkou wo kaisi.
gatu niti umusa tiku nite, kabusikigaisya hokubu kankou basu no seturitu tadasi, sinkisannyuu kisei notameni eigyou ha nengo no nen heisei nen made okonae nakatta.
nen syouwa nen gatu zimei go tiku no daikibo na zyuukyohyouzi ga hazima ru nen .
heisei zidai
nen heisei nen gatu niti nago si to hokkaidou no takikawa si ga, simaitosi meiyaku wo teiketu.
nen heisei nen
gatu niti umusa tiku nite, hokubu tiku isikai byouin no kaiin.
gatu niti sin byouin heno iten ni tomonai, okinawaken ritu nago byouin ga okinawaken ritu hokubu byouin he kaisyou.
nen heisei nen gatu niti nago tiku nite, nago siritu no dousyokubutu kouen neopaakuokinawa no gurandooopun.
nen heisei nen gatu niti yagazi oohasi daime no kyouyou kaisi.
nen heisei nen gatu niti tame mata tiku nite, meiou daigaku ga kaigaku suru.
nen heisei nen
gatu bouzitu abe tiku nite, kanutyarizooto no gurandooopun.
gatu niti nago si to oosakahu no maikatasi ga, simaitosi meiyaku wo teiketu.
gatu niti hinpun gazyumaru ga, kuni no tennenkinenbutu ni siteisa reru.
gatu niti nago simin touhyou de, beigun kaizyou heri kiti zyoukentuki wo hukumu hantaiha ga kahansuu wo sime ru.
gatu niti higa tetuya sityou ga, beigun kaizyou heri kiti no ukeire wo hyoumei si, zinin suru.
nen heisei nen
gatu niti kabusikigaisya hokubu kankou basu ga eigyou wo kaisi eigyoukyoka ha sinkisannyuu kisei no kanwa niyotte zennen gatu ni syutoku.
gatu niti nago si to buraziru renpoukyouwakoku rondoriina si ga, simaitosi meiyaku wo teiketu.
nen heisei nen gatu niti niti syuyou kuni syunou kaigi kyuusyuu okinawa samitto syunou kaigou ga sinai no bankoku tu hari kan zabusenaterasu sikitinai de kaisai sareru.
nen heisei nen gatu niti ooura wan to ooura kawa ga, kankyou syou no nippon no zyuuyou sitti ni ooura wan oyobi ooura kawa meigi de sentei sareru.
nen heisei nen gatu niti henoko tiku nite, okinawa kougyoukoutousenmongakkou no kaikou okinawaken yuiitu no koutousenmongakkou tosite.
nen heisei nen
gatu niti nago si to iwateken no hatimantai si ga, simaitosi meiyaku wo teiketu.
gatu niti hokubu kougyoukoukou to nago syougyoukoukou ga tougou sarete okinawaken ritu nago syoukou koutougakkou ga seiritu.
gatu bouzitu hokubu tiku isikai byouin ga, kyuukyuu herikoputaa niyoru kyuukyuu hansou wo kaisi.
nen heisei nen
gatu niti nago si to gunmaken no tatebayasi si ga, simaitosi meiyaku wo teiketu.
gatu bouzitu nago si no nago no niti seitei suisin nettowaaku kaigi ga, gatu niti wo nago no niti ni seitei na go nago no goro awa seniyoru.
nen heisei nen
gatu niti zyouti ku nite, ehuemu yanbaruno kaikyoku nago sinai hatu no komyuniteii housou tosite.
gatu niti tiiki koukikakudouro nago azumamiti miti no kaituu i sa kawa yohuke no kukan .
gyouseiku iki no hensen
nen meizi nen kunigami gun ga tousyo tyouson sei wo sikou si, nago hanezi hisasi no magiri ga, nago mura hanezi mura hisasi mura ninaru.
nen taisyou nen gatu niti hisasi mura no hokubu tiiki ga higasimura tosite bunritu suru.
nen taisyou nen gatu niti nago mura ga tyousei wo sikou si, nago mati ga hossoku suru.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti nago mati kara hokusei bu tiiki yabu anna yamanoha umusa ga yabu mura tosite bunritu suru. hanezi mura kara yagazi sima tiiki ya ware gabe zyou taira mei sumuide ga yagazi mura tosite bunritu suru.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti nago mati hanezi mura hisasi mura yabu mura yagazi mura no tyouson ga gattai sinsetu gappei si, okinawaken sita banme no si tosite nago si ga hossoku suru.
gyousei
dai dai sityou toguti taketoyo toguti taketoyo nen heisei nen gatu nissyuu nin. ninki manryoubi ha nen gatu niti. syuunin kikan ki me.
sityousya nen syouwa nen gatu bouzitu, minato tiku nite, nago si sintyousya genzai sisetu ga syunkou si, agarie niaru kyuu tyousya kara kinou ga iten sareta. zou sekkei syuudan to atoriemobiru maruyama kinya syusai ga sekkei wo tantou sita sintyousya ha, dounen, dai kai nihonkentikugakkai syou sakuhinsyou wo zyusyou sita. sintyousya ha, sintiku tousyo, gaiki wo tatemononai bu ni torikomu reibou nasi ga wadai tonari, okinawa kakuti de onazi youna hassou ni motozu ite sizen kanki wo ika sita zyuutaku ga tate rareta. si niyoreba tyousya ni raihou suru simin karano youbou moatte, genzai deha reibou wo siyousi teiru.
genkou gyousei tyoumei itiran
nago si deha, itibu no kuiki de zyuukyohyouzi ni kansu ru houritu ni motozu ku zyuukyohyouzi ga zissi sareteiru. zyuukyohyouzi ha, katute sigaiti no taihan wo sime teita zimei go wo tyuusin ni zissi sareta syousai ha, nago nago sigaiti syuuhen no daikibo na zyuukyohyouzi wo sansyou .
siyakusyo hontyou nohokani kyuuson gotoni sisyo kyuu murayaku tokoro ga oka reteori, kyuutyouson gotoni tiiki wo wake teiru. sikasi, motomoto senzen made yabu mura ga nago mati, yagazi mura ga hanezi mura nosorezore itibu dattatame, yuubinkyoku no syuuhai tiiki nadodeha nago yabu, hanezi yagazi wosorezore hitotu no tiiki tosite miru baai moaru. gyakuni higasikaigan no hisasi tiiki deha sigaiti tono koutuuzizyou kara minamigawa niataru kokudou gou gawa no kyuu hen san ku to kitagawa niataru kokudou gou gawa no hutami ihoku zyuu ku ni wake rukotomoari, tiiki sinkou nado de kakusa ga syouzi teiru hutami ha kokudou gou gou no ryouhou tootte iruga, gou soi nihahotondo kyozyuusya gainai.

keizai
sangyou
sinai niha, orionbiiru no kouzyou nohoka, heriosu syuzou no honsyakouzyou gaaru. mata, kono hokani mo tasuu no syuzou tokoro gaaru.
tiiki kasseika wo mokuteki tosite, goro awa sede nago to yome ru gatu niti wo nago no niti tosuru katudou ga okonawa reteiru.
yuubin
syuuhaikyoku syuuhaikyoku
nago yuubinkyoku nago tiiki to yabu tiiki no syuuhai wo tantou katute yabu tiiki ha yabu yuubinkyoku ga syuuhai siteita. yuubinbangou ha ooguti zigyousya ha , , . nao yabu tiiki ha keta zidai ha dattaga nen ni genzai no keta ka notini nago tiiki to onazi tonatta. hanezi yuubinkyoku hanezi tiiki to yagazi sima no syuuhai wo tantou katute yagazi sima ha yagazi yuubinkyoku ga syuuhai siteita. yuubinbangou ha hanezi , yagazi sima . kyuu hen yuubinkyoku hisasi tiiki no syuuhai wo tantou katute kyuu hen san ku ha kyuu hen yuubinkyoku, hutami ihoku ha se kasa niaru hisasi yuubinkyoku ga syuuhai siteitaga, mineika mae ni kyuu hen yuubinkyoku ni tougou sita. yuubinbangou ha kyuu hen san ku, ooguti zigyousya ha , hutami ihoku . musyuuhaikyoku kani kyoku kyoku
simaitosi yuukou tosi
nihonkokunai
simaitosi hokkaidou takikawa si nen heisei nen gatu niti teiketu.
oosakahu maikatasi nen heisei nen gatu niti teiketu.
iwateken hatimantai si nen heisei nen gatu niti teiketu.
gunmaken tatebayasi si nen heisei nen gatu niti teiketu. teikei tosi ehimeken imabari si nen heisei nen gatu niti zitensya wo tuuzi tamatizukuri kyoutei teiketu teiketu
aitiken ama si nen reiwa nen gatu niti saigaizi sougo ouen kyoutei kyoutei
kaigai
simaitosi amerika gassyuukoku hawai syuu hiro si nen syouwa nen gatu niti teiketu.
buraziru renpoukyouwakoku rondoriina si nen heisei nen gatu niti teiketu.
koutuu
rosen basu
ryuukyuu basu koutuu to okinawa basu no unkou suru rosen basu ha sityuusinbu tikaku niaru nago basutaaminaru wo okinawa hon sima hokubu no unkou kyoten tositeiru. nago si inan no tiiki tyuubu tiiki oyobi naha si to nago si wo musubu kakurosen to, nago si ihoku no tiiki to nago si wo musubu hokubu sisen ni waka reru. mata, koukou no tougekouzi maniawase te nago sinai no koukou wo keiyu suru ruuto mo itibu no rosen wo nozoki settei siteiru. nao, hokubu sisen no zenrosen to kokudou gou wo keiyu suru nago nisi keitou ban ban ha ryuukyuu basu koutuu to okinawa basu no kyoudouunkou, kousoku basu ha sya ni kuwae naha basu to touyou basu no sya niyoru kyoudouunkou tonatteiru.
katuteha henoko ni okinawa basu no hisasi basutaaminaru gaari, nago sigaiti ya naha oyobi higasikaigan no hisasi tiiki ya higasimura towo musubu rosen ga dou taaminaru wo kyoten tosite unkou sareteitaga nen ni haisi sare, unkou kyoten ga nago basutaaminaru ni syuuyaku sareta.
zyouki sya ga unkou suru rosen nohokani, yanbaru kyuukou basu, okinawa eapootosyatoru yuugen sekinin zigyou kumiawo unkou syutai tosuru okinawa eapootosyatoru, karii kankou ga unkou suru bi ra umi rainaa gaaru. nendai ikou, nahakuukou naha sigaiti to honbu matizyuu kokoro bu kaiyou hirosi kouen okinawa bi ra kaisui zoku kan tiku wo musubu okinawa zidousyadou keiyu no rosen ga aitugi ide kaisetusa reteiru. korerano rosen haizuremo nago sinai nimo teisya si, nago si to honbu tyounai no mano riyou mo kanou.
kahyou no unkou kaisya no ryuukyuu ha ryuukyuu basu koutuu no rosen, okinawa ha okinawa basu no rosen, naha ha naha basu no rosen, touyou ha touyou basu no rosen, hukusuuhyouki ha kyoudouunkou rosen.
basutaaminaru basutaaminaru
zyouki no rosen basu nohokani tuuzyou no rosen basu to kotonaru keitai no basu tosite, ikano youna basu ga unkou sareteiru.
nahakuukou rimuzinbasu eria, eria, eria okinawa basu unkou. nahakuukou naha basutaaminaru to nago sinai no rizootohoteru wo musubu. zizen ni zyousyaken no kounyuu ga hituyou.
kanutyasyatorubasu ryuukyuu basu koutuu unkou. nahakuukou naha basutaaminaru towansaka ooura paakukanutyarizooto wo musubu. zizen ni zyousyaken no kounyuu ga hituyou.
higasimura komyuniteibasu nago si gen kawa to higasimura nai no kan wo unkou suru. untin muryou. nen, naha nago mani tetudou wo kensetu suru kousou ga akiraka ninatta. kuni ga itibu hutan surukotoninatteiruga, zigyounusi karada ha mitei. genzai ha daisan sekutaa niyoru unei ga yuuryoku.
senpaku
honbu toguti minato nago gyokou naha minato haku hu atama daiiti marinsaabisu
douro
sinai niha okinawa zidousyadou no kiten tonaru kyoda gaaru.

kyouiku
daigaku kouritu daigaku houzinmei sakura daigaku koutousenmongakkou kokuritu okinawa kougyoukoutousenmongakkou sensyuu gakkou hokubu tiku isikai hokubu kangogakkou koutougakkou okinawaken ritu nago koutougakkou koutougakkou
okinawaken ritu nago syoukou koutougakkou nen heisei nen ni hokubu kougyoukoukou to nago syougyoukoukou no kou wo tougou.
okinawaken ritu hokubu nourin koutougakkou tyuugakkou nago siritu agarie tyuugakkou tyuugakkou

nago siritu yabu tyuugakkou tyuugakkou
okinawa saniku tyuugakkou syoutyuugakkou konaka ikkan kou nago siritu hisasi syoutyuugakkou nen heisei nen ni hisasi tyuugakkou to hisasi syougakkou wo tougou. aisyou ha ryokuhuu gakuen . syougakkou nago siritu agarie syougakkou syougakkou

iryou hukusi
iryou
okinawaken ritu hokubu byouin daityuu ni syozai.
syadanhouzin hokubu tiku isikai hokubu tiku isikai byouin umusa ni syozai. sapooto houzin niyoru kyuukyuu heri no isi nado ga syozoku siteiru.
iryouhou nin ryuu sinkai katuyama byouin yabu ni syozai. randebuupointo kasyo minkan kyuukyuu herikoputaa no heripooto tosite siyou.
hukusi
kokuritu ryouyouzyo okinawa ai rakuen sumuide sumuideni syozai.
kankou
neopaakuokinawa nago ni syozai. nago siritu no dousyokubutu kouen de, yanbarukuina wo hazime tosuru kisyou doubutu wo tenzi siteiru. nen heisei nen gatu niti, gurandooopun.
kanutyarizooto abe ni syozai. man tubo no sikiti ni, hoteru, goruhukoosu, puuru, biiti wo sonae ta rizooto sisetu. nen heisei nen gatu, gurandooopun.

busena misaki misaki
busena kaityuukouen kaityuukouen
hanezi utumi utumi
supootutiimu
enazikku kousikiyakyuu bu syakaizinyakyuu no kigyou tiimu.
zaterasuhoteruzu rateiida zyosi syakaizin handobooru no kigyou tiimu.
nago si syussin no tyomeizin
syussin tyomeizin
tokuda kyuuiti nen meizi nen gatu niti, okinawaken kunigami gunmei go mura gen nago simei go umare. seizi undou ie, kakumei ie. bengosi. seizika.
miyagi yotoku nen meizi nen gatu niti, kunigami gunmei go mati agarie gen nago si agarie umare. gaka youga ie . seizi undou ie sayoku undou ie , syakai undou ie.
kisimoto tateo nen syouwa nen , kunigami gunmei go mati umusa gen nago si umusa umare. kanryou. seizika dai kaena go sityou nado .
inamine susumu nen syouwa nen gatu niti, kunigami gun hisasi mura mihara gen nago itizou hara umare. kanryou. seizika dai kaena go sityou nado .
simabukuro yosikazu nen syouwa nen gatu nissei mare. seizika dai kaena go sityou nado .
toguti taketoyo nen syouwa nen gatu niti, kunigami gunmei go mati kyoda gen nago si kyoda umare. seizika dai kaena go sityou gensyoku nado .
oosiro yuka nen syouwa nen umare. mangaka.
uehara noriko nen syouwa nen gatu nissei mare. moto anaunsaa.
passyon yara nen syouwa nen gatu nissei mare. o warai geinin.
moromizato sinobu nen syouwa nen gatu nissei mare. syusseiti oyobi okayamaken asakuti si sodati. purogoruhu aa. tensyutu koukou okayama sanyou koutougakkou singaku wo kini asakuti si he tenkyo.
kuroki meisa nen syouwa nen gatu niti, nago si henoko umare. zyoyuu. hu a ssyonmoderu. kasyu. tarento.
kisimoto ryuuiti nen heisei nen gatu nissei mare. purobasukettobooru sensyu riigu syozoku .
hukuti motoharu nen heisei nen gatu nissei mare. puro yakyuusensyu.
nakamoto sin nen heisei nen gatu nissei mare. o warai geinin.
tuzi keiko nen heisei nen gatu nissei mare. nen misuyunibaasuzyapan.
yabiku syouhei nen heisei nen gatu nissei mare. resuringu sensyu.
tiiki niyukarinoaru ihouzin nado
hodo zyun nori nen gatu nissei mare. daini hisauzi outou no ryuukyuu oukoku no sizoku. kyouikusya. nago oyakata. nago seizin tomoiwareru. nago si kounin no masukotto nago oyakata no moderu tonatta zinbutu.
kyakutyuu
kanrenkoumoku
zainitibeigun saihen saihen
hutenma kiti isetu mondai mondai
yamahara yamahara
nago nago
nago nago sigaiti syuuhen no daikibo na zyuukyohyouzi zyuukyohyouzi
nago natumaturi natumaturi
gaibu rinku
kousiki uebusaito uebusaito
zaidanhouzin nago si kankoukyoukai kankoukyoukai
okinawaken nago si henoko ku hoomupeezi hoomupeezi
uikitoraberu niha, nago si ni kansu ru ryokou gaido gaarimasu.
tizu mappu raihu ha, nen kara nen made amerika gassyuukoku de hakkousa reteita zassi dearu. syasin wo tyuusin tosita simen de gurahu zassi to iwa reru.
fotozyaanarizumu toiu bunsyou kizi yorimo syasin wo tyuusin ni houdou genron wo kousei siyoutoiu kangaekata hasudeni yooroppa tokuni doitu de kokoromi rareteita. raihu si ha kameraman wo sutafhu toiu senzoku tekina syozoku tosi, satuei kara kizi reiauto nado no hensyuu no sutairu wo ikkan sase, fotoessei to syousi ta. dainizisekaitaisen zenka ra sengo hukkou ki, terebi no honkaku hukyuu mae madega ougonki de, amerika no sisou seizi gaikou wo sekai ni miryokuteki ni tutae ru baitai deatta.
nen kara nen made syuukansi tosite, nen kara nen madeha gekkan si tosite hakkousa re, nen kara nen made sinbun ori komi han no syuukansi tosite hakkousa reta.
gaiyou
nen ni soukan sareta doumei no taisyuu muke sougou zassi no burando wo, nen ni taimu si no hakkousya no henriiruusu ga baisyuu sita. raihu ha amerika hatu no zen peezi syasiniri no nyuusu zassi tosite rinyuuaru sare, sono noti suuzyuunen niwatatte sizyou wo sekken sita. saiseiki niha syuu ni manbu izyou ure teita. kono zassi ni keisai sareta, nen gatu niti ni nyuuyooku de nippon no kouhuku ga beikoku tami ni tutae rare, nyuuyookutaimuzusukuea de simin ga kanki ni waku naka de aruhureddoaizensutatto ga satuei sita syasin syouri no kisu ga yuumei dearu. kono zassi ha, fotozyaanarizumu no rekisi no naka de, zyuuyouna yakuwari wo hata sitato kangae rareteiru. nen ni kyuukan si, raihu no meisyou de tokubetugou ya kinen gou ga nen ni suukai deru zyoutai tonatta. nen ni syuukansi no huroku tosite hukkan sitaga, nen ni hutatabi kyuukan tonatta.
rekisi
nyuusu syuukansi tositeno soukan
nen, syuppansya no henriiruusu ga sougou zassi raihu no burando wo man sen doru de baisyuu sita. soreha, zinsei wo imi suru raihu toiu namae ga, kano syuppansya taimu sya nihusawasiito kangae takaradearu. ruusu ha, syasin ga, setumeisu ru bunsyou to onazi kuraini monogatari wo tutae rukotogadekiruto kakusin siteori, syasin wo tyuusin tosita nyuusu zassi tosite, raihu wo nen gatu niti ni sinsoukan sita. nen no taimu , nen no footyun ni tuzui te ruusu ga hakkousi ta satume no zassi dearu raihu ha, amerika niokeru kakkiteki na gurahu zassi tosite hatten sita. soukangou ha sento nen no bukka kansan de . doru de bu ga hanbai sare, peezi naka aruhureddoaizensutatto niyoru syasin ga peezi niwatatte keisai sareteita. syodai no hensyuutyou ha kurutokoruhu datta.
nyuusu syuukansi wo kikaku suruniatari, ruusu ha nen ni taimu syanai de kimitu no mokuromi kaki wo hakkousi taga, soreniha atarasii raihu si no bizyon to, kare ga mokuteki tositeitamonoga sirusa reteita. ruusu ha raihu si wo, syasin wo tyuusin tosuru, amerika no ippanno hitobito no meni hureru kotoga kanouna saisyo no syuppanbutu tosurutumoridatta.
, , , , , , . . .
zinsei wo miyo u. sekai wo miyo u. ooki na dekigoto wo mokugeki siyou. kawaisouna hitobito no kao ya i butta hitobito no sigusa wo miyo u. kimyou namono kikai, guntai, minsyuu, zyanguru ya gatu no kage wo miyo u. ningen no sigoto kaiga, tou, hakken wo miyo u. nanzen mairu mo hanare tatokoroniarumono, kabe no mukou ya heya no nakani kakusa retamono, tikayoru to kiken namono, otoko tatiga aisu ru zyosei ya ooku no kodomo tatiwo miyo u. mite yorokobi wo kanzi you. mite odoroki wo oboe you. mite osie rareyou. . .
kono saisyo no tuno hureezu zinsei wo miyo u. sekai wo miyo u. ha, raihu no mottoo tonatta.
soukangou no hyousi ha, maagarettobaaku maagarettobaakuhowaito ga satuei sita, koukyouzigyou sokusin kyoku no zigyou niyori tukura reta footopekkudamu mizuuri senryuu iki no syasin datta.
nen no raihu no foomatto ha, matatakuma ni kotenteki namonotonatta. tekisuto ha peezi no syasin no kyapusyon ni gyousyuku sareteita. kono zassi ha, atui kooto kami ni insatu sareteirunimo kakawa razu, nedan hawazuka sento datta. hakkoubusuu ha kaisya no yosou wo koe te kyuuzyousyou si, soukangou no manbu kara ka getugo niha syuu ni manbu wo koe rumadeninatta. kono zassi no seikou ha, sono nengo no nen ni soukan sare, nen made tuzui ta rukku nado, ooku no mohou zassi wo un da.
ruusu ha nen ni, taimu si no hizyoukin kisya datta edowaadokureimaatonpuson wo syasin tantou hukuhen syuu tyou ni batteki sita. kareha nen kara nen made hensyuutyou wo tutome, nen ni intai surumadeno yaku nenkan hensyuusyukan wo tutome ta. kareha, nen kara nendai nakaba madeno raihu no zenseiki ni ooki na eikyou wo atae ta. tonpuson ha, hensyuusya ni ziyuu ni koudou surukotowo yurusi teitakotode sira reteita. tokuni, hu a ssyon tantou no sariikaakurando, eiga tantou no meariirizabii, gendaiseikatu tantou no meariihamuman no nin no zyosei hensyuusya ga, tezuyoku hade na sanninmusume tosite sira reteita.
nen ni amerika ga dainizisekaitaisen ni sansen suruto, raihu mosorewo toriage ta. nen niha, taimu si to raihu si no nin no sensou tokuhain nouti, nin ga zyosei datta. amerika nin no meariiuerusyuheminguuei, maagarettobaaku maagarettobaakuhowaito, raerutakkaa, pegiidaadin, sieriisumisumaidanzu, anariizyakobii, sosite igirisu nin no zyakuriinsaikusu dearu.
raihu ha, maisyuu hakkousa reru zassi de, sensou no suikou wo sien siteita. nen gatu, raihu ha heisi wo taisyou tosita hatu no aatokontesuto wo kaisi si, zenkai kyuu kara , ten izyou no oubo gaatta. saiyuusyuu sakuhin niha sen doru no syoukin ga zyuyo sare, ten wo eran de zassi ni keisai sita. wasinton. . no nasyonarugyararii ha, sono nen no natu ni ten no oubosakuhin wo tenzi surukotoni doui sita. raihu ha, sensou wo kiroku surutameni geizyutuka wo riyou siyoutosuru gun no torikumi mo sien sita. guntai ga seihu no sikin wo geizyutuka ni teikyou surukotoga gikai niyori kinzi raretatame, raihu hasono torikumi wo hikitugi, kokubousousyou ga yatotu teita ooku no geizyutuka no koyou wo keizoku sita. raihu ga keizoku siteitakono torikumi ha, nen gatu niti ni amerika rikugun aatopuroguramu nadoni hikituga reta.
dainizisekaitaisen naka, raihu ha taiheiyou kara yooroppa made subete no amerika no senzyou ni syasinka wo okuri, maisyuu amerika nin ni sensou wo tutae ta. mata, tekigawa no puropaganda de, nama wo si ni irekae te siyousa reta.
nen gatu, detoroito deno roudou to zinsyu womeguru huan nituite, raihu ha tugino youni kai te keikokusi ta. siki no zyoukyou ha, osoraku amerika de saiaku nomonodearu. . . . kono kuni no hokano hitotati ha, tatiaga tte, tyuui wo motu te kansi surubekidearu. detoroito ha, hitoraa wo huttoba suka, amerika wo huttoba sukanodotirakada. edowaadoziehuriizu sityou hakorewo yonde gekido sita. detoroito no aikokusin ha amerika nodono tosi nimo make nai. raihu no kizi ha mattaku no dema da. . . watasi nara ieroo zassi to yon de hoututu teokuyoto katatu ta. kono kizi ha sensou no suikou nitotteha hizyouni kiken to kangae rare, hokubeiigai de hanbai sareta raihu si karaha kenetu niyori zyokyo sareta.
raihu ha, tyomei na sensou syasinka robaatokyapa to keiyaku sita. koriaazu si no beteran dearu kyapa ha, nen gatu niti no norumandii zyourikusakusen no daiippa dei ni doukou sitaga, totu tekitanohahonno wazuka na syasin dakede, sono ooku ha pinto ga atu teinakatta. raihu si ni keisai sareta syasin no kyapusyon niha, kyapa no tega hurue teitatameni syasin gaboyaketeitato kaka reteita. kyapa hasorewo hitei si, ansitu noseide nega ga dainasi ninattato syutyou sita. notini kyapa ha raihu si no kyapusyon wokarakatte, nen ni kankou sita sensou syasinsyuu no taitoru wo wazukanizureta fookasu tosita. nen, kyapa ha daiitizi indosina sensou no syuzaityuu ni zirai wo hun de sibou sita. raihu no syasinka boburandorii mo dei ni doukou sitaga, randorii no firumu hasubete usinawa re, kutu mo usinawa retatoiu.
tokuhitu subeki gohou tosite, nen no daitouryousenkyo no tyokuzen no gou de, daitouryou kouho no toomasudeyuui raga sanhuransisuko wan wo ferii de watatu teiru yousu no ooki na syasin ni ziki daitouryou ga sanhuransisuko wan wo ferii de wataru toiu midasi wotuketakotogaaru. kono senkyo deha, gensyoku no hariitoruuman ga zisuberi tekitou sen wo hata sita. nao, kono senkyo deha hokano sinbuntou demo douyou no gohou sikagodeiriitoribyuun no deyuui, toruuman wo yaburu nado gaatta.
nen gatu niti, eziputo no kakuryou kaigi ha raihu si wo kokunai kara eikyuu ni tuihou sita. hanbaityuu no subete no zassi ha bossyuu sareta. riyuu ha happyou sareteinaiga, nen gatu niti ni eziputo no mondai ou to daisi te, hu aa ruuku yo kokuou ni kansu ru kizi wo keisai sitakotoni taisi, seihu hasorewo kuni wo buzyoku siteiruto kangae tatameto mira reteiru.
nendai no raihu ha, itiryuu no sakka ni sigoto wo irai surukotode, ittei no hyouka wo ete ita. nen niha aanesutoheminguuei no rouzin to umi ga raihu si ni keisai sare, yoku nen ni syuppan sareta. sono noti, heminguuei ha raihu si kara tougyuu ni kansu ru , go no kizi no sippitu wo uke otu ta. kareha nen ni supein wo houmon si, nin no toppumatadooru no kan de okonawa reta itiren no tougyuu taikai wo syuzai sita noti, , go no kizi wo okutu ta. kono kizi ha, nen ni tyuuhen syousetu kiken na natu tosite syuppan sareta.
zensekai de bannin ga kansyou sita nen no nyuuyooku kindaibizyutu kan no zyunkai ten hu a miriiobuman deha, kyureitaa no edowaadosutaiken ha raihu no syasin wo tayou sita. abigeerusoromon abigeerusoromongodoo niyoreba izyou ga raihu no syasin dedatta. sutakein no zyosyu dearu ueinmiraa ha, nengo han kara raihu si no aakaibu ni iri, suitei ke gekkan wo tuiyasi te syasin wo eran da. kareha manmai no gazou wo sagasimawari, sonohotondoga orizinaru no nega no katati deari, zassi ni keisai sareteinai gazou wo sentei site sutaiken ni teisyutu sita syasinbu mon ga watasa reta subete no firumu wo kontakutopurinto nisuruyouninattanoha sensoumakki ni itutu tekaradearu.
nen gatu, zyoyuu no dorosiidandorijzi ga, ahurika kei amerika nin zyosei tosite hazimete raihu no hyousi wo kazatu ta.
nendai ga owari wo mukae, terebi no ninki ga takama runiture, dousi ha dokusya wo usinau youninatta. nen gatu niha, miseuri rideno teika wo bu sento kara sento ni nesage surukotowo happyou sita. terebi no uriage to sityousya kazu no zouka ni tomonai, nyuusu zassi heno kansin ha usure teitta. raihu ha atarasii katati he henkasu ru hituyou ni semara reteita.
nendai to zidai no syuuen
nendai no dousi ha, eiga sutaa, zyonkenedi daitouryou ikka, betonamu sensou, aporo keikaku nadono karaa syasin de ume tukusa reteita. tenkeiteki nanoha, zyoyuu erizabesuteiraa to haiyuu rityaadobaaton tono kankei nituiteno nen no tyouhen tokusyuu dearu. zyaanarisuto no rityaadomeriman ha teiraa to issyoni nyuuyooku, kariforunia, pari wo otozure, , go no kizi wo sippitu sita.
nendai niha, goodonpaakusu no syasin ga keisai sareteita. nen ni paakusu ha touzi nokotowo hurikaetu tekou nobe ta. kamera ha, sekai nituite watasi ga kirai namonoya, sekai no utukusii monowodouyatte mise rukatoiukotoni taisuru watasi no buki desu. watasi ha raihu si nokotoha kini siteimasendesita. watasi ha hitobito nokotowo kini siteimasita.
nen gatu no pooruueruti niyoru raihu no kizi amerika niokeru douseiai ha, zenkokuteki na syuppanbutu de gei no mondai wo toriage ta saisyo no kizi datta. raihu no syasinka ha harukooru kara, kono kizi notameni tuurubokkusu toiu namae no sanhuransisuko no geirezaabaa wo syoukai sareta. kooru ha syoki no gei katudouka no nin de, dansei douseiaisya ha memesii toiu sinwa wo hussyoku surutameni nagai kan katudou siteita. kono kizi ha, nen ni tyakkuaanetto ga egai ta baa no tousindai no rezaaman no hekiga no mihiraki peezi no syasin de hazima tta. kono kizi deha, sanhuransisuko wo amerika no gei no syuto to hyougen si, ooku no gei gasokoni izyuu surukikkaketonatta.
nen gatu, raihu ha koronbia daigaku zyaanarizumu daigakuin ga eran da zenbei zassi syou wo zyusyou sita. koreha, nen gatu ni keisai sareta anriyue niyoru kizutu ita eisei hei no syasin siriizu nado, tounanazia deno sensou de satuei sareta masare ta syasin ga hyouka saretamonodearu. raihu ga betonamu sensou no yousu wo keisai sita syasin ha, si to sousitu wo tuuretu ni egai tamonogamasumasu hue teita.
nen ni amerika no gatu tansa missyon wo keisai si, gyoukai no syousan wo abi taga, ippou de dousi ha hakkoubusuu wo hera si tuzuke ta. taimu sya ha nen gatu, syukusyou suru koukokusyuunyuu wo sousai surutameni, hakkoubusuu wo manbu kara manbu ni hera sukotowo kettei sitato happyou sita. sono nengo, raihu ha nen gatu niti gou kara, hakkoubusuu wo manbu kara manbu ni hera sita. raihu ha sikin wo utu teinaito houkoku sareteitaga, seisakuhi you no zyousyou ha rieki no zyousyou yorimo hayaku susun deita. nen gatu, hawaadohyuuzu no ziden wo netuzou sitakotoga akiraka ninatta sakka kurifoodoaavingu wo raihu si ga sizi sitakotode, ooku no dokusya karano sinrai wo utu ta. dousi ha aavingu no genkou no rensai ken wo kounyuu siteita.
raihu no hakkoubusuu no yaku ha teikikoudoku mono niyorumonodeari, yori syuuekisei no takai nyuususutando deno hanbai hawazuka datta.
itizi ha manbu no hakkoubusuu wo hokotu taga, nengoro kara manseiteki ni akazi taisitu tonatta. nen gatu niti, taimu sya hakore izyou no kaizen ha mikome naitosite dounen gatu niti gou womotte kyuukan tosurukotowo happyou sita.
sono noti, taimu sya ha, isuraeru no seisin , amerika no tyuumoku subeki zyosei , eiga no nakano nen nadowo teema nisita raihu no tokubetuban wo nen kara nen madeno mani satu hakkousi ta. koukoku mo saisyougen nomonotonari, kankou busuu ha manbu kara manbu no kan datta.
gekkan si zidai nen nen
nen gatugou yori raihu ha gekkan si tosite hukkan sare, rogomaaku mo henkou sareta. akai tyouhoukei ni siroi mozi dearukotoni kawari hanaiga, mozi ga hutoku nari, mozi no kankaku ga mizikaku nari, akai tyouhoukei mo tiisaku natta.
raihu hasono noti nenkan, ippanmuki keno nyuusu tokusyuu si tosite hakkou ga tuzuke rare, tyuuteido no seikou wo osame ta. nen niha, gurahu si tositeno soukan kara syuunen wo kinen site, nen ikou no raihu no zenhyou kami nendai no nenkan no kyuukan kikantyuu no tokubetugou wo hukumu wo keisai sita tokubetugou ga hakkousa reta. kono zidai no hakkoubusuu ha manbu wo koe teita. nen no satu no kakaku ha . doru nen no bukka kansan de . doru datta. touzi no syuppansya ha tyaaruzuuitteingamu, hensyuusya ha firippukunharuto datta. nen, raihu ha wangansensou ni tokuhain wo haken si, tokubetugou wo hakkousi ta. syuukan ha, wangansensou nakani gou hakkousa reta.
sono noti, keiei zyoukyou ga hutatabi akka si, nen gatugou kara zassi no peezi kazu ga hera sareta. mata, kono gou kara rogomaaku ga syuukansi zidai nomononi modosa reta.
raihu ha, koukokunusi nitotteyori miryokuteki namononisurutameni, koukoku no kakaku wo nesage sita. dousi ha nen gatu, koukokunusi heno hakkoubusuu hosyou wo manbu kara manbu ni sakugen sita. kono zidai no syuppansya ha noramakuanihu to edowaadomakkarikku, hensyuusya ha danieruokurento datta. raihu ha hazimete, taimu sya no simai si footyun to onazi torimusaizu ninatta.
nen, dousi ha zaiseiteki ni kukyou ni tata sareteitaga, soredemo seiki wo sime kukuru risuto wo sakusei site nyuusu ninatta. raihu no hensyuusya ha, kono nen de mottomo zyuuyouna dekigoto wo ranku tuke sita. kono risuto ha, seiyou no gyouseki ni syouten wo ate sugiteirutosite hihan sareta. mata, kono nen de mottomo zyuuyouna nin no risuto wo happyou sita. kono risuto momata, seiyou ni syouten wo ate sugiteiruto hihan sareta. toomasuezison wo kurai tositakotonituiteha, nainenkikan, zidousya, hatudenki nado, ezison no hatumei yorimoyori syakai ni ooki na eikyou wo atae ta hatumei gaaruto hihan sareta. mata, amerika kokugai dehahotondo sira reteinaiyouna amerika nin ga tasuu itutu teirukotomo hihan sareta.
nen gatu, taimu sya ha gatugou womotte raihu no teiki kankou wo utikiru to happyou sita.
soreha watasitati nitotte kanasii niti desita. taimu sya no kaityou ken saikousekininsya dearu donroogan ha. dekou katatu ta. imada kurozi dattato dousi ha nobe, raihu ha gekkan hakkoubusuu yaku manbu wo izisu rutameno sisyutu ga hue teiruto siteki sita. raihu ha motomoto ippanteki na kansinzi wo atukau zassi de, umare kawa tte irai, sizyou deno pozisyon wo mitu kerunoni kurou sitekitato roogan ha katatu ta.
nen, henriiruusu no sita deno soukangou deha, zyoozisutoorii toiu namae no kakuu no akatyan ga tokusyuu sare, zinsei raihu ga hazima ttatoiu midasi ga tuke rareteita. raihu dehasono noti mo, zyoozisutoorii ga kekkon si, kodomo ga uma re, zyaanarisuto tositeno kyaria wo omone, sityou tonari, intai site hawai de yosei wo sugo su yousu ga keisai saretekita. nen gatu ni taimu sya ga raihu no kyuukan wo happyou sita noti, zyoozisutoorii ha nen gatu niti ni sinhuzen de naku natta. raihu no saisyuugou nen gatugou deha, zinsei raihu ga owa ttatoiu taitoru de, kano monogatato, sorega naganen niwatatte raihu si todonoyouni karami atu tekitakawo tokusyuu siteita.
taimu sya no kanbu ha, koukoku no ureyuki ga warui kotoya, zassi no teikikoudoku ken wo hanbai suruniha ikamesii kankyou dearukotowo age tutu, nen ni raihu wo kyuukan sita omona riyuu ha, sono nen ni hatubai sareta riarusinpuru nadono hokano zassi ni risoosu wo saku tamedeattato nobe teiru. sono noti, oyagaisya dearu taimuwaanaa sya ha, tono oku doru no kigyou gappei wo happyou si, nen gatu niha sizyousaidai kibo no gappei ga kakuteisi ta.
nen, taimuwaanaa sya ha raihu si no tokubetuban no hakkou wo kaisi si, nen no amerika douzi tahatu tero ya seiti nadono wadai wo atukatu ta. korerano gou ha atume no kami ni insatu sareteori, zassi toiuyoriha sohutokabaa no hon noyounamonodatta.
sinbun ori komi han zidai nen nen
nen gatu, raihu ha dome no hukkatu wo hata sita. amerika kokunai no sinbun ni ori komu katati de maisyuu no hakkou wo saikai si, douyou no zassi dearu pareedo ya uiikuendo to hazimete kyougou surukotoninatta. hukkan tousyo ha, izyou no sinbunsya ni haihu sare, hakkoubusuu ha yaku , manbu ni tassi teita. raihu wo keisai sita sinbun niha, wasintonposuto , nyuuyookudeiriinyuusu , rosanzerusutaimuzu , sikagotoribyuun , denbaaposuto , sentoruisuposutodisupatti nadogaaru. taimu sya ha, naitoridaa ya makurattii nado, ikutukano syuyou na sinbunsya to raihu wo keisai suru keiyaku wo musun da. ori komi han no raihu no syodai hensyuutyou ha birusyapiro datta.
kono ori komi han raihu ha, toreedomaaku no rogo hasonomamade, hyousi ni kaka reru mottoo wo amerika no syuumatu no zassi tosita. ookisa ha . . inti de, hurukaraa de koutaku noaru kami ni insatu sareta. tatoeba, nen gatu niti gou no raihu ha zen peezi de, naiyou ha, zyoyuu zyuriaruisu zyuriaruisudoreihu a su no zen peezi syasin mai to, nyuuyooku wo kyoten tosuru puroresupafoomansu kaizyuubiggubateru ni kansu ru peezi syasin mai no essei de kousei sareteita.
nen gatu niti, taimu sya ha, nen gatu niti womotte raihu wo kyuukan si, uebusaito nomiwo nokosu to happyou sita.
sono noti, raihu no namae de tokubetuban ga nando ka hakkousa reteiru. tatoeba, nen ni bobudiran ga nooberu bungakusyou wo zyusyou sitatokino bobudiran tokusyuugou ya, nen no tosi no pooru nadodearu. nen ni taimu sya ga meredisukooporeesyon ni baisyuu sareta noti mo meredisu sya niyori raihu tokubetuban nen no nadoga hakkousa reteiru.
tono paatonaasippu
nen gatu niti, ha raihu tono kyoudousagyou no ikkan tosite, dousi no syasin no aakaibu no hosuteingu wo kaisi sita. satuei saretamama zassi ni keisai sarezuni hokan sareteita tairyou no gazou mo, aakaibu de miru kotogadekiru. raihu no manten izyou no syasin no aakaibu ha, yuuzaa ga korekusyon wo sakusei surukotowo kanouni suru wo tuuzi temo riyoukanou deari, gazou kensaku kara akusesu dekiru. mata, bukku kensaku de, honpen no zengou no aakaibu ga nyuusyukanou dearu.
onrain han
raihu no onrain han ha, nendai ni. no itibu tosite hazima tta. dokuritu saito no. ha nen gatu niti ni kaisetusa re, insatu han no kyuukan no noti mo keizoku sareteitaga, nen gatu niti ni heisa sareta.
. ha, sinbun ori komi han raihu wo soukan sita andoryuuburau to birusyapiro niyotte kaihatu sareta. raihu syasin korekusyon to yoba reru zyuuzitu sita aakaibu gaattaga, karera ha zyuuyouna gendai syasin wo teikyou sitekureru paatonaa wo sagasi teita. sokode karera ha, sekaisaidai no syasin no raisensaa dearu getteiimeezizu ni koe wokaketa. kore ikou, kono saito ha getteiimeezizu to raihu no kyoudou zigyou tonari, ryousya no korekusyon wo awa seta suuhyakumanmai no syasin ga teikyou sareteita.
bensuteiraa ga kantoku syuen sita nen no eiga deha, insatu han wo kyuukan si onrain han nomitonatta raihu no sugata ga egaka reteiru.
. ha notini. nai no syasin tyanneru ni ridairekuto sareruyouninatta. mata, . ha, , no akaunto wo izisi teiru.
kono nen de mottomo zyuuyouna nin
raihu si ga nen ni sentei sita, ha ikano toori.

kyakutyuu
kanrenkoumoku
sekai wo kae ta mai no syasin syasin
gaibu rinku
imeezi kensaku zai kuritiba nihonkoku souryouzi kan porutogaru go , eigo ha, buraziru nanbu no syuyou tosi kuritiba ni setti sareteiru nippon no souryouzi kan dearu. nen gatu yori, ta keisi ga souryouzi wo tutome teiru.
nen gatu nitizi ten de kankatu kuikinai no zairyuu houzin kazu ha nin tonatteori, koreha zaigai koukan betu de dai kurai, buraziru deha zai sanpauro nihonkoku souryouzi kan ni tuide dai kurai dearu.
enkaku
nen, kouki nen toiu husime no nen ni zai kuritiba nippon teikoku ryouzikan porutogaru go , eigo ga kaisetusa reru, syodai ryouzi ha komine tosikazu tosikazu
nen gatu niti, dainipponteikoku to buraziru no kokkou ga danzetu sare, zai kuritiba nippon teikoku ryouzikan wo hukumu zai buraziru nippon koukan ga heisa sareru sareru
nen gatu niti, buraziru ga dainipponteikoku ni sensenhukoku suru suru
nen gatu niti, dainizisekaitaisen no haisen niyori dainipponteikoku ga houkai houkai
nen gatu niti, sanhuransisuko heiwa zyouyaku no hakkou niyori nihonkoku ga dokuritu, buraziru mo douzyou yaku teiketu kuni noutino ikkoku ikkoku
nen gatu niti, zai kuritiba nihonkoku souryouzi kan wo kaisetusu rukotoga sadame rareru rareru
syozaiti
, , . ,
kankatu tiiki
parana syuu, santakatariina syuu oyobi riogurandedosuru syuu wo kankatu.
syutten
kanrenkoumoku
zai buraziru nihonkoku taisikan, zai sanpauro nihonkoku souryouzi kan, zai beren ryouzi zimusyo zimusyo
nippaku kankei kankei
nippon no zaigai koukan no itiran itiran
gaibu rinku
zai kuritiba nihonkoku souryouzi kan, dou porutogaru go
zai kuritiba nihonkoku souryouzi kan porutogaru go sinsei yukino arase yukinoha nippon no zyosei seiyuu. omoni adarutogeemu ni koe woateteiru.

syutten
tosi miman eturan kinsi no saito wo hukumi masu kanome kei ko kanome keiko, nen ha, nippon no kyakuhonka, syousetuka. hukusima kenkai tu wakamatu si syussin. andoriimu syozoku.
nen no dai kai huziterebiyangusinario taisyou kasaku wo eien nohakanasaniyori zyusyou si, yoku nen koukai no eiga honzitu no neko zizyou de kyakuhonka tosite debyuu.
doukyuusei niyori dai kai renai syousetu taisyou wo zyusyou si, taiikukan beibii totomoni nen ni eigaka. mata, niyori dai kai hakodate minato iruminasion eigasai sinario taisyou no yuusyuusyou wo zyusyou siteiru.

kyakutyuu
gaibu rinku
kanome kei ko andoriimu andoriimu
syozokuzimusyo kabusikigaisya andoriimu namegata hitosi namekata hitosi, nen ha, amerika bungakusya, syuto daigaku toukyou meiyokyouzyu.
tosiaki osamu daigaku daigakuin syuusikatei syuuryou. toukyoutoritu tankidaigaku zyokyouzyu, kyouzyu, syuto daigaku toukyou kyouzyu. nen gatu taikan, syuto daigaku toukyou meiyokyouzyu. amerika kokuzin bungaku, tosi densetu nadowo kenkyuu, honyaku suru.
tyosyo
tantyo kioku no katari to katari no kioku aanesutogeinzu, deividdoburaddorii, rityaadoraito nagumo dou fenikkusu . kyoutyo eibei bungaku to gengo homerosu sya, ,
sekai no kokuzin bungaku ahurika, karibu, amerika taka syobou yumi puresu, ,
kokuzin kenkyuu no sekai seizi syobou, ,
esunikku kenkyuu no huronteia ta minzoku kenkyuu gakkai, ,
kyouhen tyosyo
amerika kokuzin bungaku tosono syuuhen matumoto noboru hoka nagumo dou fenikkusu .
kioku no poriteikkusu amerika bungaku niokeru boukyaku to souki matumoto noboru, matumoto kazuhiro nagumo dou fenikkusu .
kami no nokosita kuroi ana wo mitu mete amerika bungaku wo yomi toku suyama sizuo sensei tuitou ronsyuu, matumoto noboru hoka, otowa syobou turumi syoten .
honyaku
tyookingudooberuman amerika no atarasii tosi densetu zyanharorudoburunvu a n sinzyukusyobou . kaidai dooberuman ni nani gaattano
mekisiko kara kita petto amerika no tosi densetu korekusyon burunvu a n matumoto noboru kyouyaku sinzyukusyobou .
kusotu nantekotta eizu no sekai heyoukosoha amerika kara kita tosi densetu burunvu a n sinzyukusyobou .
yooroppa hourouki sita matumoto noboru kyouyaku maakutoueinkorekusyon sairyuu sya .
kokuzin bungaku to mie nai tosi amerika suiitohoomu tyaaruzusukuragguzu matumoto noboru, hukuda tizuko kyouyaku sairyuu sya .
akatyan ressya ga iku saisin moodo no tosi densetu burunvu a n sinzyukusyobou .
kage to koui raruhuerisun matumoto noboru, matumoto kazuhiro, yamazaki humio kyouyaku nagumo dou fenikkusu .
sankou
eigo nenkan miyazakiken no kendou itiran miyazakikennokendouitiranha, miyazakiken wo touru kendou no itiran dearu.
rosenbangou no housoku
miyazakiken no kendou bangou ha nen syouwa nen gatu kara settei sareteiru.
syuyouti hou miti ha keta, ippan kendou ha keta no kendou bangou wo warihuru.
syuyouti hou miti nouti, kennai kanketu rosen ha gou ikou nen izen ha gou ikou tonatteiru.
ippan kendou nituiteha ikano touri tonatteiru.
bandai ekkyourosen ekkyourosen
bandai kenpoku higasiusuki nisiusuki tiiki wo kiten tosuru kennai kanketu rosen rosen
bandai kenou miyazaki higasimorokata koyu tiiki wo kiten tosuru kennai kanketu rosen rosen
bandai kennan kitamorokata nisimorokata minaminaka tiiki wo kiten tosuru kennai kanketu rosen rosen
syuyouti hou miti

kyakutyuu
kanrenkoumoku
nippon no douro itiran itiran
kyuusyuutihou no douro itiran itiran
sankoubunken
miyazakiken kendo seibi bu douro hozen ka douro sisetu genkyou tyousyo heisei nen gatu niti genzai .
gaibu rinku
miyazakiken kendo seibi bu sigaku sigaku, ei ha, koukou ago ganmen ryouiki ni kansu ru gaisyou ya sikkan no seizyou, genin nituiteno tisiki wo tikuseki, sono yobou, sindan, tiryou no houhou wo kaihatu suru gakumon dearu. sika gaku sikai gaku sikagaku sikaigaku, ei tomo yoba reru.
nippon nioiteha, meizizidai ni igaku yori dokuritu siteiruga, soremadeha koutyuu ka tosite igaku no itibu ka deatta. koukou ka isi tosite koukou igaku koukuuigaku, ei ya igaku koukou kagaku koukuukagakuni houkatu sareteiru kuni mo tyuugoku taiwan ya oubeisyokoku nado sonzai suru.
rekisi
kodai
kodai nioiteha, igaku douyou, sigaku nituitemo, kakubun mei nioitesorezoreni hattatu sita.
kodai eziputo nioite, eeberusupapirusu ya edouinsumisupapirusu niha, sorezore haita ya siniku honoo nituiteno yakubutu tiryouhou, agokansetudakkyuu ni taisuru tiryouhou ga kisai tosite nokosa reteiru.
mesopotamia bunmei ya, tyuugoku bunmei nioiteha, musiba no genin ha musi dearutoiu gainen ga hiroma tta.
indo deha susyuruta hon ten eigo nioite, koukou seisou no hituyousei, haburasi ya hamigaki zai, siseki zyokyo nituite kisaisa reteiru.
kodai girisia deha, hipokuratesu zensyuu ni, ikutuka no sika sikkan ni kansu ru kisai nohoka, tyouzyu no nin hodo ha no zanson hasuu ga ooi koto gasudeni kisaisa reteitaga, tiryouhou ha bassi ya syousyaku nadodeatta.
rooma teikoku nioiteha, kerurusu gau syoku no tiryouhou tosite, ha no kuroi bubun wokosuri oto sukotoga hituyou dearukotoya, kyouseisika nituiteno kisai wo itta hoka, garenosu zensyuu niha ha no kaibou ya zui kou sentuu hou, ha no hyouhaku ni kansu ru kisai mosareteita.
tyuugoku deha sigaku no atukai ha antei siteinakatta. in nioite, igaku no bunka tosareta sika koukou ryouiki ha syuu, syunzyuusengokuzidai deha naika no nakano syoukaki ka no itibunya tosare, sin kan nite hutatabi dokuritu sita atukai tonatta. sugimoto ha, tyuugoku deha sika sikkan ha itibu no oukou kizoku no byouki deari syomin no sika sikkan ha sukunai kotokara, sippei tositeno ninsiki ga sukunaku, sonotameni sika sikkan ni motii rareru kanzi nimo ga motii rarenakatta to houkoku siteiru.
tyuusei
kono ziki, sigaku wo hukume ta igaku bunya ha higasi yooroppa, isuramu sekai nioite hattatu sita. kono ziki no igakusyo niha musiba niyori ai ta ana ni nyuukou to myouban wo maze ta semento wo tume rukotoya ha no seisou, siseki zyokyo, ha no sai syoku zyutu, ha no kesson bui ni usi no hone de tukutu ta zinkou hawo ire ru nado no tiryou houga kisaisa reteitaga, mongoru no sinnyuu ya naibuhoukai nadono kekka, hattatu ha toma rukototonaru.
yooroppa deha, seiki ni itaru made sennen izyou ni watari, hipokuratesu igaku, garenosu igaku, abisenna igaku wo sinpou suru kaku gakuha ga zettaiteki keni tosite kunrin siteori, teitai ga tuzui teita. runesansu no eikyou niyori igaku mo kindaika ga susumu koto tonaruga, sigaku no kindaika ha seiki, pieerufosyaaru no touzyou wo matu kotoninaru.
pieerufosyaaru ikou
pieerufosyaaru ga nen ni syuppan sita sika gekai, mosikuha ha no gairon ha sigaku no bunya niokeru saisyo no houkatuteki na isyo dearu. kono kaki niyori, mongaihusyutu no hizyutu wo urimono tositeita sigaku wo kou nisi, daremo ga manabe ru gakumon tosita. kore ikou, ooku no koumei na isi, sikai si gasono sindan tiryou nadowo koukai suruyouninari, sigaku wo ookiku hattatu saserukototonaru. seiki ni iru to, huransu kakumei no konran ya amerika gassyuukoku no hatten kara yuunou na sikai si no amerika heno izyuu ga susumi, sigaku no tyuusin ha amerika heto uturi kawa tta. sono nagare no naka, nen ni borutimoa ni sekai de saisyo no sigaku kyouikukikan dearu borutimoa sikai gakkou ga, nen niha amerika sikai si kai ga seturitu sareta. kore ikou, borutimoa sikai gakkou wo hazime tosuru sigaku kyouikukikan niyori sigaku ha gakumon tosite taikeika sare, kaku bunka no kiso ga tukura rerukototonatta.
sigaku kyouiku
zyonharisu ha, ohaio syuu rosu gun no beinburijzi ni sekai de saisyo no sika no gakkou wo seturitu, kenkou no senmon tositeno sigaku kyouiku wo kakuritu saseta. koreha nen gatu niti ni hiraka re, genzai ha harisu sika hakubutukan eigo tonatteiru. saisyo no sikai gakkou dearu borutimoa sikai gakkou ha nen ni seturitu sareta.
sigaku kyouiku ha kuni niyotte kotona ri, gakubu wo sotugyou sita mono ga singaku suru senmonsyoku daigakuin no housiki wo toru kuni to, gakubukyouiku de sikai gaku kyouiku wo okonau kuni gaaru.
sotugyou sita kuni ya, onazi kuni demo sotugyou sita daigaku niyori, onazi syouzyou demo kotona tta handan wosurukotoga aru. tatoeba, isuraeru no sigaku kyouikukikan nite kyouiku wo uke ta sikai si ha, nanbei ya higasi yooroppa no sigaku kyouikukikan nite kyouiku wo uke ta sikai si yorimo daisan dai kyuusi wo sekkyokutekini bassi suru koto ga houkoku sareteiru.
bunka
kiso sigaku
koukou ago ganmen ryouiki no gakumon dearutame meisyou ni koukou to tui tehairuga, zissaini ha kaibougaku to koukou kaibougaku , seirigaku to koukou seirigaku noyouni koukou to douzini zensin wo moura sita gakusyuu wo itte iru. kaibougaku nioiteha, go itai no zensin wo zissaini kaibou site syuugaku surukotoga sikai gaku koukou igaku wo osame rutameni hissu tonatteiru. zintai wo toriatukau gakumon dearu izyou, zintai no kouzou kinou, sikkan tosono genin nado igakukenkyuu no konkyo tonaru tiken wo eru tameno gakumonbunya dearu kiso igaku to, hobo itti suru.
koukou kaibougaku kaibougaku
koukou seirigaku seirigaku
koukou byourigaku byourigaku
koukou saikin gaku koukou biseibutu gaku koukou kansen bougyo gaku
koukou seikagaku seikagaku
koukou sosikigaku sosikigaku
koukou meneki gaku gaku
sika yakurigaku sika yakubutu gaku
sika rikougaku koukou seitaizairyou gaku , sika zairyou gaku
rinsyou sigaku
koukou sindangaku sindangaku
koukuunai kagaku kagaku
sika housyasen gaku gaku
yobou sika gaku gaku
sinbi sika gaku gaku
sika inpuranto gaku gaku
koukou saisei gaku gaku
syougaisya sika gaku gaku
koureisya sika gaku rounen sika gaku
geka kei sigaku
koukuugeka gaku koukou ago ganmen geka gaku
sika masui gaku gaku
hozon tiryou kei sigaku
hozon syuuhuku gaku seiki nihau syoku niyoru kesson ni taisuru syuuhuku ga okonawa reteitaga, gakumon tosite teisai wo totonoe hazimetanoha, seikimatu ni guriinbaadimanburakku ga taikeika sitekaradearu.
ha nai ryouhou gaku gaku
sisyuu tiryou kei sigaku
sisyuu tiryou gaku gaku
hotetu kei

bubun syougi ha hotetu gaku gaku
zenbu syougi ha hotetu gaku gaku
ago ganmen hotetu gaku gaku
kougou gaku gaku
kyousei sigaku
sika kyousei gaku gaku
syouni sigaku
syouni sika gaku syounika gaku ga naika gaku kara dokuritu sita keii to douyou, seiki ni yooroppa nite kozi in kara hatten sita syouni byouin nioite koukou sikkan no rinsyou kenkyuu ga okonawa rerukotode seiritu sita.
syakai sika gaku
syakai sika gaku gaku
koukou eiseigaku koukou hoken gaku

aruhureddogiizii sika hotetu gaku gaku

kyakutyuu
syutten
sankoubunken
isii takuo, sibuya kou, nisimaki akihiko sutandaado sikai gakusi dai han dai sappan gaku ken syoin, toukyouto bunkyouku, nen gatu niti. . .
sugimoto sigeharu tyuugoku kodai no sika sippei to sippei kan sika byoumei rekitei hoi nippon sikai sigaku kai kaisi dai kan dai gou, nippon sikai sigaku kai, nen gatu niti, peezi, , .
nakahara izumi nihongo sikai gakusi no kao gaku ken syoin, toukyouto bunkyouku, nen gatu niti. . .
hirai yosito, zityuu tosio, terasita seidou, tida akira hen hozon syuuhuku gaku dai han dai sappan i ha kusuri syuppan, toukyouto bunkyouku, nen gatu niti. . .
maeda takahide, asada yosinobu, ozaki masao, tanaka miturou, hukuda ri, miyazawa hiroo, watanabe sigeru syouni no koukou kagaku dai han gaku ken syoin, toukyouto bunkyouku, nen gatu niti. . .
matuda yuuko, sano takako tyo haburasi no rekisi kodai , matuda yuuko hen haburasi ziten dai han gaku ken syoin, toukyouto bunkyouku, nen gatu niti, peezi. . .
berunwaadowainbaagaa nihongo gaisetu pieerufosyaaru sika gekai kindai sikai manano tansyo, saisyo no sikai gakusyo oyobi nenmae no sikai ni kansu ru ronzyutu , wake kouzan naohide zikuu syuppan, toukyouto bunkyouku, nen gatu niti gentyo nen . . .
gaibu rinku
nippon sikai gakkai gakkai
zai koukou hoken kyoukai kyoukai
sigaku kotobankunikoraiharutoman , nen gatu niti nen gatu niti ha, doitu no tetugakusya.
syougai
nen gatu niti, riga ni umare, maaruburuku daigaku de herumankooen, paurunatorupu ni manabi, nen, puraton niokeru sonzai no ronrigaku de kyouzyu sikaku syutoku.
sisou
syoki ha sin kanto ha ni zokusi taga, edomuntohussaaru, makkususieeraa no gensyougaku ni eikyou wo uke, sin kanto ha wo dassu ru.
nen ni zyousi sita rinrigaku nioite, kareha, sieraa no gensyougaku teki kati tetugaku wo hihanteki ni keisyou sita uede, houkatuteki na sonzairon no itibu tosite taikeika sita. sono noti, kanto no hihan tetugaku no kakusin ha monozitai to gensyou no kubetu niarutosita uede, monozitai ha ninsiki dekinaitoiu imi deha syoukyokuteki namonodearuga, genni sonzai siteirutoiu imi deha sekkyokutekina monodearutosite, sonzairon wo ninsikiron yorimo taikeiteki ni zyoui ni iti zukeru dokuzi no hihanteki zituzairon teki sonzairon wo teisyou sita.
mata, dokuzi no bigaku wo kizui ta.
tyosyo
hukuda takasi wake bigaku sakuhin sya, nen
muraoka siniti kanyaku doitu kannenron no tetugaku sakuhin sya, nen
kyakutyuu
gaibu rinku
sugimoto yosio nikoraiharutoman no tetugaku ni oke ru ninsiki to sonzai no mondai teinzyan biruma go , dazyan tomotoha biruma myanmaa niokeru sinnen, matasoreni tomonau maturi wo sasu.
kyakutyuu

gaibu rinku

eki kouzou

rekisi
nen gatu niti gousen ga kaigyou.
tonari no eki
kousyuu tikatetu tikatetu
gousen gousen
kousyuu kasya tan eki syou kitaeki tou kin eki manriibiiti ha, oosutoraria ha, sidonii no noozanbiiti ni iti suru biiti dearu. kita kara zyunni, kuiinzukurihu, noosusutein, saususutein no tuno syuyou sekusyon ni waka reteiru.
manriibiiti wo umizoi sukosi aruku to feariibauaa to sieriibiiti dearu. manriibiiti hukin niha, tenpo, resutoran, naitokurabu, baa nadogaaru.
biiti no namae hasokoni sun deiru senzyuumin nitinande, aasaafirippu teitoku ga nazu ketamonodearu. firippu hasorenituite karera no zisin to otoko rasii koudou karakono basyo ni no namae wo atae tato kai teiru.
ga saususutein deha nenzyuu, noosusutein to kuiinzukurihu deha gatu kara yokunen gatu ni katudou siteiru. mo gatu kara yokunen gatu madeno syuumatu to kyuuzitu ni patorooru siteiru.
sidonii no syuyou feriitaaminaru dearu saakyuraakii kara manrii heha ferii de waka karu. hokousyayou no hiroba to syoppingu to syokuzi gadekiru manrii no meinsutoriito no tudearu koruso touri ha, ferii hutou to minato no biiti kara noosuheddo no tukene wo yokogitu te manriibiiti heto nobi, sokode noosusutein to saususutein no sakai to setuzokusu ru.
gyararii
kyakutyuu
, ,
gaibu rinku
manriibiiti manriibiiti
huzi koukuu huzikoukuu, eigohyouki , ryakusyou toha, katute nihonkokunai de teiki ryokyaku bin wo unkou siteita koukuugaisya. nen gatu niti seturitu. notini nittou koukuu kitanihon koukuu to gappei si nihonkokunai koukuu nen gatu niti seturitu tonaru.
gaiyou
nen gatu niti ni komiya saburou raniyotte, nihonkoukuu senden kyoukai nippon senden koukuu tosite seturitu. seturituzi no sihonkin ha , manen nen touzi de, honsya ha toukyouto ni oka reteita. tousyo ha komiya ga syatyou wo tutome teitamonono, sono koukei ei zin no koutai ga aitugi sono do ni huzi koukuu, mitomi koukuu, huzi sangyou koukuu to syamei wo kaisyou, saisyuuteki niha huzi koukuu heto modosa reta.
seturitu tousyo no syamei kara akiraka na youni, saisyo ha yuuranhikou koukoku senden hikou wo tyuusin tosita huteiki koukuu unsou zigyou ni tyakusyu, nen ni sudeni toua koukuu ga kaisetusi teita kako sima syusi sima rosen ni biitikurahuto tuinbiiti de syuukou si, teiki koukuu ni sannyuu sita.
nen ni sihonkin wo oku , manen ni zousi surumonono, dounen gatu niti ni, hokano zyakusyou koukuugaisya deatta nittou koukuu kitanihon koukuu to gappei si nihonkokunai koukuu notino toua kokunai koukuu nippon easisutemu genzai no nihonkoukuu tonari, saisyuuteki niha kigyou tosite syoumetu sita.

huzi koukuuki tuirakuziko nen gatu niti hassei hassei
gaibu rinku
huzi koukuu annai suzuki yasuhiro suzuki yasuhiro, nen ha, nippon no tirigaku mono, nagoyadaigaku kyouzyu.
ryakureki
aitikenokazakisi umare. toukyoudaigaku daigaku rigakubu tigaku ka tirigaku katei sotugyou, doudaigaku in rigakukeikenkyuuka hakusikatei syuuryou, touhoku nihonnai obi bonti gun no katu kouzou to tikei hattatu de rigakuhakusi. aitiken ritudai gakubun gakubu zyouhoukagakubu zyokyouzyu wo hete, nagoyadaigaku kankyougakukenkyuuka gensai renkei kenkyuu sentaa kyouzyu. mongoru kokuritudaigaku kyakuin kyouzyu, nagoyadaigaku saigai taisaku situtyou, soutyou hosa, nihongakuzyutukaigi renkei kaiin, zisin tyousakenkyuu suisinhonbu senmoniin, gensiryoku kisei iinkai gaibu yuusikisya nado wo rekinin. mongorutorukosaharin taiwan tyuugoku kankoku nadode katu dansou no kokusai kyoudou tyousa wo susume ru. senmon ha sizen tirigaku hendou tikeigaku.
tyosyo
katu dansou daizisin ni sonae ru tikumasyobou tikuma sinsyo,
genpatu to katu dansou soutei soto ha yurusa renai iwanamisyoten iwanami kagaku raiburarii,
, , .
kyouhen tyo
katu dansou tikei handoku kuutyuusyasin niyoru katu dansou no nintei watanabe man kyuu suzuki yasuhiro tyo, kokon syoin,
bousai gensai nitunageru hazaadomappu no ika si hou suzuki yasuhiro hen, iwanamisyoten,
reziriensu to tiiki sousei dentou sito biggudeeta kara saguru kokudo dezain hayasi ryou tugu suzuki yasuhiro hen, akasi syoten,
sougen to tosi kawari yuku mongoru isii syouko suzuki yasuhiro inamura tetuya hen, huubai sya
wakaru torikumu saigai to bousai zisin suzuki yasuhiro sugito nobuhiko nakabayasi kazuki sakamoto mayumi takemura masayuki , teikoku syoin,
odayakade megumi yutaka na tikyuu notameni tikyuuzin kan ken kagaku nyuumon suzuki yasuhiro yamaoka kou haru takara kaoru hen, kokon syoin
daigakukyouiku niokeru sizen tirigaku no siten wo ika sita bousai kyouiku , usui teruko hen tiri sougou dehazimaru tirikyouiku zizoku kanouna syakai zukuriwo mezasi te kokon syoin ,

kyakutyuu
gaibu rinku
kousiki uebusaito taiyou gaippai seruhukavu aa besuto taiyougaippai puransoreiyu ha nen gatu niti ni hatubai sareta, tokunaga hideaki sakume no seruhukabaaarubamu.
gaiyou
nen hatubai eien no hate ni seruhukavu aa besuto ni tuzuku seruhukabaaarubamu ha eisyo no zyazuarenzi. suuinguzyazu ya modanzyazu wo toriire ta saundo wo tannou dekiru sakuhin ninatteiru.
tuuzyouban to syokai genteiban, deno keitai hatubai.
syokai genteiban ha taiyou gaippai . kagayaki nagara . myuuzikkubideo wo syuuroku sita tuki. syokai genteiban ha boonasutorakku wo kyokusyuuroku.
syuurokukyoku
zenkyoku sakusi sakkyoku tokunaga hideaki tokki igai henkyoku sakamoto masayuki tokki igai
yume no tuzuki
taiyou gaippai sakusi yamada hirosi
kagayaki nagara sakusi ootu akira, sakkyoku suzuki kisaburoo
kaze no eoria sakusi ootu akira
reinii buruu sakusi taiboku makoto
syokai genteiban boonasutorakku
syokai genteiban boonasutorakku sakusi ootu akira syokai genteiban taiyou gaippai .
kagayaki nagara .
kyakutyuu nissin orinpikkusyou tizyousaidai no kuizu nissin orinpikkusyou tizyousaidaino kuizu ha, nen gatu niti kara nen gatu niti made huziterebi keiretu de housou sareta namahousou no kuizu bangumi dearu. housouzikan ha maisyuukayoubi .
syutuensya
sikai katura kogane osamu osamu
sokuratesu syutudaisya yaku syodai toake hisao nen gatu niti nen gatu niti niti
syutudaisya daime kawai bou tya nen gatu niti nen gatu niti niti
hoka hoka
gaiyou
nen toukyou orinpikku ga kaisai sareru nenmae no nen ni kaisi sareta bangumi de, taitoru nimoaruyouni nissinsyokuhin no issyateikyou de housou sareta. ikkai gotono syutuzyousya ga nin, yuusyousyoukin ga manen toiu, touzi no kaheikati tositeha tyoukou hitai no kuizu bangumi datta.
kuizu ha ton syutudai sare, sono keisiki ha seika riree no koosu nitinanda settei nomonodeari, sono koosu ha setto no mannaka ni kaidanzyou tonatta katati de hyouzisa re, ton susumu gotoni kaidan ga dan zutu tentou suruyouninatteita. syutuzyousya ha, sono kaidan no ryougawa ni mouke raretahina dan zyouno seki ni suwari kuizu ni tyousen sita.
bangumi no setto ha, kaidan no itibanue atene ni seikadai gaari, seikadai no ueni orinpikku bokin bosyuu to kaka reta boodo to tomoni gorin hata ga egaka re, syutuzyousya ga suwaru hina dan seki no ueni ha, honban kuno taitoru ga kakage rare, sono saizenretu no zenmen niha suponsaa dearu nissinsyokuhin no syamei ga hyouzisa reteita.
bangumi teema kyoku ha, zissaini toukyou orinpikku no uta demoattakono niti notameni sakusi suzuki yosio, hosaku si kati yosio, sakkyoku hukui humihiko . koreni awa sete, gorin no wa wo ikko zutu motu ta nin no zyosei ga odoru toiu oopuningu datta. mata, kakkai no tyomeizin gahobo maisyuu gesuto ni mukae rareteita.
tousyo ha, toukyou orinpikku no heimaku to tomoni honban kumo syuuryou surutoiu yotei tonatteitaga, bangumi no ninki ga tuzui takotomoatte, toukyou orinpikku heimaku kara yaku ka gekkan notino nen gatu niti made housou ga entyou sareta. mata, toukyou gorinkaisai kikantyuu no nen gatu niti nousoubun karaha nissin ziettosyoo tizyousaidai no kuizu to daisi te housou sareruyouninatta.
ruuru
monme no atene kara monme no toukyou made, seika riree tuuka tosi to settei sareta ruuto wotadorinagara kuizu ga syutudai sareru. saisyo hahina dan no seki de zenin kiritu si, zeninsanka no dai monme kara dai monme madeha madeha kuizu, dai monme karaha kati nokotu ta syutuzyousya ga sitani ori te santaku kuizu ni tyousen suru. monme karaha ton seikai gotoni manen no syoukin de, ton demo matigae tara tyakuseki de soku sikkaku, ton zenmonseikai mono ga yuusyou de, tenzyou kara tairyou no kamihubuki ga ori, syoukin manen to tikinraamen nenbun ga okura reta. ton toutatu mae ni zenin sikkaku tonatta baai niha, sono kai no manen syouhin ha nasi tadasi, mare ni hutatabi zenin kiritu site sikirinaosi ninarukotomoatta. mata, honban kuno syutuzyousya niha zizen ni yosen ga okonawa reteori, yosen de rakusen sita syutuzyousya heha sankasyou tosite tikinraamen hukuro ga kubara reta.
nissin ziettosyoo ninattekaraha, ton no kuizu oyobi santaku ha kawa ranaiga, kondo ha sekai no no daitosi wo issyuu suru keisiki de mondai ga dasa re, ton zenmonseikai mono niha syoukin manen to tikinraamen nenbun no hokani, oranda koukuu niyoru sekaiissyuuryokou ga okura reta. mata, setto nouti kaitou seki to tyuuou no kaidan ha huhen dattaga, kaidan no ueno seikadai ga rondon wo tyuusin nisita eitohu zuhou niyoru sekaitizu ni henkou sareta.
ruuto
atene ga itibanue, zyunban ni itidan zutu ori te itibansita ga toukyou. seinan azia minami azia tounanazia higasi azia toitta ruuto ga tora reta. nao, touzi naha ha hondo henkanmae de, amerika no senryouka niatta. pataan ha ikano touri atta. saisyo ha pataan de hazimari, notini pataan ni aratame rareta.
pataan atene girisya

housoukyoku
huziterebi seisaku kyoku kayou
sendaihousou sendaihousou
hokurikuhousou suiyou
toukai terebi terebi
kansai terebi terebi
nihonkai terebi terebi
hirosima terebi terebi
yamagutihousou yamagutihousou
sikoku housou housou
kyuusyuuasahihousou terebi nisinihon nisinihon
kumamoto housou housou
bangumisyuuryougo
zenzyutu notoori toukyou orinpikku syuuryougo mo tuzuke rareta honban kumi daga, nen gatu niti no housou womotte syuuryou sita.
bangumisyuuryou kara nen ka getugo no nen gatu niti niha, tanpatu tokubetubangumi waku terebigurandosupesyaru dai ki doyou de, nin no geinouzin wo kaitousya nisita sizyousaidai no kuizu tosite ribaibaru sareta.
nen gatu niti ni huziterebi kaikyoku syuunen tokuban tosite housou sareta kaikyoku syuunen tokubetukikaku huziterebi tosihumi hizou ikkyo daikoukai nioite honban kumi wo saigen surutoiu kikaku ga housou sareta. honban kuno setto mo saigen saretadasi doubangumi deha nissinsyokuhin ha suponsaa ni tuka nakattatame, kaitou seki zenmen niha nissinsyokuhin no mozi hanaku, kawari ni huziterebi no sinborumaaku ga egaka reteita, sikai ha akasiya sanmato kusuda eriko, syutudai no sokuratesu yaku ha honban kuno sikaisya datta katura kogane osamu ga tutome ta. syutuzyousya ha anaunsaa, direkutaa rawo hukumu huziterebi no syain nin de, mondai ha subete huziterebi no rekisi ni kansu rumonoga syutudai sareta.
nen gatu niti ni housou sareta supesyaru natuyasumi maturida wassyoi no koonaa tosite yoru kagiri no hukkatu. housoubi no heisei nen gatu niti ni tinami, syoukin ha man en ni settei. sikai ha akasiya sanma, utida yuki, nakaimiho, hukui kenzi, kondou sato touzi huziterebianaunsaa . honban kuno sokuratesu yakuni soutou suru huziterebi no ikizibiki yaku wo tuyuki sigeru ga tutome ta. syutuzyousya ha ore tatihyoukin zoku menbaa too nyan ko kurabumenbaa de kousei sareta geinouzin tiimu, huziterebi no anaunsaa, syain, touzi huziterebi syaoku gaatta sinzyukuku kawata mati kinrin no zyuumin, sinbun zassi kisya, rekoodo kaisya syain nado goukei nin de, mondai hasubete huziterebi no rekisi ni kansu rumono.
tokukizikou
touzi no manen ha, genzai nen touzi no yaku , manen ni soutou suru tyoukou hitai no syoukin deattakotokara, soutou na nari monoire ride kaisi sareta bangumi deari, kaisi syuukanmae no nen gatu niti kara housou kaime no gatu niti madeno syuu niwatatte sankeisinbun ni bangumi koukoku ga dasa reta. sarani kaisigo no koukoku niha kouhyou no seibu no taiketu haowarimasita. konsyuu kara atarasiku touzyou no tizyousaidai no kuizu nigo seien kudasaito maebangumi seibu no taiketu no syuuryou kokuti tuki no messeezi ga soe rareta.
honsen kuizu ha subete to santaku dearuga, syoukin ga tyoukou hitai deatta kawari ni soutou no haireberu na mondai bakarideatta. koreha, notini honban kumi to onazi ku ku kuizu keisiki wo saiyou sita amerika oudan urutorakuizu nadonimo uketuga reteiru.
nissin ziettosyoo tonatta saisyo no kai ha, puro yakyuuzin taikai to meiuti, touzi no puro yakyuusensyu ya kooti, sarani touzi pasifikkuriigu sennin kaityou datta nakazawa huzio raga syutuen sita. kekka ha, kyozingun no pittyaa datta huzita motosi ga migoto ton zenmonseikai si, syoukin manen sekaiissyuuryokou tikinraamen nenbun ga okura reta.
maisyuu regyuraa housou sareru kozinsanka kata no kuizu bangumi de, syutuzyousya mei ha, nen gatu gatu housou no mei ga syutuzyou sita rakkiikuizu saadotti asahihousou seisaku, touzi ha keiretu ga kaisi sarerumade saikoukiroku datta.
honban kuno housoutouzi ha kouseitorihiki iinkai no oopun kensyou ni taisuru kisei ha naku, syoukin manen to kaigairyokou wo douzini kakutoku surukotomo kanou datta. sono noti ha, nen kara nen made kisei gakakerareta.
kantoutiku deha, nen gatu kara nen gatu made maisyuu kinyou ni saihousou sareta.
kyakutyuu
syutten
sankeisinbun sankeisinbun
terebi nen gaido toukyou nyuusu tuusinsya
bizyutu ha mita setto ura kara mita seisaku ura hanasi gettointouyuu ha, nen ni ririisu sareta daniiminoogu no maime no sutazioarubamu dearu.
gaiyou
nippon deha zensaku zyanputouzabiito ni hikituzuki aruhu a rekoodo kara hatubai.
syouyuuzaueitougoo ha zyakusonzu ga nen ni hatubai sita gakkyoku no kavu aa, disuizuitto ha merubamuua ga onazi ku nen ni hatubai sita gakkyoku no kavu aadearu.
syuurokukyoku
kyakutyuu amerikanpiitipai gendai ha, nen no amerika eiga. paramaunto seisaku. uiriamusieikusupia no romanteikkukomedi zyuuni yoru wo gensaku ni, gendaihuu ni arenzi sita sakuhin dearu.
sutoorii
zyosi sakkaa bu no sutoraikaa tosite katuyaku suru vu a iora. aru niti, kanozyo no sakkaatiimu ga haibu tonari, dansi sakkaa bu heno nyuubu mo kotowara rerutoiu ukime niau. sonnatoki, vu a iora no hutago no ani sebasutyan ga singakki wo sabo ri, myuuzisyan wo mezasi te rondon he tatu, sokode, vu a iora ha sebasutyan ninarisumasi gakkou he sennyuu, dansi sakkaatiimu ni nyuubu suru. buin tatinimo mitome rare zyuntyou niikukani omowa reta vu a iora. sikasi, nise sebasutyan no kanozyo ha zyosiseito no orivia ni hore rare, zisin ha tiimumeito no deyuuku ni koi wosi, deyuuku ha orivia ni hika reru, to omowa nu tenkai ni. sonna naka, nanimo zizyou wo sira nai honmono no sebasutyan ga kaetu tekuru.
kyasuto
vu a ioraheisuteingusu amandabainzu amandabainzu
deyuuku tyaninguteitamu tyaninguteitamu
dinkureizi viniizyoonzu viniizyoonzu
dahune zyuriihagadi zyuriihagadi

maria keiteisutyuwaato keiteisutyuwaato
koutyou deividdokurosu deividdokurosu

ivoonu ziesikaruukasu ziesikaruukasu
moniiku arekusandoraburekkenrijzi arekusandoraburekkenrijzi
rozyaa zyonpaipaa zyonpaipaahu aa gason gason

nihongo hukikae kyasuto
oriviarenokkusu kinosita sa hana hana
vu a iora nagata ryouko ryouko
deyuuku kase yasuyuki yasuyuki
kyakutyuu
kanrenkoumoku
kanozyo ha haisukuurubooi onazi ku zyuuni yoru wo gensaku tosuru amerika no gakuen mono eiga.
gaibu rinku
kousiki uebusaito uebusaito
eigo
eigo
eigo
eigo satoru si tisiha syunzyuu zidai no tyuugoku no sizoku. douzoku dearu tyuukou si to tomoni susumu no rikukei wo sesyuu sita. satoru you no dai niha take wo sinogu ikioi wo eta gasono sei wo osore ta tyou si, gi si, kan si niyotte horobo sareta.
gaiyou
motomoto ha susumu no bukou, ken kou ni tukae ta zyun iki wo so tosuru zyun si deatta. zyun iki no mago niataru zyun kubi ga satoru timei ni huuzi raretakotokara satoru si to yoba reta. rekidai tousyu ha rikukei ni nin zerare hokano go si tyuukou si, han si, tyou si, gi si, kan si to tomoni susumu no kokusei wo sayuu sita. nao tyuukou si ha zyun kubi no ani dearu zyun hayasi titi wo so tosuru douzoku dearu.
satoru no dai ni kokunai no arasoi ni zyouzi te tyuukou si to han si wo kokugai ni tuihou sita. satoru no mago no satoru you ha ryousi no ryouti wo tyou si, gi si, kan si no kan de wake youtosi, touzi no susumu no kunsyu deatta syutukou to tairitu sita. syutukou ha sei ya ro to musubi satoru si rawo uto utositaga, tatakai ni yabure toubou nakani naku natta. aratani aikou ga kunsyu tosite sokui sitaga zikken hanaku, tyuukou si to han si no ryouti no daibubun wo yuusi ta satoru si ga kokunai no saidai seiryoku tonatta. satoru you hasaranaru seiryoku kakudai wo hakari, nokotu ta san si tyou si, kan si, gi si nimo ryouti wo youkyuu si, yuiitu youkyuu ni sitagawa nakatta tyou si wo kan si, gi si to tomoni seme ta. sikasi, tyou si no tousyu dearu tyou mu zyutu no settoku niyori kan si, gi si ha tyou si gawa ni negaeri, gyakuni tyou si raniyori horobo sareta sinyou no tatakai . satoru si no ryouti ha san si niyotte bunkatu sare, notino san susumu ga tanzyou suru sitazi tonatta.
rekidai tousyu
satoru sousi zyun kubi nen nen nen
tomotake ko zyun nen nen nen
satoru tou ko zyun ei nen kigenzen nen nen
tomohumi ko satoru kigenzen nen nen nen
satoru nobuko satoru saru nen nen nen
satoru zyou ko satoru you nen nen nen
keizu
sankousiryou
syunzyuu hidari si den
siki susumu seika ki kokusyou kou kokusyou, nen gatu niti nen gatu niti , konan syou syou sato syussin no tyuugoku no tirigaku mono. zi ha umihei toitta.
syougai
ki kokusyou ha, nen ni tyousa no masa rei daigaku genzai ha nakaminami daigaku no itibu tonatteiru syou masa igaku in no zensin wo sotugyou sita. sono noti, amerika gassyuukoku he ryuugaku si, ieeru daigaku rigaku kenkyuu in, sikago daigaku tirigaku kei ni manabi, tyomei na zinbun tirigaku mono deatta eruzuwaasuhanteinton ni sizi si, syuusigou wo eta. nen ni kikoku si, kokuritu tyuuoudaigaku nankin tirigaku bu no kyouzyu wo hete, peepin sihan daigaku tirigaku bu kyouzyu kengaku bu syunin tonatta. nen niha tyuugoku tirigaku kai hukukaityou ken zimukyokutyou ni sensyutu sareta. dounen tiri kyougaku ga soukan sareta. kouniti sensou nittyuusensou ga boppatu suruto, sou zengo site seian rinzi daigaku, tuide sorega kaiso sareta kokuritu seihoku rengou daigaku no tirigaku bu syunin, seihoku sihan gakuin seihoku sihan daigaku no zensin rekisi tirigaku bu syunin, saraniha, seihoku sihan gakuin no intyou dairi wo tutome ta. dounen, zyuukei de gyousei in kanri tyuuei koukan touzi kai ga sousetu sita tyuugoku tiri kenkyuusyo no syodai syotyou ni nin zirareta. nen niha, gakuzyutusi tiri wo soukan sita. nen niha, tyuuou sekkei kyoku iin, kuiki sekkei kumi kumityou tonatta. nen ni minsyu kagaku zadankai kuzou gaku sya no zensin no tatiage ni sanka si, nen niha kuzou gaku sya no zyoumurizi ken zimukyokutyou ni eraba reta. dounen, peepin pekin ni modotu te, hutatabi peepin sihan gakuin tirigaku bu kyouzyu kengaku bu syunin tonari, sarani kyoumu syunin, rigaku in intyou mo daikou sita. nen ni tyuugoku tigaku kai ga saiken sareruto, hukukaityou ken zimukyokutyou wo hikitui da.
tyuuka zinmin kyouwakoku ga seiritu sita noti, ki kokusyou ha hikituzuki pekin sihan daigaku de kyouin wo tutome ta. nen niha, tyuugoku tigaku ato tyuugoku tirigaku kai no gappeigo, syodai no tyuugoku tirigaku kai no rizityou ni eraba reta. nen, tisiki bunsi sisou kaizou undou no saityuu ni, kuzou gaku sya to tyuugoku tirigaku kai no syokumu wo toka reta. nen ni in kei tyousei no notini ha, seihoku daigaku sihan gakuin, seian sihan gakuin, sensei sihan daigaku no tirigaku bu kyouzyu wo rekinin sita. bunkadaikakumei no tokini ha hakugai sare, nen gatu ni huzin no han yuki in totomoni kubi wotutte zisatu sita. meiyokaihuku ganasaretanoha yonin kumi ga zikken wo utu te ikou nokotodeatta. nen niha, seitan syuunen wo kinen sita gyouzi ga kuzou gaku sya niyotte moyoosa reta.
kyakutyuu
sankoubunken
tyuugoku kagakugizyutu kyoukai, . tyuugoku kagakugizyutu sen kaden ryaku ryaku rigaku hen tigaku kan san . tyuugoku kagakugizyutu syuppansya
gaibu rinku
ki kokusyou zinbun tirigaku ie . tyuugoku suuzi kagi kan. nen gatu niti eturan. dai kai zennihon bareebooru senbatu danzyo riigu dai kaizennihon bareebooru senbatudanzyo riigu ha, nen gatu niti kara nen gatu niti nikakete kaisai sareta, zennihon bareebooru senbatu danzyo riigu tuusyou, nippon bareebooruriigu, nippon riigu no dai kaime no taikai dearu. nen niwatari tuzui tekita nippon riigu ha kontaikai wo mote syuuryou si, rainen yori riigu ni koromo kae suru.

siai houhou
kaisen souatari no tuuzyou riigu tatakawo okonai, sarani zyoui tiimu niyoru kaisen souatari no kessyou riigu sen wo okonai, yuusyou tiimu wo kettei suru. tuuzyou riigu no seiseki ha motikosa nai.

kanrenkoumoku
puremiariigu bareebooru
