gaibu rinku
riigu kousiki saito dai kai nippon riigu yuusyou
riigu kousiki saito dai kai nippon riigu yuusyou hitati takehara si takeharasiha, hirosima ken no si. huruku kara setouti no koutuu no yousyou tosite hatten sita. muromatizidai yori minatomati tosite sira re, edozidaikouki ha seiengyou de sakae ta. genzai ha aki no syoukyouto to yoba re, nen ni kokudo koutuu syou niyotte, matinami tiku ga tosi keikan sen ni sentei sareta.
tiri
hirosima ken no nantyuu bu ni iti suru. sigaiti ha, takehara eki wo tyuusin tosite senzyou ni hiroga ru kankoutyou syougyouti ku, minato wo tyuusin tosita kouwan kougyouti ku, bunkazai ga syuutyuu suru ziin nado wo hukumu matinami hozon tiku ni taibetu sareru. mata, si no tokusanbutu dearu takenoko nadono santi dearu obuki tiku nadoni bunrui sareru.
rinsetu suru zititai
higasi hirosima si si
mihara si si
rekisi
ganrai, konden einen sizai hou niyori, kyouto simogamo zinzya no syouen ti tosite kaikon saretanoga saisyo tosareruga, namae no yurai ha, take no hara nanoka arui ha syouen kanrisya ga takehara si deattakarakani waka reteiru. muromati kouki niha, mouri ie mituo takakage ga, takehara de yousyouki wo sugo sunadoattaga edo kouki no sioda to syuzou niyori hatten si, tadanoumi mati niha sekisyo harai gadekitahododearu. mata, sio hasono touzi hirosima ken ga zenkoku no no sieaa wo sime tooku oosaka ya edo made kitamae hune de yusou sita.
takasi, takehara si no takasaki mati awa sima syuuhen no sunamerikuzira kaiyuu kaimen ga nen syouwa nen ni tennenkinenbutu hogo siteisa reteiru. koreha nendai made suzuki nadono sakana wo sunameri wo mezirusi ni turu dentou gyohou niyotte siteisa retamonodearu. sikasi hogo sitei nimokakawarazu, sunameri ha gensyou si, genzai kono ryou ha okonawa reteinai. nao, kono kanren sisetu tosite miyazima suizokukan ga siteisa reteori sunameri mo siiku sareteiru.
enkaku
katuteha mura touri de takehara mura to simotuke mura towo kugiri, mati mura de naritatu teita.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti kamo gun takehara mati simotuke mura ga gappei si takehara mati dai ga hossoku. konotokiniha mura nouti mura hodowo zizen tougou sumi dearu.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti touhoku bu ni ata ru kamo gun higasino mura to toubu no toyoda gun daizyou mura, oyobi nanpou mura zi tateisi nado no kuiki nouti itibu wo hennyuu.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti kamo gun syouno mura, toyoda gun tama satomura to gappei.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti kamo gun toyoda gun no gun iki saihen syousai ha kakugun no kizi wo sansyou niyori douzitu tuki de toyoda gun no syozoku tonaru.
nen gatu niti toyoda gun kiti namura, ga nagamura ooaza zinka nouti kamo gun saizyou mati he hennyuusa reta kuiki igai wo hennyuu.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti toyoda gun takehara mati, tadanoumi mati ga gappei si siseisikou. takehara si ga hossoku.
saigai
nen gatu niti tabakono hi no husimatu kara daikibo na yamabi koto ga hassei. mihara sigawa hemo ensyou site syousitu menseki ha ni tassi ta. hirosima ken niokeru heisei nenkan de banme no kibo.
nen gatu niti heisei nen gatu gouu saigai ga hassei. kamogawa ga hanran site douro ga sundan saretahoka, sinai kakuti de sinsui ya dosekiryuu, gake kuzure nadoga tasuuhassei sita. sisya nin, zyuutaku zenkai ko nadono higai nohoka, mihara si ya intaachenzi heno koutuu ga syadan sare, rikuro niyoru akusesu ha sarani ooki na higai wo uke ta kuresi houmen nomitonari, itizi ha riku no kotou zyoutai ninatta.

takehara si kankoukyoukai kankoukyoukai
tizu mappuasiperimoara , nen gatu niti ha, kubotasupiaazu hunabasi toukyou bei ni syozoku suru ragubiiyunion sensyu.
purofiiru

pozisyon ha nanbaaeito , rokku .

nihondaihyou ni eraba retakotogaaru.
raireki
nen, nihonkoukuu isikawa sotugyougo, tenridai manani iru. nao nihonkoukuu isikawa koukouzidai, koukou nihondaihyou ni eraba retakotogaaru.
nen, sanurubuzu no rensyuusei ninaru.
nen, kubotasupiaazu hunabasi toukyou bei ni kanyuu.
syutten
kanrenkoumoku
koukou ragubii nihondaihyou nihondaihyou
ragubii nihondaihyou nihondaihyou
nihonkoukuu koutougakkou isikawa isikawa
tenridai gaku ragubii bu bu
kubotasupiaazu hunabasi toukyou bei bei
gaibu rinku
kubotasupiaazu hunabasi toukyou bei sensyumeikan sensyumeikan
sanurubuzu sukoddo sukoddo
asiperimoara sieihu aa haundo ha, gensaku bai samurai takasi, sakuga katayamamakotoniyoru nippon no manga. yanguanimaru arasi hakusensya nite, nen gou kara nen gou made rensai. hukudai ha sensya to sira rezaru zyosei butai .
gaiyou
dainizisekaitaisen kouki no doitu gun wo egaki, onna tatiga yousya naku korosi au manga dearu. syoumouhin dearuto zisyou si, sinu kotowo osore nai zyosei butai ga kanawo korosi, mikata moassari sin deyuku. raitaa notamagomagoha, nen kara nen gatu ni hatubai sareta komikkusu no naka kara onnanoko ga tatakau manga tosite honsaku wo hittou ni age teiru.
syuzinkou yuuto no nakama wo sina setakunaitoiu nayami ga dokusya ni hukaku kyoukan wo atae ruto tomoni, egaka reru sensya no untiku no omosirosa, akusyonsiin ha tanzyunni manga tositenokakkoyosamoaru.
komikkusu kan hatubaizi niha, akihabara no syosen bukkutawaa nite sain kai ga kaisai sareta.
nao, sakuga wo tantou surukatayamamakotono kousiki saito ueni te seruhuparodii koma manga tou ritu sieihu aa gakuen ga keisai sareteita nen genzai dehakatayamaganite keisai siteiru.
arasuzi
dai hanasi hanasi
komikkusu kan ni syuuroku. yuuto ga tyakunin suru izen, anna ga zonmei datta gorono hanasi.
hokyuu miti tonaru isibasi ni ta houtou sensya zyuu sensya de isuwaru rezisutansu ni taisi, kaya to anna ha hasi no ryoutan karano totugeki tatakawo kankou. rezisutansu no haizyo niha seikou surumonono, kanzin no isibasi wo hakai sitesimai, zyoukan dearu sukorutuenii ha atama wo kakae ru.
dai hanasi hanasi
mura wo senryou si, murabito wo gyakusatu, boukou suru rezisutansu wo haizyo surutameni, sieihu aa haundo ha hiruma kara syoumen totugeki wo sikake ru.
rezisutansu ha haizyo dekitaga, sangou totugeki hou ha sensya tyou no anna wo nokosi taiha. anna mo murabito no syouzyo ni gisou sita rezisutansu kara bakuyaku iri no basuketto wo tewatasa re, bakusi sita.
sisouteki na mondai kara busou sineitai de kansyoku nituiteita yuuto ha, daigaku no senpai demoaru sukorutuenii ni yobidasa reru. sukorutuenii ha, yuuto ni sieihu aa haundo no syoutaityou ni tyakunin si, daremo sina setakunaitoiu kangae wo zissen suruyouni meizi ta.
tui so ren ren
komikkusu kan kan
yuuto tyakunin notino saisyo no sigoto ha, ekibyou ga hassei sita mura ni wakutin wo todoke rukotodatta. syoumen karano zinsoku na koudou wo teian suru kaya ni taisi, yuuto ha oohaba na mawarimiti wositemo anzen na ruuto deno singun wo teian suru.
yuuto no yomi touri, mura ha rezisutansu ni senryou sareteori, taisensyahou nadode syoumen kara kuru sieihu aa haundo wo geigeki suru taisei ga totonoe rareteita. korewo mikata no higai naku haizyo surukotoni seikou suruga, zituha kono rezisutansu ha otori deari, syuuhen teisatu ni deta maita ha maruto hikii ru so rengun ni torae raretesimau. kaya ha butai zentai no anzen wo kouryosi hituzi kikan no maita wo houti site tettai wo singen suruga, yuuto ha maita no sousaku wo meizi ta.
zenra no maita wo soukousya no bonnetto ni kukuri tuke, tate tosite kougeki sitekuru so rengun ni kusen surumo, dounika gekitai ni seikou si, maita no kyuuzyo nimo seikou suru.
sikasi, teiigeru ga hidan sita saino syougeki niyotte naisou de toubu wo kyouda siteita mika ga sentougo ni inoti wo hikitotu ta.
tui amerika amerika
komikkusu kan kan kan
norumandii zyourikusakusen ni sakigake te, amerika gun ha kuuteibutai wo huransu ni kouka sase, reedaa kiti nadowo hakai suru sakusen ni deta. sousita kouka butai no tuga zyosei wo syutai tosuru gureiokkusu deatta. keisou bi nagaramo sinsyutukibotu ni reedaa kiti wo hakai site mawaru gureiokkusu ni taisuru geigeki meirei ga sieihu aa haundo ni kudaru.
yuuto to maita ha ryokousya wo yosootu te senryouka no huransu no mura wo teisatu nakani gureiokkusu tai to souguu. gureiokkusu tai no taityou kyatarina to kaiwa sitakotode, yuuto ha zibun no sinnen ga yura gi hazime ru.
gureiokkusu ga daikibo senryoku dehanaikoto, syousuu wo ika sita kidou sen ga tokui dearukotowo yonda yuuto ha, gureiokkusu ga haison de bouei zin wo siku youni simuke keru. ippou no kyatarina mo yuuto rano seikaku wo yonde geigeki zin wo totonoe ta. sikasi, kouhou de siki wo toru to omowa reta yuuto no teiigeru ga haison ni totugeki site zyuurin. teiigeru ha kaya ga siki siteitanoda.
hagesii sentou no matu, hitori nokotu ta kyatarina ha, yuuto ni siro demo kuro demonai haiiro no seigi wo katari, kaori to ikki uti wo kurihiroge, tuiniha kirikubi sareru.
tui igirisu igirisu
komikkusu kan kan kan
igirisu deha kita ahurika sensen kara tokusyubutai asiddoauru wo syouhei si, norumandii zyourikusakusen ni sakigake ru kouhou kakuran sakusen ni tuke ta. mikata no sonmou wo kouryosi nai amira no sakusen niyotte, ha zyuubun na soubi wo motikomu kotoni seikou sita.
atikoti kosyou sita teiigeru wo syuuri surutame aake, marii, yuuka ha doitu kokubougun no hikouzyou ni taizai siteita. sokowo amira no butai ga syuugeki. aake, marii, yuuka ha hikouzyou ni nokosa reteita gou sensya de ousen surumo ritai wo hougeki sare kakuza.
kyuuhou wo uke kake tuketa yuuto tatiga mita noha, nabura rete kousyukei nisareta nin no itai deatta.
no honsitu ga karu gawa dearuto handan sita yuuto ha, nin ga inoti kake de seibi si intoku siteita teiigeru de mizukara otori tonari, kaya no sangou totugeki hou wo ukai sasete haimen kara kyougeki suruto tomoni, hohei ya sogeki hei no teiana rawo mori no nakani huse teoki asiddoauru wo senmetu sita. bakuhatu tyokuzen ni tyarenzyaa zyunkou sensya kara koroge dasi te bakusi kara manukare ta amira ha yuuto ni kouhuku wo mousideru. sokohe kaya ga warikon dekite, yari tori no matu, korosu kati mo nai ga, ika siteoku kati hamotto nai to amira wo syasatu suru.
touzyouzinbutu
sieihu aa haundo
seisiki niha busou sineitai dai ryouhei daitai syozoku tokumu kyuuzyo ryouhei syoutai. zyosei no senzyou deno unyousei wo siken surutameno hikoukaibu tai dearu.
yuutotu a isu sineitai zyoukyuu soutyou soutyou
tosi. doitu gun sineitai syozoku. daigaku no senpai dearu sukorutuenii syousa no inoti niyori, sieihu aa haundo no syoutaityou tosite tyakunin suru. gisei wo dasa nai tatakai wo risou tosuru. kaya iwaku huryouhin . butai deha teiigeru sensya no sensya tyou wo tutome ru.
kayakuroitu sineitai soutyou soutyou
tosi. sangou totugeki hou sensya tyou. sieihu aa haundo no syoutaityou daikou dattaga, yuuto no tyakunin niyori huku syoutaityou ni koukaku tonaru. yuuto no tyakunin wo kokoroyoku omowazu, zisin ga subete wo senzyou no koma tosite sakusen wo suikou surutameka, yuuto no risouron nimo hankan wo oboe ru. tokui na sakusen ha zinsoku na syoumentoppa . butai no nakama ga sensi suru do ni, ike ni sakana wo hoututu teiru.
kizoku no iegara deari, gunzin no ani to, oya dousi ga kime ta iinazuke syousai ha kouzyutu gairu.
maitagadouwan sineitai soutyou soutyou
tosi. kaya no hosa wo tutome ru huku syoutaityou. musen siki kuruma tantou. teisatu butai tosite, zyouhou bunseki ya teisatu wo ninmu tosuru.
aakenovu a tanaave sineitai gunsou gunsou
tosi. teiigeru sensya housyu. okappa atama ga tokutyou no muudomeikaa. itininsyou ha boku . marii, yuuka to teiigeru sensya no seibityuu ni asiddoauru no kougeki niyotte torae rare, nabura reta notini kousyukei nisareru.
mariinooru sineitai gunsou gunsou
tosi. teiigeru sensya souten te. ottoritosita seikaku de, aikidou wo tokui tosuru. aake, yuuka to teiigeru sensya no seibityuu ni asiddoauru no kougeki niyotte torae rare, nabura reta notini kousyukei nisareru.
mikakaanaa sineitai gotyou gotyou
tosi. teiigeru sensya souzyuu te. itazura suki na mekamania. rosukasutanie deno sentouzi ni, tyakudan no syougeki de toubu wo sonsyou, yuuto no ude no naka desono syougai wo oe ru.
yuukaivu sineitai gotyou gotyou
teiigeru sensya souzyuu te. mika no hozyuu tosite butai niyatte kita. kassyoku ga tokutyou. souzyuu ginou oyobi seibi ginou ha takai. aake, marii to teiigeru sensya no seibityuu ni asiddoauru no kougeki niyotte torae rare, nabura reta notini kousyukei nisareru.
annaadaa sineitai gunsou gunsou
tosi. yuuto ga tyakunin suru mae made, sangou totugeki hou sensya tyou. rezisutansu tono sentoutyuu ni zyousya siteita ga hidan, taiha. anna nomiga ikinokoru. sikasi sentou syuuryougo, wana nikakari bakusi sitesimau.
mihitohiruda sineitai soutyou soutyou
tosi. sangou totugeki hou souten te. sikkari mono no kakure kyonyuu.
keisindoraa sineitai gunsou gunsou
tosi. sangou totugeki hou kansoku te. megane ga toreedomaaku de, tantan tosita seikaku. mihito to tomoni, kaya to yuuto no kankei wo kini siteiru.
myuumaituen sineitai gotyou gotyou
tosi. sangou totugeki hou souzyuu te. syousinmono no dozi tu musume.
aimatouyousyu sineitai ittouhei ittouhei
tosi. musen siki kuruma untensyu ken, kango hei.
teianakaanedii sineitai zyoutouhei zyoutouhei
tosi. sogeki te. kawai kaodati wositeiruga, soretoha urahara ni yousya naku, tatoe teki ga zyosi tomo dearoutomo aiyou no taisensya raihuru de yousya naku uti nuku. so rengun no koyoote tono sentou deha yuuto kara taikou yaku wo makase rareruga, sogeki te dousi no taiketu ha ude izyou ni aizyuu no karyoku ga mono wo ii, koyoote no sogeki de kaya ga heddosetto wo tuke teita sokutoubu ni keisyou wo otu tanotoha taisyouteki ni, kanozyo no sogeki wo uke ta koyoote ha doutai ga makoto tu hutatu ni sake te zetumei sita.
riosyatani zyoutouhei zyoutouhei
tosi. kikanzyuu te. wo ayaturu tikaramoti.
riiahairohassyu sineitai zyoukyuu gunsou gunsou
tosi. hohei han hantyou. aihi to konbi wo kumu.
aihimizuu sineitai gotyou gotyou
tosi. totugeki hei. riia to kanpeki na tuumanseru wokonasu.
katura kaori katura kaori dainipponteikoku rikugun soutyou soutyou
tosi. dainipponteikoku karano gunzi ryuugakusei. nihontou wo buki tosuru.
kuzuno maria kazuno maria dainipponteikoku rikugun gunsou gunsou
tosi. kaori to onazi ku, dainipponteikoku karano gunzi ryuugakusei. kaori no hosa no hoka, sentoukiroku mo tantou suru.
ahato ahato
tosi. sekigan no gunyou inu. teisatu ya sakuteki wokonasu zyaamansiepaado no siro hensyu howaitosiepaado. ahato ha doitu go de hati no imi.
yuuto ga tyakunin surumadeha, sieihu aa haundo yuiitu no otoko deatta.
sentou sineitai
ottoosukorutuenii ottoosukorutuenii
zituzai no zinbutu. kaikyuu ha sineitai syousa. sidan tyou deari, sieihu aa haundo ni meirei wo kudasu sireikan demoaru.
monogatari kouhan nite, sizitu to douyou ni amerika gun ni gisou siteno tokusyu sakusen ni zyuuzi suru.
torisutansyutoraihi sineitai tyuusa tyuusa
noaru tokumukikan no kikantyou wo tutome ru dansei. kaya no iinazuke. sukorutuenii toha douki.
kaya no iinazuke dearuga, kanozyo heno taido hadokoka togetogesiku, awaya gekkou sikaketa kanozyo wo sukorutuenii ga seisi suru hitomaku moatta heta wosureba zyoukan hangyaku tumi ninarutame.
suimenka nite, amerika, igirisu, huransu, sobieto, nippon, doitu, hokano menbaa karanaru zinrui wo mitibiku sonzai wo zisyou suru himitusosiki ni sankaku siteiru.
doitu gun
huyukaritamooraa syoui syoui
doitu kuugun daisan koukuu kantai boukuu siken butai syozoku no zyosei tyuui. tuusyou, huyuka.
asiddoauru niyoru hikouzyou syuugeki no yuiitu no seizonsya. fokkeuruhu pairotto.
kanarazu ryouki ga gekitui sare tandoku kikan surutame guremurin toiu humeiyo naada mei gaaru.
adoruhugaarando adoruhugaarando
zituzai no zinbutu. doitu kuugun tyuusa. zietto sentouki no oyobi ni touzyou.
syottyuu huyuka wokarakatteitaga, zinkusu touri ni ryouki wo usinai, otikomu huyuka ni taisi zettai ni oti nai ryouki tosite kyousen suruto tomoni, kuusen no kokoroe wo denzyu suru.
sandoraoohamaiaa taii taii
doitu kaigun de booto kantyou wo tutome ru zyosei. komikkusu kan demo kaomi se teido ni touzyou suruga, komikkusu kan de honkaku touzyou. i kai no goei wo itta.
so rengun
marutosaganohu marutosaganohu
kaikyuu ha tyuui. rezisutansu ni sensya wo teikyou surunadosite sieihu aa haundo heno kougeki wo okonawa se, youha karada yoku riyou surudakeno sonzai no rezisutansu ga kaimetu notini mizukara no butai de wana wo sikake tutu takumi ni kougeki surumo sippai ni owa ru. zituha zyosei de, sore yue kaiwayuru syouri notamenara syudan wo eraba nai gunzin nagara, zyosei dearu maita wo torae ta notini zenra nisite tate ken sieihu aa haundo heno sarasi mono nihasitamonono, boukou no taguha itte inai. mata, kaikyuu ue ha zyoukan dearu tomoronohu ni taisi te reigitadasi ku sessu rutoiu, mikata ni taisi teha hunbetu aru taido de nozomu itimen wo motu.
tomoronohu tomoronohu
kaikyuu ha taii. koyoote no sisyou.
ziitisaabe ziitisaabe
kaikyuu humei. tomoronohu taii no desi de, koyoote to yoba reru binwan sogeki hei. sono sogeki gizyutu ha honmono de, senzyou deha hutatu mei no koyoote no meide hiroku sira reteiruga, roua mono nanokamatomoni kotoba wo syabera zu, kuti kara hassu runoha unari koe noyounamonodakedearu. mata, teno tume wo kamu kuse gaaru.
amerika gun
amerika rikugun dai kuutei sidan tokusyu sakusen syoutai gureiokkusu .
kyatarinasyumitto kyatarinasyumitto
gureiokkusu syoutaityou. tosi. kuroi aipatti wositeiru zyosei. aipatti wositeiru migime ha siryoku ha nokotu teiruga sikisai kan ga naku natteiru. zyuuki ya syuryuudan no atukai ha ikkyuu daga, saidai no tokuiwaza ha zyuuken wo naihu no youryou de atukau sekkinsen de, senzyou deha tuneni yobi no hun wo hukume ta hukusuu no zyuuken wo syozisi teiru.
butai ga kaimetu sita noti, kaori to tui de tatakau monono yabure, sibou suru.
igirisu gun
igirisu gun tokusyubutai asiddoauru .
amirakoosiisu syousa syousa
asiddoauru taityou no zyosei. tyarenzyaa zyunkou sensya no sensya tyou.
eikoku kizoku no ide ari, amira woo zyousama to sitau risa, tia toiu zyuni ga buka niiru.
sentou wo kari to syousi, butai no songai wo kaerimi nai songai wo hera soutosezuni buturyou wo youisu ru. risa, tia mosono yousu wo kiniitu teori, butai nai de yameru mono hainai.
asiddoauru ga sieihu aa haundo ni kaimetu saserareta saini ha, hitori ikinokori, toukou si seitou na horyo tositeno kenri hosyou wo youkyuu surumo, kaya ni syasatu sareru.
nihongun
daitou a ron oohigasi aron tyuui tyuui
dansei. nippon kara zyuuyoukimitu no hin wo doitu ni yusou suru. katura kaori, kuzuno maria toha mensiki gaaru.
mata, torisutan to tomoni aru himitusosiki no menbaa demoaru.

sieihu aa haundo haundo

kettenkuraato omoni maita ga touzyou si, teisatu nadoni siyousa reru.

warusaa
i kai i wo beesu tosita kuusou kan de, nippon kara doitu ni zyouto sareteiru settei. komikkusu kan deno tokusyu ninmu no saini sieihu aa haundo wo soubi teiigeru goto yusou sita.

nen gatu niti hatubai

nen gatu niti hatubai
syutten kyakutyuu dai kai toukyoukokusai eigasai dai kai toukyou kokusai eigasaiha, nen gatu niti hi kara gatu niti ki syuku no nitikan ni kaisai sareta toukyoukokusai eigasai.
gaiyou
dai kai toukyoukokusai eigasai ha, nen gatu niti kara gatu niti no mani konpeteisyon bumon no sakuhin entorii wo uketuke ta. oubosousuu ha hon datta.
gatu niti, animeesyon tokusyuu tosite eigakantoku hosoda syu no sekai ga, bumon nai de kantoku tokusyuu iwai syunzi ga okonawa rerukotoga happyou sareru.
gatu niti, oopuningu sakuhin ni madamuhuroorensu yumemi ruhutari, kuroozingu sakuhin ni hiziri no seisyun ga kettei sitakotoga happyou sareta.
kurasikku bumon deha kabukiza supesyarunaito no kaisai mo happyou sareta.
niibe mon tosite tosi kara syougakusei wo taisyou nisita tirudoren , tyuukousei wo syuzinkou ya syudai nisita sakuhin wo atume ru teiinzu no seturitu ga happyou sare, gatu niti ni toukyoukokusai fooramu de animesongu no ibento ani no kaisai mo happyou sareta.
gatu niti niha, indonesia eiga no tokusyuu tosite kokusaikouryuu kikin aziasentaa karahuru indonesia ga happyou sareta.
gatu niti ni rainnappu happyoukai ga okonawa re, zen rainnappu to konpeteisyon bumon no sinsain ga happyou sareta.
konpeteisyon bumon no puroguramingudirekutaa ha yatabe yosihiko. azia no mirai bumon ha isizaka kenzi.

kyakutyuu
gaibu rinku
kousiki uebusaito kousi enerugii kousi enerugii, ha kessyou kousi wo kousei suru gensi, bunsi aruiha ion ga kitai zyoutai kara kotai kessyou ninarutokino gyousyuu enerugii dearu.
kousi enerugii ha zettaireido niokeru gyousyuu entarupii henka elta no oto site teigi sareru. kinzoku kessyou oyobi bunsi kessyou deha zettaireido niokeru syouka netu ni soutou suru. kousi enerugii ha tokuni ion kessyou ni kanrensi te ronzi rarerukotoga ooi.
, elta . kousi enerugii .
kousi enerugii no sansyutu
borunhaabaasaikuru yori
ion kessyou no kousi enerugii ha, ion ka enerugii, densi sinwa tikara, seibun genso no gensi ka netu, oyobi seisei atuka ra borunhaabaasaikuru wo motiite motome rukotogadekiru. enka kariumu wo reini toru to ikano youninaru.
borunhaabaasaikuru ni motozu ku harogen ka arukari no kousi enerugii ha ikano youninaru. kousi enerugii ha ion hankei ga tiisai hodo ookiku, mata denka ga ookii hodo ookiku naru. kousi enerugii ha niokeru atai dearuga in nomonoha . niokeru atai dearu. sikasi ondo ga kotona ttemo teido no sa desikanai.
harogen ka gin no . niokeru kousi enerugii ha ikano touri dearu. koreranituiteha tanzyunna ion ketugou dehanaku kyouyuuketugou no kiyo ga ookii.
atai you ion dearu arukari doruikinzoku kagoubutu deha kousi enerugii ha ookiku naru. in nomonoha . niokeru atai dearu.
seiden enerugii ni motozu ku keisan
kousi enerugii ha kessyou kousi no seiden enerugii niyori rironteki ni suitei surukotogadekiru. kono siki ha nen ni makkusuborun to niyori dousyutu saretamonodearu.
mazu,
no kyori de ketugou siteiru denka
no you ion to denka
no in ion wo mugenen ni hiki hanasu tameni hituyou na seiden enerugii ha ikano youninaru. kokode
epsilon epsilon
ha sinkuu no yuudenritu,
ha denki moto ryou dearu.
pi pi
epsilon epsilon
moru no you ion to in ion karanaru kessyou wo kika sasete, tagaini mugenen ni hiki hanasu tokini hituyou na enerugii ha ikano siki de arawasa reru. kokode
ha abogadoro teisuu,
ha kessyou kousi nakano aru ion ni taisuru syuui no ion tono seidenki tikara no souwa wo arawasi ta keisuu de maaderungu teisuu to yoba reru.
pi pi
epsilon epsilon
mata ion ha goutai tama dehanaitame, tagaini sekkinsu ruto hanpaturyoku ga hataraki, hanpaturyoku ha kyori
ni taisi te
de arawasa reru. kessyou naka deha ion mano seiden inryoku to hanpaturyoku no goukei ga saisyou tonaru kyori
de heikou tonari, kessyou zentai no seiden inryoku to hanpaturyoku ha ikano youninaru. kokode
ha ion no ookisa ni kanrensi, harogen ka arukari no baai, ion ga ikano mare gasu densihaiti wo toru toki , , , , noyouninari, you ion oyobi in ion nituiteno
no heikinti wo motii ru. mata
ha zikkenteki na sokuteiti dearu kessyou no assyukuritu kara motome tamonowo motiite moyoi.

pi pi
epsilon epsilon
korerano siki yori kousi enerugii ha ikano rironsiki de arawasa reru. tadasi, aruiha noyouna aruiha no ion kessyou nituiteha maaderungu teisuu ni denka ga hukuma reteirutame, tomoni you ion oyobi in ion denka hasorezore
,
to oku.
pi pi
epsilon epsilon
kono siki niyoru keisanti ha ikano youninaru.
korerano keisanti hahobo zikkenti ni tikai atai wo atae ruga, zissai no kessyou ha kanarazusimo kanzen na ion ketugou dehanaku, aru teido no kyouyuuketugou sei wo motu tame kanzen na ion kessyou tosuru katei ga tadasii wakedehanai. sarani keisan no seido wo kouzyou saserutameniha hanpaturyoku nituiteno rironsiki no kairyou, hu a nderuwaarusu tikara niyoru kiyo, oyobi zettaireido demo sonzai suru sindou enerugii dearu reiten enerugii mo kouryosu ru hituyou gaaru.
sono hokano bussitu no kousi enerugii
kinzoku no niokeru syouka netu ha ikano touri dearu. in nomonoha . niokeru atai dearu. ippanteki ni hutten no takai monohodo ookii.
bunsi kessyou no niokeru syouka netu ha ikano touri dearu. ion kessyou oyobi kinzoku kessyou to hikaku site ippanteki ni tiisai atai tonaru.
kousi enerugii no imi
kousi enerugii ha ion ketugou, kinzoku ketugou oyobi bunsikan tikara no sihyou nohitotudeari, yuuten oyobi hutten to missetu ni kankei gaaru. mata ketugou enerugii ha ko no ion kan, gensi kan oyobi bunsikan no inryoku ni kansu rumonodearuga, kousi enerugii ha kessyou toiu syuugoutai zentai no ketugou enerugii ni soutou suru. mata kousi enerugii ha, ion hankei oyobi bunsi no keizyou niyoru ryuusi no zyuuten pakkingu no anteido mo kankei suru ten ga ketugou enerugii toha kotonaru.
mata youkai do tono kankei nituiteha kousi enerugii mo ooi ni kiyo suruga, youbai nagono eikyou mo ookiku tokuni suiyoueki nioiteha suiwa mohobo douteido ni kiyo suru. ion kessyou no youkai do nituiteha, kousi enerugii ha ion hankei no tiisai monoga ookiku youkai do wo sage ru houkou ni kiyo suruga, douzini ion hankei no tiisa na ion ha tuyoku suiwa si, koreha youkai do wo age ru houkou he kiyo suru. mata denka no ooki na ion kessyou ha kousi enerugii ga ookii ga, douzini suiwa enerugii mo ookii. sunawati kousi enerugii to suiwa enerugii no kaneai de youkai do ga kima ru. tatoeba harogen ka arukari nituiteha, ritiumu sio deha youkai do ha tonari, sesiumu sio deha dearu. koreha ritiumu sio no baai, ion hankei no tiisai ritiumuion ga attouteki ni tuyoku suiwa si in ion wo hukume ta zentai tositeno suiwa enerugii haamari henkase zu, kousi enerugii ga youkai do niyaya tuyoku kiyo siteirunoni taisi, ooki na you ion wo motu sesiumu sio deha kousi enerugii no saga tiisaku, in ion no suiwa no teido no saga youkai do niyori ookiku kiyo siteirukotoniyoru. harogen ka gin no youkai do nituitemo, in ion no suiwa gayori tuyoku kiyo siteiruga, koreha kyouyuuketugou no kiyo ga no zyunni kousi enerugii ni kuwawa ri, ion hankei ga zouka suruhodoniha kousi enerugii ga gensyou sinaitamedearu.
kyakutyuu sankoubunken
kanrenkoumoku
bougen direkutori ei ha, konpyuuta no hu a irusisutemu nioite, hu a iru wo guruupu kasu rutameno tokusyu na hu a iru de, seiri kanri nadono mokuteki de katuyou sareru. direkutori no nakani mo, tuuzyou no hu a iru dakedenaku ireko tekini direkutori wo tukutu te, nini no kaisou wo mota sete kanri dekirukotogahotondodearu.
hu a iru no iremono youki nadotomo hyougen sare, deha bungu no forudaa noyouna metahu aade hyougen sarerukotoga ooi. tadasi, buturiteki na youki dearunohanadono media sonomonodearunode, direkutori ha hu a iru heno midasi no iremono to hyougen suru houga seikaku dearu.
gaiyou
ya , . izen nonadodeha direkutori to yobi, deha foruda to yon deiru. ikou no ekusupurooraa deha kasouteki na kaisoukouzou dearu sieru namaekuukan ga dounyuu sare, foruda to kosyou suruyouninatta. tatoeba, kontoroorupaneru ya nettowaaku, assyuku forudaa nadoha, hu a irusisutemu ueno direkutori toha kotonaru kasouteki na foruda dearu.
nadodeha yuiitu no saizyoui no konkan ruuto, ruutodirekutori gaari, sutoreezi ya boryuumu paateisyon nadono naiyou ha, nini no eda mauntopointo ni maunto tugi ki sareru, toiu turii ki moderu tonatteiru. soreni taisi, oyobideha, saizyoui ha doraibu toiu tani deari huroppii no baai de akiraka nayouni, disuku tani dehanai. nao, paateisyon nadoni taisi doraibu wo wariate teirukotoha ooi , kaku doraibu ni taisi tesorezoreno media no ruutodirekutori gaatte, sorezoreno turii gaaru, toiu suugaku deha hayasi aruiha mori to yon de, ki to kubetu surukotogaaruyouna moderu tonatteiru.
direkutori niyori nini no hukasa no zissaini ha kouzyutu suru zettai pasu no saidaityou nadotosite seigen gaarukotomo ooi ga kaisou wo kousei surukotoga kanouna sisutemu deha, sisutemukooru ueno hu a iru no sitei wo, karentodirekutori kouzyutu no idou to hu a iru no sitei noyounisite betubetu ni okonawa nakerebanaranai sisutemu moaruga, nado ooku noyouni direkutori mei direkutori mei direkutori mei hu a iru mei noyouni separeeta bunri hu de bunri suru hyougen niyoriippenni okonae rumonomoaru. separeeta ha, deha surassyu , deha koodo ga no mozi dearuga, no separeeta no toiu koodo ha deha bakkusurassyu daga, deha hankaku enkigou , dearunado deaete touituka sarezu nokosa reta koodo deattatamemoari, sono imi ni konran saserareteiru mono ga ooi.
separeeta ga tukae ru sisutemu deha sentou wo separeeta de hazime runadono houhou niyori, ruutodirekutori karano zettaiteki na hyougen de siteisi ta pasu wo zettai pasu ya hurupasu to yobu. soreni taisi te, karentodirekutori kouzyutu nado, nanrakano nini no direkutori kara soutaiteki ni soutai pasu siteisu rukotomodekiru.
nadodeha, purosesu no motu zokusei tosite, karentodirekutori aruiha waakingudirekutori gaaru. sono purosesu ga hakkousu ru sisutemukooru nakani oite, soutai pasu de siteisa reta baai no kiten tositenado deforuto no direkutori tosite tukawa reru. ko purosesu no kidouzi niha, sono zitende no oya purosesu no karentodirekutori ga hikituga reruka, meiziteki ni siteisu rukotogadekirumonomoaru. gensoku tosite ko purosesu ha oya purosesu ni eikyou wo atae rukotogadekinaitame, sieru no karentodirekutori wo henkou surutoiu komando ha gaibu komando tosite zissou surukotogadekinainode, kanarazu sieru no naibu komando tosite zissou sareru.
niha direkutori no naiyou wo hyouzisu ru gaibu komando tosite komando gaari, niha, soutou suru komando tosite gaaru. nao, no. niha, soutou suru kinou wo motu naibu komando gaari, niha, soutou suru komando tositetogaaru.
nadodeha, yuuza gotoni hoomudirekutori ga settei sareteori hu a iru nadode, sono yuuza no roguin notino saisyo no purosesu tuuzyou ha sieru no syoki karentodirekutori gasoreninaru. tuuzyou, sono yuuza ga syoyuusya de dokusyo ki kanouni settei sareteori, sono sitani yuuzaa kozin no hu a iru wo oku kotoga ooi.
wohazime ooku no sisutemu deha, direkutori nakano hu a iru mei seikaku niha, direkutorientori no zyunban wo yuuza ga hensyuu surukotohadekinaino komando ya, sieru deno niyoru tenkai deha, tuuzyou ha sooto sarerutamewakaranaiga, no opusyon nadode zissai no zyunban wo kakunin dekiruga, deha hikakutekiyoui ni tyokusetu disuku no naiyou wo kaihen site hensyuu dekitatame, ya maikurodeeta no ekorozii siriizu nado, sonoyouna hensyuukinou wo motu hu a iru kanri sohuto moatta.
syouyou ya, nadoiwayuru kei no sisutemu deha, niokeruni soutou suruyouna kihonteki na yuuteiritei taguha subete, kaaneru to onazi puroziekuto tosite izikanri sareteiruiwayuru beesusisutemu ni hukuma reteirutame, tuuzyou ha kaku sisutemu no deforuto no haiti ga siyousa rerutame mondai ga oki rukotoha sukunai ga, deha izen ha disutoribyuusyon gotonimatimatideattatameni mendou na sagyou nadoga hituyou ninarukotogaattatame, niyori hyouzyunka ga hakara reteiru.
hugou iti
de hyougen sareru direkutori foruda no aikon ha, emozi tosite . kara syuuroku sareteiru.
tyuu
gaibu rinku
no direkutori kousei kousei

niokeru direkutori kousei kousei
dai kai kaku direkutori no yakuwari wo siro u ruutodirekutori hen
dai kai kaku direkutori no yakuwari wo siro u sabudirekutori hen
oyobi no hu a irusisutemu no kouzou sakae sakaeha, akitaken kitaakita si no ooaza. yuubinbangou . honkou deha douti iki nikatute sonzai sita kitaakita gun sakaemura sakaemuranituitemo sirusu.
tiri
kitaakita sityuusinbu no touhou ittai niataru. nisi de tuzuri ko zaimoku mati asahimati isetyou takanosu waki kami, minami de komori, kita de oodate sigai kawara, higasi de oodate sidai hi sugisawa hinai mati sirasawa mizusawa hinai mati kotubo sawa to rinsetu suru.
hokusei wo komedai kawa ga nagare, hokubu wo akitaken miti gou oodate takanosu sen ga, tyuuou wo akita miti ga tuuka suru. seitan no kokudou gou takanosu baipasu soi niha oogata syougyou sisetu ga sinsyutu siteiru. nantou gawa ha santi ga sime ru.

enkaku
nen meizi nen kinsei irai no oota nitta mura ma touson ga gappei site sakaemura ga seiritu.
nen meizi nen gatu niti tyouson sei no sikou niyori, sakaemura ga tandoku de zititai wo keisei.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti sakaemura ga takanosu mati bou sawamura siti za mura sawaguti mura to gappei si, aratame te takanosu mati ga hossoku. douzitu sakaemura haisi.

gaibu rinku
kitaakita siyakusyo mina raten mozihyouki , girisya go munuha, doryoukou, tuuka no tani dearu. kyuuyakuseisyo zidai kara tairyou no kikinzoku wo hakaru tameni motii rareteiru.
omosa tositeno mina ha paresutina, ugaritto no tuuzoku siekeru wo kizyun tosureba, guramu ni soutou suru. kahei no baai ha, mina ha denari ni soutou sita. koreha, touzi no roumusya nitibun no routin dearu.
seisyo no youhou
iesukirisuto ha nin nosimobenotatoede, kono mina wo motiite iru.
soromon ou ha tate hitotu ni mina no kin wo motiita.
babiron hosyuu kara kikan sita tami ha, sinden saiken no kouzi notameni, goukei mina wo sasage ta.
ezekieru ha mina wo siekeru niseyoto katatu teiru.
sankoubunken
sin seisyo ziten inotinokotoba sya, nen nen
kanrenkoumoku
seisyo no kahei kahei
seisyo no doryoukou sekerunosaurusu ha, tyouban me tyoukyaku amoku hadorosaurusu ka no syokubutu syoku kyouryuu. namae no imi ha kirihanasa reta tokage . nao, minami amerika de seisiki ni namae gatukerareteirunoha, sekerunosaurusu nomidearu.
kaseki ga mitu katta basyo
sekerunosaurusu no kaseki ha aruzentin de mitu katteiru. minami amerika de hazimete hakken sareta hadorosaurusu ka no kyouryuu de, kuritosaurusu to dousyu tomo kangae rareteiru.
zentai no tokutyou nado
ookisa ha m teido de, hadorosaurusu ka deha kogata. mannen mae yorimo sarani mae ni, kita amerika tairiku kara watatu tekitato omowa reru.
kyakutyuu oyanagi usaburou oyanagi koyanagi usaburou, nen tenpou nen gatu nen taisyou nen gatu niti ha, bakumatu no syouya, meiziki no seizika. syuugiingiin, niigataken nisikanbara gun syoukiti sontyou. ookawatu bunsui kensetu no kourousya.
keireki
etigo kuni kanbara gun higasinaka mura gen niigatasi nisikan ku higasinaka de syouya no ie ni umare ru. tyouzen kan de kangaku wo manabi, keihan tihou wo yuugaku. tosi de katoku wo souzoku sita.
meizi nen nen ookawatu bunsui kouziyou ben kakari ni syuunin. sono noti, niigataken kaigi in, syoukiti sontyou nadowo rekinin. nen, kokkai kaisetu konbou kyougikai no seigan kisou iin, douhon butyou ni syuunin. nisikanbara gun ziyuu tou wo sosiki si, hokusin ziyuu tou rizi, etusa doumei kai hyougiin nadowo tutome, yamagiwa sitisi wo hosa site kennai no ziyuuminken undou nadowo suisin sita.
nen gatu, yamagiwa no sikyo ni tomonau niigataken daiiti ku no dai kai syuugiingiin sousenkyo hoketu senkyo ni syutuba site tousen. sono noti, dai kai, dai kai sousenkyo demo tousen si, syuugiingiin wo tuusan san ki tutome ta.
ookawatu bunsui kouzi no saikai ni zinryoku si, niigataken tisui awo sosiki site tyuusin tonatte katudou sita. bannen ni hutatabi syoukiti sontyou wo tutome ta.

sankoubunken
syuugiin sangiin hen gikai seido hyakunen si syuugiingiin meikan ookurasyou insatu kyoku, nen.
nozima syuppan hensyuubuhen niigataken kenmin hyakkaziten nozima syuppan, nen.
sakai sinzaburou etusa meisi roku etusa meisi roku kankou kai, nen. simizu kugi kiti simizu teikiti, keiou nen gatu niti nen gatu niti syouwa nen nen gatu niti ha, nippon no zitugyouka. simizu kumi daihyoutorisimariyaku syatyou. kyuusei ono.
ryakureki
nen keiou nen miyazu hansi ono taka ei no zinan tosite, edo ni umare ru.
nen meizi nen keiougizyuku kara toukyou eiwa gakkou ni tenzi, meizi nen koubu daigakkou ni nyuugaku.
nen meizi nen teikoku daigaku kougakubu kentikugakka sotugyou.
dounen, simizu kumi dai simizu mansi zyo no mukoyousi tonari bunke.
sotugyougo, kousyu gakkou kougakuindaigaku no zensin de kyouben wotoru wotoru

kazoku
zippu ono taka ei miyazu hansi hansi
tuma take simizu kumi syatyou simizu mansi zyo no musume musume
tyounan tosio gakuhu ni kudan seika koutou zyogakkou koutyou sawa hidesaburou syaku sinpati no yousi
tyouzyo bun yokohama no bouekisyou moriyasu taki saburou no ko taki san no tuma. taki san no ane no otto ni okazaki kyuuzirou, takahasi kore huku gairu. taki san no oi ni moriyasu syoutarou.

disukogurafi
gaibu rinku
eigo heisei nen taihuu dai gou heisei nentaihuudai gou, azia mei , firipin mei ha, nen gatu ni hassei si, firipin ya betonamu nadoni zindai na higai womotarasita taihuu dearu. tokuni firipin deha, dounen gatu ni oki ta mayon yama no hunka toaimatte rahaaru ga hassei si, ruson sima nadode higai gayori kentyo tonatta.
gaiyou
nen gatu niti, firipin no higasi de taihuu gou ga hassei si, azia mei dorian to meimei sareta. meimei kuni ha tai de, sono mei no touri kudamono no dorian wo imi suru. nao, firipin taiki tikyuubuturi tenmon kyoku hakono taihuu nituite, firipin mei remingu to meimei siteiru. taihuu ha firipin houmen ni muke te seisin si, niti niha yappu sima ni sekkinsi te dou sima wo kyouhuu iki ni makikomi, higoro karaha kyuusoku ni hattatu si, wazuka niti de mo tyuusin kiatu ga teika site, hizyouni tuyoi seiryoku tonatta. sosite niti gozen ni firipin no ruson sima nanbu ni zyouriku. nisi ni oudan site ittan ha ragai wan ni nuke ta noti, hutatabi han sima bu ni zyouriku sita. ruson sima wo oudan noti ha minami sina umi he nuke, sono noti betonamu nanbu ni sai zyouriku site, tairando wan nioite syoumetu sita.
eikyou higai
kono taihuu ha, firipin to betonamu ni tokuni ooki na higai womotarasita.
taihuu no tyokugeki wo uke tata ruson sima deha, dounen gatu ni hassei sita mayon yama no hunka toaimatte rahaaru to yoba reru gensyou ga oki, sanpuku ya sanroku nadoniatta kazan taiseki mono ga deiryuu kasi te, karyuu no syuuraku ya nouti, koukyousisetu nadoni osoi kakari, sisya nin yukuehumeisya nin toukai kaoku yaku ko toiu higai ga hassei. taihuu no sekkin ni tomonai, mayon yama syuuhen deha niti no gozentyuu kara huuu ga tuyoma ri, toki kara toki madeno zikan uryou no soukei ha wo koe ta. sunawati, heikin site zikan uryou izyou no gouu ga zikan mo tuzui takotoninaru. kono syuutyuugouu niyori, arubai syuu regasupi si nado mayon yama syuuhen no kouhani niwatari daikibo na deiryuu saigai ga oki ta.
firipin kokunai deno sougouteki na zinteki higai ha sisya nin yukuehumeisya nin husyousya nin tonatteiruhoka, hisaisya kazu ha man , nin nimo nobori, higaigaku ha oku man doru ni tassi ta.
betonamu deha sisya nin yukuehumeisya nin husyousya , nin no zinteki higai ga hassei sitahoka, bannin ga hisai si, man ken mono kaoku ga higai wo uke, keizai higai oku , man doru tonatta. betonamu nanbu ha tei ido toiukotomoari, tuyoi taihuu no raisyuu haamari ooku naku, tatoe seiryoku ga otoroe tutuaru taihuu deattemo higai ga kakudai siyasui.
sono hoka
kono taihuu no azia mei dorian ha, kono taihuu kagiri de siyoutyuu tomato nari, zizyun karaha mankutto toiu azia mei ga siyousa rerukotoninatta. sikasi mankutto mo, nen no taihuu gou kagiri de siyoutyuu tomato nattatame, saisyuuteki niha kuratoon toiu azia mei ni okikaera reta.
saranikono taihuu no firipin mei remingu mo, douyou nikono taihuu kagiri de siyoutyuu tomato natte, zizyun karaha rubii toiu firipin mei ga siyousa rerukotoninattaga, kono firipin mei mo nen no taihuu gou kagiri de siyoutyuu tomato nattatame, zizyun karaha roziita toiu firipin mei ga siyousa rerukotoninattaga, kono firipin mei mo nen no taihuu gou kagiri de siyoutyuu tomato nattatame, saisyuuteki niha rosaaru toiu firipin mei ga siyousa rerukotoninatta.
kanrenkoumoku
mayon yama yama
gaibu rinku
dezitaru taihuu taihuu gou sougouzyouhou kiatu keiro zu kokuritu zyouhougaku kenkyuusyo kenkyuusyo
firipinmayon kazan kazan deiryuu saigai tyousa ippan zaidanhouzin sabou ti suberi gizyutu sentaa sentaa
zyaanaru gatugou firipin taihuu gou
firipin taihuu higai
uikimediakomonzu niha, heisei nen taihuu dai gou ni kansu ru kategori gaarimasu.
kyakutyuu haruno anzu haruno anzu, nen gatu niti ha, nippon no zyosei seiyuu. kanagawakensyussin. aatubizyon syozoku.
ryakureki
tyuugakusei no goroni anime suki no doukyuusei kara seiyuu no sonzai wo siri, koukou nensei no goroni nippon nareesyon engi kenkyuusyo no panhuretto wo toriyose, nin to hanasu noga nigate na nin demo kayoe ruto kaka reteori, nin to hanasu kotoga nigate dattakotokara, niti nare ni kayoe ba zyouzu nisyabereruyouninarukamosirenaito omotta kotogakikkakede, yokohama kou ga kaikou sita nen ni doukou ni nyuusyo suru. niti nare sotugyougo, aatubizyon ni syozoku.
nen, to hu a mi toori niyoru geemurabo nite, imaizumi rionatotoiu yunitto wo kumu.
nen gatu niti, taityouhuryou niyori katudoukyuusi si, nyuuin site tiryou ni sennen surukotoga syozokuzimusyo no aatubizyon kara happyou sareta.
zinbutu
itokenasa no nokoru syouzyo noyouna koe ga tokutyou. genki na yaku kara otitui ta yaku made enzi rukotogadekiru.
aatubizyon no syoukai peezi niaru sanpuruboisu no naka de, zisin no warui tokorotosite, geemu no hatubaibi ni purei wohazime kuria surumade nena i, syokuzi moamaritoranaito katatu teori, douzini zibun no ikikata dearuto nobe teiru. matakono seikatu wo suunenkan tuzuke teori, paateiimenbaa wo sodate ru taipu no geemu ha zenin ga sodatu made nena itoiu.
purofiiru niha tokugi doramu, syumi sakkaa kansen, karaoke, ryouri, ongakukansyou to kinyuu sareteiru. yokohama marinosu no sapootaa.
syutuen
hutozi ha meinkyarakutaa.

razio
ha intaanetto haisin.
tensin kou sinzin seiyuu yotu domoe razio nen, tyou

syutten
gaibu rinku
haruno anzu kabusikigaisya aatubizyon kousiki purofiiru purofiiru
haruno anzu
haruno anzu no purofiiru gazou syasin zaterebizyon zaterebizyon
haruno anzu seiyuu meikan seiyuu guranpuri guranpuri
haruno anzu orikon orikon
haruno anzu suugaku deha, ritti heitan tayoutai ha, ritti kyokuritu ga dearu riiman tayoutai dearu. buturigaku deha, ritti heitan tayoutai ha, nini no zigen de utyuuteisuu ga dearu riiman tayoutai ni taisi te, ainsyutain houteisiki no ruizi dearu sinkuu kai wo arawa su. ritti heitan tayoutai ha, tuuzyou ha utyuuteisuu ga dearu hituyou hanai ainsyutain tayoutai no tokubetu na baai dearu.
ritti kyokuritu ga, tiisa na sokuti you no tama no taiseki ga yuukuriddo kuukan no nakano tama no taiseki kara itudatu suru ryou wo hakaru. tiisa na sokuti you no tama ha, taiseki no kae hasinaiga, yuukuriddo kuukan no nakano hyouzyunteki na tama toha katati wo kae rukotomoariuru. tatoeba, ritti heitan na tayoutai no naka deha, yuukuriddo kuukan no nakano en ha, henkei sarete onazi menseki wo motu daen tonatteirukotomoariuru. koreha wairu kyokuritu nookagedearu.
ritti heitan tayoutai ha, horonomii gun wo seigen sareru baai ga ooi. zyuuyouna keesu tosite, karabiyau tayoutai ya tyou keeraa tayoutai gaaru.
kanrenkoumoku
wairutensoru atusi kiri zieison atugiri zieison, nen gatu niti ha,
amerika gassyuukoku syussin no zainiti kigyou yakuin, o warai tarento. watanabeentaateinmento syozoku. honmyou ha zieisondeividdodanieruson .
keireki
amerikamisigan syuu syussin. sintyou . haha to enzinia no titi to ka gatu ueno ane gairu. tiisa na goro kara bengaku ga tokui de dasa reta syukudai wo gakkou kara kitaku suru kuruma no naka desassatositesimauyouna kodomo dattato nobe teiru. sono yuusyuu sakara, tyuugakkouzidai niha koukou karikyuramu de benkyou siteminaika to teian sareta. tosi no toki nen ni misigan syuuritudaigaku ni tobikyuu nyuugaku si, sono noti irinoi daigaku aabanasyanpeen kou daigakuin ni nyuugaku sotugyou sita.
nen ni houniti si nippon ni nenkan taizai. asahikasei nioite amerika eigo taiou onseininsiki sohuto no kaihatu kenkyuu ni zyuuzi. kono tokini mita enta no kamisama nihonterebi kei no omosirosa ga kiniiri, nihongo no benkyou notametosite ooku noo warai bangumi nadode ooku no geinin no neta wo miru. nao, o warai bangumi nominarazu terebidorama moyoku mite ori, suki na sakuhin tosite sen geba , ikebukuro uesutogeetopaaku , taigaa doragon wo age teiru.
nen houniti tokini siriatu ta nihonzin zyosei to nen ni amerika de kekkon. nen gatu niti no zitende, nin no musume gairu. huyoukazoku gairutame, kaisya yakuin mo yame rarenaitonokoto.
nen ni nihongonouryoku siken kyuu gen reberu soutou , nen niha dou siken kyuu gen reberu soutou wo syutoku. genzai mo nihongo syuutoku notame, kanzi no kaki tori ha hinpan nisiteiru. mata nihonsi mo benkyou siteiruto nobe teiru. kanzi no kaki tori nadono benkyou nioite syouzi ta soboku na gimon wo motoni neta wo tukuru koto ga ooi. mata, onazi ku kanzi no neta hitomozi wo motu no gorugo matumoto ni neta woyoku mise te zyogen wo irai siteiru.
sono noti amerika ni kikoku si, herusukea ni tensyoku. notini ha hutatabi houniti siteo warai geinin woyaritaito iu omoi ga tuyoku nattaga, geinin woyarutoiu riyuu deha biza ga kudari naito nayan deiru goroni sun deiru sikago no kanren kigyou ga nippon ni sinsyutu site nippon houzin wo seturitu suruto kiki, koreni sanka site nen ni toniti.
aru niti, zabunguru no eigyou wo mini itta saini, kankyaku no naka de tikara ga tuyoso una nin wo erabi udezumou de taisen surutoiu kikaku de zieison ha hissi ni te wo age, katou ayuni eraba rete katou to taisen kekka ha zieison no kati . kono toki kara katou tono kouryuu ga hazimari, kaisya wo yame nakutemo geinin wo mezase rutosite katou ni watanabekomedisukuuru no doniti koosu wo susume rare, nen gatu ni kisei tosite watanabekomedisukuuru nyuugaku. dou sukuuru sotugyougo no nen gatu ni watanabeentaateinmento syozoku tonari debyuu.
nen gatu niti housou no sokuhou ariyosi noo warai daitouryousenkyo terebi asahi ni syutuen site bekkii ga zessan sitakotowokikkakeni, siruhito zo siru youna sonzai ninatteitta. nen gatu niti ni kessyousen ga okonawa reta guranpuri de kessyousinsyutu. guranpuride gaikokuzin no kessyousinsyutu ha hatu deari, geireki saitan kiroku geireki ka gatu mo kousin sita. mata nen gatu niti ni kaisai no guranpuri demo kessyousinsyutu, nen renzoku de hu a inarisuto tonatta.
nen ni bentyaa kigyou terasukai ni nyuusya. dousya no beikokuhouzin no tatiage ni tazusawa ri, douhou nin no hukusyatyou ni syuunin. nen genzai deha, terasukai hontai no guroobaruaraiansu zigyoubutyou oyobi dousya kogaisya no kabusikigaisya terasukaibentyaazu no torisimariyaku mo tutome teori terasukai no kabusiki wo man kabu tyou motu kabunusi demoaru, syagyou too warai geinin towo ryouritu saseta katudou wo itte iruga, syagyou nioite geinin sigoto notame hankyuu wo totu tari torisimariyakukai wo totyuu de nuke tarimositeirutoiu. hongyou ha nani to towa rerukedo, hongyou toiu kotobazitai ga kirai. koreha ningen ningen sigoto toiu imi ga kome rareterundesuyo. hongyou igai no koto ha dekina idesyouka toiu imi ga kome rareteiru. bokuha ningen zieison. subete ga hongyou. . o warai geinin tositedakedehanaku, terasukai syain senmonka tosite, honmyou no zieisondeividdodanieruson meigi deno kouen mo kazuooku itte iru.
mata, enzieru tousika tosite bentyaa kigyou no kabusikigaisya uirugeeto ni tousi wositeiru. uirugeeto daihyou no kozima nasi ki toha onazi nenrei dearu.
zisin nono forowaa kara uke ta zinseisoudan nimo teinei ni kotae teori, nen gatu nihasorerawomatome, nippon ni taisuru zisin no teigen wo itizirusi ta syoseki nippon nominasannio tutae sitai nowo hatubai. sono naka demo nobe rareteiruga, nihonzin no seikatu ya roudou sutairu, syoukansyuu nituiteha mawari no iken ni sayuu saresugi, tiisa na goro karasousurubekidato osie koma reteiru muda na kaigi, sagyou, siryousakusei ga oosu girunado, kokono iken ya katudou wo sontyou si, roudou genba womotto gourika subekidearutoiu iken wo motu teiru.
tarento katudou de eru syuunyuu nohoka, kaisya deno yakuin housyuu, sikago ni syoyuu siteiru mansyon no yatinsyuunyuu moaru. mata, hatu houniti sita tosi notokiha taizyuu ga moari, karoriidaietto to zyogingu ni idomi yaku hera si gen taikei ni itatu ta. genzai demo zyogingu wo nikka tosi, syuttyousaki demo zikan wo mitu kete kazu no hasiri komi wo itte iru. nen gatu niti niha toukyou marason no dansi no bu de syutuzyou si, zikan hun byou de kansou.
nen, no tokubetu sentei iin ni syuunin.
nen gatu, you no eigo gakusyuu apurikeesyon atusi kiri eitango wo hatubai. eiwaziten nadoniokeru eitango wo nihongo de setumei dehanaku eitango wo eigo de setumei wosurukotode neiteivusupiikaa niyori tikai eigo no kankaku wo minituke saserukotowo mezasi teiru. syuuroku ha zieison zisin ga itte iru. sono hoka, kousiki burogu ha nihongo to eigo no ryouhou de onazi naiyou no kizi wo kai teori, eigo ni sitasimu kikkake tukuri wo kokoro gaketeiru.
nen gatu kara tere noeigodeasobo nite, kodomo tatini eigo wo osie ru zieison hakase tosite regyuraa syutuen.
zinbutu
geimei no atusi kiri zieison ha, zisin ga munaita ga atui kototo kanagawaken atugisizaizyuu toiukotoga yurai tonatteiru.
kyouwatou sizisya. donarudotoranpu no daitouryou syuunin wo uke te, seizi keiken ga mattaku naikarakoso sekai ni sigeki wo atae tekurerunodeha. keizai wo risetto sasetekureruto komento siteiru. nen nimo, toranpu sannimo warui tokorohatakusanaruto omou ga, keizaiseisaku deha hyouka surutokoroha hyouka surubeki toranpu sanwo sizi siteiru nin ga nen daitouryousenkyo no sou tokuhyousuu bannin izyou irutoiu zizitu ha mitome tekara kangae teikanaitoto ziron wo tenkai sita. ippou de, korona taisaku notameniha minsyu tousei ken no houga o tagai gaman siatte kyouryoku site mondai wo kaiketu siyoutoiu ugoki ni kitai dekiru kozin no ziyuu wo yuusen suru kyouwatou yorimo minsyu tou no houga hayaku kessoku nitunagaruto omoi taitomo katatu ta.
geihuu
kanzi ha muzu kasii nippon no kanzi ni kansu ru zieison no gimon.
iti ni san to yokobou tuzuki nanoni tuga ikinari si to housoku ga kawa ru.
ten wotukeruto motono kanzi tomattaku tigau imi no kanzi ninattesimau dai ni ten wotukeruto ta inu ni henkasu ru.
tokutei no busyu ni tyuumoku si, sono busyu ga tuku kanzi no neta wo renzoku site hirou suru rei subete onna ga tuku kanzi no baai, si nado.
kanzi to katakana de onazi katati wositeiru mozi rei, kou kouto e katakana noeya kuti kutito ro katakana noronado.
singouki ha ao ki aka to hyouki sareteirunoni zissai no aosingou ga aoiro de hyougen sareteinai. ippou ryokutya ha mozidoori ryokusyoku dearuyouni syoku ni taisuru ninsiki ga ittei dehanai.
zekkyou sinagara yuuutu zyoukyou niyotteha tyuutyo ya dekoboko to kaki, oboe rudakede zyuubun yuuutu ninaruyo tyuutyo no baai ha oboe runowo tyuutyo sityauyo, dekoboko no baai hamohaya kanzi zyanaiyo tetorisu dayo to uttae ru. sositemoukore izyou kanzi wo oboe runoha akirame masu. izyou to itte syuuryou suru. nippon no hokori nippon no bunka ni kansu ru gimon.
koi noboriha itibansita kara kodomo, haha, titi no zyunban de naran deiru, nara itibanue ha sohu ninarunoni sui nagasi wo tuke teirunoha nazeka.
nihonzin ha zinzya no sanpai wo hizyouni teinei ni okonau noni, kamisama ga zyoutu ta sinyo wo ranbou ni katugu noha nazeka.
kisyou eisei himawariniyoru haireberu no tenkiyohou no gizyutu gaarunoni, hare te hosii tokini teruteru bouzu ni tayoru nohaokasii.
o iwai nadoni mizuhiki ya hurosiki nado musubi wo taisetu nisurunoni, sarariiman ga yotu parauto atama ni nekutai wo musubu noha nazeka.
yamatonadesiko wo daihyou sitehina ningyou ya bunkin takasima ta wo daihyou suru sensai na bi no bunka gaarunoni, hagoita de make rutodousite sumi de kao ni rakugaki wosurunoka.
setubun ni oni wo taizi surutamenidousite daizu wo buki tosite tukau noka.
dezome siki de hasigo nori wo hirou surutoki, dousite hasigo de sakadati wosurunoka. kotowazani kansu ru gimon gimon
kusatu temo tai syokutyuudoku wo oko sudarou sudarou
sititen bi yaoki ki kaiten ndara kai okiaga ru, kai okiaga runohaokasii runohaokasii
kaeru no ko ha kaeru kaeru no kodomo ha otamazyakusi darou darou
make ruga kati make terundakara kati zyanaidarou zyanaidarou
asi wo arau some tanoha teda rou warui kotowo hazime ru toki ha te wo some rukara zyukugo ni kansu ru gimon gimon
ningen hito sonomonowo arawasu noni nin no kan tohadouiukotoka tohadouiukotoka
tyakuhuku huku wo kiru to kaku noni warui kototosite atukawa rerunohadouiukotoka rerunohadouiukotoka
hissi kanarazu sinu naramonogotowoyaru imi ga nai darou konto kokorobosoi
matiawase zikoku ninattemo konai nihonzin no yuuzin ni, hayaku kuru you saisoku no denwa wosuru gaikokuzinryokousya wo enzi ru. sono kiwa, hazimete nippon ni kita nimokakawarazu, imai ru basyo wo hizyouni komakaku setumeisu ru hoka, matu teiru saityuu ni deatu ta nin ni nihonzin kaomake no komakai mitiannai wosuru. sono tudo kokorobosoi watotubuyakinagara yuuzin wo mati tuzuke rutoiu naiyou. korerano neta wo howaitoboodo ya gayousi nadoni kai te hirou si, sono do ni nazenanda nihonzin okasiidaronadoto zekkyou de tukkomi wo ire ru. nao, konono kime serihu ha, watanabekomedisukuuru zidai noaru niti, neta mise no tokini neta wo zenbu wasure, kono tokini tossa ni tobi deta serihu deari, igo sonomama tukai tuzuke ruyouninatta. nao, tuukindensya no naka de neta woyoku tukutu teirutoiu.
syutuen
terebi
puroguramingu nen gatu niti niti, tere
enta no kamisama nen gatu niti , nihonterebi
nepuriigu nen gatukoro , huziterebi haipaaingurissyubureintawaa , kaisetu yaku.
eigodeasobo nen gatu niti , tere zieison hakase yaku yaku
atusi kiri zieison no nen gatu niti, kumamoto housou
kansai zyouhou netto. nen gatu niti hoka, yomiuri terebi zieisondanieruson meigi meigi
tamasii nen gatu niti huziterebi sinkou sinkou
nen gatu niti, tiba terebi housou
dorama
desunooto dai hanasi nen gatu niti, nihonterebi zieisonuorutaason yaku yaku
rekisi hiwa hisutoria nihonzin nanoni tuuzi nai meizi hyouzyungo kotohazime nen gatu niti, sougou annai yaku yaku
bakumatu gurume busimesi nen gatu niti gatu niti, puremiamu ansoniiabotto yaku yaku
tensai bakabon nen gatu niti, nihonterebi no titi yaku yaku
zettai seigi nen gatu niti gatu niti, toukai terebi zyooiuiriamuzu yaku yaku
hutatu no sokoku nen gatu niti niti, terebi toukyou hopukinzu yaku yaku
kabusikigaisya gureezooneeziensii dai hanasi nen gatu niti, zieison syatyou yaku yaku
iine hikarugenzi kun nen gatu niti gatu niti, sougou firippu yaku yaku

tyosyo
nippon nominasannio tutae sitai nopia, nen gatu. .
zieison siki eigo toreeningu oboe nai eiei tango syuhu to seikatusya, nen gatu. .
zieisondanieruson meigi meigi
kanari kini naru nihongo kurieiteibu sinsyo , nen gatu. .
zieison ryuu o kin no huyasi hou kore dakeyareba tama rupia, nen gatu. .
nen gatu niti, kontenturiigu

atusi kiri zieison
atusi kiri zieison
hobo nikkan itoi sinbun atusi kiri zieison zieison itoisigesato imano zidai no naporeon naporeon
atusi kiri zieison zinbutu roku minami hana daigaku eigo ha, konan syou kou you si zyou syou ku ni honbu wo oku tyuugoku no kouritu daigaku dearu. nen ni setti sareta.
nen gatu zitende ha, gakkou no menseki ha une, kentiku menseki ha . manpei hou meetoru, seitosuu yaku , yozin, honka nama , yozin, hakase, seki samurai kenkyuusei yozin, kyousyokuin , nin.
ryakureki
minami hana daigaku no kigen ha, nen gatu ni konan syou seihu ga seturitu sita kou you kou yakou hodo gakuin gentyuu minami kou ya gakuin kou yakou hodo kei nado .
nen gatu, kou you kou yakou hodo gakuin haisi.
nen gatu niti, kou you kougakuin seturitu.
nen gatu niti, nakaminami kougakuin to kou you igaku in ga gappei si minami hana daigaku seturitu.

sosiki
gakuin mo kei mo nippon no daigaku no gakubu nihobo soutou suru. gakubu ha gakuin to kei no ueno hensei de, zittai hanaku, nippon no gakubu toha itizuke ga kotona tteiru. myou wake ganainodesonomama sirusu.

kyakutyuu
gaibu rinku
kousiki uebusaito toiu katati no meidai ni taisi te, meidai wo, motono meidai no ura ura, ei toiu.
aru meidai tosono ura no singi ha kanarazusimo itti sinai.
sikasi, aru meidai no gyaku to ura toha taiguu no kankei niarunode, sono singi ha itti suru.
nitizyouseikatu deha, narabano imi nado, ura mo kanarazu makoto dearuyouna gobyuu wosurukotogaaru. zenken hitei
suironkisoku no nizyuu hitei no zyokyo niyori, ura no ura kara motono meidai wo eneki dekiru. suironkisoku no nizyuu hitei no dounyuu niyori, motono meidai kara ura no ura wo eneki dekiru. sitagatte, motono meidai tosono ura no ura tono singi ha itti suru.
rei
meidai kate ba kangun no ura ha kata nakereba kangun denaidearu. konotoki, katu ka make rukanodotirakadakedeari hikiwake ga nai baai, sosite kangun denai mono ha zokugun dearudearu baai ni, meidai kate ba kangun tosono ura kata nakereba kangun denaito meidai make reba zokugun tono singi ga itti suru.
meidai tukue dearunaraba katai no ura ha tukue denakereba kataku naidearukono baai, akiraka ni singi ga itti sinai.
kyakutyuu
kanrenbunken
maehara syouzi kigouronri nyuumon , antou yuuki hosoku sinsouban nihonhyouronsya nippyou suugaku sensyo , nen gatu. .
yano kentarou atarasii suugaku iwanamisyoten iwanamisinsyo aoban , nen gatu niti. .
kanrenkoumoku
kiben kiben
gyaku gyaku
kouken koutei koutei
kouken hitei hitei
zenken hitei hitei
taiguu taiguu
douti douti
gaibu rinku
buritanika kokusai daihyakka ziten syoukoumoku ziten ura kotobanku kotobanku
gyaku to ura no mondai ueibakkumasin nen gatu niti aakaibu hun
, , . . . eigo . adon eigo tai go ha, kapukon no taisengatakakutou geemu sutoriitohu a itaa siriizu ni touzyou suru kakuu no zinbutu.
kyarakutaa settei
tai syussin no kakutouka de muetai sensyu. muetai no teiou tosite mei wo todoroka seta sagatto no itibandesi sutoriitohu a itaa deari, sagatto ni taisuru doukei to ihu wo dai teita. daga, sagatto ga mumei no nihonzin ryuu ni yabure takotowo sitte ookiku situbou si, kano moto wo saru.
sakadatu ta akai kami ni ago gasyakureta kao de, sutoriitohu a itaa ika to hyouki ikou no sakuhin deha ha gamuki dasi ninatteirunoga tokutyou. monkon wo atama ni maki honrai ha siaimae ni hazusu noga tuurei daga, adon ha tuke tamama tatakau , no mozi ga itutu ta torankusu wo tyakuyou siteiru.
sagatto no waza ni taigaa tora totukunoni taisi te, adon no waza niha zyagaa hyou gatuku.
sutoriitohu a itaa ika deha satui no hadou ya, sorewo matoi i ryuu to onazi waza wo tukau otoko gou oni nituite tuyoi kansin wo dai teiru.
zinbutu
mazusii ie ni umare, muetai de tyouten made nobori tumerukotowo kokorozasu. sono tousousin ha hoka wo attou siteori, sagatto no meni tomaru kotoninaru. muetai kosoga sekaiiti dearuto sinzi teori, mizukara no kobusi womottesorewo syoumeisi youtositeiru. sagatto to kurabe te taikaku ha tiisa medaga supiido to tesuu de masari, sono sekkyokutekina kougeki sisei ha tai no runpiniisutaziamu demo takaku hyouka sareteiru.
mizukara wo muetai no kami to syousuru nado, gouman namadeno zisinka deari, kyoeisin ga tuyoi. hatugen ha tuneni tuyoki katu aite wo mikudasi ta taido wo tori, sagatto tono ippouteki na ketubetu ikou ha, yori akka saseteiru. sono gouman saha hokano kakutouka tatikara keno sarerukotoga ooku, ryuu ya ken, tyunrii nadokaraha sagatto yorimo yowai kotowo ikamesiku siteki sareteiru. zisin no si dearu sagatto wo kanzen ni koe teinai uede mikudasi teiru ten mo, si wo uyamau sisei wo motu gai yamakotokara hihan sareteiru. mata barurogu karamo sagatto nihakonoyouna syuuaku sahanakattato kokuhyou sareteiru. hotondono kakutouka ga adon wo tei hyouka surunaka, erena ha yoi sensi ninareruto omou to takaku hyouka siteiru.
muetai no odori waikuu ga tokui. touzyouzi to syouri poozu desorewo okonau.
sutoriitohu a itaa ika no endingu deha sagatto wo taosi ta noti, kano suteezi niaru wattopoo no nehan hotoke wo hakai surutoiu boukyo ni deru. sikasi adon no suteezi nimo butuzou gaarunode, sinkousin ganaitoha dangen dekinai.
niokeru sagatto no bakkusutoorii deha, sagatto sissou notini muetai no teiou no za nituki, atarasii karisuma tosite kokumin tatino nekkyou wo tori modosi teiru.
hokano kyarakutaa tono kankei
sagatto sagatto
katuteno sisyou. wakaki niti no adon nitotte sagatto ha akogare no sonzai deari, sagatto ni idomi, syouri si, sositeituka koe rukotowo mokuhyou tositeita. sagatto ni sizi siteita gorono adon ha kare woanatato yobi, ooki na keii wo arawasi teita. niokeru taisen demo, saisyuusen no aite sagatto ni taisi teanatahasubarasii si deattato hatugen siteiru.
sikasi ryuu no ikken irai, sagatto no haiboku niyotte muetai ga yogosa retato katte ni omoikomi, kare ni taisuru sinzyou ha zouo to keibetu ni kawa tta. nioite, ken ya diiziei kara imada ni sagatto no desi tosite mira reteita tokini ha hukaikan wo tuyu wanisiteiru.
ippou, sagatto no hou mo adon to hazimete tatakatu ta toki, syoubu zitai ha sagatto ga assyou sitamonono hisasi burinikorehodono ha gotaenoaru aite to deatu tao mae nara ore wo koe rukotomoanagati yume dehanaito takaku hyouka siteita. sikasisono noti, zouo ya satui womuki dasi nisite tatakau youninatta kano kotoha, situbou ni tikai katati de mikagitu teiru. mata, ryuu toiu koutekisyu noiru sagatto nitotte, adon ha aite nisuruni atai sinai sonzai to kasi ta.
no bakkusutoorii deha, katute adon ha sagatto tono mogi siai de hiza wo ti nitukaseruhodoni sagatto wo oitume taga, koreni manzoku site touki wo osame tesimattanode sagatto no gekirin ni hurete mouhangeki ni ai, zenti ke gatu no zyuusyou wo otu takotogaarukono dekigoto ha sagatto ga taigaazienosaido wo ami dasu hinto tonatta.
kateiyou sutoriitohu a itaa deha sagatto no oopuninguanime ni touzyou si, muetai taikai ni araware ta sagatto ni zyagaatouusu wo mimau ga tuuzi zu, gyakuni sagatto no singi taigaadisutorakusyon de itigeki nomotoni taosa reru hikitate yakuni natteiru.
suupaasutoriitohu a itaa ika supa no raibarubatoru no aite ha sagatto. moto desi no ari houwo hitei suru sagatto no kotoba wo yo mayoi gen to issyuu si, muetai no kami tonarutameni teiou ni tatakai wo idomu. endingu deha sagatto no zituryoku wo mitome ru ippou de, sonmin to nakayoku kurasi teiru sama wo kiba wo utu tato hyousi kanzen ni ketubetu. aratame te muetai no kami ninaru ketui wosuru.
ryuu ryuu
katute sonkei siteita sagatto wo taosi ta kakutouka daga, adon ha tokuni nikusimi no kanzyou ha motu teinai. sono ippou de, sagatto wo hitori no hokori takaki kakutouka tosite mitome teiru ryuu karaha, sagatto wo kanzen ni koe teinainimo kakawara zu bubetu siteiru sisei wo keibetu sareteori, supa deha sagatto yorimo yowai kotowo dangen sareteiru.
bega bega
no endingu deha sagatto wo taosi takotode bega ni kiniira re, syadoruu ni kanyuu sareruga, mayaku ya ni iku kiha naito issyuu siteiru. niokeru adon no rannyuu kyarakutaa mo bega deari, hutatabi syadoruu heno kanyuu wo ukeru ga, kakutou kai no tyouten ha zibun to nyuudan wo kyohi siteiru.
asahi sonorama no konpuriitohu a iru sutoriitohu a itaa deha, soukanzu nioite bega ga adon kara keri wo nusun datoaru. bega no hissatuwaza daburuniipuresu ga sutoriitohu a itaa zidai no zyagaakikku kakato oto sini kokuzi siteirukotowo sasu monotosareru.
gou oni oni
no endingu de, gou oni rasiki zinbutu no rannyuu wo kii ta adon hasoituwo taosi zibun to muetai ga saikyou to syoumeisu ruto kyoumi wo simesu.
deha sagatto wo taosi te muetai no kami no za nituiteiruga, satui no hadou ni kyoumi wo motu youninari, syun goku satu wo muetai ni toriire rutameni gou oni wo sagasu tabi ni deru. mottomo dousaku niokeru adon no sutoorii deha gou oni to tyokusetusen ukotohanaku, bega ni syouri sita noti, endingu de totuzyosyutugen sita gou oni ga bega wo syun goku satu de taosu bamen ni souguu suru. adon ha gou oni no tuyosa wo mite kanarazu zibun nomononisurutono ketui wo simesu.
geemu ueno tokutyou
sagatto no desi dearuga kyoutuu suru waza hanaku, tati mawari mo ookiku kotonaru.
debyuu saku no syodai sutoriitohu a itaa deha senyou kyarakutaa de, saisyuu suteezi no hitorime no taisenaite tosite touzyou suru. tobi dougu hanaiga, subayaku ugoki mawari, kuutyuu kakato oto si genzai no zyagaakikku nadono kyouryoku na asiwaza de osoi kaka ttekuru. mata, gaado sareruto hadouken to tatumaki senpuu asi deha tairyoku wo kezuru kotogadekinaikoreha sagatto mo douyou .
siriizu deha, ugoki ha zentaiteki ni hayaku, keri waza no riiti mo nagaku, kensei nouryoku ni masare ta seinou wo motu kyarakutaa tonatteiru. syodai sutoriitohu a itaa to douyou ni tobi dougu hanaiga, zyagaakikku ya zyagaatouusu nado kisyuu sei ni masare ta hissatuwaza de kabaa dekiru. zyaku kougeki no seinou ha hikuku naiga renda ga kika zu, konbo wo hukume te renzokuwaza no syurui ha sukunai. sonotame sekkyokutekini renzokuwaza wo nerai ni iku nodehanaku, kotukotuto dameezi wo tumikasane ruyouna tati mawari wositeikukotoninaru. deha kakusyu kougeki no dousa ga osoku nari, kura i hantei mo ookiku natta. zyagaakikku no dousa mo osoku natta.
waza no kaisetu
tuuzyou waza
sakuhin niyotte zyakkan sai haaruga, kokodeha siriizu deno wazamei syou wo keisai. nao izen deno tati zyoutai no enkin oyobi zyanpu zyoutai no sui sya no kubetu hanai.
ikou ikou
deno nomi nomi
nage waza
zyagaakyarii zyagaakyarii
aite ni ko ri, asi wo hikkake te zenpou he keri toba su. nage ta noti, adon ha kouhou tyuugaeri sinagara tyakuti suruga, dousa no geki ga ookiku, ukemi wo tora reruto aite no houga sakini ugoku kotogadekiru.
zyagaasuramu zyagaasuramu
aite wo torae te atama wo tukami, zibun no hiza wo aite no dou ni ate te moti age, sono zyoutai de tiisaku hane nagara kouhou ni tataki tukeru. ukemi wo tora retemo adon ga sakini ugoku kotogadekiru.
zyagaasutabu zyagaasutabu
no kuutyuu nage. kuutyuu no aite wo torae, atama wo ude de kakae komu youni tukan de, sonomama zimen ni tataki tukeru.
zyagaasuruu zyagaasuruu
no kuutyuu nage. kuutyuu no aite wo torae, zyagaakyarii to onazi dousa de keri toba su.
tokusyu waza
zyatteingukikku zyatteingukikku
kutu nda sisei kara, naname zyouhou ni muke te massugu guni keri wo tuki dasu. taikuu seinou ga takai. deha tuuzyou waza kinkyori tati kyou kikku ni henkou sareta.
zyagaakuranti zyagaakuranti
de tuika sareta tyuudan kougeki. zenpou he humikomi nagara hizi wo huri kudaro su dan waza. dousa ha osome.
zyagaahu a ngu ngu
urutorasutoriitohu a itaa ika uru omegaedisyon de tuika. kinkyori tati kyou panti wo omoteura hanten saseta dousa.
hissatuwaza
zyagaakikku zyagaakikku
zenpou he ikkaiten zyanpu situtu kakato oto siwo abi seru. syodai sutoriitohu a itaa niokeru kuutyuu karano kakato oto siga genkei. zyaku naka kyou de kidou ga kotona ri, zyaku ha hikuku tooku he, siha takaku tikaku he tobu. naka de taimingu yoku dasu to hadouken nadowo tobi koe te kougeki ga kanou. siriizu ga susumu niturete dousa ga osoku nattahoka, kura i hantei mo ookiku natta.
no deha, subete no zyanpukikku gakono waza ninaru. kono zyagaakikku ha tuuzyou waza nanode aite no tairyoku wo kezuru kouka hanai.
supa deha zenpou mataha suityoku ni zyanpu siteiru tokini mo kuri dasu kotogadekiru.
kara de nyuuryoku komando ga henkou saretaga, deha tousyo no komando ni modotu teiru.
zyagaatouusu zyagaatouusu
gamenhasi he han da noti, kabe wo ketu te surudoi tobi keri wo kuri dasu. syagami gaado huka. zyaku naka kyou de tobi keri no kakudo ga henkasu ru. siriizu wo tousi te seinou ha takaku, gaado saretemo hangeki ha uke nikui.
raizinguzyagaa raizinguzyagaa
naname zyoukuu ni muka tte ni ren tobi hiza keri wo kuri dasu. hiza no hantei ga tuyoku, taikuu ya tossin waza heno kaesiwaza nimonaru. tadasi asimoto no kougekihantei ga usuku, asi harai kei no kougeki niha yowai. kougekihantei ha do syutugen suruga, kyou de dasu to takaku tobi aga rutame, tizyou no aite ni gaado sareruto danme ga ata ranai. siriizu deha kuutyuu gaado huka de, zyaku nomi dekaka rini issyun no muteki zikan gaaru.
to ikou de nyuuryoku komando ga kotonaru.
zyagaakurou zyagaakurou
uru omegaedisyon de tuika sareta waza. mawasi hizi uti wo kuri dasu. han ha gyakuno ude no hizi de aite wo uka seru.
zyagaabaito zyagaabaito
uru omegaedisyon de tuika sareta gaado kanouno dageki nage . sayuu no asi de kai zutu hiza keri wosuru. kaime no hiza keri de aite wo kuutyuu ni ookiku toba su. kuutyuu no aite mo tukamu kotogadekiru. han ha aite wo tukamu to raizinguzyagaa no dousa de hitto no tobi hiza keri wo kuri dasu.
kuraudozyagaa kuraudozyagaa
zyagaabaito igai de hatudou dekiru hasei waza. kaime no hiza keri no tyokugo ni sauzandozyagaa no dousa de renzoku no panti wo abi se, hizi uti de daun saseru.
suupaakonbo urutorakonbo
zyagaabariidoasaruto zyagaabariidoasaruto
sayuu no hizi uti wo kuri dasi tutu tossinsi, huki ton da aite ni kuutyuu de hizi to hiza wo tataki komu. tousyo ha hikui reberu de dasu to hizi uti nomi saigo ni toba naidattaga, deha demo tobi aga ruyouni henkou sareta. konotame gaado sareruto rakka tokini geki wo sarasu. ha pantibotan ka kikkubotan wo tuika nyuuryoku de renda surukotoniyori, kouzyutu no tane ni haseisu rudeha geemu no kiban niyori, dotirakaga randamu de hatudou .
sauzandozyagaa sauzandozyagaa
pantibotan renda tokino waza. hizi uti kara panti wo renzoku de kuri dasu. tobi aga ranainode gaado saretemo geki ga sukunai.
asasinzyagaa asasinzyagaa
kikkubotan renda tokino waza. huki ton da aite ni raizinguzyagaa de finissyu.
deha taiou no suupaakonbo de, supa demo suupaakonbo tosite siyousu ru.
uru omegaedisyon dehadotiranimo haseisi nakunatta.
zyagaariborubaa zyagaariborubaa
zyagaakikku wo renzoku de kuri dasu. zyagaakikku to douyou, saisyo ni ookiku tobu tameni, kinkyori deha aite wo tobi koe tesimau.
supa no urutorakonbo han deha saisyo no zyagaakikku ni tobi dougu muteki zokusei ga huyo sare, danme ga tizyou hitto suruto renzoku no eruboo de zyousyou site, saigo ni hiza keri wo houttu.
abarantizyagaa abarantizyagaa
supa no urutorakonbo. raizinguzyagaa de utiage ta notini kuutyuu han zyagaakikku wo kuri dasi, sorega hitto suruto aite no se ni notte eruboo wo renzoku de utikomi, zimen he tataki huse ru. taikuu konbo tosite kinousu ru waza.
hokano media deno adon
manga
tyuuhei masahiko no manga no tyuuban ni touzyou. geemu han tono tigai tosite, syadoruu to kyouryokukankei niari, mokuteki notameniha nin wo satu merukotomo zisa nai otoko tosite egaka reteiru syadoruu zitai ha kiratu teiru. geemu han no settei deha notini syadoruu ni syozoku suru sagatto ha nyuudan woassari kotowari, onazi ku baadii mo syadoruu toha karama zu, kousiki no settei to tigai ga kentyo dearu. ti ni oti ta muetai no hokori wo tori modosu tameni syadoruu no tikara wo kari temade ryuu ni hukusyuu siyoutosuruga, saisyuuteki ni zibun no okonai wo gai ni isame rareru.
onazi ku tyuuhei no manga sutoriitohu a itaa no komikaraizu sakuhin deha, ryuu ni haiboku sitakotoniurotaeru sagatto wo toomaki ni mite arega teiou no sugata kato mikagiru bamen gaaru.
udon niyoru amerikankomikku deha tai wo otozure ta ryuu to, muetai saikyou wo omoisira serubeku taiketu suru.
de pureiyaakyarakutaa tonatta touzi no koma manga nadodeha, ha ni kanrensi ta neta ga ooku tukawa reta.
sono hoka
syodai sutoriitohu a itaa deha sagatto senzen no taisenaite tosite pureiyaa wo kurusi meta. touzi no geemu zassi geemesuto deha, saisyuu bosu no sagatto yorimo, naka bosu no adon no houga tuyoi to kaka rerukotoga ooka tta.
syouri poozu nohitotudearu senaka wo muke ryoute wo hiroge ru poozu no motoneta ha manga gurappuraa baki to mira re, gurappuraa baki no tankoubon noomake manga itagakigumi gekizyou nite adon rasiki kyarakutaa ga zyouki no poozu wo totu teiru saityuu ni hanma yuuzirou ni kakato oto siwo kura u byousya gaaru.
tantou seiyuu
takagi wataru sutoriitohu a itaa siriizu, sutoriitohu a itaa
i maruoka atusi sutoriitohu a itaa siriizu
touzyou sakuhin
sutoriitohu a itaa itaa
sutoriitohu a itaasiriizu itaasiriizu
. gekitotu kaadohu a itaazu zen siriizu toreedingukaadogeemu han mo hukumu
sutoriitohu a itaasiriizu suupaa ikou kara siyou kyarakutaa
kanren zinbutu
sagatto sagatto
gou oni oni
kyakutyuu nippon sunakkusiriaruhuuzu kyoukai nihon sunakkusiriaruhuuzu kyoukai, eibun meisyou ha sunakku kasi, siriaru syokuhin no seizousya no dantai.
enkaku
nen gatu zenkoku komugi arare kyoukai seturitu seturitu

gaibu rinku
nippon sunakkusiriaruhuuzu kyoukai burunei no tiri burunei notiri, eigo deha, burunei no tiri nituite kizyutu suru.
burunei ha tounanazia ni iti si, minami sina umi ni mensi, mareesia to kokkyou wo sessu ru. zahyou ha hokui do hun toukei do hun dearu. burunei ha mareesia to . niwatatte kokkyou wo kyouyuu si, kaigansen tyou ha dearu.
tikei
kokudo no taihan ha heitan na kaigan heiya tonatteori, toubu ha santi, seibu ha oka no ooi teiti dearu. kokudo no saitei titen ha kaimen to onazi , saikoutiten ha pagon yama no dearu.
muara kara pukantuton nikaketeno kaigan bu ni syuukyoku kyuuryou gaaruga hyoukou ha takaku nai. kokunai no syuyou kasen niha tenburon kawa, burunei kawa, tuton kawa, buraito kawa gaari, ryuuiki ni sitti wo, kakou ni manguroobu hayasi wo keisei suru.
kikou
burunei no kikou ha, kouon tasitu deari, heiti ha nettai reinetu obi dan nettai , kouti ha ooame wo tomonau anettai situzyun kikou dearu. syuto bandarusuribugawan no kikou ha tuno kisetu wo motu nettai kikou dearu. kanki ha hizyouni atuku, hododearu. uki ha omoni atatakaku, situzyun na kikou de hododearu.
tiikibetu no kikou no tokutyou
bandarusuribugawan noaru buruneimuara tiku ha engan bu oyobi hokubu no hyoukou ga hikui tiiki deha nettaiurin kikou , tyuubu deha anettai situzyun kikou dearu. tuton tiku ha nettai kikou de, hokubu ha atuku, nanbu ha atatakai. buraito tiku ha nettai kikou de, hokubu ha atuku, nanbu hayaya atatakai. tenburon tiku ha nanbu no hyoukou ga takai tiiki deha anettai situzyun kikou, engan bu to hokubu no hyoukou ga hikui tiiki deha nettaiurin kikou dearu.
tennen sigen
burunei no tennen sigen niha, sekiyu tennen gasu mokuzai ga age rareru. nen no toukei deha, genyu no , tennen gasu no wo nippon ni yusyutu siteiru. burunei nitotte nippon ha saidai no boueki aitekoku dearu.
toti riyou
soumenseki ha , de, rikuti ga , , suimen ga dearu. soumenseki ha igirisu no noofooku , , nippon no mieken , to onazi kuraidearu.
toti riyou ha nen genzai, kouti ga . , sinrin ga . tonatteiru. kangai menseki ha nen genzai dearu.
kaiyou
burunei ha indo hirosi to taiheiyou wo musubu zyuuyouna siireen dearu minami sina umi ni mensu ru. kono taiyou ha tikeiteki ni mareesia niyotte hedata reru.
burunei seihu niyoru syutyou deha deha
haitateki keizai suiiki ha engan kara kairi . mataha tyuukan sen made made
ryoukai ha kairi . madetositeiru.
kankyou
taihuu zisin daikibo na kouzui hakiwamete mare dearu. burunei ha kantaiheiyou kazan obi ni hukuma reru.
tyokkin no kankyoumondai tositeha indonesia no yamabi koto ni kiin suru kisetuteki na kemuri ya moya moyaga age rareru.
kokusai goui heno sanka zyoukyou
hizyun sitamono sitamono
wasinton zyouyaku kokuren kaiyou houzyou yaku montoriooru giteisyo marupooru zyouyaku zyouyaku
kyakutyuu
sankoubunken
kagen yutaka motto siri tai burunei koubundou, nen,
deetabukkuobuzawaarudo nenban ninomiya syoten, heisei nen gatu niti hakkou, .
kanrenkoumoku
burunei burunei
burunei no gyouseiku ga hasetukabe miti sohu maro hasetukabe no miti no oozimaro, wadou nen nen botunen husyou ha, narazidai no kakyuu kanri no musuko.
kiroku
zoku nippon ki kan dai zyuu siti niyoruto, ookurasyou urusibe tukasa nuribenotukasano rei si sakande zyuu hati kurai ueno hasetukabe miti imiki sekisyou hasetukabe no miti no imiki iwakatuga, yasusi inu maro totomoni situ wo nusun de tenbai si, hakkaku site ruzai no hanketu wo uke ta.
sekisyou niha nin no musuko gaita. ue kara sohu maro oozimaro, an atama maro azumaro, otu maro otomarodearu.
kan yatu toha, kanyuu no dorei deari, zyoutin toha kansi ni mousideru koto. kousiki rei niyori, rituryou sei sita demo syo nin mo tennou ni zyouhyou surukotogadekita. tadasi, sono baai ha, bunmatu ni sizai kingen totukenakerebanaranakattatoiu.
mei rei ritu deha, kouzoku ya koukyuu yakunin no saiban deha tokken ga mouke rareteitaga, hati kurai ikano yakunin ya syomin nihasonoyouna tokuten hatukeraretehainakatta. tumari, kyoudai tatiga hanketu no henkou wo negaide tatoiunoha, inoti gakeno koudou nihokanaranakattawakenanodearu.
kei no syamen, keigen ha tennou no tokken deari, kono uttae ha, mototada tennou no temoto ni buzi todoi ta. nao, ruzai sizai ha daizyou kan de singi site, syorui wo tennou ni kairan surukotoninattemoita.
tennou ha, ikano youni mikotonori sita.
inu maro no baai ha, kazoku ga miyako ni sun deinakattatame, syamen no taisyou nihanaranakatta.
izyou, nen yourou nen gatu no dekigoto dearu.
sorekara itigatu noti,
kyakutyuu
sankoubunken
zoku nippon ki sinnihon koten bungaku taikei iwanamisyoten, nen nen
zoku nippon ki zen gendaigoyaku ue koudansya gakuzyutu bunko, uzitani mou wake, nen nen
nippon no rekisi nara no miyako , aoki kazuo tyo, tyuuoukouronsya, nen nen
kanrenkoumoku
hasetukabe hasetukabe
hasetukabe si si
mototada tennou tennou
taihou rituryou rituryou
situ situ
saigo no ikku yamanasiken miti gou owada sarubasi sen yamanasikendou gou owadasaruhasisenha, yamanasikenootuki si wo kiten syuuten tosuru ippan kendou dearu.
gaiyou
rosen deeta
kiten yamanasikenootuki si siti ho mati singou mu kousaten kousaten kokudou gou kouten
syuuten yamanasikenootuki si sarubasi mati sarubasi sin sarubasi nisi kousaten kousaten kokudou gou kouten
tuuka suru zititai
yamanasikenootuki si si
kousa setuzokusu ru douro
kokudou gou ootuki si siti ho mati singou mu kousaten
kokudou gou ootuki si sarubasi mati sarubasi sin sarubasi nisi kousaten
syuuhen
ootuki siyakusyo siti ho syuttyousyo syuttyousyo
siti ho yuubinkyoku yuubinkyoku
ootuki siritu siti ho syougakkou syougakkou

sarubasi sarubasi
kanrenkoumoku
yamanasiken no kendou itiran sanka kangen kouso sankakangenkouso, toha dai gun ni bunrui sareru kouso de, sanka kangen hannou wo syokubai suru kouso dearu. okisidoredakutaaze tomo yoba reru. seitainai deha tasuu no sanka kangen kouso ga sira reteori, yaku syurui tomoiwareru.
gaiyou
sanka kangen kouso ha sanka kangen hannou niyori bussitutaisya wo syokubai surudakedenaku, sanka hannou niyori hassei suru enerugii sansei sansei nimo kanyo suru. sanka kangen kouso ha dehidorogenaaze, redakutaaze, okisidaaze, okisigenaaze, peruokisidaaze, toransuhidorogenaaze, kataraaze nadono meisyou de yoba reru.
seitainai deno sanka kangen hannou ha ha
suisogensi hidorido no idou idou
densi no idou idou
sanso gensi no huka noizurekano keisiki wotoru.
suisogensi no idou wo tomonau hannou dassui moto hannou wo syokubai suru kouso no ooku ha dassui moto kouso dehidorogenaaze to yoba reru. korerano kouso no suiso moto hanado suiso kyouyo karada ni yurai suruga, itibu saikin nadogamotu hidorogenaaze niha tyokusetu suiso bunsi wo zyuzyu suru mono moaru.
densi idou wo syokubai suru kouso no daihyou ha densi dentatukei wo kousei suru sitokuromu dearu.
sosite bunsi zyou sanso wo kisitu tosuru sanka kangen kouso ha sanka kouso okisidaaze to yoba reru. okisidaaze ha torikoma reru sanso bunsi no haibun keisiki no tigai niyori niyori
ziokisigenaaze hutatu no sanso gensi ga betuno iti ni sounyuu sareru sareru
monookisigenaaze hidorokisiraaze tomo yobu ippou no sanso gensi ga sounyuu sare, tahou ha mizu tonaru tonaru
peruokisidaaze peruokisi moto ga sounyuu sareru nado ni bunrui sareru.
ooku no sanka kangen kouso ha kassei tyuusin ni kinzoku genso ga sonzai si, tetu tetu porufirin , dou ga daihyouteki na kassei tyuusin kinzoku dearu.
sanka kangen kouso ni kanyo suru sanka kangen zyuyoutai ha kagira reteori, , nadono ho kouso, sitokuromu rui, sanso, zisurufido, kinon kagoubutu nadoga sira reteori, bangou no gun ha sanka kangen zyuyoutai no syurui demo kubun sareteiru.
