syutten
kanrenkoumoku
kouso kouso
bangou kouso bangou
dassui moto kouso teirahu nin ha ahuganisutan no nangaruhaaru syuu no minzoku dearu. teirahi tomo yoba reru. motomotoha genzai no pakisutan no renpou tyokkatu buzoku tiiki ni zokusuru kaibaru touge ni iti suru teirahu dearuga, piirurosyaan niyori tuihou sarete genzai no basyo ni idou sita. indoyooroppa gozoku indoiran goha darudo gogun kohisutan syogo ni zokusuru teirahu go wo hanasu minzoku deattaga, genzai no syuyou gengo ha pasyutoo katato natteiru. ahuganisutan no pasyutouun nin to bunkateki ni douka keikou niaru.
kyakutyuu
sankoubunken
gaibu rinku morioka mura moriokamuraha, katute aitiken higasikamo gun niatta mura.
syouwa no dai gappei de asuke mati ni hennyuusa re, genzai no toyotasi no itibu dearu.
kyuu asuke mati no seibu ni gaitou si, tomoegawa tosono siryuu soi no sankanbu no mura deatta.
enkaku
edozidai makki, kono tiiki ha mikawa kuni kamo gun deari, okuden hanryou, yosida hanryou, hatamoto ryou nadodeatta.
nen meizi nen oono mura to kago hayasi mura ga gappei si, nobayasi mura tonaru.
nen meizi nen
kamo gun ga higasikamo gun to nisikamo gun ni bunri sareru.
inoguti mura, terasawa mura, tikaoka mura, oosima mura, ta sin mura ga gappei si, oiwake mura tonaru.
nen meizi nen gatu niti oiwake mura, nobayasi mura, iwakami mura, kuni hima mura, ue sa setu mura, uewaki mura, si tu matumura, higasiyama nakamura, totimoto mura, ue oda mura, sawa no dou mura, ue kuniya mura, gekoku tanimura, kuwahara tamura, tyuugoku tanimura, sita sa setu mura, taira ori mura ga gappei si, morioka mura tonaru.
nen meizi nen gatu niti morioka mura, kanazawa mura no itibu, toyosaka mura no itibu, hozumi mura no itibu ga gappei si, morioka mura tonaru.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti asuke mati, morioka mura, kamo mura, a suri mura ga gappei si, asuke mati tonaru.
gakkou
morioka sonritu morioka tyuugakkou asuke tyouritu seibu tyuugakkou ni koumei henkougo, nen ni asuke tyouritu asuke tyuugakkou ni tougou. gen toyotasi ritu asuke tyuugakkou
morioka sonritu oiwake syougakkou gen toyotasi ritu oiwake syougakkou
morioka sonritu sa setu syougakkou gen toyotasi ritu sa setu syougakkou
morioka sonritu asahi syougakkou gen toyotasi ritu rei ta syougakkou
morioka sonritu norisada syougakkou gen toyotasi ritu norisada syougakkou
kyakutyuu
kanrenkoumoku
aitiken no haisi sityouson itiran nen toukyou orinpikku no seika riree nentoukyou orinpikku noseika riree deha, nen kara nen nikakete okonawa reta toukyou orinpikku kyougitaikai no seika riree nituite kisaisu ru.
gaiyou
nen gatu niti ni girisyaorinpia de saika sare, gatu niti ni nippon ni toutyakugo ha miyagiken, iwateken, hukusima ken de tenzi saretaga, singata koronauirusu kansensyou ryuukou no eikyou de enki tonatta. yokunen gatu niti ni hukusima ken no virejzi wo syuppatu si, niti wokakete zenkoku sikutyouson wo mawari, gatu niti no kaikaisiki de tenka sareta.
seika rannaa ha koubo niyori bannin teido ga eraba reta. seika riree nituite, sosiki iinkai ha suponsaa kigyou sya to kakutodouhuken zikkouiinkai ga itta rannaa koubo ni nobe man ken no oubo gaattato happyou sita. nihonzin saisyo no atene wo hasiru seika rannaa tosite, nen ateneorinpikku zyosi marason kin medarisuto no noguti mizukiga eraba reta. nihonkokunai wo saisyo ni hasiru seika rannaa tosite zyosi waarudokappu yuusyou tokino waarudokappu nihonzyosi daihyou menbaa ga eraba reta.
kaikaisiki nioiteha, orinpikkusutaziamu ni moorisuraveru no borero ga nagare teiru naka de, moto resuringu sensyu no yosida saori to moto zyuudou sensyu no nomura tadahiro no mei, motono tama sensyu no nagasimasigeo, ousadaharu, matui hideki no mei, kuruuzu kyakusen daiyamondopurinsesu de hassei sita singata koronauirusu kansensyou no syuudan kansen no taiou niatatta isi no oohasi hiroki to kango si no kitagawa zyunko, toukyou pararinpikkutoraiasuron syutuzyouyotei sensyu no tutida wakako, higasinihon taisin sai no hisaiti nouti iwateken, miyagiken, hukusima ken no zidou mei ga seika wo hikitugi, tenisu sensyu de kontaikai nimo syutuzyou no oosaka naomiga saisyuu rannaa wo tutome, seikadai ni tenka sita. seikadai heno tenka tokini ha tomita isao sakkyoku no kangengakusakuhin dokutaakopperiusu yori, dai gakusyou hinode ga ensou sareta sareta
nao, seika ha syoubouhou tono kaneai de taikai kikantyuu, orinpikkusutaziamu ni tenka si tuzuke runoha konnan deattatame, kaikaisiki noti, koutouku no yume no oohasi ni utusa re, moto badominton sensyu no takahasi rei hana ga saido tenka sita.
heikaisiki nioiteha, orinpikkusutaziamu no suteezi ueni ootakesinobu zyoyuu to suginami zidougassyoudan ga toudan si, miyazawakenzi no hosi megurino uta wo kasyou. tuzui te seika nou hi tokini ha tenka toki to onazi ku tomita isao no teni yoru sinsesaizaa ongaku gatu no hikari dobyussii sakkyoku no gatu no hikari no arenzi ga nagare, kokoni nitikan niwataru taikai ga maku wo tozi ta.
siyousa reru tooti, seika sara, rantan no dezainaa ha yosioka norihito.
saika
seika no saika siki ha nen gatu niti, kodai orinpikku hassyou no ti dearu girisya no orinpia iseki heeraa sinden mae de okonawa re, ro no megami hesuteiaa wo maturu miko yakuno zyosei niyori oumenkyou de taiyoukou ga atume rarete hi ga sasa reta. nen riodezyaneiroorinpikku no syageki kyougi zyosi pisutoru kin medarisutoannakorakaki ga zyosei hatu no seika riree dai sousya tonari, nen ateneorinpikku no rikuzyoukyougi zyosi marason kin medarisuto noguti mizukiga dai sousya wo ninatu ta.
girisya kokunai wo riree suru yotei dattaga, singata koronauirusu kansen kakudai no eikyou de yoku niti no totyuu kara tyuusi. seika ha gatu niti ni atene de taikai sosiki iinkai ni hikituga reta.
tenzi
seika ha nen gatu niti ni tokubetu yusouki gou nihonkoukuu no booingu de nippon he toutyaku si, koukuuzieitai matusima kiti deno toutyaku siki wo hete higasinihon taisin sai no hisaiti ni utusa reta. nihonkokunai riree ni sakidati, miyagi, iwate, hukusima de hukkou no hi tosite tenzi sare, zensen hukkyuu sitabakarino sanriku tetudou nadowo megutu ta. kaizyou de sasa reru seika sara ha, riree ni motii rareru tooti to onazi ku sakura no hana wo motiihu nisita dezain de, takasa yaku sentimeetoru, zyuuryou yaku kiroguramu nomono. omona sozai ha aruminiumu de, hukkou kasetu zyuutaku no arumi haizai ga itibu sairiyou sareta.
sikasi, tyokugo ni gorin no enki ga kettei sitatame, nen gatu niti ni yotei sareteita virejzi deno gurandosutaato ga touketu sareta. seika ha nippon ni nokori, nen gatu kara nippon orinpikkumyuuziamu nite tenzi sare, gatu karaha douhuken no sityouson de zyunkai tenzi sarerukototonatta.
sanka
nen toukyou orinpikku no seika riree deha, sorezoreno tihou de seika riree toiu ibento wo kaisai site mawaru toiu katati ninatteiru. nen no toukyou orinpikku deha mozidoori seika riree de seika wo hakon datame sousya no kazu mo bannin wo koe taga, nen no toukyou orinpikku deha daibubun no koutei wo kuruma de hakobu tame, sousya no kazu mo teido no bannin teido to oohaba ni sakugen sareta. ruuto ni siteisa reta zititai deha hodowo seika rannaa ga hakobi, atoha kuruma de unpan sare tugino zititai ni idou suru. nin atarino kyori ha meetoru to kime rareteori, soukouzikan no meyasu ha hunkan tosareteiru. nen toukyou orinpikku deha, tasuu no bansou mono ga seika rannaa no usiro wo hasitu taga, nen no toukyou orinpikku deha itibukukan wo nozoi te bansou ha kyoka sareteinai.
seika rannaa ha, sayuu nin zutuno keisatukan ni goei sarenagara hasiru. bansou suru keisatukan ha kakutodouhuken keisatu no kidoutai ya keisatusyo no naka kara senbatu sare, zisoku kiromeetoru de hasiru.
sousya ga hakobu noha kie temo kamawa nai bunsin tomoieru hi deari, seika no tanebi zitai ha rantan ni ire rarete kuruma de heisou sareru. ame ya kaze nadono toraburu niyori tooti no hi ga kie tesimatta baai, rantan kara tanebi wo utusu katati de riree ha keizoku sareru.
niti no seika riree no saisyuu toutyaku sikutyouson deha seika toutyaku wo iwau serebureesyon ga kaisai sareru. saisyuubi wo nozoki kaizyou de serebureesyon ga okonawa rerukotoninatteiru.
geinouzin supootu sensyu mo kaku gotouti nite hasitu teiru.
nihonkokunai no ruuto
nihonkokunai ruuto no syuppatuti niha, getumatu no kikou nadokara nen taikai to onazi ku okinawaken tosuru an moattaga, higasinihon taisin sai hisaiti dearu hukusima ken ga eraba reta. seika riree no nissuu ha kokusai orinpikku iinkai no naiki de, hitohudegaki de niti inai to sadame rareteiruga, entyou ga syounin sareta. touhokutihou taiheiyou oki zisin no tunami higasinihon taisin sai ni tae ta kiseki no ipponmatu ya, kumamoto zisin de higai wo uke ta kumamotozyou nadono hisaiti nohoka, sekai isan nadomo tuuka suru.
toukyouto kukan
ruuto no henkou
oosakahu nen gatu niti ni yosimura tizi ha, oosakasinai no seika riree wo tyuusi suru ikou wo simesi ta. sono notini sarani kansen ga kakudai sitatame, niti ni iryou hizyouzitai sengen wo hassyutu si huyouhukyuu no gaisyutu zisyuku wo oosakahumin ni motome takotowo huma e, hunai zeniki no koudou deno seika riree wo tyuusi surukotowo kettei sita. , niti ryouzitu no seika riree ha banpaku kinenkouen no nakano syuukai koosu de zissi sare, mukan kyaku deatta.
ehimeken ken kara kuni heman en bousi nado zyuuten soti no tekiyou wo yousei siteiru zyoukyou deattakotokara, matuyamasi deno riree wo tyuusi si, matuyamasi de hasiru yotei datta nin ga no kankaku wo totu te seiretu si, zyunban ni tooti no hi wo utusu tenka seremonii ni henkou sita.
okinawaken okinawa hon sima deha koudou deno riree wo tyuusi si, nitime ha nago siminkaikan syuuhen, nitime ha heiwa kinen kouen itoman si de ippan kankyaku wo ire zuni zissi sita. nitime no isigakisi deha koudou deno riree wo zissi si, nitime no zamami mura deha rannaa ga sabani ni notte seika wotunaida.
hukuokaken kinkyuuzitai sengen ga haturei saretatame, gatu niti no zitende ha, nitime ni heiwadai rikuzyoukyougizyou hukuokasi , nitime ni kanmonkaikyou myuuziamuibento hiroba kitakyuusyuusi ni rannaa wo atume te seiretu sita zyoutai de seika wotunagu keisiki tosuruto happyou siteita. gatu niti ninari, sikiten no butaizyou de meetoru hodo hasiru katati ni henkou si, seika rannaa wo tutome ru yotei datta nin nouti, kakubi kibousya yaku nin ga kaizyou iri si, tenka seremonii wo kaisai sita. riree wo okonawa zu, tenka seremonii dakenisita todouhuken ha hukuokaken ga hatu dearu.
yamagutiken nitime ha riree wo tyuusi si, daihyousya mei ga seika sara ni tenka suru seremonii wo yamagutisi de kaisai sita. nitime ha simonosekisi de tyuusi sitahokaha koudou de riree wo zissi sita.
hirosima ken nitikan tomo koudou deno riree ha okonawa zu, nitime ha hirosima heiwakinenkouen de tootikisu wo okonau tenka seremonii wo, nitime ha hukuyamasi sougou taiikukan syuuhen wo hasiru tenka seremonii wo kaisai sita.
okayamaken nitikan tomo koudou deno riree ha okonawa zu, nitime ha okayamazyou de, nitime ha tuyama tyuuou kouen de, rannaa ga turani naran de tootikisu wo okonau tenka seremonii wo kaisai sita.
hyougoken nitikan tomo koudou deno riree ha okonawa zu, nitime ha himezizyou sannomaru hiroba no suteezi uede tootikisu wo okonau tenka seremonii wo, nitime ha sinoyama siro sannomaru hiroba wo hasiru tenka seremonii wo kaisai sita.
kyoutohu nitikan tomo koudou deno riree ha okonawa zu, nitikan tomo kyoutohuritu kyouto sutaziamu kameoka si de nin hasiru katati ni henkou sita.
isikawaken nitikan tomo koudou deno riree ha okonawa zu, nitime ha kanazawa siro kouen no sannomaru hiroba de tootikisu wo okonau tenka seremonii wo kaisai sita.
paatonaa
purezenteingupaatonaa purezenteingupaatonaa
sapooteingupaatonaa sapooteingupaatonaa
panasonikku, , nippon yuusei, nihonkoukuu, zennihonkuuyu
asosieeteingupaatonaa asosieeteingupaatonaa
, seika riree deha, seika no sousya no mae ni suponsaa syaryou ga turana ri, ongaku wokakenagara soukou sita. syaretu ha saityou de kiro ni oyobu.
toraburu ziken
gatu niti, naganoken naganosinai de okonawa reta seika riree no endou nioite, simindantai niyoru orinpikku kaisai no hantaiundou ga okonawa reta. seika riree no yousu ha nihonhousoukyoukai no tokusetu saito nite sutoriimingu haisin sareteitaga, itiziteki ni syouon nisuru soti ga tora reta.
gatu niti to niti, kyoutohu de okonawa reta seika riree ha singata koronauirusu kansen bousitaisaku notame, koudou deno kaisai wo dannen si, daitai tosite kameoka si no kyouto sutaziamu tokusetu koosu nite okonawa retaga, sono saini sibahu ni siito zyouno hogo zai ga kabuse rare, sono ue wo rannaa ya terebi tyuukei kuruma nadoga soukou sitatame, sibahu ga koosu ni sotte hensyoku. sono koukou wareta riigu ya kokusaisinzen no sakkaa siai nimo eikyou ga deru zitai tonari, kyoutohu ha yaku manen wokakete sibahu wo hari kae rukotoninatta.
gatu niti, ibarakiken mitosi nai wo soukoutyuu no seika rannaa ni muka tte, tooti no hi wo kese, toukyou orinpikku hantai nadoto ii nagara, mizudeppou kara ekitai wo hassya si, seika riree wo bougai sitatosite, douken hitatisi zaizyuu no zyosei wo iryoku gyoumubougai no utagai de genkouhantaiho sita.
gatu niti, toukyouto musasinosi nite okonawa reta tenka seremonii no saityuu ni kaizyou sutafhu ni muke te bakutiku wo nage tuketatosite, zyuusyo husyou no dansei wo iryoku gyoumubougai no utagai de genkouhantaiho sita.
kyakutyuu
kanrenkoumoku

tooti tooti

yunifoomu yunifoomu
toukyou orinpikku seika riree hissu zyouhou
toukyou orinpikku seika riree
toukyou seika riree
toukyou seika riree suhooisuupaazietto no tuirakuziko suhooisuupaazietto notuirakuzikotoha, nen gatu niti ni demohuraito wo itte ita suhooisuupaazietto ga nisi zyawa syuu bogooru no saraku yama ni tuiraku sita ziko dearu. zyouin zyoukyaku mei zenin ga sibou sita. kono kitai niha, kakkoku no syuyou koukuugaisya no daihyousya ya suhooi sya no syain mo touzyou siteita.
sono notino tyousa niyori, kityou wo hukumu souzyuusi zenin ga hikou suru tiiki no tikei wo rikai siteorazu, taiti sekkin keihou souti wo musisi te keihou sisutemu no gosadou dato kangae takotoga ziko genin dato keturon tuke rareta. sarani, boisurekoodaa no kaiseki niyori souzyuusi ga touzi kokkupitto niita mikomi kyaku tono kaiwa ni mutyuu ninatteitakotomo akiraka tonatta.
gaiyou
ziko ki
siyou kizai suupaazietto
seizoubangou
kitai kigou
seizou nen nen suhooisuupaazietto ha nen ni so ren ga houkai sita notini, rosia ga hazimete seizou sita minkan ryokyakki dearu.
touzyousya
kityou arekusandaayaburontuehu nen gatu niti kara nen ke gatu kinmu siteita suhooi no tiihutesutopairotto. tuporehu, yakovurehu, booingu ya eabasu mo souzyuu siteita. nen gatu niti yori no kityou tonari, sou hikouzikan ha , zikan, sono nai ha , zikan.
huku souzyuusi arekusandaakochettokohu nen gatu niti kara nen ke gatu kinmu siteita suhooi no tesutopairotto. nen gatu niti yori no huku souzyuusi tonari, sou hikouzikan ha , zikan, sono nai ha zikan.
nabigeetaa oregusibetuoohu nen gatu niti kara nen ke gatu kinmu siteita suhooi no tesutopairotto. nen gatu niti ni no nabigeetaa tonari, sou hikouzikan ha , zikan, sono nai ha zikan.
huraitoenzinia denisurakimohu
demohuraito
ziko ga oki ta niti no demohuraito ha, kazahusutan, myanmaa, pakisutan, indonesia, raosu, betonamu no roku ka kuni wo mawaru aziatuaa no ikkan de, indonesia wo houmon sita noti ha, raosu to betonamu ni muka u yotei datta. zikohassei tokini ha, suhooi sya ha sekaizyuu de kino oodaa gaari, nai ki ha indonesia karadatta. sosite suhooi sya ha, oyoso ki tikaku no suupaazietto wo seizou siyouto kangae teita.
saraku yama
saraku yama niha izen kara koukuu ziko ga noti wo tata zu, nen kara nen madeno nenkan de kai ziko ga oki teita. ga tuiraku suru sukosi mae nimo kunren ki ga tuiraku si nin ga sibou siteiru. nen niha indonesia kuugun ki ga tuiraku si nin ga sibou sita. nen gatu ni nin, nen gatu ni nin, nen gatu ni nin, nen gatu ni nin ga tuirakuziko de sibou siteiru.
zyakarutaposuto ha tuirakuziko no oosa kara saraku yama wo hikouki no boti to nazuketa. sangakutitai no rankiryuu to kyuugeki ni henkasu ru kisyouzyouken ha, kono tiiki de oki ru ooku no tuirakuziko no genin tonatteiru.
tuiraku
ha gentizikan toki hun toki hun ni harimuperudanakusuma kokusaikuukou wo ririku si, demohuraito wo itte syuppatu kuukou ni modoru yotei datta. demohuraito hakono niti dome de, zyouin mei to suhooi no daihyousya mei, zyoukyaku mei ga touzyou siteita. zyoukyaku no ooku ha aviasutaa, batabia koukuu, peritaea, suriuizyaya koukuu kara kita daihyousya datta. toki hun toki hun , riyuu ha humei daga pairotto ha , fiito , kara , fiito , ni kouka surukotowo rikuesuto si, kanseikan ha kyoka wo dasi ta. korega kansei tono saigo no kousin tonatta. sokoha zyakaruta kara minami he kairi niaru takasa , fiito , no saraku yama no tikaku de, soreha youkyuu sareta hikou reberu yorimo takai yama datta. douki ha toki hun toki hun ni saraku yama ni tuiraku si, hitozenin ga sibou sita.
abieesyonherarudo no saimonhuradetukii si ha tugino youni houkoku siteiru.
koukuu kanseikan ha eigo deno kousin no kiwa, tokuni gengozyou no mondai hanakattato houkoku siteimasu. pairotto ga usen mawato kouka wo rikuesuto sitatokiha bogooru zyoukuu, saraku yama no santyou kara hokutou ni kairi no titen desita. rikuesuto wo kyohi suru riyuu monaitame, kanseikan ha kyoka wo dasi taga, sono noti koukuuki karano outou haarimasendesita. usen kai notino houi nomama saraku yama ni tuiraku sitanokaha humei desuga, ha burakkubokkusu ga koukuuki no tadotu ta mitinori wo setumeisi tekurerukotowo nozon deimasu. matasudeni huraitopuran, reedaadeeta, kiroku, kanseikan heno intabyuu no utusi wo hukumu subete no deeta ha, indonesia kokka unyu anzen iinkai ni hikiwatasa reteimasu.
gatu niti toki hun toki hun , saraku yama de suhooisuupaazietto no zangai ga hakken sareta. kitai ha tuiraku tyokuzen ni zyakaruta ni muka tte yama wo tokei mawari ni hikou siteitakotoga waka tta. yobityousa houkokusyo deha kitai ha , fiito , no takasa no gake ni gekitotu sita noti, , fiito , no titen made syamen wo suberi oti tatosareta. genba niha koukuuki deha akusesu dekizu, kyuuzyotai hasono niti no yoru ninattemo tuiraku genba ni tadori tuku kotogadekinakatta.
ziko tyousa
ziko yokuzitu, domiitoriimedoveeziehu syusyou ha ziko tyousa notame, rosia sangyouboueki syou no yuriiisuruuzaa hikii ru ziko tyousa iinkai wo hossoku saseta. indonesia kokka unyu anzen iinkai niyoruto tuiraku genin tokutei niha saidai demo ke gatu kakarutosareta. nen gatu niti, kitai biyoku bu kara yaku no titen de kokkupittoboisurekoodaa ga hakken sare, dounen gatu niti niha, huraitodeetarekoodaa ga hakken sareta.
saisyuuhoukokusyo ha nen gatu niti ni happyou sare, ziko ni tunaga ttatosareru genin ha subete hyuumaneraa niyorumonodato keturon tuke rareta. syousai ha ikano touri.
koukuuki no taiti sekkin keihou souti sisutemu ha seizyou ni kinousi teori, tuiraku tyokuzen nimo souzyuusi rani keikoku wo hassi teita. sikasi, atui kumo de oowa rete sikai wo saegira reteirunonimo kakawa razu keihou ha gosadou dato kangae, keihou sisutemu wo ohu nisitakoto.
kokkupitto nai niita kokyaku tono kaiwa de tyuui sanman ninari, kitai ga kiken na zyoutai ni otitu teirukotoni kiga tuka nakattakoto.
kanseikan ga motu teita sutorippu niha ziko ki ga suhooi sya no gunyouki wo simesu to touroku sareteori, ga ryokyakki dehanaku gunyouki dato gokai suruyouna raberu ga tuke rareteita. no hikou keirozyou niha gun no hikou kunren kuuiki gaari, kanseikan hasokoni muka tteiruto kangae ta. soreniyori, kanseikan ha ni , fiito heno kouka kyoka wo dasi tesimai, honrai nara ryokyakki ga hikou suruhazunonai teikou do de hikou sitesimattakoto.
souzyuusi raga okonau hikou mae no buriifingu de tizyou syokuin kara bogooru syuuhen no tikei ni kansu rukotoga giron sarenakattakoto.
souzyuusi raga motu teita koukuu tyaato niha bogooru syuuhen no tikei ga kuwasiku notu teorazu, tuiraku genba tonatta saraku yama mo kisai ganakattakoto.

ryakureki
hukusima ken syussin. hukusima sihan gakkou sotu. hukusima ken, toukyouto de syou tyuugakkou kyousi wo tutome ta. taisyokugo kyouiku zassi hitono hensyuuiin tonari, razio kodomo to kyouiku denwasoudan nadode soudanyaku wo tantou.

sankou
dezitaru han nihonzin meidai ziten endou toyokiti kotobanku toukeirikigaku nioite, netuteki doburoi hatyou ei , mataha netuteki hatyou ei toha, aru ondo niokeru ryuusi no ryousirikigakuteki na hiroga rino doai wo arawasu tokusei tyou. taisyou tosuru kei ga koten toukeirikigaku de atukae ruka, mataha ryousitoukei rikigaku no tekiyou ga hituyou kawo simesu sihyou tonaru. ryuusi no situryou ga karuku, ondo ga teion dearuhodo, netuteki doburoi hatyou ha hiroga ri, ryousirikigakuteki seisitu ga kentyo tonaru. netuteki doburoi hatyou ga ryuusi mano heikinkyori ni tikazu kuto, kei wo koten toukeirikigaku de atukau kotohadekizu, ryousitoukei rikigaku no tekiyou ga hituyou tonaru. boosu kitai deha, netuteki doburoi hatyou ga heikin ryuusi kan kyori ni tikazu ku gokuteion demade reikyaku siteikuto, kaku ryuusi no hadoukansuu ga kasanari hazime, boosu boosuainsyutain gyousyuku to yoba reru ryousiteki na souteni gensyou ga syouzi ru.
gaiyou
bussitu nami no riron deha, undouryou womotu ryousirikigaku ryuusi ha doburoi hatyou hatyou

koten toukeirikigaku to tekiyougenkai
koten toukeirikigaku nioite, ziyuu ryuusi karanaru risoukitai deha, bunpaikansuu ya bunpaikansuu kara mitibika reru entoropii ha netuteki doburoi hatyou wo motiite arawasu kotogadekiru.
situryou wo tosuru ziyuu ryuusi karanaru risoukitai ga ondo no netuheikou zyoutai niarutosuru. ryuusisuu wo ko, kei no taiseki wotosuruto, kanonikaru bunpu deno bunpaikansuu ha ha

kono entoropii ha ondo totomoni gensyou si, yagateha hunoatai wotori, zettaireido de hu no mugendai tonaru. koreha zettaireido de entoropii ga zero tonarutoiu neturikigaku dai housoku ni hansu ru. entoropii ga zero tonarunoha, taisuu kansuu no kou ga tadasika ra oto naru naru

, ,
hukin dearu. koreha netuteki doburoi hatyou ga ga
de sadama ru heikin ryuusi kan kyori ni tikazu ku teion deha, koten toukeirikigaku no tekiyougenkai tonari, ryousitoukei rikigaku no tekiyou ga hituyou tonarukotowo sisasi teiru.
boosu boosuainsyutain gyousyuku
netuteki doburoi hatyou ha, ryousirikigakuteki na souteni gensyou dearu boosu boosuainsyutain gyousyuku ga syouzi ru zyouken wo tokutyou zukeru.
boosu ryuusi no syuudan dearu boosu kitai deha, teniondo ika de kyositeki na kosuu no boosu ryuusi ga saitei enerugii no ryousi zyoutai ni otikomu boosu boosuainsyutain gyousyuku wo oko su. boosu ryuusi ga sitagau boosu toukei deha, dousyu ryuusi ha kubetu dekizu, niniko no ryuusi ga onazi enerugii zyoutai wotorukotogadekiru. gokuteion de boosu kitai ga netuteki doburoi hatyou ga heikin gensi kan kyori ni tikazu kuto, kaku ryuusi no hadoukansuu ga tagaini kasanari hazime ru. konotoki, kei no boosu ryuusi ha koukan ni taisi te hadoukansuu wo taisyou nisiyouto soukuukan no onazi basyo ni gyousyuku suru. boosu boosuainsyutain gyousyuku ga oki ruto, boosu ryuusi no syuudan ha hitotu no hadoukansuu de kizyutu sare, kohiirento ni huru mau.
risou boosu kitai no itiyou na kei deha, boosu boosuainsyutain gyousyuku ga oki ru zyouken ha ryuusisuu mitudo to netuteki doburoi hatyou niyori,
lambda lambda

.
to arawasu kotogadekiru. tadasi, zeta ha riimanzeeta kansuu dearu.

lambda lambda
de teigi sareru rho ha isoukuukan mitudo to yoba re, isoukuukan mitudo ga teido no oodaa tonarutokini boosu boosuainsyutain gyousyuku ga oki rukotowo arawasi teiru. kono zyouken ha de atae rareru heikin gensi kan kyori yori, netuteki doburoi hatyou ga tiisai kotoni taiou suru.

sankoubunken
. toukeibuturi gaku , wadati miki, kozima zyou, hara keimei, toyoda sei wake kyouritusyuppan, nen.
kuga takahiro reezaa reikyaku to boozu gyousyuku iwanamisyoten iwanamikouza buturi no sekai samazamana bussitu kei , nen.
. gurainaa, . syutekkaa, . naize neturikigaku toukeirikigaku , itou sin yasusi, aoki keiko wake syupuringaafearaaku toukyou gurainaa buturi tekisutosiriizu , nen.
suzuki akira, huzita sigetugu toukeineturikigaku no kiso kyouritusyuppan, nen.
isihara sumio, izumida wataru ryousitoukei rikigakuu makuro na gensyou wo ryousirikigaku kara rikai surutamenii kyouritusyuppan huroo siki buturi ensyuu siriizu , nen.
. . . sangai sangai, bon , mataha bon , toha, bukkyou niokeru yokukai sikikai musyoku kai no mittu no sekai nokotodeari, syuzyou ga seisi wo kurikaesi nagara rinne suru sekai wosono mittu ni wake tamono. san ari sanutomoiu. yokukai yorimo sikikai nohouga, sikikai yorimo musyoku kai nohouga, issousugureta seizon nosikatadearuto kangae rareteori, sono basyo mo, yokukai ga saika niari, musyoku kai ga saizyou ni iti suru.
mittu no sekai
ikano setumei ha, seiki kara seiki goroni vu a subandou sesin ga itizirusi ta abi daruma kusya ron kusya ron ni yoru.
yokukai yokukai, yokkai, bon
yokubou nitorawareta inyoku to syokuyoku gaaru syuzyou ga sumu sekai. musyoku kai oyobi sikikai no sitani iti suru. honnouteki yokubou kaama ga sakan de kyouryoku na sekai. hatidai zigoku kara rokuyoku ten madeno ryouiki deari, kusya ron nioiteha go omomuki tuno seizon zyoutai zigoku, gaki, tikusyou, nin, ten no tane no sekai ga yokukai ni zokusuru tosareru. tadasi, kusya ron wo hou zuru setu issai ubu to taikou sita tyuugan ha ya, notino daizyoubukkyou syoha ha, korerani syura miti wo kuwae te rikudou tuno mayoe ru zyoutai tosita. izureno kenkai nioitemo, tika no sekai to, tihyou no sekai to, kuutyuu no sekai tenkai no saikasou toga, yokukai ni zokusuru.
sikikai sikikai, bon
inyoku to syokuyoku no tuno yoku wo hanare ta syuzyou ga sumu sekai. yokubou ha tyouetu sitaga, bussituteki zyouken syoku, sansukuritto go raten honzi nitorawareta seibutu ga sumu kyouiki. syoku ten ya sikikai ten tomoiu. yuusyoku usikitomoiu yokukai to sikikai no kai wosasu baai moaru. yokukai no ue, musyoku kai no sitani iti suru. syoku toha bussitu nokotodeari, sikikai toha bussituteki na sekai toiu imi. yokukai tohitosiku bussituteki sekai dehaaruga, sorehodoni yokubou ga sakan dehanaitokorowo tanni sikikai toyobu. sikikai niha, kiyosi rakade zyunsui na bussitu dakegaarutosareru. yoku ya bonnou ha nai ga, bussitu ya nikutai no sokubaku karaha dakkyaku siteinai sekai dearu. sizen wo osame ta mono ga sigo ni umare ru sekai. sikikai ha zenzyou no dankai niyotte sizen ten ni taibetu sareru. tenkai no zyousou ha sikikai ni zokusi, matasorewo komakaku ten kyouten niyotteha ten mataha ten ni wake ru. mata, hatu zen no itibu to yokukai wo awa sete itisyou tise kai to yobu.
nao, kumarazyuu ha hokekyou zyobon de, sikikai no saizyoui dearu syoku kukkyou ten wo kouzyutu no utyouten tositeiru.
musyoku kai musikikai, bon
bussituteki namonokara kanzen ni hanare ta syuzyou ga sumu sekai. yokubou mo bussituteki zyouken mo tyouetu si, seisinteki zyouken nomiwo yuusu ru seibutu ga sumu kyouiki. yokukai oyobi sikikai yorimo zyoui niari , tenkai no saizyou sou ni iti suru. kuukan wo tyouetu suru musyoku kai ha, genmitu niha syoku katatiwo mota nai. yueni, sikikai no zyouhou ni sonzai suruwakedehanaiga, bengizyou sangai nonakadeha itibanue bu ni oka reru migizu sansyou .
bussitu ga mattaku sonzai sezu, kokoro no hataraki dearu zyu sou gyou siki no si un dakekaranaru sekai. musyoku kai ha siten ni wake rare, sono saikou tokoro wo utyouten hisou hihi sou ten, hisou hihi sou tokoro toiu.
sono hoka
izyou ni nobe ta kusya ron ga toku sangai deha, gokuraku yasoreni zyunzu ru sekai nituiteha toka reteinai. sono riyuu tositeha, kono utyuukan ga seiritu sita zidai nihamada bukkyou ni zyoudo sisou ha toriira reteorazu, yueni sangai nonakani zyoudo ga kumikoma rerukotohamadanakattakototo, kamiza bu nitotteno saikou no kyouti toha nehan nibbaana , sunawati, sangai kara dassyutu site mu ni kaesu rukotodeattakotoga age rareru. sangai toiu utyuukan to zyoudo sisou no musubi tukiha, daizyoubukkyou no ryuusei ni tomonatu te susumu kototonatta.
mata kusya ron ha, enma wo rokuyoku ten no hitotu dearu yoru maten to gaki kai ryouhou ni oi teiru.
itiran
syuuha niyotte hairetu ha kotonaru.
youhou
hokekyou hiyu hin no sangai ha yasuki kotonaku, nao, kataku nogotositoiunoha, mayoi to kurusi minokono sekai wo, moe sakaru ie nitatoetamono.
sangai ni ie nasitoha, kono sekai ga anzyuu no ti denaikotowo imi si, notini ha zyosei no huantei na tii wo arawasu kotowaza ninatta.
ko ha sangai no kubikase toha, oya ga ko wo omou kokoro ni hika re, syuusei ziyuu wo sokubaku sarerukoto.
kyakutyuu
tyuusyaku
syutten
sankoubunken
taisyou sinsyuu ookura kei tekisutodeetabeesu
kouda tosio kouhon goudan syou tosono kenkyuu tyuukan zoku gunsyo ruizyuu kansei kai, nen gatu niti. . . . . . nen gatu niti eturan.
ueyama haruhei sakura bu ken sonzai no bunseki abidaruma bukkyou no sisou kadokawasyoten kadokawa sofia bunko , nen. . syosyutu bukkyou no sisou dai kan kadokawasyoten, nen syouwa nen
sadakata sei syumisen to gokuraku bukkyou no utyuukan han koudansya, nen gatu niti. .
nakamura moto hoka iwanami bukkyou ziten iwanamisyoten, nen. .
kanrenkoumoku
inga gyou gyou
gokuraku zyoudo edo edo
syaba syaba
syoki no sekaitizu sekaitizu
gaibu rinku
taisyou sinsyuu ookura kei tekisutodeetabeesu
sesin zou genzyou wake abi daruma kusya ron bi don bu . . tororiibasu ei , kome toha, dourozyou sora ni hara reta kasen kakuu densyasen kara totu ta denki wo douryoku tosite hasiru basu wo sasu. tororii toha syuudensouti nokoto. gaikan mo souzyuu hou mo hutuu no basu ni tikai. ryakusi te torobasu tomo yoba re, nihongo deha mukizyoudensya mukizyoudensyato yakusa reru.
denki basu niha tuuzyou, kasen kara kyuuden suru tororiibasu ha hukume nai.
gaiyou
tororiibasu ha romendensya to basu no tyousyo womotta koutuukikan de, haikigasu wo dasa nai, kidou wo husetu suru hituyou ganai, nadono tyousyo wo motu. sikasi, mare ni tororiipooru syuudensouti ga kasen kara hazure ru toraburu ga oko ru. kasen ga bunki kousa suru kasyo deha toraburu ga oko riyasuku, sono temae deha gensoku suru hituyou gaari, kouzokusya retu de zyuubun na syakankyori ga tamota reteinaito koutuuzyuutai wo maneku. genzai ha zidousyakoutuu ryou no zouka ni kuwae, seinou ga yoi diizeruenzin ya haiburiddo housiki no oogata rosen basu no syutugen totomoni haisi ga susun deori, nippon deha sigaiti wo hasiru tororiibasu rosen ha subete haisi sareteiru. sikasi, mitihaba ga hiroku, kuruma ga hikakuteki sukunai syakaisyugi kuni kyuusya kai syugi kuni no tosi niha ima mo ooku nokosa reteiru. mata kanada nadono suiryokuhatuden niyoru houhu de anka na denryoku ga antei site kyoukyuu sareru tiiki, nippon no kurobe damu noyouna kankouti demo riyou sareteiru.
kyuuden you no kasen ga hare nai basyo de soukou surutameno syouhaikiryou no hozyo enzin wo motu monomoaru. kono enzin ha hatudenyou dehanaku, syaryou wo tyokusetu suisin surutameni motii rare, nippon demokatute toei tororiibasu de, denka sareta tetudou no humikiri wo wataru tameni siyousu rumonogaatta. saikin deha, diizeru hatudenki wo tousai sita haiburiddo housiki ya tikudenti wo tousai sita syaryou ga kaihatu sare, kasen ganai douro deyori tyoukyori wo soukou dekiruyounamonomoaru. tyuugoku pekin si deha, wanhuutin no hankagai no keikan taisaku ya tyouan mati no oudan taisaku kenkokukinenbi dearu kokkei husi ya husime no nen niha daikibo na gunzi pareedo gaarutame, kasen wo haru kotogadekinaini riyou sareteiru.
kouzou
dourozyou no kasen tororiiwaiya kara sao zyouno syuudensouti tororiipooru wo motiite syuuden site dendouki wo mawasi, douryoku tosuru. kono tororii kara kyuuden wo uke hasiru kotokara tororiibasu to yoba reru. tororiipooru sentanbu no kasen to sessyokusu ru bubun ha, goku syoki nioiteha romendensya to douyou na kassya tororiihoiiru ga motii raretaga, tororiibasu ha dourozyoukyou niyotteha kasen no tyokuka wo ookiku hazure te hasiru hituyou gaarutame, kassya deha kasen tono kakudo ga ookiku natta baai no tuizyuusei ga huzyuubun deari, zi danmen de ziyuu ni kaiten dekiru suraidaa suri ita siki ga kaihatu sare, hukyuu sita.
taiya ha hutuu no zidousya to onazi gomutaiya dearu. gaikan mo yanezyou no tororiipooru igai ha hutuu no basu tohobo onazi daga, douryokugen ya syuseigyoki ha densya ni hitosii. tada, hutuu no densya to tigatu te senro ni aasu saserukotogadekinaitame, kasen ha no hon de, hon no tororiipooru wosorezore heikou suru kasen ni ate teiru.
tororiipooru to kasen nosorezoreno gousei ya tororiipooru no ensin no mondai kara, kaabu wo magaru tokina doni sokudo wo dasi sugitari, kyuu kaabu wo kiro utosuruto, sibasiba tororiipooru ga kasen kara hazure tesimaukotogaari, sono baai ha ittan syaryou wo teisi sase, zyoumuin untensi ya syasyou ga syaryou no usiro ni mawari, tororiipooru no keeburu wo hitu patte, kasen ni tororiipooru wo kake naosu hituyou gaaru. kasen wo hazure ta pooru ga hane aga tte turi sen supan waiyaa wo setudan surukotowo bousi surutame, ri sen tokino pooru no zyousyou wo bousi suru kyattyaa ya, zenmaibaneno hataraki de hiki himowo maki tori, pooru wo kakou saseru ritoriibaa retoriibaa ga syataikoubu ni mouke rareteiru. mata ri sen wosinakatta baai demo, syasen wo matigae ta baai ya, wazukana tororiipooru no yure nado de, iku beki houkou to kotonaru gawa no kasen ni tunaga ttesimatta baai mo, syudou de tororiipooru wo kudaro site seiki no kasen ni tunagi modosu hituyou gaaru.
nao, zenzyutu no riyuu de ri sen sita tokini anzen de koutuu no samatage ninaranai basyo made syaryou wo idou surutoki, bubunteki ni kasen wo torituke rukotonodekinai kukan tetudou no denkakukan niaru humikiri nadowo soukou surutoki, dourokouzi, ziko, kasai, saigai nadode honrai no rosen no douro ga tuukoudome meninatta kiwa, itiziteki ni rosen soto no douro wo siyousi te ukai surutokinadonotame, hozyo enzin ya batterii wo tousai siteiru syaryou ga syuryuu ninatteiru. mata, katuteha syatai no zetuen ga huzyuubun deattakotokara, sibasiba rouden wo oko site zyoukyaku ya untensi ga kanden surukotomoatta.
ruizi koutuukikan tono hikaku
teturin siki no romendensya tono hikaku
tyousyo
kidou ga hituyou nai.
sono kensetu ya mentenansu ga huyou.
hokano norimono nitotte zyama na dansa ga nai.
aru teido syougaibutu wo sake rareru.
zenrin no houkou wo kae te magaru sutearingu tame, kyuu kaabu demo soukou dekiru.
gomu sei taiya de soukou suru riten.
ensen heno sindou ya souon ga sukunai.
kyuukoubai no syamen mo nobore ru.
romen tono masatukeisuu ga ookiku kagensoku seinou gayoi.
tansyo
taiya ga gomu sei deari, koroga ri teikou ga ookii tame, syouhidenryoku ga ooi.
tororiipooru syuuden notame densyasen bunki syuusoku bu no kouzou ga romendensya yori hukuzatu de, kosyou ya pooru itudatu mo oki yasui.
gomu sei no taiya notame, teturin ni kurabe mamou ga hagesiku, hikakuteki hinpan ni koukan sinakerebanaranai.
tessei reeru ga zimen ni setti siteiru teturin siki to kotona ri, aasu taisaku ga bettohituyou tonaru.
douro ga tyokusenteki katu koudai denai baai, koubu gahami deru kiken gaari tyouhenseika ni gendo gaaru.
basu douryokugen naizou tono hikaku
tyousyo
tetudou niokeru kidousya ni taisuru densya no yuuisei to kyoutuu suru ten ga ooi.
enzin ya batterii ga hituyou denaitame syaryou ga yasui.
dendouki de soukou surutame, tyokusetu haikigasu wo dasa nai.
omoi batterii wo tuma nakuteyoi denkizidousya noyounamonode, hassouden mo hukume te sougouteki na nisankatanso haisyuturyou ga sukunai.
dendouki de soukou surutame, nainenkikan no unten hi ni kurabe yasuku sumu.
dendouki de soukou surutame, souon ga sukunai.
dendouki de soukou surutame, hensoku sindou ganai.
kasen kara kyuuden sarerutame, nenryou nado no hokyuu niyoru kouzokukyori no seigen ganai.
kidouzi kara dai toruku wo syuturyoku dekiru. tosibu deha kagensoku ga hinpan deari, kyuuna sakamiti deno unyou moarutame yuuri dearu.
pawaapakku dendouki seigyosouti ga sime ru wariai ga hikakuteki tiisaku te sumu.
nainenkikan siki no basu to kurabe te mentenansu koumoku ga sukunaku, syatai zyumyou ga nagai.
kaibatu ga takaku, sanso no usui basyo demo syuturyoku ga teika sinai. dendouki de soukou surukotoha, nainenkikan no basu tono hikaku deha zyouki noyouna riten gaaruga, denki wo douryoku tosuru denki basu tono hikaku deha itibu no koumoku wo nozoki doutou dearu.
tansyo
kasen ga hituyou dearu.
kasen no husetu ya izi notameni hiyou ya zikan gakakaru.
rosen no kaihai ga muzukasiku, douro sisyou tokina dono ukai unkou gadekinai.
rosen douro wo tuuka suru tasya no saidai taka ga kasen no takasa miman ni seigen sareru.
kasen ga ensen no keikan wo sokone ru.
henden sisetu no setti ga hituyou.
kasen karazurerukotogadekiru kyori ni seigen gaaru.
kasen wo kyouyou surutame, mae no basu wo oikose nai.
kasen no bunkibu ya kousabu de tororiipooru ga hazure ru toraburu ga hikakuteki oko riyasuku, sono kaihi notameno itizi gensoku ga koutuu sisyou no genin tonariuru. tadasi, genzai ha batterii ya hozyo douryoku nadowo heiyou sitamonomo kaihatu sareteori, kanarazusimo kasen karano zyouzi kyuuden ga hituyou dehanakunatteiru.
tetudou kidou tositeno houkisei wo ukeru kotokarano mondai.
rosen basu ni kurabe ruto kantoku kantyou heno syo todoke nado no zimu ryou ga ooku hanzatu dearu.
zyoumuin no ikusei oyobi kensyuu ga hanzatu deari, rosen basu to hikaku site tadai na kosuto gakakaru.
tororiibasu ga ippanteki denai tiiki ga ooi.
romendensya to basu no ryousya ni kurabe, tokuni nippon deha kokunai ni meekaa ga sukunaku seizou hi ga waridaka de hosyu men demo huri ninariyasui. sou zite, syasai batterii wo syudengen tosuru denki basu no gizyutukouzyou niyori, aete kasen kara syuuden suru housiki no tororiibasu wo sonzoku saseru imi ga kihaku kasi tutuaru.
rekisi oyobi genkyou
yooroppa syokoku
tororiibasu no tanzyou
nen gatu niti ni, doitu no verunaafonziimensu ga berurin kougai no harenzee hukin de meetoru no kukan de unkou wo kaisi sitanoga sekaihatu no tororiibasu tosareru erekutoromoto no siken unkou . syatai ha kaihou siki basya wosonomama motiita keitai tonatteita. kono zikken ha dounen gatu niti made tuzuke rareta. kono zikken no noti, nen ni kaisai sareta pari banpaku de demonsutoreesyon wo okonau nado yooroppa kakuti de zikken ga okonawa re, amerika gassyuukoku nadonimo tutawa tta. syuuden housiki nituiteha tousyo, tiisa na syarin wo kasen ni nose, korewo zyuunansei noaru soudensen de syatai totunaide hippari nagara soukou suru houhou ga tora reteitaga, notini tororiipooru ga siyousa reruyouninatta.
sekaihatu no eigyouunten ha nen gatu niti, doitudoresuden kougai no keenihhisyutain to hyutten no kan de okonawa retamonotosurunoga tuusetu dearuga, kono rosen ha nen ni haisi sare tanmei ni owa tteiru. konotokino syaryou deha zengo ni narabe ta hon no tororiipooru de syuuden wo okonau housiki ga saiyou sareta.
nendai hazime niha kakkoku de tororiibasu no eigyou ga kaisi sareteiru.
doitu
doitu ha tororiibasu hassyou no kuni deari, hazimete eigyouunten ga okonawa reta kuni demoaru. potudamu nadodeha genzai demo tosikoutuu tosite katuyaku siteiru.
huransu
nen gatu niti ni fonteenuburoo de rosen ga kaigyou sita. mata, nendai hazime niha huransu no riyon demo tororiibasu ga eigyou wo kaisi sita. pari deha nen ni rosen ga kaigyou siteiru.
igirisu
nen ni hatu no eigyou rosen ga ingurando hokubu no riizu to buraddofoodo no mani kaigyou sita. igirisu no tororiibasu ha kaidate te siyousya ga ooku, katuteha rondon sinai demo kaidate te tororiibasu ga mira reta. sikasi, genzai ha tosikoutuu deno tororiibasu ha zenpai sareteiru.
amerika gassyuukoku
nen, sukuranton nioite zikkenteki na unkou ga okonawa re, nen niha rosanzerusu de ryokyakueigyou ga kaisi sareta.
amerika kokunai niha kankouti wo tyuusin ni tororiibasu mataha tororii to syousuru basu ga ooku unkou sareteiruga, koreraha retoro tyou no syatai wo siyousi ta diizeruenzin mataha gasorinenzin no tuuzyou no basu dearu.
mata, korerano tosi deno eigyouunten dakedenaku, irinoi tetudouhakubutukan nadonoyouni kyuugata no tororiibasu no doutaihozon ni torikun deiru dantai moaru.
rosia
rosia no syuto mosukuwa ha rosen entyou kiromeetoru, hoyuu syaryou , ryou de, nenkan oku senmannin wo yusou suru sekaisaidai no tororiibasu tosi deattaga, nen getumatuzitu womotte zizituzyou no haisi tonatta. haisi no riyuu ha, denki basu heno ikou to ribensei no kouzyou notametosareteiruga, meikaku na riyuu ha akiraka nisareteorazu, itibu no zyuumin ha mosukuwa sityou no riken garamitosite hanpatu siteiru.
kyuu sobieto renpou nadodeha kamotu unsou mokuteki no tororiitorakku ga saiyou sareteiru rei gaaru.
nippon
rekisi
nen meizi nen niha toukyou siden ki kyoku niyotte tororiibasu no zikken syaryou ga sisaku sare, gatu niti ni hamamatutyou no kouzyou kara sukiyabasi syako made unten sareta. mata, nen taisyou nen niha hitatiseisakusyo ga foodo sei no zidousya wo kaizou si, sansoukouryuu siki no tororiibasu wo sisaku siteiru.
nippon niokeru tororiibasu no hazimete no eigyouunten ha, nen syouwa nen gatu niti ni hansinkyuukou dentetu gen, hankyuudentetu hanayasiki eki genzai ha hibarigaoka eki to tougou sarete hibarigaoka hanayasiki eki to sin hanayasiki genzai no kawanisi si mangan teramati atarino kan . kiromeetoru wo musubu kukan de unkou wo kaisi sita nippon mukidou densya tosareru. touzi kono hukin deha onsen ga wai teori, sorewo kaihatu sita onsenyado yuuenti heno akusesu rosen tosite, touzi no basu gasorinenzin deha tohan hukanou na kyuukoubai wo koe rutamenomonodatta. sikasi gyouseki ha omowasiku naku, nen syouwa nen gatu ni kyuugyou, dounen gatu niha haisi sare, kaigyou noti wazuka tosiyowa toiu tanmei ni owa tta.
tosikoutuu kikan tosite hazimete kaigyou sitanoha, nen no kyoutosiden ki kyoku noti, kyoutosikoutuukyoku no kyoutosiei tororiibasu dearu. sono noti nen syouwa nen ni nagoyasi koutuukyoku no nagoyasi ei tororiibasu ga kaigyou surumade, kono rosen ga nippon yuiitu no tororiibasu rosen deatta.
sengo ninatteikutukano daitosi ni tororiibasu rosen ga kaigyou sita. sono haikei niha, touzi no nainenkikan basu ha oogataka niha taiou siteitaga, izen tosite syuturyoku seinou ga hikuku hinpan na seibi ga hituyou na ue, souon ya sindou nimo kaizen no hituyou gaaru zyoukyou dattatame, densya no gizyutu wo ouyou site syatai no oogataka ni taiou dekiru tororiibasu ni kitai ga atuma ttakoto, mata romendensya ni kurabe te kensetuhiyou ga de sumu kotonadogaatta. sikasi kasensita sika hasire naikoto, mootarizeesyon niyoru zidousya no zouka de douro konzatu ga gekika sitatame teiziunkou ga konnan ninattakoto, mata seinou no yoi enzin wo motu ta oogata basu no kaihatu ga susun dakotonadokara, nendaikouhan kara nendai hazime nikakete zyunzi haisi sareteitta.
tosigata tororiibasu de saigo ni kaigyou haisi saretanoha yokohamasi koutuukyoku no yokohamasiei tororiibasu de, nen kaigyou, nen haisi dearu. rosen basu ni kurabe te syaryou no hiyou ga takaku, mata hoka tosi nohotondono tororiibasu ga haisi saretatame syaryou sinzou ya buhin tyoutatu ni sisyou wokitasukoto, yokohamasi koutuukyoku ga zaisei saiken dantai ni siteisa retakotoniyori haisi sareru yokohamasi den to kyouyou no hendensyo wo tandoku de izisu rukotoga muzukasii kotonadono riyuu niyori, siden to douzini haisi sareta.
ippou, nen niha kansaidenryoku ga kurobe kyoukoku toyamaken ni kensetu sita kanden tonneru de kanden tonnerutororiibasu kurobe damu eki ougisawa eki no unkou wo kaisi. nippon kara tosikoutuu tositeno tororiibasu ga syoumetu sitaatomo unkou wo keizoku si, nagaki niwatari nippon yuiitu no tororiibasu tosite sira reta. sosite nen niha kanden tonnerutororiibasu to onazi ku tateyama kurobe arupenruuto wo kousei suru tateyama kurobe kan hikari gasoremadeno diizerubasu kara tenkan si tateyama tonnerutororiibasu situdou eki taikan mine eki no unkou wo kaisi sita. koreha dou rosen no zenkukan ga tonneru dearutame kanki ni konnan wo tomonau kototo, syuuhen ga kokuritukouennai dearukotoniyoru sizenkankyou heno hairyo kara, kanden tonnerutororiibasu ni naratu te haikigasu wo dasa nai tororiibasu ni okikaera retamonodearu. sono noti, kanden tonnerutororiibasu ha nen gatu niti nite unkou wo syuuryou site denki basu ni okikaera re, nen gatu ikou ha tateyama tonnerutororiibasu ga nippon niokeru yuiitu no tororiibasu dearu.
houki ueno atukai
nippon no hourei ue ha mukizyoudensya mukizyoudensyatosare, tetudou no issyu tosite atukawa reteiru. katuteha mukidou densya mukidoudensyato yoba reteitaga, mukidou niha zyouki wo issi tatoiu imi moari warui insyou wo atae rutosite mukizyoudensya ni aratame rareta. nen syouwa nen ikou, houki ue ha mukizyoudensya toiu tetudou no issyu ni bunrui sare, kidou hou mataha tetudouzigyou hou ga tekiyou sareru. mukizyoudensya unten kisoku nohoka, rosen ga koudou zyouna ra dourokoutuuhou ni sokutu te unkou sareru. untensi ha oogata nisyu menkyo ni kuwae, douryokusya souzyuusya untenmenkyo mukizyoudensya untenmenkyo mo syutoku sinakerebanaranai. oogata nisyu untenmenkyo wo hozi siteiru mono ni taisi teha, mukizyoudensya untenmenkyo no ginou siken igai no siken ga menzyo sarerukatuteha siken subetega menzyo saretaga, nen heisei nen no syourei kaisei niyori ginou siken ha menzyo taisyougai tonatta. nao nen ni kaigyou sita basu syaryou wo riyou sita annai kizyou siki tetudou gaidoueibasu dearu nagoya gaidoueibasu mo denkisya dehanaiga, houki ue hakorerani bunrui sareteiru.
ippou de tororiibasu ha zyouzyutu notoori dourokoutuuhou no kisei ha ukeru monono, koudou wo hasiru syaryou deattemo dourounsousyaryou hou no kisei ha uke nai. sitagatte rikuunkyoku touzi heno touroku, zibaisekihoken oyobi syaken ha huyou deari, zidousya tositeno nanbaapureeto mo tui teinai.
genzon rosen
kidou hou mataha tetudouzigyou hou tekiyou no tororiibasu mukizyoudensya rosen ha, kaki no rosen nomiga genzon siteiru.
tateyama tonnerutororiibasu tateyama kurobe kan hikari situdou eki taikan mine eki .
toyamaken nakaniikawa gunritu yamatyou no tateyama kurobe arupenruuto nai niaru tetudouzigyou hou tekiyou no mukizyoudensya rosen.
diizerubasu wo motiita senyoudou wo hasiru basu rosen karano tenkan niyori nen gatu higai gyou.
ruizi sisetutou
kyougi no tororiibasu mukizyoudensya ha izyou no rosen nomitonaruga, unzen goruhu ba nagasakiken unzen si , nagopainappurupaaku okinawaken nago si no painappuru gou , huruu ri sima oosyantawaa okinawaken nakizin mura huruu ri sima no dendou kaato, tomaipari miyako sima nettai kazyuen okinawaken miyako sima si no toropikarugaidotuaa haizuremo zidousouzyuu goruhukaato no issyu denzi yuudou kaato deari, syasai batterii to dendouki de soukou suru ten ha tororiibasu to douyou daga, kasen karano syuuden ha okonawa zu, sisetu nai no yuugi sisetu atukai deari kidou hou tetudouzigyou hou ni motozu ku rosen demonaitame, tuuzyou ha tororiibasu rosen ni hukuma rerukotohanai.
mata, kako ni seiki no tororiibasu unkou zisseki ga nai tiiki wo hukume ta nihonzenkoku kakuti demo, koudou de zyouzyutu no denzi yuudou kaato wo motiita zikken unten ga zissi sareteiru.
akitaken kamikoani mura nen gatu niti gatu niti, nen gatu niti nen gatu niti niti
sigaken higasioumi si nen gatu niti gatu niti niti
simane ken iinan mati nen gatu niti gatu niti niti
kumamotoken asi kitamati nen gatu niti gatu niti, nen gatu niti gatu niti niti
ibarakiken hitatiootasi nen gatu niti gatu niti, nen gatu niti gatu niti niti
niigataken nagaokasi nen gatu niti gatu niti niti
okayamaken niimi si nen gatu niti gatu niti niti
hukuokaken miyama si nen gatu niti gatu niti, nen gatu niti gatu niti koreranituitemo, kasen karano syuuden ha okonawa zu, zikayou yuusyou ryokyaku unsou seido no katuyou wo nentou ni oita syakai zikken deari, kidou hou tetudouzigyou hou ni motozu ku rosen demonaitame, tuuzyou ha tororiibasu rosen ni hukuma rerukotohanai.
haisi rosen katute tororiibasu ga sonzai sita tosi
toukyoutokubu toei tororiibasu toukyoutokoutuukyoku nen gatu higai gyou, nen gatu niti haisi. kidou hou tekiyou.
kawasakisi kawasakisiei tororiibasu kawasakisi koutuukyoku nen gatu higai gyou, nen gatu niti haisi. kidou hou tekiyou.
yokohamasi yokohamasiei tororiibasu yokohamasi koutuukyoku nen gatu higai gyou, nen gatu niti haisi. kidou hou tekiyou.
nagoyasi nagoyasi ei tororiibasu nagoyasi koutuukyoku nen gatu higai gyou, nen gatu niti haisi. kidou hou tekiyou.
kyoutosi kyoutosiei tororiibasu kyoutosikoutuukyoku nen gatu higai gyou, nen gatu niti haisi. kidou hou tekiyou.
oosakasi oosakasiei tororiibasu oosakasikou toori kyoku nen gatu higai gyou, nen gatu niti haisi. kidou hou tekiyou.
takarazuka si kawanisi si nippon mukidou densya nen gatu higai gyou, nen getukyuu si, dounen gatu haisi. kidou hou tekiyou.
oomati si tateyama mati tateyama kurobe arupenruuto kanden tonnerutororiibasu kansaidenryoku
nen gatu higai gyou, nen gatu niti zigyou haisi saisyuu unkou ha gatu niti .
tateyama kurobe arupenruuto nai no kurobe damu eki ougisawa ekikan . . tetudouzigyou hou tekiyou no mukizyoudensya rosen deatta.
nen gatu niti kara, syasai pantagurahu housiki no kyuusokuzyuuden kanouna denki basu niyoru senyoudou wo hasiru basu rosen ni tenkan.
misei sen
nagaokasi nagaokasi nagaokasi ei mukizyoudensya
tibasi tibasi
nisinomiyasi settu denkizidousya hansindenkitetudou sanka
himezisi himezisi ga himezisi ekimae i den kyo inpun no to nisikityou heta no, hontyou itikawa hasi kayowo keikaku surumo nen ni mikai gyou sen haisi tonaru.
hiratukasi iseharasi kanagawa tyuuou koutuu ga hiratukaeki kara genzai no taira keitou no keiro de isehara eki wo keiyu site ooyama tozantetudou misei sen ooyama kankou dentetu ooyama kousaku sen ni setuzokusu ru ooyama eki oiwake ekikan no roopuuei no ooyama eki ni itaru rosen wo keikaku siteita.
yourou denkitetudou yourou eki yourou kouen kan, mairu. keikaku ha touzi no basu deha tyouoogata teiin nin syaryou dai wo nipponyusouki seisakusyo genzai no mitubisi rozisunekusuto nippon mukidou densya to onazi de seisaku suruhazudeatta. hokanimo, kumamotosi de keikaku sareta.
tororiibasu gizyutu no saisindoukou
genzai ha basu teisyou ka ga susun deori, irisubasu sya nonadonoyouni inhoiirumootaa wo motiita nonsuteppu kuruma ga kaihatu sareteiru.
mata, keikan ueno mondai sono hoka de kasen no hare nai kukan you ni atarasii deyuarumoodo kuruma mo kaihatu sareteiru. diizeru hatudenki wo tousai sita tororii kyuuden tono haiburiddo kata ya batterii gizyutu no kouzyou niyoru tikudenti wo tousai sita syaryou ga kaihatu sare, kasen nonai douro deyori tyoukyori wo soukou dekiruyouninatta. diizeru hatudenki wo tousai sita haiburiddotororiibasu ha, nyuuziirando ya amerika bosuton no sirubaarain de saiyou sareteiru neopuran syasei nomonoya, omoni huransu de saiyou sareteiru irisubasu syasei nogaaru. tyuugoku deha basu tei ni heisetu sareta kyuuden kizyou ni pantagurahu wo osi tukete basu tei de denti ni zyuuden suru syaryou ga zituyouka sareteiru. itaria deha itiziki ziryoku pikkuappu housiki niyoru romen kyuuden siki no tororiibasu ga siken unten saretaga, kotiraha seiseki ga kaguwasiku naku honkaku saiyou niha itatu teinai. rooma no tororiibasu ha, syuutan no terumini ekihukin no ouhuku kiromeetoru ni kasen ga hara reteorazu batterii de soukou siteiru.
mou hitotu no gizyutukakusin ha, handoru sousa ga huyou no gaidouei gizyutu no dounyuu dearu. doitu de itiziki unkou sareteita rooraa siki ni kawa tte, seiki syotou niha hisessyoku no gaidouei siki tororiibasu ga sisaku sareteiru. daihyouteki namonoha, kougakusiki to ziryoku siki dearu. kougakusiki ha zimen ni peinto sareta hakusen wo kamera de yomi totu te souda surumonodearu. ziryoku siki ha zimen ni umekon da zisyaku wo tayori ni souda surumonodearu. zensya ha irisubasu nonado, kousya ha oranda node saiyou sareteiru. tomoni denkikudou no haiburiddobasu tosite sekkei sareteori, tororii kyuuden nohoka, diizeru hatuden no basu tosite soukou surukotomo kanou dearu. nao, ha diizeru hatuden nomino basu siyou nomonosika saiyou sareteinai.
huransu no nansii deha bonbarudiatoransupooteesyon ga kaihatu sitatoiu sisutemu no gomutaiyatoramu ga saiyou sareteiru. koreha ippon no annai reeru ni sotte gomutaiya de soukou suru romendensya ni tikai monodaga, itibukukan ha annai reeru ganaku tororiibasu noyouna soukou wositeiru. tadasi, annai reeru heno setuzoku toraburu ga hinpatu sitatame, ha nansii to kaan no tosi nomino saiyou ni toma tteiru. mata, gaidoreeru no kaabu kukan de daturin suru ziko ga aitugu nado, kousokusoukou gadekinaitoiu ketten mo siteki sareteiru.
mata, kinnen hukyuu siteiru haiburiddobasu no gizyutukaihatu ha tororiibasu nimo ooki na eikyou wo atae teiruga, tokuni tororiibasu heno diizeru hatudenki ya batterii no tousai ha, haiburiddobasu ya hisessyoku zyuudensiki no batterii nomide soukou suru basu ni kurabe, hinpan na zyuuhouden niyoru denti no rekka ga sukunaku dentikoukan no kosuto ga hikui ten de hyouka dekiru.
tororiibasu ga sonzai suru omona tosi
azia
tounanazia deha yuiitu singapooru de unkou sareteitaga, nen ni haisi sareta. kankoku niha kyougi no tororiibasu hanaiga, souru kinkou no souru taikou sono ni soukoutyuu ni gaibu kara kyuuden surutoiu ten de tororiibasu to ruizi suru onrain denkizidousya nozou ressya ga unkou sareteiru. azia taiheiyou deha kyougi no tororiibasu ga haisi keikou niaru. sono ippou de, hensyu ni ata ru denzi soukou kaato ya onrain denkizidousya no unkou ga hazima tteiru.

morudoba
kisinau kisinau
omona tororiibasu no seizou meekaa
oosaka syaryou kougyou nippon nippon yuiitu no tororiibasu seizou meekaa. tateyama kurobe kan hikari katanasi kizyou densya ya kansaidenryoku katanasi kizyou densya wo seizou sita.
irisubasu , huransu runoo to fiattoibeko no basu bumon ga gouryuu sita basu seizougaisya. genzai ha fiatto sihon. tororiibasu ha hoiruinmootaa to diizeruhaiburiddo ga tokutyou noto, kougakusiki gaido nowo seizou.
neopuran , doitu doitu no sinise meekaa. doitu ya suisu heno nounyuuzisseki ga ooi.
hesu , suisu toiu rensetu no oogata tororiibasu wo kaihatu sita.
sorarisu , poorando touou kaikaku de tanzyou sita sinkou no basu seizougaisya. tororiibasu ha, tororiino burando de seizou. rooma heno nounyuuzisseki gaaru.
kyakutyuu
tyuusyaku
syutten
kanrenkoumoku
denki basu denki wo douryoku tosi kasen wo mota nai basu. denkizidousya no issyu.
onrain denkizidousya tityuu no denryokusen kara kyuuden si kasen wo mota naimono.
gaidoueibasu annai kizyou de yuudou sare soukou suru basu syaryou.
gomutaiyatoramu annai kizyou de yuudou sare gomutaiya de soukou suru. tororiibasu to romendensya no tyuukanteki koutuukikan.
tororiibooto kasen kara kyuuden suru dendou booto.
gaibu rinku
tateyama kurobe arupenruuto kaku kaisya annai annai
kurobe damuofisyarusaito denki de hasiru nippon yuiitu no tororiibasu kanden tonnerutororiibasu wo tyuusin tosite nippon to sekai no tororiibasu nituite notu teiru.
yokohamasiei tororiibasu haisi mae ga hasiru douga yokohamasi den hozon kan eizou siataa. yahatahigasi ku yahatahigasikuha, kitakyuusyuusi wo kousei suru ku no gyouseiku no hitotu dearu.
rekisi
hatiman no namae no yurai
ogura mura ookura mura edamitu mura ga gappei site hatiman mura ga tanzyou sitaga, mittu no mura tomoni ubusuna kamisama no hatimanzinzya wo maturi tteitanode, niimura no mei wo hatiman nisitatoiwareteiru.
hatiman mura hossokuirai no rekisi
nen meizi nen ongagun ogura mura ookura mura edamitu mura ga gappei si, hatiman mura tonaru.
nen meizi nen tyousei sikou niyori, hatimanmati tonaru.
nen meizi nen kanei hatiman seitetusyo no sougyou ga kaisi sareru.
nen taisyou nen siseisikou niyori, yahatasi tonaru.
nen taisyou nen
gatu niti kiku gun itabitu mati itabitumatino itibu ooaza tukita kyuu kiku gun tukita mura kyuu kiku gun takatuki mura arao tamura wo hennyuu hokano tiku ha ogura si ni hennyuu .
nen taisyou nen yahatasi ga ongagun kurosaki mati wo hennyuusu ru.
nen syouwa nen yahatasi ga ongagun kamitu yaku mura wo hennyuusu ru.
nen syouwa nen yahatasi ga ongagun setubi mati wo hennyuusu ru.
nen syouwa nen yahatasi ga ongagun kougetu mati to kurategun koyanose mati wo hennyuusu ru.
nen syouwa nen
gatu niti yahatasi ga ogura si mozi si kohata si wakamatu si tono gappei niyori, kitakyuusyuusi no itibu tonaru.
gatu niti kitakyuusyuusi ga seireisiteitosi tonari, kyuu yahatasi bubun ha hatiman ku tonaru.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti hatiman ku ga, momozono kouen nisigawa no douro wo sakai ni yahatahigasi ku to yahatanisi ku ni bunku sare, douzini kohata ku hirohumi mati to kyuu ogura ku yamazi tiku ga hennyuusa re, genzai no kuiki tonaru.
nen heisei nen higasida daiiti kouro ga si sitei bunkazai siseki ni sitei.
nen heisei nen supeesuwaarudo eki kaisetu. higasida daiiti kouro seibi kanryou.
nen heisei nen higasida tiku de kitakyuusyuu hakuran maturi kaisai.
nen heisei nen kitakyuusyuusi kankyou myuuziamu kitakyuusyuusi ritu sizen si rekisi hakubutukan oopun.
ku no gaiyou
kanei hatiman seitetusyo no sougyou irai, seitetugyou de sakae ta mati de, nihonsei tetu hatiman seitetusyo gaaru. higasida tiku nado kunai deha seitetusyo no yuukyuuti wo ika sita saikaihatu ga susume rareteiru.
heiya tiku deha, hobasira sankei no yamayama ga touzai ni susono wo hiroge, kokusai mura kouryuu sentaa, kokusai kyouryoku kikou kyuusyuu kokusai sentaa kyuusyuu , kyuusyuu kokusaidaigaku nadoga narabi, kokusaikouryuu zoon tositeno seibi ga susun deiru.
maruyama ooyati ku deha, syamen ti ni zyuutaku ga missyuu si, kaidan ga ooku, hukurokouzi moari, kyuurai karano syamen ti rasii matinami wo nokosi teiru. tiikizyuumin no koureika ni tomonai, kasai ya sippei nado kinkyuuzi no taiou heno taisaku ga kyuumu tonatteiru.
higasida tiku deha, toti kukaku seiri zigyou ga okonawa re, kako simamoto sen no tyokusen ka ya supeesuwaarudo eki no kaigyou, sinsan gyou bunya no yuuti, ionmooru yahatahigasi nadono syougyou sisetu no seibi ga susume rareta. mata, sizen, kankyou, rekisi wo manabu ba tosite, kitakyuusyuusi ritu sizen si rekisi hakubutukan, kitakyuusyuusi kankyou myuuziamu ga ritti siteiru.
takami tiku niha, kitagawa ha midori yutaka na kyuuryouti gaari, minamigawa ha kyuu densya touri ga hasiri, sinai kakusyo karano akusesu ga ryoukou dearu. kouhinsitu na raihusutairu wo sikou suru hitobito muke ni teian sareta kyozyuu eria de, kodate zyuutaku ya kyoudou zyuutaku nadono seibi ga ittaiteki ni susume rareteiru.
sara kurati ku niha, simin ni sitasima reteiru sara kurayama gaari, santyou no tenboudai karaha kitakyuusyuusi no matinami ga itibou dekiru. kawauti tiku niha, kawauti tyosuiti nohotoriniseseragi hiroba ya saikuringuroodo ga seibi sare, kyuuzitu wononbiri sugo su kankyou ga totonoe rareteiru.
kenkou no kou ni kisai no touri, kinnen syousi koureika ga kentyo deari, nen, yuusikisya dantai nippon sousei kaigi ga happyou sita syoumetu kanousei tosi ni, kyuusyuu no kentyousyozaiti seirei sinai de yuiitu hukuma reta.

nisitetu basu kitakyuusyuu kitakyuusyuu
takasi, kunai ni eigyousyo hanaku, omoni touku nai ha yahatanisi ku niaru hatiman zidousya eigyousyo ga kankatu siteiru.
odekake koutuu koutuu
edamitu tiku, ookura tiku no nisitetu basu gamotomoto unkou siteinai kuiki ya, nisitetu basu rosen ga haisi sareta tasiro kawauti tiku wo unkou siteori, zimoto zyuumin niyoru uneiiinkai ga unei siteiru.

kenkou
ku no zinkou nouti koureisya ritu ga . , nensyou mono ritu ga . to sinai kakuku no naka de mottomo syousi koureika ga susun deiru nen kokuseityousa toukeiti. si zentai dehasorezore . , . , koureisya ritu kurai no mozi ku ga . , nensyou mono ritu ga banme ni sukunai kokurakita ku ga . totomoni pointo izyou no sa . kongo mo syousi koureika ha sinkou surukotoga yosou sareteori, tokuni sara kurayama no humoto ni iti suru tiiki nioitehasono keikou ga kentyo dearu.

denwa

wakamatuku wakamatuku
kohata ku keitaidenwa nituiteha, dokomo, , tomo kunai hotondono tiiki de riyoukanou tonatteiruga, sankanbu de tunaga ranai tiiki gaaru. sedaikoutai ga susume rareteirukotomoari, daisansedai ikou no saabisu nominituite eria kakudai notame kitikyoku seibinado ga susume rareteiru.
sinbunsya
kunai niha kyoten ga naku, kokurakita ku niaru kyoten ga tyokusetu syuzai wo itte iru.
housou
sara kurayama ni hatiman terebi housou tokoro ga oka re, dezitaruterebizyon housou, razio housou no hokan housou wo hukumu , marutimedia housou ni heisetu ga sousin sareteiru. razio housou ha, wakamatuku kyou sousinzyo kara dasa reru denpa wo tyokusetu zyusin suru.
ensou tokoro ha nen ni terebi nisinihon ga kaikyoku si, nenyo riniwatatte housou wo dasi teitaga, kuni no housin de nen ni heisa. honsya ha hukuokasi he, kitakyuusyuu no kyoten ha kokurakita ku heto utusa reta. tatemono ha takamiya ga honsya tosite tukatte itaga, roukyuuka de iten kaitai sare, atoti niha supootukurabu ga tate rareta.

gaibu rinku
yahatahigasi ku ni kanrensu ru tiri deeta oopunsutoriitomappu oopunsutoriitomappu
kousiki uebusaito kougakusyo kyoukai kougakusyokyoukaiha, kougaku kanren no syoseki zassi wo toriatukau syuppansya ga kamei suru gyoukaidantai. nen syouwa nen gatu ni seturitu sareta. omona katudou tositeha, kougakusyo mokuroku no kankou ya rikougaku tosyo sinkan nyuusu no hakkou ni kuwae te, kougakusyo kyoukai zyoubi mise no sentei, tokusen setto no syukka, syuyou syoten niokeru kougakusyo kyoukai fea no kaisai nadoga age rareru. kyoukai no zimusyo ha, toukyouto tiyodaku kandazinboutyou zinboutyou biru kai ni syozai suru.

gaibu rinku
kougakusyo kyoukai kyoukai
sizenkagaku syokyou kai kokeniwa kokeniwa, ei ha, koke wo mein ni dezain siteiru niwa.
koke wo mein ni sakutei sareteiru nihonteien de daihyouteki namononiha koke no sato isikawaken komatu itibi you mati , yosiki entei sono narasi ya, kyoutosi niha saihou tera koke tera ya touhukuzi no itimatumoyou nado, hokani hakokemusiro ehimeken seiyo si uwa mati , hakone bizyutukan teien, adati bizyutukan teien, akisinodera teien, rinsyou in teien, kegon tera, sanpou in sake zukusino niwa, syoukoku teraura houzyou teien, zyukou in hyaku tuno niwa, yanase sou, numazu goyoutei kinenkouen nisi huzoku tei nisi niwa, sinsen sato, houkyou inpon douniwa sono nohoka tiimurabopuranettu . nadonimo, koke wo ika sita teien ga tasuu aru.
nihonkokugai deha, burooderurizaabu ni kokeniwa nadogaaruga, koke ha sibahu nado hihuku syokubutu no daitai tosite katuyou sareteirukotogaaru.
riyou sareru koke ha sugigoke rui, harimizugoke ya siragagoke rui, nado.
sankou
kokeniwa wo nozomu hun tou kata no sumai ookawa tei aitiken husou mati zouen sekkei sikou samurai tuti nyuunoomaru zidai no kurasi hou tanosi mu niwa . niwa , , nen nen
uehara keizi, nen, teien nyuumonkouza. dai kan sibahu koke niwakusa kusabana , kasima syoten syoten
morimoto yukihiro, katura rikyuu no kokeniwa no keisyou teien mo ondanka heno tekiou housaku kentou he, guriinpawaa , , nen gatugou gatugou
ooisi teturou, , kokeniwa no bunka to koke bankei zukuri tokubetukouen koke to nihonbunka , dai kai nippon sentai rui gakkai hirosima taikai tokusyuu sentai rui kenkyuu ,
gaibu rinku
kokeniwa kotobanku kotobanku
hirosima daigaku dezitarumyuuziamu dezitarumyuuziamu
nihonteien no koke tayousei koke no seitaigaku hukuiken ritudai gaku koke kenkyuusitu ooisi yositaka
kyakutyuu yamagutiken koutougakkou itiran yamagutiken koutougakkou itiranha, yamagutiken no koutougakkou no itiran. nao, kennai niha kokuritu no koutougakkou ha sonzai sinai. kennai no tyuutoukyouiku gakkou, tyuukou ikkan kyouiku kou mo hukume te syoukai suru.
zennitisei katei no sonzai sinai koutougakkou nituiteha, teizisei ha koutougakkou teizisei tuusin sei ha koutougakkou tuusin sei teizisei tuusin sei tomoni sonzai suru baai ha, teizisei hyouki de kisaisu ru.
kouritu koutougakkou
nendo heisei nendo nyuugaku senbatu kara, yamagutikennai ni hogosya no zyuusyo gaareba, zibun no sinro kibou ya nouryoku tekisei nado ni ouzi te kennai no yamagutiken ritu koukou nosubeteno katei gakka kara koukou sentaku ga kanou tonaru zenken gakku sei tonatta.
nendo heisei nendo nyuugaku senbatu kara nendo heisei nendo nyuugaku senbatu madeha, yamagutiken ritu koukou no zennitisei hutuuka taiiku koosu wo nozoku ha iwakuni, yanai, syuunan, houhu, asa, simonoseki, hagi no gakku ni waka re, ri sima ya sankanbu wo nozoki sigan kanouna gakkou ga siteisa reteita nendo heisei nendo nyuugaku senbatu izen no gakku wo saihen . zennitisei hutuuka no gakkugai karano nyuugakusya ha nyuugakuteiin no inai koosukurasu ha inai, tani sei koukou ha inai to sadame rareteori, gakku wo koe ta nyuugaku ha reigaiteki soti tosite atukawa reta. nao, hutuuka igai no gakka hutuuka taiiku koosu wo hukumu ya senmon koukou ha kyozyuuti wo towa zu singaku kanou deatta. kinnen ha seitosuu no gensyou nadono eikyou moatte gakkunai deno koukou no touhaigou ya bunkou ka, senmonkatei no seiri nadono saihen ga susun deori, tokuni koko suunen ha maitosi noyouni koukou no keitai gakka teiin tomoni ookiku henkasi teiru.
ikani oiteha, bengizyou nendo nyuugaku senbatu ziten no gakku betuni sirusu. koumei no usiro ni in gatuku gakkou ha, nen ikou no kenritukoukou saihen tougou mataha bunkou ka niyori aratani tanzyou sita gakkou.

yamagutiken siritutyuugaku koutougakkou kyoukai zieiueebutoukyoumooninguredio ha ga housou siteiru razio bangumi. nen gatu niti housoukaisi.
gaiyou
nen gatu made housou sareteita no toki dai to, no housouwaku wo tougou suru katati de, nen gatu ni housou wo kaisi sita bangumi dearu. no toki dai datta waku ha tonatta.
nabigeetaa ha ni hikituzuki bessyo tetuya ga tantou. kono kaihen niyori no asa no waido bangumi ga nen getumatu irai nen burini toki hun kaisi tonari, toki hun no mo hukkatu surukototonatta.
taimuteeburu ueno syuuryouzikoku ha toki tonatteori, nen getumatu madeha zensin no to douyou ni, tugino zikantai no bangumi nen gatu syuuryou touzi ha tono kurosutooku wo itte itatame, housousyuuryou gazure komu baai moatta.
mata, ziki ha humei daga, ohayougozaimasuto iu hyougen wo, ohayou mooningu to kae teiru. koreni awase ru katati de bangumi no hassyutagu mo tonatteiru.
oopuningu ha nando kano henkou wo hete no gatosite tukawa reteiru.
nen gatukoro karaha omoni maisyuukayoubi niti nide douga no raibu haisin mo itte iru. mata, nen gatu niti karahano tyanneru demo saimaru haisin wo okonau.
bideorisaati ga okonau nen gatudo no tyousyuritutyousa no nakani aru saikou tyousyu ritu rankingu huntani de douritu kurai tonarunado koutyou.
oopuningu no nagare
maebangumi douyou ni oopuningu de syauto woireteiru. koreha tougai zikantai de syoki ni housou sareta de zyonkabira ga itte itamonode, maebangumi no wo kabira kara hikitugu saini zihou kawari no syauto mo hikitui da.
toki hun toki hun toki hun daitai koteika sareteiruni, bangumi sutekkaa nadoga nagare ta noti, to syauto ga iru. niha eigo yomi no youbi, getuyou getuyou kayou kayou suiyou suiyou mokuyou mokuyou wo sounyuu suru. kihonteki ni youbi yomi no bubun oyobi bubun wo noba site, ribaabu nado de akusento wotuketeiru. ribaabu nokakari hou ya bessyo nonobasi hou tome kataha niti niyotte kawa ttekuru.
ni teemasongu ga kawa ttakorokara, kono syauto ni mezame runozya nadono komento wotukerukotoga ooi. nengoro karahakono komento ga toki dai mezame runozya, toki dai hune ga deru zo, toki dai hirake goma to tuzuku youninatta.
rei mezame runozya runozya
nao, o rusuban nabigeeto no kiwa ha kinyoubi no tougai zikantai ni housou sareru toha tigai, kono syauto ha hikituga renai. zizen syuuroku niyoruo rusuban, o negai yorosikune ga nagare, sono noti o rusuban nabigeetaa ga touzyou suru.

omona koonaa
nen gatu genzai.
nen gatu housoukaisi. maisyuu tuno teema ni sotte kurasikkusomurie no tanaka yasusi ga senkyoku si, kare niyoru kaisetu totomoni kurasikku no meikyoku wo okuru.
mata, koonaa no sime kukuriniha setouti zyakutyou niyoru kyou to iu niti ni muki au tikara wo atae tekureru kotoba ga housou sareta. nen gatu no zyakutyou no sikyo ikou ha kankeisya no syoudaku wo eru katati de seizen syuuroku sita kotoba wo nen getumatu made housou. dounen gatu karaha matuyama dai kou myousin tera taizou in huku zyuusyoku niyoru asa nohito tokini kokoro wo karuku suru mezame no koramu ga housou sareteiru.
ha, nen gatu niti kara dounen gatu niti made toki hunkoro kara housou sareteita raziodorama. gozitu no akaunto yori kako no housou kai ga koukai sareteita. kyakuhon ha han kazuhiko, ongaku ha yokota akinori otoko ga tantou.
nen gatu niti no no naka de housou sareta riidingudorama ga honsaku no pairotto han niataru renzoku dorama han no syuyoutouzyouzinbutu dearu takano ie no nin to sibata ie no nin ga touzyou siteiru.
renzoku dorama han deha toukyou no mansyon wo butai ni takano ie no nitizyou ni oko ru samazamana dekigoto wo egaku syootosutoorii wo housou siteita.
touzyouzinbutu
takano mirai takano mirai mirai
en toda nao nao

en taguti hiromasa hiromasa

en nakao akiyosi akiyosi
