sudou kaori sudou kaori kaori
en imori miyuki miyuki
yamada tarou yamada tarou tarou
en isii seisoku seisoku
minami hitomi minami hitomi hitomi
en hakutyou kumiko kumiko
kita mayu kita mayu mayu
en sa tugawa manami manami
utida hirosi utida hirosi hirosi
en kimura ryou ryou
suzumura kouzou suzumura kouzou kouzou
en oowada sinya sinya
utida ikuyo utida ikuyo ikuyo
en mabuti ei ri ka ka
aoki hikari aoki akari akari
en yuuka yuuka
nen gatu niti made toki hunkoro kara housou sareteita ha, no hoka no demo housou sareteita hako bangumi. huzi no harazyuku bukkukafe tono rendou kikaku wo housou siteita.
youbibetu koonaa getuyoubi sinkansyoukai syoten tensyu nadowo manei te osusume no sinkan wo syoukai suru. kayoubi zinsei wo kae ta issatu gesuto wo manei tesono gesuto no zinsei ni ooki na eikyou wo atae ta issatu wo syoukai sitemorau. suiyoubi konkuraabe nin no gesuto ga hun no motizikan de osusume no issatu syoki ha ongaku ya eiga moattano purezen biburiobatoru no arenzi han wo okonai, kayoubi kara hikituzuki touzyou suru meingesuto gadotiraga yoka ttaka sentakusu ru. koonaa mei no konkuraabe ha kontentu wo kurabe runo i. harazyuku bukkukafe demo housou sareru. mokuyoubi bukkusaron harazyuku bukkukafe no koonaa bukkusaron sakka wo gesuto ni manei ta tookusyoo no daiziesuto wo housou siteiru. sinkou yaku ha kawabata taketugu, ikezawa haruna.
iryougenba wo ouen
singata koronauirusu to tatakau iryougenba no sien ni tunaga ru zyouhouhassin wo suisin subeku, toukyouto byouin kyoukai wo tyuusin tosuru iryoukankeisya to renkei suru kyoudou puroziekuto wo housou.
kanrenkoumoku
razio saigai zyouhoukou sa ten gatu niti, gatu niti, gatu niti, gatu niti nado kako ni ooki na sinsai noatta niti ni housou. bessyo ga syutuen suru getuyou kara mokuyou nokono bangumi, oyobi kinyou no de housou sareru baai, zikan ha de, doyou nitiyou ha tandoku bangumi tosite housou siteiru. tinamini kinyou ha nabigeetaa no zyonkabira ga, doniti mo komi de tantou suru.
tuuzyou kono kikaku niha, sanka kakkyoku gotoni sennin no saigai paasonaritei mataha anaunsaa ga syutuen siteiruga, senninsya gainai karaha, bessyo kabira ga syutuen siteiru. nen ni suukai, bessyo no sigoto no kankei de keiretukyoku no sutazio wo kari te housou surukotogaari, oosaka kara housou sareru baai ha no sutazio wo kari ru. nen gatu niti niti ha kouen ga hukuoka deattakotomoari no sutazio kara housou sita. izuremo kaku sutazio karano ura okuri deari, oosaka ya hukuoka deha housou sareteorazu, soregaterano bangumi ni syutuen surukotomonai.
kyakutyuu
gaibu rinku
bangumi kousiki saito saito
bangumi kousiki saito saito
. kousiki saito saito
kanzaki siden kanzaki siden, nen ha, nippon no syousetuka dearu. hokkaidousyussin, toukyoutozaizyuu.
keireki
nen, maazinaru de dai kai syougakukan raitonoberu taisyou wo zyusyou si, dousaku wo syozyosaku tosite gagaga bunko yori syuppan.
nen, burakkuburetto wo dengeki bunko yori syuppan.
dou nen, koi no kyuupiddo ha handogan wobutu hanasu. wo gagaga bunko yori syuppan.
sakuhin
maazinaru gagaga bunko, nen
burakkuburetto dengeki bunko, nen
koi no kyuupiddo ha handogan wobutu hanasu. gagaga bunko, nen
kyakutyuu
gaibu rinku
gozen yozi oki no raitaazuhai honnin niyoru burogu
kanzaki siden ezonosisiudo ezo no sisiudo, gakumei ha, seri ka ezonosisiudo zoku no tanensou. betumei, ezonohamaudo.
tokutyou
kuki ha tyokuritu site takasa . , tyuukuu de, zyoubu ha eda wo wake, zyoubu no husi no sitani mizikai ke ga hae ru. ha ha kai uzyouhukuyou de, syouyou ha situ ga atuku teri gaari, tamagogata, kou tamagogata mataha enkei de, nagasa , saki ha ei atama mataha ei sentou, heri ha zyuu kyosi tonari, kibu hahutuukusabi katati tonari, tokini itadaki syouyou ha naka retu mataha sin retu suru. ha no uramen no youmyaku ni ke gaari, zara tuku. youhei no kibu ha hukurozyou ninattehukuramu.
kaki ha gatu. kukisaki ni kei hodono huku sankei kazyo wotuke, hakusyoku no kogata no ben no hana wo tasuu, mituni tukeru. kazyo no sitano souhou hen ha nai ka syousuu ari, kobana zyo no sitano ohusa hou hen ha tuneni ari kou senkei tonaru. hanagara ha ko ari, nagasa . ninari, kobana gara ha ko hodoari, nagasa ha yaku de ohusa hou hen to onazi nagasa ninaru. kazitu ha tyou daenkei de, nagasa ninari, bunka no haimen ni myaku ari, koruku situ ninatte hutoi. bunka no yukan ha komaku tasuu ari, syusi no mawari wo tori kakomu.
bunpu to seiiku kankyou
nippon deha, honsyuu no touhokutihou omoni aomoriken , hokkaidou ni bunpu si, omoni kaigan ya santi no kusati ni seiiku suru. sekai deha, sen sima retu sima, karahuto, usurii, amuuru, ohootuku, kamutyatuka han sima, arasuka ni bunpu suru.
namae no yurai
wamyou ezonosisiudo ha, ezo no sisiudo no i de, sisiudo toha, douka sisiudo zoku no sisiudo nokotode, ukogi ka no udo ni nite iruga oogata de kyougou nanode inosisi ga kui sounanode sisiudo tonari, ezo no sisiudo toha, sono sisiudo ni nite, hokkaidou ni san surukotoniyoru.
tane syoumyou ha, doitu no syokubutugaku mono, bunruigaku mono no gumerin . . heno ken meide aru.
gyararii
kyakutyuu
sankoubunken
takahasi katuo yamakei namae zukan yasou no namae natu , nen, yama to keikoku sya sya
makino tomitarou gentyo, oohasi kou kou murata hitosi iwatuki kunio hen aramaki no nippon syokubutuzukan , nen, hokuryuu kan kan
kadota yuuiti kansyuu, nagata yosio syasin, azegami nouryoku hen yamakei handi zukan yama ni saku hana zouho kaitei sinban , nen, yama to keikoku sya sya
oohasi kou kou kadota yuuiti kihara hirosi hoka hen kaitei sinban nippon no yasei syokubutu , nen, heibonsya heibonsya
yonekura kouzi kazita tadasi wamyou gakumei indekkusu kinukatugihamasiinomigai kinukatugi hama sii no mi kai , gakumei ha, ari hai me okamimigai ka ni bunrui sareru makigai no issyu. nisi taiheiyou dankai iki engan ni bunpu si, kisui iki no ensei sitti syuuhen ni seisoku suru. hyouzyun wamyou ha tamagogata kassyoku de sikitai ga itutu ta kaigara ga satoimo no koimo kinukatugini niru kotoni yurai si, wamyou matubi no gai wo syouryaku si kinukatugihamasiinomi tomo yoba reru.
tokutyou
seigai no kaigara ha kara taka hodo, mare ni wo koe ru. hamasiinomigai zoku no naka deha hikakuteki kogata no burui dearu. kaigara ha haku situ, karada sou ga tatenaga de nezi tou ha hikuku, keiran ya donguri ni tikai katati wositeiru. kara omote ha tan kassyoku no ziiro ni kuro kassyoku no sikitai ga suuhon iri, sono ueni koutaku nonai kara kawa wo koumuru. tadasi kotai niyotteha sikitai ga mattaku nai monomoari, mata kara omote ha kizu ya sinsyoku nadode are yasui tame sikitai ga kakuninsi nikuikotomo ooi.
kara kuti ha tatenaga de semaku, gaisin ha usui ga, kakutei syuuhen hawazukani hikou gaihan suru. kara kuti no ha ha, mazu nai kutibiru tyuuou noyaya kahou ni tuyoi ha gaari, kara no oku made reeru zyouni tuzuku. kono tuyoi ha no zyouhou niha yowaku tiisai ha ga ko, tokiniha ko hodoaruga, kyoku ku mizikaku te oku niha tuzui teinai. kara kutisita hazi niha ziku kutibiru ni makituku youna tuyoi ha gaari, naibu made reeru zyouni tuzui teiru. kono ziku sinsi to zenzyutu no nai kutibiru kahou no tuyoi ha tono mani, tokini tuyoi dansa gadekite dansa bubun ga kakubari rukotogaaru. gaisin utigawa niha suihei ni hasiru mizikai reeru zyouno ha ga ko hodoaruga, kono bubun no ha no kazu yasono kyouzyaku niha heni gaaru.
nantai bu ha, nihonsan nomonodeha toubu syuuhen ha kuroi ga, syokkaku no naka hodoga hantoumei no tan kassyoku dearu.
meisyou
hyouzyun wamyou ha, douzoku no hamasiinomigai . ni niru kototo, tamagogata kassyoku de sikitai ga itutu ta kaigara ga satoimo no koimo kinukatugini niru kotoni yurai suru. wamyou matubi no gai kai wo syouryaku si kinukatugihamasiinomi tosurukotomoaru. kankoku mei ha tei tou natume mimi kai no i de, natume mimi kai ha okamimigai wo sasu .
gakumei no zokumei girisia go uepsilonlambdamupiomicronupsilonfinal sigmaha, kuroi , asi de kuroi asi no i gengi , mosikuha girisia sinwa ni touzyou suru yuumei na senzyutu si no meramupuusu. tane syoumyou ha singapooru ni san suruno i de, taipu hyouhon sinsyu kisai ni motii rareta hyouhon ga singapooru san deattakotoniyoru.
bunpu
nippon honsyuu tyuuseibu sikoku kyuusyuu , tyousen han sima nanbu, tyuugokutairiku engan, taiwan, firipin, singapooru, indonesia nado, higasi azia no ontai kara tounanazia no nettai iki nikaketeno nisi taiheiyou indo hirosi engan ni bunpu suru. taipu santi ha singapooru dearu.
nippon deno bunpu no higasi gen ha mikawawan dearu. katuteha kantoutihou nimo seisoku si, tibaken itiharasi no zyoumonzidai no kaisou karamo houkoku sareteiruga, miura han sima deha seiki kouki ni zetumetu sitatosare, tibasi demo zetumetu sitatominasareteiru.
seitai
nami ga sizuka na naiwan kisui iki no ensei sitti ni seisoku suru. oosio no mantyou tokini mizu nitukaruhodono namiutigiwa tyokuzyou bu de, yosi, tigaya, suiba nadono syokubutu ga hae ta kuiki no, tenseki karekusa hyoutyaku mono nado no sitani hisomu. dousyo tekini mira reru kinensyu ha okamimigai, narabiokamimigai, okihirasiinomigai, siinomimimigai nado de, hokani ha hunamusi, kakubenkeigani, akategani, hasamimusi nado mo mira reru.
reddorisuto keisai zyoukyou
zetumetu kigu rui kankyou syou reddorisuto
kenbetu reddorisuto zetumetu hyougoken hyougoken
zetumetu kigu rui aitiken ehimeken ooitaken hukuokaken sagaken kumamotoken kako sima ken ken
zetumetu kigu rui mieken hokano okamimigai rui to douyou ni, kaigan no umetate ya kaisyuu nado de seisokuti ga gensyou siteiru. umi kara riku heno yuruya kana ikou kukan ni seisoku si, seisoku kankyou no konomi mo genmitu natame, hunatukiba ya douro no seibinado ga seisokuti no syoumetu ni tunaga ri yasui. nippon no kankyou syou ga sakusei sita kairui reddorisuto deha, nenban de zetumetu kigu rui tosite keisai sareta. sikasi kakuken ga dokuzi ni sakusei sita reddorisuto dehasoreyorimo ikamesii ranku tuke ga ooku, zetumetu ga kigu sareteiru.
siryou
hara kisai kara seiki syotou madeno hikakuteki hurui zidai ni bunken no kiroku. tadasikoreraha onazi gakumei de houkoku sareteirutoiudakede, zissaini subete ga dousyu dearutoiu hosyou hanai. nen ni puhu a ihu aaga itizirusi ta no zuhan , zu ni singapooru uno hyouhon ga zusi sareteiru.
sankoubunken
gaibu rinku
kinukatugihamasiinomigahii kyoutodaigaku sougou hakubutukan no hyouhon sasebo san kato tyan ken tyan ha, nen gatu niti ni nippon no hadoson kara hatubai sareta enzin you yoko sukurooruakusyongeemu. hokubeiban deno taitoru ha. . zieiziei ando ziehu tonatteori, syuzinkou ya itibu no hyougen ga henkou sareteiru.
tantei dearu syuzinkou no kato tyanoyobi ken tyanwo sousa si, kaku wareta sisanka wo kyuusyutu suru tameni tyousa ni nori dasu toiu naiyou ninatteiru. geemusisutemu ha sega kara kadou sareta aakeedogeemu wandaabooi nen oyobisono isyokuban dearu hu a miriikonpyuuta you sohuto takahasi meizin no bouken sima nen ni tikai monotonatteori, suteezi mano waapu ya surottomasiin niyoru boonasugeemu nadowo tokutyou tositeiru.
kaihatu ha hadoson ga okonai, geemudezain ha hu a miriikonpyuuta you sohuto dora emon nen wo tegake ta nozawa katuhiro, notini enzin you sohuto nyuutopia nen wo tegake ta yasuda keigo, hu a miriikonpyuuta you sohuto hekutaa nen wo tegake ta takatu tosiyuki ga tantou, ongaku ha hu a miriikonpyuuta you sohuto tyarenzyaa nen ya sutaasoruzyaa nen wo tegake ta kunimoto tuyosi syou ga tantou siteiru.
gaiyou
nihonkokunai han
zyanru ha akusyongeemu de, de hatubai sareta. keiretu de housou sareteita baraetei bangumi ka to tyan ken tyangokigen terebi nen nen wo daizai nisiteori, sono nakano koonaa dearu tanteimono go wo motiihu tositeiru. tada, tarentogeemu tosite tukura retatame, syouzouken no kyoka koso uke teirumonono, doubangumi to tyokusetu taiappu sitamonodehanakatta.
naiyou ha tantei no kato tyan katou tya to ken tyan simura kenga katuyaku suru yoko sukurooru no akusyongeemu de, mokuteki ha yuukai sareta sisanka wo kyuusyutu sini iku koto.
totyuu suteezi mano waapu gaattari, aikata ga kaihuku aitemu ya koin wobaramaku kumo no ueno sekai gaarunado, suteezi kousei tositeha suupaamarioburazaazu nen ni, purei kankaku ha wandaabooi nen to nite iru. nanido ha hizyouni takaku, sira naito susume naidearou basyo ga tasuusonzai suru. ippatu auto denaku raihu sei dearuga, pureiyaa no kura i hantei ga ookiku dameezi wo uke yasui keikou gaaru. mata surippu nosiyasusakara, semai asiba kara oti te tenraku si toiunoga hinpan ni hassei suru. sikasi, tumi nadono kouryaku hunou na zyoukyou tonaruyouna rihuzin sahanai.
touzi hadoson no syain datta takahasi meizin takahasi tosiyuki mo nanido no takasa wo siteki siteitaga, kaihatu menbaa ha ima no kodomo nara, korekuraihasuguni kuria suruyoto omoikomi sonomama seisaku sareta.
mata honsaku no tokutyou tosite pureiyaakyarakutaa no gurafikku ga tori sata sarerukotomo ooi. oowaza hayasi nadono tokumasyoten hakkou no urawaza sassi dehatonikaku kyara no hyouzyou ga riaru nanoga insyouteki to syoukai sareteori, sono gaiken ha yuuzudogeemuzu notino no syoukaikizi de nitousin de kao dake riaru to hyougen sareteita.
nihonkokugai han . .
honsaku ha nihonkokugai dearu deha siyou ga kawa tteori, katou ga. . zieiziei ni, simura ga ziehu toiu kakuu no kyarakutaa wo tukatta taitoru ni henkou sareteiru. mata, geemu nakano akusyon hasyagamuto kouhou ni hunsya suru onara kougeki ga supuree niyoru zenpou kougeki ni henkou sareteitari, tati syon no byousya ga sakuzyo, noguso ga ookami, koneko no koumuri mono wosite sigemi ni hison deiruni henkou sareteiru. kokunai deha enzin hokubeiban , ousyuu han hukumu ni tuika taitoru tosite syuuroku sareruga, rookaraizu nihongoka hasarenai. hokubei ya yooroppa deha nen gatu niti, no baatyarukonsooru de haisin sareruga kokunai deha haisin sareteinai.
geemu naiyou
sutoorii
sisutemu
teki kyara ya syougaibutu ni hureru mosikuha itteizikan ga keika suru do ni baitariteigeezi ga hetu teiki, geezi ga ninaruto misu tonatte pureiyaa ga heru. mata, ana ni oti temo misu. pureiyaa no nokori ninzuu ga naku naruto geemuoobaa tonaru.
baitariteigeezi ha totyuu ni dete kuru aitemu no tabemono wo totu tari, surottomasiin kouzyutu de tokutei no zugara wo soroe rutoikuraka kaihuku dekiru. mata kakusi heya ni itutu te aikata karano hinto wo kike ba zenkai huku suru.
siyoude kiru kougeki ha kikku to humi tuketo onara dearu. kikku ha suteezi niaru hinto ya surottomasiin no heya no tobira wo hirai tari, sakini susumu tameno sikake wo sadou sasetarisurukotogadekiru mottomo zyuuyouna dousa dearu. itteizikan syagamukotoniyotte onara kougeki gadeki, aitemu no huraidopoteto wo toru kotoniyottesono hikyori ga nobi ru. onara denaito taose nai teki moiru. mata suteezi nakani aikata gadaizyobudaa taiko wo tataku heya gaari, kokoni iku to itteizikan muteki tonaru. ka to tyan ken tyangokigen terebi deha taiko wo tataku noha simura nomidattaga, honsaku deha pureiyaa ga simura no baai ha katou gadaizyoubudaa taiko wo tataku
totyuu samazamana tokoro de koin wo eru kotogadeki, kono koin ha surottomasiin ni tukau kotogadekiru. surottomasiin de ata reba baitariteigeezi wo kaihuku sasetari, baitariteigeezi no saidaiti syokiti ga memori, saikou memori madewo huyasi tari, nokori no kyara kazu wo huyasi tarimodekiru.
honsaku niha konteinyuu kinou ga tousai sareteori, no hyouzi ga dete iru mani botanbotanbotan wo douzini osu kotode eria no saisyo kara saikai dekiru. kaisuu ha mugen. kono konteinyuu no sousa ha setumeisyo nimo keisai sareteiru.
aitemu
kagi, koin, poteto, karee, hati zyo ha hazime kara gamen ni dete inai kakusi aitemu dearu. korerano aitemu hagomi hako, haikei no saku, syoukasen, basu tei, kanban, tokini ha nanimo nai kuukan wo kikku surukotoniyotte syutugen suru.
cherii baitaritei ga memori kaihuku.
meron baitaritei ga memori kaihuku.
hanbaagaa baitaritei ga memori kaihuku.
kappuraamen baitaritei ga zenkai huku.
kagi bosu noiru men ni iku tameni hituyou.
koin surottomasiin wosurutameni hituyou.
huraidopoteto onara ga tooku made tobu youninaru.
karee baitariteigeezi ga memori hue, mantan ninaru.
hati zyo pureiyaa no zansuu ga nin tuika sareru.
surottomasiin
surottomasiin heno heya ha zenzyutu notoori tobira nadokara susumu kotoga dekiru. doutyuu de nyuusyu suru koin ga hituyou de, surotto kaiten nituki mai koin wo dekiru. hati zyo, hanbaagaa, poteto, koora, koin, hae no syurui no zugara gaari, teisi sita zugara no kumiawase niyori samazamana kouka wo era reru. ikani sono kumiawase oyobi kouka wo simesu. deme rantyuu no no zugara ha towa nai.
zyouhyou igai no kumiawase hasubete hazure tonaru.
kakusi fiityaa
aitemu to douyou, koreramo hotondo ga kikku niyotte hakken dekiru.
boonasusuteezi boonasusuteezi
tokutei no pointo wo kikku suruto suteezi kan idou nomonoto onazi youna gondora ga ori tekuru baai gaari, koreni noru to kumo no ueno sekai ni iku kotoga dekiru. kokodeha aikata ga kuutyuu kara tugitugi to tabemono ya koin wo nage tekurunode, sorerawo umaku kyatti sinagara susun deiku. zyanpu ni sippai surunadosite gamensita he rakka surutosono ba de boonasusuteezi syuuryou ninaru.
kakusi doa doa
kabe ya nanimo nai kuukan wo kikku suruto totuzen doa ga araware rutoiu basyo mo sonzai suru. tuuzyou no doa to onazi youni hinto men ya surotto men nadoni iku kotoga dekiru.
hanmaagongu hanmaagongu
tokutei no gaitou ya yasi no ki, kabe no paipu nadoni kakusa reteiru. pointo wo kikku suruto syutugen sita hanmaa ga aga tteyuki, kikku sita syunkan no idousokudo ni ouzi te tokuten ga iru. konotoki, saikousoku dato tyouzyou no gongu ga natu te suru.
suteezi kousei
saisyo ni nin noutinoizurekawo pureiyaakyarakutaa tosite sentakusu ru. suruto, mou ippou ga doutyuu deiroiroto zyama wositari hinto wo atae tekuretarisuru kyara ninaru.
geemu ha tuno fiirudo de kousei sare, kaku fiirudo ha tuno eria de kousei sareteiru. kaku fiirudo no saigo no eria eria niha bosukyara gaite, korewo taosu koto niyotte tugino fiirudo ni susumu kotogadekiru. bosukyara no matu siin ni toutatu suruniha kaku fiirudo no eria ni kakusa reteiru kagi ga hituyou dearu. sonotame, kagi wo mota zuni eria ni toutatu sitemo eria no totyuu kara sakini susumu kotoga dekizu, sono hukin ni setti sitearu midori no supuringu ni nori dai zyanpu surunadosite mae no eria ni modotu te kagi wo sagasu hame ninaru.
nao bosukyara niha, bosukyara no kosi yori ue wo kikku surukotoniyottesika dameezi wo atae rukotohadekinai. pureiyaa no asi ha hizyouni mizikai tame kikku no atari hantei ga tiisaku, korega bosu sen no nanido wo age ru youin tonatteiru.
fiirudo no bosu wo taosu to endingu ga nagare ru. syuume ikou hanaku, syuu de syuuryou tonaru.
kyarakutaa
pureiyaakyarakutaa
kato tyan katou
nihonkokugai . . zieiziei kinpatu oorubakku
asi ha osoi ga surippu sinikui. sentakusi nakatta baai ha, hageoyazi sugata nadode dete kite teiban gyagu wo hirou sitekureru. ken tyanyorimo attouteki ni tukai yasui.
ken tyan simura
nihonkokugai ziehu akage ni sangurasu
asi ha hayai ga surippu siyasui. sentakusi nakatta baai ha, baka tonosama nadono teiban gyagu wo hirou sitekureru. honsaku deha asi ga hayaku temosorehodo eni hanaranaitame, ken tyanno houga zyoukyuusyamuke kedearu era reru zyouhou mo kouryaku notameno hinto yoriha, koutokuten wo eru tameno hinto ga ooku naru. zyanpu tikara ha ryousya tomo onazi dearuga, taikuuzikan ha ken tyanno houga mizikai.
teki kyarakutaa
zakokyarakutaa
tokki sitamono igai ha kikku to humi tukede taosu kotogadekiru. humi tukede taosu baai, tyakuti sezuni renzokuteki ni humi tukeruto tokuten ni bairitu gakakaru . ikou ikou nomama . humi tukenoato, tyakuti mae ni kikku de taosi tari, aitemu wo totu tatokimo douyou.
tomezou
kemusi noyouna teki. ki karabura saga ttayouna kanzi de zyouge ni ouhuku siteiru. ten.
puraimasu
hae noyouna teki. hentai wo kumi, sainkaabu wo egaki nagara ton dekuru. ten.
baabaado
hato noyouna teki. hun untoo wo oto sitekurumonomoiru. ten.
moorin
mogura noyouna teki. zimen kara syutugen si, pureiyaa ni muka tte tobi katu tekurukotomoaru. ten.
sindoraa
nezumi noyouna teki. moorin to nita ugoki daga, gamen no hazi ya zyouhou kara araware ru. ten.
gazyabuu
burudoggu noyouna teki. massuguni idou si, tamani tati toma tte hoe ru. humi tukeha kika nai. endingu niyoruto me ga yoku nairasii. ten.
rokkiizyakku
koroga ttekuru iwa. bosu ga nage tekurukotomoaru. gomu dedekiteirurasii. ten.
makkii takkii
taki hi. hureru to hi darumaninari, tairyoku no zanryou ni kankei naku itigeki de misu tonaru. muteki denomi taose ru. hi no tama wo toba sumonomoaru. ten.
kanibunke
kani noyouna teki. sayuu ni ouhuku suru. sisei ga hikuku, kikku wo ate rukotogadekinai.
oisii rasii kaisetu yori. ten.
raadissyu
sakana noyouna teki. umi kara totuzen tobidasi tekuru. ten.
pemopemo
rakko noyouna teki. kaigara wo toba sitekuru. muteki demo taose naiga, ueni noru kotoga kanou.
unibou
uni noyouna teki. kaimen de zyouge ni hane teiru. ten.
middofoo
syougaibutu tonaru isogintyaku. kikku suruto aitemu ya asiba ga deru kotomoaru. muteki de taose ru. ten.
sandeebooi
kaminari sama daga, takagi buu noyouna kao hasiteinai. zyoukuu kara kaminari wo oto sitekuru. muteki denomi taose ru. wagamamana seikaku rasii. ten.
tarineedo
kogata no tatumaki. zimen wo urouro siteirumonoto tobi hane rumonogairu. ten.
herobooi
herikoputaa no katati wositeiru. sainkaabu wo egai te tobu ga puraimasu to tigatu te tandoku de araware rukotoga ooku, onara ga kika nai. waiyaa de tura reteirurasii. ten.
nontaahu a mirii
sangurasu wo kake ta suutu sugata no otoko. muka ttekurudakenomonoto akikan wo nage nagara nige rumonogairu. ten.
hassii
kyouryuu noyouna seibutu. taosu niha hanasaki ni onara wo ate rusikanai. kouhan ninaruto hi wo haku hu a iahassii ga syutugen suruyouninaru. sessyoku dameezi ga nanode, baitaritei no saidaiti ga aga tteirebabutukattemo karou zite tasuka ru baai gaaru. ten muteki tokino taiata riha ten . kubi ha nagai ga dou ha tiisaku teasi ha mizikai.
kohassii
hassii no kodomo. gazyabuu to onazi ugoki de hoe rukotomoaru. kikku, onara de taose ruga humi tukeha kika nai.
kaisetu ni to kaka reteite, inu ni nite irurasiisouha mie naiga ten.
untoo
togurowo mai ta daiben. burokku wono naka kara dete kurukotomoari, zimen ni oti te sukosi tatuto kie ru. mitame karaha sinzi rarenaiga humi tukede taose ru. ten.
kuribou kuribou
kuri no iga to omowa reru. pureiyaa ga tikazu kuto ki kara oti tekuru. ten.
denkya denkya
ugoka nai iwa. muteki denaito taose nai. ten.
iwa turara turara
seisikimeisyou humei. pureiyaa ga tikazu kuto rakka si, zimen ni ata ruto kudake ru. ten.
hitodama hitodama
seisikimeisyou humei. pureiyaa no mawari wo tadayou. muteki nohokaha onara sika kika nai. ten.
yakyuu booru booru
seisikimeisyou humei. gamensita kara ooki na houbutusen wo egai te ton dekuru. humi tuke deyattukerareru. ten.
yasinomi yasinomi
seisikimeisyou humei. pureiyaa ga tikazu kuto yasi no ki kara oti tekuru. ten.
bosukyarakutaa
kaku fiirudo no eria no gooru wo tuuka suruto, itigamen hun no bosu tono kessen ba ni kirikawa ru. bosu ha fiirudo niyotte huku no syoku to kao ga kotonaru ga, izuremo kukkyou na oootoko de, sayuu ni idou sinagara tokiori zyanpu sitari iwa zako no rokkiizyakku to onazi kyara wo nage te kougeki surutoiunoga kihonteki na koudou pataan tonaru. bosu ga zyanpu site tyakuti surutokini zimen niiruto, sindou de mai age rarete issyun sousa hunou ninaru. zyakuten ha kosi kara ue zyouhansin nanode, kougeki suruniha sekkinsi te zyanpukikku sinakerebanaranai. kaku ten. fiirudo ga susumu gotoni taikyuuryoku ya idousokudo, kougeki hindo ga masi teiku.
mofiido
fiirudo no bosu. kikku hatu de taose ru. ugoki ha kanman de kougeki moyurui.
rigurugongu
fiirudo no bosu. kikku hatu de taose ruga ugoki gayaya hayaku, sono hun kougeki no hindo mo takai.
hebiimerudaa
fiirudo no bosu. kikku hatu de taose ru. ugoki ha rigurugongu tohobo onazi.
yaaman
fiirudo no bosu. kikku hatu de taose ru. hebiimerudaa yori hagesiku kougeki sitekuru.
gureetopapa
fiirudo no bosu. imamade no bosu yori supiido ga attouteki ni hayaku, taosu niha kikku hatu ga hituyou.
daburuheddaa
fiirudo no bosu saisyuu bosu . gureetopapa yori kougeki ga hagesiku te hayai. kikku hatu de taose ru.
isyokuban
sutafhu
eguzekuteibupurodeyuusaa nozawa katuhiro katuhiro
puroguramaa nozawa katuhiro, kaneda takasi, yasuda keigo keigo
geemupurannaa ura tosiharu, okumura megumi, takatu tosiyuki tosiyuki
geemudezainaa nozawa katuhiro, yasuda keigo, kaneda takasi, takatu tosiyuki tosiyuki
dezainaa yamamoto zigyou, sindou tukasa, matuda hirokazu, satou hirosi hirosi
kyarakutaadezainaa yamamoto zigyou, wa sima tomomi, yamaguti moto moto
saundoefekuto sasagawa tosiyuki, takimoto tosiaki tosiaki
myuuzikkupuroguramu sasagawa tosiyuki tosiyuki
myuuzikku kunimoto tuyosi syou syou
hyouka
geemu si hu a mikon tuusin no kurosurebyuu deha de goukei ten man ten , no dokusyatouhyou niyoru geemu tuusinbo deno hyouka ha ikano touri tonatteori, . ten man ten tonatteiru. mata, kono tokuten ha enzin zen sohuto no naka de kurai hontyuu, nenzi ten tonatteiru. geemu hon natukasi geemu ki daihyakka enzin kanzen gaido deha, sentakusi nakatta hou no syuzinkou ga doutyuu de samazamana katati de syutugen suru koto ya ensyutu nadonituite kouteiteki ni hyouka sita hoka, onara kougeki nadono gehin samo moto tonatta bangumi yuzuri nomonodearuto siteki, sarani tousin daga kao dakega riaru na syuzinkou no zoukei ha bukimi sahaaredo geemu no huniki zukurini hitoyaku katu teiruto kouteiteki ni hyouka sita. sikasi, honsaku ga taka nanido dearu koto wo siteki si, idouzi ni surippu siyasui sousasei ha nare ga hituyou ninarutomo genkyuu sita.
kyakutyuu
tyuusyaku
syutten
kanrenkoumoku
ka to tyan ken tyangokigen terebi terebi
takahasi meizin no bouken sima sima
wandaabooi wandaabooi
gaibu rinku
kato tyan ken tyan hadosongeemunabi ueibakkumasin nen gatu niti aakaibu hun
. . eigo kotoura kotouraha, okayamaken kurasikisi kozima tiiki niaru tiku dearu. katuteno kozima gun kotoura mati kotouratyouni soutou suru.
genzai no kotoura tyuugakkou ku niataru.
gaiyou
kozima no tounan bu niatari, tiku hokubu ha kyuuryouti de, yuka yama wo yuusi, nanbu ha setonaikai ni mensi teiru. nanbu wo touzai ni kokudou gou ga hasiri, kokudouzoi iya syuuhen ni sigaiti ga keisei sareteiru.
huruku ha men sangyou to yuka yama rendaizi no monzen no minatomati tosite hanei, kingendai ha seni gyou hihuku gyou ga zibasangyou tonari, gakuseihuku sagyouhuku denimu no santi tosite kokunai yuusuu no tiku tonatta.
setooohasi no kaituumae no honsibisansen setooohasisen tyayamati eki kozima ekikan zanteikaigyou tokini, touti kunai ni ueno mati eki ga setti sareta.
tiiki
ueno mati sitano mati
kotoura mati ni gappei suru izen ha, kou mura kounoson, kousondatta tiku. ueno mati kaminotyouga yama yori, sitano mati simonotyougasono minamigawa de umi yori no mati tonaru. genzai haoomune kurasikisi tategoto uranisi kotoura minami syougakkou ku.
ueno mati ha, katuteha kamimura to yoba re, huruku ha kibi onko hiroku toiu bunken nisono mei ga sirusa reteiru. motomoto ha nouson dearuga, yuka yama ga sinkou wo atume dasuto, nisisandou iriguti niaru kamimura ha sandou kuti no monzenmati tosite ooku no sankei mono de nigiwa tta.
ippou, umigawa no sitano mati mokatuteha simomura to yoba re, kibi onko hiroku ni sirusa reteiru. edozidai niha kaiganzoi ini menbatake ga ooku sonzai si, men no santi tosite sakae ta. men baibai notameno hunatukiba mo nigiwa i, minatomati tositemo hanei sita.
sitano mati no kumagaya tiku niha, kotoura no uzigami dearu kou hatimanguu ga tinza siteiru. kou mura no meisyou hakono hatimanguu ni yurai siteiru.
mata, meizi nen ni sitano mati ni simomura bouseki tokoro ga seturitu sare, kokunai bouseki kigyou no sensintiiki tonaru.
ta no kuti tou kon
kotoura mati hossoku izen ha ta no kuti mura tanokutisondatta tiku. genzai haoomune kurasikisi tategoto hotou syougakkou ku tonaru.
ta no kuti tanokutiha, sen zui yama no nanroku no setonaikai engan noataru. zenzyutu no kamimura simomura douyou kibi onko hiroku ni kiroku gaaru.
motomoto ha nougyou syutai no ooki na syuuraku deattaga, douson hokubu niaru yuka yama ga syokoku kara ooku no sankei mono ga atumari, sanuki kuni no kotohira miya tono ryou mairi ga sakan ninaruto, yuka yama no minami sandou kuti ni ata ru touson ha monzenmati oyobi hattyaku minato tosite hanei sita. mata miyagemono tosite sanada himo ya ogura obi no seizou ga hazimari, tiku no sangyou tonatta.
meiziki ninaruto rinsetu no sitano mati totomoni orimono no santi tosite hatten sitaga, notini gakuseihuku ya sagyouhuku, mataha denimu nadono kouzyou ni kawa tteitta.
nao, ta no kuti no timei ha yuka no kuti no henkei dearu.
tou kon karakotoha syouwa nen ni hikiami hikiamikara kaisyou sita tiku de, ta no kuti no touhou, ouzi ga gaku no seihou ni iti suru setonaikai ni mensi ta syuuraku dearu.
korai ha minatomati deattaga meizi ninari ta no kuti tono gappeigo, ta no kuti douyou ni hihuku kanren no kouzyou ga ritti sita.
yuka sirao
kozima han simanaka ou bu no yuka yama syuuhen no tiku de, kotoura tiku hokubu no yamagami niaru sankan syuuraku. yuka yugaha, yuka yama no monzenmati oyobi sankan no nouson karanaru. katuteha sanson yamamuratomo syousi ta. sanson mo rinsetuti no sirao siraomo tatiku douyou kibi onko hiroku ni kisai gaaru.
meiziikou hakono tiku no gyousei kankatu hamemagurusiku kawa tteori, kozima si hossokuzi ni sanson ha hutatabi yuka to syousuru.
genzai ha, ta no kuti no sirao tiku totomoni kurasikisi tategoto ura kita syougakkou ku tonatteiru.
zinkou setaisuu
heisei nen getumatu genzai.
tuusin
denwabangou
kotoura tiku wo hukumu kozima tiiki ha kurasiki ni zokusi, sigaikyokuban ha . koreha kurasikisi no tatiiki ni kuwae tukubo gun sou sima mati oyobi okayamasi minamiku no itibu uematu nisi aze minosima to kyoutuu tonaru.
yuubinbangou
zeniki ga kozima yuubinkyoku yuubin ku bangou no syuuhai tantou kuiki ni ata ru.
kozima tou kotomati
kozima tou kon
kozima ta no kuti
kozima sitano mati
kozima ueno mati
kozima sirao
kozima yuka
gakku
syougakkou ku kurasikisi tategoto hotou syougakkou ta no kuti tou kotomati no zeniki, sirao no itibu, sitano mati tyoume no kaku itibu.
kurasikisi tategoto uranisi syougakkou ueno mati oyobi dou tyoume zeniki, sitano mati oyobi dou tyoume tyoume zeniki, sitano mati tyoume no kaku itibu.
kurasikisi tategoto ura minami syougakkou sitano mati tyoume zeniki, sitano mati tyoume no kaku itibu wo nozoku tiiki.
kurasikisi tategoto ura kita syougakkou yuka, sirao itibu nozoku . tyuugakkou ku zeniki ga kurasikisi tategoto uranaka gakkou ku.
rekisi
nen meizi nen kozima guzyou mura to simomura ga gappei si simomura, ta no kuti mura to hikiami mura ga gappei si ta no kuti mura, sanson yuka to sirao mura ga gappei si sanson wosorezore sinsetu.
nen meizi nen gatu niti tyouson sei sikou. simomura ga kou mura ni kaisyou suru. kozima kouriyama mura nouti sirao wo nozoku tiku yuka to ohara mura gappei si, kimi mura wo sinsetu. sanson nouti, sirao tiku ha ue kamo mura he ikan.
nen meizi nen gatu niti kozima guzyou kamo mura sita kamo mura oyobi syuu ten mura no itibu ga gappei si, syounai mura wo sinsetu.
nen meizi nen gatu niti kozima gun kimi mura yori sanson yuka sirao wo ta no kuti mura he ikan.
nen meizi nen gatu niti kozima gun kou mura to ta no kuti mura ga gappei si kotoura mura wo sinsetu.
nen taisyou nen gatu niti tyousei ikou niyori kotoura mati tonaru.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti kozima gun syounai mura yori sirao tiku wo kotoura mati he ikan.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti kozima si syodai to kotoura mati ga gappei si kozima si dai wo sinsetu. kotoura mati ha haisi.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti kozima si dai kurasikisi syodai tama sima si ga gappei si, kurasikisi dai wo sinsetu.
nen syouwa nen gatu niti setooohasisen honsibisansen ga kaituu si, ueno mati eki ga kaigyou suru.
tisei
kasen simomura kawa sangaku yuka yama yama
sen zui yama tousyo tate ba sima tatebazima ta no kuti tou kon oki minami yaku . niaru kaibatu yaku , syuui yaku . no sima. genzai ha muzin sima dearu.
sohu sobo sima zinbazima zyouki tate ba sima to rikuti tono mani aru kuno gansyou karanaru sima.
tokusanhin meibutu
seni kakouhin kakouhin

kyouiku kurasikisi tategoto uranaka gakkou gakkou

okayamaken tategoto ura koutougakkou genzai ha kozima koutougakkou to tougou si, haikou.
okayamaken ritu nankai koutougakkou genzai ha kozima tikunai no suukou to tougou si, haikou.
okayamaken ritu kurasiki kotoura koutou sien gakkou gakkou
meisyo kyuuseki
yuka yama yama

rendaizi rendaizi

douro
kokudou gou gou

rosen basu

kouwan

kyakutyuu
sankoubunken
gan tu maturigoto uemon okayama timei ziten nen nihonbun kyou syuppansya syuppansya
okayamaken daihyakka ziten hensyuuiinkai okayama timei ziten nen sanyousinbun sya sya
watanabe hikari nakano mikoto sei yamaguti keiiti rou siki masahide nippon timei daiziten tyuugoku sikoku nen asakurasyoten asakurasyoten
simonaka naoya nippon timei taikei daisan si kan okayamaken no timei nen heibonsya heibonsya
kuroda sigeo kenbetu mappuru okayamaken kouiki syousai dourotizu nen akihumi sya sya
gaibu rinku
kurasikisi tategoto uranaka gakkou gakkou
kurasikisi tategoto hotou syougakkou syougakkou
kurasikisi tategoto uranisi syougakkou syougakkou
kurasikisi tategoto ura minami syougakkou syougakkou
kurasikisi tategoto ura kita syougakkou raizinguzehu aa hukuoka ei ha, nippon no purobasukettoboorutiimu. hoomutaun ha hukuokaken hukuokasi. . syozoku. kosyou ha raizinguzehu aa hukuoka. kyuu tiimu mei ha raizingu hukuoka.
nao, botai dearu hukuoka booizu oyobi, zissituteki na zensin demoaru hukuoka reddohu a rukonzu nituitemokono kou de kaisetu suru.
gaiyou
hoomutaun ha hukuokaken hukuokasi. unei kaisya ha raizinguzehu aa hukuoka kabusikigaisya. siizun yori raizingu hukuoka raizinguhukuokano meisyou de riigu ni kuwawa ri, riigu siizun ni zyunyuusyou.
nen ni riigu toga tougou si. ga hossoku surutotomoni, bu soutou no . ni idou sita. koreni awa se nen gatu, genzai no tiimu mei ni aratame rareta. tiimu mei raizingu ha, hukuokaken no dazaihutenmanguu ni matura re, raizin to kasi tatoiu densetu wo nokosu sugawara dousin to, zyousyou wo imi suru eigo no wokaketamonode, koubo niyotte kettei sareta. zehu aaha girisia sinwa niokeru nisikaze no kami zehu aawo sasi, huuzin , raizin gasoroi humi ninarinagara syouri wo yobi komu youni, to negai wo kome teiru. maitosi gatu niha, hakozaki miya de hissyou kigan wo okonau noga kourei tonatteiru.
nen gatu niti, rogo no henkou wo happyou. tono zukei kara naru arata na rogo ga koukai sareta. raizingu no raizin , zehu aano huuzin ga kaminari noyouni tikarazuyoku, kaze noyouna hayasa de zyousyou siteiku imeezi wo hyougen siteiru.
yunifoomusuponsaa siizun
yunifoomusapuraiyaa
zenmen yazuya yazuya
rekidai yunifoomu
ouen sutairu
kaizyou syudou no rizumu ni awa se koe wo dasi te wo tataku, oosodokkusu na ouen sutairu. siizun ha, tiimu no sekandokaraa dearu aka wo kityou nisi, no mozi gaasirawareta syatu wo ouen guzzu tositeiru.
kaizyou to ofisyarutiariidaa
kaizyou ha . ofisyarutiariidaa ha . siizun kara siai kaizyou, ibento nadode katudou siteiru.
siizun madeha ga hoomugeemu ni touzyou siteita. raizingu hukuokahatu asi tousyo ha kyuudan tyokkatu deattaga, saisyo no siizun wo oe ta notini dokuritu si, purodakusyonzu unei tonatta. abisupa hukuoka hoomugeemu nado kennai no samazamana ibento ni touzyou siteiru.
masukotto
kami zin kun riigu de yuusyou sita syunkan ni tizyou he mai ori ta. kaminari to kaze no haahu deari, hisoka ni kika waku de sentaa yorino gaadopozisyon wo neratu teiru.
kuruma isu basukettobooru
raizinguzehu aa hukuoka hukuokakennai wo kyoten ni katudou suru kuruma isu basukettoboorutiimu. nen ni kizon tiimu no hukuoka wo sanka ni osame te hoyuu si, gen tiimu meihenkou sita. nen, nihonsya isu basukettobooru sensyukentaikai ni syutuzyou site ikou, nen renzoku de yosen taikai wo kati aga ri nihonsensyuken tennouhai ni syutuzyou surunado, zisseki wo kizui teiru. zyosisensyu mo syozoku siteori, hirai miki zyosi tiimu no kyuusyuu dorufin nimo syozoku ga kuruma isu basukettobooru zyosi nihondaihyou ni sensyutu sare, nen toukyou pararinpikku de gin medaru wo kakutoku sita.
rekisi
hukuoka reddohu a rukonzu
nen, niigata arubirekkusu no suupaariigu dattai ni tomonai, hukuokaken kara kigyou no intento ga tyuusin tonatte tiikimittyaku kata kurabutiimu hukuoka reddohu a rukonzu wo seturitu, siizun kara suupaariigu ni sinkisannyuu sita. hukuoka ha koukou ikano zyunia sedai ya syakaizin noarayuru kategorii nioite zenkoku yuusyou wo teni siteiru basuketto oukoku deari, konokotoga purotiimu hossoku heto tunaga tta. kyuusyuu karano toppuriigu sanka ha nippon riigu reimeiki no hatiman seitetusyo irai tonaru. reddohu a rukonzu toha akai hayabusa to iu imi de, onazi hukuoka wo hoomu tosuru purosupootutiimu no hukuoka sohutobankuhookusu yakyuu hookusu taka ya abisupa hukuoka sakkaaabisupa hati kara hinto wo ete nazu kerareta. kako sima ken wo honkyoti tosuru kurabutiimu dearu renovu a kako sima gen kako sima rebunaizu no tiimu aisyou kouho niha kako sima reddohu a rukon toiumonomoatta.
rensyuu kyoten ha hukuokaken munakata si no guroobaruariina. ganzitu hondai omote no syouzi kazuhiro rawo iseki kakutoku. gaikokuzin mei to sinzin wo awa se sensyuzenin to puro keiyaku wo musun da. heddokooti niha zimotosyussin no gotou tosihiro ga syuunin sitaga, kaimakumae ni harada sigeru ni koutai sita.
sikasi, botai kigyou no keiei husin ni kuwae zimoto suponsaa no kakutoku ga nankou. sensyu sutafhu no kyuuyo miharai ya manen no sito humei kin mo hakkaku si, keiei huan ga hyoumenka. syatyou no zisatumisui nimade oyobu zitai tonatta. sonotame, zennihonsougou basukettobooru sensyukentaikai ooruzyapan niha sensyu sutafhu no zihi de sanka.
nen gatu niti, suupaariigu kouhansen no husanka wo hyoumei surutotomoni, basukettobooru nippon riigu kikou dattai no ikou wo simesi ta. kekkateki ni suupaariigu ha sen zenpai, kousikisen mo ooruzyapan niokeru touzi nensei no takeuti kousuke wo yousi ta keidai tono kaisen deno kati nomide tiimu ha kaisan. ha tokurei niyoru sensyu no tiimu heno ukeire wo hyoumei. mata, riigu mo aariityarenzi sensyu seido wo mouke te sensyu no kyuusai ni ata tta.
singaisya ha hunada yukio syatyou daikou to tizin wo kaisi te mensiki noatta kimura ikusei ga syatyou wo tutome ru inboisu ni sien wo motome, kimura ga kaityou wo tutome ru riigu ni tenseki wo hyoumei, siizun ikou no sannyuu wo mezasi taga, kyuusya no saimu gaarisugi, dougiteki na bubun de kaisya wo nin makase nihadekinakatta hunada syatyou daikou tono riyuu kara, nen gatu hizuke de riigu heno sannyuu negawo torisage ta.
hukuoka reddohu a rukonzu ni syozoku sita sensyu sensyu
ne kan youiti youiti
satou nobunaga nobunaga
ono sou zirou zirou
kougen zyunpei zyunpei
ueyama hiroyuki hiroyuki
syouzi kazuhiro kazuhiro
kawamo tuyosi tuyosi
siroma syuuhei syuuhei
sedorikkupiipuruzu sedorikkupiipuruzu
hotta takesi takesi
takeda ken ken
tanaka takesi takesi
piitaakooneru piitaakooneru
hukuoka booizu
ippou, hukuokasi deha zimoto supootumanezimento kaisya no supootukoodineeto pesasu ga tyuusin tonatte riigu sansen wo hyoumei. hukuoka reddohu a rukonzu izen yori riigu sannyuu wo mezasi teitaga, reddohu a rukonzu no kaisan wo uke, katudou wo honkakuka suru. tinamini pesasu niha moto puro yakyuusensyu no imai yuutarou raga syozoku siteiru.
tosiharu, moto reddohu a rukonzu no kawamo tuyosi raniyotte arata na kurabutiimu hukuoka booizu ga seturitu sareta. tiimu mei ha to wokakete tuke rareta. siizun ikou no riigu sansen wo mezasi suponsaa wo kakutoku. motosensyu mei mo hokyou. nozigiku hyougo kokutai nimo mei no sensyu ga sanka si, hukuokaken ha yuusyou wo hata sita. ippou de kurabu mo ooita hiitodebiruzu no hukuoka niokeru hoomugeemu no kougyou ken wo kakutoku si, no zenzaziai ni syutuzyou siteiru.
nao, genzai no raizingu hukuoka tono sihonkankei ha mattaku nai.
raizingu hukuoka
nen gatu niti, hukuokasi wo honkyoti tosi, siizun no riigu sansen ga kettei sita.
dounen gatu niti yori tiimu mei no koubo wo kaisi. wo koubo no saini siyousu ru zyouken tosi, kouho ha hukuoka asupia hukuoka oosyanzu hukuoka raizingu no mittu tonatta. nen gatu niti kara gatu niti made touhyou wo okonai, gatu niti ni sin tiimu mei ga hukuoka raizingu ni kettei.
gatu ni unei kaisya hukuoka purobasukettoboorukurabu kabusikigaisya wo seturitu. sitasimi yasusaya siyousu ru rogo nadowo kouryosi ta kekka, raizingu hukuoka wo seisiki na tiimu mei nisita. zenerarumaneezyaa niha sanson kyousei, kyuudan daihyou niha tarento no yamamoto kayo ga syuunin sita genzai ha ryoumei tomo tainin .
nao, booizu ha tiimu tositeha kaisan sezu, tousyo ha zizituzyou raizingu hukuoka sanka no amatyuakurabutiimu tosite hikituzuki katudou siteitaga, raizingu hukuoka ni kabusosiki ga kessei saretatame, sono sonzai ga tyuu ni ui ta katati ninatteiru.
riigu
siizunbooizu no kawamo to purotekuto niyori puro keiyaku wo maziwa si, ekusupansyondorahuto de sensyu, dorahuto de nakagawa kazuyuki simei tyokugo ha keiyaku ni itara zu, nen gatu ni keiyaku ra sensyu wo simei. kono hoka, mae toukyou apatti no nakanisi atusi, mae niigata arubirekkusu no haraguti masahide ya hukuokaken syussin no kanou toku dai rawo kakutoku sita. gaikokuzinsensyu ha ziehuriipuraisu, maikerugaadenaa, zyosyupeppaazu, moto senegaru daihyou no dongonuzyai to keiyaku. nen gatu niha maikerupaakaa, gatu niha aariityarenzi seido niyori takeno meirin to keiyaku. heddokooti ha tousyo, hauiranda ga syuunin sitaga, katei no zizyou kara kaimakumae ni kaaruzyonnyuuman ni koutai sita.
sannyuu syonendo ha zyoban nami ni nore zu, nuzyai ga husyou niyori sensyu touroku kara hazure ru zitai tonatta. sikasi, nuzyai ni kawa ru sentaa tosite toukyou apatti yori toreboonburaianto ga iseki suruto hatiku no ikioi de katibosi wo omone, ooita hiitodebiruzu wokawasite regyuraasiizunuesutankanhu a rensu kurai ni suberi komu. wairudokaadogeemu deha regyuraasiizun no syouritu de hukuoka wo wari izyou uwamawaru takamatu hu a ibuaroozu wo kudasu bankuruwa sewo enzi, hu a inaru ni sinsyutu sita. sikasi, hu a inaru deha kanhu a rensuhu a inaru to kurai ketteisen de renpai site kurai ni owa tta.
siizun sinsyatyou ni takeuti kou ga syuunin si, yamamoto kayo mae syatyou ha sinsetu no torisimariyaku ken kyuudan daihyou tonaru. mae ooita hiitodebiruzu no mitutomo kouhei ya sinzin no isigaya satosi raga sinkanyuu. siizun nakani nakanisi atusi tono toreedo de kure ya takanori ga kanyuu. regyuraasiizun ha uesuto kurai tonari, siizun renzoku de pureiohu made susumu ga, kanhu a rensusemihu a inaru de uesuto kurai no ryuukyuu goorudenkingusu ni yabure hu a inaru sinsyutu hanaranakatta. siizun notini kaaruzyonnyuuman ga heddokooti wo tainin.
siizun yamasita yuuzi ga sinsyatyou ni syuunin si, takeuti mae syatyou ha senmu torisimariyaku kani naru. kaaruzyonnyuuman no kounin tositekatute ooita hiitodebiruzu wo hikii ta ogawa tadaharu ga syuunin sita. uesutankanhu a rensu kurai tonari pureiohu ni sinsyutu sitaga, kanhu a rensusemihu a inaru de uesuto kurai no okinawa ni yabure ru. kono siizun womotte kawamo tuyosi ga intai.
siizun kawaguti kentarou ga daihyoutorisimariyaku ni syuunin si, yamasita mae syatyou ha soudanyaku ni sirizoku. nakanisi atusi, takeno meirin, nairumaarii raga kanyuu. uesutankanhu a rensu kurai de pureiohu ni sinsyutu. hoomu kaisai no hu aa sutoraundo de uesuto kurai no simane susanoomazikku ni syouri site, kanhu a rensusemihu a inaru ni sinsyutu sitaga, uesuto kurai no oosaka evessa ni yabure ta.
siizunsiizun mae ni arato site ganzitu hondai omote kooti de kaisetusya tositemo sira reru okuno tosikazu ga oonaa daikou kennin tosite syuunin. mae siizun made tiimu no daikokubasira datta maikerupaakaa ga taidan si, kawa tte tiimu zaiseki keiken noaru kebinparumaa rato keiyaku.
siizun totyuu no gatu hizuke de ogawa heddokooti wo kainin, deitorikku ibaraki deatta kanazawa atusi ga sin heddokooti ni syuunin sita. nen gatu hizuke de okuno oonaa daikou ken ga sinsyatyou ni syuunin sita. uesuto kurai de pureiohu ni sinsyutu sitaga, hu aa sutoraundo de uesuto kurai no siga reikusutaazu ni yabure ta.
siizun nen gatu hizuke de okuno syatyou ga zinin. kounin no syatyou ha bengosi no itou makoto ga syuunin. sin oonaa niha riihurasu daihyoutorisimariyaku syatyou no itou kiyotaka ga syuunin. keieizin wo issin sita. nen gatu niti, riihurasu syouyou zigyousyo ni kyuudanzimusyo wo iten.
gaikokuzinsensyu ga zenin irekawa ri, riigu deno keiken ga houhu na reziiuooren, zyuriasuasyubii, zyosyupeppaazu raga kanyuu. siizun totyuu ni zyasuteinzyonson wo hokyou. regyuraasiizun ha kaimaku renpai no sutaato tonattaga, saisyuuteki ni kako saikou no kati woagete uesutankanhu a rensu kurai de pureiohu ni sinsyutu. kanhu a rensusemihu a inaru de simane susanoomazikku wo kudasi, riigu sannyuu syonendo no siizun irai siizun burini syutuzyou sita uesutankanhu a rensuhu a inaru no kyouto hannariizu sen ha, no douten de mukae ta dai ni kyouto no ofensu wo huriisuroo hon no wazuka tokuten hukuoka tokuten ni osae, saisyuu sukoa de kaisyou. hu a inaru deha yokohama biikoruseaazu ni de yabure taga tiimu hatu no riigu zyunyuusyou.
siizun kyuudanzimusyo ga minamiku ni iten. sin heddokooti ni santou raionzu nadodeno sidou reki gaaru makkutakku wo mukae ru. asisutantokooti niha maemiya saki syainingusanzuheddokooti no sano kimitosi ga syuunin. toukyou sanreevusu wo keiyaku manryou tonatta zimoto hukuoka syussin no aoki kouhei ga kanyuu. gaikokuzinsensyu deha uooren to asyubii ga zanryuu, aratani maikeruderu, sesutaabaa to keiyaku.
kaimaku tyokuzen ni takkuheddokooti ga katei no zizyou niyori kikoku sitatame, gatu niti no takamatu hu a ibuaroozu tono kaimakusen yori sano asisutantokooti ga siai no siki wo situ ta. takku ha hukuoka ni modora zu gatu niti ni keiyakukaizyo tonari, gatu niti ni sano ga seisiki ni heddokooti ni syuunin sita.
nen gatu niti, kanada no burokku daisotu de doitu ya berugii nadode kooti wo rekinin sitekita zieemusudankan ga sin heddokooti ni syuunin sano ha asisutantokooti ni hukki . siizun ha kurai de pureiohu ni sinsyutu sitaga, hu aa sutoraundo de kurai no hamamatu higasi mikawa fenikkusu ni yabure ta.
siizun itou kiyotaka oonaa ha, tasya de mondai wo oko sita toukyou no konsaru kaisya karano haken yakuin to hakensyain no zenin wo kainin, kyuudan kara tuihou sita. kyuudanzimusyo wo hukuokasi hakataku nakasu ni iten. nen gatu niti ni daihyoutorisimariyaku syatyou ni mikuni tyokkou ga torisimariyaku yori syoukaku. mae syatyou ken oonaa no itou kiyotaka ha oonaa gyoumu ni sennen suru koto ninatta hoka, moto kyuudan syatyou de kabusikigaisya arutekusu daihyoutorisimariyaku syatyou no takeuti kou to nisinihon ginkou gen nisinihon sitei ginkou no gendai omote torisimariyaku senmu de keiei konsarutanto no kawabe yasuharu ga komon ni syuunin sita. syakai kouken ibento ya kurinikku katudou mo sekkyokutekini okonai, hukuoka kakuti de zissi siteiru.
nen gatu niti, seisekihusin niyori zieemusudankanheddokooti wo kainin. hamanaka ken asisutantokooti niyoru kantoku daikou wo hete, nen gatu niti ni toukyou apatti riigu rerakamui hokkaidou rosanzerususupaakusu no heddokooti wo rekinin sita zyooburaianto no heddokooti syuunin wo happyou sita. zyooburaianto no syuunin notino syosen tui simane susanoomazikku wo, syouri de kazatu ta. gatu niti, toukyou apatti nadode buraianto nomotode puree keiken noaru zyonhanhurii wo hokyou sitaga, kekka ha kakosaitei no nisitiku kurai sougou kurai ni owa ttatame, zyooburaianto wo kainin. douzini oonaa mo sekinin wo tori tainin si, syatyou no mikuni tyokkou ni oonaa ken wo izyou sita.
siizunriigu toga tougou site siizun ni kaimaku suru yotei no sin riigu no kameisinsei ni hituyou na sien syoudakusyo wo, hukuokaken basuketto kyoukai ga dasa naitoiu tuutatu wo uke, gatu niti ni sin riigu kamei dannen no nyuusuririisu wo happyou sita. sikasi, sono noti mo kousyou wo keizoku siteikunaka, bannin izyou no syomei ga atumari, taimurimitto no niti ni hukuokaken basuketto kyoukai ga sien syoudakusyo wo kurabu ni teisyutu. douzitu, kurabu ha tasukufoosu no nyuukai sinsaiin kai he sien syoudakusyo wo teisyutu si, seisiki ni zyuri saretakotode, raizingu hukuoka no sin riigu heno sanka ga syounin sareta. aratani maezima ne susanoomazikku daikou nen gatu nen no moriyama tomohiro ga syuunin. aoki kouhei ha keizoku keiyaku, nakanisi atusi ga saikanyuu sita. ryoumei tomo hukuoka de nezuyoi ninki gaaru. sin oonaa niha, kabusikigaisya sentobeene no yosii morizi syatyou ga syuunin sita.
gatu niti, moriyama tono keiyaku wo kaizyo. niti niti ha wakayama toraianzuanbasadaa no isibasi takatosi ga tanki keiyaku de daikou tosite siki wo situ ta. gatu niti, arato site zyozeppukurarosu to keiyaku sita. siizun totyuu, zyosyupeppaazu no husyouketuzyou moari kurusii tatakai wo siira retamonono, kurai tonari nen burino pureeohu he sinsyutu sita.
raizinguzehu aa hukuoka
.
siizun riigu
sin siizun ha semipuro niyoru bu riigu ni haizoku.
nen gatu niti ni, riigu ni sinsei siteita, riigu sannyuu ni hituyou na zyunkamei sinsei ga syounin sareta.
nen gatu, riigu, hu aa sutosuteezi, hu a inarusuteezi de yuusyou. regyuraasiizun wo hukume ta suteezi wo sougou sita syoukaku wo kettei surutameno sougouzyuni demo kurai tonari, no toukyou ekuserensu, kako sima rebunaizu no raisensu hu kouhu ni tomonau tokurei tosite, siizun no syoukaku ga kakutei.
siizun nisitiku
kawai ryuuzi gani syuunin. zyoban ni kobayasi daisuke ga husyou de ridatu suru akusidento ni mimai warenagaramo, kati hai de tikuyuusyou. pureeohu deha zyunkessyou de iigurusu nagoya ni rensyou si, hatu no syoukaku ga kettei sita. kessyou deha akita noozanhapinettu wo aite ni dai sen ha oto sumonono, dai sen dai sen ha rensyou si, yuusyou wo hata sita.
siizun nisitiku
nen gatu ni kanda yasunori ga sinsyatyou ni syuunin. gatu niti no syuunin kaiken dehakokode zisseki wo nokosi, itukaha puro yakyuu kyozin no syatyou tosite yoba retai. kumamoto nimo tu roasso kumamoto, kumamoto vorutaazu arunode honki dedottikano keiei woyattemitaitoiu tiimu no wadai tokake hanare ta hatugen no bubun ga wadai ninatta. ippou de, nenkan tiimu wo sasae tekita tiariidaa noto keiyaku kousin wosezu, ofisyarudansu bookaruyunitto wo kessei. tiimurogo wo henkou suru nado, samazamana kaikaku ni nori dasi ta.
hatu no tyousen tonattakono siizun ha hikituzuki kawai ryuuzi gatosite siki wo toru ga, kaimaku husi de renpai wo kissi bobunassyu niwo koutai sitamonono, nakanaka huzyou nokikkakewo mii dasezu, saikai ni teimei.
ippou de unei men deha, oku senman en de nenkanyosan wo hensei si, koukokuryou ya nyuuzyouryousyuunyuu de oku senman en no syuueki wo mikon da uede, husokubun wo oonaa ga koukokuhi tosite sisyutu suru sikin keikaku wo tate teitamonono, oonaa karano sikintyoutatu ga konnan tonattakotode, kessan ki madeni yaku oku senman en no sikin ga syooto suru kanousei ga hassei. koreniyori, ga nen gatu niti ni hirai ta yoku siizun no kuraburaisensu sikaku sinsa de, hukuoka ni huyo suru raisensu wo kaizyo zyoukentuki raisensu tosurukotowo kettei. koreniyori, yokunen do ha tiimu seiseki ni kankei naku heno zidou koukaku ga kima ttadakedehanaku, gatu niti madeni sikin syooto kaihi nomedoga tata nakereba raisensu mo kouhu sarezu, he dankai koukaku suru kanousei mo torizata sarerukototonatta. syatyou no kanda yasunori ha kisyakaiken de kizon kabusiki no baikyaku niyori sikintyoutatu wosuru kangae wo hyoumei sitaga, husai wo kakae ta zyoutai de ga ukeire tekurerukamo waka ranaito taikai no kanousei nimo genkyuu siteiru. gatu niti ni sikinguri ni medo ga hetu tatame, raisensu ga kouhu sareta. gatu ninatte kanda ha zinin si, sintaisei ni sassin sareta. siizun syuuryougo ooku no syuryoku, tokuni hukuoka niyukarinoaru sensyu ga hanare, unei men nosamazamana sippai ga medatu ta siizun datta.
siizun nisitiku
yuugikaminosu ga sin heddokooti ni syuunin. ni koukaku sitakono siizun mo kaimaku kara renpai wo kissi te teimei. gatu ni dome no renpai wo kissi ta noti, nen gatu niti ni kaminosu ga kainin sare, zyozeppukurarosukanarusu ga heddokooti ni syuunin sita. korona ka de siizun utikiri tonarumadeno seiseki ha kati hai de, nisitiku saikai tonatta.
siizun nisitiku
to keiyaku wo kousin sezu siizun desono yakuwari wo oe rukototonatta. mae siizun ni hikituzuki kurarosu ga heddokooti wo tutome ru.

sensyu to sutafhu
episoodo
maborosi no riigu kouryuusen
nen gatu niti niti ni akusion hukuoka nite, touzi nippon basukettobooruriigu ni kamei suru fenikkusu tono riigu hatu no kouryuusen hurendosippugeemu ga okonawa reru yotei deattaga, fenikkusu gawa no syozizyou tono riyuu de tyuusi tonari, nen gatu niti, kousiki saito de happyou sareta. riigu oyobi raizingu hukuoka no kousiki saito deha kaisai gaiyou nadoga keisai sareteitaga, no kousiki saito dehakorerano kizi ni issai hurera reteorazu, tyuusi ni itatu tanomoga sanka soto no tiimu tono taisen ni nansyoku wo simesi tatametoiwareteiru.
nao, riigu syozoku tiimu to sanka tiimu no kouryuusen tositeha, nen siizun mae ni kamiiti maturi zenyasai tosite, riigu sansen tyokuzen no toyama gurauziizu ga nippon riigu touzi, genzai ha ni ikou kamei no isikawa buruusupaakusu to taisen sita zisseki gaaru.
riigu sizyouhatu no daigaku kyanpasu nai deno kousikisen
siizun nioite, raizingu hukuoka ha kousikisen nouti, siai ga touzi kan suponsaa deatta hukuhara gakuen guruupu zokusuru kyuusyuu kyouritu daigaku no taiikukan de kaisai sareta. amerika no purosupootu ya, reimeiki no nippon puro yakyuu demo, gakkou no sikitinai de kousikisen ga okonawa re, doudaigaku demo purobokusingu kougyou ga hiraka reta keiken gaaruga, riigu tositeha hazimete tonaru.
riigu hatu no eikyuuketuban
nen, kyuudan sousetuirai yori katuyaku wo tuzuke, dounen kagiri de puro intai tonatta kawamo tuyosi ga tuke teita sebangou wo eikyuuketuban tosurukotowo happyou sita. riigu niokeru eikyuuketuban ha sizyouhatu deattaga, nen ni kanyuu sita aoki ga sebangou wo tukeru kotoninari, eikyuuketuban ha kaizyo tonatta.

raizinguzehu aa hukuoka
raizinguzehu aa hukuoka harada kyuu hitosi sin harada kunitika, nen gatu niti ha, nippon no mangaka. hukuokaken syussin.
gaiyou
koukousotugyougo ni zyoukyou, syuusyoku suruga, nen de taisyoku site mangaka wo mezasu. bigguueebu ga dai kai syougakukan sinzin komikku taisyou kasaku wo zyusyou si, zoukan syounen sandee nen o syougatu zoukangou nite debyuu suru. nen, kaziwaraikki ni simei sarerukatatide syuukansyounen sandee ni puroresusuupaasutaa retuden wo rensai. touzi no puroresubuumu ni nori hitto tonaru.
suupaasutaa retuden ha nen, kaziwaraikki no bouryoku ziken ni hazi wo hassu ru itiren no sukyandaru de rensai utikiri tonaru. nen, kaziwara no hukki saku otoko no seiza manga goraku no sakuga wo mizukara mousideru. manga gensakusya tosite kyuuti ni oikoma reteita kaziwara ha harada no otokogi ni kandou si, hukai sinnin wo eru. sikasi, kaziwara ga rensaitotyuu ni kyuusei si, kono sakuhin mo mikan ni owa tta.
sono noti ha, seinensi wo tyuusin ni sippitu. zituroku manga wo tyuusin ni sippitu suru. daga, katutenoyouna hitto ni meguma rezu, nen no nakagoro kara, basu kaisya de seisou no sigoto ya reitou souko deno arubaito, raamen ya no sigoto nadowo kengyou sinagara seikei wo tate ru.
nen, takara sima sya yori bessatu takara sima puroresu kanren mukku hon ga teiki kankou sareru. rensaimanga ni harada ga kiyou sare, puroresu zigokuhen siriizu wo happyou. puroresuhu a n no wadai wo yobi, yomi kiri manga ya puroresuirasuto no irai mo hutatabi kuru youninaru.
nen ni masuda tosiya karano rabukooru wo uke te, masuda no ooya syou zyusyousaku kimura masahiko hanaze rikidouzan wo korosa nakattanokano mangaka sakuhin no rensai wo syuukan taisyuu de kaisi, mangaka tosite honkaku hukki suru. harada nitottehobo nen buritonaru syuukansi rensai deari, tosi toiu kourei dearinagara inoti gakede egai teikuto ketui wo katatu teiru.
sakuhin risuto

zen kan dai kan dai kan
rikidouzan puroresu zigokuhen kimura masahiko hanaze rikidouzan wo korosa nakattanoka saisyuusyou gensaku masuda tosiya
no zokuhen. zyougekan.
zouho kanzenban gekiga puroresu zigokuhen nen, takara sima sya
sisyou
oyama yuu yuu
kyakutyuu onsenmizugomatubo ha, hukusoku tuna ban asi me mizugomatubo ka ni zokusuru makigai no issyu. nihonkoyuu tane de, ooitaken yuu si kyuu yuhuin mati nomini seisoku suru.
tokutyou
zentyou yaku , tyokkeiyaku . no kiniro wosita kogata no tansui kairui de, kara omote niha ten koku retu ganai. koke wo syusyoku tosuru.
zengo no onsui iki wo konomi, onsen ga ryuunyuu suru suiro ni seisoku suru. kaityuu deha nessui kousyou noyouna kouon kankyou ni seisoku suru kairui ga sira reteiruga, rikuzyou no onsen ni seisoku suru kairui ha sira reteorazu, honsyu ha onsen no syuuhen iki ni seisoku suru yuiitu no kairui dearutosareru.
bunpu
genzai ha, ooitaken yuu si no yuhuin onsen niaru kinrin mizuumi tikaku no suiro nomini seisoku siteiru.
katuteha ooitaken kusu gun kokonoe mati no housen tera onsen ya, beppu si no kamekawa onsen nado nimo seisoku siteori, mosiki hyouhon santi ha housen tera onsen deatta. sikasi, yuu si igai deha nendai matu niha seisokuti ga syousitu sita.
hozen zyoutai hyouka
zetumetu kigu rui kankyou syou reddorisuto
zetumetu kigu rui ooitaken reddodeetabukku nen gatu niti ni ooitaken no sitei kisyou yasei dousyokubutu ni siteisa reteiru. mata, nen gatu niti niha yuu si no sitei bunkazai ni siteisa reteiru.
seisokuti ga kankouti dearutame, zetumetu ga kigu sareteiru. yuu si deha seisoku ikigai hozen ni torikun dekitaga, seisokuti ga kasyo de seisoku kazu ni kagiri gaarutame, katuteno seisokuti dearu kyuu ginrin mizuumi ni isyoku subeku douti deno siiku zikken wo itte iru.
kyakutyuu
gaibu rinku
onsenmizugomatubo ooitaken kou hora tera koudouziha, aitiken komaki si niaru soutou syuu no ziin. souken ha keityou nen nen . iwaya kohun oyobi iwasaki yama ni rinsetu suru. hondou ga kayabuki yane dearukotode sira reteitaga, kinnen kaisyuu no tema ya hiyou ga taihen dearukotokara, kawarabuki yane ni tukuri kae rareta.
rekisi
nen keityou nen souken souken
nen heisei nen hondou no tate kae kouzi kaisi kaisi
koutuusyudan
komaki zyunkai basu noiwazaki zyusan tokoro higasi teiryuusyo gesya, toho hun.
meitetu komaki sen azioka ekigesya, toho hun. tensutooriiravusongu ha, nen gatu ni hatubai sareta sutoonroozezu no singuru. gitarisuto no zyonsukuwaia ga kai ta. tensutoorii toha no monogatari dehanaku, gendai no touri kaidate teno i.
soreha zenei singurutyaato kurai ni tassi te syuu no kan tyaato ni atu teita. men moozezu to raidoon ha guruupu ga ririisu sita saigo no sin rekoodingu deatta.
doramaa no reni ha, tensutooriiravusongu no myuuzikkubideo sofiimyuraa kantoku no satuei ni kona katta. sono kekka bando no nokori nin no menbaa sukuwaia, ianburaun to mani dakede bideo ni syutuen sitaga, reni no kao no masuku wo tuke ta bando no roodii ga nankai ka araware ru.
kono kyoku ha roozezu no sekandoarubamu sekandokamingu ni syuuroku sareteiru. tensutooriiravusongu ha kyokumoku deari, kyokumoku no deibureiku heto feedingu suru.
nen ni igirisu no sakka rityaadomiruuoodo ha kano sakume no syousetu wokono kyoku kara nazuketa.
torakkurisuto
kasetto kasetto
gefin gefin tensutooriiravusongu tensutooriiravusongu
raidoon
gefin gefin tensutooriiravusongu tensutooriiravusongu
moozezu moozezu
raidoon raidoon
gaibu rinku
tensutooriiravusongu no kasi metororirikku kagayaku yoake ni muka ttekagayakuyoakenimukatte gendai ha, nensei saku no huransuigirisu minami ahurika kyouwakoku amerika gassyuukoku gassaku eiga.
firippunoisu kantoku, ansoniimingera seisaku, sidoniiporakku seisaku sou siki.
zituzai nono tousi patorikkutyamuuso no han aparutoheito tousou wo egai ta sakuhin.
arasuzi
nen, aparutoheito taisei sitano minami ahurika kyouwakoku. kokuzin no patorikkutyamuuso ha han aparutoheito undou niha kansin ganaku, kazoku notameni sekiyu seiyu tokoro dekotukotuto hatarai teita.
aru niti, kareha zibun ga kantoku suru syounen sakkaatiimu ga kessyousen ni sinsyutu sita koto karayamuwo ezu sigoto wo yasuma nakerebanaranakunari, byouki to ituwari sigoto wo yasun da. sono yoru, zibun ga hataraku sekiyu seiyu tokoro gano tero niyotte bakuha sareta.
keisatu no sousa ha patorikku nimo oyobi, taiho sareta kareha nikkufosu ra hakuzin keikan no goumon wo hukume ta ikamesii zinmon wo ukeru. tuma no puresyasu nimade zinmon ga oyon da koto wo situ ta patorikku ha ituwari no zihaku wosi, syakuhou sareta.
patorikku hakorewokikkakenino tousi tonari, han aparutoheito no tero ni miwo touzi teiku.

oorumuubii eigo
eigo aoki zyunitirou aoki zyunitirou, nen gatu niti ha, kousei sakka bangumi purodeyuusaa ongaku purodeyuusaa keibayosou ie tarento eizou kurieitaa dearu.
zinbutu
toukyouto arakawaku umare. saitamaken ritu urawa nisikou nado gakkou, wasedadaigaku daini bungakubu bungei sensyuu sotu.
tarentodebyuu ha nen huyu, gekizyouyou anime eiga seikimatu kyuuseisyu densetu hokutonoken nen syougatukoukai nite ekisutora seiyuu tosite syutuen sitanoga hazimari. syutuen daihyousaku ha terebaidaa sakumaakirano kyanpiko housoukyoku keiba kakutuke batoru yoasobi meerubatoru nado.
raitaadebyuu ha nen, gekisakka koike kazuo keiei no hensyuu purodakusyonsutaziosippu kara hakkousa reta gekkan ron ni keiyaku raitaa tosite sippitu sitanoga hazimari.
keiba suki de, tihoukeiba towa zu, yoku sansen. intaanettoterebi atu toodoroku housoukyoku de housou sareta bangumi keiba kakutuke batoru no purodeyuusaa wo tutome teita. nen gatu yori mainiti komyunikeesyonzu ga unei suru keiba keiba guranpuri de keiba no yosou zyouhou wo teikyou siteiru. tyuuoukeiba zen ba zen reesu yosou narabini minamikantou koueikeiba tihoukeiba zen reesu yosou wo kaisai zennittei teikyou. tomoni taitoru ha aoki no mainiti zekkoutyou dearu. minamikantou koueikeiba no yosou deha rentan no tekityuu kazu no oosa kara rentan tairyou tekityuu no aoki zyunitirou to yoba reteiru. yuumei nanoha nen gatu kara gatu ni keiba bakenkounyuu saito rakuten keiba de kiroku sita ke gekkan rentan tekityuu hon toiu dai kiroku.
nen gatu karaatu toodoroku housoukyoku dai dai getuyou sinya yoasobi meerubatoru nimo syutuen. bangumi no syuyaku dearu densetu no rokkubando denki no aran tosite katuyaku siteiru. hokutonoken kensirou noyouna kakkou de doramu wo tatai teiru. daihyousaku ha, atu toodoroku housoukyoku kousiki torinoorinpikku ouen songu rirehanmeru .
indiizurekoodoreeberu no ongaku purodeyuusaa tositemo katuyaku. hosozimaayakanadowo purodeyuusu.
huziterebi no kanrengaisya ga unei suru wattimii deha, sizyouhatu no tassei sakuhin no kurieitaa tosite sira reru. daihyousaku ha nen gatu yori maisyuuhappyou siteiru mini bangumi buhitan keiba nado.
ure nakatta zidai ni singakuzyuku senninkousi tosite omoni syougakusei tyuugakusei wo sidou si, nen gatu ni okonawa reta saitamaken ritu koukounyuusi deha saitamakennai. kokugo kousi ni kagayaku. mogisiken kaisai ya gakusyuuzyuku you kyouzai hanbai wo tega keru iku sin sya no tyousakekka niyoru. iku sin syasyu sai no mogisiken wo riyou sita kaku zyuku yobikou kara seito no zyuken seiseki deeta nado wo syuuseki si, sono bunsekikekka wo deeta wo teisyutu sita kaku zyuku yobikou he souhu surutoitta katati no naibusiryou dato omowa reru. zyukensei no kyoka wo tora zuni kaku zyuku yobikou no handan de syusai sya ni teisyutu sarerunoga tuurei notame, gokuhi atukai nisuru baai hotondo. genzai ha kozinzyouhou hogo hou nadomoari, toriatukai ni hizyouni tyuui ga hituyou na siryou. mogisiken wo syusai siteiru kaisya ha taitei hobo douyou no tyousa wo okona tteiru hokusin tosyo nado. tyousa no mokuteki ha, syusai sya gawa ha yokunen do no mogisiken goukaku hantei no seido hozi no tame, zyuku yobikou gawa ha sinrosidou no seido hozi no tame, to kangae rareru rareru
toukou saiyou honsuu ga hon kyou toiu moto hagaki syokunin.
rikuruuto huromuee toukyou pinpointo minamiikebukuro kouen urutorakuizu yuusyou. rikuruutohuromuee toukyou pinpointo tokosikouen urutorakuizu yuusyou yuusyou
syougi amatyua dan.
sakuhin risuto
goosutoraitaa tositeno tyosaku ga zyuusuu satu. goosuto nanode syomei ya tyosyamei ha aka senaitoitumo katakuna ni kuti wo toza su. tatianapetorovunanikoraaewa rosia go atyana trvn ikolaeva ikolaeva raten mozi tensya rei , nen gatu niti buryansuku ken bezitu a nen gatu niti ha so turano pianisuto ongakukyousi.
keireki
tosi kara piano wo hazime ru. mosukuwa ongakuin ni nyuugaku site arekusandorugoridenveizeru to ehugeniigorubehu ni sizi. nen ni mosukuwa ongakuin piano ka sotugyou. nen ni mosukuwa ongakuin no kousi tonari, nen ni kyouzyu tonatta.
nen ni, bahha botugo syuunen kinen no raiputuihiyohanzebasuteianbahha kokusai konkuuru nite yuusyou. touti ni syusseki siteita syosutakooviti to, syougai niwataru sinkou wo musun da. syosutakooviti ha nikoraaewa no bahha ensou ni syokuhatu sarete no zensoukyoku to huuga wo sakkyoku si, korewo nikoraaewa ni kentei sita.
syougai ni ten izyou no rokuon wo nokosi, toriwake bahha no kenban gakkyoku de tyomei deattaga, seiou de yuumei ninattanoha kouhan uni oitekaradeatta. sobieto renpou no houkai notini, motome rarerumama oubei kakuti de ensouryokou wo okona tta. igirisu de seisaku sareta, syosutakooviti no no zensoukyoku to huuga dome no zenkyoku rokuon ha, nendo guramofon syou kigakukyoku bumon ni kagayai ta. sorekara nengo no nen gatu niti, sanhuransisukohaapusuto gekizyou de dousaku hin no ensoukai wo okona tta tyokugo ni nounai syukketu niyori konsui zyoutai ni otiiri nitigo ni sikyo.
sakkyokuka tosite, piano nyuumonsya ya zidou mukeno kyouzai tonariuru heii na syouhin wo nokosita hoka, taisaku moaru.
sakuhin
piano kyousoukyoku ro tyoutyou sakuhin sakkyokusya zisin no ensou to kirirukondorasin no siki niyori nen ni rokuon sare, nen niha gakuhu ga syuppan sareta.

gaibu rinku
ni kanrensu ru tyosakubutu intaanettoaakaibu intaanettoaakaibu
kyakutyuu guradiusu guradiusuneo inperiaru, ha nen ni konami ga keitaidenwa muke saito de koukai sita yoko sukuroorusyuuteingugeemu. guradiusu no anazaasutoorii teki sakuhin.
gaiyou
honsaku ha biggukoa wo sousa suru hidarihoukou sukurooru no sakuhin tonatteori, guradiususiriizu deha moai kunni tugu supinohu sakuhin to ie ru. biggukoa ha syurui no busou wo sonae teiruhoka, hutuu no teki no syoutotu teido dehabikutomosinai kyouko sawo hokotu teiru. ziki syoumen tyuuoubu igai niha kura i hantei ga sonzai sezu hutuu no teki ha taiata ridemo haizyo dekiru, tatoe kougeki wo uke tatositemosono bubun ni siirudo gaaru kagiri tae rukotogadekirutadasi, siirudo ganai zyoutai de syoumen kara kougeki wo ukeru to gekitui saresono zitende geemuoobaa . mata, siriizu igai deha moodo wo kirikae rukotoniyori, no tuni bunkatu sareta eria no naka kara tuni napaamu dan wo utikomu kotoga kanou.
pawaaappu mo dokutoku no mono tonatteiru.
supiidoappu supiidoappu
biimu zenpou ni utu biimu hou wo kyouka. syokizyoutai deha rensou daga, korega rensou rensou rensya tonaru.
misairu kyouryoku na misairu no hassya kazu wo to huyasu.
reezaa zenpou ni reezaa wo hassya suru. pawaaappu niyori reezaa ga hutoku naru.
napaamu eria kougekiyou no napaamu no rensya kazu wo huyasu. siriizu deha kyouka suru imi nonai koumoku.
siirudo siirudo wo tu kaihuku suru. siirudo ga gensyou siteiru baai nomi syutokukanou. biimumisairureezaa no pawaaappu ha douzini hozi kanou.
sutoorii
tyoukika suru raazu teikoku to rengougun no sensou. teikoku ha kako no tekunorozii wo hakkutu si rengougun ni saisyuukessen wo idomu kamae deitaga, foosubaipaa ga ubawa retesimau. saisyuu kyokumen he muka u sensou, sikasisono naka de teikoku ni rihan mono ga araware ru. kareha teikoku ga kaihatu wo susume teita biggukoakasutamu wo ubai, teikoku ryou wo dassyutu siyoutositeita.
suteezi kousei
honsaku no sutoorii kousei ha kihonteki ni guradiusu nosoreno gyakuzyun dearu. tadasi, men nomi kotonaru.
gaibu rinku
guradiusu kousiki saito heddoresutirudoren gendai ha, amerika gassyuukoku no hevimetarubando, . . . . ga nen ni happyou sita sakume no sutazioarubamu.
kaisetu
izen no sakuhin yorimo siriasu na rosen ni ututu ta sakuhin de, ongakuhyouronka no ha. nioite naganen no hu a n ga, syoki no sakuhin no gehin na hevimetaru rosen wo konomu tositemo, honsaku ha. . . . no sakuhin tositeha mottomo kanseisa reteiruto hyousi teiru. riarumii ha, zahuu no arubamu sizyuu zinkaku nen syuurokukyoku no kavu aa.
igirisu deha, bando nitotte hatu no zenei arubamutyaato niokeru toppu iri wo hata si, bando no bokoku amerika deha, sekandoarubamu rasutokomando nen irai tonaru zenbei toppu iri wo hata sita.
honsaku wo saigo ni kurisuhorumuzu ga dattai notini hukki .
nen ni hatubai sareta saihatu niha, singuru no kappuringu kyoku ya nen no raivu ongen ga boonasutorakku tosite tuika syuuroku sareteiru. rokomooteivuburesu ha ziesurotaru no arubamu akuarangu nen syuurokukyoku no kavu aa.

kyakutyuu riidogyaretto , nen gatu niti ha, amerika gassyuukoku baazinia syuu henraiko gun henraiko syussin no puro yakyuusensyu tousyu . utou migiuti. no wasintonnasyonaruzu sanka syozoku.
keireki
puro iri to renzyaazu sanka zidai
nen no dorahuto zyunme zentai kurai de tekisasurenzyaazu kara simei sare, puro iri. keiyaku noti, sanka no kyuu supokeenindiansu de purodebyuu. siai senpatu siai ni touban site kati hai, bougyoritu . , datusansin wo kiroku sita.
nen ha kyuu hikkoriikuroudazzu to kyuu haidezaatomaaberikkusu de puree si, kyuudan goukei de siai ni senpatu touban site kati hai, bougyoritu . , datusansin wo kiroku sita.
nen ha kyuu haidezaato, kyuu hurisukorahuraidaazu, kyuu raundorokkuekusupuresu de puree si, kyuudan goukei de siai senpatu siai ni touban site kati hai, bougyoritu . , datusansin wo kiroku sita. ohu niha arizonafooruriigu ni sanka si, sapuraizusaguarosu ni syozoku sita.
nen ha kyuu hurisuko de puree si, siai senpatu siai ni touban site kati hai seebu, bougyoritu . , datusansin wo kiroku sita.
nen ha kyuu hurisuko to kyuu raundorokku de puree si, kyuudan goukei de siai ni touban site kati hai seebu, bougyoritu . , datusansin wo kiroku sita.
detoroitotaigaasu zidai
nen gatu niti ni ruuruhu a ibudorahuto de detoroitotaigaasu kara simei sare, iseki sita.
nen ha kaimaku nin waku iri si, gatu niti no torontoburuuzieizu sen de mezyaadebyuu. gatu niti nitonatta. taigaasu deha siai ni touban site bougyoritu . , datusansin wo kiroku sita.
renzyaazu sanka hukki
nen gatu niti, ruuruhu a ibudorahuto no kiyaku de renzyaazu ni modoru kotoninatta. gatu niti ni sanka no kyuu nassyubirusaunzu he haizoku sare, siai ni touban site kati hai seebu, bougyoritu . , datusansin wo kiroku sita.
seibu zidai
nen gatu niti ni saitama seibu raionzu to keiyaku wo musun da.
nen gatu niti no tui hukuoka sohutobankuhookusu sen de kai ni bante de touban si, kimura huminori ga gyakutenmanrui honruida wo hoututu takotode hatusyouri wo kiroku sita. gatu niti no tainiti hon hamu sen nioite, isekigo saisoku tonaru wo kiroku sita. kaimaku kara kati pataan no ikkaku wo makasa retamonono, tyousi wo oto sitekaraha moriwaki ryousuke ni settoappaa no za wo yuzuri, hoorudo no tuka nai bamen deno touban ga tyuusin tonatta. mata, gatu niti no rotte sen deha burupendee deno senpatu wo makasa re, korega iseki hatusenpatu tonatta. siai ni touban si, kati hai hoorudo, bougyoritu . no seiseki wo nokosita ga, siizun syuuryougo no kyuudan tono zanryuu kousyou ga kizitu madenimatomarazu, gatu hizuke dekara ittan ziyuukeiyaku sensyu tosite kouzi sareta. niti, yokunen no keiyaku wo kousin sitakotoga happyou sareta.
nen ha singata koronauirusu no eikyou de tiimu heno gouryuu to tyousei ga okure rumo, buzi ni kaimaku wo itigun de mukae, gatu niti no hukuoka sohutobankuhookusu sen de iseki hatu seebu wo age ta. moriwaki ga migikata tuu de huzai toiukotomoari hutatabi kati pataan no ikkaku wo ninai, masuda tooru ita ga hutyou de massyou sareruto siaitenkai ni ouzi te taira kaiba to tomoni , kai wo makasa reruyouninatta. sikasi, haisin toukyuu ga medatu youninari, gatu niti no hansin taigaasu sen deha ten riido no kaihyou ni touban surumo kai wo nage te sitten de haisen tousyu. korega osae tositeno touban deha dome no kyuuen sippai tonari, sono noti ha taira ga osae ni kotei sareta. zenhansen wo oe te gorin no tyuudan kikan de itizikikoku si, sono noti sairai niti sitaga kuukou deno kensa de singata koronauirusu yousei ga kakuninsa reta. saiwai ryouyou wo hazime te souki ni kensa de insei ga kakuninsa re, gatu niti ni rensyuu hukki sisono noti itigun ni gouryuu, ekisibisyonmatti nimo touban si, buzi ni kouhansen no kaimaku wo itigun de mukae ta. tada kouhansen mo huantei na toukyuu ga tuzuki, kono nen ha kati hai hoorudo seebu, tiimu kurai no siai ni touban sitamonono bougyoritu . to anteikan wo kai ta. gatu niti ni touroku wo massyou sareruto siizun syuuryou wo mae ni kikoku sitakotoga douzitu ni kyuudan kara happyou sareta.
nasyonaruzu sanka zidai
nen gatu niti ni wasintonnasyonaruzu to mainaa keiyaku wo musun da. gatu niti ni supuringutoreeningu ni syoutaisensyu tosite sanka surukotoninatta.
sensyu tositeno tokutyou
nen no saisoku kyuusoku ha yaku . tate ni otiru pawaasuraidaa, saisoku wo keisoku suru nakkurukaabu ga buki de, karaburi ga ubae ru ueni, goro wo uta serukotomodekiru.
henkakyuu no seikyuu niyaya nan gaari, henkakyuu ga kima razu foosiimu ni katayotu ta haikyuu ninaruto kuzure yasui keikou gaarutame, kouhutyou no nami ga hagesii.
kouryuusen ni sonae ta dagekirensyuu deha saku koe wo hatu hirou siteiru.

kiroku
hatu kiroku hatutouban hatu hoorudo nen gatu niti, tui hokkaidou nipponhamu hu a itaazu kaisen mettoraihudoomu , kaihyou ni bante de kyuuen touban, kai musitten musitten
hatu datusansin douzyou, kaihyou ni kondou kensuke kara karaburi sansin sansin
hatusyouri nen gatu niti, tui hukuoka sohutobankuhookusu kaisen mettoraihudoomu , kaihyou ni bante de kyuuen touban, kai musitten musitten
hatusenpatu touban nen gatu niti, tui tiba rottemariinzu kaisen marinsutaziamu , kai musitten musitten
hatu seebu nen gatu niti, tui hukuoka sohutobankuhookusu kaisen hukuoka doomu , kai ura ni bante de kyuuen touban kanryou, kai musitten musitten

sensyu no tuusanseiseki to zyouhou , , , ,
. eigo
kozin nendo betu seiseki . gyaretto . nihonyakyuu kikou kikou
riidogyaretto takai gaku takaidakeha, hukuokaken ukiha si to ooitaken hita si tono sakai niaru hyoukou . no yama dearu.
sengokuzidai niha, takai gaku siro mataha taka ke gaku siro to kiroku niaru zyousai gaatta. genzai, kokoniha terebi housou no nisibi tanaka kei kyoku gaaru.
takai gaku ha, ootomo si sihaika no bungo kuni hita gun kara tonari no tikugo kuni ton tyuu tokoro si no ryouti wo nozomu ti ni iti suru. takai gaku siro no iti nituiteha, hita gun kokorozasi gekan ni taka ke gaku, nisi no hou han pukuniari bassui inyou toaru.
hita gunnai no rekisisyo yutaka nisi ki niha, takai gaku siro tubusu kan yuki koto to daisi te, ikano youni sirusa reteiru.
akizuki si ni kouhuku sita ton tyuu tokoro oya nori nagaiwa zyousyu ha, doumeikankei niatta ootomo si tono tegire ni nozomu beku, hita gun he seme itutu ta. daiiti no kouryaku taisyou tonattanoga, bungo kuni to tikugo kuni no kokkyou ni iti suru basyo ni kizuka reta takai gaku siro deatta. takai gaku niha seirou wo sonae ta siro gaari, zyouban wo tyuuton saseteita. konotokino zyouban ha hita hati bugyou no hitori tutumi etizen syu no otouto, tutumi heiemon i deatta. yose teno ton tyuu tokoro sei to kassen tonari, heiemon i ha oote hukin de montyuu tokoro sei taisyou no isii kurabito to sasitigae te utizini. siro ha kanraku si, ryounai hita gun isii sato ni sinnyuu wo yurusi taga, takase simotuke syu no gunzei ga kake tukete ton tyuu tokoro sei wo gekitai sita.
nisibi tanaka kei kyoku
sousin setubi
tizyou dezitaruterebizyon housou
ha, dezitaru sinkyoku.
tizyou dezitaruterebizyon housou ha nen heisei nen gatu niti ni zenkyoku honhousou kaisi.
nen heisei nen gatu niti, kyuusyuu sougou tuusin kyoku kara nisibi tanaka kei kyoku ni tizyou dezitaruterebizyon housou no yobimenkyo ga kouhu sareta.
sikenhousou ha, nen heisei nen gatu niti kara gatu niti made zissi sareta.
omona zyusin tiiki ooitaken hita si no itibu itibu
ha dezitaru sinkyoku tosite kaikyoku.
no tyanneru ha tousyo deattaga, houtei eria nai de konsin niyoru zyusin syougai ga hassei sitatame, nen heisei nen gatu niti gatu niti nikakete ni henkou sareta.
tizyou anaroguterebizyon housou
ha anarogu tyuukeikyoku wo tikyoku siteinai.
tizyou anaroguterebizyon housou ha, nen heisei nen gatu niti madeni zenkyoku housousyuuryou.
kyakutyuu nakamura hideo nakamura hideo, nen gatu niti ha, nippon no doboku kougakusya. toukyouto sidai gaku kyuu musasikougyoudaigaku meiyo soutyou. nippon niokeru kokudo keikaku no daiitininsya.
raireki
nen, kyoutohu kyoutosi ni umare ru. toukyoudaigaku sotugyougo teito kousokudo koutuueidan genzai no toukyou tikatetu ni syuusyoku suru. sono noti toukyoudaigaku kyouzyu, musasikougyoudaigaku gen toukyouto sidai gaku kyouzyu nadowo rekinin si, nen yori musasikougyoudaigaku gakutyou wo tutome ru. nen ni dougaku nagamoto wo ori, gen meiyo soutyou.
ya tiri zyouhou sisutemu no genkei niataru konseputo no kaihatu ya toti riyou koutuu moderu no sakusei wo okonau.
nen, naikaku hu ni setti sareta dourokankei si koudan mineika suisiniinkai niha mei no iin tuusyou sitinin no samurai noutino itimei tosite sanka si, imai takasi totomoni tuukouryou syuunyuu kara kensetu wo zokkou suruyou syutyou sita.
nen heisei nen haru no zyokun de, kyouikukenkyuu heno kourou ni taisi te zuihou naka zyusyou wo zyusyou.
nen niha sotobori no suisitukaizen nadowo kakage sotobori saisei kousou puroziekuto wo tatiage ta.
ryakureki
gakureki
dousisya tyuugakkou, dousisya koutougakkou sotugyou sotugyou

syokureki

douro tousi hyouka kenkyuukai douro tousi no syakai keizai hyouka touyoukeizai sinpou sya, nen. .

kyouhen kyouhen tyo

nakamura hideo, ieda hitosi, toukyoudaigaku syakai kiban gaku kyousitu toukyou no inhurasutorakutyaaa kyodai tosi wo sasae ru han gihou dou syuppan, nen. .
nakamura hideo, nagasawa koutarou, hiraisi kazuaki, hasegawa sen inhurasutorakutyaa gairon rekisi to saisin zirei ni manabu korekarano zigyou no susumekata nikkei, nen. .
kyoutyo
