nakamura hideo
nakamura hideo kakenhi zyosei zigyou deetabeesu deetabeesu
gakutyou wo sirizoku kotoninari saisyuukougi wo itta toukyouto sidai gakutyou nakamura hideo san nen gatu niti nippon siritudaigaku kyoukai kebi syuu syuu
syuu no aisyou kouhei no ti ti
kebi syuu kebi syuu, ha, naizieria no hokusei bu no syuu dearu. nen ni kyuu sokoto syuu no seibu ga bunkatu sare setti sareta.
nen no zinkou ha yaku . bannin.
tiri
kita wo sokoto syuu, minami wo naizya syuu, hokusei wo nizieeru, nansei wo benan, higasi wo zamuhu a ra syuu ni sessu ru.
gyousei
kebi syuu ha no tihougyousei ku , tuno syutyou kuni guwandou, arugungu, yauri, zuru , no tiku ni waka reru.
tihougyousei ku
ariero, arewa arewasandi, arugungu, augie, bagudo, birunin biruninkebi, bunza, dandi, hu a kai, guwandou, ziega, karugo, koko kokobesse, maiyama, ngasuki, sakaba, syanga, suru, wasagu wasagudanko, yauri, zuru zuru
sangyou
nougyou zakkoku, toumorokosi, kyassaba, zyagaimo, kome, mame, negi, yasai, komugi, daizu, syouga, satoukibi, rakkasei, mangoo, guaba, papaiya nado nado
mineraru sekkai iwa, sio, roomu, sekkou nado nado
koutuu
nizieeru kawa wo riyou sita suiun ga okonawa reteiru. nen niha kebi syuu kara naizya syuu ni muka u mokuzou hune ga tinbotu site tasuu no sisya yukuehumeisya ga deta.
minzoku kousei
zyuumin no ooku ha hausa nin de hokani bussawa, doukawa, kanbari nadoga ooi.
kyakutyuu
kanrenkoumoku
kebi syutyou kuni kuni
arugungu turi maturi maturi
gaibu rinku
kebi syuusei hu kousiki saito kabusikigaisya terebizyon diieitisiiterebizyon ha, intaanetto douga haisin to bangumi hanbai no zigyou wo okonau seisaku purodakusyon. tuusyou ha terebi. nen gatu niti madeha siataa no tuusyou de, nippon no housou tyanneru wo housouzigyousya tosite unei siteita.
gaiyou
nen gatu niti, sezonguruupu no moto eiga zigyou tantousya de eiga purodeyuusaa no yamada hidehisa ga kyuu kabusikigaisya siataaterebizyon sya wo seturitu. nen gatu niti, itaku housou gyoumu no nintei sinsei. nen gatu niti kara housoukaisi. siataaterebizyon tosite kaikyoku ikou, nihonhatu no butai senmon tyanneru tosite opera, dansu, engeki, myuuzikaru, o warai nado no butaityuukei wo kokunai mono to kaigai mono no sohuto wo hanbun zutu toriatukatu teiku housin de atukatu tekita. sikasi, nen gatu niti, kyuu kabusikigaisya siataaterebizyon ga minzi saisei tetuzuki kaisi kettei wo uke, zizituzyou tousan. notini, nebyurapuroziekuto, santorii hokano syussi niyoru singaisya ni housou zigyou wo zyouto site keiei saiken ni seikou. daihyou ga kawari, imai miwa ninaru. nen niha itimura saku tomoo ga daihyoutorisimariyaku tonatta.
nen gatu, nippon raddo no motibun hou tekiyou kaisya tonaru. nen, nippon raddo no ootuka ryuuiti ga daihyoutorisimariyaku ni syuunin si, nen gatu hizuke de genkoku kaigi in, bengosi dearu hamada takuzirou no tuma de, zitugyouka no hamada maki ko ga torisimariyaku syatyou ni syuunin. nen gatu niti, nippon raddo wo taisyou tosuru daisansya wariate zousi wo zissi si, koreniyori nippon raddo no renketusi kaisya tonaru.
soreni tomonai, sukapaa heno tyannerukategoraizu wo geizyutu kara sougou he henkou si, kyuu keieizin ha taizin sita. nen gatu karaha siataaterebizyon ha uingu wo hiroge masutono kyattikopii nomoto, dounen gatu niti kara hensei wo oohaba ni kae, geizyutu bangumi wo sakugen si, hosyuha ronkaku niyoru zizi bangumi ya intabyuu bangumi, eiga nadowo housou suruyouninatta.
mata, hensei no naka de, housou syuueki kyouka no tame, kyoutei tyuukei heno housouwaku no hanbai ya denpa ookusyon naru housouwaku no nettoookusyon hanbai wo itta koto moaru.
nen gatu hizuke de, hittou kabunusi gano daihyoutorisimariyaku kaityou dearu yosida yosiaki ga torisimariyakukai tyou ni syuunin, honsya huroa wo nippon raddo syanai dearu kyoudoutuusin kaikan kai kara genzai no kai ni iten. mata, nen gatu ni kabusikigaisya kara iseki nyuusya sita yamada akira ga torisimariyaku ni syuunin suru.
nen gatu niti, syamei wo kabusikigaisya siataaterebizyon kara kabusikigaisya siataa ni henkou sita. soreni tomonai, dousya no sateraitosutazio wo namahousou no taiou ga dekiru you, housou buusu to saburuumu wo zoukaitiku. dounen gatu hizuke de tyanneru meisyou wo siataaterebizyon kara siataa he henkou si, , rogo nado mo henkou sita. soreni tomonai, kabunusi mo yosida yosiaki kozin kara guruupu sanka tonatta. sono kiwa, gaibu purodeyuusaa tosite kamimura naoto ga sanka si, toukatu purodeyuusaa tosite toranomon nyuusu nyuusu zyosi hougen riikusu nadono subete no hitto bangumi wo kikaku si tatiage ni hana wo soe ta.
nen gatu niti, intaanetto heno douga haisin he risoosu wo tyuunyuu surutame, bangumihensei de nittyuu no terebi housouzikan wo teiha suru koto wo kettei si, sityouryou kin no kaitei wo zissi.
nen gatu niti womotte, sukapaa puremiamusaabisu, puremiamusaabisu hikari, hikari terebi deno terebi housou saabisu wo syuuryou si, terebi kyoku tosite hei kyoku. intaanetto douga haisin to bangumi hanbai no zigyou wo keizoku si, nen gatu niti ni kigyoumei syou wo terebizyon ni, burando mei wo terebi ni henkou sita.
nen gatu niti, torisimariyaku syatyou deatta hamada maki ko to dousya motosyain gayaramaika sinsou hakouda oyobi nippon rasii kuni zukuriwo terebi ni mudan denite haisin si, katuyaramaikano zokuhen wo niowa su setumei wositeitatame, torisimariyakukai nite nen gatu hizuke de hamada wo kainin sitakotowo happyou. kounin ni torisimariyaku dearu yamada akira ga syuunin sita.
nen gatu niti, keieihousin no tigai kara dousya no itibu ga hanare, mirai netto ga seturitu sare tamoto wo wakare ta.
nen gatu niti, sibuyaku udagawatyou ni syozai suru, toukyuuhanzu sibuyaten tika kai ni guruupu no to kyoudou de aratani sutazio wo kaisetusi ta. nendo kara kyoudoutuusin biru ga toranomon nityoume tiku daiissyu sigaiti saikaihatu zigyou nite heisa yotei dehaaruga, toumen ha dousya honsya ga syozai suru toranomon no sutazio karamo haisin ha keizoku suru yotei.
genzai ha kabusikigaisya booizu, hoorudingu kabusikigaisya, kabusikigaisya no kanrengaisya ga dousya no kontentu wo sikiru sikumi ninatteiru.

kyakutyuu
tyuusyaku
syutten
gaibu rinku
kousiki uebusaito uebusaito
terebi
terebi
terebi tyanneru tyanneru
terebi nikonikotyanneruheruveege ha, doitu renpoukyouwakoku niidaazakusen syuu no rootenburuku vuyunme gun ni zokusu tyouson ika, honkou deha bengizyou mati to kizyutu surudearu. zamutogemaindezottorumu wo kousei suru tyouson no hitotu de, vuyunme kawa ni mensi teiru.
tiri
rinsetu suru tyouson
heruveege ha, higasi ha ahauzen, kita ha zottorumu, nisi ha ottaasuberuku, minami ha ranguveederu to sakai wo sessu ru.
zititai no kousei
kono mati niha, auhudeameente, buraitenferudaamooa, syutere no syuuraku wo hougan suru.
rekisi
heruveege ha nen ni hazimete bunken ni kiroku sareteiru.
gyousei
gikai
kono mati no tyougikai ha giseki karanaru.
monsyou
kono mati no monsyou ha, niidaazakusen wo syoutyou suru akai haikeisyoku ni, kono mati no namae no yurai tonatta kyuugun you douro no herenveege zantoveege wo arawasu siroi gyaku naname obi gaaru. gin no naname obi no nakani ha vuyunme kawa wo imi suru aoi hatai ga egaka reteiru. muka tte hidariue ha, feruden sikyou ryou wo simesu gin no naageru zyuuzi katan ga sen tta zyuuzi . muka tte migisita hakono mati no mori wo syoutyou suru gin no ooku no mi.
keizai to syakaisihon
koutuu
kono mati ha autobaan gousen kara yaku no kyori niaru.
inyou airabuyuu ha, morita kenzi niyoru kyouei wo daizai nisita nippon no manga sakuhin.
arasuzi
bunburyoudou de sira reru kenka kitteno meimon kou, siritu ouka koutougakkou. nensei no akai syuuzi ha, suieibu no hoopu tosite tyuumoku wo atume teitaga, youtuu notame taibu wo kangae teita. sokohe sinnyuubuin tosite, mitinoku tyuugakkouzidai no doukyuusei datta wakabayasi tinatu ga itutu tekuru. kanozyo tono saikai wokikkakeni, syuuzi hamou itido oyogu kotowo ketui suru.
omona touzyouzinbutu
akai syuuzi akai syuuzi syuuzi
ouka koukou taiiku ka nensei. tyuugakuzidai ha purutoniumu ningen no imyou wo motu huryou syounen dattaga, tinatu no oyogu sugata wo mite iruutini, kanozyo ni susume rarete suiei wo hazime ruyouninatta. zituryoku wo kawa re, taiiku ka ni tokutai nama tosite singaku. nensei natu no taikai de taikaisinkiroku wo dasi te yuusyou si, syourai yuubou to kitaisa reteita. sikasi, sono notihodo nakusite kosi wo itame, nensei ninattekaraha rensyuu ni sanka siteinakatta. syumoku ha batahurai daga, tinatu tono saikai notini ziyuu katati he tenkou suru. wakabayasi tinatu wakabayasi tika tika
ouka koukou hutuuka nensei. syuuzi no tyuugakuzidai no doukyuusei. toaru dekigoto gakikkakede rounin si, nen okure de ouka koukou ni singaku sita. syumoku ha haiei gi. huzisiro huuko huzisiro huuko huuko
sugi ke ura syougyoukoukou nensei. syuuzi no osananazimi de, tyuugakuzidai ha huryou nakama demoatta. hanasima kouhei hanasima kouhei kouhei
tinatu no tyuugakuzidai no koibito. batahurai de intaahai kai, gakuseisensyuken kai no yuusyou reki gaari, orinpikku daihyoukouho ninatta koto mo. haruna taiiku daigaku zaisekizi ni, kyouikuzissyuu notame suieibu no kooti tosite mitinoku tyuugaku ni kita koto gaari, syuuzi kara raibaru si sareteita. sikasi mizukara no genkai wo kanzi te geneki wo sirizoki, suieibu kantoku tosite ouka koukou niyatte kuru.
gaibu rinku
syougakukan biggukomikkusu sakuhinsyoukai peezi peezi
dai kan kan
dai kan kan
dai kan tisitugaku wo hazime tosuru tikyuukagaku niokeru gensei gensetoha, genzai no, yo wo imi suru kosyou deari, tisitu zidai noutino sinsei dai daiyon ki kansin yo wo sasu hyougen dearu.
kansin yo toiu tisitu zidai kubun mo genzai wo kizyun tositeiru syukanteki namonodearuga, imako no toki ga zokusi teiru tisitu zidai toiuissou syukanteki na nyuansu wo arawaso utosuru baai ni, gensei toiu go ga motii rareru.
yourei wo age runaraba tugino toori.
hito aka no seizonkikan ha, yaku mannen mae mosikuha yaku mannen mae sinsei dai sin daisan kityuu sinsei makki gensei daiyon ki kansin yo .
koumoku inu ya wani , tyourui no migiue dan niaru tenpureeto wo sansyou.

kanrenkoumoku
tisitu zidai kensei dai sinsei dai daiyon ki kansin yo yo
tikyuu si nenpyou nenpyou
gaibu rinku kateikyousi hittoman batoruariina katekyoo hittomanriboon batoruariina ha, you taisengatakakutou geemu. hanbaimoto ha maaberasuentaateimento. kaihatu seisaku ha einsyanto. zennen rei taisyou. dai dan ga nen gatu niti hatubai. dai dan kateikyousi hittoman supirittobaasuto ga, nen gatu niti hatubai. kyarakutaairasuto to sutooriimoodo kousei ha ariga hitosi.
gaiyou
manga anime kateikyousi hittoman no iti siriizu miraihen wo butai nisita orizinarusutoorii. huruboisu taiou. sono hokano youso tosite, touri izyou no kyarakutaakasutamaizu gadekiru.

gaibu rinku
tyanneru tyanneru
syunkasyuutou syunkasyuutou deizu, ha, toumatu sakuraniyoru nippon no manga sakuhin. koudansya nite, nen gou kara nen gou made rensai sareta. arasaa zyosei nin no riaru na renai wo egai ta sakuhin. tankoubon ha zen kan.
arasuzi
koukou no doukyuusei datta kituno, nabesan, ruri no nin.
daigaku no sotugyou to douzini dekityatta kekkon wosita kituno, toukyou no daigaku wo sotugyougo, syuusyoku si kekkon sitamonono rikon si kikyou sitanabesan, syousetu wo kaki nagara koibito tono sokubaku sinai ziyuu na renai wo mankitu siteiru ruri. tosi wo mokuzen nisite saikai sita nin ha hanasi ni hana wo saka seruga, kyori ga tikazu kuhodo, sorezorega tigau sekai de iki tekitakotowo omoisira sareru.
touzyouzinbutu
maeda kituno maeda yosino yosino
tosi tosiue no otto to syougakusei no musume sai mi amito siawase ni kurasi teiru.
daigakusotugyou tokini ninsin ga hakkaku si, haha ga yomei ki bakumonakattakotoya, genzai no otto ya otto no kazoku ga ninsin wo ooyorokobi sitekuretakotoga keiki tonari, sonomama katei ni itutu ta. genzai ha tiisa na kaisya no zimu wositeiru.
tanabe yayoi tanabe yayoi yayoi
batuiti. hitoritabi wosi, kimama na dokusinseikatu wo tanosi ndeiru.
toukyou no daigaku ni singaku si, toukyou de syuusyoku, kekkon surumo, otto kara bouryoku wo huru wareruyouninari rikon sita. kikyou sitamonono, tomodati gainainoga sabisiku te, hisasi burini kituno tatini renraku wo toru.
tatibana ruri tatibana ruri ruri
tatibana ruri no penneemu de sippitu suru syousetuka. koukouzidai kara bunsyou wo tukuru noga suki datta. sitasika ra akutagawa syou hamadakato seka sareteiruga, mattaku zyanru ga tigau.
otoko hairanaiga seiyoku haaru, toiu riyuu de dansei to dousei siteiru.
tamaki tamaki tamaki
nin to onazi koukou no gakunen kouhai. kameraman. kituno to meeru noyaritoriwosi, kikonsya to siri nagaramo kokuhaku suru.
udagawa utagawa utagawa
nin no koukouzidai no doukyuusei. kituno no kataomoi no aite datta.
syosizyouhou
toumatu sakura syunkasyuutou koudansya zen kan nen gatu niti hatubai,

syutten
gaibu rinku
syunkasyuutou sakuhinsyoukai koudansya komikkupurasu ueibakkumasin nen gatu niti aakaibu hun rasumeniinasu supein go de nyokan tatino i ha, nen ni supein ougon seiki wo riido sita gaka diegoberasukesu niyori, seisaku sareta. nazo kakenoyouna kousei no sakuhin de, genzitu to souzou tono mani gimon wo teiki si, kansyousya to e no touzyouzinbutu no mani bonyarisita kankei wo souzou suru. rasumeniinasu no hukuzatu na kousei ha, seiyou kaiga no bunya deha sakan ni kaiseki sareta.
rasumeniinasu no butai ha feripe yono madoriido kyuuden no ooki na issitu dearu. supein kyuutei nin zinbutu mo tokutei sareteiruno yousu wo, nannin kano hyouronka ga iu youni sunappu syasin nogotoku, syunkanteki ni kiritori, utusi egai temiseteiru.
zinbutuzou nouti, ikunin kaha kanbasu no naka kara kansyousya no gawa ni muka tte tyuui wo muke, nokori no ikunin kaga tagaini kouryuu siteiru. osanai marugariita ouzyo wo tori kakon deirunoha, o tuki no nyokan, zizyo, metuke yaku, nin no kodomo to hiki no inu dearu. karera no haigo niha, ooki na kanbasu ni muka u berasukesu zisin ga egaka reteiru. berasukesu no sisen ha e no nakano kuukan wo koe, e no kansyousya zisin no tati iti no houkou ni muke rareteiru. haikei niha kagami gakakatteori, ou to ouhi no zyouhansin ga ututu teiru. ou to ouhi ha, e no soto, tumari kansyousya no tati iti to onazi basyo ni tatu teiruyouni mie ru. mata, betuno kenkyuuka ha, ou to ouhi no zou ha berasukesu ga sakusei nakano sakuhin ga utusi dasa retamonodato kangae teiru.
rasumeniinasu ha, seiyou bizyutu si nioite zyuuyouna sakuhin dearuto nagaku mitome rareteiru. barokku ki no gaka rukazyorudaano ha kaiga no singaku wo syoutyou surumonodato ii, seiki no gaka toomasuroorensu ha geizyutu no genri to yon da. saikin no komento niha, berasukesu no saikousaku, ziisikikazyou de keisan si tukusa reta kaiga niyoru siikoudou, sosite osora ku, koremadeninasareta iizeru ga no kanousei heno mottomo ikamesii hihyou toiumonomoaru.
haikei
feripe yono kyuutei
seiki no supein deha, gaka ga takai tii wo era rerukotoha, mettaninakatta. kaiga ha, akumade kougei deatte, si ya ongaku noyouna geizyutu toha mina sarenakatta.
sikasi, berasukesu ha, feripe yono kyuutei de, kurou no matu nen gatu, zizyuu tyou ni ninmei sareta. kono posuto nookagede, berasukesu ha, tii to syuunyuu towo eru kotogadekita. sikasi, douzini sono ninmu nikanarino zikan wotorarerukototonatta. zinsei saigo no nenkan de, kareha sakuhin wohonno sukosi siage raretadakedattaga, sono daibubun ha ouke no syouzou deatta. rasumeniinasu wo egai tanoha, kare ga oukyuu de hataraki hazime te nenme nokotodeatta.
feripe yono saisyo no tuma isaberudeborubon ha, nen ni sikyo, hitorimusuko no barutasaarukarurosu mo nengo ni sikyo sita.
ouikeisyousya wo naku sita feripe ha, nen marianadeausutoria to kekkon, marugariita ouzyo ha karera no mani dekita saisyo no ko deari, e ga egaka reta zitende ha yuiitu no ko demoatta. sono noti, otouto no feripepurosupero ga umare taga tanmei ni owari, tuide karurosu ouzi ga umare ta. karurosu ha tosi de, karurosu yo tosite oui ni tui teiru. berasukesu ha mariana tosono ko rano syouzouga wo egai ta. feripe zisin ha rounen ki no zibun wo egaka serukotowo kiratu taga, rasumeniinasu ni zibun ga touzyou surukotoha yurusi ta. nendai syoki, feripe ou ha yue barutasaarukarurosu no kyositu no piazapurinsiparu syusitu wo kyuuden bizyutukan tosite berasukesu ni atae, kano atorie tosita. rasumeniinasu no butai ha, kono heya dearu. feripe ou ha zisin no isu wo atorie ni oki, suwatu te berasukesu no sakusei wo nagame rukotogayokuatta. ikamesii reigi ni sibara renagaramo, geizyutu wo itosi ta ou to gaka ha, hizyouni kinmitu na kankei wo kizui tayoudearu. berasukesu no sigo, ou hasono koukeisya nituiteno oboegaki nohutinigakkurikitato kaki nokosi teiru.
nendai kara nendai nikaketeno berasukesu ha, kyuuteigaka to, feripe yono yooroppa geizyutu no korekusyon wo atume ru gakugeiin no yaku wo tutome teita. kareha zisin no ninmu ni kansi te, kanarino ziyuu wo atae rareteitayoudearu. berasukesu ha, mottomo kati aru kaiga wo hokan suru heya no sousyoku ya interiadezain nituite sizi si, kagami ya tyouzou, tapesutorii wo tukekuwae ta. kareha rekidai supein ou no syouzou nituitemo, tenkyo, sakuseisya no tokutei, keizi, mokuroku sakusei nadono sekininsya wo tutome ta. nendai hazime niha, berasukesu ha kantei ie tosite, supein de hiroku sonkei wo atume teita. kyou niokeru purado bizyutukan no korekusyon nohotondoha, berasukesu no sizi nomoto atume raretamonode, sono nakani ha teituiaano, rahu a ero, ruubensu no e mo hukuma reteiru.
sakuhin no yurai to kondisyon
rasumeniinasu ha, saisyoki no mokuroku deha rahu a miria kazoku tosite touroku sareteiru. nen, supein ougon seiki no zyoruzyovu a zaari tomoiubeki antonioparomiino niyori, rasumeniinasu nituiteno syousai ga syuppan sareteori, ikutukano zinbutuzou no moderu ga hanbetu sareteiru. sakuhin wo sekigaisen de sirabe ta kekka, zyakkan no penteimento, sunawati gaka zisin no teni yoru henkouten ga hakken sareta. rei wo age ruto, saisyo berasukesu zisin no atama ha, muka tte migi yorimomusiro hidari ni katamui teita.
rasumeniinasu ha, sakuhin no motono saizu yori, sayuu tomo kiri oto sarete tiisaku natteiru. nen niha, arukasaru siro wo kaimetu saseta kasai niyori sakuhin mo sonsyou wo uke, kyuuteigaka no hoangarusiademiranda nen no tede hosyuu sareta. ouzyo no hidarihoho ha, ganryou no sonsitu gakanarihidokattatame, hotondo zenbu nuri naosa rerukotoninatta. kasai kara kyuusyutu sareta notino nen, rasumeniinasu ha ousitu korekusyon no itibu tosite mokuroku ni keisai sareta. kono tokini, marugariita ouzyo ha, ibo ane no mariitereezudootorissyu to gonin sare, nen ni sin madoriido oukyuu no mokuroku wo sakusei sita saini mosonomamaninatteita. nen no mokuroku deha, syoki no taitoru feripe yono kazoku de touroku sare, nen no mokuroku tukuri no kiwa mosonomamadatta. nen no purado bizyutukan no sousetu niyori, sono korekusyon ni kuwae rareta. nen, purado bizyutukan no katarogu ni hazimete rasumeniinasu no taitoru de keisai sareteiru.
kinnen rasumeniinasu ha, tekusutyaa ya sikityou ni sonsyou ga mira reruyouninattekita. yogore to, houmon suru gunsyuu heno rosyutu ga genin de, nyokan no isyou no ao to siro no ganryou mo, katuteha senmei ni taihi siteitamonoga yowama ttekita. nen, amerika no bizyutu syuuhuku nin zyonburearii nomoto, seiki no hosyuu irai tama tta hokori no kiiro no beeru wo tori haratu tanoga saisin no kuriiningu dearu. kono kuriiningu ha hagesii kougi wo uke taga, geizyutu rekisika no federikozeri niyorebaikanaru katati deare, e ga sonsyou wo uke tatamedehanaku, mitame ga henkasi tatamedearutoiu. sikasi ropezu ropezurei no iken deha, syuuhuku niha hi no uti dokoroganaitoiu.
rasumeniinasu ha, sono saizu, zyuuyousei, kati notame, tenzi notamedakeni kasidasa rerukotohanai.
sakuzu
syudai
rasumeniinasu ha, madoriido no feripe yono arukasaru siro niaru berasukesu no atorie de egaka reta. atorie ha hizyouni tenzyou ga takai heya de, siruviogajzi no kotoba niyoreba ten tousi zuhou no kousi sen de kugire ruyouna, sinpuru na hako datoiu.
zenkei no tyuuou niha, marugariita ouzyo ga tatu teiru.
kono zitende ha ouzyo ha tosi de, feripe yo to mariana no mani umare ta naka deha yuiitu no ikinokori deari, notini sinsei rooma koutei reoporuto yo to kekkon suru. ouzyo ha nin no nyokan nikasizukareteiru. o zigi wosiyoutositeirunoga isaberudeverasuko , hizamazuite kin no torei no akai kappu wo ouzyo ni susume teirunoga mariaagusuteinasarumientodesotomaiyooru dearu. ouzyo no migigawa niha, nin no kodomo gairu. nankotu mukei sei syou no doitu nin mariabarubora, tuusyou maribarubora to, itaria nin no nikoraperutosaato dearu. nikora hahuzakete, asimoto no masuteihu inu wo oko soutositeiru. karera no usiro ni tatu ta ouzyo no syaperon, maruseradeuryooa ha mohuku wo kite ori, namae husyou no metuke yaku ni hanasi kaketeiru.
koubu migigawa niha, donhosenietoberasukesu ga tatu teiru. kareha nendai, ouhi no zizyuu deari, ousitu no tapisutorii kouzyou no tyou demoari, gaka no sinseki deatta kanousei moaru. nieto ha migi no hiza wo mage, asi wo betuno dan ni oi te tati toma tteiru. geizyutu hyouronka no hariettosutoon no iu touri, iku tokoroka modoru tokorokaha humei dearu. nieto ha siruetto de egaka reteori, kabe ka nanika wo bakku ni, mizikai kaidan no totyuu de kaaten wo hirake teiruyouni mie ru. gyakukou ya hirai ta doa kara, sono haigo niha betuno heya ga sonzai siteiruyoudearu. geizyutu rekisika no anarizareppanen niyoreba, sono yousu ga wareware no sisen woiyademo oku heto hiki tukerunodearu. kokuou husai no sugata ha kagami ni ututu teori, hantaihoukou sunawati e no zenpou ni tatu teiru. enkinhou niokeru syousituten ha doa hukin niari, migi no kabe to tenzyou tono sessen wo entyou surukotode iti wo motome rukotogadekiru. nieto wo sikai ni ire teirunoha ou to ouhi dakedeari, kansyousya ha zenkei no zinbutu dehanaku, kokuou husai no sisen wo kyouyuu surukotoninaru.
berasukesu zisin no sugata ha gamen hidari ni egaka re, iizeru ni sasae rareta ooki na kanbasu kosi ni, kotirawo mite iru. kano mune niha santeiago kisidan no akai zyuuzi gaaruga, kare gasorewo uke tanoha nen nokotodeari, e no kansei no nengo nokotodearu. paromiino niyoreba, berasukesu no sigo, egaki kuwae ruyou feripe ou ga meizi tamonode ou zisin ga egai tato kangae ru mono moirutoiu. gaka no beruto niha, kano oukyuu no atorie no kagi ga syoutyou kasi te egaka reteiru.
haigo no kabe no kagami ni zyouhansin ga ututu teiru nin ha, hokano kaiga ya paromiino no kizyutu kara, feripe yo to ouhi mariana dato kakuninsa reteiru. ippanteki niha, berasukesu ha kokuou husai no syouzou wo egai teirutokorode, kagami ni ututu ta husai no zou ha e no poozu wototteirutokoro, sosite husai no musume gasorewo mite irutokoro, to katei sareteiru. tumari rasumeniinasu ha, kokuou husai karano sisen de egaka reteirunodearu.
egaka reta nin no zou nouti, kokuou husai mosikuha kansyousya no sisen kara tyokusetu mie teirunoha nin dearu. karera no sisen ya kokuou husai no kyouzou kara, kokuou husai gairunoha, sakuhin ni egaka reta kuukan no sotogawa dato kangae rareru. soretoha betuni, geizyutu rekisika no. . zyanson ha kokuou husai no zou ha, berasukesu no egaku kanbasu ga kagami ni ututu tamonodato kangae teiru. tadasi kanbasu no syoumen ha, kansyousya gawa karaha mie nai. hokano ronpyou ie niha, berasukesu ga seisakutyuu no kanbasu ha, kano egai ta syouzou niha ookisu giruga, rasumeniinasu no ookisa to onazi kuraidato kangae ru nin moaru. berasukesu ga egai ta kokuou husai no syouzou nouti, nin issyoni egaka retamonotositeha, sira reru kagiri rasumeniinasu ga yuiitu dearu.
kansyousya no sisen ha, kokuou husai nomonotohobo omona ruto omowa reruga, kono ten nituiteha hiroku rongi no tekini nattekita. kokuou husai ga sorotu te syouzouga notameni e no poozu wototteiru saino, nin no sisen ni motozu ite egaka reta bamen deari, ouzyo yasono nyokan tatiha husai no taikutu wo keigen siyoutositeirunodato, ooku no hihyouka ha kangae teiru. mata, berasukesu ha marugariita ouzyo wo egai teirunodato suisoku suru hihyouka moiru. genzai demo, kenkai no touitu nihamada itatu teinai.
heya no usiro no kabe ha inni natteite, e ga turani natte kake rareteiru. kono e no nakani ha, ruubensu niyoru ouidiusu no hensin monogatari no rensaku ya, berasukesu no giri no musuko to syunin zyosyu hoanderumaazo niyoru yaakobuyorudaansu no mosya mo hukuma reteiru. e ha, kono ziki ni kaka reta mokuroku no, kiroku touri no iti ni egaka reteiru. migite no kabe niha, tiisa meno e ga tu kousizyou ni kake rareteiruga, kakudo noseide, kansyousya no iti karahahotondo hitai sika mie nai . sorerano e ha mokuroku kara, ruubensu no ouidiusu no rensaku wo maazo ga mosya sitamonodato tokutei dekitaga, e no naka deha mai ga sukosi mie rudakedearu.
kousei
e no hyoumen ha suiheihoukou ni tu, suityokuhoukou niha tuni bunkatu sareteiru. kono guriddo sen ha, zinbutuzou no guruupu wokitinto sosikika surunoni yakutati, touzi ha ippanteki ni tukawa reta gihou deatta. berasukesu ha zinbutuzou wo tu, kokuou husai no kyouzou wo hukume reba no syouzou wo egai taga, karera ha kyanbasu no sitahanbun wo senkyo siteiru.
sarani hukuzatu nakotoni, bunkatu ha e no hyoumen kousei dakedehanaku, okuyuki nimo tekiyou dekiru. hukisoku na kankaku de sou ni hairetu sareta, butaisouti noyouna hyougen ga kyoumibukai. saisyo no sou ha, e no hidarigawa ni tukidasi ta kyanbasu to, migigawa no ooki na inu to otoko no kodomo de kousei sareru.
banme no sou niha, ouzyo to nyokan, kodomo gairu. banme no sou wo nasu noha, gaka zisin ya, sono sukosi usiro niiru syaperon, metuke yaku dearu. banme no sou ha, e no kaka tta koubu no hekimen dearu. doa no mukou de nieto ga tatu teirunoga, banme no sou dearu. banme no sou ha, usiro no kabe nikakatta kagami no oku de, kyouzou ga utusi dasa reru basyo dearu. banme no sou ga, kansyousya ya kokuou husai ga tatu basyo, toiukotoninaru.
ropesu ropesurei niyoreba, rasumeniinasu niha fookarupointo ga tuarutoiu. marugariita ouzyo, zigazou, sosite feripe yo to mariana ouhi no zyouhansin no kyouzou dearu. nen, geizyutu rekisika no kenesukuraaku ha, kono kousei gaumakuittanoha, nani yorimo meian wo seikaku ni byousya sita seika dearutositeiru.
okuyuki to rittaikan wo un deirunoha, sen enkinhou wo siyousi, zinbutuzou no sou wo omone, kuraaku ga nobe ruyouni tokuni toon no hyougen niyorumonodearu. kono kouseiyouso ha, e no naka de samazamani hyougen sareteiru. mazu sizenkou ha, gaka no atorie to, sono mukou wo tera siteiru. e no zenkei to tyuukei ha tuno kougen ni tera sareteite, tuha hirai ta doa kara more ru komai suzi zyouno hikari deari, mou tuha migite no mado kara sasikomu habahiroi nagare no hikari dearu. seiki huransu no tetugakusya deari bunka hyouronka no misieruhuukoo no ron deha, mado karano hikari ha, atorie zenkei to, e niha egaka renakatta temae bubun towo tera siteori, kokuou husai ya kansyousya mo hikari wo abi teirutoiu.
berasukesu hakono hikari wo tukatte, sorezoreno katati no rittaikan ya komakai bubun wo hyougen sitadakedenaku, e no fookarupointo wo meikaku nisiteiru. migite kara nagare komu hikari ga, kougen ni mottomo tikai iti niiru onna kodomo no kazari himo ya kinpatu wo akaruku kagayaka seteiru. sikasi kanozyo no kao ha hikato ha gyakuno houkou wo mui teite inni natteirunode, tokuni tyuumoku wo hiku monotohanaranai. douyou ni, kanozyo no tikaku niiru zizyo no hoo nimo naname ni hikari gasasiteiruga, kao no hyouzyou niha todoi teinai. sono awai syoku no doresu mo, hotondoga inni natte sizun demieru. ippou marugariita ouzyo ha zensin ni hikari wo abi te tatu teori, sono sisen toha urahara ni, kao mo kougen no hou ni muke rareteiru. ouzyo no kao wo awai syoku no kami ga tori kakomi, kanozyo ha e no naka de tokubetu na sonzai tonatteiru. korusetto ya katai dougi de sime agerareta tiisa na ensuikei no doutai, kyandi ga itutu ta tamagogata no hako noyouna panie de hiroga tta sukaato, to, ouzyo no sugata ha hikari no nakani sen yakani uki tatu teiru. ouzyo no isyou no akarui kinran to, sono asimoto no kurai kage toha, surudoi taihi wo un deiru. sorezoreno kouka niyori, ouzyo no tiisa na sugata ni kansyousya no tyuumoku ha syuutyuu surunodearu.
berasukesu hasarani ouzyo wo kyoutyou surutame, ouzyo no zizyo no haiti wo zengosayuu ni huriwake, meian wo umu younisita. hidari no zizyo no kao ha hikari no houwo muki, sono akaruku tera sareta yokogao to sode toga naname no rain wo egai teiru. hantaigawa no zizyo ha, hidari no zizyo no oomaka na hanten tonatte, nin no mani sankakukei no kuukan ga tukuridasa reru. ouzyo hasono kuukan ni, hogo sarete tatu teiru.
sarani utigawa ni, naname no sen ga ouzyo no sime ru supeesu wo tootte iru. douyou no kankei ga, onna kodomo to berasukesu zisin no zou no mani mo mira re, dotiramo onazi kakudo de kansyousya no houwo muki, sikakuteki na kintyoukan wo umidasi teiru. berasukesu no kao wobonyarito tera si dasu noha hansyakou deari, tyokusetukou ga ata ttamonodehanai. kano tokutyou hahakkirisita sen deha egaka reteinaiga, yori kougen ni tikai iti niiru kodomo yorimo miya suku egaka reteiru. kao zentai ga kansyousya no hou ni muke rareteite miru mono no tyuui wo hiki tukeru. kuroi kami to, hikari no ata tta te ya ehude toga taihi wo umi, gaka no sode ni ata tta hikari ga takumi ni katati zukuru sankakukei ha, kao wo tyokusetuteki ni sasisimesu kouka wo umu.
gaka no zinbutuzou kara, kansyousya no sisen ha hutatabi e no naka heto naname ni hiki tukerareru. betuno dansei ga, naka dehanaku sotogawa, hikato kage dehakkiri tokutei dekiru mono todekinai mono, toiuyouni, gaka no katati wo hanten site kurikaesi teiru. e no kouhou bubun de, toon ni tuyoi kontorasuto wotukerunoha, daitan na kousei senzyutu toieru. akarui hikari wo abi ta sugata ha, zenkei de hukisoku na hikari ni tera sareru zizyo no sugata ni nite iru. hakkiritosita doa waku no katati ha, kagami no waku no katati de kurikaesa reteiru.
kagami ha, habahiro no kuroi waku no nakani, awai sikisai de egaka reteiru. kikagakuteki na meikaku na sen ha, tera si dasa reta kao douyou, kansyou suru mono no sisen wo hiki tukeru. doa ya, zenkei no kodomo ya haikei no dansei noyouni inni nattari naname ninattarisita kao nado, kikagakuteki ni hukanzen na sen ga kansyousya wo hiki tukeru tikara ha otoru. kansyousya niha, kokuou husai no tokutyou wo miwake rukotohadekinaiga, hyoumen ga nyuuhakusyoku ni kagayaku kagami no nakani, zyouki sita tamagogata no kao gakotirani muke rareteirunogahakkiri waka ru. zyonasanmiraa no siteki niyoreba, naname no setudanmen ga siroku kagayai teiru, sono kagami ni uturu zou to zituzou tono tigai de mottomo zyuuyouna ten ha, syouzou wohakkirito utusu niha hansyakou sikanakattahazuno syuui no kabe no usukurasa to, akaruku tera sareta kokuou husai no sugata tono mani muzyun gaarukotodearu. .
zizyo tomou nin no zizyo, kokuou husai no zituzou to kyouzou, syaperon ya metuke yakuno bonyarito tera si dasa reta sugata, ouzyo no sewa wo yaku nin, to ooku ga tuini natteiru. korerano zinbutuzou no haiti niha, nin no otoko, kuno danzyo, nin no otoko, kuno danzyo, to ittei no yousiki gaaru. sotogawa no zinbutuzou no houga utigawa no zinbutuzou ni kurabe kansyou suru mono ni tikai iti wo toru ippou de, karera hamina e no hyoumenzyou, douitu no suiheisen ueni iti suru.
zenkei deha otoko kodomo ga, e no hukuzatusa wo masi, sarani sikakuteki sougosayou wo umi dasiteiru. kano age ta te ha, haikei no dansei no dousa no kurikaesi deari, ippou sonohasyaida yousu ha, tyuuou karasoreta tokoro de mattaku hantai no huniki wo kamosi teiru. kano kudaketa taido, inni natta yokogao, kurai syoku no kami, toitta kano subete ga, ouzyo nihizamazuku zizyo to taisyouteki dearu. sikasi, gaka ha kare wo mado kara sasikomu hikari no nagare no temae ni oku kotode, kono zenkei no zinbutu no hyougenzyou, toon no kontorasuto wo saisyou ni osame ta.
kono e no motu kuukanteki tagisei nimokakawarazu, rasumeniinasu ha, gaka ga egai ta kentikuteki kuukan tositeha mottomo kanpeki namonodeari, tenzyou ga egaka reta yuiitu no e dearu. ropesu ropesurei niyoreba, hokano dono kousei nioitemo, berasukesu gakorehodo doramateikku ni miru mono no sisen wo hiki tuketakotohanai. kareha kansyousya no me wo kouhou, tumari gaka ga egai teirunoga mie ru kyanbasu to, kokuou husai ga tatu teiru souzou ueno supeesu no ryouhou heto mitibii tanodearu. mukidasino kurai tenzyou, berasukesu no kyanbasu no ura, hitai ni ire rareta e no genmitu ni kikagakuteki na sen nadoha, ikiiki to akarui hikari de zeitaku ni egaka reta zenkei no torimaki tatito, taisyou wonasiteiru.
sutoon ha tugino youni kai teiru.
kagami to kyouzou
kyouzou no kuukan kouzou to haiti ha, feripe yo to mariana kisaki ga kansyousya no gawa ni tatu te, ouzyo yasono torimaki no houwo mui teiruyouni mie runoto onazi dearu. zyanson niyoruto, feripe yo husai notame zenkei ni hitobito ga atuma tteirudakedenaku, gaka no isiki ga kokuou husai ni syuutyuu siteirunode, husai no syouzouga ni torikun deirutokoroto omowa reru. kyouzou tosite tiisaku touzyou surudaketohaie, kokuou husai no sime ru iti ha kyanbasu no tyuuou deari, koreha kousei no kuhuu dearuto douzini syakai kaisou no hanei dearu. e no bamen ni taisuru mokugekisya tosite, wareware no iti hahakkirisinai. kansyou suru mono nosobani kokuou husai ga tatu teirunoka, soretomo kansyousya ga kokuou husai no me wo tousi tekono bamen wo nagame teiruto kangae rubekinanokaha, rongi saretekitatokorodearu. kousya no kangaekata no konkyo tositeha, zinbutuzou nouti berasukesu, ouzyo, maribarubora no nin no sisen ga, kansyousya no hou ni massugu gu muke rareteirukotoga age rareru.
haigo no kabe ni kaka tta kagami ha, sokoni sonzai sinaimononituitemo simesi teiru. sunawati kokuou husai, sosite hariettosutoon no kotoba wo kari reba e no mae de, kokuou husai nohuriwosuru kenbutunin dearu. nen ni, hihyouka no sunaidaa to koon ha tugino youni kansatu siteiru.
rasumeniinasu no baai, kokuou husai gairunohaosoraku e no sotogawa nokotodaga, haigo no kabe ni kaka tta kagami no nakano zou niyori, husai mo e no utigawa he torikoma reteiru.
rasumeniinasu ha, nen yanhu a neiku saku arunorufiini husai no syouzou no eikyou wo uke teiruyoudearu. touzi, hu a neiku no e ga feripe ou no kyuuden nikakerareteori, berasukesu nimonazimigaatta. arunorufiini husai no syouzou demomata, kaiga sekai no kouhou ni oka reta kagami ni nin no zinbutuzou ga ututu teori, berasukesu no baai to onazi youna anguru no koukei ga egaka reteiru. zinbutuzou ga tiisasu gite kakuninsi zuraiga, sonoutino nin ha gaka honnin dehanaikato omowa re, e no sekai niha egaka reteinainodearu. rusiandarenbahha ha tugino youni nobe teiru.
zyonasanmiraa ha tugino youni katatu teiru. wareware ha, kokuou husai no kasun da sugata wodou kaisyaku subekinanoka kagami no motu sikakuteki ketten to kankei surukotohaarienai. zissai no kagami ha, kokuou to ouhi nokukkirisita zou wo simesi teitanodarou. egaka reta kagami ni kuwae, kareha egaka reteinai kagami womo anzi siteiru. kyou watasitati ga meni suruyouna e wo egaku niha, mou mai no kagami ga hituyou dattahazudakaradearu.
kaisyaku
rasumeniinasu no nankai saha, doosonkaaru niyoreba, geizyutu, sosite zinsei ha, gensou dearukotowo sisasi teirutoiu. gensou to genzitu no kankei ha, supeinbarokku bungaku no yuumei saku donkihoote niyoku araware teiruyouni, seiki supein bunka no tyuusinteki na kansinzi deatta. kono ten de pedorokaruderonderabaruka no tetugaku geki zinsei ha yume ha, berasukesu no e no bungaku han ni ata ruto mina sareteiru.
zyonmantippuhowaito ha, kono e ga berasukesu no zinsei to kyaria, sono zitende no kano geizyutu wo monogataru rirekisyo tomoieruto nobe teiru. kare ga egai tatada tuno zigazou wo oita oukyuu no heya niha, ouzoku ya teisin ga tudoi, korutesu deno seikatu wo niowa seru obuzie ga naran deita. geizyutu rekisika no suvetoranaarupaasu ha, oukou kizokusyakai de gaka tosite hataraku kotode berasukesu ha, geizyutuka tositeno zibun yasono e ni taisi takai keii wo harau you motome tanodehanaika, sosite tokuni, kaiga ha kikaiteki gizyutu toiuyorihamusiro ziyuu siti ka dato teigen sitanodehanaikato kangae teiru. kono kubetu ha, touzi kara ronsou ten tonatteita. santeiago kisidan ga, kikaiteki gizyutu niyori hataraku hitobito wo gensoku zyogai sita toki kara, berasukesu nitottemo zyuuyouna kotogara ninattanodato omowa reru.
misieruhuukoo ha, tyosaku kotoba to mono nen no boutou no syou wo rasumeniinasu no bunseki ni tuiyasi ta. huukoo hakono e wo, hizyouni syousai ni kaisetu sitaga, soreha kitei suru wake demonaku, geizyutu si wo tyousa sita iroiro na bunken wo sansyou nisuru wake demonakutoiu zyoutai deatta. huukoo ha syudai nikodawarazuni e wotorae, gaka no keireki, gizyuturyoku, tenkyo ya eikyou, syakaiteki haikei ya kouensya tono kankei mo zyuuyousi sinakatta. kare ga bunseki siyoutositanoha, gaka no ito sita saryaku, gaka to nyokan to kansyousya no sikakukankei no, hukuzatu ni kyoutyou sareta tunaga rideatta.
huukoo nitotte rasumeniinasu ha, yooroppa geizyutu no atarasii episuteemee, aruiha kangaekata no saisyo no haturo deatta. e ga arawasu monoha, geizyutu no rekisi no tuno ooki na danzoku , kurasikku to modan no tyuukanten deari, osoraku berasukesu no e niha, kotenteki hyougen to, wareware nimonazinda kuukan no teigi ga sonzai suru hyougen ha saisyuuteki nisorewo samatage tekita kankei kara toki houtta re, honrai no zyunsui na katati de egaka reruyouninatta.
toutatuten tositeno rasumeniinasu
berasukesu ha syoki no sakuhin de, kanrei nitorawarenai hyougen wo kokoromi teiruga, sono ooku wo rasumeniinasu no naka demo toriire teiru. berasukesu no genzon suru yuiitu no rahu zou kagami no viinasu deha, viinasu no kao ha kagami no naka deboyake, mattaku riaritei ganai. zisin wo mite irutoiuyori, touwaku site wareware wo mite iruyouna kakudo ni kagami ha hozi sareteiru. nen ni egaka reta syoki no sakuhin maruta to maria no ie no kirisuto deha, kirisuto to desi tatino sugata ha, haigo no heya ni tuuzu ru kyuuzi you no mado karasika mie nai. rondon no nasyonarugyararii hakorewo itoteki na kouzu dearuto kakusin siteiruga, syuuhuku mae ha, ooku no geizyutu rekisika tatihakono bubun nituite, mein no bamen no kabe ni kaka tta e nanoka, kagami ni ututu ta zou nanoka kousatu wo omone tekitaga, giron ha kotogotoki nai. tuno bamen deha tyakuyou sareteiru ihuku mo kotona tteiru. mein no bamen deha gendaihuu no ihuku wo mini tuketeirunoni taisi, kirisuto no bamen deha zyuuraidoori, seisyo zukai tekina isyou wo minituke teiru.
kono tokutyou ha, nen no bakkasu no syouri nimo mira reru. kono e deha, gendai no noumin ga bakkasu kami yasono nakama ni maziwa tteiruga, kami no sugata ha zyuurai sinwa touri, hadaka no zyoutai dearu. kono sakuhin deha, syoki no syokuhin ko no seibutu sakuhin hoka to onazi ku, zinbutuzou ha kansyousya wo syoumen kara misue, sono hannou wo ukagau kanoyoudearu.
syokuzyo tatiha osora ku rasumeniinasu no notini egaka reta e de, ouidiusu kara tuno bamen ga toriire rareteiru.
tuha, zenkei de gendaihuu no isyou wo tyakuyou sita hitobito, mou tuhasono usiro de, itibu ga kodai kaze no isyou wo kite, heya no kabe no ueno tapesutorii no mae de engi suru hitobito dearu. hihyouka siiradanbe niyoreba, byousya ya hakuryoku no men deha, kono e de tora reta syuhou ha rasumeniinasu deno atukai to missetu na kankei gaarutoiu. nendai no owari kara nendai nikakete egaka reta itiren no syouzouga ha, genzai deha subete purado bizyutukan ni syozou sareteiruga, berasukesu ha kami ya eiyuu, tetugakusya no hunsou wosita douke ya, sono hokano ouke no hitobito wo egai ta. sono ito niha, sukunakutomo yoku sitte iru hitobito nitotteha kokkei na bubun mo kakuzitu niaruga, hizyouni aimaina hyougen ninatteiru.
berasukesu no egai ta ouke no hitobito no syouzouga ha, sono ziten madeha tyokusetuteki namonodeari, hizyouni syazituteki de hukuzatu na hyougen ganasareta. ippou de kokuou no syouzou ha, kyuuden no koudai na heya no mukou niirutoiu kouzu deari, hokano sakuhin yorimo tikarazuyoku kabi na, berasukesu tokuyuu no syuhou ga toriire rareta. berasukesu no gahou ha rui nonaihodo ziyuu de, rasumeniinasu ni tikazui teikuto kyuuni zinbutuzou ga e nosiminoyouni mie tekuru pointo gaaru. gara no nagai burasi wo tukau kotode, kareha hanare ta basyo karasono kouka wo tasika menagara egaku kotogadekitanodearu.
eikyou
nen, napori no gaka rukazyorudaano nen ha, feripe yono sisitu ni kazara reta e wo miru kotogadekiru syousuu ni nakamairi wo hata si, rasumeniinasu ni ookiku kokoro wo ugoka sareta. zyorudaano hakono sakuhin wo kaiga no singaku to yobi, kanka sarete berasukesu heno omaazyu toiu sakuhin wo egai ta.
seiki hazime niha, kano sakuhin ha kokusaiteki ni ninti sareteita. sono seiki no owari niha, eikoku no syuusyuuka ga e no nyuusyu wo mokuteki ni supein wo otozure teiru. eikoku no kantei ie no kan deha itaria kaiga no ninki ga zettyouki wo mukae teitanode, karera ha itaria no eikyou wo meihaku ni uke ta e ni muraga ri, rasumeniinasu noyouna reigai wo musisu ru huutyou gaatta.
derumaaso saku no mai no syouzouga ni, rasumeniinasu de egaka reta syudai nohobo tyokusetuteki na eikyou wo miru kotogadekiru. ikutukano ten de, rasumeniinasu no motiihu wo gyakumuki ni egai teirunodearu. nengo no nen derumaaso ha, tosi ninatte sinsei rooma koutei tono kekkon ni muke te madoriido wo saro utositeiru ziki no marugariita ouzyo wo egai teiru ue, mohuku sugata no marugariita ouzyo no syouzouga wo sansyou .
haikei niha, hanare ta toguti noatarini nin no zinbutuzou ga egaka reteiru. nin ha marugariita ouzyo no otouto de atarasii ou no karurosu yo deari, mou nin ha kodomo no maribarubora dearu. mata kahu tonatta mariana ouhi wo egai ta derumaaso no syouzouga niha, arukasaru no toguti no mukou ni, wakai ou to, osoraku maribarubora wo hukumu kodomo tatiya, kare ni nomimono wo susume ru nyokan tatino sugata ga egaka reteiru.
huransisukodegoya ha nen ni, rasumeniinasu no ettingu sakuhin wo seisaku si, notiniha berasukesu no e wo motoni karurosu yono kazoku wo egai ta. rasumeniinasu douyou goya no sakuhin demo kokuou ikka ha, akiraka ni gaka no atorie wo otozure teirunodearu. dotirano e demo gaka ha kyanbasu ni muka tteori, kyanbasu no uragawa ga mie teirudakedearu. sikasi goya ha, rasumeniinasu ni mira reta atatakaku omomuki noaru enkinhou wo, pieerugasie noiu issyokusokuhatu no iki tuma ru huniki ni okikaeta. goya no egai ta kokuou ikka ha minsyuu muke no butai no ippou de, gaka ha butaisode de muzihi na bisyou wo uka be, karera wo mite zisin de handan sitamaeto siteki siteirunodearu.
seiki, eikokuzin no kaiga syuusyuuka uiriamuzyonbankusu ha, supein dokuritusensou ki ni supein ni tabi wosi, derumaaso niyoru rasumeniinasu no mosya wo teniire ta.
karezisin hasorewo, berasukesu no teni yoru orizinaru no yusai syuusaku dato omotte itaga, berasukesu ha tuuzyou sonoyouna syuusaku wo egaka nakatta. bankusu ha zisin ga kounyuu sitamonowo waga syuusyuu no eikou to yobi, keiyaku niha nagaku kakari, kanarino kingaku wo siharatu tato sirusi ta. mosya ha seiki no eikoku de, syousan sareteita.
geizyutu kai ha nen igo, amari itaria teki denai berasukesu no e wo aratani hyouka si hazime, ferunando yo ha ouke no korekusyon wo ippankoukai sita. nen, anrihu a ntan ntanratouuru ha pateinyooru no atorie toiu sakuhin wo egaki, tyuuou de ehude wototteirunoga mane de, kano migi ni gakubuti ni itutu tayouni egaka reteirunoga runowaaru, migidonari ni emiiruzora, migihasi ni mone nadoto atarasii zidai no sainou wo egai teiru. nen, zyonsingaasaaziento ha rasumeniinasu no mosya wo tiisa na sukeeru de sakusei si, nen niha edowaadoboito no musume tatiwo egai te rasumeniinasu heno omaazyu tosita. ippou airurando no gaka zyonreivu a ri nen ha, berasukesu no honsaku wo motoni syouzouga nen, bakkingamu kyuuden no kokuou ikka wo egai ta. e no seisakukikan niha zyoozi yo ga reivu a ri no atorie wo otozure, osoraku berasukesu no zou no santeiago kisidan no zyuuzi wo feripe yo ga egai tatoiu densetu wo omoidasi tanodearou, zisin de syouzouga ni te wo ire rukotogadekinaika, reivu a ri ni tazune teiru. reivu a ri niyoreba, roiyaruburuu ga tekitou darouto omowa retanode, watasi ga paretto ni syoku wo tyougou si, zyoozi yo honnin ga hude wototte gaataa kunsyou no ribon wo egai tatoiu.
nen no gatu kara gatu nikakete, paburopikaso ha rasumeniinasu ni motozu ku zinbutuzou nado rensaku wo touri egai ta. soreraha genzai, baruserona niaru pikaso bizyutukan no rasumeniinasu situ ni osame rareteiru. rensaku de pikaso ha touzyouzinbutu wo kae rukotohanakattaga, omoni hozi saretanoha, bamen no sizen sadearu. bizyutukan niyoreba, pikaso sakuhin no kousei ha katati, rizumu, syoku, ugoki no tetteiteki na kousatu ni motozu iteirutoiu. pikaso saku meninasu to nazuke rareta nen rityaadohamiruton gaka saku no ettingu ha, berasukesu to pikaso ryouhou no e ni motozu ite egaka reteiru. syasinka zyoeru zyoerupiitaauitokin ha, supein bunka syou no irai wo uke te nen, rasumeniinasu nyuumekisiko to daisu ru sakuhin wo seisaku sita. koreha, berasukesu no e ya, hokano supein nin gaka no sakuhin wo motoni sousaku sareta syasin dearu.
nen niha, bideoaateisuto no ivusasuman ga arukasaru no byou to daisi, rasumeniinasu wo motoni sita koukaizoudo no bideo kaiga wo satuei sita. kono sakuhin haoyoso byoukan nomonode, ouzoku to teisin tatiga ture datte itutu tekite, saigo niha berasukesu no e wo seikaku ni saigen sita eizou de owa ru. sasuman hakonotameni, kentikuka, butaibizyutu ie, hurituke si, isyou dezainaa, haiyuu, zyoyuu, satuei tai nado no tiimu wo kun da.
nen, pikaso bizyutukan de to daisi, berasukesu no e ni syokuhatu sareta sakuhin no tenzi ga okonawa reta. tenzi sareta sakuhin niha, feruminaguazyo , avigudooruaruka , kuraudioburabo , huankareenyodemiranda, maikerukureigu maikerukureigumaatein , sarubadoorudari, hoandaunii , goya, rityaadohamiruton, derumaso, vikkumuniizu , horuheoteisa, pikaso, antoniosaura , hurantufonsyutoukku, ivusasuman , manorovu a rudesu , zyoeru zyoerupiitaauitokin hokano monogaatta.

tyuusyaku

gaibu rinku
daisyoudai takesi daisyoudai tuyosi, nen gatu niti ha, toukyouto edogawaku syussin de oitekaze heya nyuumon toki ha tomozuna heya ni syozoku siteita moto oozumou rikisi. daime daisyouzan. honmyou ha nisino gou nisino tuyosi. sintyou , taizyuu . saikoui ha nisi zyuuryou hittou nen gatu basyo . tokui te ha tuki, osi. syumi ha supootu kansen to eigakansyou. genekiintaigo, oitekaze heya maneezyaa.
zinbutu
syougakusei no goro kara sumou wo hazime, saitama sakae koutougakkou, nihondaigaku zidai wo tuuzi te doukyuusei no saitou motosekiwake hayateumi to tomoni katuyaku sita. makusita tuki deno sikaku wo eru kotoha dekina kattaga, saitou to tomoni oitekaze oyakata moto zentou maime daisyouzan no utidesi tosite tomozuna heya ni nyuumon. nen gatu basyo ni maezumou kara hatu dohyou wo hun da.
gakuseizumou syussin de onazi ku makusita tuki deno sikaku wo era renakatta huruiti kinkidaigaku sotugyou ha hatu dohyou karano raibaru de, zyo no kuti zyonidan de huruiti to yuusyou wo arasoi, renzoku zensyou yuusyou si, sorezore basyo de tuuka suru. sandanme deha ban sumou de yabure te zyo no kuti karaha rensyou de owari, yuusyou mo taisen nonakatta huruiti nisarawareta. soredemo sandanme mo basyo de tuuka sita.
makusita deha, huruiti no hon wari rensyou wo habami ribenzi sitamonono, sono noti kurou si zyuuryou syousin ha huruiti ni saki wo kosa retesimattaga, makusita tuki dezome dohyou douki no kai miti ni sakin zi nen gatu basyo ni zyuuryou ni syousin. sin zyuuryou no basyo ha kati hai to katikosi taga, yoku gatu basyo ni tatiai gayaya osoi kotomoari, kati hai to taihai wo kissi makusita ni kanraku sita.
nenizyou makusita zyoui ni teimei siteitaga, sidai ni tatiai osi tekarano yotu sumou no houwo migaki nen gatu basyo ni sai zyuuryou wo hata sita. ikou, taisyou kosonaiga, dai make monaku seiseki wo nokose ruyouninari zyuuryou zyoui ni sinsyutu. saikoui tai de mukae ta nen gatu basyo ha syoniti karano renpai gaattamonono, sono koukan ki kaesi te sensyuuraku de kati hai to katikosi wo kime ta. zyoban make ga kon demo kouhan ni makikaesu nado antei sita seiseki wo nokosi teirukotomoari nyuumaku no kitai ga kaka ru rikisi no hitori deattakotokara, nen gatu basyo niha zikosaikou kurai no nisi zyuuryou hittou ni banzuke wo age ta.
sikasi, sinnyuumaku ga kitaisa reta gatu basyo dehasono zinkusu touri niha ika zu nitime ni sousou to make kosi ga kettei sitesimai, kati hai to taihai wo kissi ta. sarani higasizyuuryou maime ni banzuke wo sage ta yoku gatu basyo ha syoniti kara renpai sitesimai, kati hai tosarani taihai si yoku gatu basyo, higasi makusita maime ni kanraku sita. gatu basyo ha kati maka ra nebatu te kati hai tositaga, siti ban sumou de yabure, kati hai to osiku mo make kosi tesimatta. dounen gatu basyo kara sisyou no genekizidai no sikona dearu daisyouzan wo syuumei si saiki wo hakatu taga sekitori hukki ha hata sezu, nen gatu giryou sinsa basyo kagiri de geneki wo intai sita. intaigo ha oitekaze heya no maneezyaa ni syuunin si, sisyou tatiwo hosa siteiru.
sono hoka
nen gatu basyo katayama, totinonada sen de makuuti no dohyou ni aga tta. kekka haizuremo make
omona seiseki
syougai senreki kati hai kyuu syouritu.
zyuuryou seiseki kati hai syouritu.
geneki zaii basyo basyo
zyuuryou zaii basyo basyo
kakudan yuusyou yuusyou
zyonidan yuusyou kai nen gatu basyo
zyo no kuti yuusyou kai nen gatu basyo
basyo betu seiseki
kaimei reki
nisino gou nisino tuyosi nen gatu basyo nen gatu basyo basyo
nisino takesi tuyosi nen gatu basyo nen gatu basyo basyo
daisyoudai takesi daisyoudai nen gatu basyo nen gatu basyo basyo
daisyouzan takesi daisyouyama nen gatu basyo nen gatu giryou sinsa basyo basyo
daisyoudai
sikona no imi ha, ookiku habataite, yori ookiku naretoiumonodatta. kono mani zyuuryou syousin mo hata siteiru.
kyakutyuu
kanrenkoumoku
oozumou rikisi itiran itiran
gaibu rinku
daisyoudai takesi sumou rehu a rensu yamamoto sou yamamoto kanade, gatu niti ha, nippon no zyoyuu. kabusikigaisya teiiandoekkusu syozoku. kako sima ken syussin. syumi tokugi ha, eigakansyou, uta.
syutuensakuhin
butai
tasuka tta, to hitoiki tuite kitizyouzi siataa
ginza miyuki kan gekizyou
yume ni muka tte ginza miyuki kan gekizyou
razio
oki tara doyoubi nippon housou hoka, housou, sinetuhousou, kako sima, kako sima, nado nado
terebi
hanamaru ginpei ginga terebi syousetu
odoriko gou satuzinziken satuzinziken
totugawa keibu zikenbo nado tasuu syutuen syutuen
ibarakiken akuawaarudo ooarai kyarakutaaboisu
uta
omotyano tyatyatya minnanouta minnanouta
gaibu rinku yagi mura yagimuraha, nen meizi nen gatu niti kara nen syouwa nen gatu niti made sonzai sita tibaken higasikatusika gun no mura.
genzai no tibaken nagareyama sityuu bu toubu ni ata ru tiiki.
tiri
kasen edogawa, sakagawa sakagawa
rekisi
sonmei no yurai
tyuusei no syouen dearu, kazahaya souhati ki sato no ti deattakotokara.
enkaku
kono tihou hakatuteha katusika gun ni, notini higasikatusika gun ni zokusi ta.
nen meizi nen daiku syou kusei sikou no kiwa, komaki, komaki nitta, hatuisi nitta, nono sita, dai aze nitta, zyuu tayuu nitta oyobi itino tani no kakuson ha dai daiku syou ku ni, omoi i, maehira i, hurumagi oyobi noti hirai no kakuson ha dai daiku syou ku ni, mae ke saki, meito syaku oyobi kou kogane nitta ha dai daiku syou ku ni zokusuru.
nen meizi nen gunku tyouson hensei hou sikou no kiwa, ikano tani de mura rengou tonaru.
maehira imura, omoi imura oyobi notini nagareyama mati tonaru nisidaira i, hire ke saki no kakuson kakuson
nono simomura, hurumagi mura, nagasaki mura, itino tanimura, noti hirai mura, sibasaki mura oyobi notini hokano mura tonaru nakamura nakamura
komaki nitta, komaki mura, dai aze nitta, zyuu tayuu nitta, aota nitta, hatuisi mura oyobi notini sinkawa mura tonaru dai aze mura mura
kou kogane nitta, mae ke sakimura, meito syaku mura, notini kogane mati tonaru touhei ga mura oyobihoka mura mura
nen meizi nen ikano tani de, douitu kotyou yakuba syokatu tonaru.
zyuu tayuu nitta, hatuisi nitta, dai aze nitta oyobi notini sinkawa mura tonaru kiri ke tani, dai aze, kita, sita hanawa, tani, koya, zyousin yado, zyousin yado nitta, ue kaizuka, minami no kakuson kakuson
maehira imura, omoi imura, nono simomura, hurumagi mura, nagasaki mura, itino tanimura, noti hirai mura, sibasaki mura, komaki nitta, komaki mura, hatuisi mura mura
nen meizi nen gatu niti higasikatusika gun nono sita, hurumagi, omoi i, sibasaki, maehira i, noti hirai, nagasaki, itino tani, meito syaku, mae ke saki, kou kogane nitta touhei ga mura heno tobiti wo nozoku , dai aze nitta, komaki, zyuu tayuu nitta, komaki nitta, hatuisi nitta, aota nitta zyuu yo nimura heno tobiti wo nozoku. gen nisihara, nisi kasiwa dai no kakuson ga gappei si, higasikatusika gun yagi mura tonaru.
nen meizi nen gatu niti ooaza hatuisi nitta ni toubutetudou nodasen hatuisi eki ga kaigyou. nen syouwa nen gatu niti higasikatusika gun nagareyama mati oyobi sinkawa mura to gappei si, edogawa mati tonaru.
koutuu
tetudou
toubutetudou toubutetudou
nodasen nodasen
hatuisi eki eki
douro
moriya kaidou kaidou
genzai no tyoumei
oomune aota, noti hirai, omoi i, komaki, komaki dai, sibasaki, zyuu tayuu, naka, nagasaki, meito syaku, nisi hatuisi, nisimatu ke oka, nono sita, higasi hatuisi, hurumagi, mae ke saki, maehira i, mita, matu ke oka, miyazono, kou kogane ni soutou suru.
kanrenkoumoku
tibaken no haisi sityouson itiran haabaado ha, amerika kaigun no hozyo zyunyoukan.
kan reki
tousyo no senmei ha siteiobunyuuyooku deari, sukottorando, kuraidobanku no zyonburaunandokanpanii de kenzou sare, nen ni sinsui, inmanrain no syoyuu suru oosyanrainaa tosite amerika to yooroppa kan wo koukou sita. siteiobupari no simai hune deatta siteiobunyuuyooku ha touzi saidaikyuu no oosyanrainaa deari, ziku sukuryuu wo sonae ta hatu no kisen no nai no seki deatta. nen ni amerikanrain ni iseki, nyuuyooku heto kaimei sareta. nyuuyooku wo hazime tosuru oosyanrainaa niyori, amerika gassyuukoku no taiseiyou niokeru zyoukyaku boueki ryou ha toppukurasu heto seityousi ta. nyuuyooku ha nen gatu ni sausanputon nyuuyooku mano kiroku wo zyuritu siteiru.
beisei sensou
beisei sensou ga boppatu suruto, nyuuyooku ha busou syousen tosite minkanzin norikumiin to tomoni tyouyou sare, nen gatu niti ni kantyou kotton taisa no sikika syuueki, kanmei ha haabaado to kaimei sareta. teisatu ninmu ni wariatera reta haabaado ha gatu niti ni nyuuyooku wo syukkou, nisi indo syo sima wo zyunkou si supein kantai no tansaku wo itta. karibu umi deno supein kan no iti wo suudo houkoku sita noti, haabaado ha maruteiniiku no sanpieeru de gatu niti kara niti made kantai no huusa ni sanka sita. sono noti uinfiirudosukottosyuurei daisyou ga haken sita butai to tomoni santeiaagodekuuba, haiti ni idou sita. haabaado ha teisatu ninmu wo tyuudan si, gatu niti kara niti made baazinia syuu nyuupootonyuuzu ni modori, kono mani norikumiin ha seisiki ni kaigun no gunmu ni tyakunin sita.
haabaado ha heiin oyobi hokyuubussi wo nose te karibu umi ni modori, gatu niti ni kyuuba no arutaresu ni toutyaku sita. gatu niti no asa, supein kaigun ga syukkou sitatoiu densin wo uketoru. uiriamusanpuson syousyou ga santyagodekyuuba kaisen de syouri sita noti, haabaado ha seizonsya no kyuuzyo wo itta. takanami to zasyou sita supein kan ga tousai suru danyaku no bakuhatu nimokakawarazu, haabaado ha mei izyou no sikan to heiin no kyuuzyo ni seikou sita.
nen gatu niti, dai masatyuusettu giyuu hohei rentai ga haabaado kannai de horyo no goei wo itte ita. goei ha horyo ni taisi te sen wo koe te modoru youni meirei sitaga, horyo ha eigo wo rikai sezu, goei ha hokano horyo ga tatiaga tta saini happou sita. kyouhu wo kanzi ta horyo tatiga sawagi dasi tobi kakaroutositatame, goei ha happou si mei wo satugai, mei izyou wo husyou saseta. tyousa no noti, ziken ha ayamatu te hassei sitamonoto keturon zukerareta. kono ikken ha haabaado ziken tosite sira reteiru.
karibu umi niokeru teisatu ninmu ha huyou tonattatame, haabaado ha nen gatu niti ni kikoku sita. haabaado ha rikugun syou ni itiziteki ni hikiwatasa re, heisi wo kikoku saserutameni santeiaagodekuuba ni haken sareta. haabaado ha gatu niti ni nyuuyooku ni toutyaku si, nen gatu niti ni nyuuyooku kaigun kousyou de taieki sita.
daiitizi sekaitaisen oyobisono noti
haabaado ha hutatabi nyuuyooku he namae wo kae, amerikanrain de taiseiyou oudan ni zyuuzi sita. kono kan nen ni kouhani na kaisyuu ga okonawa re, hon no entotu no nai tuga tekkyo sareta. amerika gassyuukoku ga daiitizi sekaitaisen ni sansen suruto, nyuuyooku ha yusousen tosite nen gatu niti ni hutatabi kaigun ni tyouyou sare, gatu niti ni kuroodoburohho kantyou no sikika syuueki, kanmei ha purattubaagu , to henkou sareta.
purattubaagu ha nyuuyooku kara ribapuuru heno do no koukai wo okonai, amerika haken gun no yusou wo tantou, sengo ha do no koukai wo okonai, , mei izyou no kikan hei wo kikoku saseta. nen gatu niti ni saigo no koukai wo oe, nyuuyooku ni modori gatu niti ni motono syoyuusya ni henkan sareta.
henkango ha hutatabi nyuuyooku no senmei de taiseiyou kouro ni syuueki sitaga, mohaya issen kyuu no rainaa dehanaku, nen ni kakyaku kouro kara tettai, poorando no hunagaisya ni baikyaku sareta. sono noti do no koukai wo itta ga, kaisya ha kan monaku tousan si, hune ha nen ni haiki sareta.
sansyou
kono kizi ha amerika gassyuukoku seihu no tyosakubutu dearu ni yurai suru bunsyou wo hukun deimasu. kizi hakokode eturan dekimasu.
gaibu rinku
meonha kagawaken wo butai tosita nihoneiga dearu. nen nosanuki eigasai de hatu zyouei.
kagawaken takamatusi oki no setonaikai ni uka bu megi sima ogi sima wo omona butai ni, danzyo no renai wo egai ta renai rikon oni no hihou ranpuuei nomukounino hon no monogatari de kousei sareteiru omunibasu keisiki no eiga dearu.
taitoru nomeontoha, takamatu minato to megi sima ogi sima wo musun deiru siyuu sima kaiun no ferii no namae.

kikugawa rei rei

seisaku
roke ti
takamatu minato minato
megi sima sima
ogi sima nyuumekisiko syuu no gun itiran ha, amerika gassyuukoku nyuumekisiko syuunai no gun no itiran dearu. nyuumekisiko syuunai niha no gun gaaru. sita ha aruhu a betto zyun dearu.
nyuumekisiko syuu no gun itiran
haisi sareta gun
santaana gun , , nen ni seturitu sareta saisyo no tunoutino tu. nen ni berunario gun ni gappei.
kyakutyuu
gaibu rinku
momizi airu kaede airu, nen gatu niti ha, nippon no zyoyuu.
toukyoutosyussin.
ketuekigata kata , sintyou , suriisaizu , kappu.
ryakureki
nen ni debyuu.
nen ni tanaka nasi yatotomoni, keiemupurodeyuusu no kikaku reeberu okazu. no kyanpeengaaru okazu gaaruzu . ni eraba reta.
nen gatu ni momizi airu ga sinya no sibuya de sirouto gyaru arasi hottoentaateimento de kantoku debyuu wo hata sita.
nenmatu mosikuha nensyo atama, satoyama ka yo meigi de ni syutuen.
burogu ha nen gatu womotte kousin ga syuuryou si, gatu ni heisa sareta.
genzai, intai sitato mira reru.

tizyo kairaku no toriko gatu niti,
daburu tizyo ni seme rarete gatu niti,
kurisumasuenzieruzu hiziri naru yoru no haaremusanta gatu niti,
adarutobideo kantokusakuhin
momizi airu ga sinya no sibuya de sirouto gyaru arasi nen gatu niti, hottoentaateimento
momizi airu teki syuudan tizyo zukusi nen gatu niti, hottoentaateimento
kanrenkoumoku
toukyoutosyussin no zinbutu itiran minami tomo kousokudouro nanyuukousokudouro, mataha nannei yuugi kan kousokudouro nannei yuugikankousokudouroha, tyuuka zinmin kyouwakoku kousei tiwan zoku zitiku nannei si ao syuu ku to kousei tiwan zoku zitiku suu hidari si hyou syouiti wo musubu zentyou . no kousokudouro dearu.
nao, kiten no migisi kara ryou keinan madeha ran umi kousokudouro, migisi kara takane madeha nannei kanzyou kousokudouro minami siro kousoku kouro tono tyouhuku kukan ninatteiruhoka, zenkukan ga aziahaiuei gousen no itibu tonatteiru.
gaiyou
nen ni kensetu ga kaisi sare, nen gatu niti ni zensenkaituu sita. kaituugo no unei kanri ha kousei koutuu tousi syuudan yuugengaisya gen nisi koutuu tou syuu yuugen kousi ga itte iru.
zenkukan ga syasen de kaituu siteiruga, saikousokudo ha migisi suu hidari kan ha , suu hidari nei akema ha , nei mei yuugi kan kan ha tonatteiru.
intaachenzi nado
bangou ran no haikeisyoku gadearu bubun nituiteha douro ga kyouyou sumi no kukan wo simesi teiru. mata, sisetu mei ran no haikeisyoku gadearu bubun ha sisetu ga kyouyou sareteinai, mataha kanseisi teinaikotowo simesu. mikaituu kukan no meisyou ha kasyou.
eiryaku zi ha ikano koumoku wo simesu.
intaachenzi, zyankusyon, saabisueria, paakingueria paakingueria

kokka kousoku kouro ami kensetu sinten kantaizi tyuugokugo
nizyuu minami ita tomo kousoku kouro gen nisikou soku kouro kensei toori me ken gen nisikou soku kouro kanri kyoku kantaizi tyuugokugo
kanrenkoumoku
kokudou kokudou
syou katura sen sen
tyuuka zinmin kyouwakoku no kousokudouro kousokudouro
tyuuka zinmin kyouwakoku no kokudou dai kai senbatu koutougakkou yakyuutaikai dai kaisenbatukoutougakkouyakyuutaikaiha, nen gatu niti kara gatu niti ame de niti zyunen made hansin kousienkyuuzyou de okonawa reta senbatu koutougakkou yakyuutaikai dearu.

dai kai meizizinguu yakyuutaikai yakyuutaikai
dai kai zenkoku koutougakkou yakyuusensyu ken taikai taikai
gaibu rinku
dai kai senbatu koutougakkou yakyuutaikai honebutoha razio no nyuusuwaido bangumi.
gaiyou
razio deha, nen kara nen no naitaaohu nirabu tyanneru toiu waido bangumi wo housou sitekitaga, nen no naitaaohu deha kayoubi kara kinyoubi ni higawa rino nama waido bangumi wo hensei surukotoninatta.
kono bangumi ha honebuto na paasonaritei to honebuto na komenteetaa ga saisin no dekigoto wo mazie te, honne wobutuke ai nagara, risunaa ni taisi te mondaiteiki wo okonai nagara, risunaa totomoni tukuri ageru nyuusuwaido bangumi tonatteiru.
housouzikan
suiyou
paasonaritei
siiba yuu yuu
iwabe ken nasi kyuusyuuasahihousou anaunsaa
kyakutyuu basureen ha, syaryou tuukou obi wo yuusu ru douro de rosen basu nado no tuukou notameni mouke rareta syasen wo sasu.
syaryou tuukou obi ganai douro nioite rosen basu nado no tuukou notameni syasen ga mouke rareru baai ha, basureen niha hukuma reruga basu senyoudouro tosite kubetu sareru. syousai ha basu senyoudouro wo sansyou.
nippon niokeru basureen
nippon deha, basureen ha dourokoutuuhou de sadame rareteori ooku ha rassyu tokina do zyuutai ga oko riyasui zikantai nomini settei , basu senyou reen to basu yuusen reen no syurui gaaru. mata, ribaasiburureen kisei to setto de itte iru douro moaru. keisatutyou siryou niyoruto, nen getumatu zitende nihonkokunai niaru basu senyou yuusen reen to senyoudouro ha , kukan de souentyou , kiromeetoru ninoboru. nao, nippon no kousokudourozyou ha setti sareteinai nihonkokugai deha kousokudourozyou demo setti sareteiru keesu gaaru kouzyutu .
nippon no basureen ha, douro no hidarigawasyasen ni setti surunoga ippanteki daga, nagoyasi deha douro no tyuuou yori ni basureen wo setti siteiru rosen gaaru. hidarigawasyasen ha rokata no tyuuteisya nado koutuuzyuutai no eikyou wo uke yasuiga, tyuuou reen hakorerani kuwae te sasetusya ryou no eikyou mo uke zu, mata houkoubetu singou seigyo niyori usetu suru ippansyaryou to kousaku sinaiyouni seigyo sareteiru. izyou kara teizi sei wo kouzyou saserareru riten gaaru. tadasi, basureen ni tyuuou reen wo riyou suru baai ha, dourohukuin ga meetoru teido izyou hituyou nakotokara, mitihaba no semai douro ga ooi nihonkokunai dehakono housiki ha hokano tihou nihaamari hukyuu siteinai.
toukyouto deha nen gatu ni hazimete megurodoori, tamagawa touri, oumekaidou no san ka tokoro ni yuusen reen ga setti sareta. setti niyori tamagawa touri no sibuya sangenzyaya kan de tuukazikan ga san wari tikaku tansyuku saretakotokara, setti suru kukan ga kakudai sareteitta.
basu senyou reen
rosen basu senyou no syasen dearu. kihonteki niha mozidoori rosen basu ni kagiri tuukoukanou dearu. mata, rosen basu zisin mo gensoku tosite basu senyou reen dakewo tuukouka dearu kouzyutu no syasen tuukou no reigai ni gaitou suru baai wo nozoku .
tadasi, zitensya wo hukumu keisyaryou, gendoukituki zitensya oyobi kogata tokusyu zidousya hakono kisei no taisyougai dearu. keisyaryou ya gendoukituki zitensya nadoha, betto no kisei ya syasen tuukou no reigai ganakereba, izen tosite dai tuukou obi saisa syasen wo tuukou surukototonaru. sorera igai no ippanno zidousya ha, basu senyou reen igai no syasen wo tuukou sinakerebanaranai.
nao, syasen tuukou no reigai ni gaitou suru baai niha, subete no syaryou ha basu senyou reen toha mukankei ni, sono reigaikisoku ni sitagai tuukou sinakerebanaranai.
senyou taisyou tonaru rosen basu ha, hozyohyousiki niyori siteisa rerukotoga ippanteki dearu. hozyohyousiki ni tuugaku tuuen basu , tuukin sougei basu ya nirin , zi nirin toaru baai ha, sorerano syaryou mo hukuma reru hozyohyousiki de siteisa reteinai baai niha, hukuma renai.
taisyouzidousya ha tiiki niyotteha unyou ga kotona ri, rosen basu igai nimo takusiihaiyaa nadono tuukou ga mitome rareteiru keesu zissya ni kagiru baai moaruya, ittei ninzuu izyou zyousya siteiru zidousya mo tuukoukanou na keesu momirareru hozyohyousiki mataha kouaniinkai kisoku niyoru.
basu senyou reen ga mouke rareru douro niha, syuuzitu, basu senyou reen ga mouke rareteiru douro to, asayuu no rassyu tokina do zikantai wo gentei site basu senyou reen ga settei sareru douro gaaru. mata, nitiyou kyuuzitu, sarani ha doyou mo sikou sinai baai ga ooi.
nen toukyou orinpikkupararinpikku no kankei syaryou ha basu senyou reen ha tokurei de tuukou ga kanou dearu.
basu yuusen reen
rosen basu nado ga yuusen tuukou dekiru syasen dearu. basu senyou reen to kotona ri saisyo kara rosen basu nado to kitei sare taisyou ga kakudai sareteiru kouzyutu . nao, basu senyou reen to kotona ri, rosen basu nado ha, basu yuusen reen no tuukou ha nini dearu.
basu senyou reen to kotona ri, rosen basu nado igai no zidousya mo tuukoukanou dearuga, basu yuusen reen uede kouhou kara rosen basu nado ga sekkinsi tekita toki ha, dekirudake sumiyaka ni yuusen reen no soto ni dete, miti wo yuzura nakerebanaranai. mata zyuutai nado niyori yuusen reen no soto ni dera renakunaru kanousei gaaru baai niha, saisyo kara yuusen reen wo tuukou sitehanaranai.
tadasi, rosen basu nado zisin to, zitensya wo hukumu keisyaryou, gendoukituki zitensya hakono kisei no taisyougai dearutame, betto no kisei ya syasen tuukou no reigai ganakereba, izen tosite dai tuukou obi saisa syasen wo tuukou surukototonaru.
nao, basu senyou reen niokeru ooku no baai to kotona ri, yuusen reen deha gensoku tosite zidounirinsya mo yuusen reen no kiseitaisyou tonaru. basu senyou reen deha hozyohyousiki nado niyori nirin zi nirin mo siteisu ru koto ga ooi ga, basu yuusen reen deha siteisa renai koto ga tuuzyou deari, zidounirinsya mo kiseitaisyou tonaru. tadasi, basu yuusen reen no hyousiki ni nirin wo nozoku nadono hozyohyousiki gaaru baai, zidounirinsya mo kiseitaisyougai tonaru.
mata, betto no kisei ya syasen tuukou no reigai ni gaitou suru baai niha, subete no syaryou ha basu yuusen reen toha mukankei ni, sono reigaikisoku ni sitagai tuukou sinakerebanaranai.
senyou taisyou tonaru rosen basu nado ha, rosen basu, tuugaku tuuen basu, sono hoka kouaniinkai ga siteisi ta zigyou you zidousya ga taisyou tonaru. taisyouzidousya ga tiiki niyotte unyou ga kotonaru keesu nituiteha, kouaniinkai kisoku yasono hoka kouaniinkai ga sadame ru kisoku nadoniyori kitei sareru.
basu yuusen reen gaaru douro ha, asayuu rassyu tokino zyuutai suru zikantai ninomi basu yuusen reen ga settei sareteiru baai ga ooi. ippou de asayuu no rassyu tokina dowo basu senyou reen tosisore igai no nittyuu no zikantai wo basu yuusen reen tosuru baai moaru.
basukamera niyoru basureen ihou soukou nado no kansi
tosibu deha, basureen no ihou soukou oyobi ihou tyuuteisya niyori, rosen basu no enkatu na unkou ga samatage rarerutoiu mondai ga hassei siteiru. sokode, nen ni basureen, nen ni kannou siki basu yuusensingou wo dounyuu sita hamamatusi ensyuutetudou ha, nen gatu no basureenkaraa hosou ka hikari biikon siki basu yuusensingou wo dounyuu sita kiwa, dourozyou no denkoukeiziban ni keikoku hyouzi wo okonai haizyo suru sisutemu wo setti siteiru. sosite, nen gatu yori, nisinihon tetudou no itibu rosen wo soukou suru syaryou ni basukamera wo tousai site basureen wo ihou soukou hitosi teiru syaryou wo satuei si, sono syaryou no siyousya ni keikokubun kaki wo hassu ru nado no taisaku wo itte iru. koreniyori, rosen basu unkou no enkatu ka nominarazu, maikaa kara rosen basu heno riyou tenkan niyoru kankyou ya enerugii mondai no kaizen mo hakara reteiru. nao, nen gatu yori toukyuu basu to seibu basu no, nen gatu yori keiou dentetu basu to kantou basu no kaku itibu rosen demo zissi sareteiru. nen gatu yori toukyoutokoutuukyoku no itibu rosen demo okonawa reteiruhoka, toukyuu basu deha zissi rosen gasarani rosen tuika sareteiru.
nihonkokugai niokeru basureen
igirisu
rondon deha, zendou romou man kiromeetoru nouti kiromeetoru no basureen wo seibi siteiru. senyou reen ha sekisyoku ni nuri wake rare, basu nohoka takusii zitensya no tuukou ga mitome rareteiruga, ootobai wo hukumu ippansyaryou no tuukou ha mitome rareteinai. basu no haimen nihasono mune ni kuwae, ihan suruto pondo no bakkin ga kasa rerutoiu hyouzi ganasareteiru. reen nai ni sinnyuu suru ippansyaryou ni taisi teha, basu no untensyu ha daionryou no keiteki wo nara sitekorewo haizyo siteiruhoka, kansi kamera wo tukatta torisimari ga kouka wo age teiru.
kankoku
kousokudouro deha, kyougama kousokudouro no sin nada tu intaachenzi kara zuisou intaachenzi madeno . kiromeetoru no kukan ha tyuuoubunritai kara sotogawa issyasen wo basu senyou reen tositeiru. aoiro no zissen de tosou sareteiru syutunyuu bu ha hasen . basu senyou reen wo tuukou dekiru zidousya ha, nin zyou izyou no noriai zidousya tadasi, nin zyou ikano noriai zidousya ha hitoizyou zyousya siteirukototosareru. tekiyou zikan ha doyoubi toki kara toki made ryouhoukou , nitiyoubi syukuzitu kyuu syougatu syuuyuu toki kara toki made huzan houkou , toki kara toki made souru houkou tonaru.
mata, souru sinai deha basurapiddotoranzitto wo sikou si, nen ikou ha basu tyuuou kuruma miti sei tosite syuyoudouro ni basu senyou reen to basu tei no seibi wo itta.
taiwan
taihoku sinai no itaru tokoro ni basu senyou reen ga seibi sareteiru.
taityuu ai sen ha ka huki asi eki kara sei gi daigaku eki made basu senyou reen gaaru.
zitensya tuukou kuukan tositeno basureen
rondon, edinbara, zyuneevu, berurin, pari nadono tosi deha, basureen ga zitensya no soukou kuukan tositemo katuyou sareteiru. ippansyaryou no toura naikotokara koutuuryou ga sukunai koto, basu to zitensya no sokudosa ga sukunai koto, basu no untensyu ha puro ni kagira rerukoto, basu ha zenpou no mitoosi gayoikotonadokara, basureen wo soukou surukotoha ippan reen ni kurabe te zitensya nitotteno anzenseikakuho ni yuukou dearuto siteki sareteiru.
basureen wo tuukoutyuu no zitensya riyousya ni ankeeto tyousa wo okona tta nen no kenkyuu ha, zitensya riyousya ga basureen nituite, sono tiku no ippanteki na douro kankyou yori ansinkan ga takaku, idouzikan mo tansyuku dekiruto hyouka siteirukotowo akiraka nisitaga, basudoraibaa heno kiki tori deha, hyouzyunteki na basureen no hukuin ha basu ga zitensya to kyouzon suruniha semasu giru, zitensya riyousya ga koutuu ruuru wo mamora naikotoni ikidoori wo kanzi teiru, nadono kaitou wo ete iru.
kono kenkyuu wo hazime tosuru zyuurai no basureen yougoron ni taisi teha, tyousataisyou ga genni basureen wo hasitu teiru itibu no zitensya riyousya ni kagira reteori, senzaiteki na zitensya riyousya no ikou ga kouryosa reteinaikoto, zitensya no riyou wo sokusin site kodomo yao tosiyori nadomo hukumu tasuu no zitensya riyousya ga basureen wo hasiru youninatta baai, basu no unkou ni sinkoku na sisyou ga deru kanousei gaarukotonadoga siteki sareteiru.
rondon sikou toori kyoku no nen no tyousa deha, basureen ha riyou ikou do no ten de, hokano zitensya inhura haba no semai kani zitensya reen, seisiki na zitensya reen, syadou soto no zitensyadou yorimo hikui hyouka wo uke teiru.
basureen ga zitensya no taizi dousya ziko no risuku wo sage rukadoukanituiteha, madahotondo kenkyuu sareteinai. nen no kenkyuu deha, hokano kankyou insi no eikyou wo torinozoi ta baai, basureen gaattemonakutemo zitensya riyousya no husyou risuku ni yuuisa hanaito houkoku sareteiru.
zitensya to basu ha heikinsokudo koso tikai monono, basu no houga saikousokudo ga takaku teisyazikan mo nagai tame, ryousya ha hinpan ni oinuki ai, konzai tuukou sasereba tagaini asi wo hipparu kankei ninaruto siteki sareteiru.
kousita mondai kara igirisu deha kinnen, basu tei wo hodou gawa kara ukai dekiruyouni zitensyadou wo seibi site, basu to zitensya no sakusou wo kaisyou suru rei ga zyozyo ni hue teiru.

koutuusingou yuusen sisutemu
koukyou syaryou yuusen sisutemu
basurokeesyonsisutemu basurokeesyonsisutemu
zoonbasureonteiusu mataha reonteiosu girisia go ambdaepsilonnutauiotaomicronfinal sigma, nen botu ha, higasi rooma teikoku no syougun. nen kara nen nikakete, zenon no teii wo nerai hanran wo oko sita.
syougai
reonteiusu ha darisandosu syussin no siria nin datta. kareha zenon nomotode magisuterumiritoumuperutorakiasu torakia no teikokugun tyoukan tonatta.
nen, syougun no irrusu ga zenon ni hanki wo hirugaesi ta. zenon ha reonteiusu wo toubatu gun no sireikan tosite haken sitaga, kareha irrusu ni settoku sarete hanran gawa ni ne kaetu ta. zenon ha isauria syussin no zinbutu dearutame, teikoku no syuto konsutanteinoopuru no zyuumin nimo banzoku tominasare huninki deatta. soreyue, nen niha basirisukusu ni teii wo itizi ubawa reru zitai ninatteiru. irrusu mo isauria nin deattatame, kareha zibun dehanaku reonteiusu wo teii ni osi ta.
nen gatu niti, senseizyutusi tatiga kitizitu tositakono niti ni, reonteiusu ha tarususu de koutei sokui siki wo itta. sentei reo yono mibouzin uerina ga reonteiusu ni teikan wokabuserutotomoni, touhou kanku ya eziputo kanku no soutoku tatini kizyun wo motome ru syokan wo okutu ta. reonteiusu ha anteiokia si ni koutei tosite mitome rare, gatu niti nikono mati ni iri, syuuhen no kakuti mo mawatu ta. zenon ga koudou wo oko su mae ni, reonteiusu ha koukan wo ninmei si, kouka wo tyuuzou suru yoyuu moatta.
zenon ha rooma nin to higasi gooto zoku karanaru toubatu gun wo haken sita. sireikan teodorikku to sukitai nin yohanesu ha, gatu niti ni anteiokia hukin de hanran gun wo yabutu ta. irrusu to reonteiusu ha papuriusu siro ni tate komori, hanran hei no zantou to tomoni nenkan tae tuzuke ta. nen, hanran gunnai deno uragiri ga oki, siro ha kanraku sita. reonteiusu ha sikei hanketu woukete sereukia de kirikubi sare, syukyuu ha zenon nomotoni okura reta.
irrusu to reonteiusu ha karukedon ha no sinzya dattatame anteiokia sou syukyou karrandion ni sizi saretaga, sore igai karano sizi wo atume rukotoganakanakadekinakatta. ikyouto no naka demo, sizin tetugakusya yogensya no panpurepiusu nadoha hanran wo sizi sita.
kyakutyuu
sankoubunken
, , ,
, , , .
. . . . . .
, . , . , , , , , . .
, , , , , , . . gureetobeesun kokuritukouen gureetobeesun kokuritukouen, ha, nen ni seturitu sareta beikoku no kokuritukouen de, yuta syuu tono syuuzakai tikaku, nebada syuu no higasinaka ou bu ni iti suru. kouen no mei ha, ooi naru bonti wo imi suru gureetobeesun, sunawati sieranebada sanmyaku to rokkii sanmyaku no mano kansou sita yama gatino tiiki ni yurai suru. kouen no toti no menseki ha . . heihou mairu dearu. kouen ha, rasubegasu no kita, oyoso . mairu ni iti si, rasubegasu no tyuusingai kara kuruma de yaku zikan yaku . , mairu kakaru.
zyumyou tosiyowa nomonoga kakuninsa reteori, tanitu kotai tositeha sekaisaityou hisasi no ikimono to iwa reru goyou matu no issyu wamyou mitei, eimei , gakumei no mori to, nebada syuu dai no kouhou de takasa , . , fiito no hoiiraapiiku no humoto no riiman doukutu de yuumei dearu. doukutu ha motomoto nen gatu niti ni riiman doukutu kokutei siseki tosite hogo sare, notini harukani ooki na kokuritukouen ni kumi ire rareta. kouennai niha ooku no kaihatu sareta kyanpu ba dakedenaku, subarasii mikaiti deno kyanpu no kikai gaaru.
kikou
kouen ha kansou sita tiiki niari, nenkan kousuiryou ha teido to sukunai. kousuiryou nohotondoha, yuki aruiha natu no raiu niyorumonodearu. huyu ha suzusiku, natu ha ondan naisi atui. tenki ha kyuuni henkasu ru. riiman doukutu ha nenzyuu kinpen, situdo de antei siteori, uwagi to tekisetu na uookingusyuuzu ga nozomasii.
midokoro
tikei
gureetobeesun ha, haikingu de tanken surunoga mottomo yoi. kouen niha, nagasa . . mairu kara . . mairu no hon no yamamiti gaaru. yamamiti ha, , . , fiito niaru mizikai sizen no yamamiti mauntenvuyuuneityaatoreiru kara, , . , fiito kara hazima ru hoiiraasamittotoreiru made samazamana monogaaru. hoiiraasamittotoreiru ha, hizyouna nanro de, koudo notame, zyunbi nonaimataha keikenbusoku no haikaa nitotteha hizyouni kiken dearu. okuti no ruuto ha, kouen nomotto hanare ta nanbu noitarutokorode, tokiori seibi sareteiru. ooku no yamamiti no kiten niha, gensiteki na syosyooni kyanpu ba de owa ru mihosou no douro wo tootte iku kotogadekiru.
dousyokubutu
syokubutu
syurui no sinyouzyu takagi wo hukumu syurui teido ga kakuninsa reteiru. hyoukou no hikui kansou sita basyo deha byakusin zoku to itiyou no kawa tta matu zoku no issyu ga yuusen suru sinyouzyu hayasi wo keisei suru. hyoukou ga aga ruto momi zoku , touhi zoku nadoga mazi ri hazime, matu zoku no naka demo sekaisaidai kyuu to iwa reru ponderoosamatu ya kouyouzyu no yamanarasi rui mo sugata wo mise ru.
genzai sira reteiru naka de sekaisaityou hisasi no zyumoku, ikimono dearu goyou matu no issyu hakoreranosarani kousyo, sinringenkai hukin no iwa gamuki dasi no basyo ni seisoku suru. nen ni bassai sareta kotai no nenrin wo kazoe tatokoro wo koe teita. kono kotai ha purometeusu to nazuke rare, genzai mo kirikabu ga nokotu teiru. souhon deha kiku ka ya kouen hun ni tae rumonoga mira reru.
doubutu
getu ha rui ya usagi, kittogitune, oogata sousyoku kemono tosite puronguhoon, myuuruzika nadoga mira reru. nikusyoku kemono tosite daihyouteki nanoha koyoote daga, basyo niyotteha pyuuma ya bobukyatto nadono neko ka nikusyoku kemono mo seisoku siteiru.
sake ka no benizakehimemasu to douzoku toiu sakana hakokonisikainai asyu dearu.
bizitaasentaa
gureetobeesunbizitaasentaa ha, beekaa no mati no nebada syuudou gousen soi niari, mainiti, taiheiyou hyouzyunzi koku de kara made hirai teori, natu ha eigyouzikan wo entyou suru. riiman doukutu bizitaasentaa ha, nebada syuudou gousen soi niari, mainiti taiheiyou hyouzyunzi koku de kara made hirai teori, natu ha eigyouzikan wo entyou suru. dou sentaa ha, nebada syuu beekaa kara . . mairu , kouen no kyoukaisen kara . . mairu utigawa niaru. izuremo, kansyasai, kurisumasu, gantan ha kyuukan tonaru. gureetobeesun kokuritukouen niha, tuuzyou ha maitosi , nin kara , nin ga otozure ru nen ha , nin . kouen ha, oyoso man doru no yosan de unei sareteiru.
kyakutyuu
kanrenkoumoku
kokuritukouen kokuritukouen

kousiki saito gureetobeesun kokuritukouen kokuritukouen
. meinpeezi meinpeezi
gureetobeesun kokuritukouen . zyuumonzi intaachenzi zyuumonzi intaachenzi ha, akitaken yokote si zyuumonzi mati zyuugo no nitta niaru, touhoku tyuuouzidousyadou yuzawa yokote douro no intaachenzi dearu.
yokote si kyuu masuda tyouiki no moyori intaachenzi. tou no kouzou ha toranpetto kata tonatteiru.
rekisi

nen heisei nen gatu niti yuzawa zyuumonzi kan kaituu.

tonari
