gaibu rinku
higasinihon kousokudouro nakazi teinen nakazi teinen, seibotunen husyou toha, edozidai no kyouto no esi.
raireki
si kei keireki humei. kyouto no nin. kumo syuu, tatibana hayasi ken to gou su. sessyuu ryuu no gahou wo manabi, sakuga ki ha kyouho kara kanen nokoronikaketetosare, e tehon wo nokosu. kanen goroni bossi tatoiu.
sakuhin
ehon zu ka e tehon kyouho nen nen kankou kankou
ehon hituyou e tehon houreki gannen nen kankou kankou
sankoubunken
nippon ukiyoe kyoukaihen gensyoku ukiyoe daihyakka ziten dai kan taisyuukansyoten, nen dokuritu gyousei houzin kokuritu byouin kikou akita byouin dokuritugyouseihouzinkokuritubyouinkikouakitabyouinha, akitaken yurihonzyou si no iryoukikan.
kokuritu byouin kikou no byouin tosite omoni seisaku iryou bunya niokeru sinkei suzi sikkan, zyuusyou sinsin syougai, kekkaku nadoni taiou suru iryou wo teikyou siteiru.
gaiyou
kekkaku ryouyouzyo tosite sousetu sare, akitaken no kekkaku kyoten byouin tonatteiruga, genzai ha zyuusyou sinsin syougai oyobi suzi zisutorofii, suzi isyuku sei sokusaku kouka syou wo hukumu sinkei suzi sikkan ni taisuru senmoni ryou ga tyuusin tonatteiru. touhokutihou no kokuritu byouin kikou no byouin de suzi zisutorofii byoutou wo yuusu runoha sendai nisitaga byouin, aomori byouin to honin nomidearu.
byouin ha nihonkai ni mensi ta toti niari, umigawa niha kokudou gou, uetuhonsen ga heikou si, haigo no santi wo nihonkai touhokuzidousyadou ga tuuka siteiru. minamigawa ni gairai kanri tiryou tou gairai kensa tou, syuzyutu tou, byoutou ippan byousyou , byoutou kekkaku byousyou, ippan byousyou no kakutou ga, kitagawa ni kaidate no kita minami byoutou zyuusyou sinsin syougaizi mono byousyou, suzi zisutorofii byousyou gaaru. kakutou ha watari rouka de renraku siteiru. gairai kanri tiryou tou no kansei niyori, subeteno tatemono gaakita byouin he ikougo nomonotonatta.
gairai sinryou
uketukezikan gozen toki hun gozen toki syosin no baai ha gozen toki hun gozen toki
sinryou zikan gozen toki hun gogo toki hun seikeigeka, hihuka, zibiinkouka ha gozen toki hun yori sinryou kaisi
sinryou niti getuyoubi kinyoubi doyoubi, nitiyoubi, syukuzitu, nenmatunensi gatu niti gatu niti ha kyuusin
enkaku
nen syouwa nen gatu dounokawa mura no sikiti kihu niyori, syadanhouzin akitaken eisei kai ga kekkaku ryouyouzyo no kentiku wo keikaku keikaku
nen syouwa nen gatu niti syadanhouzin akitaken eisei kai akita ryouyou in tosite zigyou kaisi toko
nen syouwa nen gatu byoutou wo zyunzi zousyou toko
nen syouwa nen gatu niti nippon iryou dan ni ikan ikan
nen syouwa nen gatu niti kouseisyou ni ikan, kokuritu akita ryouyouzyo no bunin no kokuritu ryouyouzyo akita ryouyou in tonaru kekkaku byousyou toko
nen syouwa nen gatu niti kokuritu dounokawa ryouyouzyo to sisetu mei kaisyou kaisyou
nen syouwa nen gatu niti kokuritu akita ryouyouzyo yori dokuritu dokuritu
nen syouwa nen gatu kekkaku byousyou wo zousyou toko
nen syouwa nen gatu niti kekkaku byousyou no itibu wo ippan byousyou ni tenkan ippan toko, kekkaku toko, goukei toko
nen syouwa nen gatu niti suzi zisutorofii byoutou toko wo kaisetu, ippan toko, kekkaku toko, suzi zisutorofii toko, goukei toko
nen syouwa nen gatu niti kokuritu ryouyouzyo dounokawa byouin to kaisyou kaisyou
nen heisei nen gatu niti zyuusyou sinsin syougaizi mono byoutou toko wo kaisetu, suzi zisutorofii byoutou toko wo zousyou, kekkaku byousyou toko wo ippan byousyou ni tenkan tenkan
nen heisei nen gatu niti dokuritu gyousei houzin ka niyori, kokuritu byouin kikou akita byouin to kaisyou kaisyou
nen heisei nen gatu niti suzi zisutorofii byoutou toko ga ryouyou kaigo zigyousyo tonaru tonaru
nen heisei nen gatu niti zyuusyou sinsin syougaizi mono byoutou toko ga ryouyou kaigo zigyousyo tonaru tonaru
nen heisei nen gatu niti kekkaku byousyou toko wo ippan byousyou he henkou ippan byousyou toko kekkaku byousyou toko, kei toko

syutten
gaibu rinku
dokuritu gyousei houzin kokuritu byouin kikou akita byouin uebusaito uebusaito
dokuritu gyousei houzin kokuritu byouin kikou uebusaito omati akuagaaden ha, omati no reisen tosite nen syouwa nen ni meisui hyakusen nohitotuni sentei sareta yuusui no migi ni, sinsui wo mokuteki ni aratani onazi suimyaku no tikasui wo douryoku yousui si seibi sita kouen dearu.
nitiryou no kousui ga kouennai kakusisetu kara dete iru.
omati no reisen
nen teikyou nen , okayama hansyu ikeda mitumasa ga, ikeda tunamasa ni meizi te ido wo seibi sasete goyou mizu tosite tukawa reteita.
ido no basyo ha kyuusinai niarutame, kuruma deha konnan deari toho de iku koto ga dekiru.
sisetu
nen heisei nen ni okayamasi niyori seibi sareru. ennai niha omati no reisen no mizu kumi ba nohoka, houhu na tikasui wo riyou sita tanosii mizu no yuugu ga sonae tearu.
koutuu
tetudou okayamaeki aruiha takasima eki yori uno basu takasima danti keiyu toukou sankou omati naka gesyatoho hun. takasima eki yori toho hun.
kuruma okayamaken miti gou ima zaike toukou yama teisya ba sen omati kousaten yoriomati akuagaaden houmen he. omati no reisen heha toho m.
kyakutyuu arai tosie arai hisae, nen gatu niti ha gaka kousiki hoomupeezi deha aatomessenzyaa , misu nippon kousiki saito deha e tegami si minarai to syoukai , moto hu a ssyonmoderu. oosakahu syussin. oosaka sinai zyogakuin tankidaigaku sotugyou. singapooru zaizyuu.
zinbutu
moto puro yakyuusensyu no arai hiromasa to kyakusituzyoumuin wositeita haha nen nigande sikyo no dai ko tosite syussyou. imouto ga nin ori, uti sitano imouto ga nen misu nippon guranpuri wo zyusyou sita sekaiteki moderu moto aruteimetto sensyu no arai takako araikikodearu.
nen yori singapooru honkon nadono azia syokoku de, e tegami wo gaikokuzin muke ni arenzi sita aatomesseezi wo tousi te nihonbunka no hukyuukatudou wo okonau.
nen no misu nippon kontesuto nioite misu nippon misu kimono wo zyusyou. misu nippon tositeno katudou no katawara, gaikokuzin muke no kankou yuuti kyanpeen no supesyarusapootaa tosite, aatomesseezikarendaa wo seisaku surunado, nippon no huudo bunka wo sekai ni hirome ru katudou wo itte iru.
nen nen, kanbozia oukoku no tenisu renmei no sinzen taisi ni syuunin.
nen, misu nippon rekidai zyusyousya misu nippon kouhosei hu a inarisuto wo hukumu to kontesuto syusaisya ga tyuusin tonatte seturitu sita boranteia dantai misu nippon boranteia kyoukai syodai daihyou ni syuunin suru.
nen, kanbozia nite mizukara ga hokkinin tonatta suriihaatu zaidan wo seturitu. misu nippon kontesuto zimukyoku nadoto taiappu site, tounanazia wo tyuusin tosita sinkoukoku no syakaihukusi katudou no ibento wo tenkai siteiru. suriihaatu no imi niha supootu sinkou kenkou kyouiku bunka kouryuu no bunya ni kansu ru torikumi nohoka, arai sansimai wo syoutyou sitamonoto itizuke teiru.
nen ni kikoku, misu nippon rekidai zyusyousya niyoru misu nippon uneiiinkai syodai iintyou wo rekinin nen gatu, ippanzin to nyuuseki kekkon. nen gatu, daiissi ninsin, nen gessyutu san yotei.
syutuen
kyasuto nen gatu niti terebi are, kininaaru no koonaa de, nen misu nippon guranpuri wo zyusyou sita takako wo toriage ta tokusyuu ni touzyou si, zyusyou sita touzi notasukiwo simai sorotte hirou. mata intabyuu nimo syutuen sita.
sarani, titi hiromasa ga genekizidai kara, doubangumi sougou kyasutaa no itou humitaka to kouryuu ga hukai toiukotode, sansimai gasorotte egaka reta nen no nengazyou wo hirou sita. nakai masahiro no ayasii uwasa no atumaru tosyokan nen gatu niti terebi asahi onazi ku takako to simai de kyouen kyouen
syutten
gaibu rinku
arai tosie kousiki peezi
arai tosie kousiki insutaguramu
suriihaatu zaidan kousiki saito
arai tosie
arai kiko kousiki insutaguramu saitou tetuya saitou tetuya, nen gatu niti ha, no eguzekuteibuanaunsaa.
raireki zinbutu
ibarakiken syussin. ibarakiken ritu ryuugasaki daiiti koutougakkou wo hete wasedadaigaku daini bungakubu syakai sensyuu sotugyou.
daigakuzaigakutyuu ni higasi hatirou ga syusai suru warai zyuku niteo warai wo manabi, sinzyuku koma gekizyou wo hazime kazukazu no butai wo keiken suruga, daigakusotugyou to higasi no sikyo ni tomonai, o warai kara anaunsaa he tensin.
nen gatu, kyuuhou nin ni anaunsaa kisei tosite nyuusya. douki niha kobayasi yutaka, ogasawara yasuko, hukusima yumiko, harayama riitirou gairu.
nen gatu madeha omoni houdoubangumi wo tantou siteita. nen, asa no zyouhoubangumi anatani ontaimu de akisawa zyunko totomoni meinkyasutaa wo tutome ru.
sono noti ha nen gatu no bangumikaisitousyo kara syutuen siteitahanamaru maaketto de ninkizyousyou. nen getugo zikan bangumi nokyou hatu purasu he idou ni tomonai, hanamaru maaketto wo kouban. sono noti, heizitu hiru no zyouhoubangumi dearu toki tu tyao hiruobi ni syutuen.

syutuen eiga
hu a nkiimonkiiteiityaa koukoukyousi nen, touei terebirepootaa yaku yaku
sekai no tyuusin de, ai wosakebu nen gatu, touhou taihuu wo tutae ru banguminai no anaunsaa yaku yaku
sousaku katudou
nen gatu niti ni toukyoukokusai fooramu de moyoosa reta anafesuta de happyou sita gogyou uta ha, gozitu asahisinbun no syutoken han nimo keisai sareta.
syumi no irasuto egaki wo ika si, anaunsaa kousiki saito nai anaunsu no meinirasuto wo egai ta.
episoodo
hamanaru maaketto kouhan no kuizukoonaa kuizudeirii mamadasu no sikai de timeido wo ookiku age teiru. tokuni koonaa syuuban no yuusyousyouhin wo kime rutamenohanamaru bokkusu touzyouzi no hanamaru no kakegoe to poozu ha saitou no toreedomaaku tonatta.
toki tu tyao deha sasupendaa saitou no sinbun koonaa wo tantou. koonaa no boutou deha sasupendaa no himo wo hippatu te patin to karada ni tatakituke teita.
nen gatu niti housou no izumi pin ko no bangumi pin ko no zikan no kikaku de daietto ni tyousen si, ka gatu de . kara . he yaku no genryou ni seikou.
hanamaru maaketto de sikai wo tutome teita okaekumiko ga singata koronauirusu heno kansen ni tomonau haien de nen gatu niti ni tosi de kyuusei sitakotowo uke te, yoku niti niha koukei bangumi no gutu to rakku he kyuukyo syutuen. seizen tono okae tono omoidebanasi ya, zenzitu no kaigityuu ni huhou wo sitte karano sinzyou wo namida wokoraeruyouna hyouzyou de katatu tauede, sityousya ni taisi te kenkou ni kiwo tukatu teita okae sangakouiukoto singata koronauirusu heno kansen ga inotitori ninarunode, kono uirusu nikakaranaiyou, imamade izyou ni kiwo tuketeitadakitai. sorega okae sanno isi ninaruto omou to yobi kake ta.
kyakutyuu
sankoubunken
toukyouhousou hen tosihumi toukyouhousou, nen gatu.
kanrenkoumoku
terebi no anaunsaa itiran itiran
ibarakiken syussin no zinbutu itiran itiran
gaibu rinku
anaunsaa tuusin saitou tetuya tomuson ha, katute sonzai sita kanada ni honkyo wo oku uddoburijzi sya sanka no sekaiteki na oote zyouhou saabisu kigyou dearu. tuusinsya dearu roitaa wo baisyuu sitakotoniyori, nen gatu niti ni tomusonroitaa tonatta.
rekisi
somosomono hazimari ha roitomuson ga nen ni ontario syuu teiminzu no sinbunsya teiminzupuresu wo doru de kounyuu sitakotodearu. roi ha yuuzin no zyakkukentokukku to kyoudou de ontario syuu no kakuti ni sinbunsya to razio kyoku wo tenkai sita.
tomuson ha sekaisaidai no zyouhou kigyou nohitotude, roitaa tono tougou mae niha tuno bumon wo yuusi teita.
tomusonhu a inansyaru
tomusonherusukea
tomusonriigaru
tomusonsaienteifikku
tomusontakkusu akaunteingu mata, tomuson ha nen madeha koutoukyouiku no kyoukasyo no syuppan nadowo okonau tomusonraaningu toiu kyouikubu mon wo yuusi teitaga, kono bumon ha nen gatu ni bentyaakyapitaru dearu ni baikyaku sare, dounen gatu ni sengeeziraaningu tonatta. sarani, tomusonraaningu sanka no tesuto zissi kigyou purometorikku ha, nen gatu niti ni kyouiku siken saabisu , yawo zissi suru hieiridantai ni baikyaku sareteiru.
nen gatu niti, tomuson ha roitaa wo yaku oku pondo yaku tyou okuen de baisyuu si, ryousya wo tougou surukotode goui si, nen gatu niti ni singaisya tomusonroitaa ga seturitu sareta.
tomuson no kousiki na honsya ha toronto niattaga, zissituteki na honsyakinou wo nyuuyooku kinkou no konetikatto syuu sutanfoodo ni oi teita.
nippon houzin
nippon houzin tositeha, nen gatu niti ni seturitu sareta tomusonkooporeesyon kabusikigaisya ga sonzai sita. tomusonkooporeesyon ha, tomuson to roitaa no tougou ni tomonai, tomusonroitaapurofessyonaru kabusikigaisya ni syamei wo henkou site sonzoku siteiru.
sono hoka
tomuson ha, maitosi sizenkagaku niokeru nooberu syouzyusyousya kouho wo dokuzi ni sentei, happyou siteita. kono happyou ha tomusonroitaa ni hikituga reteiru.
gaibu rinku
